games.name: Spinny Dungeon
games.description: The slot machine roguelike. Each time you hit the SPIN button monsters creep closer to you. KILL 'em! LOOT 'em! EAT 'em! Focus on spells or synergies between symbols. Spin to DIE... or spin to SURVIVE!

games.name: Axyn Adventure
games.description: Axyn Adventure is a retro style 3D platformer. You take control of the titular character Axyn and embark on many adventures with your friends Yunn and Leaf. Play in the vast open levels using your big set of moves to get around. Collect as many items as you can to advance the story and unlock tons of content.

games.name: Weapon Rearing
games.description: Idle weapon collection and weapon development game. Legendary weapons can be automatically obtained.

games.name: Dhadoom!
games.description: High-speed parkour obstacle racing with wild courses, fierce rivals, and nonstop action!

games.name: War and Politics
games.description: A strategy simulation that combines elements of war and politics. Take on the role of President (or Prime Minister) and govern the nation, managing government, policy, military, diplomacy, taxes. Win elections and achieve victory in war. Turn your beliefs into reality.

games.name: Imp
games.description: Fight hordes of aliens and visit desolate moons in this arcade-inspired third-person shooter.

games.name: Fall Asleep
games.description: Fall Asleep is a tense first-person climbing game where you’re trapped in a nightmare and the only way out is up. See only the platforms in front of you, make every jump count, and try to escape before the dream swallows you whole.

games.name: Joint Force
games.description: Solve challenging puzzles to reunite Belcho and Nim.

games.name: Apex Path: Bolt
games.description: Fast-paced first-person parkour through a futuristic city. Run, wallride, dash, and uncover the truth behind Bolt and his darker half, Incarnate. and all the other runners.

games.name: Fixora
games.description: The system encountered a chaotic and unwanted code bug, BUG_D, and even more critically, it was spreading. To prevent this disaster, the system generated "ZERO." Its mission is to penetrate the core node of the "BUG" and completely fix [BUG_D].

games.name: Emu Empire
games.description: Build your empire, manage resources, and ascend to greatness in Emu Empire—a quirky strategy game where every decision shapes your legacy!

games.name: Diluted
games.description: Diluted is a 3/4ths puzzle adventure-action game where nightmares seep into reality. Play as Archie, an orphan bound to a living nightmare, and uncover the truth behind his matron's orphanage as you explore twisted forests and corrupted memories.

games.name: Monstro Maestro
games.description: Play as a conductor trapped in a haunted and crazy mansion! As a concert begins, a jealous ghost appears and takes possession of your orchestra. To free them, you must explore every corner of the mansion, complete musical challenges, and rebuild your troupe.

games.name: Roll or Die
games.description: Roll or Die is a fast paced arcade survival game where players control a rolling boulder across collapsing platforms. Survive as long as possible while tiles fall away beneath you, pushing reaction speed and positioning to the limit. Compete for high scores, master precise movement, and see how long you can last before the world gives way.

games.name: Relative Frame
games.description: Explore space in a hand crafted, physics based universe, with immersive sound and atmosphere. Fight and board ships, collect rare cargo, and upgrade your ship.

games.name: Digging a Hole... with a Spoon... Escape from Alcatraz
games.description: A darkly comedic escape game where you dig your way out of a decaying Alcatraz-style prison using nothing but a plastic spoon. Scavenge junk, barter with your toilet-dwelling cellmate, and bolt bizarre upgrades onto your spoon.

games.name: FloraLumina
games.description: FloraLumina is a peaceful, magical gardening game where sunlight, moonlight, and shifting weather impact your garden's growth. Nurture your garden of beautiful hand-drawn flowers, enjoy soft ambience, and play at your own pace.

games.name: Late Hours
games.description: Your job sucks. Your relationships collapsing. And someones watching you from the shadows of Greasezs. Welcome to the night shift.

games.name: Chaturanga
games.description: Chess-variant mixed with roguelite elements

games.name: Monster Ops 14
games.description: Season 2 of Monster Ops! Black Ops soldiers Wraith and Tide know the world is against them, and they can only rely on each other. Two soldiers, forced to go rogue, with a desperate mission. There's no one left they can trust. A NSFW Gay Visual Novel Dating Sim Put out in Monthly Episodes!

games.name: Sweet Casino 2
games.description: Sweet Casino 2 - A simple, aesthetically pleasing puzzle game set in a casino setting. It depicts the daily work lives of five beautiful and lovely casino employees, accompanied by relaxing music. After completing a level, you can view their photos in the gallery.

games.name: Eclipse of Eldergaard
games.description: A dark action-adventure where you race against time to seal the hell gates, gather crystal shards, and stop Umbra’s return on the Bloody Day. Estimated playtime: ~1 hour.

games.name: Fall
games.description: In Fall you guide a leaf gently through the forest towards its final resting place. Controlling wind to influence the leaf's path you dodge branches, falling twigs, and birds flaps of wind. Rest in comfort, knowing this isn't I AM PILL.

games.name: The Dark Heart of Balor
games.description: Archdemon Balor has opened the Gate of Hell into the human realm and hordes of demons and monsters have flooded into your world destroying everything in their path. You must protect those who are still alive and ultimately destroy Balor to close the Gate.

games.name: Journey Express
games.description: A hybrid 2D/3D adventure game pitting the player against countless dangers on a cross-country journey. Manage your resources and keep your party alive!

games.name: Mistward
games.description: Mistward is a survival city-builder set on a mysterious island enshrouded in a poisonous mist! Create light sources to keep the mist at bay, build houses and command humans to gather resources. Explore the island and find a way out!

games.name: Triangle: Cursed Town
games.description: Triangle - Cursed Town is a 4-player online co-op atmospheric horror game. You and your friends are a team sent by the church. Together, you will enter the cursed village, try to collect as much evidence as possible, and complete the necessary ritual to lift the curse. The tools you find in the village will help you learn about the type of demon you're dealing with and uncover the mystery behind the curse.

games.name: Ace of Space
games.description: Ace of Space is a roguelike deckbuilder about growing your armada and rescuing the galaxy from the forces of chaos.

games.name: Conquest
games.description: Conquest is a turn-based open-world fantasy game that allows you to explore a world created by multiple stages of randomness. Every card, interaction, map location, and character is linked to several layers of physical (and internal) decks of cards to ensure you never have the same experience twice!

games.name: Space Trench
games.description: A survival horror roguelite where you salvage scrap, upgrade your equipment, and fight against countless hordes in the tight corridors of the derelicts of space.

games.name: Puzzles in Otter Space
games.description: Don your spacesuit to teleport and super-jump your way through 90 brain-teasing platform puzzles.

games.name: The Power of Fish
games.description: Go fishing! Catch unique fish! And then... interrogate them?! The many fish in this pond may not be what they seem in this fishing-meets-detective game.

games.name: Gravity Station
games.description: Welcome to Gravity Station. The space station that defies the laws of physics. In this headspinning puzzle platformer you control gravity. 28 levels will challenge your wits and reflexes. Will you conquer them?

games.name: Clans of Four Color: Impossible Promise
games.description: Third person action adventure chess indie game, you explore colorful maps and fight the Red Clan to save your family.

games.name: Nocturn
games.description: Nocturn is a strategy rogue-like game where you have to survive eternal darkness. Rebuild your outpost, manage villagers, survive random events and assaults to bring back the light to the world!

games.name: Youchosis
games.description: Overshadowed by multiple Psychosis, you play as Keith as he overdoses and shift through realms looking for the "perfect afterlife" all from his mind and psychological view on reality.

games.name: Space Aces
games.description: Space Aces is an indie space shooter that plunges you into an online universe full of action, strategy, and fierce competition. Step into the cockpit and evolve from a rookie pilot into the most feared Ace in the galaxy!

games.name: A Frog in a Small Pond
games.description: It is a game in which a frog that has heard about the sea from another frog goes on an adventure. Help the frog go through the forest and into the sea.

games.name: Rogueblock
games.description: Classic puzzle mechanics meet roguelite chaos. Stack blocks, draft powerful upgrades, and survive the ever-changing challenges in this adventure.

games.name: A Lenda de Niterói
games.description: Embark on Arariboia’s journey during the 16th-century struggle for Guanabara Bay. Explore lush forests, face Tupinambás and French forces, and uncover ancestral echoes that still resonate today, in an action-adventure with exploration and metroidvania-inspired elements.

games.name: Teddy Knight
games.description: Step into the paws of an unlikely hero and journey through the toy chest! In Teddy Knight, a physics-based action roguelite, you play as Teddy, a brave stuffed knight on a mission to save the toy world from evil. Engage in fast-paced combat with unique “bounce” mechanics in a dark toy universe.

games.name: Chou Crème Collect Whip
games.description: A pop-style 3D sandbox action adventure in a world of sweets! Use your “Sweets Change” mode to blast chocolate or freeze it with ice for slippery chain reactions. Collect over 200 Super Chocolates and explore a relaxing, sugar-filled world full of sweet surprises!

games.name: Terra Invicta
games.description: From the creators of Long War, an alien invasion has fractured humanity into seven ideological factions each with a unique vision for the future. Lead your chosen faction to take control of Earth's nations, expand across the Solar System, and battle enemy fleets in tactical combat.

games.name: Havenhold
games.description: Havenhold is an Action Sandbox MMO inspired by the ancient Far East. Train as a warrior monk, wield primordial powers, craft, trade, and compete against rivals in riveting battles for access to the sacred peak.

games.name: Retro Relics
games.description: Retro Relics is a cozy sandbox and story-driven treasure hunting simulation, where you immerse yourself into nature and search for ancient artifacts with your metal detector. Explore, dig, help other people find lost belongings and complete your coin and relics collection!

games.name: Pingcheng Chronicles
games.description: Pingcheng Chronicles: Pioneering the ARPG Genre with Chinese-Style Battle Royale and Entwined Partnerships[

games.name: DuneCrawl
games.description: DuneCrawl is an online coop action-adventure game where players take on the roles of desert faring privateers. Together, players explore the dust seas by piloting their Dune Crawler, a gigantic walking crustacean festooned with cannons and treasure maps.

games.name: Clean Stack
games.description: A little puzzle game that involves stacking odd-sized objects with fun physics without making anything touch the ground. There are lots of different objects. You'll also need to use potions on the objects to get through the levels, which makes the game even more challenging!

games.name: 100 Los Angeles Cats
games.description: Join the cutest adventure in the Los Angeles, full of cats! Explore the charming hand-drawn artwork of themed locations as you embark on a quest to find 100 adorable cats hidden throughout the game.

games.name: After Juice: Animal Disco Mafia
games.description: Welcome to this graphic adventure! You play as a little hamster named Tofu. You will join him on a series of adventures trough university nights, in a city full of parties and mistery, tons of humor and bad jokes, but above all..... Dru.... i mean, SUGAR!

games.name: City-Racing
games.description: Race through vibrant urban environments against elite drivers in this high-octane street racing game. Navigate waypoint courses, use nitro boosts strategically, and compete across multiple tracks. Master your driving skills to overcome the ultimate challenge: an intense police helicopter chase.

games.name: C4 Clicker: First Mint
games.description: Click through Crypto chaos in this parody clicker-RPG. Farm tokens, slay bag-holding monsters, and mint fake coins with real attitude. Trade what drops — if it even does.

games.name: Dwarfare: All For The Forge
games.description: Be the dwarf you know you are! Build towers to protect the beacons and keep production in motion! Use your weapons to corner any enemies that scrape through. Do it- do it ALL FOR THE FORGE!!

games.name: Smash Out Colony
games.description: Smash Out Colony launches you into roguelite breakout styled chaos. Time your hammer swings, launch projectiles, crush enemy hordes, and adapt fast with game altering tools and physics driven mayhem. Swing fast. Smash waves. Survive the chaos. You got this.

games.name: Pursuit
games.description: You are an illegal courier in a city where speed is survival and the law never sleeps. Deliver forbidden cargo, outsmart police, and master the streets. Every ride is a challenge— one mistake could cost everything.

games.name: Asteroid Odyssey
games.description: Gather and refine resources, shoot your way through countless asteroids and other celestial bodies to gather and refine useful resources from them to build the biggest and the most powerful spaceship-base.

games.name: Lure Of Passion
games.description: "Lure of Passion" is an adult game about a simple fisherman living in a old hut… who somehow keeps catching more than just fish.

games.name: Texplore
games.description:
Texplore is a roguelite digging-and-combat game where every run challenges you to go deeper. Drill through a collapsing Earth, fight what lives below, haul valuables back to the surface, and spend your winnings to push farther next attempt—until you can build the rocket and escape to a harsher world.
Each run is a fast loop of descend → mine & fight → cash out → upgrade → dive again, with risky choices that can supercharge you or end the run early.

games.name: Number Wars
games.description: You will not believe doing math can be so fun. Looking for some fun and thrill while doing math?

games.name: Sky Traveler
games.description: Simulator of life in the Japanese village. Building your own village. Use the portal to move around the islands and collect resources. Once you're ready - go to other worlds. There is work for you too. Relax and feel like a hero in this world.

games.name: DunHero
games.description: Dunhero is Roguelike game where character is in procedurally generated dungeon. Hero has to explore a lot of different rooms, level up character and gather equipment to defeat all enemies and reach final stage.

games.name: StarRupture
games.description: Explore a mysterious planet in an ever-changing open world torn by recurring cataclysms. Build a complex industrial system to extract resources, produce goods and expand your base. Fight against hordes of alien monsters to defend your base and survive, alone or with friends.

games.name: Death Machine
games.description: Conquer the mechanical citadel in Death Machine - a metroidvania, with a roguelite item system. Gather items to gain strength, navigate the perilous machine world, leverage the aid of ancient demons, and seek out dangerous denizens to defeat before the forces of the machine close in on you.

games.name: Spyfall
games.description:
Welcome to Spyfall, a pulse-pounding multiplayer game where trust is scarce, and the stakes are high. Set in a dynamic urban environment teeming with life, Spyfall puts you and your friends in the middle of a thrilling game of deception, strategy, and survival.
In a city alive with NPCs, five players take on unique roles. One becomes the relentless police officer, tasked with uncovering spies hidden among the bustling crowd. The other four assume the roles of citizens—spies with a mission. Their goal? Complete covert tasks across the city without raising suspicion and, above all, avoid getting caught.

games.name: Chivalry Quest: Sword and Flame - Collector's Edition
games.description: Awaken in a war-torn realm where knights and dragons are bound by a forgotten pact. Search for relics, battle the Ashen Knights, and decide the fate of Camelot in this epic hidden-object adventure.

games.name: Blind Memory
games.description: Dive into a haunting mystery where you wake up half-blind and amnesiac, trapped in a time-looping nightmare. Uncover the truth through shifting 3D and 2D perspectives, where every revelation twists reality further.

games.name: Arcane Rivals
games.description: Arcane Rivals is a combo‑driven, voice‑interactive PvP fighter. Weave hand signs, then speak the spell into your mic to unleash anime‑inspired techniques. Chain, counter, and outplay in fast duels where precision, timing, and clear calls decide the winner.

games.name: Malón
games.description: From the plains in the Pampas to the most hostile places in the untamed Patagonia: Manage your own frontier outpost, build new structures, train soldiers, and survive relentless attacks from the enemy.

games.name: Kitty Can Cook
games.description: Kitty has big plans this time! Help Kitty deliver meals while managing space and time. Chop, mix, and toss food fast, with 8 recipes to master and challenge! Pressure Cooker mode turns up the heat with unlockable costumes! Give the demo a try today!

games.name: Lawn Care Simulator
games.description: Take Back the Yard in Lawn Care Simulator! Grab your mower and bring unruly lawns under control. From overgrown backyards to massive estates, cut through the chaos one blade at a time. Satisfyingly slice, edge, and clean your way to perfectly manicured greens — all in a day's mow.

games.name: 8AM: The Swimming Pool
games.description: "8AM: The Swimming Pool" is a suspense game set in a public pool after closing hours. Observe the last swimmers through security cameras and decide whether their strange actions come from exhaustion or something far more disturbing, as you try to endure until 8:00 a.m.

games.name: IdleDragon
games.description: This is an adventure AFK game based on text and images, where you can recruit heroes and collect equipment to defeat the demon king. Cultivate unique custom heroes in the game, create exclusive equipment as the main gameplay, easily place to complete the main storyline, and there is also an endless.

games.name: Aerial Battle Frame: Vernion
games.description: Control a robot with the mouse and challenge yourself to find the way out of a dark, twisting cave!

games.name: Girl Island
games.description: This is a casual island survival game.

games.name: Bult: Hunting Simulator
games.description: BULT: Hunting Simulator is a hunting simulation game focused on waterfowl hunting. The game features a realistic shooting model based on ballistic calculations, dynamic bird behavior driven by an AI ecosystem, and tools such as decoys, calls, and a hunting boat. Players explore natural wetland environments influenced by weather, time of day, and seasonal activity

games.name: Wordy Weapon
games.description: A word-crafting roguelite! As the Wordsmith, fill in the blanks with Adjectives & Nouns to forge ridiculous weapons with RPG-style names and defeat your enemies.

games.name: Intergalactic Cleaning Squad
games.description: Meet Zephyra, Robuddy and Niles in this tactical arcade space action clicker game! Can you defeat all 25 levels of interplanetary evil and restore peace in the universe?

games.name: Professor Galaktionov Dawn of the Robopocalypse
games.description: Embark on an incredible adventure with the eccentric genius Professor Galaktionov and his voice assistant Sara! You’ll unravel the mysteries of the universe and experience mind-blowing escapades.

games.name: Nobu Jump
games.description: A game where you keep aiming upward, no matter how many times you fall. It's a high-difficulty action game — skilled players might clear it easily, but for those who aren't good at games, it will be a real challenge.

games.name: Feed The Reactor
games.description: An incremental unfolding game about feeding fuel into a reactor. Combine elements to produce energy, unlock exotic technologies and explore a strange galaxy.

games.name: Laments of a Platinum Rose
games.description: A mixed-media visual novel about a robot and God. A story-focused visual novel game where the player can explore Nexus and interact with the world in whatever order they like, with a story emphasizing the player's agency.

games.name: Sim Sports Raid
games.description: *NOTE: A CONTROLLER OR STEERING WHEEL IS REQUIRED TO PLAY THIS GAME* SIM SPORTS RAID offers you the excitement of off-road and navigation competition with maximum realism. You can also compete in duels in Challenge mode and participate in events that we will make available to our users

games.name: Ezmeralda
games.description: Ezmeralda is an action-packed top-down RPG where you explore dangerous dungeons, battle powerful bosses, and collect legendary loot. Master fast-paced combat, uncover hidden secrets, and forge your path through a world of adventure.

games.name: 53X Homecoming
games.description: 53x - Homecoming follows a young man who, after a year-long coma from a car accident that killed his father, awakens in a strange town. Now living with three unfamiliar women, he must uncover what happened and rebuild his life in this mysterious new world.

games.name: Super Star Adventure
games.description: Super Star Adventure is the 1-bit RPG which takes you on a wild ride through deep space gone wrong. Your ship hits a meteor field above Astralis, a rogue planet full of weird tech, weirder ruins, and even weirder creatures. It’s lonely out there, but not quiet.

games.name: Protocol Nightmare
games.description: Survive three nights of absolute terror while more than 10 monsters hunt you down. Explore secret paths, complete tasks, use your flashlight and scanner, upgrade your abilities, and face an intense survival experience.

games.name: Endless Furry Slayer
games.description: Fight furries endlessly and survive for as long as possible.

games.name: Fantastic Journey
games.description: Simulation: Hot air balloon ride in dreamlike landscape in Arctic then, floating around worlds in cosmos with captivating music

games.name: Deceived of Joy
games.description: Step into a Psychological Horror Experience where you live in an apartment complex where the walls between reality and nightmares are crumbling. Run for your life, solve small puzzles and use items to help you survive.

games.name: Beat:Keeper
games.description: Vantan Game Academy TOKYO GAME SHOW 2025 Exhibition Match the rhythm of flowing notes, convert beats into power, and defeat your enemies! A psychedelic beat battle to bring sound (freedom) back to the people!

games.name: Aye Leon
games.description: Glide your way to victory in this enchanting 2D platformer. Master your jetpack’s smooth glide through colorful, floating worlds packed with collectables. A full playthrough takes around 20 minutes, perfect for a quick burst of platforming adventure.

games.name: Let's Save Mice
games.description: Join up to three friends in this mouse-sized adventure! Explore, gather resources, solve puzzles, and battle enemies as you try to bring your kidnapped brothers and sisters home

games.name: Past Fate
games.description: Past Fate is an open world MMORPG set in medieval fantasy world where the players freedom is the key element. Choose what you will become and explore the vast world and its continents for hidden secrets and mysteries. What is your fate?

games.name: Kingdoms and Slaves
games.description: Even with the slavery of the weak green-skinned, the kingdom couldn't resist to the curse of the crystals and began to fall, driving them madness, death, and leading the Kingdom to the catastrophe.

games.name: FlipScapes
games.description: Flip, bounce and roll through a Pinball universe filled with playful characters. Pick your favorite hero and immerse yourself in arcade fun!

games.name: Summer Beach
games.description: This is an adult sandbox love simulation game. You will meet and fall in love with many beauties with different personalities, and embark on sweet journeys one after another. Of course, there are no restrictions. In this seaside town, there is everything worth remembering.

games.name: Bots & Mods
games.description: Bots & Mods is a robot workshop simulation game set in a cyberpunk city. Repair and upgrade robots according to specs. Craft components and gather needed materials. Meet the gangs and corporations of Danopolis and experience a cyberpunk story.

games.name: Sales Employee Takeru-Kun
games.description: Hello World!! This game is based on the image of a Japanese arcade game from the 70's to early 80's where you could easily play by inserting 1 coin. The player will work hard at his sales job to save L.Planning, a company that has been reincarnated into another world.

games.name: Day Off: Moonriver Incident
games.description: An atmospheric 2D top-down shooter with an open world and physics. Step into the role of a police officer from an old horror movie. Discover what happened in the town of Moonriver. Use your brain against zombies - create barricades with the furniture, stay quiet, or unleash full-blown action!

games.name: Oddcore
games.description: You have only 5 minutes to stylishly explode your way through the hordes of corrupted entities in a retro FPS, roguelike liminal-nightmare... and Timmee is here to help!

games.name: Heartopia
games.description: Heartopia is a life simulator which gives gamers the chance to slow down and enjoy the little moments in life! No matter your hobbies, personality, talents, or appearance, Heartopia is your chance to share them with the world -- however you want.

games.name: Putt It in Orbit
games.description: Play golf now with this super fun and cute orbital golf! Explore different planets, annoy the neighbors, and see how many levels you can make par on. Launch the ball into orbit and see if you can chip the ball in with Putt It In Orbit!

games.name: Isekai: I'm an FPS Hero Who Was Summoned to Another World
games.description: I'm a die-hard FPS gamer. By mistake, I became the hero of an Isekai story. An incompetent Goddess summoned me to her world to defeat the Demon Lord. I'm in my element—guns, upgrades, action, and hordes of monsters to slay. There's even some magic… and Goddesses…

games.name: Vital Shell
games.description: Vital Shell is a single player top-down arena shooter that puts you in control of mechs inspired by classic fantasy archetypes. Unlock powerful synergies with unique weapons, traits, and abilities as you take on increasingly challenging waves of enemies in a shattered realm.

games.name: Cracked
games.description: Physics-based wizard brawling! In CRACKED, glass-headed mages duel in chaotic 1v1, 2v1, or 2v2 battles. Draft absurd upgrades, unleash wild spells, and shatter the competition in this 3D roguelike PvP arena.

games.name: Cooking Time!
games.description: A chaotic multiplayer strategic shooter where players cook different dishes and throw them at their enemies.

games.name: Cosmotiles
games.description: Embark on a relaxing cosmic expedition. Use your strategic skills to terraform barren planets into vibrant worlds — one block at a time.

games.name: Basketboy's Adventure
games.description: Explore, collect, and fight in Basketboy's Adventure! Uncover stories and hidden secrets across the vibrant, hand-drawn semi-open world of Gugu City. Master dozens of skills and talents, bond with powerful pets, and gear up for an epic battle!

games.name: Tiny Paws
games.description: Your hand-drawn desktop pet digs while you work. Care on breaks. No timers, just cozy idle. Paw to paw, pixel to pixel, helping real animals.

games.name: Orrin's Chessboard
games.description: A unique tower defense game where you build defenses on a dynamic board to repel enemies. Experience the thrill of strategy with an extraordinary degree of freedom.

games.name: Unknown Faces
games.description: Unknown Faces is a 6-15 player multiplayer social deduction game inspired by the Mafia party game, reimagined with darker themes and deeper strategy. Lies, manipulation, and betrayal fuel every round as players deceive, outsmart, and expose one another in a fight for survival.

games.name: King's Devotion
games.description: Experience a world broken by war with one hope of redemption. Follow the tale of a general whose loyalty is put to the test when his kingdom is thrown into shambles. Friends may become enemies, and enemies may turn to friends.

games.name: Noelle
games.description: Trapped in a frozen dimension of depression, you fight despair and fading sanity as memories of Christmas haunt you. Every step is a battle, every memory a lifeline. Can you survive the season when even hope has frozen over?

games.name: Dzyun Battle 2026
games.description: Strafe, jump, and battle for holiday supremacy! Join Team Santa or Team Krampus in high-speed New Year PvP!

games.name: Kumasama
games.description: A large brown shadow lurks in the abandoned factory; the night hides her form.Something terrifyingly massive is concealed within this town.I think of her, and of the days I can never go back to.“KUMASAMA” is a horror adventure set in the present day.

games.name: Tubby's Wonderful Town
games.description: Tubby's Wonderful Town is an indie first-person horror game featuring quests, exploration, item collection and a day-night transition that starts as a friendly colorful to a robotic nightmare full of corrupted visuals and distortions

games.name: Snapshots
games.description: A short game about organizing messy spaces. Place every object back where it belongs, discovering and deciphering secrets hidden amongst the clutter.

games.name: Dungeon Antiqua 2
games.description: Relive the golden age of dungeon RPGs with Dungeon Antiqua 2! A retro 2D dungeon crawler bursting with SNES nostalgia. Hack, slash, and survive relentless side-view encounters! With 10 jobs and endless skill combos, forge the ultimate party and conquer the depths—if you dare!

games.name: Marble's Marbles
games.description: A love letter to the classic marble games. Help Marble find his lost marbles and roll through physics-powered worlds packed with wild challenges and quirky contraptions.

games.name: Pneuma
games.description: Take the role of Zoe, Deaths apprentice, and fight back against the 7 Deadly sins who stole the fragments of your soul, engage in fast paced top-down hack and slash action, fending off hoards of Hell's spawn. Gain buffs throughout the different levels to increase your power to take on the bosses....

games.name: Pichenette
games.description: Pichenette is a fast-paced flick-fighting game! In intense matches, you have to attack, dodge, or block your opponent’s flicks. You can play on your own or locally against a friend.

games.name: Hologuard
games.description: Hello there! Sorry for the rush, but could you start tomorrow? Don’t worry—think of the details as “on-the-job training.” You did study the materials I gave you in advance... right?

games.name: Loot and Order
games.description: Turn off your brain and jump in to the exciting world of sorting loot and keeping your base in order! Endlessly organize your loot in order to fulfill requests for specific items. Complete incoming requests to discover more items and crafting recipes.

games.name: Beat Shapes
games.description: Beat Shapes is a simple incremental bullet heaven shooter game. Defeat enemies of various shapes to collect resources, which you can use to upgrade the skill tree, unlock new bullets,upgrade instruments and explore other upgrades. Grow stronger and challenge tougher enemies and bosses.

games.name: Oriko Days
games.description: Oriko Days is a warm and cute life-sim inspired by classic virtual pet games! You get to look after your very own catgirl friend Oriko - Give her attention, feed her, decorate her apartment, and watch how she reacts.

games.name: Le Petit Raccoon
games.description: Le Petit Raccoon is a stealth cooking game where you must steal food to cook for your hungry guests! Steal food from the grocery store, but don't get caught! Time is of the essence, and your customers are waiting.

games.name: Blasten!!
games.description: Blasten!! is a retro side-scrolling shooter with 6 stages of robot-busting action! Can you master all the robot power-ups and keep world peace?

games.name: Ancient Farm
games.description: Plow, sow, and reap. Sounds familiar? Not this time. Ancient Farm may not be the first farming simulator but it’s the first one to take you back thousands of years into the past, to ancient times where technology wasn’t nearly as impressive as it is today, but humanity was just as hungry as always.

games.name: Entity: The Black Day
games.description: A third-person survival horror action game set in dark, atmospheric underground environments, blending psychological suspense with intense combat.

games.name: Zombie Death Day
games.description: Battle for survival against zombie hordes. This FPS puts you at the frontline of the battle to repel the hordes, and save the human race. Lead the fight by destroying the infected.

games.name: Blocks and Bones
games.description: Blocks and Bones is a zombie wave shooter with endless hordes of the undead in custom maps built by players. Build mode is the sandbox side of the game where you build levels from blocks and publish them online in-game so other players can survive the apocalypse inside your chilling creations.

games.name: Cozy Caravan
games.description: Embark on a single-player, top-down journey in Cozy Caravan, where the arts of crafting, trading, and exploration come together in a beautifully cozy world. Form lasting bonds as you and your caravan journey through charming towns, enriching lives along the way.

games.name: Kinsfolk
games.description: Kinsfolk is an emotional single player adventure game. You will embark on a journey to discover the meaning of family. Explore the beautiful world with atmospheric music. Discover and relive stories about the past.

games.name: Hillbilly Hellfire
games.description: Defend a holy relic in this third-person tower defense repelling waves of hellspawn using divine intervention and a bit of hillbilly ingenuity. Charge headfirst into fierce battles, outsmarting twisted foes with quick decisions, explosive turrets, and precision gunplay as you claim victory!

games.name: Metits Magic 3: The Revenge of Luli
games.description: Trapped in Darski High School, you must uncover the secrets of the Sacred Protein while evading threats like Big Marina and battling terrifying teachers. Solve puzzles, manage resources, and face Luli’s revenge in a chilling survival horror adventure with multiple endings. Will you escape?

games.name: Pixelegend
games.description: In this fantasy world, you will become an adventurer, gradually understanding the world, becoming stronger through weapons and equipment, and gradually resolving various crises.

games.name: Run Quad Run
games.description: Run Quad Run is a top-down skill based parkour game where you escape from the evil shapes to recover the lost artifacts of Cubicland. Navigate through various worlds with different enemies and master your reflex skills in the world of cubes.

games.name: Joltt: Battle Pillars
games.description: A hyper-accessible 2D fighting game where challengers face off in magical jousts. Outmaneuver your opponent's attacks and knock them off their pillar to be the last one standing. No close combat. No blocking. Dodge and counter everything to be victorious!

games.name: 100 Cats Lost in England
games.description: Grab your crayons and hunt for 100 hidden cats across a beautifully hand-drawn map. Play solo or invite a friend to join online, then bring each scene to life with guided color-by-numbers or your own palette — all in a relaxing, soothing atmosphere.

games.name: Throne of Blood
games.description: Celestial power thrums in your veins, Hell’s throne calls, and demons conspire. Will you ascend as savior, tyrant, or something in between? A text-based horror novel, 295,000 words and hundreds of choices, without graphics or sound effects.

games.name: WTF Am I Playing?!
games.description:
WTF AM I PLAYING?! is a first-person shooter with elements of platforming, puzzles, and experimental comedy. It blends fast-paced action with unexpected scenarios, minimal guidance, and surreal humor.

Gameplay & Features:
-Uniquely designed levels with their own mechanics.
-First-person shooter gameplay with puzzle and platforming elements.
-Stylized retro graphics and effects.
-Unique enemies: angry chickens, mutant burgers, giant gorillas, and more.
-Dynamic soundtrack and sound design tailored to each level’s tone.
-No loading screens between core sequences — just smooth, weird transitions.
-Short session-friendly level structure. (15–20 minutes per level.)
-Main content offers around 2–3 hours of gameplay.

And yes — you’ll keep wondering what’s going on, and why you’re enjoying it.

Perfect for players who enjoy:
-Unconventional, unpredictable gameplay.
-Retro-inspired visuals and effects that evoke classic gaming nostalgia.
-Fast-paced FPS action with a twist of humor and unexpected challenges.
-Players with no expectations.

games.name: Pencil Stories
games.description: Explore Tsukinoma village after midnight and share the peace and solitude with Letty whilst everyone is asleep. Unravel secrets of lost letters in this unique, hand-drawn world - no rush, just calm discovery.

games.name: Mate'Morphosis
games.description: Mate Morphosis is a pixel art, chess-inspired puzzle game built around the concept of becoming the piece you capture. Outsmart each board, adapt to evolving mechanics, and hunt down the rival king across every stage.

games.name: Out of Order Zero
games.description: Try for free! Sort the colours faster than they arrive to win the round. Supports up to 4 local players.

games.name: Psycho
games.description: You’re trapped in an endless nightmare, reliving the same haunted night over and over. Every time you escape your house, reality resets. Haunted by grief and stalked by a relentless presence, can you solve the twisted puzzles and face the truth to break the loop?

games.name: Extinct Forest
games.description: Fight for your life in a mysterious, abandoned open world. In Extinct Forest, there are no crosshairs and no HUD — just you and your weapon against intelligent dinosaurs. Explore the desolate wilderness, solve environmental puzzles, and master realistic combat mechanics in this immersive shooter.

games.name: Everyday I Play Board Games with a Summoned Eldritch Girl
games.description: Outer God girl × Socially-Inept Shut-In Comedy

games.name: Maid Cafe Coop
games.description: Become a cute maid in a maid cafe! Prepare to harness your inner moe energy by preparing and serving customers many different drinks and foods with proper Moe Moe Kyun hospitality, and unlock new ways to make them happier. Play singleplayer or with your friends!

games.name: Cyndefense Remastered
games.description: Cyndefense Remastered is a casual Tower Defense game. With multiple modes its really easy to jump into a game and play for 10-20 minutes. For those who desire a challenge, the game offers multiple harder difficulties and maps if the casual experience is a little too casual.

games.name: Upload
games.description: Mow down security programs and hack your way to freedom. UPLOAD is a roguelite where you can't move - you're an AI bolted to a server rack. Your weapons auto-fire while you balance processing cycles between defense and escape.

games.name: Deadrock Salvation
games.description: The frontier of Deadrock Salvation is an immersive Open World RPG on the edge of a gun barrel and temptation hides behind every saloon door. In DR2, you step into the boots of Colt Dawson, a weary gunslinger searching for a second chance in a land that's forgotten the meaning of mercy.

games.name: Rela
games.description: This program simulates astrophysics, allowing the creation of stellar systems in the void and the experience of being one of the celestial bodies.

games.name: Only Down: Not Up!
games.description: After finishing his shift, a crane operator finds himself stuck at the top of a massive crane tower. There’s no climbing up, only down! Jump from platform to platform, avoid falling, and reach the ground to get home. Only Down: Not Up!

games.name: Song of Twilight
games.description: A horror adventure where you control two sisters trapped in a twisted otherworld, fleeing from the insane ruler known as "Father". Explore the realm of madness and find your escape. Your choices shape the story in this multi-ending experience.

games.name: GraviChess
games.description: Use the classic chess pieces to work your way through this complex puzzle platformer. Capture all enemy pieces before they get you to beat the 102 intricately designed levels.

games.name: Fickle Card Legend
games.description: A side-scrolling, non-turn-based card battle game. Level up, collect gear, and challenge stages and bosses with a unique card-clash combat system.

games.name: Hentai Furry Cow
games.description: This is a gentle erotic adventure for those who love furry characters, farm aesthetics, and soft, pleasant sensuality that doesn’t push — but seduces.

games.name: Sweet Cafe
games.description: Sweet Cafe - A simple, aesthetically pleasing puzzle game set in a cafe, featuring the daily lives of five beautiful waitresses, accompanied by relaxing music. After completing a level, you can view their photos in the gallery.

games.name: The Princess Factory
games.description: The Princess Factory is an anomaly-detection horror game where you check princess animatronics for errors in a mysterious factory beneath an abandoned fairy-tale theme park. Your actions may determine far more than simply whether or not you get out alive...but which path will you choose?

games.name: Make it! Kushikatsu
games.description: Get ready for a delicious kushikatsu-making challenge! Make tons of kushikatsu and watch your food cart prosper!

games.name: AiliA
games.description:
Ailia gets lost in a mysterious world.

She has no special power but going into the mirror and walking on the reflections.

Traveling through the maze, playing with reflections, revealing her past with the help of the mirror, her only friend in this world.

Try to use your understanding of mirror reflections to solve the puzzles and help Ailia find her way home.

AiliA is a tricky puzzle game where mirror reflections are made real. Manipulate mirrors and guide Ail through a stunning, reflected world to save her long lost "twin sister" Lia, who was captured inside a mirror.

games.name: Monster Path
games.description: A deck building roguelike-JRPG with a 2.5D storybook fantasy art style accompanied by a dynamic score

games.name: Transilio
games.description: Retro-style frenzy awaits as you dash through demon-filled dungeons in this fast-paced top-down dungeon crawler.

games.name: Pathologic 3
games.description: Save a town from a mysterious plague in this in narrative first-person RPG. Learn the stories of its unusual inhabitants. Shape their lives with your decrees. Diagnose patients. Face the Plague. Connect the dots. Find out who killed the immortal man. Correct your mistakes in the past.

games.name: Snow Ash
games.description: "Snow Ash" is a stand-alone independent game about running a business in the snowy wasteland developed by 3 people! The player plays the role of a courier who delivers goods on the snow. The delivery process will be presented in a light Rogue+DBG way, with some survival elements.

games.name: Evolit
games.description: Take charge of the galaxy's defense! With strategic moves, stop waves of cute yet dangerous enemies and prevent them from reaching the end of the road. Enhance your tactics with a variety of cards and unique towers, and stand against Evo! Strategy and infinity await here.

games.name: The End of Paradise
games.description: A dark, despair-filled RPG + survival horror game set in a post-apocalyptic world. Play as a mercenary survivor in the last paradise. Befriend or kill 6 companions, explore the black mist, face the Old Gods, and choose to save humanity—or end the world.

games.name: Space Station: Beyond
games.description: Play as a variety of creatures or characters and try to survive either maintaining or attacking a space station while everything that can go wrong has already gone wrong.

games.name: Stock Fighter
games.description: Wall Street meets street fighting! Engage in arcade-style trade duels where you buy low, sell high to drive your opponent into bankruptcy.

games.name: TavernHold
games.description: Build, manage and defend your fantasy tavern.

games.name: Blightseed
games.description: A space roguelike, where you fight waves and decipher the language of your enemies. Take breaks between fast action sequences, to translate the attacks and buffs you collected. The more you understand the easier it will be to find the winning synergies to defeat your foes.

games.name: Damn Gravity!
games.description: Parkour, bounce, & flail your way sky-high because the only way is up! There is no saving. There is no loading. There is only gravity. Collect your parachute. You only get one. Your eyes will lie & your depth perception will betray you! Can you reach the top of this hardcore vertical 3D platformer?

games.name: 12 Months to Launch
games.description: A lighthearted resource-management game of running an indie game studio! Play as a first-time indie game producer, making critical decisions for your team's future while balancing quality against viral appeal. Will you become a laughingstock among players, or a shining star in the industry?

games.name: The Unplace
games.description: “The Unplace: Escaping The Cursed Place by Facing Different Trials” is a first-person game where you must escape a cursed place by completing a series of trials.

games.name: Nearly Impossible Odds
games.description: Nearly Impossible Odds is an idle game where you increase the chances of unlikely events happening at the same time!

games.name: Scribble Bots
games.description: Draw your robot, play as your drawing! Face your friends in Scribble Bots, a 2D, physics based sandbox party game. Will your robot be a functional masterpiece, or an inoperable abomination?

games.name: Flappy Witch
games.description: Help Flappy Witch save her beloved cat in this short, magical adventure!

games.name: Don`t Peek
games.description: Don’t Peek is a cooperative psychological horror in a cyberpunk style, blending elements of survival and escape. Experience the atmosphere of fear and uncertainty, make critical choices, and control the fate of your friends — will you save them or leave them to perish in this nightmare?

games.name: There's No Differences: Cake
games.description: Ready to test your detective skills? Find the differences between two similar sweet scenes!

games.name: Prisoner of the Ephemeral Kingdom
games.description: Fourteen from across the world are abruptly abducted to an isolated structure dubbed "Ephemera Manor". They are strangers, but now forced to partake in an ancient and eerie ritual—"the Feather-Burning Rite". A bloodstained drama spanning millennia has silently unfolded...

games.name: Air Blitz
games.description: Experience Pong reimagined! Air Blitz brings arcade football action to the classic formula with 30 challenging AI levels, dynamic speed, and strategic gameplay. Reflexes aren’t enough — do you have what it takes to win it all?

games.name: Log.in
games.description: Log.in is a mystery-horror game where you explore a PC screen, digging through images, videos and files. Hidden somewhere in the system is the location of a girl being held captive. Your actions on the desktop will dramatically change the story and her fate.

games.name: Dreadmyst
games.description: Dreadmyst is an online fantasy RPG running on its own engine. Customize your stats and abilities as you slaughter the aberrations plaguing a cursed land. Choose from four playable classes, level up, farm gear, run dungeons (PvE), and fight other players (PvP). Tab target combat.

games.name: Loreen's Purgatory
games.description: Get ready to be hunted by monsters, surprised by jump scares, and tested by the rage-inducing obstacles! Get ready to conquer Loreen's Purgatory! if you can...

games.name: Slotomancer
games.description: Battle wizards in this roguelike slot-battler! Spin the board to cast spells, summon creatures, and unleash powerful combos. Build your deck, unlock artifacts, and ascend through 15 unique wizard encounters. Every spin is a strategic decision!

games.name: Nightmare On Maple Road
games.description: NIGHTMARE ON MAPLE ROAD is a survival horror game about juggling two characters at once, where failure for one means death for both. Solve puzzles, explore an abandoned house, and endure quick-time events while keeping them both alive.

games.name: Gun Up
games.description: Kill the undead, get new weapons, combine weapons, kill even more undead! Over 20 weapons, INFINITE combinations. Featuring different locations to play and survive. How long can you survive?

games.name: Streaming Race
games.description: Streaming Race is a single-player management game about building and running the career of a music artist. Plan releases, choose singles, manage marketing campaigns, negotiate contracts and follow your results daily and week by week on detailed global charts.

games.name: The Bomb Split
games.description: Two mysterious, challenging platformers where you launch yourself with an infinite supply of bombs.

games.name: Eggtastic
games.description: Eggtastic - A retro puzzle game where you paint, mask, and design eggs to match the target. Simple to learn, fun for all ages.

games.name: Cataclysmic Bite
games.description: Cataclysmic Bite is a dark fantasy horror, turn based RPG where survival means hiding, listening, and holding onto your sanity. You follow a small group of travelers Lila, Malcolm, Elias, Rowan, and Alice. They uncover the truth behind, the demon cat curse spread across the village.

games.name: The Promise Tree of Alden
games.description: The Promise Tree of Alden is a short, atmospheric narrative experience about remorse, memory, and the silence of a forest once alive.

games.name: Forest Hustle
games.description: You are dropped into a forest with one goal - making money and paying off your 100k debt. Collect resources, make deals, upgrade, build and hire workers to do the job for you.

games.name: Paradise: Musubi
games.description: The first sequel to the Boys Love visual novel Paradise. Play through the continuation of the original game's good endings, and unlock flashbacks to the first Paradise from new perspectives. Contains new CGs, characters, and lots of romance!

games.name: Run Coffee Run
games.description: A fast-paced FPS platformer where staying awake is the challenge. Unlock movement upgrades, explore a compact island, drink coffee to delay sleep, and find the fastest path to escape before you collapse. Also features a corporate office tower full of dogs.

games.name: Hiyah Go!
games.description:
Hiyah GO! is a voice-controlled monster battle royale where your words are your weapons!
Drop into a chaotic arena with your team of creatures, shout your spells out loud, and outplay every rival summoner. Only one player or one monster squad will claim the top spot!

games.name: Void Miner
games.description: Mine the void. Call the eclipse. Consume everything. Void Miner is a flashy, relaxed, self-paced idle-roguelite hybrid built around 30-60 minute runs, full of powerful builds and bizarre weapons.

games.name: Alder Forge 2
games.description: Play as a party of 8 in an Adaptive Turn-Based RPG, featuring dynamic boosts, crafting, skill fusion, and the interactive cinematic battles of the Guardians. Join the 4th Squadron and their 3 allies as they confront their toughest foe yet and witness the collapse of an old and tired feudal society.

games.name: Restless Dreams
games.description: Before you realize it, dreams have become a curse. Wander through a darkened room and descend into the depths of her mind. A story-driven first-person horror game that leads you into an abyss of anguish and despair. Dedicated to those who once pursued their dreams—and to those who still do.

games.name: Heartbeat House: Hong Kong
games.description: Heartbeat House: Hong Kong is a dating reality visual novel. Live with eight participants in a shared villa and make romantic choices. Your decisions are remembered, and relationships will change. If the screen flickers or something feels off—please relax and keep dating. The show is still ongoing.

games.name: Love Love Mystery Club
games.description: In Love Love Mystery Club, you’re the newest member of the Detective Club at a seemingly ordinary high school. Through Full Motion Video (FMV) storytelling, your choices steer the narrative—will your heart find tenderness… or will hidden horrors emerge from the darkness?

games.name: Wizard Pool
games.description: Pool, but each ball is enchanted! Master the 7 different magical effects, but don't forget your fundamentals!

games.name: MoonLost
games.description:
A cozy, fascinating and thoughtful adventure in the shoes of a young Wizard at the beginning of his journey as an aspiring expert Wizard.
You'll learn the basics of the Magical Arts, Meditation and study of the Ancient Texts. Will you be able to make your way through the pitfalls of this reality and discover its secrets?

games.name: Rogue Masters
games.description: Rogue Masters is a 6 player co-op horde survival game with souls-like combat and extensive character customization where you fight Entropy in long-lost civilizations.

games.name: DudeGo
games.description: Each map is different and has a challenge for you. Are you ready to conquer the unexpected? Prove that you can handle every challenge the game has to offer. Last survivor is the winner. will it be you?

games.name: Devastablance Mountain Brotherhood
games.description: A dynamic sci-fi adventure, the events of which unfold in a post-apocalypse setting, the catalyst of which is a terrifying nuclear war.

games.name: Eternal Hunt
games.description: Eternal Hunt is a pixel art roguelite action game where you battle waves of enemies. Fight on random maps and upgrade your character with powerful weapons and outfits!

games.name: Unspoken
games.description: Slightly based on a true story, where someone goes through depression and a hard time. On the verge of suicide. It is a 2d puzzle platformer with some psychological horror elements. You will be controlling a whisp, we did this to leaving the interpretation of the Character to the players.

games.name: Femdom Wife Game: Zoe
games.description: "Femdom Wife Game - Zoe" is a relationship simulator. Zoe, your partner, has grown tired of your sex life and wants to try new things. Only she wants to be the one in charge. The game offers both authenticity and immersion. Start your new life with Zoe!

games.name: The Sickle Family
games.description: The Sickle Family is a haunting adventure game about dogs, exploring how inaction, even when everything seems normal, can lead to deep trauma and heartbreak. It tells a real-life story of grief, loss, and the hidden consequences of everyday moments.

games.name: Mr Investigator
games.description: The Time Bureau sent us another unfortunate case to crack. Do what you do best - Use your detective skills, explore the written memories and restore the victim's diary.

games.name: Scam Line
games.description: Scam Line — a tense multiplayer game show for 4–8 players: bluffing, betrayal, and deadly traps. Forge fragile alliances, bluff your way through the host’s twisted trials, and fight to be the last one standing. Cheat. Be the last one standing

games.name: Mystical Herbalists
games.description: A tactical alchemy board-game. Gather herbs, master recipes, finish missions, and compete in local hot-seat multiplayer.

games.name: Barrok 2
games.description: Race high-speed sportscars in time-based challenges or against AI opponents. Master the track, beat the clock, and prove your skills in fast, arcade-focused races.

games.name: The Dagby Files
games.description: Assemble beautiful hand-illustrated jigsaw puzzles to unveil the clues as intrepid Inspector Dagby investigates dastardly crimes. Listen in as Dagby questions the suspects. Then solve the case yourself! Seven perplexing mysteries await. Features 28 brand-new illustrations from artist Dave Montes.

games.name: Shino's Insatiable Pursuit of Knowledge
games.description: In this wacky story-driven adventure, you'll join Shino as she tries to fund her lab, catch the thief who stole all of their money, and... infiltrate a shady cult!? She'll make it through thanks to the power of invention! Probably! Explore a variety of locales to uncover special keywords known as Concepts and Processes, then combine them to unlock new maps, abilities, tools, and even quality-of-life features in this adventure RPG!

games.name: Mechastrike: Red War
games.description: Lead epic armies on Mars in intense autobattles! Mechastrike: Red War offers local 8-player couch multiplayer with smartphone controllers. Strategy meets chaos in fast-paced rounds of explosive action. Gather your crew, scan the QR code, and conquer the Red Planet!

games.name: Hentai Age Vacation
games.description: A calm, magical puzzle game where each completed stage reveals a beautiful portrait. Arrange tiles at your own pace—no timers, no pressure—just relaxing gameplay with soothing visuals

games.name: Fapout 69
games.description: Fapout 69 is an adult visual novel set in a ruined wasteland. As the new owner of a brothel-haven, you must rebuild, recruit girls, fend off raiders and mutants, and turn desire into the most valuable currency: survival through pleasure.

games.name: Blood Money: Lethal Eden
games.description: You arrive at a border region of a certain country, filled with anticipation to meet your long-time online lover in person. Unexpectedly, you fall victim to a romance scam and are kidnapped to “Eden,” a sinister compound, where you begin a so-called “high-paying” job. You will immerse yourself in the complex interplay of cruelty and temptation within the compound. Your choices will shape your destiny and may even alter the fate of others. Life or death? Overnight riches or unwavering principles? The decision rests entirely with you.

games.name: Truth Seekers
games.description: Truth Seekers is a horror multiplayer cooperative shooter game centered around hunting urban legends and folklore monsters. Find and craft items to aid in your attack, all while strategizing with others to learn the monsters' behaviors before they learn yours...

games.name: Gamblers Table
games.description:
Gamblers Table is an idle automation game where you toss coins to earn money. Buy bigger and better coins, unlock upgrades and hire little helpers to automate the process and take care of all the busy flipping work for you. Simple. Satisfying.

Click a coin to toss it. Every time it lands on Heads, you earn money.

The more coins you own, the more you can flip. Buy upgrades to make them flip faster and yield more money. Discover curious interactions and unexpected synergies between different coin types.

Hire little helpers to take care of all the manual labour for you. They don’t complain, and they never question.

Leave your fortune behind and rise to something greater. Start again with peculiar new talents you didn’t have before.

Admire your riches, lean back, and watch your automated coin-flipping empire grow.

games.name: Couch Detective
games.description: Couch Detective is a text-based deduction game hosted by AI. Ask questions to uncover bizarre yet logical truths. You can also feed the AI your ideas to generate new puzzles and share them with friends.

games.name: Wilva
games.description: Wilba is a side-scrolling action platformer game influenced by classic action RPG games.

games.name: Soglia
games.description: "Like all psychic life, creativity also comes from the unconscious. If you identify with the creative process, you end up believing that you are the creator." Soglia is a game based entirely on sound. A dreamlike journey into our unconscious to discover where ideas are born.

games.name: Spook Ltd.: Warashi Homes
games.description: This is the story of a modern Zashiki-warashi who visits a mysterious real estate agency in search of a home to haunt. Explore real apartments in Tokyo, uncover mischievous yokai disguised as everyday furniture and household items, and delve into the mysteries of Warashi Realty.

games.name: KunKunPrison
games.description: This is a fictional story. In the game, you need to gather clues and uncover the secrets of this prison and leave safely. All content in the game is unrelated to reality, and any similarity is purely coincidental.

games.name: Low Value Job
games.description: LOW VALUE JOB is a dystopian job-simulation game where you sort scattered bolts, nuts, and washers by type. Pick up each part, examine it, and classify it accurately. Play solo to steadily raise your score, or compete online with players around the world to test your sorting skills.

games.name: Tatari
games.description: Take the role of a detective from Tokyo who tries to solve the mysterious case of the disappearance of a young camper. You will try to follow the trail of evidence to guide you through an enigmatic and paranormal case connected with a Japanese urban legend. Can you help until the end?

games.name: Big Hops
games.description: Big Hops is a fresh and froggy action-platformer focused on deep movement and emergent gameplay! Use parkour and your tongue to explore 8 huge, colorful worlds full of charming animal friends. Discover a huge range of surprising, playful interactions with gadgets and veggies!

games.name: Nom Nom: Cozy Forest Café
games.description: Nom Nom: Cozy Forest Café is a cozy and relaxed decoration and rhythm game where you manage a cafeteria and befriend cute animals.

games.name: Kalahari’s End
games.description: After your plane crashes, You find yourself in one of the largest abandoned tourist locations in South Africa. Build, Craft, and create your character while combatting the intense heat of the Kalahari Desert in this upcoming realistic open-world survival simulation game.

games.name: Iron Decree
games.description: A medieval fantasy, round-based horde mode FPS. Become a Paladin solo or with up to 3 friends, wield swords and spells to purge an endless onslaught of reanimated horrors. Perform rituals, unlock spells and melee weapons, and uncover the truth behind the enchanted fortress you are sworn to protect.

games.name: Draconis 8
games.description: Draconis 8 is a trading card game that meets the balance and strategy of a tile-laying board game. Each pack includes a terrain card and a complete, balanced eight-card deck for one player — featuring one powerful dragon and seven champions ready for battle.

games.name: Confidential Killings
games.description: A series of murders is shocking Hollywood! Use your detective skills: search the crime scene, find clues, solve the mystery. Who is pulling the strings behind these Confidential Killings?

games.name: Quarantine Zone: The Last Check
games.description: "Papers, Please" meets zombie apocalypse. Command the last blockade, inspect survivors, and decide their fate: trust, quarantine, or liquidate. Expand your base, upgrade defenses, and fend off hordes. Every step shapes humanity’s survival. Your choice matters and every mistake costs a life...

games.name: RGB GlitchGazer
games.description: A mad and romantic ADV. Unravel a strange world of science and philosophy with a mecha girl, zombie girl, or beastfolk. Some paths may disturb you... or thrill you.

games.name: Gamer Stop Simulator
games.description: Gamer Stop Simulator is a simulation game where you manage a video game store. Buy games and consoles from customers, repair broken devices, test games, and add rare items to your collection. Negotiate prices, expand your store, and grow your business in this exciting retail experience!

games.name: Isekai Adventurer Guild
games.description: One day, countless Isekai adventurers were suddenly summoned, and at the same time, numerous monsters appeared. As the master of the Adventurers Guild, you will train adventurers to solve the anomalies. Experience the fun of SRPG alongside various adventurers!

games.name: Galactic Overlord
games.description: Galactic Overlord is a rogue-lite deck-builder. Travel the galaxy, hone your deck, find strange and powerful artifacts, and defeat the rebels! Balance your deck carefully to maintain the favor you have with the different factions!

games.name: Kuukiyomi: Consider It World - Thailand Ver.
games.description: Introducing the New Title: “KUUKIYOMI: Consider It World”! This time, the stage is Thailand! Test your ability to read the room in familiar, everyday Thai scenarios, packed with cultural quirks and “That’s so true!” moments.

games.name: Grave Stakes
games.description: Survive an underground game show by outplaying up to 7 other competitors. You'll either walk away with the enormous cash prize...or you won't walk away at all. Good Luck!

games.name: Office 5
games.description: Protect your family. Protect your coworkers. Verify today. Office 5 is an analog indie horror experience where the player can never be certain who is human or who is unverified.

games.name: Kindred: High Tide
games.description: In this mystery horror visual novel, help lead a loyal crew across deadly waters. Encounter beasts, explore forgotten seas, but most importantly: don't let this become your final voyage. A deeper mystery looms, and the sea is not your only enemy. Choose a side; don't look back.

games.name: SpelBrawl
games.description: SpelBrawl is a roguelite word game with challenging and rewarding gameplay. Play solo to unlock spells, intervals, and unique characters to extend words. Battle others online and test your luck to become the ultimate SpelBrawler!

games.name: After Dark
games.description: After Dark is a first-person endless wave zombie shooter set across multiple locations. Survive as long as you can against relentless hordes of the dead in a fight that only ends when you do.

games.name: Ratsukade
games.description: Drag heavy gems, slay giant bugs, find mystical items and craft overpowered builds in this action packed physics based roguelike!

games.name: Anxiety Arcade
games.description: Anxiety Arcade is a short, surreal narrative game about living with anxiety — and how it feels when your own thoughts turn into puzzles.

games.name: Word95
games.description: Play word games and get points to build a dictionary one word at a time

games.name: Flip Hammy
games.description: Flip Hammy is a 2D puzzle game with unique stages that you can flip its face. Let's clear simple rules puzzles with Hammy!

games.name: Pixelance
games.description: Pixelance is a turn based roguelike adventure RPG with permadeath and multiple quests within dungeons and a vast overworld.

games.name: The Honest Little Fisher
games.description: A cozy fishing game made with care, full of discovery, gentle progression, and hundreds of things to catch. Set out to explore the sea, upgrade your boat, and uncover stories, fun facts, and legendary finds along the way.

games.name: Synthetic Orders
games.description: A quick, hypercasual pattern-memory game. Watch the left-right yellow signals, memorize the sequence, and repeat it using two simple buttons - no grinding, no complex mechanics.

games.name: Dream of Corpse Lady
games.description: Cards, battle! Someone woke up the sleeping Corpse Lady... Perhaps, the world needs to pay a price for the awakening... In this game, you will play the role of the awakened Corpse Lady, try various strange construction combinations, discover powerful opponents, and then knock them all down!

games.name: WonderKing
games.description: Genre: Free 2D Side-Scrolling MMORPG Key Features: Class selection and job advancement system Quest-based story progression Party play and guild system A wide variety of mounts, pets, and costume customization PvE dungeons and PvP content available

games.name: Grexovka Village
games.description: You've come to the village to "recharge." An hour later, you're looking for something you've lost, sniffing incense in a barn, and arguing with people who smile when it suits them. Here, a glance, a pause, and what's under the rug decide everything.

games.name: TwentyOne
games.description: A deadly psychological card game where the stakes are your life. Each opponent has their own twisted rules, and every decision could be your last. The closer you get to 21, the further you fall into madness. Play the game - or let the game play you.

games.name: Hank: Drowning on Dry Land
games.description: Hank: Drowning On Dry Land is a time-traveling game in witch you play as Hank - a Batman-esque vigilante fighting a sadistic mastermind calling himself The Unraveler.

games.name: Letifer
games.description: Take on the demonic threat as Letifer in an action-packed mix of twin-stick shooter, roguelite, and survivors-like gameplay. Gun through brutal Rituals, shape your build with powerful upgrades, and return to base for lasting upgrades to your character and gear.

games.name: Sign Craft: Simulator
games.description: Sign Craft: Simulator puts you in the steel-toe boots of a Sign Technician! It is a 3D first-person game that allows you to utilize power tools and equipment to construct signs!

games.name: The Real Faces of Vtuber
games.description: In this murder committed in a VTuber agency, the identity of the Nakanohito is key to cracking the case.

games.name: Echoes in the Deep: A Fateforge Tale
games.description: It’s time for one last heist. How you achieve it is down to you. Explore the Free City, prepare and equip your crew, keep them loyal and navigate the difficult choices you’ll need to take to succeed.

games.name: Meal: Mystery Escape Room
games.description: Meal is a mystery escape room game, where you must solve a series of puzzles to progress and discover the truth behind an enigmatic hotel. With challenges and secrets, combining exploration, varied puzzles, and an intriguing story. Can you solve the puzzles and escape from the illuminated hotel?

games.name: Spiritual Bond: Breaking the Curse, Intertwining Fates
games.description: “Anyone who is destined, please help us....” A text-based puzzle game themed around shrine Miko. Explore an abandoned village, ancient and mysterious shrines, and eerie sacrificial rituals by combining nouns and verbs. Gradually uncover the truth hidden behind the story.

games.name: Valor & Blade
games.description:
Valor & Blade is a focused, Souls-inspired action RPG centered on deliberate combat, consistency, and mastery.

Descend into a cursed gothic dungeon that reshapes itself every cycle. While the dungeon layout changes, enemy encounters remain consistent, allowing players to refine their skill, timing, and positioning through repetition rather than progression grinding.

games.name: Elemental Brawl
games.description: Elemental Brawl is a multiplayer party game for everyone who likes to beat up their friends (in a good way!) with the power of the elements! Compete across interactive arenas, mix and match elements for new and exciting attacks, and use them to bring even more excitement into other players' lives!

games.name: Frostrain2
games.description: Become the last conductor and rule over the final train society in a frozen world. Gather, expand, and forge your train while building powerful synergies with mighty artifacts. Your position—and the safety of your passengers—now rests in your hands.

games.name: Laugh Track
games.description: You're now the lead writer for Juno's World, a perfectly normal sitcom in which nothing strange or horrible happens, ever! Choose your scripts, decide what characters to build relationships with, and keep those audience ratings high -- or get cancelled in more ways than one! Welcome to Must See TV.

games.name: Magic Forge Tycoon
games.description: Craft enchanted weapons, experiment to improve quality, trade resources, and shape rival kingdoms’ destinies in this relaxed fantasy tycoon. Fulfill contracts, upgrade your forge, and choose whether to keep peace or stoke war to become Korendor’s most renowned blacksmith.

games.name: Mech Builder 3D
games.description: Become a master modeler in Mech Builder 3D. Experience the relaxing process of assembling, customizing, posing and displaying all the 61 model kits with complete freedom without ever losing a piece.

games.name: Arena of Suffering
games.description: A classic RPG of strategic turn-based combat, dangerous dungeon crawls, and total party customization. Build the best heroes in the land — and by the end, you won’t just face the final boss. You’ll be the final boss.

games.name: Idle Geometry Defense
games.description: Defend against endless waves of deadly red cubes in this futuristic idle tower defense game. Upgrade your towers, deploy mini-towers, speed up time, and rotate the battlefield in full 360°. Infinite levels. Infinite upgrades. No mercy.

games.name: Adventure Seekers: Lost to Sea - Collector's Edition
games.description: From hidden coves to sunken wrecks, explore breathtaking locations, solve puzzles, and unravel Rafael’s mysterious connection to a pirate captain with dark intentions.

games.name: Blobbymite: Hero of Power
games.description: Experience the complete adventure of Blobbymite: Hero of Power with a full campaign, powerful level editor, online leaderboards, and expanding story content that reveals the dark past of the Rebelord Pirates. Online accounts can be made to save progress and acess online features!

games.name: The Champions of Lootheim
games.description: The Champions of Lootheim is an action roguelike where you face hordes of creatures to survive. Have fun defeating enemies to evolve your attributes throughout the game and buy permanent upgrades in the shop, as well as equipment dropped in chests by powerful enemies.

games.name: White Memories
games.description: Take the mantle of a postman who refuses to give up his job, even after death. Clinging to your last memory, take off into the world of the forgotten to deliver your letters to the ghosts that are stuck there, allowing them to reach the afterlife. Protect your mail from those who are pursuing you.

games.name: Waves of Chess
games.description: A roguelike chess game where players see how far one set of pieces will take them. A short, run based game that respects the classic, but with a few fun twists. Compete against friends and the world on the leaderboards, how far will you go?

games.name: The Watching Woods: The Louse
games.description: Twelve-year-old Leva, returning to the mining village after the hospital, learns about the mysterious disappearance of his friend, and the familiar rhythms of school life begin to unravel. Soon, his days turn into a terrifying nightmare, accompanied by the relentless stomping of hundreds of insects.

games.name: Lost Trust: Episode 1
games.description: After years apart, you visit an old friend for what should’ve been a quiet evening. But you soon realize you’re not alone and a dark betrayal awaits .The game is a first-person, linear PSX-style experience focused on exploration and uncovering secrets.”

games.name: MaSzyna
games.description: MaSzyna is a simulator which will allow you to become a train driver of most popular railway vehicles used on the Polish railways.

games.name: Velaster
games.description: Velaster is a gruesome 2.5D side-scrolling action combat game set in the Middle-earth called Malum. You will find yourself growing in battles against various monsters and bosses. Take revenge that remains in your fading memories.

games.name: Kejora
games.description: Kejora is a hand-drawn animated puzzle platformer adventure, tells the story of a girl named Kejora pursued by monstrous creatures after discovering a dreadful secret. She is accompanied by her friends who can assist her in overcoming obstacles and find the truth behind their peaceful village life.

games.name: Streetdog BMX
games.description:
Get ready for massive tricks, high scores, and gnarly slams in Streetdog BMX. Carve your way through six huge maps featuring hidden spots, handcrafted challenges, and flowing lines!

Customize your bike and rider before hitting the streets to explore six maps packed with wallrides, gaps, bowls, ramps and rails. Uncover new spots, complete handcrafted challenges, and link up your combos!

games.name: Last Mile
games.description: Last mile - is a first-person car horror game. It seems that you are in a spatial anomaly, you drive through the same places from time to time, maybe your GPS navigator doesn't work? Or maybe there are really, really strange things happening here.

games.name: Capri Care
games.description: Capri Care lets you care for and interact with adorable Capri creatures. Compete in fun minigames, breed new colors and traits, and explore a vibrant island. Feed, train, and bond with your Capri to unlock new adventures and surprises in this magical world!

games.name: Air Hares
games.description: Join the intrepid bunny pilot, Captain Rabbo, and her crew of fluffy flyers as they fight to turn the barren Winrose Warren into a blossoming landscape! Become an Air Hare in a unique take on bullet hells, restoring farmland one seed at a time, against the nefarious Gale Gang goons!

games.name: Battlewrights
games.description: A 4-player local party brawler with quirky characters, a unique movement system and fast, intense versus matches. Get back to the glory days of couch multiplayer and be ready to destroy some friendships.

games.name: Finger Party
games.description: Role-play as a regular finger in this short incremental game about plopping and collecting colorful blobs.

games.name: Blocky's Short Quest
games.description: Play as Blocky with super high jumping height in this 2D adventure platformer. Discover new worlds where Blocky's abilities change.

games.name: Scope Battle Royale
games.description: Scope, a fast-paced 100-player battle royale where memory wiped warriors fight for survival on a remote island. Dropped into a stylized world with no powers, only skill, strategy, and will-power.

games.name: Perfore the Perforien Request
