games.description: Carolanne Marin, Princess of Prodo, is invited to Berlo, the capital of Birini and the great capital of Perfore, to see the Perforian in person for a request.

games.name: Pomelo & Friends: Sevilla
games.description: Pomelo and his friends have hidden away in sunny Seville! Explore five iconic hand-drawn locations and find 101 different dogs in this colorful hidden object game.

games.name: Grass Life Sim 2
games.description: Don't touch grass. Become grass!

games.name: Reunion Online
games.description: Reunion Online is a massively multiplayer online role-playing game (MMORPG) where you can fight monsters with your friends in an open world.

games.name: Static Voice
games.description: Artyom, a resident of an old Soviet apartment block, finds himself trapped after a factory explosion releases a deadly gas. He plans to explore the toxic entrance to build an SOS transmitter with his friend Viktor. But the building is no longer safe, and his neighbors are hunting in the silence.

games.name: Creaworm
games.description: In this short indie puzzle game you play as a little bookworm with a big dream. Find morsels of lost knowledge across the maze, craft spells to pass doors, and find the way to the land of dreams.

games.name: Moonshot Billiards
games.description: Moonshot Billiards is a relaxing puzzle game blending billiards and mini-golf. Plan angles and power to sink every ball in as few shots as possible. Easy to learn, inspired by the classic NES game.

games.name: She Was 98
games.description: “SHE WAS 98” - you play as a grandson who returns to his elderly grandmother's home to care for her.....

games.name: Neurosis
games.description: A psychological horror anomaly horror puzzle game where the player explores looping corridors, observes environmental details, and solves puzzles to escape the endless repetition.

games.name: We Are Counting
games.description:
We are counting.
I open my eyes.
Suction cups.
On my chest. On my arms. Everywhere.
Seventeen.
Eighteen.
Voices whisper.
Mom is waiting.
A short psychological horror visual novel about compulsive counting. A fragmented narrative where the ordinary melts into absurdity.

games.name: Reel Horror
games.description: A haunted projectionist's room. A shelf of cursed films. Each reel plays a terrifying short story you must live through. Explore twisted worlds from the safety of the projection booth, or so you think...

games.name: The Joy of Putting
games.description: Relive the era of Flash mini-golf games on more than 54 holes based on real courses! And do it... for The Joy of Putting!

games.name: Dark Descent
games.description: Dark Descent is a 4 player multiplayer cooperative horror game where you and your friends venture into an old elevator, aiming to reach the deepest levels. However, the journey won't be without it's challenges.

games.name: OneTry
games.description: The world we once knew no longer exists, the infected are everywhere. Will you be able to keep your sanity? Among hidden clues and scarce resources, you must find a way to escape. Fight for your survival.

games.name: Serial Lover
games.description: A dating sim rhythm game where you seduce serial killers

games.name: Cassette Boy
games.description: All you see is all there is - Cassette Boy: an RPG where what exists depends on you.

games.name: Philna Fantasy
games.description: This is a pixel-art style action role-playing game with exciting storylines, different career choices, cute art style, lively battles, and rich character development.Let's go and start the adventure.

games.name: Project Homecoming Haven
games.description:
Play as a Trauma Cleaner; a housecleaning service that receives requests from bereaving families to clean up rooms and houses left by the deceased.

In your job, you will learn about those who left the world of their own volition or others. Learn about the life they lived, choose belongings of the deceased to be given to their families, or keep them for yourself to grow your Trauma Cleaning business.

games.name: One Turn Kill
games.description: One Turn Kill is a PvE card game where card drawing and deck control are the keys to victory. Engage in battles limited to a single turn for an exhilarating, suspenseful experience.Join the protagonist in a pixel art wasteland to face off with the strongest of enemies and see what story awaits.

games.name: Craftlings
games.description: Inspired by legendary classics from the ’90s, Craftlings will take you on a journey full of strategic decisions and test your skills in optimizing automated production chains and Craftlings’ paths. Gather, deliver, build, and fight for wealth and glory in the unique, nostalgic world of Craftlings.

games.name: Deep Fringe
games.description: Deep Fringe is deep tactical combat game set in a biopunk wasteland. Lead powerful factions in turn-based battles, leveraging the strategic use of an interactive environment. Modify or destroy terrain to achieve tactical supremacy. Craft legendary chapters with the level editor.

games.name: Tabulo
games.description: Position your pieces carefully to max out your score in this Balatro-inspired chess roguelike. Enhance your pieces, purchase powers, and win bonuses from optional challenges, but be careful - your board only has so much room.

games.name: Backrooms: We Escape Forever
games.description: We Escape Forever is a co-op survival horror game for 1–6 players. Solve puzzles and escape dream worlds. Explore eerie environments, avoid terrifying entities, and survive together. Built with Unreal Engine 5, the game adds new levels and content regularly, offering fresh challenges.

games.name: Dungeon With Girl
games.description: Conquer dungeons and flirt with girls in this roguelite RPG! You'll need wisdom, courage, and luck to traverse these mysterious depths and secure the best ending for you and your unexpected travel companion Monica.

games.name: Man of Nollyn
games.description: A noir detective game where you can bribe or intimidate suspects for extra clues.

games.name: Frontline Command
games.description: Frontline Command is a tactical auto-battler where you control a squad of soldiers through intense missions in a modern military setting. Use strategy and combat skills to outsmart tough opponents as you navigate challenging battlefield scenarios.

games.name: Ultimate Golf Battle
games.description: Multiplayer Golf Game with up to 12 players. Different modes, play turn-based or simultaneously. Choose from over 50 holes you want to play or play randomly selected holes. Choose a new item before each hole to help you get to the finish faster or to hinder the others.

games.name: Journey Through the Undead
games.description: Blast through hordes of relentless zombies in an action-packed journey across a stunning, mutated world. Arm yourself with guns, melee weapons, and grenades as you fight for survival through eerie ruins and deadly swamps.

games.name: Whimsy Bake ＆ Craft
games.description: Whimsy Bake ＆ Craft is a relaxing and therapeutic idle game where you can craft adorable desserts while freely designing your home’s aesthetics. Embark on this sweet dual-healing journey to enjoy the perfect blend of creativity and cozy charm!

games.name: Super Woden: Rally Edge
games.description: The spin-off of the acclaimed Super Woden saga, blending classic arcade essence with great depth and a genuine love for car culture. With a unique personality, Rally Edge takes you back to an era where fun goes beyond realism.

games.name: Touhou Rinrinki: Crafts of the Lucky Beast
games.description: Touhou Rinrinki ~ Crafts of the Luck Beast is a Touhou Doujin Card-Strategy Game. Using cards across different seasons, join forces with duelists of unique abilities, face various opponents from all over Gensoukyo, and uncover the truth behind the Card Duel Incident!

games.name: Eggo
games.description: A desktop pet that can fall in love and have a baby with your friend’s Eggo! Start with a simple egg and raise it into your most special companion, stay with you while you work or study — and who knows, maybe you’ll get a rare mixed-heritage Eggo baby!

games.name: ShuXian Chronicles: Idle Ascension
games.description: Form a team, battle, AFK farming, loot grinding, divine weapon forging, artifact refining, pet catching, pet fusion, pet training... all the way to ascension!

games.name: Solitary in the Library
games.description: A haunting psychological horror set between school life and a cursed library. Relive the same days. Search for answers. Try to wake up.

games.name: Kotama&Academy Citadel
games.description: Kotama and Academy Citadel is a 3D Metroidvania game. Players assume the role of an exchange student named Kotama as she explores through the mysterious Academy Citadel, aiming to become the esteemed [Carmel Star].

games.name: Cube Dungeon
games.description: Trapped in the mysterious Cube Dungeon, you must fight, loot, and survive through dark halls and deadly enemies. This action RPG blends old-school handcrafted style with unique progression systems and hardcore mechanics. Can you escape?

games.name: Witch Play House
games.description: Witch Play House is an unconventional fantasy collection-adventure game that seamlessly blends exhilarating monster-slaying action with a deep collection system. The game features a unique "aesthetic of feet" theme, creating a mysterious world brimming with whimsical imagination.

games.name: MilkTea Time
games.description: "Milk Tea Time" is simulation business game that includes all the elements of production, deployment and construction. You need to make each cup of milk tea. Research new flavors to win customer praise. Build and decorate your milk tea shop by hand. Create your own beautiful milk tea shop!

games.name: HeadHunters
games.description: HeadHunters is a chaotic platform fighter for up to 4 players, online or on the couch. Blast, bash, and body-swap your way through explosive arenas in fast-paced, no-rules mayhem. It’s all about dodging, blasting, and making your mates scream “no way!”. Heads will definitely roll!

games.name: Speakeasy Simulator
games.description: Manage your own speakeasy during the Prohibition. Produce illegal alcohol, customize your bar, satisfy demanding customers, and smuggle booze to the mafia, all while avoiding police patrols in this Prohibition-era simulator.

games.name: Spibee
games.description: A cooperative puzzle-platformer! Join a cute spider and bee on a thrilling adventure! Solve puzzles together, enjoy fun PvP minigames, and face epic boss battles!

games.name: Project Killdance
games.description: Project KILLDANCE is a Noir tactical action featuring a one-army strategy and instant-death combat. Slowly observe surroundings, choreograph each killing move, leave no survivor, and become the spectral death.

games.name: Party Party Anxiety!
games.description: A dating card game for anxious people. Use conversation cue cards up your sleeves to make connections. But beware—the more anxious you get, the scarier they become.

games.name: Bubba Yuga
games.description: Bubba Yuga is a 2-player couch co-op puzzle game based on the Slavic folktales of the Baba Yaga. Playing as a pair of tied together witches, you and a friend must work together with your walking house to capture all the woodland children and break the curse that's been placed upon your family.

games.name: Defentrix
games.description: Defentrix is ​​a tower defense game with 31 handcrafted levels. Capture the towers and defend our solar system.

games.name: Ladies, Don't Tempt My Immortality
games.description:
They say the path to immortality is paved with hardship. But in your case, this hardship happened to take the form of seven dangerously beautiful women.

You are Lin Fan, the chosen one of the Crane Illusion Sect. Born with a Pure Yang Lineage, you are destined to ascend to the heavens. However, no matter how hard you train, fate sends yet another challenge in your way...temptations in the shape of an unreliable master, a strict senior sister, or a saintess who seems far more interested in testing your heart rather than your skills.

Can you survive the thousand tribulations of love, jealousy, and thunder? Or will your heart fall just before your heavenly ascension?

games.name: Oh Demon! Fix my TV
games.description: In this horror, comedy, and puzzle game, you will play as a demon summoned by an old woman to fix her television, sending you on an adventure beyond all reason.

games.name: Dragon Chase
games.description: Control an ancient dragon in an epic escape through the skies! Destroy jets, zeppelins, and warships in a fast-paced shoot 'em up with magical powers, colossal bosses, and a retro techno soundtrack inspired by 80s arcade classics.

games.name: Shadow of Paris
games.description: Paris's life changes when she encounters a charming stranger who seems to be watching her. This choice-driven psychological visual novel delivers a tense, intimate story focused on curiosity, trust, and crossing dangerous boundaries.

games.name: WindStop Strategy
games.description: The young master of Hu Yan Men, SITU's peaceful life has been overturned, by a sudden massacre. The Windstop Strategy is a region-suppressing strategy RPG.As the new leader of Hu Yan Men, can you bring glory back and dominate the Windstop Valley?

games.name: The Empty Eyes
games.description: The Empty Eyes is a first-person psychological horror experience that immerses you in an investigation steeped in mystery. Every step inside the house brings you closer to a hidden truth, while tension mounts and fear takes root in your mind.

games.name: Around the World 4: Family Tour - Collector's Edition
games.description: An incredible and amazing journey!
A short game where you guess whether it is a 6 or a 7. Can you 6-7 to the top?

games.name: Nocturnal Quest
games.description: Nocturnal Quest is a Semi-Idle Adventure RPG with 100s of spells & effects, 6 classes, 12 specializations, and countless builds. Have your teams grind gear and progress through an infinity of levels!

games.name: Deskworm
games.description: A tiny desktop worm pet that moves when you type, click, or play. Dress it up with hats and skins, park it in a pocket where its gaze follows your mouse, and let its Anti-Shrimp reminders nudge you to sit up and stretch.

games.name: Bot.vinnik Chess: Legendary Queens
games.description: Do you think chess is a man's game, comrade? Think again! The Soviet Queens are here to crush your ego and show you true elegance on the board. Enroll now!

games.name: The Calamity Trials
games.description: Complete platform parkour featuring multiple unique weapons and obstacles while IT chases you. These weapons will increase speed, or become another obstacle you must overcome.

games.name: Drudge
games.description: You are a slave. A collar with three lights hangs around your neck: each one fades and shocks you for mistakes or disobedience. Your life is quotas: sorting waste, growing food, and expeditions into lower levels with zombies. Earn, unlock passages, buy gear, and seek a path to freedom.

games.name: Hentai Saki
games.description: A sensual puzzle game where Saki seduces new “neighbors”. Unlock scenes and satisfy her desires.

games.name: Pazing By
games.description: Pazing By is a GRAZE-oriented with 2D platformer and bullet hell game, player need to dodge enemy's bullets or stay near enemy to damage enemy. A game for graze lover, dodger, and bullet-hell player!

games.name: Furry House
games.description: The protagonist of a furry house is a boy forced by some events to move in with his mother. Making things difficult is that the mother and sisters are of another species, not human beings but furry!

games.name: Mesozoikum
games.description: Mesozoikum is an open-world dinosaur survival game and guides you through the atmospheric world of the Jura.

games.name: Geometry Arena 2
games.description: Geometry Arena 2 is a free-form arena-shooter Roguelite game, dedicated to creating an exciting battle experience. Freely combine difficulty options, components, modules and upgrades to create the best gaming experience for yourself!

games.name: BrokenLore: Unfollow
games.description: BrokenLore: Unfollow is a surreal horror game where you play as a victim of bullying, fighting terrifying monsters as you uncover a dark mystery in a thrilling journey of terror. It pushes you to the edge of your seat as you explore the dark impact of social media on mental health.

games.name: Bail Force: Cyberpunk Bounty Hunters
games.description: Hunt cybercriminals in a brutal action roguelite where enemies adapt to your fighting style. Play as Angel or Lea and choose your path through revenge and redemption in a dystopian society.

games.name: Ghetto Zombies: Graffiti Squad
games.description: Expect blasts of green zombie goo painting the screen in this top-down shooter packed with crazy guns that blow the heads off some… freaky zombies. Your mission is simple: graffiti the whole city before these mutants dog-pile you.

games.name: Blooming
games.description: Blooming, is a 2D platformer action game. Use your bow, which can be turn into dual blades, to defeat your foes and explorer different areas in any order you want. Defeat bosses in order to absorb their power and get new abilities.

games.name: A Song of Sunlight
games.description: An RPG set in a distant, lonely future. Follow Arem, a young man lured from his small island community to explore the desolate megastructure beneath it: “The Well.” With the simple goal of finding the exit, Arem will burden himself with something more terrible than he ever thought possible.

games.name: Star Mountain
games.description: Star Mountain is a fast paced 1v1 game where you must race to get a star before your opponent. Build your own platforms, and block your opponent to get to the star first! Featuring character customization, online and local multiplayer, and full controller support.

games.name: Finch & Archie
games.description: An episodic co-op murder mystery in which you play as one half of a crime-fighting duo: Jack Finch the detective or Archie the police dog! Use your skills to find evidence, interrogate suspects, and catch the culprit in a gritty 1930s setting.

games.name: To Clean The Mountain
games.description:
To Clean The Mountain is a platforming adventure where you throw yourself towards the summit. The spirit of the mountain will talk with you as you traverse a variety of environments.

Environments
Handcrafted levels based on a variety of mountainous landscapes. Each environment features unique mechanics for you to interact with and learn, combining the interesting platforming elements with puzzle solving.

The Mountain
Elements of the world change based on how you assist the mountain. The game is completable regardless of your choices, but the difficulty is up to you.

games.name: Find Oann
games.description: Find Oann is an action-horror game that follows the story of the protagonist, Thomas, who must solve mysteries, arm himself, and fight against horrendous creatures to survive and find the mysterious Oann.

games.name: Umbra Lumen
games.description: Roguelike Deckbuilder meets puzzle gameplay. Collect tarot cards and mystic items as you face unpredictable events, meet memorable characters, and explore the beyond life. Each run is different, and every decision matters. Will you ascend or fall in this unique turn-based RPG?

games.name: Randy the Racoon
games.description: Randy the Raccoon is an open-world action comedy where you're a raccoon in a car. Cruise around a vibrant island, chat with sassy animals and take down the goose gang. Randy reacts to everything you do with sass, humor, or just a lot of yelling. So, try not to crash... or do!

games.name: The Book of Plagues
games.description: In a city plagued by a deadly plague, you are the last hope for salvation! You are the Plague Doctor, a mysterious and determined healer whose job it is to stop disease, save lives, and restore order to the city...

games.name: Moving Simulator
games.description: Dive into the ultimate moving experience in Moving Simulator! Manage chaotic house moves, carefully pack belongings, load trucks, and navigate through hilarious disasters. Precision, speed, and creativity will make you a moving master!

games.name: Fairground Online
games.description: Fairground Online - The ultimate simulator! Control rides, create light shows and accompany them with music. Experience realistic physics, detailed controls and the day-night cycle. Play online with friends worldwide and become part of the community!

games.name: Soul Astray
games.description: Jump, dash and use abilities granted by your immortal soul to outjump damnation in this challenging, yet whimsical, puzzle-precision platformer. Flex your creativity and precision as you overcome hand-crafted trials with minimal instruction.

games.name: Garden Hunt
games.description: Watch out for sharp corners… Dash through a garden maze as a slug snail, collecting slimes while dodging enemies! A gooey, dot-eating style slime tag game!

games.name: Parcel Frenzy: Get To Work!
games.description: Run the warehouse while your boss relaxes on a beach. Sort packages by weight, stack pallets under 60kg, label them, manage power, and deal with failing machines. Everything costs money. Mess up and you’re fined. Keep it running, or the company goes under.

games.name: Kin and Quarry
games.description: An incremental mining adventure where you must dig into the earth to recover essence for your sacred Evertree. Mine, drill, and blast your way to the deepest depths, discovering rare artifacts and recruiting more kin to your cause along the way. Dig. Upgrade. Repeat.

games.name: Out of the Ocean
games.description: A cute and wholesome yuri story about a girl who meets a mermaid washed up on the beach at night. Join Asuka as she finds herself caught up between Misuzu, her ladylike classmate, and Nerine, a girl with scales and a secret.

games.name: Night Drone
games.description: "Night Drone" is a game about using drones in modern warfare. To achieve your goals, you will have to control various types of drones (reconnaissance drone, kamikaze FPV drone, drop drone, surveillance drone, FPV drone and others).

games.name: To the Finale.
games.description: What is music to you? In my eyes, music is a key, a key that can unlock the heart. People always compromise with so many things, locking their emotions, their hearts. Music is the key to that lock. It can unlock the shackles. Sadness, anger, joy, whatever emotion, whatever words, can be woven into a song. With this key, we, and everyone else... at least until the end, can temporarily remove those heavy shackles...

games.name: A Game of D.I.C.E.
games.description: A tense gambling duel in an elegant Art Deco world where luck and strategy decide who survives. Roll five dice and build winning hands inspired by poker. Use Gambits to reroll, sabotage your opponent and turn your fate. Win rounds and outlast your rival. Only one leaves the dinner table.

games.name: Texas Twist Poker 3 Bandit's Run
games.description: A poker-infused tile-puzzler with the strategic depth of a roguelike deck-builder. Hunt notorious Bandits and break their curse by combining Jokers and upgrades to create the 10 best poker hands in a 52-card deck. Shop wisely between rounds to build a formidable deck and winning strategy.

games.name: Epoch Cycle
games.description: Apocalypse is Not the End, It's Your Beginning. Become the supreme leader of a civilization in an apocalyptic world. Every collapse fuels the rise of a new era—your choices will forge a legacy across four monumental epochs.

games.name: Better Days
games.description: This is a new type of PVE combat game that combines elements such as shooting, skill-based battles, exploration, search-and-destroy missions, PVE combat, survival in a free-roaming environment, vehicle control, and character customization.

games.name: Granite Noir
games.description:
Granite Noir: The Social Experiment is a first-person experimental game where YOU literally create the game for others.

Enter a dark room. Wait 2 hours as a timer counts down to 00:00:00. Before you stands a black granite monolith inscribed with the wishes of previous players.

When the timer reaches zero, make ONE wish. ONE permanent addition to the game. Your wish will be implemented by the developers and engraved on the monolith forever.

THE RULES:
- One wish per player, for life
- Every wish is implemented - no refusals, no exceptions
- Implementation time: hours to months depending on complexity
- Your wish shapes the experience for thousands who follow

At launch, the game is nearly empty: a dark room, a monolith, a timer, echoing footsteps. The game builds itself through players' cumulative wishes.

This isn't Early Access. This is a finished social experiment that evolves indefinitely.

Will you collaborate with the community? Subvert expectations? Create chaos? The choice (and its permanent consequences) are yours.

"You're not buying a complete game. You're buying the power to CREATE the game for others."

games.name: Tomo Jam!
games.description: TomoJam is a musical sandbox where up to 4 players can perform real MIDI songs using only their gamepads. Play, learn, and laugh as you hit (and miss) every note solo or together. Add your own MIDI files and explore a surprisingly deep, endlessly customizable way to make music and Jam with friends!

games.name: Spellgun Sprint
games.description: Spellgun Sprint is a high-fantasy speedrun shooter with guns and magic! You are a wizard-artificer and you've just been kicked out of your own tower by a meddling druid seeking to destroy your life's work. Use your Spellgun technology to fight back and reclaim your home. Time is of the essence!

games.name: Don't Crash
games.description: Don't Crash is a fast-paced space survival dodging game. Pilot the Argo explorer through shifting cosmic hazards, using speed, sharp turns to escape meteors and storms. Survival depends solely on skill as threats escalate. Push farther, chase higher scores, and seek the hidden Haven Sector.

games.name: 101 Dogs Hidden in Australia
games.description: Join this adventure and discover the hiding places of 101 dogs in Australia in the hand-crafted landscape. Earn tons of achievements. How many can you find? Be quick!

games.name: War of Dots
games.description: Easy to learn, hard to master. A simple & free RTS game.

games.name: Giant Snake Girl Wants the Burger!
games.description: One silly Tsuchinoko's epic journey to feed The Burger to her Giant Snake friend.

games.name: JuJu
games.description: JuJu The Land of Juju, The land of lost souls, culture, and healing becomes a wasteland of a beautiful realm. The Realm now feeds off of descendants and ancestral trauma and pain creating monsters and haints to help demolish such world.

games.name: Third Person Basketball Court
games.description: Rise to the top of basketball with your aim and movement skills! “TPBC” is a third-person, online multiplayer basketball game that brings the familiar controls of FPS/TPS titles straight to the court. Take on skilled players from around the world and prove your mastery!

games.name: Voxel Drive
games.description: Voxel Drive is a captivating car simulator that immerses you in a world of voxel graphics. You'll navigate numerous tracks full of obstacles and challenging turns.

games.name: Sebi 16
games.description: Sebi 16 packs sixteen curated singleplayer games into one charming collection: metroidvanias, puzzle games, platformers, a roguelike, and even a deck builder. Built with love in PICO-8!

games.name: CDL for a UFO
games.description: Play as a starship captain who is woefully unqualified for the job. With an unfamiliar control panel in front of you, all 45 keys of your keyboard are randomized at the start of every attempt. Guide your ship through a variety of obstacles in an attempt to make it to your destination in one piece.

games.name: EmuDevz
games.description: A game about building emulators! Implement your own NEEES core in JavaScript, get instant feedback with unit/video tests, build the graphics unit in real time, learn 6502 assembly, debug test ROMs, and have fun with the included homebrew games!

games.name: The Anomaly Manor
games.description: There's a mansion with a dark legend: Whoever enters disappears forever. Equipped with your spectral camera, you decide to delve inside to investigate. Locate and photograph the anomalies to escape before the wandering souls catch you!

games.name: Toey Weedz Smoke Dead Mirror
games.description: Toey Weedz is humanity's last hope... Or maybe not!? Because in Toey Weedz Smoke Dead Mirror, nothing is as it seems. Get ready for a comedic solo adventure in retro military shooter style that you won't soon forget!

games.name: Serendipity Morning Mist: Dawn, Tobacco, Your Scent
games.description: Your girlfriend, Chisa Tsukiyama, suddenly decides to go study abroad. Every prolonged touch, every held breath, every slight burning sensation becomes silent proof that you still exist for each other, leaving marks in the room until the countdown ends.

games.name: Stellar Dawn: Survivor
games.description: "Star Dawn: Survivors" is a survivor-like game. You will transform into a brave warrior and use high-tech weapons to fight against endless enemies. Explore the mysterious interstellar wilderness, and constantly unlock powerful upgrades to enhance your combat effectiveness.

games.name: The Llama
games.description: Experience a lovely day out walking the beautiful British countryside with your new animal friend Rosie, the llama! Soak in the stunning views of Mortfordshire and relax in the serene peace of nature. Just be sure to stick to the trails and not wander off too far.

games.name: Nothmere
games.description: A retro classic point-and-click RPG inspired by 1990s adventure games, primarily Quest for Glory. Explore a mysterious town where no one remembers their past, powerful wards hold back unspeakable horrors, and every choice shapes the fate of a world trapped between life and death.

games.name: Kowloon Labyrinth
games.description: Roguelite horror set in the randomly generated back alleys of Kowloon. Escape from the monsters and find your way out.

games.name: Hentai Barmaid
games.description: Relaxing puzzle game about a charming barmaid in a warm fantasy tavern. Solve puzzles, unlock beautiful artworks, and enjoy the cozy evening atmosphere.

games.name: Cult of Dawn
games.description: Attempt to survive as a mysterious event strips away the bounds of reality itself in Cult of Dawn, a third person horror adventure inspired by classic survival horror titles of the 90s and early 2000s. Featuring tank controls, fixed and over the shoulder camera angles, inventory management and more.

games.name: Goal3
games.description: GOAL3 is a 3D arcade soccer game with a side view.

games.name: Hyperspace Striker
games.description: Alone in the vast expanse of space, you are the Hyperspace Striker. Choose a unique class of spaceship and survive the onslaught of factions defending their territory.

games.name: Hijack Jump
games.description: Hijack Jump is a tricky parkour game where your success depends on friends… or enemies. Every player can be hijacked by others. Hijackers don’t just watch – they can interfere with your run, blasting you with stuff to knock you down. There’s no limit to how many spectators can join and mess with your game.

games.name: The False God's Fold
games.description: A turn-based card strategy game. You are a Card-Seeker, wandering ruined lands and forgotten realms, collecting forbidden cards—shattered relics of fallen gods. Wield their power to battle twisted creatures and ancient guardians. Each card is a weapon. Each play, a gamble.

games.name: Nami no Iro: The Color of the Waves
games.description: Mugen Takebara doesn't remember much of his childhood. Returning to Inonaki wasn't his choice. Welcomed by his cousin, Sora, the two quickly reconnect… but something is wrong. With her. Or with you.

games.name: The Reason My Wife Has Gotten More Beautiful
games.description:
Rintaro Tsukamoto has begun to notice a curious change: his beloved wife seems to grow more radiant with each passing day. Though this should be a welcome change, it stirs up a sense of anxiety in him. Something is off, and driven by his deepening curiosity, he resolves to seek out the man who has become secretly entangled with his wife, walking a path of self-discovery and self-destruction.

Follow Rintaro's story as you uncover the secrets behind his wife's sudden change in this compelling visual novel. Dive into the mysteries and read through events with stunning art and beautiful backgrounds that help bring the story to life.

games.name: Pickle Simulator
games.description:
Enjoy the latest Simulator addition with PICKLE SIMULATOR. Enjoy playing as a pickle in a never before seen experience where you see what it may be like to be a pickle. Navigate a series of cameras to see the life of a pickle and learn things about Pickle culture you have never done before!

How Long Can you Pickle?

In Pickle Simulator you can play as long as you like as your favorite pickle. Just navigate to a camera you like in the level and see which pickle world is your favorite! There are lots of secrets to find and countless adventures in Pickle Simulator as you play from the experience of a PICKLE!

games.name: Hentai World Tour
games.description: A simple but addictive matching game where you pair identical images under a fixed time limit. Stay focused, beat each stage before the clock runs out, and enjoy a calm yet challenging gameplay experience

games.name: Stress Ball
games.description: Experience the blend of fun and challenge with Stress Ball! In this 3D ball game, your character bounces through platforms toward the goal. As levels intensify, and a dark theme adds depth to the atmosphere, immerse yourself in the thrill of overcoming increasingly difficult obstacles.

games.name: Who Is Ethan?
games.description: You wake up in an abandoned hospital, with no memory of who you are. The silence is heavy. Shadows move. Something—or someone—might be watching you. Trapped between reality and nightmare, the only way out is to piece together the truth hidden in your surroundings.

games.name: Super Chipflake Ü: Quest for the Uncooked Schnitzel
games.description:
In "Super Chipflake Ü: Quest for the Uncooked Schnitzel", your stomach is rumbling, and there's only one solution – find the ingredients and cook the world-famous schnitzel! But even in Schländ, the schnitzel-loving country, it won't be easy!

Embark on a quirky adventure filled with unexpected encounters, platforming challenges and a fun merging mechanic. Explore a world brimmed with secrets, strange characters, and even stranger problems. Dig, swing, and sprint your way through a lovingly designed environment, where surprises await around every corner.

games.name: Day Trading Simulator
games.description: Experience a realistic stock market simulator! Buy and sell virtual stocks, respond to dynamic market news, and manage your assets wisely to become a successful investor.

games.name: The Noexistencen of Morphean Paradox: The Forest of Silver Shallots
games.description: You awaken in the Forest of Silver Shallots, setting out to uncover the secret of the Morphean Paradox. Above, factions weave their schemes; below, the black mist hides a swelling undercurrent. Time never stands still, and truth wears many faces. Not everyone can return to their fate…

games.name: Merror
games.description: Trapped in an endless loop of mirrored rooms, restore broken symmetry by solving puzzles and confronting your fears. An atmospheric psychological horror puzzle game where reality and reflections merge into one.

games.name: Holo vs. Robo
games.description: Build a strong defense of hololive dolls to defeat a robot army in this exciting hololive-themed tower defense game!!

games.name: Sunken Seeker
games.description: Sunken Seeker is a short, first-person underwater horror experience. Forced to pilot a decaying submersible, you have 7 days to pay off a massive debt. Navigate pitch-black waters, scan for salvage beyond your headlights, and survive the shift before the Director cuts your life support.

games.name: Growing Things Up: Season 1
games.description: An adult visual novel about desire, trust and the secrets we try to hide even from ourselves. In South Lake, every choice reveals scars, silent manipulations and paths that bring you closer to or further from who you truly are.

games.name: Hamam: The Steaming Backrooms
games.description: Step into Hamam — a haunting twist on the Backrooms formula. Tired of the endless yellow walls? Here, every corner is shrouded in steam, echoes, and terror. But beware: this is only the beginning... More chapters, chilling environments, and terrifying updates await with every release.

games.name: Naïca
games.description: Naica is a 8bit Fantasy cross-platfrom MMORPG where you take on the role of a lowly adventurer trying to assist those in peril. Fight, collect or explore what the world of Naica has to offer, secrets lie behind every corner. The world needs your help adventurer, will you answer the call?

games.name: Elengard: Ascension
games.description: Embark on an epic adventure to rise to power in this new Real-Time-With-Pause medieval fantasy RPG that combines action and strategy mechanics. Fight a lot, explore, choose how you fight, configure your abilities, create powerful builds and combos. Awaken your true power!

games.name: Earth of Oryn
games.description: Earth of Oryn is an indie city-builder/strategy game set in a medieval world filled with story and heart. Starting from nothing, shape your kingdom according to your vision while managing the needs and wants of your people.

games.name: Feather Party
games.description: Welcome to the fantastic party on the adorable planet of chicks! Feather Party is a multiplayer party game for up to 8 players. Engage in a diverse array of fun mini-games with friends or against rivals to be the winner of this party!

games.name: Gah!
games.description: Fight through procedurally generated levels - from haunted dungeons to futuristic space stations. Choose from 13 unique characters, crush your enemies, gather loot, face deadly bosses, and return to a growing village hub where permanent upgrades await. The demons watch. The angels wait. You fight.

games.name: Battle for Ercaton: Robot Uprising
games.description: Battle for Ercaton: Robot Uprising is a first-person shooter where the player takes on the role of an earthling who crashed a spaceship and ended up on the planet Ercaton, which is inhabited by dangerous robots.

games.name: Hungry Horrors
games.description: Face legendary creatures from British and Irish folklore in this roguelite deck builder where cooking replaces combat. As a princess, you must prepare dishes to feed these monsters or risk becoming their next meal.

games.name: Mochi-O
games.description: A doomsday land defense adventure in which you raise MOCHI-O, a weapon of annihilation that looks a lot like a hamster, to protect your country. Pet and raise MOCHI-O to defeat the oncoming enemies and fight through the tender post-apocalypse.

games.name: BroomSweeper
games.description: BroomSweeper is a Minesweeper-style Roguelike puzzle game. Unmask the evil lurking at TentaTech, Inc. as you ascend through increasingly challenging floors. Assemble winning combinations from over 100 powerful items to defeat the dust bunnies and keep your job until morning!

games.name: On-Together
games.description: A social chatroom game to work, play games and hang out with your friends. Stay connected while you work, then use breaktimes to chat, chill, chew bubblegum and more!

games.name: Find Cats 5
games.description: This is a game where players search for the souls of many lost cats in a 3D world. The protagonist is an angel cat responsible for retrieving the souls of lost cats. Players need to play as the angel cat and explore and discover in different 3D worlds!

games.name: Astronook
games.description: An astronomy game where you can explore space from your cozy office. Map out constellations, photograph planets and discover the hidden wonders of space.

games.name: Attrax
games.description: Opposites attract and likes repel. Enter the mysterious world of Attrax in this captivating single-player experience. Solve logic puzzles based on attraction and repulsion, and uncover the origins of the institute. Enjoy hours of gameplay that will redefine your understanding of physics and logic.

games.name: Factory Planner
games.description: Factory Planner is a card-based simulation/strategy game that lets you build a factory using cards. The main goal of the game is to make combinations with different cards so that each player can build different factories and feel the sandbox experience to the fullest.

games.name: Wrangle Ranch
games.description: Wrangle animals, grow your herd, and discover game breaking combos in this farm-to-desktop, roguelike barnbuilder.

games.name: Carnedge
games.description: Carnedge is a dark fantasy RPG where you drag the Eternal Flame across a dying world. Build deadly decks, summon weird allies, and fight through twisted dungeons full of enemies that hate your guts and watch chaos unfold!

games.name: Astro Delivery
games.description: Uncover hidden routes to deliver the package in perfect time in this 2D precision platformer.

games.name: We Escape Together
games.description: While enjoying a peaceful evening, we suddenly find ourselves in an unknown place, forced to play a mysterious game. Should we play along with their rules? Can we truly reclaim our old lives—or are we trapped in this game forever?

games.name: Growmon Island
games.description: Growmon Island is a CREATURE-COLLECTION idle sandbox that lives on your desktop. Hatch eggs, care for each creature’s needs, TRAIN and EVOLVE them through Child, Teen and Adult stages. Customize island with decorations and facilities — sell or keep adults for passive bonuses.

games.name: Threshold of Judgement
games.description: A mysterious gate judges your soul between Heaven and Hell. Answer wisely — fifteen truths lead to salvation, one mistake to eternal damnation.

games.name: Paravalence: With My Angel
games.description: Get implicated in Saint Ambrose. A linear visual novel experience told in three parts: The shadow of my mother is my mother, too. My little cellmate casts a spell. The world is like a dancer: the ritual of everyday. We're all doing magic, of course.

games.name: Z-Gyubaan!
games.description: Destroy the floor panel with the blast that defeated the enemy and rescue the captive girl! After destroying 75% of the panels, move on to the next stage.

games.name: Whispers Beyond
games.description:
Whispers Beyond is a semi-cooperative deduction game set in a dark fantasy world where a restless Spirit guides a circle of Inquisitors to solve a murder. Uncover the suspect, location, and object of fate by interpreting the Spirit’s visions and whispers; surreal visual and audio clues that reveal fragments of the truth.

Work together… but only those who read the signs best will truly see beyond the veil.

Choose your role:
- The Spirit: Communicate without words. Send abstract visions, offer whispers as audio clues, or bestow extra signs to guide the living.

- The Inquisitor: Interpret the Spirit’s clues to uncover the truth. Use your perceptions to evaluate and wager on others’ choices for an advantage.

Features:
- Online multiplayer for up to 8 players
- Solo play with AI companions
- Adjustable difficulty, customize: inspirations, perceptions, hand size, timers, and more

games.name: Cheeseland Mistery
games.description: Cheeseland Mystery is a retro-style puzzle adventure where a sneaky rat steals cheese under cover of night. Solve clever, room-based challenges across 30 levels, inspired by classic Lolo gameplay, with pixel art visuals, dynamic sound, and Xbox controller support.

games.name: Watch Grass Grow Simulator
games.description: A real-time experience built entirely around watching grass grow, where patience turns into payoff and leaving too early means missing it.

games.name: Observa
games.description: Alone on a floating island in deep space, you use your telescope to study the universe, capture what you find, and confront the growing sense that something out there is aware of you.

games.name: VHSMan
games.description: "Alice decides to watch a VHS she found in the dumpster 6 months ago and crazy stuff happens!" A Visual Novel about a magical VHS tape

games.name: Key Your Debt
games.description: You have two things, debt and a number keypad. Use the number keys on your keyboard to pay your debt in this capitalistic clicker debt paying simulator.

games.name: Bad Eye Deer
games.description: Bad Eye Deer is a point and click survival horror game where you survive 3 nights, manage your 'energy' and 'temperature' levels, and keep your own eye out for any incoming threats.

games.name: Babulya
games.description: Babulya – that’s what grandchildren affectionately call their beloved grandmother. But what if your Babulya is no longer human, but a bloodthirsty monster? You came to taste her pies… and she wants to taste you instead…

games.name: Solargene
games.description: Take Command of a Space Corporation in the Sci-Fi Simulator Solargene! Manage personnel, design and develop colonies and orbital stations across the solar system! Mine resources, establish logistics, research cutting-edge technologies, trade, and complete missions

games.name: Lunars
games.description: Gather your friends for the zodiac party game where chaos meets competition! Up to 4 local and 8 online players can customize characters, conquer mini-games, and outsmart rivals with items and power-ups. With 3 game modes—including one where everyone plays at the same time—it’s non-stop fun!

games.name: Death's Web
games.description: "Death's Web" is a challenging "Rogue-lite" platformer where you explore an ever-changing 2D world filled with enemies ready to slay you. Numerous curses are waiting to be discovered; they may lead to your demise, but perhaps they're valuable.

games.name: D-Day VR Museum
games.description: Step into the pages of history with "D-Day VR Museum", an immersive virtual reality experience that brings the monumental events of D-Day to life like never before. Transport yourself back to June 6, 1944, and witness the heroic actions of Allied forces during the largest amphibious assault in history.

games.name: Mio: Memories in Orbit
games.description: Play an android in MIO: Memories in Orbit, a mesmerizing metroidvania where you explore the Vessel, an enormous technological ark overgrown with machines gone rogue. Uncover its secrets, enhance MIO's abilities, and save the spaceship and its resident from oblivion!

games.name: Blightstone
games.description: Blightstone is a challenging, dark fantasy turn-based roguelike that brings unique twists to combat through freedom of character placement, interactive environments and hardcore resource management. Dying, learning, and meta-progression will be key in your mission to destroy the Blightstone itself

games.name: The Legend of Shiande
games.description: An old-school, extremely challenging game that combines RPG, adventure, and puzzle elements. Designed to test the skills and determination of players who thrive on tough challenges.

games.name: Hack and Climb
games.description:
"Hack And Climb" is a physics-based 2D Foddian platformer where every swing matters!
Play as a cursed axe on a grueling ascent in search of revenge
Hard, fair, and addictively fun!

games.name: Futanari Coffee Shop
games.description: An erotic management simulation game about managing a coffee shop.

games.name: Strategos
games.description: Strategos is a real-time tactics wargame set in classical antiquity. Simulate large-scale battles with over 120 factions, and 250+ units, from the ancient world. Create custom battles, or take command of historical ones.

games.name: Crucible of the Forgotten
games.description: Overcome a series of challenging stages in this roguelite horde survival game by developing your power with autocasting spells across many different dimensions, including items, upgrades, talents, and more that interact with each other to produce many unique and powerful builds.

games.name: Cappu Dungeon
games.description: Cappu Dungeon is a skill-building 3D action roguelite where you equip skills to wipe out hordes of enemies. Players buy and combine skills to create a powerful combat style. Activate skills at the right moment to overwhelm enemies, clear stages, and conquer challenging dungeons to claim victory.

games.name: Grime&Gold
games.description: Fancy some cards, alchemist ? Mix and stack cards to craft strange recipes, delve into dungeons for new ingredients. But be careful! The streets aren't nice with anyone, and the shadows might not be enough to hide you from angry customers...

games.name: Shovelware
games.description: Dig your way to the bottom in one hundred levels of block digging mayhem. Avoid TNT, collect gems, save kittens, collect potatoes and more in this colourful fun filled game.

games.name: The Wellmonts Case
games.description: The Wellmonts Case is a first-person psychological horror game set in 1993, Northern Maine. As a private detective, you explore the abandoned Wellmont farm, search for clues, photograph unsettling evidence, and uncover the truth behind a family's unexplained disappearance.

games.name: The Blessing of Airon
games.description: The Blessing of Airon is a First Person Story Adventure (Walking Sim) telling the story of a society which has lost access to all electronic devices capable of processing a neural network due to demon infestation. It is a horror game which focuses on exploration and uncovering mysterious events through a large variety of inspectable items with story text, custom sounds and vfx.

games.name: Gem Miner TD
games.description: Mine. Maze. Merge. Survive. Dig for powerful gems, merge them into game-breaking towers, and pick roguelike perks to build wild synergies in this vibrant 2D pixel art roguelike tower defense. Do not let enemies drag your miner to the lava!

games.name: Halcyon Days at Taoyuan
games.description: Welcome to Taoyuan Village to heal your loneliness. Here, you can lead a carefree, self-sufficient life: farm, tame animals, raise livestock, fish, and build a prosperous homestead. Or, immerse in village life, meet kindred spirits, find love, and influence their destinies with your choices.

games.name: Buddies in a Ball
games.description: Trapped inside of a giant rolling ball, you and your friends must roll, bounce, and scream your way through diverse levels. Solo or co-op, try to beat every level in the fastest time.

games.name: Rectifier: In Bloom
games.description:
To the world of Aelyria, you are known as an Angel, but to you, you're "Rectifier".

Regardless of the terminology, your role is the same. Save humanity from itself.

You find yourselves in a party of 7 men, all with their sinful...quirks.

games.name: Loot & Ledger
games.description: Run your own medieval store! Stock shelves with groceries and legendary loot, set prices, serve customers, and expand your shop. Fund adventurers to explore dangerous lands and return with valuable chests full of swords, shields, and rare items and all without leaving the counter.

games.name: Bite Night: Dine or Die
games.description: Bite Night: Dine or Die is a First-Person horror thriller where you play as a diner worker trying to solve the murders of your customers along side your best friend Vamp.

games.name: Quarantine Zombies
games.description: Inspect survivors in Chicago's Quarantine Zone to spot the infected before they turn. No base-building - just tense inspections and gunfights! You've got 30 days until the army arrives. Hold out, fix your car, and fight your way through Chicago to the main checkpoint to save your little brother.

games.name: Everest: Real Climbing Simulator
games.description: Climbing Mount Everest is a lifelong dream for many — but also the world’s most dangerous and costly challenge. Now, with this world's first life-size 1:1 replica of Everest game, you can live that dream without risking your life or breaking the bank!

games.name: Awaken
games.description: Awaken brings Lovecraftian horror to the beloved 2D side scroller genre. Make your way through the strange forest while encountering inexcplicable forces and try to keep your sanity as you piece together the mystery of your sister's disappearance.

games.name: Little Squirrel Cabin
games.description:
Little Squirrel Cabin is a 2D pixel-art survival horror game with psychological elements and dynamic storytelling.
Every new dawn can change your situation.
Nights are harsh, your sanity is fragile, and local traders have their own interests.

games.name: Scrap Daddies
games.description: Scrap Daddies is a slapstick co-op extraction-style looter for 1–6 players. The world has sunk beneath the waves, and survivors live on scattered platforms. Dive into deep-sea bases as a scrapper to recover power cells and gather scrap to upgrade your gear.

games.name: Auto Snakes in Outer Space
games.description: A hypnotic incremental idler where you manage colorful snakes. Watch them collect food, then spend the food on upgrades and abilities for your colony.

games.name: Yayos
games.description: Yayos is a cooperative survival gamewhere you control an elderly person who mustmanage your day:shopping, cooking, taking medication, and savingto survive.Improve your mobility, play slots, watch TV and enjoy this retirement life simulator alone or with a friend.

games.name: Moving with the Moon: Mastering Universal Gravitation!
games.description: This is a new action game where you steer the earth. Steer the Earth, when both the Earth and the Moon are in the goal zone, the stage is cleared. Stars are constantly pulling on each other with universal gravitation. You can experience a simulated universal gravitation.

games.name: Fruit Casket
games.description: Survive and thrive in Fruit Casket! Match fruits and use power ups to make your Hi-Score soar, and unlock more colorful bugs. The longer you survive, the harder it gets. Don't get smooshed or starve to avoid it becoming your Fruit Casket.

games.name: P0: Byte-Sized Brilliance
games.description:
P0 is a speedrunning anomaly hunting game within the horror genre.

In P0, 10 seconds is all you’ll get to decide whether your memorised office environment has an anomaly or not before smashing a button to progress to the next floor. Look fast, decide quickly, and crash through all 30 floors to earn the highest grade possible and ace a rather unusual interview to land your dream job. Red or green. Make your choice.

You won’t be thrown in at the deep end for your interview. Every candidate starts on the Junior level exam, and once completed, tougher difficulties and sub difficulties will unlock. You’ll be up against a global roster of talent, so to really impress and earn your spot on the board, pick ANY exam and complete it as quickly as possible.

Your office bestie, Buddy, is there to offer you emotional support during your interview. Through every run, you’ll earn credits to spend on kitting them out in the finest or wackiest wares. If you’re more sensible with your credits, you might want to spend them on collectibles. These can help spot tougher anomalies or provide glimpses into the lore.

games.name: House Tidy
games.description: House Tidy is a meditative and calming game that will help you relax and unwind from the hustle and bustle of everyday life.

games.name: Sex Therapy
games.description: Sex Therapy is a candid visual novel for adults. A routine consultation with a sex therapist turns into a story of forbidden passion and awakened desires, where professional boundaries collapse under the pressure of long-suppressed hunger.

games.name: Glyph Chess
games.description: Glyph Chess is a strategic board game infused with magical fantasy elements, derived from the Tales of Tarsylia. You will command mages with distinct abilities to escort your Scepter to the central "Source of Magic", or to destroy the enemy's Scepter.

games.name: Presentfall: Santa Defense
games.description: Presentfall: Santa Defense is a short, action, tower defense game where you help Santa defend his last presents from endless waves of naughty invaders. Aim, react, and throw snowballs to save Christmas. Collect rewards, improve Santa's skills and unlock bonuses!

games.name: Phyllosoma
games.description: You are a lone hunter who awakens in darkness. Within a cursed fortress where reality and hell intertwine, your goal is clear: Reach the top. Fight horrific enemies, grow stronger, and face what awaits at the summit.

games.name: Yellow
games.description: YELLOW is a liminal survival horror game. As a M.E.G. inspector in hazmat gear, explore unstable Backrooms zones to document "Undocumented" entities. With zero data available, you must study these lethal threats, uncover their origins, and solve the mystery of why new levels are appearing.

games.name: Social Caterpillar
games.description: The only hands-on puzzle adventure guaranteed to accurately and humanely teach Socialization to Introverts, heh heh!

games.name: Geobeast
games.description: Test your geography skills with Geobeast! Find as many countries as you can in 12 minutes, master two unique game modes, and climb the global Steam leaderboard.

games.name: The Empty Halls
games.description: The Empty Halls is a VHS analog horror exploration game inspired by the idea of liminal spaces. Explore eerie Backrooms-style environments, record strange anomalies with your VHS camera, and complete missions assigned by the anonymous higher ups.

games.name: Ancient Maze
games.description: A 3D survival exploration game set in a mysterious ancient labyrinth. Unravel the truth in Story Mode, or descend endlessly through procedurally generated mazes. Dynamic fear and environment systems create a tense, ever-changing experience.

games.name: Level 37: The Ritewood Anomaly
games.description: Level 37: The Ritewood Anomaly is a first-person found-footage horror game set in a distorted imitation of the Backrooms' poolrooms. As David, a Fluxora Dynamics intern, you follow the lost log tapes of Paul Ritewood through shifting halls, flooded corridors, and the surreal poolrooms.

games.name: Did You Visit CommutatorApply
games.description: "Did you visit CommutatorApply?" — Ask the protocol question in a dying world. You are not a hero. Just a checkpoint officer. Nothing more. Stick to the duty. 30 minutes, 4 endings. You won't uncover the truth behind the "Act of Oblivion". Eyes can't hide the lies. God save us from the flies.

games.name: Jukai Maze
games.description: Jukai Maze is a sci-fi suspense visual novel where every choice sends the story down a completely different path. Branching routes twist and diverge with each decision you make. Explore multiple endings, piece together scattered clues, and uncover the deeper truth that lies beneath them all.

games.name: Violent Rush
games.description: A near future where ruthless corporations reign supreme. A familiar story, isn’t it? Once again, few have the courage to challenge the authorities. Enter our heroes: desperate youths armed with spray cans and… the truth. A visual novel about street art in a cyberpunk world, by Sky Seekers Studio.

games.name: Bitch Shop Simulator
games.description: Summer! Sea! Sand! For everyone, these words mean rest and entertainment! But not for you! You opened your own business on this paradise beach and work from morning till evening in your grocery store.

games.name: Duel Corp.
games.description: An action RPG that you can play alone and later with a friend during Early Access. It features an unrestricted class and AI system with fluid and challenging direction-based combat. Discover epic items, hidden secrets, unique skills and talents in a procedurally generated retro fantasy world.

games.name: Smashed
games.description: Play against your friends or players from around the world in rousing games ! One ball, two paddles, the goal is simple: Score as many goals as possible! For that, you will have to be reactive and strategic.

games.name: Exotica 2: Pet Shop Simulator
games.description: Welcome back to the world of our dear friends in Pet Shop Simulator 2! We reintroduce you to new and more animal species. Build your own pet shop. In addition to new exotic species, you will also be able to breed and adopt cats and dogs.

games.name: Fear & Hope
games.description: Can you help solve the mystery and more importantly do so before its too late?

games.name: Linear Calamity
games.description: Destroy enemies on a roguelike-ish setting, using multiple weapons and powerful abilities to break the own concept of time! Regain back your memories as you advance, knowing unique characters and uncovering the dark truth on what has really happened... BURN THE WITCH!

games.name: Falling Stars... And Other Celestial Objects
games.description: Design the perfect defence system for the city in this physics-based game. Stop the falling celestial objects with turrets, fire, lightning, portals and more! 50 levels that will challenge your ingenuity and creativity.

games.name: Tailside: Cozy Cafe Sim
games.description: A charming RPG where you'll discover the joys of running your own cozy cafe. From brewing the perfect cup of coffee to making friends with the locals, experience a blend of relaxation and adventure during your own coffee break.

games.name: Hyperslice
games.description: Fast paced action arena roguelike where you defeat waves of enemies using your dash. Slice through enemies or push them to survive. Upgrade and buy abilities throughout your run to turn your ship into a killing machine.

games.name: Eldegarde
games.description: Eldegarde is a mini-MMO Action RPG with PvE, PvPvE and Arena modes. Explore vast outdoor zones, craft powerful gear, and fight to survive in a living fantasy world.

games.name: 100 Cats India
games.description: Find 100 Cats hidden in India! Can you find them all?

games.name: Lort
games.description: LORT is a 1–8 player co-op action roguelite. Team up with your friends to battle, loot, and stack ridiculous power-ups across a cursed fantasy world. Fight toward escape, revive your homies, and get absolutely chadded as you evolve from goblin tickler to god slapper.

games.name: AutoParts Simulator
games.description: AutoParts Simulator puts you in charge of an auto parts store, where every decision you make influences your success. Manage inventory, expand the product range in your warehouse, serve customers and grow your business. Conquer the automotive market with strategy and efficiency!

games.name: One & Done
games.description: Explore dungeons and fight monsters using four unique weapons in One & Done. Switch weapons strategically, face powerful enemies, and conquer labyrinth-like dungeons with dynamic strategies for victory!

games.name: Traffic Rivals: 1v1 Duels
games.description: Traffic Rivals: 1v1 Duels is an action-packed street racing game where you skillfully weave through heavy traffic in intense 1v1 duels. Outsmart rivals with strategy and skill, customize your car, and become a street legend solo or with friends in co-op mode!

games.name: The Roast: Coffee Shop Simulator
games.description: Enjoy the thrill of managing your own coffee shop! Fill the counter with coffee beans, craft your menu and set prices to your liking, take customer orders, and whip up tasty coffees. Decorate and expand your shop.

games.name: 2 Hours Later
games.description: Your girlfriend was unfortunately bitten and turned into a zombie while trying to save you. In order to cure her, you struggle to survive in the apocalyptic city.

games.name: Luzhanqi
games.description: A modern, digital take on the classic Chinese abstract-strategy game Luzhanqi. Deploy your army, outmaneuver your opponent, and capture their flag in this turn-based war game. The battlefield waits for no one!

games.name: Bug Bane Survivors
games.description: Mother Nature has no mercy! Turn bug swarms into fertilizer as a mutated plant. Take root, evolve, and create your garden of death with unique combos. You are the top of the food chain in this chaotic arena!

games.name: Gooey
games.description: A fast, physics-driven platformer inspired by Celeste, Super Meat Boy, and Mario Maker. Grapple, swing, and launch through pipe networks, pulley belts, and electric hazards. Collect the L, A, B letters and reach the beacon! Build and share levels on Steam Workshop.

games.name: The Hero Of Pixel Spire
games.description: Ascend a tower of chaos. Upgrade spells that evolve wildly. Survive savage bosses. Rescue other Ascendents. Will you become the Hero Of Pixel Spire?

games.name: Fortress Fury
games.description:
Fortress Fury is a multiplayer tower defense game with minimalistic gameplay and roguelite elements.

The monsters are here, and there's no place to run or hide.

Defeat the enemies!

All you can do is survive as long as you can until other towers are fallen.

Gather gold to buy upgrades and win other players.

Key Features

Dynamic Builds: With over 16 different weapons to choose from throughout a run, no two attempts will ever be the same

Rank System: Compete your skills with other players in session and overall

Diverse Cast & Tower Arsenal: Experiment with builds across a wide cast of unlockable towers and upgradable weapons

Pick Up And Play: Approachable 10-20 minute runs built with quick play sessions in mind

games.name: Guild of Hunters
games.description: A mysterious miasma spreads across the world, turning local wildlife into terrifying monsters. Guild of Hunters is a turn-based RPG where you recruit new members for your guild, negotiate item prices, and embark on adventures across various regions of a medieval world.

games.name: Fishing Mega-Game
games.description: Fishing Mega-Game takes the joy of a fishing mini-game and crafts it into a larger creature collecting experience. Roam the land for new fishing spots and deploy your favorite fish in search for new playable fish!

games.name: Super Blowfish Castle
games.description: Physics are your best frenemy in this cozy chaotic puzzle-solving platformer where you guide a small blowfish back to its castle just by pressing one button.

games.name: Tiny Isle
games.description: Tiny Isle is a cozy idle sim where you care for a magical island. Grow whimsical crops, collect sparkling crystals, and unlock fantastical new plants. Discover hidden secretsgiant fish, strange weather, island expansion, and charming residentsall at your own relaxing pace.

games.name: TR-49
games.description: Narrative deduction meets audio drama, from the creators of Heaven’s Vault, Overboard! and A Highland Song.

games.name: Omega Man
games.description: "Omega Man" is an interactive fiction game . After a global viral outbreak, as the only surviving male, players bears the responsibility to perpetuate the human races. Throughout the game, players' numerous choices will determine multiple possible endings.

games.name: Forks & Daggers
games.description: A Chaotic Medieval Social Deduction Party Game for 3–10 Players. Find the traitor or become a traitor. Use Manor as a weapon itself; throw, hit, arm trap. Convert to a Dagger to hide and eliminate.

games.name: Good Dreams
games.description: You are on vacation in a country house, but at night you live a real nightmare. Discover several endings that can help you get out of this bizarre dream.

games.name: Jumpy Tiger
games.description: Jumpy Tiger is a family-friendly collect-a-thon 2D platformer inspired by the classics of the 90s. Journey through seven unique levels and complete 35 missions, defeating enemies and avoiding hazards along the way.

games.name: G-Mode Archives+: Armored Core Mobile 3
games.description: Fight on—just to survive. A world of rival powers, with tomorrow unknown.

games.name: Obscure Horrors
games.description:
8 obscure horror games, based on surrealism, psychology, depression, fantasy, existentialism, analog horror and fear of all kinds.

Ossa:
A surreal psychological horror game about the mind escaping from a dying body.

Mosquito Face:
A psychological horror game about John and the invasion of mosquitoes.

Timore Solum:
Short horror game about sadness.
Stay. Cry.

Queen Of Cards:
The game that tells you your future.
Play at your own risk.

Dia:
There is nothing scary ahead.
No sudden noises.
No flashing images.
No one will follow you.
Welcome to Dia.

Garrison Broadcast:
An existential horror game about a post-apocalyptic technology driven world.

From Me, To You:
'Death is an opportunity'

Analog Sammelot:
Analog horror in a dark dungeon, answer the questions on the TV screen and maybe you'll be set free.

The collection comes with a launcher game, featuring each game as an in-game physical box, bringing the retro atmosphere and visuals.

games.name: Hidden Cats 9: Aliens
games.description: Explore a mysterious alien world, find cute cats, and paint black-and-white locations with bright cosmic colors.

games.name: Running Horror
games.description: A first-person horror game where you must explore a vast labyrinth, evade a relentless demonic Beast, and find trapped survivors to reverse a miscast spell and escape.

games.name: Moved In
games.description: A short horror game where you unpack in a new house and experience paranormal occurrences.

games.name: The Lucky Stray Cat
games.description: “The Lucky Stray Cat” is a hybrid Dungeon Crawler and Visual Novel, told through an urban horror narrative reminiscent of Junji Ito's storytelling style.

games.name: Big Balls
games.description: Big Balls is a First/Third-Person Multiplayer party game with proximity voice and unique movement system. Compete against friends in a variety of gamemodes and maps to decide the winner. Who will be the biggest Ball?

games.name: Grapple Souls
games.description: I wanted to see if I could capture the deliberate, punishing combat that makes these games work. This isn't a sprawling 100 hour RPG. It's a small, focused slice of a world that doesn't care if you live or die. If you miss slowly opening doors like an anime character, you'll love this.

games.name: Remi
games.description: An action RPG about Remi, the last remaining member of the Vanguard. Engage in challenging combat with the Plagued, mind-controlled enemies to fulfill Remi's oath to save the world from these monsters. A passion project made by a single developer.

games.name: Prequel
games.description: Play as every creature and forge your own path in the beautiful world of Prequel! Your journey to conquer the Abyss as the reckless odd spirit awaits in this unique and challenging adventure game! Welcome home, Odd Spirit!

games.name: Sex Novel: Swingers Yacht
games.description: An erotic VISUAL NOVEL with stunning HD visuals and steamy ANIMATIONS. Two adventurous couples set sail on a luxurious yacht for a week full of passion.

games.name: Dungeon Slayer
games.description: A turn-based strategy game where you explore dark dungeons in a fantasy world filled with the monster. In your mission to save innocent people, you need to have a great sense of strategy and a little bit of imagination to slay the dark creatures!

games.name: Little Gods of the Abyss
games.description: Go on a trip to heal the mysterious and beautiful world of the soul. Visit various stages that express the complex emotions of the Soul World. Open closed doors to heal broken hearts and experience beautiful stories.

games.name: Perfect Tides: Station to Station
games.description: A point n' click sequel to Perfect Tides about the momentum and whiplash of young adulthood.

games.name: Dwarves: Glory, Death and Loot
games.description: Build and command your own party of Dwarves in this mix of RPGs, roguelike and auto battlers. Prepare formations, assign equipment, and decide the fate of up to 10 Beardlings, as you lead the raid through reckless runs filled with Glory, Death, and Loot!

games.name: Microcivilization
games.description: Incremental clicker strategy, where you expand, construct, research, fight, collect heroes and make choices between good and evil. Ascend through difficulty tiers by playing through challenge campaign going back and forth through history. Mammoths included.

games.name: Out of Action
games.description: Action heavy, multiplayer + singleplayer FPS set in a brutal cyberpunk universe.

games.name: Bladesong
games.description: Crafting/management game Bladesong is set on taking swordmaking mechanics to a new level, featuring unparalleled customization of the sword's every detail and deep analysis of the sword's physical properties. Take the role of a swordsmith in the city of Eren Keep, one of mankind’s last standing cities after the gods have banished themselves in an act of desperation. Run your forge, fulfill customer commissions and perfect your craft and tools. Find your way in a city governed by an idolized ruler with an iron grip and build a loyal team of those you deem trustworthy.

games.name: Phantom
games.description: A Single Player Ghost Hunting Game. Unlockable & Upgradeable Equipment, and multiple Unique Locations to investigate.

games.name: Salmon Man
games.description: Salmon Man is not a game; it's an experience, a test, a gift... to be sent to a certain kind of person, the one you hate from the deepest part of your soul.

games.name: Captain Hardcore
games.description: Board your ship and explore the darkest reaches of the universe in search of the Ultimate Pleasure Device, all in the name of science! Build your crew, customize their looks, and conduct sexual research and experiments on them. Become the most outstanding sexual explorer in the cosmos!

games.name: Our Journey
games.description: Our journey is a co-op (2 players) asymmetric adventure game. Communicate creatively with symbols to unveil the path to success. Find out who you really are by meeting intriguing characters and visiting new places.

games.name: Weird RPG 2
games.description: The sequel to the "Weird RPG" game. An action role-playing game focusing on boss battles. Players can use a series of special methods such as voice control and equipment hardware to strengthen their characters to fight. This will be a very wonderful adventure.

games.name: Maze and Fairy tale
games.description: This is a 2D style, survival and tower defense built ARPG game. Combine dungeon and tower defense construction, become a trap master, and punch unexpected Combo. The more days you survive, you will have the opportunity to travel through a complete fairy tale world.

games.name: Rent A Car Simulator 24
games.description: Rent A Car Simulator. Start by renting your first car. Expand your rental car fleet by purchasing different vehicles and grow your car rental business. Drive your cars and get them fixed when they break down. Find new customers. Build and improve your rent a car office.

games.name: Push & Plunder
games.description: An Arcade game where you fire coins at evil statues that hurt you if they fall off the bottom of the board. Complete Challenges, unlock classes, perks, and equipment for your next attempts. Earn Gems & Coins in runs to buy permanent upgrades and unlocks. Can you survive 'til the end?

games.name: Knockoff
games.description: KNOCKOFF is an upcoming Iso-fighter RPG, set in a Lovecraftian mall taken over by various gangs. Featuring a blend of RPG decision making and fighting game combat, KNOCKOFF is like nothing you've ever seen.

games.name: Snowy Memories
games.description: A narrative-driven sci-fi game set in a world of artificial intelligence and androids, blending limited inventory survival strategy with Metroidvania elements. Players will manage their equipment and utilize weapon abilities to solve puzzles, face enemies.

games.name: Ella Stars
games.description: Bop and bash to the rhythm with Ella & Bird! Help them beat bosses with an explosive Fever Time! Experience a new world of rhythmic action, where dynamic moves and diverse music come together!

games.name: RogueJack21
games.description: RogueJack21 is a Blackjack-inspired deckbuilder where you build and upgrade your deck to battle your opponents. Navigate through procedurally generated casinos and take revenge on The House, the ruthless mafia ruling Noir City that stole everything from you.

games.name: Dead Engine
games.description: Fight to survive against zombies hunting in coordinated hordes through a pixel-art post-apocalyptic city. Loot the abandoned city, merge items to enhance your power, and expand your backpack. Each run tests your tactical skills while trading uncovers haunting survivor stories.

games.name: Sandwich Simulator
games.description:
Sandwich Simulator is a restaurant simulation game that can be played solo or with up to 4 players in online co-op. Players manage a sandwich shop by taking orders, preparing sandwiches and side items, cleaning the restaurant, and ensuring customer satisfaction. Time management, task coordination, kitchen layout, and restaurant expansion are key elements of the gameplay. The game offers both single-player and cooperative multiplayer.
Ready to create your own world of flavor? Play solo or co-op with up to 4 players, prepare sandwiches with your friends, deliver online orders to the courier and run your sandwich restaurant. Clean, expand, and keep your customers happy!

games.name: Sega Football Club Champions
games.description:
SEGA Football Club Champions is the latest multiplatform football management simulator from SEGA! Play for free!
Start off with a small club competing locally, and aim to take on the world

games.name: Legitimate Space Corp Simulator LLC
games.description:
NOW HIRING: Station Manager! (Interim)
Run a totally legitimate space business, in Sector 7-G.
Farm totally legal alien crops, refuel legally acquired ships** of 100% reputable clientele, and sell technically edible snacks and other consumables.

Perks: justification of your species' continued existence, "gloves", oxygen insurance, and mild recognition.

No exp needed.
Apply today!

games.name: Vanquish Evil
games.description: Vanquish Evil is an Action RPG Roguelite! Fast-paced action! A Randomized Upgrade System to choose your own path, and every run is unique! Explosive spell-based and melee upgrades! Stack upgrades for synergy! Features stylized pixel art!

games.name: Hello Anxiety
games.description: Hello Anxiety is a pixel art narrative puzzle RPG set in a surreal world shaped by mental health struggles. Navigate eerie bookstores, silent streets, and haunting memories as you explore the layers of anxiety and self-doubt in this emotional, story-driven experience.

games.name: Adventures in Calculon
games.description: Gather and choose adventurers by using your math skills to grow your army in this auto-battler to defeat all enemies through the world of Calculon.

games.name: Dove Days: Time Flies
games.description: Welcome to "DoveDays"! This is an engaging and compact casual puzzle game. Easy to use, simple to solve puzzles. We have combined the essence elements of various casual puzzle games. Without complicated operations, just open and play. It is both a stress-reliever and a brain-energizer.

games.name: Turnbound
