games.description: Turnbound is an auto battler, where you manage a hero's inventory to escape a haunted boardgame. Each run is different from the last, with unique upgrades, combos and synergies. Async PvP lets you battle the ghosts of other players at your own pace in this unique new inventory battler. Will your design outlive your ghostly opponents… or join them?

games.name: Cerulean Invasion
games.description: Cerulean Invasion is an engaging BL / Yaoi / Gay / Bara / Queer / NSFW (18+) visual novel featuring space cadets and enticing romance. Follow our characters as they embrace their sexuality and explore their newfound romance.

games.name: Dark Grid
games.description: You wake up with only a luminous tower beside you, its warm light enveloping you. Besides, looking around, there is only endless darkness. Survival, exploration, utilizing all resources around to survive, searching for the reasons why the world is plunged into darkness.

games.name: Pixel Shinobi
games.description: Become the Green Ninja. Step into the role of a swift, deadly warrior on a mission to cut down monsters, defeat powerful bosses, and uncover the darkness consuming the land.

games.name: Catch & Defense
games.description: Catch & Defense is a unique mix of tower defense and monster collection. Build your team, defend your base, and use powerful creatures in a strategic game where every decision counts. Capture monsters, unleash them in battle, and combine their abilities to create unstoppable synergies.

games.name: Red Passport: Ticket to Russia
games.description: Embark on a thrilling journey across Russia! From a cozy apartment to the airport, fly to a new city, and ride a train to Vladivostok. Explore, solve puzzles, and uncover secrets along the way!

games.name: Suspecto
games.description: Dive into chaos with your friends! Slip into disguise as the killer and pick off your targets, or play the agent and hunt down the fakes hiding in the crowd. In this blend of strategy, stealth, and absurd humor… one fart sound can blow every plan to pieces.

games.name: Alien Cartographer
games.description: Alien Cartographer is a Minesweeper-like logic deduction puzzle game, where the player has to identify various buildings on a hexagonal grid using environmental hints and the strict rules of their architecture.

games.name: Liar Masks
games.description: Two masks guard your escape—one always lies, one sometimes lies. Question both, spot anomalies as clues, and identify the absolute liar to choose the correct door to Escape.

games.name: Zaetherfall
games.description: Precision bullet-hell shmup with dual-element weapons, two tight-window shields, reactive in-mission dialogue and multi-phase bosses. Lead three rival aces united against the theocracy of Zael Aether.

Accelerate endlessly, dodge relentless blocks, and push your reflexes to the limit. Every 10K distance unlocks a tougher round—faster, harder, deadlier. No luck, just pure skill. How far can you survive?

games.name: Unguided Order
games.description: In a world where ancient barriers are crumbling, Darkness approaches Master Leo's home. Using a powerful artifact, Leo attempts to repel the threat. Your key tasks are strategy, creature selection, and tactical deployment, while your troops and the Master handle the battles and application of magic.

games.name: A Bad Christmas Story
games.description: Christmas lights, winter snow, and a serial killer on the loose. Follow a gifted detective through a twisted holiday night in this story-driven, interactive horror game. Your choices determine who lives, and who dies. Can you outsmart the killer?

games.name: Bonk the Boykisser
games.description: Survive endless waves of Boykissers! Fend off the Boykissers, gain XP, and choose upgrades to survive as long as possible!

games.name: Chicken Fren
games.description: Chicken Fren is a desktop pet that struts across your screen while you work or play. Every mouse click and keypress is a chance to spawn an egg: crack the egg to reveal hats and cosmetics ranging from common to legendary. Collect items, equip them, or trade them on the Steam Marketplace!

games.name: Dead Hand
games.description: Dead Hand is a retro-styled, high-tension Blackjack game focused on quick matches, smart decisions, and duels that can flip in an instant. The rules are simple, but every round hits hard, one card can make you a legend or wipe you out instantly.

games.name: The Krampus Game
games.description: The Krampus Game is a chaotic, scary-fun multiplayer adventure where ancient winter folklore turns into wild holiday mayhem. Inspired by real Krampus and Nikolaus parades, this game brings the tradition to life — but with more monsters, more laughs, and a whole lot more chaos.

games.name: 101 Cats Hidden in Denmark
games.description: Join this adventure and discover the hiding places of 101 kittens in the hand-crafted Denmark landscape. Earn lots of achievements. How many can you find? Be quick!

games.name: The Cemetery Shift
games.description:
The Cemetery Shift is a short, first-person horror story that takes place over a single night. You play as a college student working an overnight security job at a remote cemetery in the Arkansas woods.
You’ll spend most of your shift monitoring CCTV feeds from the security booth, then stepping out to investigate when the cameras catch something suspicious. Search the grounds, interact with the environment, and follow the trail of events to keep the night moving forward.

games.name: Ashentia Hauntings
games.description: Ashentia Hauntings is a 2D top-down survival horror game based on the story of a paranormal enthusiast called Noah, who decided to investigate the various haunted locations of Ashentia, a place that is surrounded by hills and forests.

games.name: 101 Dogs Hidden in Los Angeles
games.description: Join this adventure and discover the hiding places of 101 dogs in Los Angeles in the hand-crafted landscape. Earn tons of achievements. How many can you find? Be quick!

games.name: Cozy Home
games.description: Cozy Home is a calm and relaxing organizer game where you can forget your daily stress and find peace by sorting, stacking, and organizing your items.

games.name: Retrowave Barro Crazy Drift
games.description: Retrowave Barro Crazy Drift is a racing game with small cars and challenging tracks.

games.name: Oily Tower
games.description: A tower nobody wants. Climb it anyways.

games.name: Potion Knight
games.description: Potion Knight is an intense and up-tempo first-person shooter that combines the need for speed with tactical potion throwing. Set in the harsh snow ridden village of Cronenberg where an unorthodox alchemist has been fusing animals with weapons to fight under his command.

games.name: Drones Drop Bombs
games.description: An old-school arcade where a single drone is humanity's last chance against robot uprising. Drop the bombs, fire your lasers, destroy robots and protect humanity.

games.name: Hentai Sexy Mom
games.description: Hentai Sexy Mom isn’t just a puzzle game. It’s your personal fantasy about a seductive kitchen MILF who cooks only for those who’ve been very, very naughty.

games.name: How Smart Are You? IQ Test
games.description: How smart are you? Take this IQ test and find out!

games.name: After School Afterlife
games.description: Listen to the beat to navigate obstacles and escape the mansion in this narrative platformer inspired by Peranakan culture! Talk to strange and funny ghosts, and help them with their problems. Fill your journal with tasty food and cool stickers. You may just uncover the secret behind the mansion...

games.name: The Gold River Project
games.description: Single or multiplayer open world camping adventure game where you and your friends are offered a remote camping trip. One week turns into several as you suspect your guide is never coming back. Deserted, you discover you are trapped in an experiment to see if you can survive.

games.name: Escape from Ever After
games.description: When a greedy megacorp with the power to enter storybooks takes over Flynt Buckler’s fairytale world, he must get a job to sabotage them from within! Climb the corporate ladder, fight in stylish, snappy combat, and dive into storybook worlds from Lovecraft to sci-fi in this genre-bending RPG!

games.name: Sky Harvest
games.description: Sky Harvest is an Open World Farming Game set in a fantasy town named Magica where you play as Zacharias whose goal is to manage the farm on a floating island and supply the crops in the City below.

games.name: Caution Ahead: Part 2
games.description:
This is the second installment of a three-part series featuring a run-and-hide type horror experience, with each part consisting of three chapters.

You follow the story of John Rand, an experienced search and rescue officer stationed at Richburg National Park.

After the events of Part I, John continues his relentless search and rescue mission. He must venture further into the depths of Richburg National Park before it's too late to save both Michelle and Elena.

* Chapter 4: The search.
* Chapter 5: Run for your life.
* Chapter 6: Almost there.

games.name: Fighting Force Collection
games.description: Who doesn’t love a good brawler? In Fighting Force, you and up two three friends have a simple, four step strategy: break things, get weapons, use those weapons to pummel people, and repeat as needed. It’s straightforward streetside carnage with a 3D flair.

games.name: Swordia
games.description: Traverse Swordia, a community-driven MMORPG with skill-based progression, PVP, PVE, and endless possibilities. Inspired by the classics, experience a mix of dungeon crawling, farming, mining, and more. Help development with your choices and feedback.

games.name: Orbit
games.description: The protagonist robot, Nico, explores a ruined planet and uncovers its hidden secrets.

games.name: Dreadway
games.description: A co-op horror about surviving a nuclear apocalypse as a small group of people on a train, scavenging for various scrap to upgrade the train.

games.name: Dragon Puncher
games.description: Dragon Puncher is a single-player arcade-style action game designed to be a training tool for Street Fighter and 2D fighting game enthusiasts, and a well-rounded short game. About 15-20 minutes in length, players typically perform 50-75 dragon punch moves per play-through.

games.name: Wicked Seed
games.description:
Wicked Seed is a modern-day horror RPG with tactical combat and survival horror roots.

Hybrid Combat System: Combine real-time actions like dodging and parrying with strategic turn-based attacks.

Rewarding Exploration: Discover hidden paths, solve optional puzzles, and find unique items that enhance your abilities.

Customization: 50 unlockable costumes and a variety of weapons and accessories to tailor your play style.

games.name: Valiant Villagers
games.description: Assemble your villagers and defeat the ultimate evil! Valiant Villagers is a roguelike strategy RPG where your choices determine your army's abilities and playstyle as you complete various map objectives.

games.name: The 18th Attic
games.description: The 18th Attic is a psychological horror game where you play as a man trapped in a loop, armed with an instant picture camera. Hunt down paranormal anomalies lurking around by taking their pictures and detecting their presence to unravel secrets of your past. Each photo unlocks a new memory.

games.name: The Fortress
games.description: The Fortress is a dark fantasy dungeon crawler with turn-based combat, mixing strategy and risk. Choose a class, delve into cursed chambers, roll dice to fight brutal enemies, and grab loot. Face tough choices, survive epic bosses, and fight to escape... or fall to the shadows

games.name: Blood Country
games.description: Blood Country is a roguelike shooter set in the Wild West. Kill outlaws with your guns, knife, and dynamite. Defeat the gang's leader, and free the country from outlaws, bandits, and scoundrels.

games.name: Embers of the Night
games.description: In the game, day and night alternate. Zombies will not be active during the day, so you can build your home with confidence. But at night you have to resist hordes of zombies and guard your camp!

games.name: Glassy Stare
games.description: A story-driven psychological experience where memory fades, silence deepens, and something waits in the dark.

games.name: Neuroxus
games.description: A third-person, mech-powered, fast-paced shooter with roguelite elements—Doom-like intensity in a lifeless machine-ruled world.

games.name: Petrick
games.description: This is a FE-like game. To defend against human forces, you will assemble monster girls. Training them, get powerful equipments and skills... In short, it features a wealth of character development elements. Every decision players make will influence the outcome of the entire game!

games.name: S.E.M.I.: Side Effects May Include...
games.description: S.E.M.I. is a cooperative online game about escaping from a special clinic. Here you and up to 3 of your feeble-minded loyal friends in the role of patients fight with the staff and other patients and find yourself in unexpected situations. Teamwork is essential, as randomized events and experimental drugs will lead your party into unpredictable mayhem. Pop pills with your friends as you cooperate to gain your freedom.

games.name: Breath of Life
games.description: Breath of Life - a dark third-person action RPG. You are an Incarnation, born from the Void to tread where the dead cannot rest. Each portal is a step toward the artifact "Breath of Life" and a step deeper into the abyss.

games.name: Cursed Presence
games.description: Cursed Presence is a first-person psychological horror, paranormal, and survival horror story where grief opens the door to the supernatural. Explore, solve puzzles, and escape from ghostly entities, guided only by a bell that detects evil and defending yourself with limited resources.

games.name: Stellar Raiders
games.description: Stellar Raiders is a turn-based tactics roguelike where you lead a crew of space pirates, raid enemy ships, and grab as much loot as you can before making your escape.

games.name: Aexxos
games.description: Command 25 ship variants with 20+ upgrades in a living, multiplayer galaxy. Explore, trade, mine, and fight epic real-time battles. Forge alliances or betray rivals—your choices shape the universe. Dive into stunning space combat now!

games.name: Chernobots
games.description: Chernobots is a retro 3D roguelite, allowing endless exploration of the horrific and procedurally generated Chernobyl Exclusion Zone. Search for highly radioactive targets via remote controlled robots to get the job done or pay the price. Are you up for the gig?

games.name: Showdown! Mahjong Tutorial Included
games.description: A Mahjong roguelike deckbuilder where you create powerful synergies between Mahjong hands and performance-based sponsorships to execute combos that make numbers go up. The game also features a step-by-step tutorial to help you learn how to play Mahjong.

games.name: Cubuleto
games.description: Step into the world of Cubuleto, an isometric grid puzzle game where your goal is simple: find the path from start to finish. Easy to learn but challenging to master, each puzzle tests your logic and creativity. Can you find the way through?

games.name: Individual Investor Tycoon II
games.description: Start with nothing and work your way up — sell stocks over the phone, seize market opportunities, invest in properties, and build your fortune through smart decisions and well-timed moves.

games.name: Calm Before the Storm
games.description: Calm Before the Storm is a retro japanese themed cleaning simulator game

games.name: The Counter Gambit
games.description: A revenge-themed visual novel. After a decade of study, I entered a top university, only to be framed in the library and unjustly imprisoned. Now at rock bottom, how can I break free? Is there any chance left to flip this ruined life of mine?

games.name: Unusual Tales: Deep Below
games.description:
Unusual Tales is an episodic psychological horror game that follows a main character through what seems like a never ending nightmare. Will they make it to the end in one piece?

The city you once knew and grew up in isn't safe at all anymore after recent events. You, a regular working Joe, decide to take things into your own hands after a spontaneous decision. Will you regret or accept your new destiny?

This game features many things that might peak your attention such as:
An hour long scary experience depending on pace
A horror experience filled with scares
Complete voice acting for each character
Lighthearted writing and amusing moments
A dark city full of secrets to explore
Environments to keep you on edge
And much more!

Maybe today was a day that you should've stayed in bed.
But who am I to decide on your decisions in the end...
You want to save her don't you?

games.name: Idle Tycoon Manufacturing
games.description: Idle Tycoon Manufacturing is an industrial management game where your workers are literal monsters. Build, upgrade and automate your factory to transform a rusty heap of scrap into a thriving empire. Handle unexpected events, unlock new technologies and make the Monstercoins rain.

games.name: Behold the Horde
games.description: An endless horde advances without rest. Survive infinite waves, dodge the chaos, and fight for the top spot on the online leaderboard.

games.name: Where We Went
games.description: Where We Went is a narrative driven puzzle game. Step into the role of a mysterious character that can control ancient guardians to solve puzzles. Uncover the story behind your visit to the tomb and the reason for it's existence!

games.name: Woodswalker
games.description: Woodswalker is a strategy-based survival horror game in which quick thinking is key. Listen closely to your surroundings, defend yourself with your searchlight, budget your limited power, and solve environmental puzzles to discover the truth of the forest.

games.name: Dunjinn
games.description: Turn-based dungeon crawl, every step advances foes; stealth, noise, and light matter. Procedural rooms mix traps, mimics, locks, loot; combat is gear-driven with augments, consumables, and breakable durability. Between runs use town to shop, craft/repair, vault gear; death drops your pack.

games.name: Fast Food King
games.description: Serve hot dogs, hamburgers, and drinks in a fast-paced street food game. Manage orders, beat the clock, and keep hungry customers happy!

games.name: Tasty Planet: Final Bite
games.description: Grow bigger and bigger as you eat everything in the world! Play through six wildly different end-of-the-world scenarios in this chaotic eat ’em up.

games.name: Memoria
games.description: Memoria is a classic memory matching game designed for Windows 3.1. Players are presented with a grid of face-down tiles, each holding a pictogram. The Objective is to find all matching pairs by flipping two tiles at a time.

games.name: Grass Gnome Golf
games.description: A cozy, physics-driven 3D golf game featuring mouse controlled swings, countless clubs, and explorable courses. Play solo or with friends, ride golf carts, and master every shot in a cozy, handcrafted gnome world.

games.name: C.A.R.S: Creating A Ridiculous Shitshow
games.description: A rebellious chaos sandbox where you weaponize junk, disrupt highway traffic, and engineer outrageous physics disasters to turn the morning commute into pure, glorious mayhem.

games.name: Rummix
games.description: Rummix is a fast, minimalist puzzle game inspired by Rummy. Slide rows and columns to create matches of equal numbers or consecutive sequences. Every move counts—fail to make a match in time and the run ends. Plan smart, chase high scores, and master the pressure.

games.name: Hentai Shinobi
games.description: Sexy shinobi puzzle game. Solve 15-puzzle, swipe and rotate modes to reveal spicy art. Two difficulties and soothing music.

games.name: Terminal Lucidity
games.description: In a concrete slab beneath the earth, a lone technician is sent for routine maintenance on a network of supercomputers. Each terminal operates on its own hidden rules, and the only way to escape is to learn how to speak their language. Crack the code, unlock the truth.

games.name: Super Wash Simulator
games.description: A relaxing open world pressure washing simulator where you explore the city, accept cleaning jobs, upgrade your equipment, and turn dirt-covered places into spotless environments at your own pace.

games.name: Thief's Roulette
games.description: Thief's Roulette is a Story-Driven Puzzle game inspired by the Zero Escape and Danganronpa game series. Taking the narrative heavy design of visual novels and combining it with immersive, first person puzzle gameplay, Thief's Roulette hopes to be a unique gaming experience.

games.name: MeowGun: Hell Denizen
games.description: Fast paced action first person shooter. Earth has been invaded by demons. The demon rulers have evil laws. They found out you're transgender and are now hunting you. Slaughter large masses of transphobic demons, zombies and other monsters in colorful environments. The game runs on FTEQW engine.

games.name: Red Rampant
games.description: Red Rampant is a narrative-driven action-adventure game set in Medieval Scotland. With the ability to travel back in time through their memories of previous gameplay and begin again, players use knowledge gained from past mistakes and hindsight of future events to change the course of history.

games.name: Comic Store Simulator
games.description: Collect, sell or even display your favorite comic books! With over 100 to collect, along with various other forms of merchandise, run the store of your dreams as you order new products, employ helpful staff, stock shelves and bid on auctions in hopes to complete your comic book collection.

games.name: Deck of Destiny: Battleforge
games.description: "Deck of Destiny: Battleforge calls you to write your own legend in an endless battle! In this game that combines strategy, action, and roguelike deck-building elements, survive on the thin line between chance and strategy, shape your destiny, and become a legendary warrior!"

games.name: Mannequin: Factory
games.description: Assemble and pack orders in a mannequin factory. It's your weekend shift alone and your job is simple... But something's off.

games.name: Royal Lord
games.description: In "Kingdom Monarch", you are a monarch and can build the kingdom of your dreams! You need to build city walls, assign jobs to villagers, recruit soldiers, repel hordes of monsters at night, and expand your village during the day.

games.name: Assassin Of Spider
games.description: Play as warrior and try to beat giant spider boss in 7 different levels and find captured skulls in this medieval rpg adventure

games.name: Anesthesia
games.description: A third-person horror puzzle game about a young girl who woke up in a dreamy nightmarish hospital and must escape while on the look out for something dangerous lurking...

games.name: Flirting With Girls in Fantasy World
games.description: Your choices shape the story, deepening relationships and unlocking romantic paths. Experience a vibrant fantasy world brought to life with stunning hand-drawn monochrome art and a blend of adventure and dating sim mechanics.

games.name: Mosaica: Arboreal
games.description: If "Diablo" and "Cookie Clicker" had a cute goblincore baby. An enchanting RPG mosaic puzzle where every mouse click evokes the mysterious power of nature.

games.name: Nick's Text Adventure
games.description: Nick’s Text Adventure is a cruel text-based RPG where everything unfolds one line at a time. Spells lie, gear gets worse, fishing can hurt you, and enemies mock your choices. Nothing is fair, nothing is explained, and the game remembers.

games.name: Hentai Age Servant
games.description: Relax in a gentle puzzle adventure where completing each level reveals a beautiful girl’s portrait. Arrange tiles at your own pace, with no pressure, enjoying soothing visuals, calming music, and endlessly comforting gameplay anytime, relaxation

games.name: VIractal: World of Viractalia
games.description: A strategic board game-style RPG where dice rolls guide your journey! Build your deck, explore changing maps, and face events shaped by your choices and luck. Play solo or online with friends—every adventure is a new experience!

games.name: 100 Vampire Cats
games.description: Join the cutest adventure in themed locations full of cats! Explore the charming hand-drawn artwork of special places and try to find 100 adorable cats hidden throughout the game. ️‍Can you find them all?

games.name: Find the Differences 3D
games.description: A game of finding differences in 3D environments. In 30+ levels with 6 different themes you can find: Hidden object, colour, size, rotation and location differences. Also Find the same objects in different environments. Control with the mouse and navigate with the free camera. Have fun!

games.name: Locust_4457
games.description: Locust_4457 is a self-contained compilation of puzzles with elements of cryptography, escape rooms, and some ARG tropes.

games.name: R.I.P.: Reincarnation Insurance Program
games.description: In this virus-ravaged, post-apocalyptic world, you will wield the power of infinite resurrection to delve into perilous ruins, gather legendary gear, and draw strength from the gods—growing stronger through endless cycles, until you become a true savior legend.

games.name: League of Foes
games.description: League of Foes is a split-screen Multiplayer Local Battle Arena (MLBA) where players strategically push lanes, battle minions, and fight to destroy the enemy's base.

games.name: Blackout Tonight
games.description: A side-scrolling puzzle adventure where a power outage hits an apartment building during a stormy night. Play as an amateur detective, visit diverse residents, uncover secrets, solve puzzles, and restore power before midnight... Stop rummaging through those useless trash cans!

games.name: 6 Rooms
games.description: 6 Rooms - Find a way to get out of the endless Soviet communal apartment, look for clues, watch out for anomalies.

games.name: Truckin' It!
games.description: Truckin’ It is a fast-paced online co-op delivery game where two players struggle to deliver cargo quickly without losing it. Choose risky shortcuts or safer long routes, trust your partner, and enjoy the chaotic, silly world as you work together for the best score.

games.name: Outworld Defence
games.description: Outworld Defense is a 2D tower defense game where you recruit defenders, fortify your mansion, purchase upgrades, and use bonuses to protect it from hordes of demonic creatures.

games.name: RogueDiceR
games.description: RogueDiceR is a Roguelite Dice-builder. Buy randomly generated dice and modify their values. Attach stickers to grant special effects or strengthen your dice deck with powerful artifacts. Fight your way through randomly generated dungeons filled with monsters, events and bosses.

games.name: Bye Bye! Police!
games.description: Steal, Escape, and Power Up! "Bye Bye! Police!" is a high-octane, first-person heist action game set in a stylized world. Evade the police blockade, cash in your loot, and upgrade your abilities. Master various skills to pull off the ultimate, "smooth" robbery!

games.name: The Black Route
games.description: The contract has you lined up for 10 days driving the Black Rails, make sure the goods arrive. Callers can't resist the train's rumble.

games.name: Yoko no Hanashi
games.description: Yoko no Hanashi is a first-person survival horror game where you need to survive in an abandoned college with one of your chosen yandere: Yoto (male version) and Yoko (female version)

games.name: Horror
games.description: Horror is a test of your logic in the face of primal fear. You are unarmed. You are vulnerable. All you have is a flashlight with a dying battery and your intellect.

games.name: Backrooms: Don't Look Away
games.description: A terrifying multiplayer horror experience set in the Backrooms. Four survivors against player-controlled mannequins that can only move when nobody is watching!

games.name: Adaptory
games.description: Deep in uncharted space, your expedition took a challenging turn when your ship crash-landed. Master complex simulations to keep your outspoken explorers alive, face unpredictable challenges, and figure out a way back home.

games.name: Winnie's Hole
games.description:
Join Winnie on a new adventure, from within!
Play as a virus in his body and mind. Capture cells to mutate and build a deck of actions to unleash in combo-driven combat.

A genre-blending roguelite with a dark yet charming story. Embrace discomfort - Sometimes we can't help being seen as a monster...

games.name: Arcadium: Space Odyssey
games.description: Embark on an interstellar roguelite adventure set in a procedurally generated universe! Battle relentless alien horders, strategically enhance your build, harness planetary resources, and journey across the vastness of space to reveal its hidden secrets.

games.name: Ashes of the Past
games.description: In the devastated ocean city you find yourself as Werner, searching for his wife, resisting looters, hunger and thirst... Explore, solve and survive in this city...

games.name: Abyss Manager Idle
games.description: Abyss Manager Idle is an incremental tower defence game. Fend off assaults from two worlds, recruit and develop your personnel in an endless cycle of time. Defeat the calamity emerging from the abyss at the year's end to break the endless gyre.

games.name: Along Came a Dragonfly
games.description: Strange creatures from another dimension have appeared all over the land. Explore dungeons, solve puzzles, and capture monsters to fight them back, and discover a mystery best left forgotten.

games.name: Where's Fido?
games.description: From the creators of Search & Find - Hidden Objects, Where’s Fido is a relaxing 3D hidden objects journey, where you will be searching and finding lost dogs all around the world.

games.name: Valkyrie Saga
games.description: Up high on a floating island, Roll the Valkyrie must ascend and subvert fate. Climb, dash, jump and glide up to the summit of the Island, and stop it from crashing to the earth below, in this PSX style 3D platformer.

games.name: HackHub: Ultimate Hacker Simulator
games.description: Unravel cyber secrets and foil mass surveillance as a skilled hacker in Hackhub. Challenge authority, rewrite the rules, and emerge as the ultimate digital rebel.

games.name: Mr. President
games.description: Can you face the challenges of the Oval Office? Find out in Mr. President, a sandbox simulation of the U.S. presidency. Pursue your legislative agenda. Compete with rivals Russia and China. Deal with crises from 9/11 to COVID-19; and direct the U.S. military against terror groups and rogue states.

games.name: Wanderling
games.description: Wanderling is a no-combat roguelike platformer about exploration. Die, retry, and mark your path deeper into a dungeon filled with traps and enemies. You get 8 tries to gain the upgrades and map knowledge needed to clear each dungeon.

games.name: The Way of Knight
games.description: The Way of Knight is a chess-like puzzle game about the journey of Esroh the knight. You pilot the heroes through various enemies, boards, hazards, and stories.

games.name: Chromatic Conundrum
games.description: Chromatic Conundrum is a first person puzzle game where you manipulate light. Combine different colors and form shadows to illuminate your way through an enigmatic world.

games.name: Set a Watch: Digital Edition
games.description: Assemble your party to survive in this dice-management game! Master steel and magic: roll dice and next use them to attack directly or for powerful abilities. Scout, light a fire, use ancient runes or equip perks to prepare before battle. Use tactics to fight monsters and Unhallowed. Set a watch!

games.name: Synthesis of Corruption
games.description: Emergency Protocol activated: Dark Energy Particle Synthesis failed. Now you — late and alone — must navigate a facility where science and sanity have collapsed. Face entities born from dark energy corruption in this atmospheric FPS-horror hybrid where human ambition meets primal terror.

games.name: My Tiny Landscape
games.description: My Tiny Landscape is a minimalist colorful landscape builder. Bring procedural archipelagos back to life by placing biomes and regrowing a vibrant landscape tile by tile. Strategize to leverage placement rules and maximize your score, or simply enjoy a relaxing peaceful experience.

games.name: Encounter: The Lost Cards
games.description: The Major Arcana have been lost to time. A mysterious figure known as The Collector (yeah, kinda sus) seeks them out. With your help, you’ll uncover the secrets of the Tarot ✨ in Encounter — a solo roguelike where every card tests your resolve and reshapes your destiny.

games.name: Game With Balls
games.description: Game With Balls! Move the Steam Deck to navigate through handcrafted mazes.

games.name: Hundred Doors
games.description: A psychological horror experience where reality twists behind every corner. Explore disturbing rooms, uncover buried memories, and descend into madness. Can you make it through all one hundred doors?

games.name: Type Her to Sleep
games.description: Ever spelled out your thoughts to fall asleep? Well, here, you can! Type Her to Sleep is a lo-fi, cozy typing game about typing out thoughts for a good night's sleep. Experience cute aesthetics, chill music, and an overall comfy vibe.

games.name: One Potion Please
games.description: NSFW expansion themed potion crafting puzzle game! Mix kink-themed potions to inflate boobs, bwomph butts, and more, in this comedic and lewd fantasy world.

games.name: GrowBud
games.description: Farm cannabis on your desktop! Grow and master 30+ strains alongside your daily workflow as a discreet sidebar. Customise your grow houses to suit your style; fulfil orders, unlock new strains and equipment, and progress from hands-on care to full automation🪴

games.name: Turbocide
games.description: A Simple third-person, arena shooter playing as robotic beings called Reavers Each kill Grants you More Power.

games.name: Rebound Hell
games.description: A minimalist top-down action game where every shot bounces, changes color, and can turn against you. Managing ricochets is your only chance to survive.

games.name: Drunkard Simulator
games.description: Drink. Stumble. Cause chaos. Drunkard Simulator lets you turn your neighborhood into a boozy playground of impulsive stunts and slapstick mayhem.

games.name: Danmo Three Kingdoms: Battle of Wits
games.description: A Three Kingdoms-themed tactical chess game with light strategy and easy controls. Step into the era as a strategist, use over 200 historical figures—each with unique traits and counters—to form teams, revisit key battles, and shape outcomes with your tactics.

games.name: Chesscape Room
games.description: Chess variant where you have to escape custom boards through a door with your king while you opponent hunts you! Play through a campaign, create custom boards or challenge others locally or online.

games.name: Ashes of Paradise
games.description: Ashes of Paradise is a cinematic visual novel set between a neon city and its underworld, following Ash as she uncovers hidden truths and shapes her path through key choices and emotional moments.

games.name: Highguard
games.description: From the creators of Apex Legends and Titanfall, comes Highguard: a PvP raid shooter where players will ride, fight, and raid as Wardens, arcane gunslingers sent to fight for control of a mythical continent.

games.name: Black Hole: Farmageddon
games.description: Grow your ever-growing black hole as you chase panicked animals across levels with janky physics. Catch them, stack incremental upgrades, and dive into fast runs that always tempt ‘just one more’.

games.name: Guerilla Cubes
games.description: Guerilla Cubes is an action-packed couch co-op hero shooter where a special ops squad battles through living jungles, scorching deserts, and bone-freezing tundra's to reclaim Cube City from the ruthless BOX BOSS.

games.name: Blackhole Maker
games.description: Blackhole Maker is a simple, casual game. Pour resources into your flask and merge them together to create ever-larger resources. Upgrade your flask to hold even greater masses, and ultimately strive to create a black hole.

games.name: Infected Swarm
games.description: Infected Swarm is an adventure game with first-person shooter (FPS) elements.

games.name: C
games.description: A game where number goes up

games.name: Lucky Pikinini: IMS Intelligence Corp
games.description: IMS Intelligence Corp is a Large-Scale First-Person / Third-Person Story-Telling Game with a 13-Chapters Story Campaign, 4-Maps Special Missions & 33-Maps Survival Mode. It Happens Same Time As the Events of Super Incursion & IMS Death Squad. You Take Control of IMS Daryl Kalashi.

games.name: Over the Tower
games.description: Over the Tower is a hack-and-slash clicker game where you defeat enemies with simple mouse clicks. Collect coins to unlock upgrades, and equip the items you obtain to grow even stronger. What will you witness at the top of the tower…?

games.name: Callus
games.description: Callus is a short psychological horror walking simulator about cruelty and overprotection.

games.name: Urban Nightmare
games.description: "urban nightmare" is a first-person psychological horror game with VHS effect. Be careful and attentive, there is something hiding in these rooms, something is watching from the darkness.

games.name: Blood Permafrost
games.description: Suddenly alone in a snowstorm, a camper is haunted by strange visions. A short, cinematic, mind-bending psychological horror nightmare. Beware the rifleman.

games.name: Calon Arang Nightmare of Revenge
games.description: A narrative-driven horror game inspired by the Indonesian legend of Calon Arang. Explore cursed locations, uncover dark rituals, and survive psychological terror filled with jump scares, traps, and relentless enemies.

games.name: Loop the Loop: The Mansion of Gluttony
games.description: A closed-circle mystery visual novel where twelve people wake up inside a bizarre, impossible mansion—and a string of murders begins. Read from Remi's point of view as you piece together the truth through his thoughts and conversations. Linear, text-focused, Japanese/English supported.

games.name: Where's My Egg?
games.description: Where’s my egg? A poor chicken dad has sadly lost his eggs. Help him find 62 strange eggs and bring them back.

games.name: NightReaper2
games.description:
NightReaper2 is a dark fantasy action game with a stylized atmosphere.

You play as the Reaper, a mysterious character wandering through a ruined city consumed by chaos. As people flee through the streets, enemies emerge from the darkness, forcing you to fight and survive.

Gameplay focuses on action-based combat, movement, and timing. Enemies become more dangerous as you progress, requiring better positioning and faster reactions.

By defeating enemies, you collect souls that allow you to unlock new abilities and strengthen your character. Progression encourages exploration, combat mastery, and risk-taking.

The game features atmospheric environments, escalating challenges, and a dark fantasy setting designed to keep players under constant tension.

games.name: Archival Anemoia
games.description: Welcome to Archival Anemoia, an archive of over 30 different games made over the course of around 13 years, all by one girl in her childhood, and all for free!

games.name: Run TavernQuest
games.description: A role-reversing twist on old school text adventure games. You're the command parser and game master for an artificial player named STEVE. Who knew that running an RPG would be so frustrating?

games.name: Underground Garage
games.description: Become a mechanic in the world of illegal street racing. Buy used cars, repair and sell for a profit. Work on 20+ types of car. Develop a workshop and attract even more customers. Promote your cars online and sell greater numbers. There are also lots of available parts to use.

games.name: Sand Witch Adventures
games.description: Sand Witch Adventures is a roguelike game with bullet-hell elements. Cursed lands full of undead are fraught with wealth and knowledge for the young witches.

games.name: Rightfully, Beary Arms
games.description: Rightfully, Beary Arms is a bullet hell roguelite that is about more than collecting loot, dying, and then losing everything. Carefully choose enemy upgrades against your own. Plan your dungeon crawl tactfully to gun through unique factions of enemies and strategically preserve loot after death.

games.name: Cerebral
games.description: Cerebral is a psychological horror game where every mistake hurts your memory. Save your mind... or lose it to the system.

games.name: The Spirit Lift
games.description: The Spirit Lift is a deck-building rogue-like horror adventure in a haunted hotel. Ascend 13 floors in a ghostly elevator. Use equipment cards to battle monsters. Make it to the villain at the top… or die trying!

games.name: Task Force Admiral: Vol.1 - American Carrier Battles
games.description: Experience the thrill of leading American aircraft carriers to victory in this innovative full 3D command simulation wargame set in the Pacific in 1942. First-person or God’s eye, you lead your fleet and planes right from the center of the battle.

games.name: Pirate Patrol
games.description: Manage anti-piracy operations and secure important trade lines. Command your carier and send your fighter pilots on missions. Find and train new officers and pilots, on procedural game universe map. Equip your ship with new weapons and equipment.

games.name: Echoes of Elysium
games.description: An aerial exploration and survival game, set in the procedural world of Elysium. Fire up the engines and take to the skies in your hand-crafted fleet of airships. Mechanical wonders clash with ancient mysteries in an untamed paradise.

games.name: Dust & Courage: Jake Bolton’s Journey
games.description: "Dust & Courage: Jake Bolton's Journey" is a historical fantasy RPG set in the Wild West. Play as Jake, a cowboy uncovering secrets and exploring towns. Your choices shape Jake's destiny through quests and tough decisions. Experience compelling and fun stories for a memorable experience.

games.name: Ascension: The Immortal Alchemist
games.description:
Ascension follows the trials and tribulations of an Immortal Alchemist and his quest throughout time to transmute humans in to gods. Players descend into an ancient labyrinth where their souls are tested by cosmic forces to challenge the limitations of their mortality. Do you have what it takes?

Ascension is a modern resurrection of the classic 3D Action Adventure Genre - Inspired by the legendary writings of Hermes Trismegistus - a figure who rose to prominence in the mystery schools of Hellenistic Egypt & Greece, and whose timeless teachings are as relevant today; as they were when they were written.

Action-adventure, puzzle, platforming, atmospheric, difficult, speedrunner, escape room, maze

games.name: Conquest Tactics: Realm of Sin
games.description: Conquest Tactics: Realm of Sin is a dark fantasy roguelite with hex-based, turn-based tactical combat. Command your forces, make impactful choices, and navigate a realm consumed by sin—will you restore order or surrender to darkness?

games.name: Forsaken Facilities
games.description: Find your fate in the Forsaken Facilities. Explore vast dungeons to gather a valuable resource for your mysterious kidnappers. Each day you enter a facility the only way to return is if you find the required resource. Test your luck to see how long you can survive through a variety of facilities.

games.name: Speedball
games.description: A brand new entry into the legendary Bitmap Brothers series! Venture into the grim future of 2138 where mega-corporations use Speedball to distract the downtrodden masses from their miserable lives.

games.name: Delivery & Beyond
games.description: No packages? No problem! Break in, scrap, deliver... A chaotic online co-op game for up to 5 players!

games.name: Millennium Dream
games.description: Wander through spaces constructed from millennial memories, experiencing the fusion of Chinese dreamcore and liminal space aesthetics. Use your camera to capture corners forgotten by memory, collect fragments of childhood. No monsters or jumpscares, immerse yourself fully in this millennial dream.

games.name: Really Fast Rat
games.description: Really Fast Rat is a cute 2D platformer where you play as a Really Fast Rat! Dash into several unique levels and collect some adorable hats!

games.name: Earth Must Die
games.description: These moronic Terranoids think they can just roll in here and take over my beautiful Tyrythian kingdom? The kingdom that I built from the ground up with my bare hands, and only sort of inherited from my dear, sweet, extremely dead father? This is complete bullsh*t, and I'm going to make them dead.

games.name: Typing Break
games.description: If you can type, you can fire a gun.

games.name: RaceWorms
games.description: Dig your way through this competitive multiplayer racing game with up to 6 players! RaceWorms can be played online, locally (max. 4 players) or both. Burrow through dynamic maps, leap from the ground to gain a burst of speed, and use items to hinder your opponents.

games.name: Flipside
games.description: "Flipside" is a 2D puzzle platformer game demo. The demo consists of about 30 levels from the 150 unique levels in the complete edition. You need to solve the puzzles by not only jumping but also flipping the entire screen, and avoid the traps by walking on walls, floors and ceilings!

games.name: Idle Harem Dungeon
games.description: Upon hearing your dreams of making her yours one day, the beautiful and sadistic goddess Era comes to you with a proposal: survive and seduce her seven chosen warriors, and she will consider making your dreams a reality. Will you succeed or die, over and over again, trying?

games.name: The Eternal Mines
games.description: Upgrade your minions as you journey deeper into the mines. Discover new areas with unique effects. Upgrade and equip masks to change the behaviors of the your miners

games.name: 101 Cats Hidden in Kyoto
games.description: Join this adventure and discover the hiding places of 101 kittens in the hand-crafted Kyoto landscape. Earn lots of achievements. How many can you find? Be quick!

games.name: Green Pond Town
games.description: You've received a strange letter, and inside, a chilling black and white photograph - the people in the picture are eerily faceless! A powerful intuition compels you to journey to the location in the photo: Greenwater Town. However, this town, named after a "green pond," is far more sinister than its name suggests.

games.name: Niji Protocol
games.description: Hunt the Demon Aristocracy in this neon-noir detective puzzle game. As an agent of the Njij Protocol, travel the globe, interview witnesses, and cross-reference clues in the Grimoire to profile the suspect before time runs out and history is lost forever.

games.name: Obey the Voice
games.description: You are here to listen to The Voice, do what he says. But don't listen to other voices...

games.name: Astro Party EX
games.description: Shoot first, then run 'em over

“0.0035%” is a mystery & horror game set in modern Japan. Players piece together fragmented clues and items to uncover hidden truths. No flashy action—only a shocking finale and deep, thought‑provoking exploration with multiple endings.

games.name: Deadlist
games.description: A psychological survival horror game where you explore a shifting, haunted forest, uncover rituals, and fight to escape before madness consumes you.

games.name: Lunar Mystery 2103
games.description: Lunar Mystery 2103 is a sci-fi puzzle-adventure game originally developed for the Game Boy Color. Explore the cold, mechanical corridors of C01, battling through the Colony's defensive drones, and something more sinister... Solve puzzles, defeat bosses, and unravel the mystery!

games.name: Never Ending Corridor
games.description: A First-person horror game with multiple endings. Endings and Events might change Every time you Replay it.

games.name: Queen Anne's Lace
games.description: An anomaly horror game with a big twist: YOU hide the anomalies. As the Night Auditor for the Queen Anne's Lace hotel, your job is to keep your guests checked in. Forever.

games.name: Oxu 2
games.description: Minimalistic 3d puzzle with portals, cubes, lasers and mobile platforms

games.name: Ze Bomber
games.description: Free Bomber game

games.name: Empire of Vice: Chicago
games.description: Live the rise and fall of a gangster in Prohibition-era Chicago. Strategic turn-based management meets gritty narrative in a city built on blood, booze, and betrayal.

games.name: Vironics
games.description: Control a Nanite body from a space station to gather Nanite resources on Earth, seized by a rogue AI. Build and fortify your dropbase with turrets and defenses, fight waves of robotic enemies, and collect Nanites for extraction, balancing fast FPS combat with strategic tower placement.

games.name: Project: Gorgon
games.description: Project: Gorgon is an indie 3D Fantasy MMORPG that focuses on player exploration and discovery.

games.name: Fighties 2
games.description: Fighties 2 is a fast paced 2D platform fighter. It is the second Fighties game.

games.name: Horde
games.description: low poly fps where you have to survive unlimited waves of zombies

games.name: Carnage in Space: Crucible
games.description: A fast-paced sci-fi action-platormer/beat-em-up with multiple characters and customization for replayability. Features both adjustable difficulty settings and intense post-game challenges for players of all skill levels.

games.name: Nova Antarctica
games.description: Survive Earth's harshest conditions on a devastatingly beautiful journey shaped by the choices you make, the paths you take, and the stories you weave with the mysterious animals of Antarctica.

games.name: Omi Oh My AI
games.description: Go on a captchavating adventure with Omi, a friendly (if a bit quirky) artificial intelligence! Learn to see the world the way Omi does as you solve image, word, and number puzzles inspired by the CAPTCHAs we’ve all had to do to prove we’re not a robot. Go outside the game and explore websites chronicling Omi’s development and learn how to solve the game’s stranger puzzles in this game inspired by AI, I Love Bees, the 90’s, and the constant need to prove you’re not a robot.

games.name: Re-Activated
games.description: Re-Activated is a 2D puzzle platformer game where you need to manipulate the movement system of a robot to pass the levels. You control the little flying robot named “Minic” to help the robot. Explore the facility and solve the puzzlles in a relaxing 1-bit style atmosphere.

games.name: Dark Galaxy
games.description: Dark Galaxy is an action based rogue-like top-down shooter. You pilot a space drone to oppose the insectoid like species called Minaripods and get stronger by travelling to different star systems. Can you free our galaxy from the invaders?

games.name: Melon Man
games.description: Embark on a deliciously delightful challenge with Melon Man, a charming 2D platformer that will test your platformer skills and tickle your taste buds! Join Melon Man on his quest to collect all his melons in this vibrant and exciting adventure.

games.name: Ghost Keeper
games.description: Become a Ghost Keeper and lead your fearsome minions against the living. Use diverse scare tactics, manage demonic creatures and harness dozens of skills. Oh, and don’t let the Brotherhood catch you! The ultimate scaring experience begins…

games.name: Labyrinth of Touhou Tri: The Dreaming Girls & The Mysterious Orbs
games.description:
A Fanmade Touhou Project DRPG With Not-So-Easy Boss Fights!
The girls of Gensokyo weave together a dungeon RPG with an estimated playtime of 30~50 hours. Pick a frontline of 4 and a rear of 8 to form a party of 12 characters out of a pool over 40+ and conquer extensive dungeons!

The girls of Gensokyo weave together a DRPG with not-so-easy boss fights! Form a party of 12 allies out of a pool of 40+, and create with 1000+ skills to choose from! Hack, slash, and grow stronger, then make builds (or counter-builds!) to take down powerful bosses awaiting you in the dungeons.

games.name: Journey to the Void
games.description: Prepare to fend off attacks from all directions in this hybrid strategy roguelite deck builder. On your journey through varied grid-based biomes, battle unique foes and make tough moral choices to restore a corrupted land and decide the fate of your world.

games.name: Steel Century Groove
games.description: Pilot mecha in rhythm-RPG dance battles. Assemble a squad of colossal dancers, challenge every rival you lock eyes with, compete for the championship trophy, and uncover the secrets of a world where everything moves to the drumbeat of steel feet.

games.name: Roots Devour
games.description: Extend your roots, imbibe fresh blood, and expand without end. Roots Devour is a strategic exploration game centered around a card-connecting mechanism. Drive your frenzied roots through swamps and over frozen mountains, invading human cities until the darkness... descends.

games.name: Destroyer Burger
games.description: DESTROYER BURGER is the 4th best independent fast food simulator game of 2025! Featuring frenetic multi-tasking madness where you assemble burgers in the Kitchen and serve them up in the Front Desk, DESTROYER BURGER is a game of chaos management.

games.name: BannerBound
games.description: Bannerbound is a flag-capturing game where you lead a customized army, combining strategy and action to dominate the battlefield. Organize your troops, adapt your tactics, and fight for victory!

games.name: Lanesplit
games.description: Push performance bikes to the absolute limit, and weave through traffic where one wrong move can spell disaster.

games.name: Bogos Binted?
games.description: Welcome to a sinful night with the wackiest aliens in the galaxy! In this online game for 2-4 players, you'll engage in various tabletop games, devise brilliant strategies, lie, and do whatever it takes to outplay your opponents. Didn't work out? Well, then your head is going to explode.

games.name: Hellmart
games.description: Supermarket simulator meets horror. You’re a clerk at a 24-hour convenience store in the far North. During the day — serve customers and hit your sales goals. At night — beware of strange clients. Hide, escape, defend yourself.

games.name: Nekogumi
games.description:
Join Bruce, a tuxie who loves to cosplay and roam around town. Spruce up the cat café and buy all sorts of wardrobe items you want. Gather your brigade and let your curiosity guide you, you get a free pass as a cat boss~

Nekogumi is a single player, third person cafe-adventure game. It is a cozy game where you’d find companions among silly and funny animals and work together to protect and bring prosper to the neighbourhood.

games.name: Null.Process
games.description: Navigate a procedurally generated factory using limited LiDAR visibility. Scavenge for resources and vital upgrades to improve your abilities and keep your mechanical shell operational. Every run is a unique formation of rooms, upgrades, and secrets.

games.name: Terraformental
games.description: Waking up alone in a derelict terraforming facility on an unknown (and distinctly not terraformed) planet, it's up to you to find a way to survive, learn what happened to the people who lived here and why you were abandoned in this narrative-driven incremental game.

games.name: Wastelanders
games.description: A dystopian turn-based strategy game where your moves are made manifest through a colorful selection of combat cards. Assemble your deck, exploit Clashes to turn the tides in your favour, and survive long enough to learn the secrets of the Wasteland.

games.name: Sahir: Shiv of Memories
games.description: Sahir: Shiv of Memories is a classic story-driven JRPG blended with survival mechanics. Gather your party, choose who you trust amidst the mysterious events unfolding on the island, and fight to survive.

games.name: Gunflare Epoch
games.description: "Gunflare Epoch" is a roguelike top-down shooter. Earth has fallen. As rebel rangers—humanity's last hope—plunge into randomized dungeons, arm yourself,and survive endless hordes. Uncover the rebellion's truth in a storm of bullets and scrap.

games.name: Cleaning Simulator
games.description: Cleaning Simulator offers a relaxing and satisfying experience where mess turns into order and dirt into shine. Sweep, scrub, and polish. Every corner transforms under your touch!

games.name: The Backrooms: Liminal Space
games.description: A short horror experience rendered with a real-time VHS filter (grain, scan lines). Freely explore the spaces of a strange yellow maze. Independently created by a 12-year-old developer using UE5, it immerses you in a purely liminal space atmosphere.

games.name: Mytosis
games.description: Mytosis is a short, experimental incremental game about evolving life forms from simple cells to complex procedural organisms.

games.name: Pack my LunchBox
games.description: Pack my LunchBox is a cute and relaxing puzzle game where you assemble lunchboxes based on customer wishes. Read the cards, consider their likes and dislikes, and choose the perfect meal, drink, and snack. Meet all the conditions to clear the level!

games.name: Viscera Alien
games.description: A Suika Game-style physics puzzle! Merge cute alien creatures called Viscera to create bigger ones. Combine two Level 11 Viscera to create an Alien and collect it in your encyclopedia! Simple yet addictive casual puzzle game.

games.name: Eschaton: Battle for Eternity
games.description: Eschaton is a vivid, fast-paced top-down arcade sci-fi space shooter with weapon upgrades, intense boss fights, dynamic SFX, and an original metal-meets-synth soundtrack. Chase high scores, accuracy ranks, and speedrun times while killing aliens in this chapter of a longer legendary saga.

games.name: Dream Savior
games.description: Purge the onslaught of Nightmares and defeat the Dream Bosses! Dream Savior is a cute casual game with rogue-lite elements, where your choices can help build towards your victory against hundreds of monsters that get thrown at you!

games.name: Oubliette
games.description: Twin stick fighter-adventure game, where you take control of your enemies to use their skills against them.

games.name: Our Burial Dolls Remastered
games.description:
They buried the dolls for us that night. But the story didn’t end with the soil.

The beloved classic returns in a remastered edition, featuring improved visuals and enhanced atmospheric presentation.

games.name: Penguin Ascension
games.description: A cozy pixel-art idle clicker where you click for Fish, buy upgrades, trigger random events, and Rebirth for Golden Krill to unlock permanent prestige boosts and absurd arctic progression.

games.name: Urban Myth.exe
games.description: Escape from the terrifying urban myth and strive for survival. Immerse yourself in a heart-pounding and nail-biting escape in this first-person survival horror game.

games.name: Toganeyobi
games.description: A horror-style escape puzzle game

games.name: A Game About Boxes
games.description: "Boxes are the most wonderful things ever! Truly they are, didn’t you know?" A Game About Boxes is a quirky little adventure that shifts from minimalist aesthetics to uncanny atmospheres, all while you jump around, summon boxes, and slowly learn to love them. :) or else <3

games.name: Incremental Dungeon
games.description: Incremental Dungeon is an incremental game in which you fight combatants with exponentially increasing strength via an auto-battler system. Each defeated opponent on the main path unlocks new equipment, shops, or other ways of empowering your build!

games.name: U.N. Owen Was Her?
games.description: Escape a Scarlet Mansion haunted by U.N. Owen..? Feed or fight roaming entities, solve light and gear puzzles, and use hunger to survive. Explore grand halls and a vast library, descend into a sealed underground, and defeat the original U.N. Owen.

games.name: HackSociety
games.description: hackSociety is an immersive MMO hacking simulator. Become part of a living, breathing simulated society in the most thorough and expansive hacker sim ever made. Will you become a legend, or fade into obscurity?

games.name: Uninvited: Security Service
games.description: Uninvited: Security Service is a really simple stealth/exploration game where you sneak around a mansion while avoiding the butler that lives in there. Learn about the foolhardy protagonist and the stupid chain of events that led to the situation that’s happening there.

games.name: Absølve
games.description: Welcome to Absølve, a dark fantasy based hack-and-slash game, where you fight wave after wave of demons hordes using the chaotic Wheel of Judgement system to try and defeat as many monsters as possible in an attempt to gain absolution.

games.name: Bait & Tackle Store Simulator
games.description: Run your own fishing tackle shop in this first-person simulation game. Order and stock products, manage prices, serve customers, and expand your store over time through simple shop management and steady progression.

games.name: Bent on Destruction
games.description: Bent on Destruction is a 3D projectile launching battle game featuring realistic building destruction! Topple the towers and use your power-ups to defeat the meanies. Experience a revolutionary new building destruction engine.

games.name: The Perfect Pencil
games.description: Help John on his journey of personal growth. Unravel the nuances of human reactions to fear. Surprising exploration, fast paced combat, complex choices and allegorical characters, all intertwined with a psychological narrative in this hand-drawn 2D action-platformer.

games.name: The Green Light
games.description: The Green Light is a single-player first-person mystery set in 1986. A story driven game with an atmospheric environment and narrations. A tale of self-discovery as Gary Baker attempts to save what's left of himself and his family.

games.name: Harem in Another World
games.description: Save the world. Get the girls!

games.name: Dark Auction
games.description: The game is a mystery adventure centering on the idea of a historical figure having surreptitiously bequeathed a fictitious estate, following the drama that plays out among the characters faced with an enigma extending all the way into their modern world.

games.name: Untrusted: Hackers at Large
games.description: A single player hacking adventure set in the Untrusted world where you'll be playing as various hackers getting into computer systems to hack, steal and sabotage. Manage your crew, manage your risks, threaten or kill your targets. Investigate. Hack. Don't Die.

games.name: MMA Life Simulator
games.description: In “MMA Life Simulator,” you step into the shoes of a young aspiring fighter facing other fighters. To survive and protect your loved ones, you must enter the renowned world of fighting. Every choice you make, from intense training to accepting risky challenges.

games.name: Dusk Index: Gion
games.description: Dusk Index: Gion is an upcoming psycho-suspense adventure game from Tokyo Dark creator Cherrymochi in collaboration with Bushiroad Games.

games.name: Don't Stop, Girlypop!
games.description: Spread the love! Don’t Stop, Girlypop! is a Y2K arena movement shooter where standing still is not an option.

games.name: The Midnight Walkers
games.description: Fight, Scavenge, and Extract in The Midnight Walkers, a hardcore FPS game with deadly zombies, dangerous players, and valuable loot. Craft weapons, armor, and consumables; trade items; and maintain your hideout. Escape Liberty Grand Center mega complex, and thrive...or die and lose everything.

games.name: Cairn
games.description: Reach a summit never climbed before in this survival-climber from the creators of Furi and Haven. Climb anywhere and plan your route carefully, managing pitons and resources to survive the unforgiving Mount Kami. Discover what Aava is willing to sacrifice to achieve the ascent of a lifetime.

games.name: 5omeday
games.description: You have been assigned to guard a dragon girl set to be executed at the end of 5 days and have the ability to kill her instantly at any time with the push of a button in this multi-ending visual novel.

games.name: Whisper of the Swallows
games.description: Sink into a vast, strange and unforgiving world, in procedural generation. Fight against extreme climatic conditions. Alone or in cooperation, survive, explore, build and bring light back to the chaos.

games.name: City Tales: Medieval Era
games.description: City Tales is a medieval city builder, allowing you to unleash your creativity and shape vast cities that break outside a traditional grid. Plan each district for your citizens needs and aid your companions in their tales, creating a city to be proud of!

games.name: Pastopia
games.description: Become a Memory Walker in Pastopia and restore the mystical lands of Talmanu. In this open-world adventure, team up with your Golem A.I companion to explore vast environments, solve puzzles, and unleash your creativity. Discover the lost memories of Pastopia and shape your own adventure!

games.name: Calyx
games.description: A strategy game with a new kind of enemy, Calyx puts you in charge of a space mining outpost, locked in battle with an overwhelming alien organism. Build your base, gather resources, assemble your forces, and take on the Calyx. With only an out-of-date AI for company, can you survive?

games.name: Spring Tales
games.description: Spring Tales is a cozy 2D puzzle adventure game. Help the charming residents of Blossomdale prepare for their spring festival by solving puzzles, overcoming challenges, and rebuilding after a storm. Experience a heartwarming story filled with friendship, hope, and community spirit.

games.name: Poly TD
games.description: Poly TD is a new type of tower defense game with roguelike elements. Combine heroes in a circular stage and use your own strategy to fend off endless waves of enemies!

games.name: Sword Sanctuary
games.description: Players control a knight aspiring to become a Swordmaster. Face and defeat various powerful opponents, and finally challenge the Sword Saint to claim victory.

games.name: I Hate this Place
games.description: A craft-based, isometric survival horror game with twisted monsters and warped reality. Scavenge and build to survive terrifying days and nights while using stealth and noise to fight enemies that stalk by sound. All styled with bold comic art and an '80s horror vibe.

games.name: The Cooking Club
games.description:
The Cooking Club is a Slice-Of-Life // Dating Sim visual novel that is produced in the Ren'Py engine!

Ready to start cooking?

High school can be a drag—especially when you’re stuck in classes you can’t stand. Looking for an easy escape, our protagonist.. YOU! (Yes - You!) stumbles upon the only club with an open spot: The Cooking Club.

What starts as a simple excuse to ditch class quickly turns into something far more delicious. Between chopping, stirring, and whisking up new dishes, unexpected sparks begin to fly. Will you master the recipe for love, or will things boil over? With a cast of charming clubmates, secret ingredients of romance, and just a pinch of chaos, The Cooking Club is serving up a story that’s equal parts heart-warming and hilarious. So grab your apron—because in this kitchen, love is always on the menu!

But remember.. each decision you make comes with a choice and a path - you can't have every girl to yourself!

games.name: Automatic Kingdom
games.description: Build the perfect kingdom in this turn-based city builder, arranging synergies of Citizens and Constructions to generate valuable resources. Keep your kingdom happy, endure hostile Challenges, and unlock new cards as your kingdom becomes more prosperous.

games.name: Code Vein II
games.description:
Code Vein II is an action role-playing game set in a post-apocalyptic world where Revenants are being transformed into hostile "Horrors." A Revenant Hunter must partner with a time-manipulating companion named Lou.
Gameplay features third-person action combat and deep RPG progression, emphasizing specialized Blood-based mechanics and character customization. An evolved Partner System enhances tactical cooperation with AI companions during exploration and high-difficulty boss encounters. Success depends on mastering diverse weaponry and temporal abilities to survive a world defined by memory and ruin.

games.name: 100 Cats Lost in Usa Find & Color
games.description: Grab your crayons and hunt for 100 hidden cats across a beautifully hand-drawn map. Play solo or invite a friend to join online, then bring each scene to life with guided color-by-numbers or your own palette — all in a relaxing, soothing atmosphere.

games.name: Namakorium
games.description: Namako (Sea cucumbers) will save the Earth—NAMAKORIUM is a chaotic, cooperative multiplayer RTS game for up to four players. Command the “cleaners of the sea” —Namako left behind by humanity and work together to clean up the polluted oceans!

games.name: Blastermancer
games.description: Blastermancer is a crunchy, lo-fi platform shooter where you control a robot whose sole purpose is to obliterate space demons. Beginning as a mix of 80s arcade and rogue-like, the game transforms into a cacophonous ballet of lasers and pixel dust.

games.name: Ufophilia
games.description: UFOPHILIA is a first-person psychological horror game where you explore areas marked by alien phenomena. Use specialized equipment to detect, identify, and photograph aliens—but do so at your own risk... They are watching you too.

games.name: Feastopia
games.description: Feastopia is a roguelike simulation game. In this rich yet mysterious land, you sign a contract with an egg that fell from the sky and undertake the grand task of establishing a prosperous food capital.

games.name: School Days
games.description: "School Days" is a highly flexible campus development game. Summer watermelons, afternoon ceiling fans, and a throbbing heart transport you back to the early 2000s. Study, exercise, and fall in love—will you retrace your past path or live a different life? 12 years from now, what will your future hold? It's up to you to decide!

games.name: Atrium Mortis
games.description: Trapped in an endless Roman corridor, you must observe carefully, solve eerie puzzles, and survive horrors in this roguelite puzzle-adventure.

games.name: Football Academy Manager
games.description: Run your own football academy. Scout and discover young talents, evaluate their potential, manage their development through training, and negotiate transfers with clubs to grow your prestige and influence.

games.name: Silktrails: Cats in the Grove 2
games.description: Silktrails: Cats in the Grove 2 is a cozy, hand-drawn adventure where you explore 11 peaceful levels and find over 1,000 hidden cats. Set in the charming world of Silkgrove, it's perfect for anyone who loves relaxing games and cute cats.

games.name: Somewhere, a Cat Sleeps
games.description: Between the veil of night and dawn, a cat once loved still wanders on. A meditative walking simulator about cats, patience, love, and loss.

games.name: Supernatural Visual Novel: The Fourteenth Guzai Vol. 1 & 2
games.description: Middle school girls face final exams and a deadly supernatural game. An urban legend of a “nonexistent telephone pole.” The “Eight Sisters,” silver assassin, and mysterious “RULERS.” A supernatural suspense of survival and conspiracy. Ongoing story continuing to unfold.

games.name: The Arena
games.description: Fight for Glory in the arena! Face challenging enemies, deal with random events, and entertain the crowd on your path to becoming the ultimate arena champion!

games.name: Lac Viet Journey
games.description: Explore Vietnam’s rich flavors and culture as you soar with a little Lạc bird, typing dish names, unlocking upgrades, and journeying across the country.

games.name: Echoes of the Rest
games.description: A first-person psychological horror game where you explore Joe's house and psyche after his accident, solve clues while trying to escape the house, and attempt to uncover the underlying issue behind Joe's mental state.

games.name: Space Warlord Baby Trading Simulator
games.description: Buy low, sell high, and short an entire universe of babies in this arcade stock market sim set in the world of Space Warlord Organ Trading Simulator.

games.name: The Way
games.description: RPG+Rouge+AFK+forging? Cultivate characters, AFK cultivation, Rouge cards, unlock skills, craft equipment, and experience the irresistible fun!

games.name: Bento Blocks
games.description: Craft delicious lunch boxes in this cozy-yet-challenging ingredient-cutting puzzle game.

games.name: Berry Bury Berry
games.description: A juicy first-person incremental game about growing berries and tossing them down an ominous hole. Earn money and upgrades. Make new friends with sentient berry pals. Grow and control the hole as you unearth why nobody leaves this accursed garden. Bury it all, Berry everything.

games.name: Ouchi de Amaeru Shakaijin Kanojo no Renai Moyou
games.description: A heartwarming visual novel about a romance with a younger female colleague. Enjoy an authentic office love story between two working adults navigating their careers and their feelings for each other.

games.name: Channel 4 Midnight
games.description: A bite-sized psychological horror game about a wayward soul who seeks transformation through a sinister ritual.

games.name: MetaChess
games.description: MetaChess is chess that lets you build your own army and rewrite the board. With alternate roles for every piece, it creates billions of new possible games possibilities. No more memorized openings, no more solved meta. Every decision matters. Outdraft, outthink, and outplay your opponent.

games.name: Mirage of Tower
games.description: A pure platformer game containing nothing but platforming and the occasional wordless story. Dreamlike and surreal, yet full of multi-layered symbolism.

games.name: Lovely Anime Puzzle: Summer
games.description: Lovely Anime Puzzle: Summer is a fun and rewarding puzzle game. Assemble charming beach-themed pictures, sharpen your attention, and immerse yourself in a festive holiday world.

games.name: ACE: Alice Card Episode
games.description: Caution! Do not make any plans before playing this game. This game is so addctive that makes The new brand deck-building rogue-like card battle A.C.E is here!

games.name: Sorrow's Serenade
games.description: A brief emotional experience lasting a few minutes, centered on the quiet weight of a kept promise. A narrative-driven tale with minimal mechanics.

games.name: Flat Galaxy: An Idlemare
games.description: Flat Galaxy: An Idlemare is a one-button arcade experience set in a surreal sci-fi training simulation. Precision and strategy are key as you guide a robot through six challenging levels, backed by an original soundtrack with live guitars.

games.name: The Archive
games.description: Welcome to the Case Processing Unit. Classify forgotten reports, uncover hidden patterns, and discover why this backlog exists, and why you were brought in to handle it.

games.name: Your Canvas
games.description: Your Canvas is a Text-Based Psychological Horror game set during three therapy sessions with different time periods where the player will be presented with various choices for deciding the outcome of the story.

games.name: Pocket Lint Zero
games.description: Play for free! A deceptively hard little game of deduction. I’m now thinking of a specific combination of pocket items. If I give you hints about what you’ve got wrong, can you guess it in as few guesses as possible?

games.name: Wasteland Orchard
games.description: A Survival-Farming-Roguelite Game with Idle elements

games.name: Obscure Figures
games.description: It is a psychological horror game and walking simulator. Only half of the rooms are safe. When you enter an unsafe room, you must leave immediately. Ghosts can be dispelled with a flute or a guitar.

games.name: Hentai Cleopatra 2
games.description: Hentai Cleopatra 2 is an exciting game that combines puzzles, an intriguing storyline, and a seductive atmosphere inspired by the legendary queen of Egypt. You will immerse yourself in the world of ancient Egypt, where power, passion, and mysteries intertwine into a single story.

games.name: Occupy Mars: The Game
games.description: Survive and colonize Mars in a highly technical, open-world sandbox game. Build and upgrade your base, discover new regions, conduct mining operations, retrieve water, generate oxygen, grow crops, and fix broken parts.

games.name: Folklore Hunter
games.description: You are a hunter world reknowned for slaying supernatural beasts. Your next contract is to hunt down a wendigo plaguing a section of woods in north america. Gather resources, set traps, prepare your equipment, use your hunters instincts and take down the beast, before it hunts you.

games.name: RLLL: Tower of Choices
games.description: RLLL: Tower of Choices blends party-based RPG, deck-building, and roguelite elements. Roll dice to move, make choices that matter, and build your perfect party through class advancement and companion recruitment. Discover powerful synergies between artifacts and skills with each new run.

games.name: Touhou Blooming Soul
games.description: A classic pixel side-scrolling action game with Rogue-lite. Play as Hata no Kokoro on a journey of self-discovery and use combinations of different emotions to fight battles as beautiful as a dance!

games.name: The 9th Charnel
games.description: A first-person survival horror game, The 9th Charnel is filled with a rich and frightening atmosphere. While exploring the many mysteries of this world, you must survive- whether you do it through stealth or by using weapons.

games.name: Legends of Celestite: The All Bearer
games.description: Fate unites a new group of heroes as an unstoppable supervillain resurrects from the dead. During his war-filled resurgence, he discovers the peculiar birth of a red-eyed boy whom he believes to be more than just a prophecy in this story-driven RPG influenced by Naruto and The Legend of Dragoon.

games.name: Cosmic Carnage
games.description: Prepare for an interstellar showdown like no other in a gripping roguelite/roguelike top-down twin-stick shooter set in the vast depths of space. Pilot your advanced starship, engaging in relentless battles against hordes of alien adversaries. Destroy, Collect, Upgrade, Die, Unlock, Repeat.

games.name: Half Sword
games.description: Half Sword is a physics-based medieval combat simulator featuring historically accurate XV-century arms and armor. We are not afraid to show the brutal nature of medieval combat with in-depth blood and gore features.

games.name: Shadows of Soldiers
