games.description: Immerse yourself in the heart-pounding action of "Shadows of Soldiers," an adrenaline-fuelled 8v8 third-person cover-based tactical multiplayer shooter! Prepare to embark on an epic battlefield adventure, where strategic choices and teamwork determine victory.

games.name: Slimedrop Laboratory
games.description: It’s war under your microscope: bacteria will devour your Slime cells if you don't help! In this casual strategy game grow your cell sample, guide them to stay out of bacteria’s reach, boost your cells power, and watch them use unique abilities for survival.

games.name: Vampires: Bloodlord Rising
games.description: You are a vampire. Build a castle, manage your clan and expand your hold over Sangavia. Develop your character, experience a dramatic story in an open world and rule the land either alone or with your friends in co-op mode.

games.name: Aliosso
games.description: Combine tiles and run-changing cards to unleash power-packed combos and crush your enemies. Fight your way through the scorching desert of Samsara and stop the Djinn!

games.name: Project Rebearth
games.description: The game is set in a post-apocalyptic utopia where you rebuild society after a global collapse. A massive online multiplayer where everyone plays on an exact replica of planet earth. Grow your town, trade with other players, face challenges and discover the rich history of the planet.

games.name: Net.Crawl
games.description: Net.Crawl is a puzzle rogue-like about White Rabbit lost in the unfriendly cyberspace. Dive deep into the bizarre digital world and outsmart dozens of unique Cores(mini-bosses). Short runs, deep strategies, crazy combos and a ton of replayability.

games.name: Cuprum2929
games.description: After waking up disoriented near the sea, a young kid must navigate through an enigmatic city controlled by AI screens, searching for their missing dog, Pythagora. Solve intricate puzzles housed in unique locations and unravel the secrets of this advanced island and reunite with your companion.

games.name: Holomancer
games.description: Embark on an epic journey in OBU, a top-down shooter blending intense combat with strategic crafting and exploration. Navigate diverse levels, battle formidable foes, and harness your creativity to craft and upgrade gear. Dive into a world where skill and strategy shape your adventure.

games.name: Fear the Timeloop
games.description: Fear The Timeloop is a survival horror game where every fifteen minutes, the protagonist dies and resets to the starting point. Can you break the cycle and escape the loop?

games.name: Horizon Journey
games.description: Embark on an epic adventure to Mars in Horizon Journey, an open-world survival game that blends colonization, terraforming, and exploration in both single-player and multiplayer co-op modes. You're tasked with the monumental challenge of making Mars a new home for humanity.

games.name: Chumini: Tiny Army
games.description: In this vampire survivor-like, summon an army of tiny Chuminis to battle waves of forest demons. Each Chumini has its own movement patterns: it's up to you to manage this merry mess to create an unstoppable force!

games.name: Katana Dragon
games.description:
Katana Dragon is an action-RPG adventure and dungeons exploration, where you play as the ninjas Shin and Nobi in their quest to end the curse that hangs over Sogen.
Learn ninja skills, upgrade your Dragon Gems, equip the Cursed Seals and level up. Avoid traps, solve puzzles and fight powerful enemies.
Your ninja way begins!

games.name: Necrosis: Dawn of Dread
games.description: Necrosis: Dawn of Dread is a full-length co-op survival horror experience inspired by the golden age of zombies. 15+ hours of missions, vehicles, puzzles, with many playable survivors await across a world consumed by the dead. No microtransactions, no shortcuts: just pure survival.

games.name: Ranch Store Simulator
games.description: Immerse yourself in Ranch Store Simulator, where you care for adorable animals, grow fresh vegetables, and manage your own store! Feed, water, and harvest to keep your farm thriving. Sell your goods, attract customers, and expand your business in this cozy, fun-filled farming adventure.

games.name: Dustbound
games.description: Build your deck, craft overpowered cards, and command up to five customizable drones. Adapt, strategize, and fight your way through the unforgiving desert.

games.name: Prophecy of Ashen
games.description: "Prophecy of Ashen" is a medieval fantasy role-playing game. The game revolves around the conflict between the Ashen descendants and the Hall of Divine Edict, and players must make difficult choices throughout the game to determine their fate.

games.name: Tarot
games.description: Tarot is a Rouge-like deck builder themed around the Major and Minor Arcana of the Tarot.

games.name: VonGarland Castle: Beyond Blood
games.description: prepare yourself for side scrolling survival horror action. Ransom VonGarland must journey to Mayhem Island and the ruins of VonGarland Castle to find her brother and uncover the truth of what Plasmadine corporation is doing on the island

games.name: Fish Hunters: The Most Ridiculous Fishing Simulator
games.description: Hunt fish solo or in co-op. Haul them in and take them down with crazy guns. Try out different baits and rods, explore unique locations, and complete your fish collection in the atlas. Or just kick back by the campfire with friends in this wild webfishing adventure

games.name: Perished Truth
games.description: Inspired by classic "Resident Evil" and "Saw", prepare for an adrenaline-fueled survival horror following the story of Shinji Ueda, a struggling father who finds himself the subject of a twisted series of life-or-death trials. Fend off ravenous zombies, solve puzzles, and escape the trials...alive.

games.name: Super Golden Odyssey: 3d Platformer World
games.description: Super Golden Odyssey takes you on a thrilling 3D adventure through vibrant fantasy worlds! Discover hidden secrets, conquer moving platforms and explore twisting tubes. Experience breathtaking landscapes filled with surprises and endless fun!

games.name: Feeding the Velociraptors
games.description: Feeding the Velociraptors is a point-and-click interactive escape game where you wander corridors, trying to escape both the blame for your past actions—and the scientifically realistic raptors who cast no blame upon you for said past actions, but will still eat you regardless.

games.name: Cube Foundry
games.description: Classic Incremental Gameplay: Easy to start, with a depth that will keep you hooked as you optimize your strategy. Satisfying Progression: Feel the power grow as your production numbers explode. Mastery System: Long-term rewards for your dedication and total production.

games.name: Travis, the Frog
games.description: travis, the frog is a lightning fast speedrunning platformer in which you are a frog on a skateboard.

games.name: Redact
games.description: A short free game, where you're listening or not affects your path of a single press of a button.

games.name: Halliwell's Garden
games.description: Build a thriving garden by day, survive monstrous hordes by night! Plant flowers to attract danger, unlock powerful upgrades, and defend your land in this vibrant roguelike with building, farming, and strategic chaos!

games.name: Moon Garden Optimizer
games.description: A puzzle strategy game, and a deckbuilder without a deck. Cultivate a garden while conserving water. Your only opponent is access to an undo button, and a sense of perfectionism.

games.name: MX Racing World
games.description: Experience the offroad racing with dirt bikes, tough AI rivals, and rugged circuits. Race through clear, sunny and rainy weather while tackling sharp track turns and jumps. Customize your rider outfits, adjust AI opponents, and push your limits on challenging dirt tracks to prove your racing skills.

games.name: Black Cat Bundle
games.description: Black Cat Bundle is a 2D arcade platformer that consists of two games: Black Cat Blitz and Black Cat Brawl. Avoid obstacles and reach a high score either alone or with a buddy in Black Cat Blitz. Either that or grab seven of your friends and duke it out in the team-based showdown Black Cat Brawl!

games.name: Nickelodeon Splat Pack
games.description:
Game like Every Day’s a Saturday!

The Nickelodeon Splat Pack includes: Aaahh!!! Real Monsters (MEGA + Super 16-bit), GUTS (Super 16-bit), and Rocko’s Modern Life: Spunky’s Dangerous Day (Super 16-bit)

games.name: Bookbound
games.description: Bookbound is the power of imagination. Every level — a new world, new rules. From space to ancient ruins. From black hole to wild jungle.

games.name: Middenmoon
games.description: That's no moon. It's a giant ball of garbage. Build a factory to excavate, wash, sort, classify and disassemble the detritus of ages past.

games.name: Kawaii Clicker Reborn
games.description: Ultimate cute clicker is back and even cuter than ever! Fill up the gauge to enter “Fever Mode” and get lots of hearts! Let's click to see cute animations of cute characters!

games.name: Odyssey Times: A Quest for Adventure
games.description: Embark on a story-driven adventure where dynamic combat and leveling meet the charm of a SNES-era JRPG.

games.name: Dig Island
games.description: Dig Island is a 4-player co-op digging game. As you dig deeper, discover new resources, upgrade your equipment, and work with your friends to repair the plane and escape the island.

games.name: My Tiny Garden
games.description: My Tiny Garden is a cozy idle game that runs at the bottom of your screen. Plant cute plants, water, fertilize, and prune them. Earn coins to unlock new pots, plants, and stands. Decorate your desktop and relax while working, studying, or browsing.

games.name: The Curse of Tethria
games.description: Explore dungeons, avoid traps, fight monsters and progress through a hand-crafted world. Defeat your enemies with action combat using your sword and shield, the tools you find and items from the environment. Can you overcome these challenges to end the curse and restore the world from evil?

games.name: Faint Echo
games.description: Faint Echo is a psychological horror visual novel with point-and-click elements. A young man named Denys moves into a cheap apartment, but soon faces disturbing paranormal events. Explore the dark building, uncover its secrets, and try to survive.

games.name: Wizard's Oblation
games.description: Wizard's Oblation is a co-op horror for 1–4 wizards. Step through a portal and hunt for artifacts that hold unique spells.

games.name: Pyromaniac
games.description:
Play as Nikolas, a 20-year-old guy who found himself lost in a completely abandoned city... or so he thought it was at first.
Explore the city, defend yourself from monsters, and find answers to what is really going on.

games.name: Ropeat
games.description: Ropeat is a fun top-down shooter in which 2-10 players use their robots’ repeat-mechanic to win: Each player gets copies that repeat exactly what they did a few seconds ago. Plan carefully ahead or just dive into the chaos and win against your friends!

games.name: Running Fable Petite Party
games.description: Running Fable Petite Party throws you and your friends into 16 fast-paced, friendship-testing mini-games across 3 tabletop arenas. Outsmart, outplay, and out laugh each other in this ultimate party showdown for 1–4 players!

games.name: Veilborne Sacrament
games.description: Veilborne Sacrament is an immersive psychological horror experience centered around atmosphere, puzzles, and emotional tension.

games.name: The Dreaded Hut
games.description: A mysterious flood swallows a small village in the Philippines. Wade through the ruined homes, drowned fields, and whispers in the fog to search for your lost sister. Be careful of the water, some things don’t drown… they wake up.

games.name: Astral
games.description: ASTRAL is a first-person shooter set in a futuristic universe. Embody a GRD robot and engage adversaries in dynamic environments, spanning Earth and Off-World locations. Utilize comprehensive weapon customization to craft your personalized loadout, preparing you for intense kinetic action.

games.name: Twilight Moonflower
games.description: A Japanese-style horror game for 1 to 4 players set in randomly generated residential neighborhoods. Explore a dangerous otherworld haunted by yokai, seal the supernatural phenomena that occur, and aim for escape. Experience replayable terror and tension with your friends.

games.name: Spirit & Steel
games.description:
The spirits of a remote volcanic island have lived in balance for generations, until William Von Pingleton III arrives with a mining army and a plan to turn them into fuel for his machines. When his first attack knocks the island’s shaman, Ila, off her feet, the spirits answer with a gift: the power to command the elements themselves.

In Spirit & Steel, you play as Ila, a short but stubborn 70-year-old shaman who hits harder than she looks. Swap between elemental fists, chain melee combos, and weave in dashes and air movement to outplay swarms of mechanical enemies in tight, focused combat encounters. Every arena asks you to use your full toolkit; knock foes back with wind, pull them in with crashing waves, and burn through armored threats with searing fire.

As you fight deeper into the island, lush beaches and sacred temples slowly clash with scaffolding, smokestacks, and churning machinery.

Your journey builds toward a final showdown with Pingleton in his volcanic stronghold, where you’ll put all of your unlocked elements to the test. Defeat him, free the captured spirits, and restore the island’s balance, or watch it disappear under steel.

games.name: The Helios Incident
games.description: A challenging top-down survivor game where your mind is your greatest enemy.

games.name: Chained Sun
games.description: Chained sun is a 3d singleplayer action survival with a tiled randomly generated world. Npcs exist that can assist you on your journey following precisely in and out of combat and using their abilities when ordered. Battle, command, loot and gather!

games.name: Subsumed
games.description: A claustrophobic first-person horror game about crawling through a dark, winding cave system in search of three missing divers.

games.name: Slop Fest
games.description: An incremental horroresque game about feeding a gluttonous beast! Feed it slop, upgrade, repeat!

games.name: Erma: The Game
games.description: Erma's here and she has a.....science fair project to finish? As your project goes explosively awry, look through your hometown in this point-and-click adventure game to gather all the pieces. Figure out how to find the remains of your project to get them back in time to finish for the science fair!

games.name: Curse of the Ethereal Dragon
games.description: Adventure to the strange and remote town of Cliffside to investigate a mysterious curse. Meet eccentric characters, face unusual foes, and collect unique items as you climb the snowy mountains to discover the cause.

games.name: Neon Mind
games.description: A single-player turn-based puzzle game that will thoroughly tease your brain

games.name: Phantom of Time
games.description: Phantom of Time is an endless runner where you've got to grab the key and get to the next gate in 10 seconds or it's game over! How long can you delay the inevitable?

games.name: Dust and Sorcery
games.description: Defend your village from El Enterrador's hordes of enemies using magic, guns and quick reflexes in this intense western action shooter.

games.name: Midnight Overtime
games.description: A first-person atmospheric horror experience where hidden clues and impossible spaces draw you deeper into a place that should not exist.

games.name: Shawarma Wars
games.description: A 2-4 player co-op party game where each of you runs a shawarma van for a festival crowd. Cook fast, upgrade your stuff, throw poop (or grenades at least) into your competitors and then feed them with bullet rain!

games.name: Deep Sea Bubble Shooter: Reflex Challenge
games.description: Deep Sea Bubble Shooter is a fast-paced reflex aim trainer! Pop the bubbles with precision and speed, master 150 levels, earn stars, unlock upgrades, and find the fastest ways to clear each stage for maximum points and thrilling bubble-blasting action.

games.name: Down With Hell: Crystal
games.description: Play as M in this retro styled platform-shooter and blast your way up to heaven!

games.name: Lawnmower Maniac
games.description: There’s a maniac with a lawnmower outside… and the grass isn’t his only target.

games.name: Icebound Secrets: Soul Hunter
games.description: Step into the role of a detective in a gripping mystery, save stolen souls, and uncover dark secrets!

games.name: Crystal Garden
games.description: A classic-style match-3 puzzle experience with a soothing garden theme. Easy to play, rewarding to master, and perfect for short sessions or long, relaxing play.

games.name: Arc Aquarium
games.description:
Build and manage your own aquarium by collecting fish, earning money, and unlocking decorations.
Feed your fish, clean the tank, and enjoy relaxing idle progression in this cozy 2D aquarium simulation.

games.name: The Most Difficult Ball Game
games.description: Getting Over It — but with a ball.

games.name: Go To The Finish
games.description:
Embark on a dangerous yet fun journey as a brave little frog with one simple goal — reach the princess. This fast-paced 2D platformer puts precision, timing, and patience to the test.

Each level is filled with traps, obstacles, and tricky situations that force you to learn from your mistakes. Death is quick, restarts are instant — and every new attempt pushes you to do better.

The game currently features 12 levels. More levels are planned for future updates.

Hard to finish? Maybe. Hard to be the fastest in the world? Definitely.

games.name: Blobular
games.description: Blobular is a simulation virtual-pet game. You are tasked with researching these strange Blob creatures. Take care of and mess around with your blobs, how you interact with each individual blob will influence how they grow up by changing their looks, color and personality!

games.name: Don't Blink
games.description: First-person psychological horror game. Navigate an abandoned asylum where blinking reshapes your surroundings - sometimes helping you, sometimes unleashing terror. The game blends slow-burn tension, stealth and psychological horror.

games.name: Nocan's Quest: Sex Gold Glory
games.description: An erotic JRPG adventure in the primal wastelands. Barbarian Nocan unleashes sexual demonesses seeking to enslave the world. He fights back by exploring ancient ruins, uncovering lost lore, collecting artifacts, earning gold, and fighting turn-based battles.

games.name: Art-Therapy: Diamonds
games.description: Art-Therapy: Diamonds is a calm and cozy game where you create paintings by numbers, placing “diamonds” on the canvas. A wide collection of images, soothing music, and nature sounds help you relax and take a break from daily stress.

games.name: Rainbow Gate
games.description: Rainbow Gate is a survival horror game set in an abandoned toy factory and amusement park that was once full of joy, but has now become a deadly trap. You are trapped in a twisted game, forced to find a way to escape from the lurking shadows and relentless Animatronics before it’s too late.

games.name: RK Override
games.description: RK Override is an hour-long fully voiced interactive narrative following Chimera, a Mecha Captain fighting in an endless war for their country's future. Fight for control against your Mecha's AI copilot (RK System) as you attempt to end the conflict - no matter the cost.

games.name: Lawnmower Game 2026
games.description: New low poly version for legendary lawnmower game saga. Drive and cut grass in big open world and try to find all hidden items in this driving simulation

games.name: Hentai Cowgirl
games.description: A calm and cozy puzzle game featuring a charming anime cowgirl in a warm Wild West setting. Solve 15-puzzles, slide puzzles, and rotate puzzles with two difficulty levels, relaxing music, and beautiful western-style illustrations.

games.name: Upalu Mundi
games.description: Upalu Mundi is a transport puzzle game set in a fantasy world shaken by the dawn of railways. Lay tracks, build stations and set switches to keep goods moving and profits soaring. Read the news to see how customers, shareholders and the public react as you shape the future of transportation!

games.name: Plinbo
games.description: Take your chance, build your fate, and earn money! Every choice is a new strategy, every run a unique challenge. The thrill of roguelike meets the sweet chaos of plinko.

games.name: Night Shift at the Gym
games.description: Your first night shift at an empty gym becomes a descent into madness. Clean the equipment, mop the floors, and discover what lurks in the weight room after midnight.

games.name: Camelot 10000CE
games.description: Camelot 10000CE is a dark fantasy action game where you play a crippled cyborg and have to type commands to move and attack.

games.name: Talebuilder
games.description: Write the story that leads to victory. Build each book by selecting and playing its chapters, weaving together narrative threads as you choose. When the story turns into conflict, face enemies on a strategic board powered by a rich and versatile deckbuilding system.

games.name: You Belong Here
games.description: Family man Philip Oakes wakes up with a piercing headache, unable to remember his past. Dazed, he explores an old home, receiving guidance from a caller on the phone. As Philip walks through the familiar rooms, he uncovers a reality better left forgotten.

games.name: Town Tower
games.description: A strategic tower defense game where management is key. Build houses to generate villagers, gather resources, and erect an impenetrable defense. Withstand increasingly powerful waves of enemies and prevent them from destroying your tower.

games.name: Robo Dolphin Escape
games.description: Break out of a top-secret military operation! To enter the portal that leads to your escape, you must thwart an army of fish-like machines and collect their power-ups.

games.name: Duality Paradox
games.description: Duality Paradox is a puzzle game where players control a character that switches between black and white. This color shift changes how the world is perceived: matching colors become walls, while opposite colors turn into passable floors.

games.name: Touhou Mistystory
games.description: A free-to-play, single-player Touhou Project fan-made bullet hell shooter that blends light roguelike elements with modified gameplay mechanics. Defeat your enemies and collect dropped spell cards to enhance your abilities!

games.name: Loot Scoot
games.description: LootScoot is a fast, team-based cops-and-robbers game. Thieves break into shops and deliver cash; Cops patrol, chase, and arrest. Beat the clock with chaotic plays or go stealth and slip past patrols. Pick a side, outsmart the other, and sprint for the win.

games.name: Surreality Check
games.description: A absurdist, psychological choose your own adventure, Surreality check has the player helping Rowan Roach discover the meaning of his life through therapy sessions with the Universe personified. The Universe being a massive tool doesn't help matters.

games.name: Banished Knight
games.description: The 'Banished Knight' is a 3D top-down action Roguelike game. The story takes place after Ragnarok, where the player, as a heroic knight, must travel to Svartalfheim to battle various types of monsters, collect resources, unlock new weapons,and repair the Valkyrie statue.

games.name: Balls vs. Tombs
games.description: Balls vs. Tombs is a dark fantasy action-survival game built around a single, haunting purpose: to reclaim stolen souls and restore peace to a desecrated graveyard.

games.name: Abyss Bistro
games.description: A restaurant romance simulation set in the shadowed world of the Abyss! As you meet its strange residents and grow closer to them, their hidden stories gradually come to light.

games.name: 4th Era: The RuneChild
games.description: Welcome to the world of The RuneChild. An ancient kingdom full of magic, adventure, and amazing powers.! Enter an Open-World, Fantasy RPG; emphasizing freedom, exploration, and player-driven stories.

games.name: Food Industry
games.description: A city building game, focus on construction, management and strategy economic of the agri-food industry. Build, develop and manage the different sectors of this industry.

games.name: Rusty Seas
games.description: A game about furry girls fighting over junk on the beach.

games.name: God For A Day
games.description: In this 2D, narrative-based simulation game, you play as the Son of God. Your mission: Decide, bless or condemn city residents. Uncover the person's story through their items and secrets before making decisions. Your choices alter the city's destiny, and impact your revelation on Judgment Day.

games.name: Octopus Goulash
games.description: Explore a futuristic metropolis, interact with a population of NPCs, and experience a unique narrative. Engage in dynamic missions, battle between flying cars, and shape your story in this interactive world where every choice is an opportunity, every moment an unparalleled adventure!

games.name: Cats in Wonderland
games.description: The Queen of Hearts had a fit of rage after the Cheshire Cat refused to be her pet and ordered the capture of all the cats in Wonderland. Find them before her and prevent anything bad from happening.

games.name: Lunar New Year
games.description: Apart from the Year "is a shooting adventure 2D horizontal version of the game developed by Emu Shanhai Studio. The game takes the legend of the zodiac as the background, integrates traditional Chinese cultural elements, and strives to let players experience a strong Chinese cultural atmosphere .

games.name: Relic Abyss
games.description: Experience a unique hand-crafted Bullet Heaven Roguelite RPG set in a Fantasy x Sci-fi world filled with might, 🪄magic, and lost technology! A mysterious tale centered around a world-devouring Abyss awaits...

games.name: Treasure Hunter: Idle RPG
games.description: Let your team kill the bad guys and gather all sorts of loot for you to play with

games.name: Damashi Game
games.description: A thrilling multiplayer experience where social deception, strategy, and quick thinking are your greatest weapons. Outsmart your opponents and be the last player standing in this intense fight for survival.

games.name: Nak
games.description: Become a ghost to save your family from ghosts. Nak is a story driven platformer with arena combat. Enter the world of Nak. Here your reflexes and analysis will be tested as you traverse vast physical and spiritual realms and square off against traditional Thai ghosts. How long will it be until you can no longer distinguish yourself from the monsters you face?

games.name: Collapsed Horizon
games.description: Travel between galaxies, dig planets, collect ores, sell them, upgrade your equipment, and earn your ticket back to Earth.

games.name: Its Time To Meet God
games.description: Its Time To Meet God is an interdimensional Ray Tracing shooter built from the ground up in Game maker studio. Fight and loot your way through interdimensional realms created by demi Gods, eldritch horrors, and Holy creatures to get to your loved ones who reside in the 3rd Heaven.

games.name: Aftershock
games.description: Put yourself in the shoes of a combat veteran. Can you handle the hardships that come with a life of solitude?

games.name: Sacrificio
games.description: An intense and fast-paced survival horror shooter in a dark fantasy world. Face overwhelming odds in a brutal struggle against evil.

games.name: To Get There
games.description: To Get There is a turn-based puzzle. Manage a group of robots, plan your moves, collect energy sources, and avoid traps. Simple and intuitive mechanics, but truly challenging levels that require attention and strategic planning.

games.name: Fish and Chill
games.description: A cozy idle fishing game where your fisherman catches fish automatically while you relax. Sell your catch, upgrade your boat, and enjoy the calming sea in a transparent, borderless overlay that floats on any desktop.

games.name: Cattlieb
games.description: Pinball meets roguelike. A mysterious adventure of strategy and luck, where the path of the ball changes the battle and board events with both risks and rewards shake the player’s choices.

games.name: Comet Tycoon
games.description: Build and automate your way to cosmic riches in this satirical tycoon sim. Harvest comets, entertain space tourists, recycle the broke ones, and let COMTEC help you replace humanity… one drone at a time.

games.name: Dicey Hacker 1999
games.description: 《Dice Hacker 1999》 blends idle gameplay with dice strategy in a cyberpunk roguelite. As a hacker in a post-1999 parallel world, gather resources, hack programs, manipulate probabilities via bizarre devices. Each dice rewrites reality's code, every roll destabilizes the digital abyss.

games.name: Empire in Decay
games.description:
Empire in Decay is a roguelike deckbuilding turn-based tactical game, loosely based on chess. Its gameplay has been broadened with the use of cards and the progression of units. In the game, you'll proceed through procedurally generated routes across the districts of Daandria, the capital of the Empire.
In your journey to the Throne Hall to face the King, you will have to fight turn-based combats through different locations, collect cards and upgrade them, recruit units to support your cause and enhance them, find relics and forge artifacts to boost your powers, and use all your cunning and skill to make your way through waves of enemies.

games.name: Touhou Chronicle of Youkai Prayers
games.description: A fan-made roguelike action Touhou game. Due to a Kedama incident in Gensokyo, Flandre Scarlet eagerly takes the initiative to resolve it. Or rather, she's actually just causing chaos, definitely not trying to solve anything!

games.name: Born to Burn: Ash and Flesh - A Tale from Surrealidade
games.description: Born to Burn: Ash and Flesh is a surreal, experimental indie game that blends psychological horror, platforming, and exploration as players control an evolving creature through diverse gameplay styles and metaphysical challenges.

games.name: Obitus
games.description: Obitus is a multiplayer survival game where players are thrown into a deadly wilderness. Scavenge for weapons, avoid traps, and eliminate your opponents – only one will survive. Inspired by Hunger Games, it combines strategy, tension, and life-or-death combat.

games.name: Tobiano
games.description: Tobiano is a sport horse simulator with realistic genetics, management, and riding. Shop for horses and train them through the levels to succeed at shows or sell for profit. Breed horses with unique personalities and conformation. Grow your facility to add stables, farm feed, or craft tack.

games.name: Put One In for Johnny Minn
games.description:
Stylized physics-soccer arcade puzzle game. Players score using diving headers, volleys, side volleys, and free kicks. Beat levels by discovering the optimal way to solve the level. Timing and precision are needed to make good contact with the ball in order to achieve high contact quality and goal placement scores.

Includes local PvP multiplayer modes: 1v1 (striker vs. keeper) and pass-and-play shot-for-shot party mode for 2-8 local players.

games.name: Sunken Dreams
games.description: An atmospheric puzzle and exploration game from a solo developer. Explore an island ruin, and delve into the darkness with a cinematic camera system and realtime player decay.

games.name: Anchor's Lament
games.description: Is a multiplayer roguelike strategy game, where you as your own captain travel the thousands seas to find glory! On your way you gather a crew of exotic animals and creatures that will help you fight other captain's that stand in your way. In this world, all life is sentient.

games.name: iRacing Arcade
games.description: Race across global licensed series and build your own racing team to secure your motorsport legacy in this third person arcade racer.

games.name: Ecto Mercenary Program
games.description: Ecto Mercenary Program is a sci-fi looter shooter where you and your friends form a mercenary group to forge a path for yourselves. Rise from a destitute crew fighting raiders for scraps to a feared force on the station. Survival is not guaranteed.

games.name: Chess 2048
games.description: Chess 2048 – Classic chess moves meet fresh puzzle-strategy twists: watch the board reshape, adapt on the fly, and master piece combos. Then escape poison gas, jump between water tiles, use portals, and pull off clever tricks.

games.name: BunkerZ
games.description: Stylized WWI trenches meet explosive co-op mayhem. Hold the bunker as a Rifleman, Medic, Engineer, or Machine Gunner. Fight back with era specific WWI weapons, shovels, and flamethrowers, then launch undead sky-high with grenades and explosives. Solo or multiplayer survival at its most chaotic.

games.name: Island of Hearts
games.description: After a rough breakup, you do what any reasonable person would: run away to a remote tropical island full of beautiful strangers. There, you’ll meet six captivating women, each with her own charm, secrets, and questionable taste in men. Your choices decide who you love, lose, or accidentally ghost.

games.name: Motion Wulin
games.description: "Motion Wulin" is a fast-paced martial arts action game where you play as a time-traveling warrior fixing broken timelines.

games.name: Slot or Not
games.description: Deck-building turn-based slot machine battling adventure. Fight evil fruits aside your battle buddy slot machine to save your village. Spin your destiny and grab the precious loot in a fast paced colorful adventure.

games.name: Skewer Squad
games.description: Become the ULTIMATE Grill Master! Pick your favorite foods and seasonings to build your Skewer Squad. Drag, shoot, and bounce to keep those sneaky critters away from your precious grill!

games.name: Let Me Play!
games.description: Welcome to "Two Strangers in an Elevator"! The play is about to begin. Except it doesn't. And nothing works. And why can't I choose anything? Try getting to the end of this overly meta play, or don't.

games.name: Fate Dealer
games.description: Bet your freedom in a deadly quiz where a single answer can save you… or kill you. Will you take the Dealer’s offer or walk away alive?

games.name: President of Steel
games.description: President of Steel is a choice-driven political strategy game where every decision shapes the fate of your nation. Balance power, stability, and economy while navigating political intrigue, war threats, organized crime, and personal relationships.

games.name: A Date With Chester 2
games.description: A Date With Chester 2 is a short, standalone story about remembering the good times. You've been with Chester for a long time. If there's one thing you're sure of, it's that things don't always go as you expect.

games.name: Scission
games.description: Scission is a dark and gruesome action game where you control two characters at once. Fight grotesque representations of the subconscious, master new skills and explore the depth of the human mind in this singleplayer game.

games.name: The Lost Edge
games.description: You live in a small village where everything goes as usual. You went to a workers' village on business, but upon arrival, something went wrong…

games.name: Grime Reapers
games.description: Grime Reapers is a first-person horror survival game where you clean haunted houses while avoiding monsters and ghouls. Complete cleaning objectives, distract enemies, or hide to survive your shift and escape the house alive.

games.name: The Williams Family Sacrifice
games.description: Things have been hard for Elizabeth Williams after the tragic death of her husband. She has been doing all she can for her family, but she has been struggling and she's starting to slip. Hopefully she doesn't slip too far...

games.name: Stick Out!
games.description: Stick Out! is a precision platformer where you must use a spear to overcome obstacles by sticking yourself to walls and surfaces. Collect coins, buy skins, earn stars, and break time records! Can you complete every level?

games.name: Metal Goose
games.description: Play as the MG-1 super soldier in this gritty and wacky first-person boomer shooter, and mow down hordes of robotic birds in an endless global war between the Chickens and Geese.

games.name: Hopping Ninja-san
games.description: Hop your way to the goal as Hopping Ninja-san! A high-difficulty game with simple controls — just be careful not to hit your head.

games.name: Axolotl Swim
games.description: Join John Axolotl in his quest to reach the end! Eat orange fishies to refill you dashes, and red hearts to refill your health. Collect treasure chests for points to spend on death. Spend your total score on funny clothing at the shop!

games.name: Half-Cat
games.description: Muni’s life is hard. She spends her days at a boring job, and at night returns to her unloved husband. Everything changes when Tayou appears in her life. Muni has to turn her life upside down and get to know herself from the most unexpected sides.

games.name: Spellers
games.description: Step into the arena to take on other wizards in this magical brawl. Choose from a variety of spells with which to decimate your opponents in this multiplayer magic fight. Work together with your team to defeat your opponents and win the match. Do you have what it takes to be the best spell caster?

games.name: Archive 1985
games.description: Charlie and his childhood friend Jack go on a boat trip that turns into a nightmare. Trapped in a storm...Charlie washes up on an abandoned fishing island...

games.name: Pie in the Sky
games.description: Pluck them. Pluck them all. You are an Australian Magpie on a mission. That mission: Spread havoc, cause mayhem, and grab the occasional unattended piece of food. Menace, rob, and terrify humans, enjoying old-school action arcade gameplay rendered in glorious retro PS2 graphics.

games.name: Queen Slayer
games.description: 'Queen Slayer' is a turn-based RPG set in a fascinating fantasy world. The player must lead heroes of various professions and skills to defeat the powerful queens who dominate the underground dungeons and save the kingdom from darkness.

games.name: Tearscape
games.description:
Discover a Gothic world in this 2D top-down action-adventure, blending fast-paced combat, exploration, and pixel art inspired by Game Boy Color classics. Fight monstrous foes, unlock new abilities, and explore a non-linear map filled with hidden secrets and dangerous challenges.

Master precise combat, where every strike and dodge matters. Strategically manage your stamina by carefully considering each move as you face off against grotesque enemies. You have a limited number of healing flasks—use them wisely and plan your moments to recover carefully. Upgrade your character's stats to remain effective and competitive in combat.

Discover powerful items hidden in the dungeons that enhance both combat and exploration. Unlock new abilities to defeat enemies more effectively and access hidden paths, uncovering deeper secrets within the world.

Uncover hidden dungeons throughout Tearscape's dark, interconnected world. Each dungeon holds unique challenges, powerful items, and deadly enemies, pushing your combat and exploration skills to the limit.

Face off against challenging bosses—massive, grotesque creatures born from dark experiments. Each encounter demands precise timing, strategy, and mastery of your abilities to emerge victorious.

Explore the vast, interconnected map filled with branching paths, hidden shortcuts, and secret areas. The non-linear design encourages exploration, rewarding you with powerful items and new abilities.

Encounter a diverse cast of NPCs, some offering guidance, others seeking your help, and a few with their own hidden agendas. Every interaction adds depth to the story.

games.name: My Shelter
games.description: This is a placement game located at the bottom of the screen that won't interfere with your daily study and work. Research technologies, grow crops, automate tasks, explore maps, utilize various machines to craft items, and defend against monsters. With just you and a dog, conquer the apocalypse!

games.name: Kissed by a Star
games.description: Embark on a journey through catastrophic disasters, supernatural horrors, and ominous occurrences in this turn-based RPG meets modern fantasy novel.

games.name: R.A.T.: Human Error – Episode One
games.description: The world ended. Now the real nightmare begins. Deep underground, a child wakes in a infected facility. Minds are breaking. Bodies are changing. Crawl through vents, follow echoes, and escape before it’s too late. Your mother is waiting.

games.name: 100 Camp Cats
games.description: Join the cutest adventure in themed locations full of cats! Explore the charming hand-drawn artwork of special places and try to find 100 adorable cats hidden throughout the game. ️ Can you find them all? ️

games.name: Pax Autocratica
games.description: In Pax Autocratica, shape a grand colony where every life bends to your will. Feel the weight of absolute power as you decree laws, then lead your squads in roguelite FPS battles from brutal skirmishes to large-scale battlefields and unite the Tyris System under your banner. Wishlist now!

games.name: Cosmic Scramble
games.description: A grid-based arcade shooter where enemies only move when you do. You have about a second before they break free of the time freeze and scramble your ship's controls again and again. Best of luck. You'll need it.

games.name: Megastore Simulator
games.description: Megastore Simulator is a first-person management & tycoon game. Start small and grow into a massive two-floor megastore with forklifts, pallet jacks, and staff. Unlock and run Bakery, Clothing, Electronics, Sports, Music, Toy & Grocery departments. (Formerly Urban Supermarket Simulator)

games.name: Unseen Land: Into the Mist
games.description: For centuries, Veridia thrived. Now, an otherworldly invader tears rifts, unleashing maddened beasts. In the chaos, you awaken—once a humble farmer and hunter. Take up the sword, wield your power, and save Veridia.

games.name: Zhúlù Hàn Mò
games.description: Zhúlù Hàn Mò invites you to the exciting and transformative Three Kingdoms era at the end of the Eastern Han Dynasty, where you can embark on a journey to dominate the world and unify the Central Plains with unprecedented freedom, depth and historical authenticity.

games.name: Jǐn Nǐ Yī Rén
games.description: I was known as the "problem girl," and she was the center of the class. Two seemingly unconnected lines, however, collided through a series of coincidences, shattering my bleak life. I wanted to monopolize her gaze, to be the only one by her side. Starting with that encounter in the hills behind the school, the pure longing in my heart gradually began to distort.

games.name: Fishing for Numbers
games.description: Fishing for Numbers is a vibrant first-person educational adventure where you step into the shoes of an aspiring Mathemagician on a quest to join the prestigious Arcane Anglers Guild. Master increasingly harder equations and catch magical fish to prove your worth and earn your place among the elite!

games.name: Repeater
games.description: REPEATER is a one-hit to kill, online arena shooter where the arenas repeat infinitely. Forward is backward. Up is down. You have been here before.

games.name: Hong Kong 2097
games.description: Hong Kong 2097 is the official sequel to Hong Kong 97, codeveloped by Kanipro and Happy Soft. Throw morality out the window and decimate an entire country in this twin stick shooter from hell.

games.name: Idle Breakanoid
games.description: Idle Breakanoid combines the satisfying block-breaking action of classic Breakout/Arkanoid with the addictive progression of idle games. Watch as your balls bounce, blocks shatter, and your power grows!

games.name: Exorush
games.description: A 2D vertical shoot 'em up that lets you upgrade your ship with an insane amount of options. From missiles and pods to specials and shields, you can upgrade every bit of your ship from guns to thrusters.

games.name: Final Word Royale
games.description: Think fast, spell faster — your life depends on it. Join the deadly 40 player word battle royale, Solve word puzzles or face brutal consequences. Only one will remain.

games.name: Lunar Tide
games.description: Slaughter hordes of monsters, evolve your skills, and survive in this frantic action roguelite. Choose from 4 unique classes, unlock a devastating arsenal, and upgrade permanently to defeat the bosses of the lunar tide.

games.name: News Roll
games.description: An educational dice-rolling board game where you answer real news quiz questions while traveling through the calendar. Roll, learn, and test your knowledge across 9 categories in 4 languages.

games.name: Hellbound
games.description: Hellbound is a chaotic 2D action fighter set in hell. Slash, dodge, and chain combos through a looping arena, defeat relentless demons, ascend to angelhood, and face the ultimate boss. Survive the Tenth Layer of Hell, where deadly events push your skills to the limit.

games.name: Street Takoyaki
games.description: Run your very own takoyaki stand in the streets of Japan. Manage your ingredients, pricing, upgrades, and pressure from the police and yakuza in a survival-focused tycoon inspired by some classics.

games.name: Brain Centipede
games.description: A top-down, action and puzzle game with thrilling boss fights, played as a linear story line. Combat imitates that of a slow top-down shooter, where the player throws various tools as a weapon. Pixel art graphics with a dark, electronic soundtrack.

games.name: Shinobi
games.description: A social stealth party game for 2-4 players. Blend in with AI ninjas, find the real threats, and strike before they strike you.

games.name: Day and Night
games.description: It's Day versus Night as you stack and combine themed puzzle blocks, battling against your opponent and the clock as time changes and flips all the rules!

games.name: Pro Football Online
games.description: Pro Football Online is a 1st/3rd person, highly skill based, online multiplayer American Football game. It offers a sports game experience unlike any other with smooth, physics based, input driven gameplay that is competitive and rewarding with no pay to win mechanics.

games.name: X999 Ball
games.description: A fast-paced action game built around slingshot physics, precision, and combos. Launch your Node, bounce through enemies, protect the Core, and push your skill to hit a x999 Combo.

games.name: Working Through The End
games.description: Working a weird ice cream truck as the world ends around you. Day after day, apocalypse after apocalypse, you keep working because even as the world ends, those bills need to be paid. Working Through The End is a point-and-click game where you take orders, deal with problems, and work off your debt.

games.name: Kotoba Dash
games.description: Kotoba Dash is a Japanese vocabulary review game that replaces passive flashcards with movement based gameplay. Run to the correct answer, practice reading and translation, and reinforce what you already know through short, engaging sessions.

games.name: New Face On The Block
games.description: A psychological home-invasion horror set in the bleak year of 1992, focusing on tension, atmosphere, and an immersive soundtrack. The story involves elements of a cult, rituals meant to reach the dead, and the haunting presence of those who should have remained in the past.

games.name: Sandy
games.description: Guide Sandy, a charming ragdoll, through a giant world of toys in this atmospheric puzzle-adventure. Navigate the perils of a cluttered children room, solve intricate physics-based puzzles, and collect lost buttons to help Sandy find her way back to the safety of her dollhouse.

games.name: The Last Departure
games.description: The Last Departure is an atmospheric horror game set aboard the final run of a closing train line. Find your way out or loop forever.

games.name: Sakura Succubus 10
games.description: The tenth part of the Sakura Succubus series. Hiroki finds himself in a bind after the beautiful actress, Yamamoto Hifumi, proposes to him. How will the other girls in his harem take this shocking development?!

games.name: Dearend
games.description: Dearend is a cinematic action-adventure set in a post-apocalyptic world ruled by AI. A former soldier haunted by his past and a humanoid girl with a human heart cross paths in a story of loss, connection, and redemption.

games.name: The Last Starship
games.description: Introversion Software, the indie legends behind Prison Architect, Darwinia, DEFCON and Uplink, present to you the broken, unfinished and bug filled Alpha of The Last Starship. Pick a ship hull, kit her out with engines, life-support, sensors and rail guns and start your galactic adventure!

games.name: Goldilock One: The Mists of Jakaira
games.description: Action RPG with survival elements. Manage resources and bond with NPCs to unlock crafting and gain allies who may become playable. Use them to solve puzzles and battle together. Survive the frozen wilds and uncover the truth behind your exile.

games.name: Sector Zero
games.description: SECTOR ZERO is a reverse horror physics-based puzzle platformer where you play as a monster! You are part of The Corruption - an Alien Hive Mind Entity hunting down survivors inside the Mining Colony of Asteroid 2031 XT.

games.name: Aces of Thunder
games.description:
Experience the thrill of aerial combat like never before with Aces of Thunder, the ultimate flight simulation game with high fidelity graphics and unmatched immersion. The game was made specifically with capabilities of latest generation VR helmets in mind.

The game's physically accurate flight and damage models derived from the popular War Thunder military action game ensure a high level of realism. The battles take place exclusively from the cockpit view to provide ultimate immersion and fully supports HOTAS controls. Aces of Thunder features a set of the most legendary WW1 & WW2 aircraft available to hop in and fly right upon purchase.

games.name: Nonentity Galaxy
games.description: Nonentity Galaxy is a rouge-lite strategy game about starship battle, asset management, dark humor, and jobbery. You need to play the role of a fleet commander in the field to make money for the company , just try to survive in these miserable times. Fortunately, you have friends, life goes on.

games.name: Rogue Factory
games.description: The AUTOMATION bullet heaven! Build, automate, autocast, OBLITERATE!

games.name: Super Platform Tag
games.description: Tag, chase, and outsmart your friends in this chaotic platformer party game featuring your favorite variations of tag. Snag crazy power-ups, place obstacles to gain a winning edge, and unlock a colorful cast of characters and stages. Enjoy the ignorant bliss of childhood.

games.name: Unemployment Simulator 2018
games.description: A social welfare survival horror based on real events. Endure emotional pain, crushing pressure of adulthood and societal expectations while evading a literal death by boredom. Battle demons, hide from skeletons, keep your bathroom clean. Uncover a dark mystery and emerge as a hero.

games.name: Millennium Runners
games.description: The ultimate anti-gravity racing experience. Millennium Runners is an homage to classic arcade racing games. Speed through futuristic cities and planets in adrenaline-fueled competitions. Along the way, you'll discover hidden easter eggs and pick up an arsenal of power-ups — from rockets to mines and more — designed either to propel you to victory or to hinder your rivals. Choose your team, conquer the Millennium Cup, and race your way into legend!

games.name: The Dark Rites of Arkham
games.description: A macabre ritual murder puts Arkham PD detectives Jack Foster and Harvey Whitman to the test. As the investigation progresses, they will unveil a disturbing connection between the Salem witch trials of the 17th century and the end of humankind.

games.name: Little Knight 2: Old Dreams
games.description: Little Knight 2: Dark Souls of the Past "is the official 3D RPG sequel to the classic" Little Knight ", continuing the passion and adventurous spirit of its predecessor, and creating a broader and more free medieval fantasy world.

games.name: Gravethorn
games.description: Gravethorn is a 2D platformer that combines soulslike and metroidvania elements with deep storytelling. The story follows an Inquisitor who has lost his memory, searching for his forgotten past along with his regrets.

games.name: Cryptid Keeper
games.description: Become the Cryptid Keeper. Track, catch, and collect cryptids, monsters, and aliens. Manage your own Cryptid Zoo, care for your creatures, and attract visitors while exploring the wild to discover new and mysterious Cryptid species to add to your Index.

games.name: Yumi's Adventure
games.description: This is an action-adventure game where a magical girl embarks on a journey through a fantasy world. Take control of the protagonist and dash through eight diverse stages. At the end of each stage, a powerful boss awaits the player.

games.name: Feng Shui: Meowjong
games.description: Feng Shui: Meowjong is a roguelike Mahjong puzzle game with mystical treasures and strategic tile-building. Arrange 14 tiles, trigger powerful synergies, and master Feng Shui to beat target points!

games.name: Ave Classic
games.description: Ave Classic is a productivity support tool game featuring personified classical music characters. It helps you create a focused work environment with a Pomodoro timer and background music for work.

games.name: Towerfolk
games.description: Build your city and manage your people in a medieval setting. Overcome earthquakes and other challenging natural disasters, complete missions from the kingdom, and defend against waves of enemies. Use strategy and economic management to keep your city thriving

games.name: Yapyap
games.description: A magic-themed co-op horror game where you and up to 5 friends are minions summoned by a wizard to break into their rival’s towers to cause mayhem. Try to fulfill your vandalism target with an assortment of spells while avoiding magical beasts and monsters that protect the tower.

games.name: Orbiteers
games.description: Design efficient space stations across the solar system in this minimalist puzzle-builder. Solve unique challenges with help from your assistant L.U.N.A., optimize your builds, maximize your score, and lead humanity’s journey beyond Earth!

games.name: Holy Justice: Galaxy Outcast
games.description: A cosmic bullet-hell roguelike. Holy Justice is an exhilarating arcade shooter where you upgrade your ship with Core Enhancers, create unexpected combinations, discover unique devices at critical moments, and unleash outrageously powerful builds.

games.name: Yìnéng Chóngzǔ
games.description: "Yìnéng Chóngzǔ" is a turn-based rogue-like game. Do you envy the boss's abilities? Great! In this game, you can completely plunder the enemy's abilities, skills, and even minions! Build your own abilities through looting while simultaneously destroying the enemy's abilities. Can you find the best strategy? As you progress, the strength of both you and your enemies will rapidly increase. Come experience the stat boost brought by perfect combos!

games.name: Cave Explorers
games.description: You will delve into the underground world of the mysterious desert, build your own deck, fight monsters, and dig for treasure. Every adventure is randomly generated - build powerful card combinations, collect equipment, encounter unknown creatures, and fight your way out of the dangerous caves!

games.name: God Forsaken
games.description: The God - Forsaken Land is a roguelike survival adventure game that combines the features of Diablo. In this abandoned land of despair, you fend off endless monsters, light a fire in the darkness, and search for that faint glimmer of hope.

games.name: The Interval Bureau: Extension 0
games.description: A short psychological audio horror call where every number routes you deeper into a faceless bureau that measures and files you.

games.name: Void81
games.description: VOID81 is a 3D platform game with survival horror elements, where you explore ever-changing levels, solve puzzles, avoid dangers, and traverse surreal worlds inspired by the retro atmosphere of the 1980s.

games.name: Monster Ops 15
games.description: Season 2 of Monster Ops! Black Ops soldiers Wraith and Tide know the world is against them, and they can only rely on each other. Two soldiers, forced to go rogue, with a desperate mission. There's no one left they can trust. A NSFW Gay Visual Novel Dating Sim put out in Monthly Episodes!

games.name: Droid Must Deliver
games.description: Droid Must Deliver is a classical logistics puzzle game where a low-rank delivery droid proves its worth by pushing supply crates through increasingly challenging levels of an empire at war.

games.name: Faehnor Online
games.description: A handcrafted MMORPG developed by a solo creator, where exploration relies on real paper maps. Get lost, find your way, and set out to conquer a world that will never take you by the hand.

games.name: Get Goating
games.description: You’re a goat. You work at a post office. A storm scatters the mail across the PNW woods. Recover lost packages solo or with friends, navigate treacherous terrain, and avoid a roaming Sasquatch. Deliver fast, hide when needed, and don’t get caught.

games.name: Mortal Mythos: Island of Fairies
games.description: Dodge waves of bullets in cover shooter + shmup-inspired combat, as you strike back with powerful attacks of your own! Use clever cover spots to gain an advantage over your enemies, find treasures to make yourself stronger, and avoid taking damage to raise your score!

games.name: Andy Runner
games.description: An endless runner made by NoelleW and AidenV, based off Andyland. It has unique abilities, bosses, characters, etc.

games.name: Left 4 Bread
games.description: A run and gun shooter where you must escape a city and the infected!

games.name: Colonize
games.description: Colonize is a combination of survival game and building strategy that takes place during the colonization period - the 17th century. It tells the story of a settlement in the new world and all the difficulties encountered by the early settlers.

games.name: Dead Grid
games.description: Dead Grid is a single player game with tactical card combat, level-based progression and loot set in a post-apocalyptic dynamically scaling world. Manage a squad of elite mercenaries, discover and upgrade hundreds of cards ranging from weapons to consumable items.

games.name: Hoverflow
games.description: Surf, jump, climb and keep your flow in this first-person platformer while finding secrets and beating time trials !

games.name: Territory: Farming and Fighting
games.description: From a small village of a dozen people to a small kingdom of thousands of people. Arrange for residents to work, gathering, fishing and hunting, farming and mining, processing and manufacturing. Trade, accumulate supplies, increase your strength, and fight evil forces and monsters.

games.name: Anthem#9
games.description: Combine Gems to unleash Skills in ANTHEM#9, a deck-building rogue-lite puzzle-battler! Customize your Recipes for a wide variety of deck ideas, and explore the thrilling story of secret agents fighting for world order.

games.name: Typing Ninja
games.description: Typing Ninja is an upcoming fast-paced typing game where players type falling words before they hit the ground, featuring Arcade and Story options. Players can use power-ups, face challenging bosses, and customize keycaps.

games.name: Island of Enchantment
games.description: This is a relaxing and casual little game. You need to help the beautiful girls to find their lost things. This game can provide you with a relaxing experience while also exercising your intuition and concentration.

games.name: Master of Piece
games.description: Recruit mercenaries, combine their traits, and forge endless synergies. Venture through the mysterious medieval realm, facing powerful foes and mighty bosses. Simple turn-based rules hide deep strategic depth—build your ultimate team, master the pieces, and uncover the secrets of the Dragon Orb.

games.name: The Pale Piper
games.description: Uncover the truth behind your death and your sibling’s in a story-driven precision platformer inspired by the Pied Piper myth. Navigate a decaying, interconnected world where movement is your only defense. No combat, only precision, consequence, and secrets hidden in the dark.

games.name: No Fap Island
games.description: No Fap Island is a choice-driven adult Visual Novel. Set in a reality TV show surrounded by five gorgeous women can you evade the view of the cameras and find a way to get dirty with the ladies? Build relationships, go on hot dates, have sex and get ready for a vacation you'll never forget!

games.name: Blind Touch
games.description: Blind Simulator, offering a new perspective and immersive sensory experience. Step into a world of darkness using your guide cane.

games.name: Car Service Together
games.description: Car Service Together is a 1-4 co-op & single player simulation game where you and/or with your friends start from scratch and build your way up. Work together to successfully run your own service center. Team up, manage your business, and create the ultimate car service !

games.name: Moor Rail
games.description: 《Moor Rail》 is a strategic lateral scroll shooting action game set in diesel funk. As you strengthen your train, you can increase your load, speed up, and install vehicles that assist or attack your battles.

games.name: Choppy Cuts
games.description: Welcome to Choppy Cuts! In this light-hearted multiplayer co-op game, you'll become hair salon employees, working together to meet the diverse needs of various customers. Through teamwork, you'll complete a series of hairdressing tasks, earn bonuses, and challenge your skills.

games.name: Fast Food Frog
games.description: Fast Food Frog is an adventure game where you control a cute, chubby frog with a backpack and a refined palate. Tired of his natural diet, he embarks on a journey through the most unusual regions in search of juicy snacks like burgers, fries, and sodas.

games.name: Black Shadow
games.description: Black Shadow is a first-person survival horror game built with UE5. Players take on the role of investigator Eric Stone, who ventures into a dark-matter zone. You must explore warped timelines, sneak through the shadows, and evade unknown threats while gradually uncovering hidden secrets.

games.name: Shattered Dreams: Redemption
games.description: Shattered Dreams: Redemption is a choice-driven visual novel where you play as a former basketball prodigy whose dreams were shattered. The game emphasizes its immersive narrative, where you will face moral and difficult choices that will shape your story.

games.name: Tenvader
games.description: Tetris meets Space Invaders – Build your ship block by block while blasting alien swarms. Upgrade weapons, face evolving bosses, and survive the chaos across endless loops.

games.name: Sheep Island
games.description: Sheep Island is a bartering casual ranch game! You can grow plants, raise animals, process goods and develop your small island!

games.name: Dimensional Gates
games.description: Truly ambitious Indie RPG with innovative modern concepts and original storylines. Normal mode has random encounters and boss fights. Story mode has no random encounters and boss fights play themself out. Can you stop the Shetman from destroying the strings and the very fabric of our Universe?

games.name: 4PGP
games.description: Enjoy the excitement of 90's arcade games anywhere and with anyone!

games.name: Sword of Shandar
games.description: Sword of Shandar is a narrative-driven light RPG focused on choice, consequence, and discovery. Engage in turn-based combat, resolve challenges through dice-roll skill checks, crack locks in hands-on minigames, and decipher ancient runes as you uncover the secrets of a fading world.

games.name: Dune Rancher
games.description: Dune Rancher is a first-person incremental Moondust collecting game where you hoard materials and keep them safe from stealing Desert Spirits. Use Moondust to buy weapons, tools and robots to boost and automate your income.

games.name: Bakken: Ski Jumping - Next Season
games.description: Bakken: Ski Jumping - Next Season is a winter sports simulation game. Compete with more than 200 male and female ski jumpers on more than 10 hills and master the jumping, the flying and the landing! The next season starts here ...

games.name: Fightfinity
games.description: Fightfinity is a fast-paced action roguelike where you survive relentless enemy waves, build powerful combinations, and push your limits through increasingly challenging floors.

games.name: Loop Firefighters
games.description: Save homes, plan your tactics on the circular track and build a deck of abilities as Loop Firefighters combines deckbuilding with strategic decision making on a procedural city loop.

games.name: Monster Tower
games.description: Monster Tower is a high-octane retro platformer where you must ascend a deadly tower filled with beasts and traps. Jump, blast enemies and use your energy shield to survive the auto-scrolling madness. Can you reach the top... or survive the descent?

games.name: Number Dungeon
games.description: A quick strategy roguelike in a dungeon where you need to carefully use what the room gives you to get past it. Clear set dungeons to win, or see how far you can make it in endless!

games.name: Lost Episodes Alone
games.description: Lost Episodes Alone is a short first person indie survival horror game. Save your friends from an evil nun named Valak. Collect items and solve puzzles to escape the nightmare. Inspired by games like Resident evil, Slenderman and other horror titles!

games.name: Nights in Endless Dream
games.description: Nights in Endless Dream is another psychological anomaly game that focuses on the story of our main character and 2D aesthetics. Memorize the rooms and find the anomalies to escape the dream.

games.name: G-Mode Archives+: Flash Motor Karen
games.description:
Flash Motor Karen is an action puzzle game in the style of Sokoban.
While puzzles are the core of the gameplay, it also features an excellent story.
A cool world setting, a wonderful narrative, and unique characters define its charm.

games.name: Lofi Haven
games.description: In Lofi Haven, soothing Lofi music and white noise create the perfect setting for focused work or study. Decorate your room, interact with your pet during breaks, and enjoy music and time with friends. No matter how busy you are, this place is your peaceful haven.

games.name: Saylor Animals Puzzle
games.description: Saylor Animals puzzle is simplictic jigsaw puzzle game with different animals puzzles

games.name: Press A
games.description: Extremely realistic simulator with unprecedented features that let you finally vent all the anxiety modern world induces in you.

games.name: Star Voyagers: Hentai Jigsaw
games.description: Travel through distant galaxies while assembling sensual puzzles featuring alien beauties, stellar officers, and girls from different species and worlds — all illustrated in exclusive artworks that blend futuristic charm, bold sensuality, and that forbidden spark only the universe can hide.

games.name: The Qixia Diary
games.description: The Qixia Diary is an original Visual Novel inspired by the food culture of Hangzhou, China. You play as Sheng Sheng—a first-year art student at Yunqi University. Through her eyes, you'll step into a unique university life brimming with warmth and local charm beside the West Lake.

games.name: SpaceCraft Brawl
games.description: A top-down, multiplayer, physics driven, space shooter game with destructible ship parts. Build your own spacecrafts. Fight with and against other players in different game modes, using a variety of weapons. Pick up super weapons and slice enemy ships in half. Easy to get into, hard to master.

games.name: Hermit and Pig
games.description: Hermit and Pig is a turn-based, adventure RPG about a reclusive hermit and his truffle-hunting pig. These unlikely heroes must explore, forage, fight, and overcome unfortunate personal shortcomings to solve the mystery of a sinister corporate plot.

games.name: Menace
games.description: Lead a strike force against an alien threat in this turn-based tactical RPG from the developers of Battle Brothers. Answer distress calls across different worlds, train and equip infantry, deploy tanks and mechs, and plan and execute missions in detailed turn-based battles.

games.name: Liar's Game
games.description: This is a social inference game, you and your companions lurking in the evil forces, find your right partner, in the mysterious maze, together to complete the task! The game has randomly generated splicing plots, and has a variety of classes and props to play, let you and your friends to have fun!

games.name: Streamer Life Simulator 2
games.description: In the second game of the series, competition has increased and now everyone wants to be a streamer. Are you ready to stream until your cpu burns out?

games.name: I Am Etheric
games.description: I Am Etheric is a realistic first-person horror game in which a man with spiritual power visits a small, secluded psychiatric hospital in a town to banish an archon who can travel through different dimensions

games.name: The Battle of Aurinoxia
games.description: A retro space shoot 'em up with pixel art graphics, unique enemies, tough angry bosses, and a killer soundtrack. You are among the first pilots to arrive in the system to mount the counteroffensive against the aggressors. Get out there and show these aliens the price for messing with The Alliance!

games.name: The Bell Echoes
games.description: The Bell Echoes is a turn-based strategy game that combines SRPG-style storytelling with roguelike gameplay.

games.name: Tackle for Loss
games.description: Tackle for Loss is a 2D top-down action game that puts you in the shoes of a former American football pro. Violent combat, a captivating narrative, and dark pixel art combine to create a pumped-up experience, inspired by the likes of Hotline Miami.

games.name: Theta and Paralldoxs on Worldlines
games.description: In this puzzle game, you can use a fork that can split yourself to create a variety of unimaginable "Paralldox"s.

games.name: Lovish
games.description: Lovish is an outrageous 8-bit action-adventure game! Quest with Sir Solomon through a series of bite-sized rooms, as he attempts to free Princess Tsuna, the woman he loves, from the Devil Lord's clutches!

games.name: PUBG: Blindspot
games.description: PUBG: BLINDSPOT is a dynamic 5v5 military shooting game, presenting a realistic and fast-paced gunplay like never before in a top-down shooting game. Use real-time shared vision with teammates and a variety of tools to create and execute creative team strategies.

games.name: Jackal
games.description: Execute ultra-violent raids in retro 1970s hotels. Master precision and timing to take out bad guys in unforgiving top-down close-combat. No two playthroughs are alike with stackable gameplay mutators and randomly generated rooms.

games.name: Tomb of the Bloodletter
games.description: Tomb of the Bloodletter is a strategic word roguelike where your keyboard becomes your arsenal. Use your wit to unleash deadly words through tactical combinations of your letters to defeat the denizens of this dingy tomb and claim the Bloodletter for yourself...

games.name: Cycle of Struggle: Ardengrad
games.description: Cycle of Struggle: Ardengrad – a visual novel about social struggle and the fates of people in a country on the brink of revolution. Four heroines, four ideologies, one choice: become a fighter or an observer, save Ardena or plunge it into chaos. Your decisions will shape the course of history.

games.name: Youtubers Life 3
games.description: Reach the top of the rankings! Create your dream home with a luxury setup, compete online in real-time with other users by streaming, creating VODs, and editing them in the most epic way… and don't forget to share your photos in the unique and time-limited events on your calendar!

games.name: Pirate's Gambit
games.description: Pirate's Gambit takes you on an unpredictable voyage, blending deck-building with Yacht Dice mechanics. Roll the dice in the dimly lit cabin, where fate shifts with every turn. Are you closing in on treasure or something far more sinister?

games.name: Leavers Rift
games.description: Explore the surreal world surrounding the Leavers Rift in this immersive roguelike deckbuilder. Build powerful decks, collect treasures, and lose yourself in a dramatic story about humanity in a realm of magic. Uncover the influence of foreign forces and save your world!

games.name: My Hero Academia: All's Justice
games.description: SMASH through My Hero Academia’s final story arc and triumph over your foes in spectacular 3v3 battles! Follow the trials of Deku and other characters in the Final War between Heroes and Villains!

games.name: Umigari
games.description: UMIGARI is a first-person harpoon fishing game set in the foggy waters off the coast of Japan. Hunt fish with your harpoon, sell your catch, buy fuel, and upgrade your gear. Alone at sea, the more you explore, the stranger the fish become.

games.name: Purrplate
games.description: In this sunlit feline paradise, become the owner of a one-of-a-kind restaurant designed with your dream "Purr Plate"! Team up with over 100+ quirky cat staffers--from paw-kneading bakers to servers tumbling adorably over their own tails--to create your purrfect woodland café!

games.name: Big Band Survivors
games.description: Build your band, unlock powerful relics, and slay hordes in sync with the beat. Big Band Survivors is a rhythm-based roguelite that combines the visceral gameplay of the Survivors-like genre with musically interwoven game mechanics.

games.name: Tailor Simulator
games.description: Build your workshop and turn it into a fashion business. Interact with your customers and design unique collections to sell in your store. Upgrade your workshop until you rule the fashion industry.

games.name: Sweet Shop
games.description: Sweet Shop - A simple and aesthetically pleasing puzzle game set in a sweet toy shop. It depicts the daily lives of five beautiful and adorable toy girls, accompanied by relaxing music. After completing a level, you can view their photos in the gallery.

games.name: Space Bash
games.description: A chaotic local party game where tiny spaceships blast, bump, and battle through wild arenas — from survival to soccer to space billiards!

games.name: D1AL-ogue
games.description: Become an android repair technician in a cyberpunk city where the sun never rises. Rotate the unique circular puzzle 'D1AL' and merge modules to fix their broken bodies and hearts. Your precise repair is the conversation starter. Turn the dial and listen to their stories.

games.name: Be Queen Bee
games.description: An action-strategy game where you command a bee swarm with pheromones. Split your swarm into squads and upgrade your bees to win escalating battles.

games.name: The Run
games.description: An FMV horror-thriller. A famous fitness influencer must fight for survival when she's hunted by killers. Your decisions determine whether she lives or dies.

games.name: Dragon Spira
games.description: Master the board game with Spirit Beasts in a pixel-art fantasy RPG!

games.name: Cartapli: Fold Quest
games.description: Cartapli is a turn-based battle game that combines a strategic roguelike with unique paper-folding puzzles. Fold the paper to shift positions and defeat all enemies!

games.name: Antpocalypse
games.description: Many ants have become infected by the cordyceps fungus and are attacking their queens! Place ants (towers) along the paths of zombie ants and hopefully save every queen! Features: - Bespoke 2D art and animation - Multiple biomes - Original music - Satisfying ant deaths - Charming environments

games.name: War Drone
games.description: Tactical drone combat against infantry, armor, and air defenses. Control advanced drones, strike high-value targets, and dominate the battlefield from anywhere, your call. War is no longer fought on the ground. Operate combat drones, destroy high-value targets, and survive hostile airspace.

games.name: Trust Me, I Nailed It
games.description: is a turn-based strategy game where you edit video clips to make a screwed up warrior into a monster-slaying legend. Edit, stitch, and fake your way to epic battle videos. Make every fight look like a glorious win.

games.name: Chase St
games.description: The shadows are following you. Navigate an oppressive, familiar darkness in this 3rd-person psychological horror. Make use of your environment to escape the looming presence, and make your way safely home.

games.name: Super Bomberman Collection
games.description:
Party battle game "Super Bomberman" is now available as a collection featuring a total of 7 titles with 12 versions across JP, EUR and USA, including the long-awaited localised versions of the unreleased Super Bomberman 4 and 5!
Including Boss Rush mode to time attack against all the bosses in each title, support functions, libraries and more!

games.name: In My Bubble
games.description: In My Bubble is a 3D action-adventure platformer featuring a child in a cute earflap hat on a quest to save the sheep of the dream world. Explore a world overtaken by darkness, rescue corrupted sheep, and restore the lost morning using the power of bubbles!

games.name: Spacetime Shooter
games.description: You are a sniper who controls time and space. Eliminate all enemies with a single bullet.

games.name: Exe.cutor
games.description: Exe.cutor is a game where you place data blocks to complete lines. Acquire various equipment and enhance your data blocks to build stronger lines and defeat virus hosts infesting cyberspace!

games.name: Ocean Otter Swim
games.description: Ocean Otter Swim is a 3D top-down swimming game about making your way back to the sea. Let’s swim with a CUTE SEA OTTER!

games.name: A Normal Train Game
games.description: Trapped on a chaotic subway, you must act fast before time runs out. Hurl crying babies out of the car in a frantic arcade rush as difficulty ramps up. Chase high scores and climb the online leaderboard.

games.name: Battle for Asciion
games.description: Battle for Asciion is a classic horizontal shoot 'em up built entirely from real text characters. No sprites. No pixels. No images. Just pure ASCII action, massive bosses, weapon upgrades and retro arcade challenge.

games.name: HoloType: Treasure Zombie Island
