games.description: Houshou Marine sets sail again, this time with typing! Due to Crazy Ollie's mischief, the captain's precious treasure has transformed into "Treasure Zombies"! Can the captain recover her original, adorable treasure? A typing game like no other, filled with Hololive's most memorable lines!

games.name: Sifu Kidnapped!: Adventure in the Women's Kingdom
games.description:
This is the ultimate choice between Buddhist compassion and mortal desire! Assume the role of the protagonist Chen Yi in first-person perspective, making crucial decisions in demon-subduing puzzles and sweet interactions. Every conversation shapes favorability, and every choice alters the fate of the Three Realms. Will you honor the bet between Tathagata Buddha and the Demon King, sever earthly ties, and attain Buddhahood? Or follow your heart and spend a lifetime with your beloved?

Many distinct endings await—from achieving Buddhahood in the West to staying in the Women's Kingdom, from becoming a dragon palace son-in-law to wandering the world. Every step writes your unique time-travel adventure!

games.name: White Silence
games.description: After crashing in the winter wilderness, you wake up in the middle of a blizzard. The forest is dead, the roads are gone, communication is lost. The only chance of salvation is a village hidden in the snow.

games.name: Echo
games.description: Marit returns to her father's research facility expecting answers, only to uncover files he meant to share when she was “ready.” They reveal the truth: she wasn't just his daughter — she was his project.

games.name: Iris
games.description: IRIS is a short psychological horror experience about being watched, controlled, and haunted by what was taken from you.

games.name: Dragon Quest VII Reimagined: Additional DLC Sets
games.description: A DLC set that will enhance your adventure, including additional contents, character costumes, and useful items for DRAGON QUEST VII Reimagined.

games.name: No Mana, Just Dice
games.description: Zero Mana. Massive Debt. No Mana, Just Dice is a tactical turn-based roguelike. Play as a dropout witch who needs dice just to take a single step! Use your limited dice to maneuver and attack, outsmart your bad luck, and seize the wish-granting scroll to rewrite your fate.

games.name: Hentai Furry Raccoon
games.description: Hentai Furry Raccoon is an exciting game that combines puzzles, light humor, and a seductive furry atmosphere. You will dive into a colorful and playful universe where temptation, cunning, and flirtation intertwine into a single story.

games.name: Harukoharu
games.description: Harukoharu is an adventure and puzzle game. But you don’t have to solve the puzzles.

games.name: RoboCo
games.description: RoboCo is a sandbox game about designing and building robots to serve the needs of squishy, hapless humans in the world of tomorrow!

games.name: HumanitZ
games.description: HumanitZ is an isometric, open-world sandbox survival game set in a world ended by a zombie outbreak. Survive alone or with friends by scavenging, crafting, building, and fighting to last as long as ‘humanly’ possible. You can’t change the past, but you can fight for the future of humanity.

games.name: Dead Pets: A Punk Rock Slice of Life Sim
games.description: Struggling punk band, Dead Pets, are still looking for their breakthrough after almost 10 years. Gordy has big plans for the group, but when you turn 30, life starts to get in the way. Dead Pets Unleashed is a narrative, slice of life and management-lite game; get ready to unleash your inner demon.

games.name: Osiris
games.description: Osiris is a Roguelike Dark Fantasy game that thells a Story of a demigod who wants to escape the Egyptian underworld to save his beloved woman who was doomed to lose her soul forever.

games.name: The Quinfall
games.description: Embark on an adventurous journey to explore the Quinfall universe. Be a part of unique battles and an immersive story with dozens of different professions in the depths of medieval times in an all-new MMORPG experience.

games.name: Final Forge
games.description: Defend your tower and protect the dwarf's treasure from marauding creatures in this roguelike survival game. Explore the region, collect resources, and choose the right upgrades. But be careful, don't leave your fortress empty for too long.

games.name: Underboard
games.description: Tactical team-building auto-battler with active and passive playstyles. Draft a team as you explore maps full of monsters, build synergies, equip items and cast spells to support your team during battles and help them escape the Underboard.

games.name: Break Them All
games.description: The game type is A Roguelite barrage shooting game, Choose different upgrades after each level, and each upgrade can be integrated to form a unique gameplay. Every game is a brand-new experience. After each customs clearance, the difficulty increases and the playability is enhanced.

games.name: The Chronicles of Eleos: The Hall of Azaron
games.description: The Chronicles of Eleos: The Hall of Azaron is a classic RPG where we control an archaeologist wizard on a journey through the continent of Eleos, a place with various peoples and cultures and full of mysteries and craziness just waiting for a nosy enough wizard to reveal them.

games.name: Who's Next?
games.description: 『Who's Next?』 is a real-time multiplayer social deduction game set in the traditional Korean hell, featuring a massacre of ghosts and spirits, with individual survival competition rather than team battles, focusing on 'Chasing Tail'.

games.name: PawnShop Simulator
games.description: PawnShop Simulator is a business simulation game where you buy and sell items through negotiation, clean and repair goods, rebuild and renovate your shops, and unlock licenses to trade over 180 unique products while growing from a small street pawn shop into another, larger modern urban pawn shop.

games.name: Demon Dust
games.description: Demon Dust is a Survival Horror Dungeon Crawler with a unique, mouse driven interface. Scavenge the depths of concrete and metal while rationing supplies to stay alive.

games.name: There's Always a Madman: The MacGuffin
games.description:
Secret agent Franklin Benjamin's former-mentor-turned-rogue-agent Dustin MacGuffin has resurfaced to kidnap the one you care about most.

In this single-player interactive spy novel, play as secret agent Franklin Benjamin and use your particular set of skills to save Virginia from the clutches of the madman Dustin MacGuffin.

Which means - you’d better get the MacGuffin!

games.name: Souper Game
games.description: Souper Game is a fun and spicy clicker where you play as... SOUP! That's right—an irresistible, hot, and aromatic soup that the elven girl Sylvie prepares for the rude and insatiable Troll. Your mission? Not only to become the perfect dish but also to earn her affection!

games.name: Nioh 3
games.description: In the latest game in the dark samurai action RPG series "Nioh," you will need to use both Samurai and Ninja combat styles in your battles against formidable yokai as you explore a thrilling open world.

games.name: Soulbound Roguelike
games.description: As heir to the fallen Divine Beast Sect, restore your clan by exploring procedurally generated Jianghu realms, forging pacts with mythical beasts, and combining Martial Skills × Blessings × Enchantments to craft your ultimate combat style—experience intense, satisfying roguelite action!

games.name: Machine Tower 2984
games.description: 《Machine Tower 2984》 is a top-down mechanical fantasy style Roguelike game. You will embark on an adventure in a tower filled with mechanical mechanisms, challenging the five robots that control the machine tower and searching for the huge secrets behind the entire tower.

games.name: Handsum
games.description: Lose the game. Lose your fingers. With nothing but an arsenal of powerups and your gut instincts, the only way out of this high-stakes guessing game is to win.

games.name: Prescribe and Pray
games.description: Who said being a doctor was an easy job? In Prescribe and Pray, you're the Doctor! Check the patient's identity, diagnose their (often bizarre) illness, and issue their prescription. All without making a mistake! So, are you up to the challenge?

games.name: Creature Kitchen
games.description: Befriend your local wildlife and feed them their favorite snacks in this cozy atmospheric cooking simulator! With a strange house to search and forest to explore, the witching hour has only begun.

games.name: Exit Plan b
games.description: Exit Plan b is a fast-paced action-puzzle roguelite where you explore intricate mazes, collect coins, evade and outsmart relentless enemies, and gather gems and points to unlock powerful new skills and progress through increasingly challenging levels.

games.name: Ghost Gunners
games.description: This party FPS is made to CHALLENGE YOUR FRIENDS, up to 6 people! Everyone is invisible, but you have various tools to track and reveal enemies. Play different game modes and customize your lobbies.

games.name: Bist Squad
games.description: Bist squad is a short, tactical dungeon crawler where you hatch strange eggs, evolve your creatures, and face off in auto-resolved battles. No tutorials. No hand-holding. Just discovery. Learn the mechanics by playing and experimenting.

games.name: Samurai Heroes
games.description: This is a highly flexible command RPG set in Japan's Warring States period. There are over 85 playable factions and over 300 generals! All items have random titles and qualities! Enjoy collecting generals and items, and freely forming your troops!

games.name: Ink Link
games.description: Ink Link is a sleek world of action in 2.5D! Outsmart enemies, piece together platforms, and upgrade your skills to take on powerful bosses. Discover hidden paths as darkness creeps in and your ally-turned-enemy, Ink, tests your skills—and your will to survive.

games.name: Heaven Does Not Respond
games.description: Heaven Does Not Respond is a psychological and analog horror simulation game set in an alternate 2005 timeline. Play as intelligence agent, exploring a retro computer interface to decrypt hidden files, watch mysterious videos, and uncover dark secrets behind a young man’s sudden death.

games.name: Cool Cool Water
games.description: A desert survival game, set in southern New Mexico.

games.name: Solo Tactics
games.description: Solo Tactics is a 1 V 1 MOBA where you'll need to rapidly switch between three champions. Play as the defender or attacker in a thrilling showdown-play for free !

games.name: You and I, at the End of That Summer
games.description: Having lost the meaning of life, Shionagi meets Ayana, who suffers from a certain illness. “Kidnap me from this boring everyday life.” He wishes to die. A girl promised death. A bittersweet summer kidnapping drama where they confront each other's “lives.”

games.name: Carmageddon: Rogue Shift
games.description: Carmageddon smashes back with brutal roguelite vehicular‑combat mayhem. Adapt, upgrade, and unleash destruction on post‑apocalyptic zombie hordes. The legacy lives on, reinvented and unforgiving.

games.name: Day of Light
games.description: Day of Light is a hand-drawn platformer about facing inner struggles. Use powerful masks to unlock temporary abilities and bring light back into a dark world!

games.name: Amen 11 11
games.description: AMEN 11 11 is a hidden object adventure game set in an atmosphere of apocalypse and psychological horror. The player's task is to find objects hidden on the maps.

games.name: Mimetic
games.description: Hunt or be hunted is this new generation hide & seek game style with advanced physics and interactions. Hunt your friends with the drone or be hunted and morph yourself into any object in the game ! Turn on special abilities mode for more fun !

games.name: Grix
games.description: Grix is a deduction-focused roguelike where you grow by discovering rules and predicting dangers in darkened dungeons.

games.name: Power Punch
games.description: Power Punch is a local multiplayer (max 4 players) party fighting game where the longer you charge you punch the strong and faster it becomes when you release.

games.name: Hourfall
games.description: Hourfall is a fast-paced character-action RPG where you wield three unique clock hand blades, fight fantastic servants of Time, and race against a ticking timer while in combat.

games.name: Gun Swinger
games.description: Blaze away with blistering fast weapons! Never stop! Swing your self through a world without floors! No Fear! No Brakes! Gain upgrades to increase your ferocious velocity! Unlock new weapons! Solve puzzles! Or relax in the in-game level creator with endless fun and possibilities!

games.name: House Call
games.description:
HOUSE CALL is a short 10-minute experience heavily inspired by Adobe Flash point-and-click games of the late 2000s, including THE HOUSE by Sinthai.
Use your mouse to explore the environment, solve puzzles, and proceed through the house to find what lies within.

games.name: Snow Bros. Classic Collection
games.description:
It’s always more fun to throw a snowball than to be hit by one!

Toaplan‘s hit Snow Bros. is back! This arcade-style, fixed-screen platformer follows brothers Nick and Tom through epic levels in the Kingdom of Hottoda to save two trapped princesses, each possessing the magic of snow… and the only hope for the realm. As evil King Atchich seeks to take over the world, the snowmen we love must set out to storm the enemy’s fortress and rescue their princesses!

Shoot snow at your enemies, picking up items to enhance your fighting, from speed enhancements to shot powerups, becoming giant, and more. Each level features not only enemies but a boss fight, with unique characters to size up and snowball!

Whether you have loved them since the 90s or are just discovering the snowy goodness now, Snow Bros. will show you exactly why it’s such a timeless game.

Included Games:

Snow Bros.
Snow Bros.: Nick & Tom
Snow Bros. Jr.

games.name: I Am Not A Robot
games.description: A short, incremental game where you solve Captchas and get a bot to automate this process.

games.name: Jaden Williams' The Stalking Stairs
games.description: The city’s under curfew after a series of disappearances and murders. You’re a young delivery driver trying to finish your gig before 9:00 PM. Set inside a decaying apartment complex, every knock on a door brings you closer to uncovering what lurks within its halls, where every delivery could be your last. The Stalking Stairs is a PSX-style psychological horror thriller featuring tense atmosphere, immersive sound design, and full voice acting.

games.name: Sudoku Dungeon
games.description: Sudoku Dungeon is a turn-based fantasy tactical puzzle game mixing 9x9 Sudoku logic with dungeon crawling combat. Manage hero abilities, enemy abilities, and more as you navigate through an 80-puzzle campaign. In Challenge Mode experiment with your own team compositions and optimize your solutions.

games.name: Poker Hands Bullshit
games.description: Turn-based card game. Raise the bar on the best poker hands you think are present out of all players' cards. Since you can only see your cards, you'll have to take a chance on the cards other players have or lie about your own cards. Bullshit or be bullshit-ed.

games.name: Mmnana
games.description: Mmnana is a 3D adventure featuring 2D pixel art in which, after an accident, you must learn to move from scratch and discover whether you can escape an island by crawling using only your hands.

games.name: Anomaly Company
games.description: You and your crew are sent in to assess reality in this 4-player co-op horror game. Memorize the environment. Spot disturbing anomalies. Decide if the timeline is safe. One bad call—and you’re forced to start over.

games.name: Saka-doh: The Reversal Arts
games.description: Fight in reverse! Legendary 80's arcade creators return with a lost project reborn! Experience pendulum battles never seen before, with vintage pixel art, hot-blooded rivals, and captivating women. To save your beloved, race across the globe and Forge your SAKA-DOH! Wishlist today. Now, warrior!!

games.name: Northern Adam: The Saga of Revenge
games.description: An atmospheric Action-RPG set in a dark fantasy world, where exploration and combat are equally paramount. Begin your Saga. Survive. Avenge.

games.name: No Way Up
games.description: The only way up... Is down.

games.name: Help Bipboop
games.description: Guide Bipboop, the autonomous little robot, through a series of mind-bending puzzles. You don't control Bipboop directly; instead, place terrain blocks strategically to help him reach the end. Are you up for the challenge?

games.name: Miss Peacock
games.description: Between 1930 and 1933, Lieutenant Chen, an ambitious Asian officer, travels to a remote mine in the mountains of French Indochina to investigate a decrease in mineral production. Various forces become entangled in the power play, revealing the truth amid diplomatic mediation and supernatural events.

games.name: Sword Phantom
games.description: A high speed stylish Action Game about 2 girls in the future world! Use your gun, sword, and fist to finish the enemy and save the world! The game also contains many equips and underwears to dress up your character.

games.name: Dungeon Train
games.description: You're a security guard for hire set to work on a train when it is hijacked at night! Take guns and shoot your way through each car until the train is fully liberated.

games.name: Polyjump
games.description: Polyjump is a fast-paced indie platformer where you play as a small sphere jumping through different low-poly worlds. Master 3D and 2D levels, beat the clock, and climb the leaderboards with your best runs.

games.name: Perfume Atelier
games.description: Blend fragrances in your cozy perfume atelier! Craft unique scents by mixing essences, design beautiful bottles, and try to sell your creations to curious customers. Decorate your workshop, unlock new recipes, and grow your reputation in the art of fragrance.

games.name: Dillingham
games.description: Dillingham is a fast-paced fish-processing and logistics simulator where chaos meets precision. Run an Alaskan seafood plant, unload boats, sort and process fish, manage conveyor systems, operate forklifts, and keep every station flowing before the whole line backs up.

games.name: Cityscapes
games.description: You're an urban planner, and it's time to build a new city! Your new residents all dream of something different, but there's only one design that is perfect for everyone! Take your time and use your brain in this cozy puzzle game.

games.name: Steamwrecked
games.description: Ascend the skies and escape the hot desert caused by humanities over usage of fossil fuels. Find blueprints, scavenge and craft items to build your airship to soar the skies up to society once more. Can you survive this tragedy or fall prey to the harsh nature of this decaying world?

games.name: Haramimura: When a Wife Becomes a Villager
games.description:
Nagisa and Haruki have a happy marriage. They always get along, Haruki has a great job, and Nagisa is a happy wife. Their only disappointment is their lack of kids.

Together, they move to Haramimura, a rural village known to bless its residents with plenty of children. But it isn't long before cracks begin to form in the veneer of perfection that the villagers try so hard to maintain. Will Nagisa and her husband get to the bottom of Haramimura's many mysteries and build a happy life together, or was leaving the big city the last mistake they'll ever make?

games.name: Escape From Yandere
games.description: Yandera has locked you in your house and is asking for a declaration of love. You can stay with her or try to escape. Explore the house, but be careful, Yandera can kill you.

games.name: Monday Meow
games.description: Cats, a deserted island, and office equipment! A corporate retreat to a deserted island goes horribly wrong, and it's up to little ol' you to find everyone and bring them back to camp.

games.name: Find All: Valentine's Day
games.description: Test your attention and go on a look for different items with your loved one. Explore the cozy waterways of the town on Valentine's Day and find all the hidden objects to make the black-and-white picture burst into bright colors.

games.name: Super Rocket Monkey
games.description: Control a rocket-powered monkey through a brutal top-down Foddian platformer in search of the ancient Golden Banana.

games.name: Hentai Pop Star
games.description: Hentai Pop Star is an erotic puzzle game where each completed level reveals new seductive artwork of a stunning anime idol. Neon vibes, satisfying gameplay, and beautifully drawn illustrations create an addictive experience you'll keep coming back to.

games.name: The Strange Lights
games.description: You have arrived in a forest where people are rumored to disappear and strange things happen... Locals often see bright flashes and hear strange sounds...

games.name: Omelet You Cook
games.description: The cozy chaotic cooking roguelike. Assemble omelets for quirky students using ingredients from a conveyor belt. Discover wacky combinations to satisfy the ever-demanding Principal Clucker.

games.name: Ichorless
games.description: Battle mighty gods, earn game-changing Blessings, and shape the fate of Greece through your choices in ICHORLESS — the RPG that lets you forge your own path and play your way!

games.name: Kantmis-Zero
games.description: "Kantmis-Zero" is a boss rush action game. As the only chosen one on the Kantmis continent, you must follow the divine instructions and complete the trials.

games.name: Brainrot Online
games.description: Brainrot Online is a fast, chaotic, and absolutely unhinged multiplayer FPS where strange brainrot-inspired creatures clash in ridiculous battles. Join existing servers or create your own, jump into matches filled with real players or AI bots, and fight your way to the top across three unique maps designed for nonstop action.

games.name: Smutty Scrolls
games.description: An erotic drag 'n drop puzzle adventure where you play three versions of yourself - at the same time! You're a sexy slime hero... Change the outcome of your story in real time! Explore the Smutty Scrolls, find legendary items and stay alive to date and pleasure all the girls!

games.name: Demiurges
games.description: Demiurges is a strategic roguelike game. Build your deck, develop your city, upgrade your heroes, and defeat your enemies in turn-based battles to save your world from destruction. Immerse yourself in a rich fantasy world. Collect new cards to create new strategies and increase your chances.

games.name: Monday Meltdown
games.description: Unleash your inner Monday rage in "Monday Meltdown," a 2D multiplayer mayhem. Engage in intense battles across casual environments like the office, gym, and grocery store. With a vast arsenal of weapons, be the first to achieve 10 kills for victory. Let off some steam and conquer Monday madness!

games.name: Contract & Control
games.description: Embark on an electrifying journey in a role-playing extravaganza with mind-bending features that'll whisk you to new realms! Get ready for an adventure that'll leave you breathless and craving more! Brace yourself, this game may actually blow your mind!

games.name: Many Mini Typing Games
games.description: Chase high scores in a series of breakneck typing minigames! Keep up with keyboard-mashing cats, banana-wielding monkey-cowboys and more as you "QWERTY" your way to new heights!

games.name: The Oily Depths
games.description: Pilot an oil-drilling submarine while taking instructions from a mysterious voice. You better meet your quota or they will cut your oxygen.

games.name: Lythe The Forgetful Witch: A Visual Novel
games.description: Guide Lythe, a naïve witch on a journey through the spooky world of Samhain, as she seeks the High Witch and rediscovers her magic. This visual novel features spell crafting, rune seeking, and memory game mechanics, all while unraveling the desires of her monstrous friends!

games.name: Monday Syndrome
games.description: Monday Syndrome is a singleplayer action roguelike where you play as an intern that's trapped in a hellish office. Descend into a satirical corporate hell, battling demonic coworkers with absurd office supply weapons in an endless, procedurally generated tower. Can you survive the eternal 9-to-5?

games.name: Haifa
games.description: Haifa is a hidden object puzzle experience that tells a story about the emotional struggles of trying to maintain hopefulness in times of war. Help your characters keep their head up by finding small objects in their environment to lift their spirits, as they look for their lost friend.

games.name: Hand of Hexes
games.description: Play cards to cast spells that control enemy hordes and use your deck to build deadly mazes of towers with funky attack patterns.

games.name: Little Knight
games.description: This is a medieval horizontal pixel-style game that can achieve unlimited gold coins. Players can control the little knight and experience the endless fun of monster swiping and exploration.

games.name: Circle Empires 2
games.description: CIRCLE EMPIRES returns! Expand your empire, circle by circle, in this fast-paced follow-up to the hit RTS. Gather resources, build armies, and defeat bosses (or your friends) in a world that changes with every game. With unique units and biomes, it's an addictive battle of wits and tactics.

games.name: Monterey Jack
games.description: Run, run, run as fast as you can, you can’t escape the Cheese Man!

games.name: 100 Demon Cats
games.description: Join the cutest adventure in themed locations full of cats! Explore the charming hand-drawn artwork of special places and try to find 100 adorable cats hidden throughout the game.

games.name: Astro Protocol
games.description: Space strategy in a nutshell. Astro Protocol is a fast-paced space 4X where each run takes 1 to 2 hours. Explore the galaxy, colonize new worlds, research powerful technologies and command deadly fleets. No diplomacy, pure conquest. Turn based strategy at its core.

games.name: Pixel Wizard
games.description: A medieval fantasy hack and slash adventure where you are a battle pixel wizard. Fast and frantic, fight hordes of enemies and defeat brutal bosses in any order to save the kingdom. Use deadly magic, powerful items and valuable loot to help turn the tide of battle.

games.name: Goblin Sushi
games.description: In this rogue-like restaurant-action-sim, you play as a goblin that has the dream of becoming a sushi chef. Upgrade the restaurant, the menu and your ingredients to feed your fellow goblins the best and most expensive sushi any goblin can find in the cave!

games.name: Fate of the Seventh Scholar
games.description: Fight against an unyielding horde, explore a handcrafted world, solve puzzles and discover the Fate of the Seventh Scholar.

games.name: Familiar Findings
games.description: Summon and study witches’ familiars in this charming creature collection game. Gather dragons, spirits and more in your quest to complete your magical grimoire. Watch them enchant your screen without intruding while you work, study or relax. With over 100 variations there’s a favourite for everyone!

games.name: Lead to Gold
games.description: ​​Lead To Gold​​ is a tech-themed solitaire game collection. Rearrange cards on your playing field to complete a series of challenging missions.

games.name: 1964 Operation Velvet Twins
games.description: A retro-style action-platformer that blends the stealth shootouts of Rolling Thunder with the raw brawling of Double Dragon. The result? A thrilling 2D spy adventure set in the 1960s — packed with fists, bullets, and classic arcade energy!!

games.name: Wise Guys
games.description: Wise Guys is a ruthless, high-stakes social deduction game where trust is a weapon and betrayal is just survival. Up to 8 players race against time to clean up their criminal operation and get out before the raid hits. Meanwhile, a Rat is quietly sabotaging the crew at every turn.

games.name: Worlds
games.description: Worlds-is a psychological horror with a deep story, where nothing is accidental. The narrative is delivered in an unconventional way — not through dialogues or a narrator, but through the environment and subtle details And remember, nothing in this game is done for no reason.

games.name: AxeSlinger
games.description: AxeSlinger is a fast, heavy-metal roguelite FPS where you shred through demon-infested dimensions using guitar-weapons. Fight hordes, rack up insane combos, unlock powers, and battle colossal bosses as the last Death Angel of Shred on your path to reclaim your throne from the Battle Worm.

games.name: The Last Night: Zombie Attack
games.description: This game is a tense, atmospheric survival experience built around exploration, pressure, and learning the environment through failure and persistence.

games.name: Mellow's PillowLand
games.description: A cozy city-building and management game where plushies come to life. Design, decorate, and nurture your dream world in The Sweetest Bed-Time Story : Mellow’s PillowLand

games.name: Aizasia
games.description: Defeat enemies, solve the puzzles, find the hidden objects and finally collect the three stars to pass into the next level with lots of coins. Funny game, lovely interaction and smart obstacles. Realistic graphics and unique designs with different environments.

games.name: Library of Babel
games.description: A infinite library of randomness.

games.name: The Test: Reimagined
games.description: The Test: Reimagined is a masterful mix of Personality Test Psychology and Dark Tarot. Answer a series of fully-narrated questions to receive a personalized, unique ending based on your choices. Dive deep into your own psyche and join millions in a social experiment that you will NOT want to miss!

games.name: Yokai Return
games.description: This is a Souls-like action game. You fight by switching between characters equipped with different weapons. You can balance your character build with your desire to use a variety of weapons.

games.name: More Love Yuri
games.description: Voice actress Lu Xi and writer Shu Yu continue their life together. After the incident, they became a fan-favored “official CP,” forced to act close at events. Sweet days flow on, small ripples appear, and their bond deepens—until the rejected Twin Souls ending unfolds in reality.

games.name: Mewgenics
games.description:
From the creator of The Binding of Isaac, Super Meat Boy and The End is Nigh comes... Mewgenics! A game where you hoard, breed, train and set cats out on epic adventures through a sprawling world of complete chaos.
Level up your team as you venture further and further from your home, collect unique items, defeat epic bosses, gain mutations and return home so you you can breed and further your bloodline, in this turn based legacy roguelike draft sim about cats!

games.name: Westwood Shadows
games.description: A police detective gets involved into a case about a missing couple. Soon he finds out that the husband was working at a mental asylum and he was conducting a research over a mysterious disappearance of patients. Among the files there is something he would never thought he would find.

games.name: Celestial Crowns
games.description: The King is dead! Take the throne in this choice-rich fantasy game and save your Kingdom by reviving ancient magic that's been lost to your family for generations. Customize your character and play through three different romantic routes!

games.name: Crisol: Theater of Idols
games.description: What would you do if your blood were your only weapon? How much would you sacrifice your life? Experience the unholy island of Tormentosa in this twisted first-person adventure full of horror and action where only your blood can be used to defeat the impious creatures that roam therein.

games.name: Shadows of the Afterland
games.description:
Madrid, 1960. The old city zoo is rocked by a mysterious death, catapulting a soul to the threshold between the world of the living and the afterlife. But when the transition goes awry, the soul arrives with the memories of Carolina, one of the pioneers in Madrid's police force, who has yet to be born.

Step into Carolina’s shoes and plunge into a riveting adventure to unravel the enigma shrouding these ominous events. Explore the wacky realm of the afterlife, teeming with unique characters and with its own set of rules.

games.name: Maid Sisters' Service
games.description: During a business trip, I lived with two newly recruited maid sisters—the considerate Kiyomi and the passionate Shizuki—for a month. Although I had lost my memory, my little thingy was still very energetic!

games.name: The Prisoning: Fletcher's Quest
games.description: After a visit to the psychologist that went horribly wrong you’re trapped in the mind of a game developer on the brink of physical and emotional burnout during the last stages of an intense project. Experience a metroidvania drenched in anxiety based on a very true story.

games.name: Adrenalinkick
games.description:
Feel like Ghost Rider and race across the highways and streets of any regions.

A race in the grey area of the law, because there is no speed limit for you.
But always remember,
every decision could be your last.
You don't have unlimited guardian angels.

games.name: Monsters and Me
games.description: A chaotic 2D top-down roguelite shooter where you blast through waves of mutant freaks, upgrade ridiculous weapons, and die gloriously. Slime is everywhere. So are the jokes. Survive alone or with a buddy—then do it all again!

games.name: Supercat Survivors: Meow or Die
games.description: Meow! This is a cat-themed Survivor-like game where you control an adorable Supercat! Battle monsters to level up, collect items, upgrade weapons, and experiment with strategic builds to fight off invading creatures threatening Meow Star.

games.name: Relooted
games.description: Reclaim real African artifacts from Western museums in this Africanfuturist heist game. Recruit crew members, plan escape routes, acquire the precious cargo, and bounce out of the joint as fast as you can.

games.name: Hill Defender
games.description: You’ve claimed the best spot on Earth, but invaders want it. Defend your camp from waves of enemies trying to destroy your base or throw you off the cliff. Use ballistas, catapults, and spells to stop them. Earn rewards, upgrade your defenses, and survive stronger waves. Never let your camp fall!

games.name: Her Trees: Puzzle Dream
games.description: "Her Trees: Puzzle Dream" is a unique point-and-click puzzle game where you move and combine objects to solve puzzles. Unravel the strange puzzles hidden in your dreams.

games.name: ReUse
games.description: Fancy a shoot’em all with a little bit of resource management. Join Theo on his perseverance to kill monsters by crafting deadly weapons using whatever he can scavenge from his surroundings.

games.name: Chiseler
games.description: Use logic to uncover artifacts in this casual picture puzzle game. With over 150 puzzles spread throughout a full story mode campaign, you'll have plenty of puzzles to keep you busy. Make and share your own levels with others with the included puzzle editor to keep the fun alive forever.

games.name: Arcabbit
games.description: Latch on with two hooks and ride the momentum of a pendulum swing. Swap left and right in rhythm to blaze through neon stages in this 2D action game. Stage mechanics sync with the soundtrack for a snappy “one more try” loop.

games.name: Lone Bird in the Tree
games.description: “Lone Bird in the Tree” is an ADV with male and female versions of each of the four characters. The story alternates between the “future” of the main character, who is deeply traumatized by the grief of his/her best friend, and the “story leading up to the loss of his/her best friend”.

games.name: Outbreak
games.description: Build, defend, and survive. Strengthen your defenses between waves and fight endless hordes of zombies under haunting lights. Play solo for the ultimate challenge, or in the upcoming online co-op mode to survive together.

games.name: Cute Techno Slayer: Re Seele
games.description: "Seele," the protagonist who is a customizable Sex Bot, fights against hordes of enemies called "Shadows." The enemies and maps are randomized, ensuring that each game is different, and the content is pornographic.

games.name: HorSteal
games.description: The journey of a thief horse targeting the Louvre's Mona Lisa begins! Control 4 legs and neck individually in this physics action game. Steal masterpieces, sell loot, and upgrade your hideout. Ready? Take the first hoof towards the Mona Lisa!

games.name: Project Atlas
games.description: Inspired by the 3I/Atlas commet, Project Atlas is a story-driven sci-fi narrative following Commander Simth as she tracks a mysterious object through deep space and discovers a truth no one is prepared for.

games.name: Plighters
games.description: Fight. Loot. Die. Repeat. Begin your plight into this 2D rogue-lite, and try to survive. Battle enemies, bosses, charge orbs, enter portals, and try to make it farther than last time, uncovering new items, challenges, and secrets. Adventure alone or with up to 3 other friends in co-op.

games.name: Captain Whiskers: Incremental Seas
games.description: This is a relaxing fishing-themed incremental game. You will join the Cat Captains to explore global fishing grounds, catch fish, and collect resources. Unlock permanent upgrades in a vast talent tree with your gold. Every rewarding voyage will have you shouting, "One more round!"

games.name: Dead Zombie
games.description: Dead Zombie is a top-down survival shooter set in a dark city at night. Fight zombies and mutated monsters using a pistol, SMG, and flamethrower, explore the environment with a flashlight, rescue survivors, collect ammo, destroy obstacles with bombs, and escape by reaching the evacuation helicopter.

games.name: Dot Art Logic
games.description: This game is for players who simply want to enjoy nonograms. There are no flashy effects at all, and it feels like solving paper puzzles from magazines using a mouse on your computer. It includes 1600 B&W puzzles sized 20x20 and 300 color puzzles up to 15x15, for a total of 1900 puzzles.

games.name: Kickback Clash
games.description: Kickback Clash is a fast-paced arena shooter where every shot pushes you back. Fly using your weapons, dash through the air, survive vertical arenas with double jumps, and climb to the top of the global leaderboard by outplaying your opponents.

games.name: Void Light
games.description: Survive. Endure. Repeat. Avoid creatures and survive as long as possible across various star systems.

games.name: Campfire: Night One
games.description: Experience True Survival Horror Campfire: Night One is an immersive psychological horror game where every shadow hides a threat and every bullet counts. As you navigate the suffocating darkness of the Abanda wilds, you must do more than just survive—you must find and rescue the one who matters most to you.

games.name: Baston
games.description: In Baston, a branch of the Colombian Cartel quietly embeds itself in the outskirts of Milenagrad in eastern Russia, striking a deal with corrupt local police to peddle illicit goods and harass the townsfolk. Major Stepanovich, one of the few honest officers left, reaches out to an old friend—Gena "Baston"—who has just returned and is ready to set things right.

games.name: Perfect Loop: Soleris
games.description: Perfect Loop: Soleris is a tactical turn-based RPG with two heroes and two progression systems: loot-based abilities for one, deck-building for the other. The time loop resets your loadout roguelite-style, but quest progress carries over.

games.name: Minesweeper Pillar
games.description: Minesweeper Pillar is a twist on the classic minesweeper game. In this unique gaming experience, you'll find yourself in a cylindrical world where mines are hidden within the walls of a rotating pillar.

games.name: Elixion
games.description: A crafting potions & turn-based strategy game

games.name: Five Letters Only
games.description: Five Letters Only is a fun, single-player, competitive word game. Submit 5-letter words to reach the top of each leaderboard.

games.name: MMA Empire
games.description: Unique MMA Management-Style Game. Compete against rival promotions, expand your roster, and build your Empire!

games.name: Atheris
games.description: Atheris is a third-person sci-fi survival horror game where you explore an industrial spaceship, manage limited resources, and face deadly creatures while fighting to stay alive in a claustrophobic and hostile environment.

games.name: Particul
games.description: Click to mine particles and watch your pile grow. Turn resources into profit, automate extraction, research new technologies and trade. Can you mine the rarest particle and ascend? There is just one way to find out.

games.name: Cosmo Strike: Complete Edition
games.description: In the distant year of 2359, previously unknown alien forces have attacked Earth and its colonies. You are an agent on a special mission sent by the global senate to repel the attack and stop the alien forces.

games.name: Square Man Puzzle Game
games.description: Square Man is a real-time puzzle game where you must solve stages by achieving certain goals. Most often you’ll be collecting stars and/or reaching the exit, but you might also have to melt ice, fill in water, turn lava to stone, or even fight monsters!

games.name: Tekken 8: Season 3 Pass
games.description: The Season 3 Pass includes 4 Additional playable characters (Kunimitsu, Bob, Roger Jr., and Character 12) and 1 Additional battle stage (Stage 5)

games.name: Cadence
games.description: You've been playing games most of your life. You've been listening to music even longer. Wouldn't it be great if making music was as easy as playing a game? Cadence lets you draw shapes as music. Let your imagination run free with the PC's first music sandbox game.

games.name: Life Game
games.description: Open World, first person life simulation

games.name: In Next Life
games.description:
In next Life is a crafting, survival, and civilization building game, where collaboration with other players gives you very real advantages (it is possible to play alone, but it will be harder to survive). Your technology level starts at stone age level, and then it's up to you and your village members to invent and craft tools and technologies such as fire, baskets, spears, ..., in order to survive easier and to advance to new development stages. Time moves quickly and each game played equals one life, including birth, childhood, adulthood and old age.

The goal of each life is to contribute as much as possible to the survival and development of your village, children and future descendants. What you leave behind will be the foundation for others to keep building on. The flint spear you invented one life, could turn out to be the difference between survival and annihilation for your whole civilization. There are hundreds of objects you can craft, collect, cook, and eat. We intend to add at least 1,000 more during the Early Access period.

games.name: The Great Ocean
games.description: Dive into adventure-missions in the earth’s oceans. Explore in your high-tech submarine fascinating spots like the Galapagos or the Deep Sea. Use your upgradeable tools to solve quests when you free jailed whales, or explore sunken WW2 battleships. Swim with majestic whales, sharks and sea turtles. And take real action to save the oceans.

games.name: Ragtag Heroes
games.description: Team up in Ragtag Heroes, a co-op roguelike deckbuilder for up to 3 players. Rally your party, craft powerful decks, and control the flow of battle as you face corrupted worlds that change every run! With new synergies, challenges, and surprises each time, no two adventures are ever alike.

games.name: Anlife: Motion-Learning Life Evolution
games.description: Intervene in the evolution of virtual lifeforms that learn to move in a world powered by a physics engine. This world already features built-in mechanisms like heredity and natural selection. The player acts as a creator, manipulating these natural processes to help lifeforms learn and evolve.

games.name: The Amazing Crackpots Club!
games.description: The Amazing Crackpots Club! is a fast-paced, action-packed magic duel in a 2D arena, where wizards throw powerful spells trying to destroy the opponent’s pots, while using mobility and defensive abilities to protect their own pots from incoming attacks.

games.name: Sisyphus Paradox
games.description: Sisyphus Paradox is a fusion of roguelike tactical elements with classic side-scrolling shoot 'em up gameplay. Explore and fight your way across the galaxy as you try to get back home to Earth in this hand drawn indie game.

games.name: Everwayne
games.description: Embark on a journey through the fading world of Everwane, unravel all of its secrets, untangle the personal stories of characters, collect various unique cards for each character, and battle your enemies.

games.name: Starsand Island
games.description: Leave the hustle of the city behind and embrace life on Starsand Island. Fish, farm, raise animals, and befriend or fall in love with locals to learn their secrets. Customize your world with our DIY system, and invite friends to help build your dream paradise!

games.name: Locked in my Darkness 2: The Room
games.description: A psychological horror walking sim set between realities—where the past never truly stays buried.

games.name: Romeo is a Dead Man
games.description:
Latest ultra-violent sci-fi action title from Grasshopper Manufacture and Suda51.

Step into the blood-soaked boots of Romeo Stargazer, a man pulled back from the brink of death by a time paradox gone wrong. Now reborn as Agent Dead Man of the FBI Space-Time Division, and armed with the mysterious Dead Gear mask, Romeo must chase the universe’s most dangerous fugitives across alternate realities.

Blending high-octane gunplay, brutal sword combat, and over-the-top sci-fi insanity, Romeo Is a Dead Man is GhM’s bloodiest action game yet. Players can expect mind-bending twists, outrageous gimmicks, and a deeply cathartic combat system that turns enemies’ powers against them in universe-shattering battles.

As Romeo tears through the multiverse, he’s also on a desperate quest to find Juliet, his mysteriously vanished girlfriend. With a narrative that fuses love, loss, and metaphysical chaos, Romeo Is a Dead Man offers a stylish and unpredictable journey through the very fabric of time itself.

Can you survive the bleeding edge of space-time? Or will you become just another ghost in the paradox?

games.name: Ballad: As the Music Goes
games.description: Ballad is a musical cosy 3rd person 3D adventure game. Explore several biomes, discover melodies in order to call, help, sooth, interact with the world and villagers around you thanks to your Kalimba ! Or just chill and jam in a colorful place, whatever you choose, magic of music awaits you !

games.name: Cinicross
games.description: CiniCross is a roguelike puzzle game set in a dark fantasy universe. Solve increasingly difficult nonogram puzzles, choose your path through a tree-like dungeon, and adapt your strategy using artifacts and items with unique effects. Each room is a new puzzle, each boss a challenge to overcome.

games.name: Ashes of War
games.description: Thrown into a century long war between the Union and the Kingdoms, a lone starship Captain decides to rebel against his fate. Join him in his galactic journey and discover the various stories that can still bloom in the Ashes of War...And flirting. A lot of flirting.

games.name: The Butcher's Village
games.description: The Butcher's Village is a psychological slasher horror game that provides a horrifying experience. Explore unsettling environments, solve intricate puzzles, and struggle to survive in a village that is at once eerily familiar and terrifyingly real.

games.name: Window Aquarista
games.description: Create your dream aquariums while you do other things in this relaxing idle game that sits on the bottom of your screen. Unlock new fish and watch them thrive with your help. All at your own pace.

games.name: Sunrise of the Time: End of Blue
games.description: Every step matters in “The Hunt,” the trial Gilens must face to become a soldier. A 2D action-adventure shaped by real-time combat, free exploration, and player-driven choices awaits you.

games.name: SoulUp
games.description: If you can climb, you can fight. Every step is survival, every fall a lesson a hardcore action adventure.

games.name: Tracebound
games.description: Tracebound is an atmospheric, fast paced, ice skating game. Slide and leap across the giant’s colossal body, shattering its shackles to restore nature’s movement.

games.name: Distance
games.description: Distance is a minimalist idle game where your keystrokes drive a lone starship forward through an endless stretch of space.

games.name: RogueFlip
games.description: RogueFlip is a perfect marriage of a logic puzzle with a roguelike deckbuilder! Deduce the right cards to flip to score points, dodging damaging bombs along the way, then power up your run with crazy run-bending trinkets and manipulate your cards with stickers and upgrades.

games.name: 101 Dogs Hidden in Tokyo
games.description: Join this adventure and discover the hiding places of 101 dogs in Tokyo in the hand-crafted landscape. Earn tons of achievements. How many can you find? Be quick!

games.name: Bloodsaint 2
games.description: BLOODSAINT 2 is the most recent, barely playable, fast-paced, retro-hardcore, top-down arena-shooter minigame from Walter Machado.

games.name: Xenus Bug Eater
games.description: Survive and evolve your carnivorous alien plant, defending and hunting bug swatter style. Adapt as you see fit. Be careful though, you can attract more prey than you can handle, and they will be just as happy to eat you.

games.name: Gore Sword
games.description: Gore Sword is a brutal and hilarious medieval combat simulation game driven by real physics! There are no elegant swordplay techniques here—only the most primitive, clumsy, and uproarious physical confrontations.

games.name: Super Astro Space Blast
games.description: Dodge asteroids attracted to your gravitational pull and use the profits generated from their collisions to unlock a variety of different spaceships with different abilities. Reach for High Scores to unlock unique skins for each ship.

games.name: Fugitive Free Rider
games.description: The chairman’s daughter ran away without doing her assignment. Join the group project, take down the troublemakers, and capture the chairman’s runaway daughter. A thrilling hack-and-slash “musou” action adventure with a cast of colorful, distinctive characters.

games.name: Fantasista Asuka
games.description: In this real-time soccer sim, play as the coach of a women's soccer team to guide your players to victory! Unlock new players and power up your team as you go through each match. Make your ideal team and go for the gold!!!

games.name: Car May Fly
games.description: Jump your WWII-era car across moving warplanes above the ocean. Spin, boost with nitro, dodge mines, lasers, turrets, tornadoes, and UFOs in a high-speed arcade race where the sky itself tries to stop you.

games.name: Security Breach
games.description: Monitor the surveillance feeds, log anything unusual, and alert the on-call team of oddity specialists who’ll handle the rest.

games.name: Diablo II: Resurrected – Infernal Edition
games.description: Rediscover the dark fantasy classic that defined the modern ARPG genre; fully remastered with a new class, fresh content, quality‑of‑life upgrades, and an overhauled endgame. Chain brutal skill and item synergies, rise in power, and carve through Hell's armies with up to eight players.

games.name: Imry
games.description: IMRY is an atmospheric isometric RPG set in the 1970s Soviet taiga, where your choices shape a story of survival, identity, and a reality that refuses to stay still.

games.name: Blemo
games.description: BLEMO! It’s a super-short, casual interactive story. You can talk to NPCs, walk across the tiny map, or try to solve our secret puzzle. We wanted to create a tiny, living world so let us know how we did! Soak in the five minutes of gameplay for as long as you like.

games.name: Fear Night Tales: Do You Like Coffee?
games.description: A young woman begins a night shift at a roadside coffee shop. What starts as ordinary days filled with coffee and cleaning slowly turns into a nightmare when she finds a strange message written on a napkin. A shocking story awaits you in Episode 2 of FEAR NIGHT TALES.

games.name: Selini
games.description: Collect the lost memories of the protagonist in a vast and ruined world, filled with ancient mysteries, minimal Cycladic islands and a forgotten metropolis that holds a dark secret.

games.name: Hordes of Hunger
games.description: Hordes of Hunger is a fast-paced action arena slasher with rogue-lite elements set in the dark fantasy setting of Ismer. A land engulfed by the living hunger, the cosmic horror known only as the Beast. You are the unlucky one still living inside the nightmare and the only way out is through it.

games.name: Bonnie Bear Saves Frogtime
games.description: Bonnie’s self-worth is at an all-time low, and there’s only one thing that can fix it - a lovely game of Frogtime! Grab your toadbag and get ready to go on a hilarious adventure full of quirky characters, explorable islands, and way too many frogs.

games.name: Clue: Murder By Death
games.description: A narrative adventure set in 1930s England. Immerse yourself in an adventure where knowing who, how and why will depend on your skills as a detective.

games.name: Sector Unknown
games.description: Sector Unknown is a solo-developed, isometric sci-fi RPG set in a shadowy expanse of space. Begin on a desolate planet, establish a stronghold, explore space, ally with or dominate local factions, and combat a despotic organization set on ruthlessly exploiting the sector's resources and inhabitants.

games.name: Chowdown Kitty
games.description: Meow we're talking! Chowdown Kitty is a Match 3 puzzle game where your goal is simple: Find treats and fill up the bowls of hundreds of adorable feline friends - then fill up your living room with a whole cat-alogue of kitties dressed up for the occasion!

games.name: ChromaGun 2: Dye Hard
games.description: Shoot paint, mix colors, and solve puzzles in this adventure about friendship and redemption. Just don't enter that portal to another universe, and everything will be perfectly fine.

games.name: Crimson Capes
games.description: Crimson Capes is a soulslike Action-RPG taking place in a Sword & Sorcery setting. Engage in fluid 2D pixel art swordplay, hunt witches, track monsters and experience the age of high adventure.

games.name: Rogue Point
games.description: From the creators of Black Mesa: Welcome to Rogue Point! A 4-player co-op shooter where teamwork is everything. Join forces on intense missions with evolving objectives and powerful upgrades. Plan, Adapt, and Overcome. Your squad’s survival depends on it.

games.name: Scaling Up
games.description: Become the owner of a snake ranch! As a small dragon, raise your ranch from the ground up. Gather and manage resources, build various facilities to house your snakes, make sure they are cared for to keep them happy, and collect their beautiful scales, to forge stronger equipment and scale up!

games.name: BrebeMan
games.description: Save the world with breakbeats.

games.name: Prop Haunt
games.description: Prop Haunt is a 4v1 multiplayer psychological horror game. Take on the role of spirits focused on expanding their influence on the physical world by haunting objects, or play as an investigator assigned to report on these hauntings to reduce the amount of paranormal activity in the world.

games.name: Dachs Hunter
games.description: Dachs Hunter is a survivors-like top-down roguelite game where you play as a dachshund wizard battling through hordes of elemental monsters. Discover and collect unique spells, master all elements, and strategize your way to survival.

games.name: Gooning Aim Trainer
games.description: Edge closer to victory while gooning! 33 unique sexy targets as well as videos to practice with!

games.name: Fields of Fortune
games.description:
In Fields of Fortune, you start out on a small island with just a few tools and the idea of building something from scratch. You plant crops, place buildings, and slowly turn your patch of land into a working little farm.

As you progress, you unlock new things: crafting tools, refining materials, and exploring other islands for rare resources. You can travel to the city to sell your goods or take on small tasks for extra rewards.

Animals are part of your farm too – you feed and water them, build pens, and collect what they produce. Whether you like to play at your own pace or plan things out for maximum efficiency is completely up to you.

games.name: Flan's BN
games.description: 《Flan's BN》is the prequel to 《Flan's MS》, which combines JRPG and deckbuilder mechanics. Experience Flan's story of self-discovery

games.name: Roadside Research
games.description: Roadside Research is a 1 to 4 player co-op gas station simulator. Except you’re aliens. And undercover. Do very human things like restocking shelves while preparing for the invasion. Just don’t get caught.

games.name: Pure Pool Pro
games.description: Welcome to Pure Pool Pro; the ultimate pool simulation. Play solo or online, master every game type, and compete in high-stakes tournaments in immersive venues. Experience breathtaking 8K native visuals, lifelike physics, and pinpoint-precise controls.

games.name: Killer Inn
games.description: A corpse has been found... and everyone is a suspect. You have been chosen to participate in a one-night-only game of death, deceit, and deduction. Will you be a wolf? Or perhaps a lamb with the means to fight back... In deception we trust.

games.name: The Seven
games.description: "The Seven" is a single-player roguelike auto-battler where virtue and sin clash. Endless growth. One shot at survival. Lead your army through the eternal war between good and evil.

games.name: Disciples: Domination
games.description:
Rule through the chaos! Fifteen years after Avyanna freed Nevendaar from the tyrannical grip of the gods, Disciples: Domination returns you to a realm hanging in the balance. In this dark fantasy strategy RPG with turn-based combat, take your place on Queen Avyanna’s throne – and attempt to hold together a crumbling kingdom.

The fire of doubt burns scorching within her, sparked by the crushing weight of the throne in Yllian and stoked by twisted dreams of becoming one of the very monsters she once defied – and destroyed. Paralyzed by fear and haunted by her own power, Avyanna’s rule begins to crack. Allies disappear and abandon her. An unknown force spreads strife and madness through her realm.

The choice is yours – shape the future, for salvation or ruin. As you chase the truths behind the ceaseless conflicts, dark magic and lurking conspiracies infecting your rotting empire, you’ll face betrayal, strife, and shadowy schemes. Uncover the long-lost Mountain Clans, witness the rise of an ancient cult and confront a corrupted seer whose visions have awoken bitter grudges, while old enemies are on the rise.

It will take all your courage to save Nevendaar. Are you brave enough to face – and embrace – its darkest truths?

games.name: Pillar of Salt
games.description: The deity of this world has decided to destroy it in three days. His avatar awaits the world's champion at the top of the Mountain of Power. Can you build up your strength in time and reach the mountain in this unique real-time tactical roguelike RPG?

games.name: Bomcat
games.description: Throw bombs and charge ahead! In this stage-clearing action game packed with respect for 80’s arcades, rescue the lady imprisoned in the factory!

games.name: Yakuza Kiwami 3 & Dark Ties
games.description: YAKUZA KIWAMI 3 is an extreme remake of the action-adventure beat 'em up Yakuza 3 featuring ex-yakuza Kazuma Kiryu's fight to protect those he loves. DARK TIES is a brand-new game featuring Yoshitaka Mine from Yakuza 3 included as a separate action-packed experience.

games.name: The Hull
games.description: Descend as a Fathomwalker into the ruined depths of a drowned world in this co-op horror dungeon-crawler FPS. Explore the subterrane with friends, uncover forgotten facilities, and survive what lurks beneath. The Hull awaits.

games.name: Heart of the Forest
games.description: An ill-fated hiking trip into the Black Forest spirals into a chilling fight for survival in this interactive horror adventure.

games.name: The Spiriting Away of Saooni Village
games.description: After Mako and Akane arrive at the village, the villagers gaze at them with eerie eyes. Will the two of them be able to leave this place safely?

games.name: Rogue AI: Idle Domination
games.description: A Rogue A.I. simulator that sits at the bottom of your screen. Take over the world while taking care of other tasks!

games.name: The Ice Cream Shop
games.description: You run a late-night ice cream shop, but your illness makes reality twist. Serve customers who may not be what they seem, and try to separate your mind’s visions from the horrors at your door.

games.name: Aura
games.description: Restore the cosmos. In this immersive RPG adventure for PC and VR, wield magic and steel to heal corrupted goddesses, dragons, demons, and fae. Journey through a shattered universe and uncover the mystery behind its destruction—your destiny is to bring it back to life.

games.name: Ride 6
games.description: Live the thrill of asphalt and dirt with RIDE 6: affirm your biker identity by joining RIDE Fest, race with 250+ bikes from different categories and prove you're the best by challenging real motorcycling legends.

games.name: Duolty
games.description: Duolty is a mystery, exploration and puzzle game developed by a single person. Dive into a strange world and befriend its curious inhabitants. Will you discover who you really are before it’s too late?

games.name: Umbranomicon
games.description: Umbranomicon is a full immersive experience! Because you get two in one: a VN and a fully animated dating simulator. You will have to dive into a mystical world of dangerous adventures to fight the Queen of Darkness and meet a lot of lonely girls, because men are extinct.

games.name: Log Riders
games.description: Join a fun adventure by rolling a log together! In this 2 player co-op platformer, become lumberjacks with your friend and keep your balance while moving forward on a log. Overcome obstacles by moving back and forth, reach the goal, and never give up. Knowing how to get back up matters.

games.name: Kitty Powers' Matchmaker Makeover
games.description: Kitty Powers' special brand of matchmaking returns in this remastered version of the viral sensation Kitty Powers' Matchmaker. It's time to make love happen, again!

games.name: Rise of Atom
games.description: A retro-futuristic, sci-fi, turn-based management RPG. Become the CEO of an R&D behemoth: hire scientists, woo investors, dabble in corporate espionage, and forge the science of tomorrow. Whether the technological wonders that emerge will save humanity—or doom it—is up to you.

games.name: Slither Realm
games.description: Help the snakes rest without disturbing each other by filling up the available space! Use your analytical skills to solve the puzzle and guide the snakes to their perfect resting spots.

games.name: Unstimulated Simulator
games.description: Feeling too stimulated? Then get unstimulated across a collection of 20 ‘minigames’ that turn mundane and anticlimactic tasks into a mundane and anticlimactic gaming experience.

games.name: StarShip Wars
games.description: Modern Release of Retro Sci-Fi Shoot'em Up Small Game in Arcade style !!! Take a role as pilot of Your spaceship and feel the 90's arcade games vibes in a new modern release. Defeat intergalactic alien riot and succed in this mission.

games.name: Hidden Cats 10: Valentines Day
games.description: Explore a mysterious paradise for lovers, find cute cats, and paint black-and-white locations with bright colors.

games.name: Mukuro no Rasen
games.description: Rogue-lite action with a Japanese dark fantasy style! Move and fight nimbly with simple one-stick, one-button controls. Grow stronger, death after death, and aim for the peak of the demon castle!

games.name: Brainrot Survivors
games.description: Fight your way through the endless waves of newer-gen memes by using older memes as your weapons. How long can you keep defeating them until your own brain turns to mush?

games.name: Can I Get an Iced Coffee with Breastmilk!?
games.description: Visit your favorite Bunny Girl, Muffin, and get the Ultimate Breast Milk treatment for your daily Coffee intake in this first person hentai short story! Make tits expand, make milk flow!

games.name: Enchain
games.description: Grapple, throw, and gib your fellow undead and navigate with masterful speed as you smash towards whatever sent you to the depths of the afterlife in this retro-inspired FPS action platformer.

games.name: Goodbye Dreaming
games.description: A visual novel dating simulator following Robin as she discovers herself and escapes her mother's shadow. Set in college this otome game features six romanceable characters, but be careful: not everyone has Robin's best interests at heart.

games.name: Bud Masters: Battle Edition
games.description: A weed lifestyle card deck building game. Play vs. a stoned AI or PvP. Satisfying and challenging CCG gameplay.

games.name: Lunar Ascendant
games.description: In Lunar Ascendant, a narrative-driven political simulation RPG, you lead Artemis, humanity's first lunar colony. You have to confront different factions in their struggle for power, and address the controversial use of human brains as CPUs. Your choices will shape the future of space colonization.

games.name: Reanimal
games.description: The creators of Little Nightmares I & II have returned to take you on a darker, more terrifying journey than ever before. In this horror adventure game, a brother & sister go through hell to rescue their missing friends and escape the island that they used to call home.

games.name: Fisherman Simulator
games.description:
Forge your path through the islands—Hunt for sea animals and other resources to make a profit. Buy and upgrade boats and fishing gear, and sail across the seas!
Tags

games.name: Love in an Enchanted Realm
games.description: Lost in a magical world where true love is your only escape - form powerful connections, outsmart deadly enemies, and resist the temptation of a dangerous villain who swears you're destined to be his.

games.name: Desert of Ash: a Post-Apocalyptic Gay Sex Simulator
games.description: The world has burnt to ash. Wander the wasteland, scavenge and trade for vital supplies, hook up with over a dozen hot guys, develop relationships—however fleeting—and decide how you want to live in this new world.

games.name: My Café Manager Simulator
games.description: Unleash your inner entrepreneur! Balance renovation, product selection, customer service, and outdoor ambiance to build the ultimate café experience and keep your customers coming back for more.

games.name: Curation
games.description: Build, customise, and expand your dream museum into a place of science and history, wonder and mystery.

games.name: Case Records: Lost Night
games.description: CASE RECORDS is a series of psychological horror games that are part of the CASE: Animatronics and CASE 2: Animatronics Survival universe.

games.name: Rescue Heli RH407
games.description: An arcade game with a retro vibe. Navigate a helicopter in 2.5D and rescue people waiting for transport. Don't overdo the aerial acrobatics -passengers might fall out! Land softly! And be quick -you're running out of fuel. The physical simulation of flight adds a modern twist to the retro gameplay.

games.name: Coldwake
games.description: Explore an abandoned facility in this narrative-driven terminal adventure. Unlock hidden files, solve text-based puzzles, and piece together a fragmented AI as you uncover the truth behind a failed salvation and a buried past in this cold, atmospheric mystery.

games.name: High on Life 2
games.description: An intergalactic conspiracy threatens the fate of humanity! Team up with a wide cast of talking alien guns as you shoot, stab, and skate your way through the exotic locales to take down the bad guys and save your favorite species (humans)!

games.name: Runeblight
games.description: Runeblight is a retro, souls-like FPS set in a dying kingdom. As an eternal curse eats away at those who remain, an unlikely gift allows you to break the shackles of fate. Find secrets and hidden paths as you explore an interconnected world, tearing through cultists and monsters along the way.

games.name: Arctic Digger TCG Collection
games.description: A cozy simulation game where you dig through the arctic to collect ores and trading card packs. Use what you find to produce new items, upgrade your tools, and hire penguins to help run your business. Expand your area and turn it into the top trading spot in the frozen north.

games.name: Monster Lab Simulator
games.description: Ready to become a mad scientist? Synthesize, evolve, and command an army of unique creatures in your own lab. Manage your laboratory, master genetic essences, and dominate the battle arena in this deep creature collection simulator!

games.name: Polyarmory: High Calibre Love
games.description: The world's only fully-loaded conspiracy theorist gun-nut dating simulation.

games.name: Ravy Davy: Attack on Ambiguity
games.description: Play as a washed-up rockstar Ravy Davy battling aliens, biker gangs, satanic cults and whackjobs in the desert town of Ambiguity—ruled by villain Margaret Doom, a chain-smoking OAP on a mobility scooter.

games.name: There's No Differences: Dragons
games.description: Ready to test your detective skills? Find the differences between two similar dragon-themed scenes!

games.name: No Entry
games.description:
This is a club bouncer simulator meant for the types with a dark sense of humor but deep empathy of the feeling of exclusion, social isolation, and desensitization of the pleasures of life. Decide who is worthy and unworthy, while factoring in the club's status and the bouncer's health. Dealing with losers and drunks can be a very stressful job, and there is a support system of a bartender(shop), DJ(information), bottle girl(opportunities), and a loveable, taller, older dominating boss(raison d'etre).

There is downtime to talk to these fellow employees, but occasionally the club can have a VIP who can also add lore to the experience of night life debauchery. But really, it's just scanning, and making decisions. Occasionally, there will be an attendant who will protest their refusal of entry. They can be denied again, or force can be used. Sometimes they are willing to bribe, which there are no negative consequences in the short run, but may devalue the club's atmosphere in the long run. Survive 10 nights without dying or the club closing down due to an incompetent bouncer.

games.name: ClusterCluck
games.description: ClusterCluck is a chaotic murder mystery game where not everyone is what they seem. Collect clues, complete tasks, deceive others and talk your way to safety. Whether hunting as a fox or surviving as a chicken, every player has unique skills that can change the game. Trust no one… and cluck wisely.

games.name: Deda
games.description: Old crazy grandfather trapped you in his house... You have 3 difficulties to choose. Try to escape DEDA's house...

games.name: Devinica: Clip
games.description: Bite sized AI simulation.

games.name: Just Another Boomer Shooter
games.description: Take the role of Tommy Gunn (no relation) as he's forced to pass a series of maniacally (and hastily) made "Levels" in order to get more views on Twitch for his new Pal/Drill Sergeant/Gamemaster Solid P. Chip.

games.name: Sky Mates
games.description: Sky Mates is a turn-based, multiplayer-only 1v1 tactics game in which you assemble a team of deadly steampunk pirates to gain control over a crumbling airship.

games.name: Jambredrek: Two Guns
games.description: A first-person action-adventure set in the 1990s. Play as a corrupt police officer as you move through story-driven locations, investigate crime scenes, and make morally questionable choices.

games.name: Bashers
games.description: Gather items and kill endless waves of enemies! Level-up, unlock characters with different abilities, powerups, items and locations!

games.name: Gobliins6
games.description: Gobliins6 - The Prince Buffoon - The Madmen of the Year 1000 Point'nClick adventure game in 2D, large scenery in 16/9th. French and English versions. 16 great levels packed with puzzles, characters, music and humor. A great adventure for all ages.

games.name: The Empathy Algorithm
games.description: Are you an android? Two university students volunteer for a paid experiment, rating an android's humanity—except Erin Cole isn’t told she might be the test subject. Their conversations about love, free will, and death challenge what it means to be human in this thrilling, melancholic visual novel.

games.name: BumSlayer
games.description: BumSlayer is a fast-paced hack’n’slash - action arena brawler where only the toughest survive. Fight through stages, facing waves of dirty street bums and powerful bosses that stand in your way.

games.name: Resultare
games.description: Drop into the chaotic thrill of Resultare, a pachinko rouguelike where precision and chaos collide! Smash through colorful boards, build powerful combos, and chase high scores as you fight your way to victory one bounce at a time.

games.name: Forgotten VIlla
games.description: Forgotten Villa is a first-person story-driven horror experience set inside a massive forestside villa you recently inherited from your late uncle. What begins as a simple weekend trip with friends slowly turns into something far more unsettling after you wake up alone inside the house with no explanation, and no one left to talk to except the villa’s quiet caretaker.

games.name: Hentai Spacegirl
games.description: Hentai Spacegirl is an erotic puzzle game set in a glowing sci-fi universe. Solve puzzles to unlock seductive, high-quality artwork of a beautiful space explorer in cosmic, neon-lit scenes.

games.name: Rayman: 30th Anniversary Edition
games.description: Perform Rayman’s signature punch and helicopter hair glide through colorful worlds, from the Dream Forest and its unforgettable mosquito ride to Band Land’s musical chaos. Rescue the Electoons and save the world from Mr. Dark in a classic platforming adventure that remains as magical today as it was in the 90s.

games.name: PC Building Nightmare
games.description: PC Building Nightmare is a co-op horror survival game for 1-4 players. Before the RAM crisis hits, carry the computer parts you found cheaply for your internet cafe and build the PCs. Get the job done and just don't get caught by the obsessive governess!

games.name: Far a Night
games.description: You wake up alone in the depths of an abandoned sewer with only basic gear to keep you alive. Something went terribly wrong and it’s not done with you yet. Face relentless horrors, solve environmental puzzles, and fight your way through an inhospitable world in this action horror FPS game.

games.name: Mr. Flesh Flam
games.description: Mr. Flesh Flam is a single-player psychological horror game. When a mysterious person stuck in the line between reality and mentality gets lonely, he creates his own friends out of flesh and needles.

games.name: DJ Bunny
games.description: DJ Bunny is a 2D music-puzzle adventure where you craft songs by solving grid-based challenges. Take requests from quirky townsfolk, build beats, and help DJ Bunny chase her dream of performing at the legendary Hippity Hop Music Festival!

games.name: Aroya Knight
games.description: Aroya Knight is a demanding 2D Metroidvania action-platformer. Master punishing, precision combat where every encounter matters and explore the dying world of Cygnus. Collect charms, pick a path each time, and connect to Lola’s and Lucy’s story.

games.name: Absolved
games.description: Would you go through Hell if it meant freedom? Faced with the choice of serving the rest of a life sentence or playing nightguard for a week. You thought the choice was an easy one to make. You couldn't be more wrong.

games.name: Cellchemist
games.description: Solve carefully crafted puzzles and experiment with over 100 cells in this physics sandbox where every pixel is simulated.

games.name: Dystopian Pet Simulator
games.description: A grim exploration-driven pet simulator set in a broken world. Master platforming, optimize pet modifiers, upgrade your body, and advance through a dystopia where survival comes at a cost.

games.name: Pawffice
games.description: Pawffice is a story-driven, strategy roguelike game. Coon, an average college grad. He has to use his unique ability, "Rock-Paper-Scissors" to defeat all sorts of strange enemies. After countless do-overs , can he save himself and his friends, and uncover all the secrets behind Pawffice?

games.name: O2Jam: The Beginning
games.description: O2Jam : The Beginning is the official PC version based on O2Jam - Music & Game, featuring the entire series collection. Enjoy legendary original tracks, overwhelming note impact, and various key modes! From nostalgic classics to new hits, experience the authentic rhythm action of O2Jam.

games.name: Trailer Game
games.description: Reversing a trailer is tough in real life, this game takes the challenge to the extreme. Traverse tight corners, uneven terrain and narrow bridges in this ultimate test of skill and determination.

games.name: Berserker 2: The Saga of Hilde
games.description:
A Father's Wrath. A Sister's Prophecy. A Child Lost to the Shadows.
Step into the blood-soaked boots of Asbjorn, a fallen warrior consumed by vengeance, in Berserker 2: The Saga of Hilde — a brutal side-scrolling action game that blends cinematic storytelling, intense melee combat, and a haunting Nordic world torn by myth, sorrow, and violence.

This is not just a sequel. It’s a reckoning.

games.name: Mercenary Leto
games.description: A science-fantasy action platformer with a nostalgic pixel look. Travel the galaxy with a cast of memorable and endearing characters, ride one fluffy dragon, and stumble onto a plot to stop dragon poachers.

games.name: The Darkness Below
games.description: Embark on an epic journey into "The Darkness Below", a homage to the golden era of 90's cRPGs, with grid-based movement, turn-based combat and 2.5D perspective. Wander a vast and colorful fantasy world filled with puzzles, exotic creatures, forgotten dungeons and ancient guardians.

games.name: Eldabyss
games.description: A fast-paced, bloody, gothic, and stylish platformer video game about saving the mortal realm from the wrath of Hell's armies.
