games.name: Another Day with You
games.description: Another Day with You is an adventure game featuring mini-games galore. Explore this quiet corner of the city - time passes as you play, whether you are talking to locals, playing hide and seek, or at the arcade. Will you leave your date waiting? Did you bring flowers? It's Another Day with You.

games.name: Dino Ramen Express
games.description: From RAMEN to RIFLES! This is an immersive first-person simulation game where players can run their own restaurant empire. The game allows players to devise their own business strategies, from hands-on "guns & blazing" food delivery in the open world to staff management at stores.

games.name: ZetaZania Part 1: Vampire Pirates from Uranus
games.description: Blast off to ZetaZania, a massive alien space station ruled by wicked Vampire Pirates. Dive into a 2D side-scrolling, action-filled quest to wipe out the horrors haunting Uranus. Packed with retro pixel art, an original electronic score, tricky puzzles, and a dose of cheeky British humour.

games.name: Love Blades and Run
games.description: Viva la Revolution—tear through a parkour action game where every move is rebellion, every fight is a swift flair, and style rules the streets.

games.name: Reborn: Examine Again
games.description: "Reborn: Examine Again" is a Roguelike game that mainly offers the experience of deck building. What you need to do is to select the appropriate cards to add to your deck and then wait for the wonderful chemical reactions they produce.

games.name: No More Furries
games.description: Hordes of Werewolves siege the world and you alone must find out how to stop it. Fight in a Singleplayer Round-based Shooter as you fight off waves of enemies. Only the strongest can survive the longest in this action packed game.

games.name: Donna Survivors
games.description: A cute and chaotic survivors-like action game set in the world of Donna! Play as lovable characters, combine wild abilities, defeat bosses, and survive hordes of enemies across 6 unique maps.

games.name: Zombie Emperor
games.description: A top-down zombie slaughter defense adventure game. Players use skills, talent trees, unique weapons, and weapon upgrades to hold the ultimate defensive line, frantically clearing wave after wave of rotting undead under the blood moon curse. From ordinary Qin soldiers to immortal war gods.

games.name: Crystal Clear, Mail's Here
games.description: Crystal Clear, Mail's Here, is a cute gem matching game about a little delivery girl named Ruby.

games.name: Niramare Quest: Saving a World That Loves Hating Me
games.description: Reincarnate as a man in a misandrist world in this classic turn-based RPG! Meet colorful characters, fight your way through many dungeons, and unravel the mysteries of a story that hides much more than meets the eye. Do you have what it takes to save a world where everybody hates you?

games.name: Miners' Union
games.description: Miners' Union is an incremental game. Mine coal, upgrade, fight off busters and grow the union.

games.name: Insert Coin: Arcade Party
games.description: Insert Coin: Arcade Party is a chaotic online multiplayer party game packed with 30+ fast-paced arcade minigames. Face friends in rapid rounds of reflex, timing, and word battles. Insert coin. Let the chaos begin.

games.name: Sakura Gozen
games.description: In Ouma, samurai Sakura Ouka, jobless and foolish, loses her home. She aids Suzune, sparking a quest to revive the Sakura Style. They aim for the Gozenjiai, facing trials in a Japanese-style action RPG. Complete requests, build reputation, and master thrilling battles to win!

games.name: The Plant
games.description: Интерактивная история про ученого-отшельника, с которым заговорил его подопытный цветок. Настраивая характеристики выбора ответа, результат приведет вас к одной из нескольких окончаний.

games.name: Sanguo's Ambition 4: Three Kingdoms
games.description: The world's first competitive SLG strategy game with real-time matchmaking for multiplayer battles. In 《Three Kingdoms Ambition 4》 you can experience the unique journey of starting as a small faction and growing into a powerful warlord during the turbulent Three Kingdoms era.

games.name: Doom Spiral
games.description: DOOM SPIRAL is an intense first person shooter where your health is the integrity of your consciousness.

games.name: Necromance
games.description: A brave hero and a bound lich rescue a legendary warrior from a forgotten tomb and put the romance back in necromancy. Necromance is a dark fantasy comedy visual novel with light puzzle elements, 3 endings, and 15 ways to die!

games.name: Flag-O-Tron
games.description: FLAGOTRON is a unique flagbuilder roguelike. No cards—just flags and strategy. Place flags, move them with chess pieces, build combos, and battle bosses.

games.name: Pray or Die: Tactical Defense
games.description: PRAY OR DIE is a game that combines the genres of survivor-like, tower defense, MOBA, and action roguelite. Players must build defense towers on the island, equip their sailboat with weapons, and pray to Guardian Spirits for powerful blessings to protect the island from invaders and corruption.

games.name: Paint on Paint TD
games.description: A tower defence that blend the chaos of bullet hell with the strategy of a tower defence. Yours tower damages enemies — but also you — forcing constant awareness and balance. No two runs play the same, with random upgrade paths and map layouts that demand fresh strategies each time.

games.name: Nice City
games.description: Welcome to Nice City. This is a beautifully crafted, emotionally rich third-person open-world shooter. The people here are simple and honest, the place is endowed with fine spirits – if you encounter any strange characters, they might have traveled from "Return to Campus".

games.name: The Complex Chapter 1: Who, What, Where?
games.description: Wake up in a trashed apartment and investigate mysterious disappearances. Solve challenging puzzles, interact with others, and confront a terrifying boss. Your choices lead to one of five unique endings in this tense, atmospheric puzzle-horror game

games.name: The Night Cleaner
games.description: Night shift office cleaning. All that greets you, a new hire, is a dirty floor… and a formless sense of unease. In the silent floors above, something is unmistakably moving.

games.name: Rooms
games.description: This is a walking horror game in which players explore rooms and identify strange anomalies.

games.name: Cold Calling
games.description: Operate a telephone switchboard, meet caricatured historical figures, and avert a nuclear war in this alternate history Cold War comedy. Use tactile point-and-click controls to drag wires and install wacky gadgets as you juggle waves of calls.

games.name: The Last Citadel
games.description: The Last Citadel is a Roguelike, Role-Based, Third-Person shooter. Embark in an expedition to uncover artifacts inside a Citadel suspended above a black hole where many challenges and deadly encounters await. Explore the ever-changing citadel alone, or with a group of up to 4 players.

games.name: Seclusa
games.description: You're a wildlife photographer staying at a cozy, secluded safari lodge in East Africa. Spend time relaxing at scenic outlooks, snapping photos of local wildlife, and working your way through a variety of upgrades and unlockables in this laid-back photography sandbox.

games.name: Life After End
games.description: Life After End is a harsh and cruel representative of the Survival Horror genre, where you have to survive in post-apocalyptic Siberia. Be prepared for harsh climatic conditions and realistic gameplay.

games.name: Together Tree: Romance 911
games.description: Together Tree: Romance 911 is a relationship application for married couples looking to stimulate love, affection, romance and intimacy in their relationship. Complete daily challenges, complete session evaluations and have a great time rating each other's progress as they rate and review your own.

games.name: Dobbel Dungeon
games.description: Gather your party, roll your dice and embark on a quest to discover why the local wildlife has suddenly turned evil! No two adventures are the same in this dice-powered tactical RPG!

games.name: Kitchen Delights
games.description: Kitchen Delights is an exciting cooking game that will put your culinary skills to the test, where you can be a chef in a restaurant or a burger joint, creating delicious dishes. With a touch of chaos and lots of fun.

games.name: Book Smugglers
games.description: Join the courageous underground network of Book Smugglers in a grim decision-making, point-and-click, resource-management adventure as they risk everything to preserve their cultural heritage and ignite a flame of resistance.

games.name: Teenage Wasteland
games.description: Teenage Wasteland is a hugely detailed, open world RPG set in the early 2000's! With over a hundred perks, dozens of cliques to help/harass, and hundreds of choices, you can be the teen YOU want to be...

games.name: Space Game
games.description: In a vast universe where nothing is familiar, you must use your knowledge to progress and learn how to survive. Upgrade your spaceship and explore to your heart's content, or destroy everything that comes your way, all in classic retro style.

games.name: Astrobotanica
games.description: Discover Earth 300 thousand years ago as an alien biologist. Utilize your expertise in botany to survive, grow plants, harvest crops, compose and brew tonics. Reveal hidden powers of unknown plants. Engage with primal humans, leaving your mark on the future of civilization.

games.name: An Abyss of Dreams
games.description: Two worlds, one nightmare. Explore a gruesome orphanage, solve puzzles related to an inexplicable phenomenon, and dive into the depths of dreams to uncover otherworldly horrors. An Abyss of Dreams is a cosmic horror point-and-click game set during the Great Darkness.

games.name: Stormbridge
games.description: Build a bridge settlement while outrunning an impending storm in this roguelite city builder. Unlock upgrades and pets between runs as you unravel the storm's origin. Can you survive and build the longest self-sufficient bridge?

games.name: Screaming Head
games.description: You are a head and you have two feet, four wives, one house and a retirement fund. Unfortunately, your body is a jealous type. One day it attacks you and takes... everything! Well go ahead and scream your way through an eclectic gallery of various body parts to get your darlings back. AAAAAAAAAAAAA!

games.name: Hamstermind
games.description: Play as the legendary explorer Hamster Jones and explore a mysterious pyramid while solving the puzzles hidden within.

games.name: Wanko Wanko Adventure
games.description: A resort hotel where everything has been squared away by a mysterious virus. A dog's great adventure to clear the cubes in closed rooms and search for his stray family!

games.name: Wish Me Well
games.description: Craft magical weapons. Uncover synergies. Unleash your creativity. A top-down weapon-building roguelite dungeon crawler. Jump into the Magic Well, gather powerful scrolls, build your magical weapon and fight unique ink monsters your way!

games.name: Might & Magic Fates: The Trading Card Game
games.description: The Sea of Fates emerged from the destruction caused by apocalyptic events across the Might & Magic worlds, a chaotic multiverse where fragments of order fight to survive. This realm draws heroes and creatures from all eras into its swirling conflict. Among them, Sandro, the necromancer, uses the power of chaos and order to summon a void of nothingness, threatening to consume all existence. As players clash in battles for survival and dominance, they unknowingly play into Sandro’s dark designs, shaping the destiny of the multiverse.

games.name: 100 Cats Lost in Space Find & Color
games.description: Explore 10+ space-themed maps and find 1,000+ hidden cats in 100 Cats Lost In Space: Find & Color! Enjoy guided color-by-numbers or free coloring modes. Play solo or local co-op in a relaxing cosmic adventure.

games.name: Soukh
games.description: Discover Soukh - a Middle Eastern-inspired fantasy shopkeeping and strategy game. Run a chaotic bazaar with demanding customers, dispatch caravans and conquer challenges to gather exotic loot. Guide an exiled merchant’s rise. Will the sands lift him to glory… or bury him in stories left untold?

games.name: Alien Morgue
games.description: Sci-fi pathologist simulator. Identify aliens, detect damages, and perform autopsies to determine the cause of death. Choose to follow protocols or fulfill special requests when handling bodies and their stuff. Your choices may have global consequences.

games.name: Table Battle Simulator
games.description: Assemble your own figure collection! Open surprise boxes, collect legendary warrior figures, and join tabletop battles against rivals in the city. Upgrade your warriors and become the owner of the strongest collection in town. A world full of strategy and excitement awaits you!

games.name: Home Before Winter
games.description: Single Player coming soon! -- Mobilize your troops and start your journey towards world domination. Get into the trenches and shoot incoming soldiers in this WW1 inspired shoot'em up, turn based, strategy game.

games.name: Woofy Run
games.description: Woofy Run is a multiplayer dog racing game where speed, strategy, and sabotage come together. Set traps, avoid obstacles, and race to be one of the top 10 fastest players on every map! Select your favourite dog and join the race!

games.name: Tower of Jank
games.description: Create game-breaking card combos to survive relentless hordes. Tower of Jank is a chaotic top-down action roguelite card-battler where you build overpowered decks, collect relics, and fight through ever-harder stages. You can stop time to plan your moves or let your cards play automatically.

games.name: Chicken Fries
games.description: Chicken Fries is a first-person restaurant simulator where you run a fast-food kitchen: prepare meals by hand, manage fryers and inventory, serve customers, and survive the daily chaos of a busy restaurant, one chicken at a time.

games.name: Cubettiny
games.description: Cubettiny is a fast-paced 2.5D arcade game where you guide a sad blue cube through low-poly levels filled with obstacles, traps, and power-ups. Collect cubes, complete chains, unlock hidden paths, use power-ups, and push through each stage to bring order back to Numeria!

games.name: Sewercide
games.description: Trapped in a bunker connected to an old sewer, you must survive a few days before the creature lurking below finds you. Explore dark tunnels, gather key items, solve environmental puzzles, and uncover what happened underground before “it” finally devours you.

games.name: 101 Dogs Hidden in Madrid
games.description: Join this adventure and discover the hiding places of 101 dogs in Madrid in the hand-crafted landscape. Earn tons of achievements. How many can you find? Be quick!

games.name: Assassin of Dragon
games.description: Play as warrior woman in this small medieval themed rpg game. Mission to find big flying dragon and beat it and collect skull. Beware also zombie enemies

games.name: Under the Island
games.description: A 2D Action RPG set in a fantasy world inspired by the 1990s. Explore an island, fight monsters, solve puzzles and uncover the mystery of an ancient civilization. Help the inhabitants and interact with the plants and animals of the island.

games.name: The Slaverian Trucker
games.description: The Slaverian Trucker is a Survival/Truck/Life simulator game. Make enough money to survive and expand your wealth in the harsh semi-post apocalyptic lands of Slaveria, doing legal and illegal work, while maintaining, fixing, building, repairing, tuning your trucks, cars and other vehicles.

games.name: An Action Roguelite For When You Have 20 Minutes to Spare
games.description: An Action Roguelite For When You Have 20 Minutes to Spare because you gotta leave soon and there's no game you can squeeze in so you play this. Be careful not to lose track of time and miss your appointments.

games.name: Forgotlings
games.description: Forgotlings is a breathtaking cinematic action-adventure set in a magical land of sentient forgotten objects.

games.name: Kill the Witch
games.description: The time when humans gave up being happy to be no longer unhappy and became 'bugs'. The story of a witch who smashes everything with a baseball bat tightly in her hand.

games.name: Fate's Theater
games.description: A mischievous micro-tales toy where Fortune and Misfortune vie to twist mortal lives into short, rhyming couplets of bright serendipities… or gleefully gruesome doom.

games.name: Placid Plastic Deck: A Quiet Quest
games.description: A wholesome game where you can’t die. A relaxing and witty adventure featuring colorful pixel-art locations, peculiar characters, quirky dialogues, elements of deck-building card battles, and a lot of ducks. A tale of friendship and revenge!

games.name: Palpus X: Annihilation
games.description: An isometric brutal horde shooter with light RPG elements. Kill tons of aliens, find over a dozen weapons, skill up your character & unveil the secrets of an abandoned research lab!

games.name: Boiiing Boiiing
games.description: Boiiing Boiiing is a physics-based party game up to 5 players in local, where you play as animals that chase each other using pogo sticks and unique powers.

games.name: Norse: Oath of Blood
games.description:
Norse is a turn-based tactics and combat game for PC and console. Set against the rich backdrop of the Viking Age, join Gunnar, a young warrior, on a relentless quest for revenge across the rugged landscapes of Norway.

Build a thriving settlement, govern your community, forge alliances, grow strong, and win the favour of the gods. For this is a time when legends are forged in the fires of conflict, and only the brave are remembered.

Written by prize-winning and Sunday Times bestselling author Giles Kristian, Norse is set in a fully realised historical world, driven by a compelling narrative and brimming with memorable characters.

games.name: Ritual Party
games.description: In Ritual Party you get to summon Cthulhu with your friends! Work together (or not) with 1-4 players to perform wild rituals, unlocking cosmic horrors from the Cthulhu mythos. Chaotic party game where summoning eldritch beings is only half the fun!

games.name: Eutolant Saga
games.description:
Eutolant Saga is a classic-style tactical simulation RPG developed and published by Oistar Games, released in early access on September 7, 2025 for PC.

The game is set in the fantasy world of Eutolant, where players follow a war chronicle story that spans multiple continents. Players command a party of units across varied maps and engage in turn-based strategy battles that emphasize tactical positioning and unit skills.

Key gameplay systems include a traditional weapon and magic rock-paper-scissors style affinity, movement skills that influence battlefield strategy, and a wound system in which defeated allies become injured and withdraw, causing temporary setbacks without permanent loss. Difficulty options allow players to tailor the challenge to their preferences.

The game also features a large cast of characters, encouraging diverse unit growth and personalized strategies as players progress through the narrative.

Although it is in Early Access, the game is playable through to the ending. Future updates are planned to include enhancements to the New Game Plus features and the album functionality.

games.name: Aerial_Knight's DropShot
games.description: Aerial_Knight’s Dropshot is a high-speed, stylized FPS / Race where you play as Smoke Wallace. As a kid, he was bitten by a radioactive dragon, turning his skin purple and giving him the power to fire bullets from his fingertips. Thrown into deadly sky battles for revenge, you race rivals, fight dragons, move fast, shoot smart, and look cool when you land.

games.name: Roach Post
games.description: Restore an abandoned post office by order of the Royal Postal Academy! Welcome customers, send packages, hire cute little roach-workers and pass Inspectors’ checks in an incredibly addictive roguelite puzzle Roach Post!

games.name: Broom and Boom
games.description: Blast goblins with gunpowder and magic as you ride your assortment of broom and broom-like apparatuses in this twin stick arcade shooter. Customize your witch and cackle for Victory!

games.name: Jeff the Skinner
games.description: You have to escape Jeff`s house.. You have five days. Jeff the skinner is a scary horror game where you must escape from a sinister Jeff. Test your wits, stealth, and survival skills in an intense, immersive experience. Navigate through a terrifying environment, feeling the suspense at every step.

games.name: Heart Idler
games.description: Heart Idler is a clicker/idle game where you start with nothing and build your way up to a vast collection of hearts! Click to generate hearts, invest them in powerful upgrades, and watch your heart count soar. Can you unlock all the upgrades and achieve the ultimate collection of hearts?

games.name: Fallsaga
games.description: FALLSAGA! The journey of Marcel in search of a legendary waterfall!

games.name: Beyond the Doors
games.description: An atmospheric horror, exploration and automation game all set in the dim halls of an apartment building.

games.name: Hold the Mine
games.description: Explore and defend your mine against waves of monsters in this innovative roguelike survival game! Collect and manage your resources, discover buildings with unique effects and unleash mighty heroes to hold monsters out of the mine until the sun rises.

games.name: Modo Modo
games.description: A 2D/3D hybrid rogue-lite card game. Top demon realm streamers Momo & Dodo face a mysterious network crash that drives all demons mad! After receiving "Dr. M's" salvation card deck, they battle via live-streams to save fans. Uncover the realm's truth through animated story chapters & multi-endings.

games.name: Darkward
games.description: Dark, surreal point-and-click text adventure inspired by the poetics of Dark Souls. Guide the Wanderer through ruins and tombs in a purgatorial world.

games.name: Liturnian
games.description: Discover a strange world inhabited by living lights. Liturnian is a 3D-Metroidvania with fluid movement, fights against strange creatures and exciting puzzles.

games.name: Defend Against Cats
games.description:
In Defend Against Cats, each level represents a desperate work day before a looming deadline. Waves of mischievous cats sneak in, scratch your monitor, knock your mouse around, and sprawl across your keyboard, steadily destroying your productivity.
To stop them, you place food bowls, feeders, and toy-based defenses around your room. Hungry cats can be fed and sent away, while satisfied cats must be distracted with toys before they start tearing your setup apart. Different cats behave differently, with faster, greedier, and larger cats appearing as the invasion escalates day by day.

games.name: Lightsaver
games.description: A free-to-play single-player 2D physics puzzle game where you rotate a light launcher and place water, glass, and mirrors to bend beams into a glowing door.

games.name: TanCrush
games.description: Harvest resources, fend off incoming enemies, and build your own squad through an endless cycle of combat and progression.

games.name: Carmencarmen
games.description: You wake up on the beach, with water crashing against your body. You don't remember anything, you don't know where you are, and everything hurts. The meaningless mass of flesh and metal seems to be breathing... it doesn't make sense, but it's breathing...

games.name: Rummy Odyssey
games.description: Rummy Odyssey combines the mechanics of Rummy and Rummikub with Roguelike and Deckbuilding elements. Defeat chance with strategy, manage your deck, and unleash powerful Jokers. Adapt to shifting rules, manage your economy, and survive challenging Boss Stages.

games.name: SnowBot
games.description: Silence, cold, solitude… What lies ahead? A small atmospheric adventure about a robot lost in a frozen wasteland.

games.name: The Wrong Floor
games.description: Trapped in a mysterious hotel, you must observe, decide, and take risks. Use your points and abilities to descend faster… if you dare.

games.name: Omni Kitty
games.description: This is an action based flappy game turned up to eleven. In the main arcade mode the player is unlocked and able to flap around the length of the screen dodging obstacles, fighting enemies and engaging a stage boss at the end of every level. This is a fully flushed out flappy game.

games.name: Ling and the Corrupted Hollow
games.description: Explore a mythical world of a lost paradise as you help Ling and the spirits cleanse the home of the Hollow Woods in our third-person puzzle platforming game. With your spirits by your side, find the four soul shards and restore balance to the corrupted hollow.

games.name: Pip's Potion Shop
games.description: With your shop on the line, meet unique characters and craft potions of every flavor in this short, light-hearted game. From giant constructs to quirky little creatures, listen to their troubles and mix the right ingredients to create a potion that soothes their hearts and satisfies their cravings!

games.name: The Dream Office
games.description: Welcome to "The Dream Office," an immersive game that allows you to step into the shoes of a master office designer and renovator. Prepare to embark on a thrilling journey where you'll transform drab and cluttered workspaces into stunning, productive havens that would make anyone's dreams come true.

games.name: Towerbolt
games.description: Towerbolt is a fast paced vertical platformer set in the year 239X. Race to the top of a cyberpunk Megatower while outrunning lethal security lasers on every floor!

games.name: Fur Squadron Phoenix
games.description: Embark on an action-packed adventure in this on-rails space shooter. As a trainee pilot, you will fight in strange virtual worlds. Master your ship, upgrade your skills and protect the federation from an imminent threat. Are you up for the challenge?

games.name: Weeny Wise
games.description: Embark your adventure with your companion in Weeny Wise. Invite a friend to join you for free in the magical world of Weeny Wises with Friend’s Pass and continue the story of Anneli and Hugo.

games.name: College Diaries
games.description: College Diaries is a simulation game set against the backdrop of college life. Players take on the role of a college freshman, shaping their college career by choosing different majors, joining various clubs, participating in campus activities.

games.name: Insider Trading
games.description: Insider Trading is a roguelike deckbuilder where you bend the market to your will. Synergize perks, manipulate stock prices, and trade wisely or risk pricing yourself out.

games.name: Menherarium
games.description:
This game is a deck-building roguelite where you must keep winning blood-staked Cee-lo against a super clingy girl.

Modify the dice faces, use cheating items when necessary, and overcome her unreasonable demands to win the bets.

Your goal is to survive the life-and-death Cee-lo.

games.name: Blaze of Storm
games.description: Blaze of Storm is a vertical scrolling shmup in which you use explosions from a variety of sub weapons to destroy enemies in cyberspace.

games.name: Star Trek: Voyager - Across the Unknown
games.description: Star Trek Voyager: Across the Unknown is a story-driven survival strategy game in which the fate of the iconic starship is in your hands. Take the helm, manage the ship and resources, and make difficult decisions. Will you be able to bring home the ship and its crew?

games.name: The Killing Stone
games.description: Beat the Devil at his own game. The Killing Stone is a deckbuilding card battler wrapped in a 17th century folk horror narrative. Clean the sins of a cursed family by bargaining against a series of demons - and outwitting the Devil himself.

games.name: 3 Nights of Terror
games.description: 3 Nights of Terror lets you dive into the Nightmare-driven Dreams of Police Officer Scott Harris, who suffers from an extreme form of Parasomnia. Guide him through his horrifying dreams and survive the Nightmares to ensure he wakes up in the morning.

games.name: Swimpossible!
games.description: Move each limb separately to swim against the current and avoid difficult obstacles in Swimpossible!

games.name: Strange Brew
games.description: Escape zombies and chase coffees! Run to survive the horrific launch of a new pumpkin spice latte. Play as Joe the Duck, a mascot, who must outmaneuver and outwit the brainless mobs. Destroy the company town to win some peace with your morning cup.

games.name: Debris
games.description: A science based builder with event-driven story set in Mars' orbit. Extract scarce resources from debris and build your drone and station to survive. Space isn't against you it is just brutal. Build your drone, clean the orbit, save Mars.

games.name: Gumball in Trick-or-Treat Land
games.description: A nostalgic JRPG love letter to the Game Boy Color era! Gumball in Trick-or-Treat Land is a lighthearted adventure with challenging turn-based combat. Explore a mysterious world, take on tough opponents, and save the day in a game designed to charm all ages!

games.name: Revolgear Zero
games.description: Shizuku and Akane...two pilots bound by rivalry and friendship battle to save their world from malevolent cosmic forces! A classic arcade style shmup with deeply satisfying fast paced combat, wide variety of load-out combos, and even local co-op!

games.name: Dungeon Trail
games.description: A role playing game where you gamble with human lives. Roll dice, change fate.

games.name: Go Ape Ship!
games.description: Go Ape Ship! is a frantic co-op multiplayer game for one to eight players. Work with your crew of daring Astrochimps to master an expanding collection of tasks, respond to emergencies, unlock new rooms and upgrades for your spaceship, and safely reach the stars. Survive together. Or not at all.

games.name: Yume Roof
games.description: Yume Roof is a sandbox slow-life game where you customize a voxel-style Japanese rooftop with furniture, colors, crafting, and dress-up. Gather materials, trade items, and improve your Cozy and Nature values to unlock new recipes through the dreams you see at night.

games.name: Two Tired to Mountain
games.description: A cyclical jaunt. Pilot a bicycle vertically to the peak of a frozen mountain tower! Platform with the power of momentum and rage to reach the summit!

games.name: Boomerang Survivor 3
games.description: The action of controlling the boomerang has been powered up! Defeat the evil "Dark Acero" and aim to escape from the spaceship "Magenta Jolokia". It's even more fun with two-player mode, new items, gimmicks, a challenge battle mode, and more! There is also a "Easy Mode" for beginners.

games.name: Ayin
games.description: Ayin, a surreal speedrun-rage-troll-platformer where you platform across many tough levels and uncover secrets of a world that hates you.

games.name: The Forgotten Castle
games.description: Play as an old man who wakes up in a mysterious castle full of magic and danger. Explore every corner of the castle and discover what is hidden between the walls of this misterious and ancient place while you keep fighting with monsters and improving your abilities.

games.name: Lost In Space: The First Adventure
games.description: "Danger! Danger!" Play as Will Robinson, Dr. Smith and Robot in this 3D, point & click adventure game based on the TV show: Lost in Space. Explore treacherous environments, outwit classic Villains and solve countless puzzles and mysteries to rescue your fellow crew members of the Jupiter 2.

games.name: Apex Rush
games.description: Race, Drift & Stunt in this physics-based arcade racing game! Build and share your own tracks with the world and top the leaderboards!

games.name: Frontier Paladin
games.description: You are an Apprentice Paladin, following your Master on your first quest. Survive by engaging your enemies in deliberate and impactful combat with a variety of play styles. Rally your beleaguered Order, improve your Castle and it's defenses, and hold fast against the Warlords of the Crater.

games.name: Color Fear
games.description: Today on the Color Fun Coloring Show they want Viewers to Help them Find out Who is Breaking into Their House.

games.name: Demon Tides
games.description: Explore the open seas and uncover the kingdom's dark secrets as you expressively platform your way across dozens of locales, upgrading your gear every step of the way!

games.name: Love Eternal
games.description: Wander a castle built of bitter memories in LOVE ETERNAL, a psychological horror platformer with devious trials and an unsettling, experimental narrative. Find a way out - or live in Shelter forever more.

games.name: Kletka
games.description: Kletka is a co-op horror game about going down in an elevator that is trying to eat you. Feed the elevator, explore deadly floors and descend deeper.

games.name: Park Ranger Simulator
games.description: Manage your own park facility in a huge open world in Park Ranger Simulator. Take on all the tasks that need to be completed as a park ranger - alone or together in cross-platform multiplayer! You have a variety of vehicles and equipment at your disposal to complete the challenges ahead!

games.name: Key Fairy
games.description: A hand-drawn, pacifist, folkloric, bullet-hell. Grapple and dance around monsters to collect their shattered stars, weave your way through twisting paths, encounter strange folk, uncover ancient magic, and evade forgotten gods in this frenetic 2D action-adventure.

games.name: Dead In Antares
games.description: Dead in Antares is a turn-based survival management game with RPG elements, set on an alien planet. Lead a crew of survivors sent on a mission to save humanity. Manage their needs, strengthen their teamwork, and explore this mysterious world to find a way back home.

games.name: Styx: Blades of Greed
games.description: The master of stealth is back! Explore the dizzying heights of the Iserian Continent and cunningly eliminate your enemies. Thanks to your Quartz powers, you are freer than ever. Be creative: Never has it felt so good to be greedy.

games.name: Lazy Writer
games.description: A story-driven simulator of a writer who is too lazy to work. Find motivation to write, make friends, and overcome endless challenges.

games.name: Illusion Pathology
games.description: "Illusion Pathology" is a suspenseful and slightly scary B female love game. You will wake up as a doctor in a mental hospital, and become entangled with three suspicious "patients" around you, and your life and memory will be gradually revealed.

games.name: Checkout Midnight
games.description: Checkout Midnight is an atmospheric horror game where you work the night shift as a cashier. What begins as a simple job scanning groceries in an almost empty supermarket slowly turns into a true nightmare.

games.name: Horse Manager
games.description: Manage your own horse racing teams in Horse Manager. With charming retro ASCII graphics, buy, train, and race horses while making planned decisions to lead your teams to success.

games.name: Manairons
games.description: Manairons is a 3D action platformer game inspired by the legends of little creatures living in the Pyrenees. Help Nai face off against the landowner who has taken control of a charming village using the power of the "canut," with magic, flute, and plenty of chaos.

games.name: Baking Bad
games.description: A chaotic co-op, rouge like, quota game, where you and your friends are constantly on the run, cooking, looting, and shooting whatever you can to survive.

games.name: Guilds of Greybrook
games.description: Guilds of Greybrook is a roguelike management simulator where you don't play the hero, you pay the heroes! Operate the choppy waters of business ownership, hire adventurers, take contracts, and choose sides in the dangerous power struggles of the frontier.

games.name: Gear.Club Unlimited 3
games.description: The Gear.Club series is back! Customize and set up your favourite cars to race at top speed along the roads of the French Mediterranean coast and Japan. Don't just win – show off your style!

games.name: Super Battle Golf
games.description: An online 1-8 player golf game where everyone plays at the same time. Swing, shoot, sabotage, and finish first by any means necessary in a free-for-all rush to the hole.

games.name: Paranormasight: The Mermaid's Curse
games.description:
A brand new PARANORMASIGHT tale begins in Ise-Shima, Japan—a region rich in mermaid legends.

Join a cast of fascinating characters investigating the mysteries of the Mermaids of Ise. Unravel their different perspectives on the case and guide the story to its thrilling conclusion.

games.name: Hentai Nami
games.description: Hentai Nami is a sensual puzzle game about temptation and tension. Complete levels, unlock revealing scenes, and gradually get closer to Nami — a woman who can arouse with a single glance and always craves more.

games.name: Sealchain
games.description: The "Sealchain" is a roguelite game where items can be connected to each other to create chain reactions. In this crumbling world, you will play as a medium, using the power of curse seals to cleanse the world of post-apocalyptic evil spirits.

games.name: Komadori Inn
games.description: Your boring life changed, when you started to work at the Komadori Inn. A picturesque forest by the sea and beautiful co-workers make the perfect place for relaxing.

games.name: CaveVox
games.description: CaveVox is a first-person roguelike set in a medieval fantasy dungeon. Level up, face traps, fight monsters and bosses. Each run is unique, with permadeath forcing tough choices as you delve deeper, crafting your own adventure.

games.name: Express Car Wash Simulator
games.description: Run your own Car Wash company! Wash cars, earn money, grow your business and enjoy the bubbles!

games.name: Welcome to Doll Town
games.description: In "Welcome to Doll Town," explore a cursed village where lifelike dolls roam. Uncover dark secrets, solve eerie puzzles, and survive the haunted dollhouses to escape a twisted nightmare.

games.name: Horripilant
games.description: Horripilant is a chilling incremental dungeon crawl through the horrors of a forgotten underworld. Combining idler, puzzle and autobattler elements, you'll fight, mine, and think your way through the depths of a forsaken dungeon.

games.name: Obliterator-x
games.description: A chaotic tower defense roguelike where scavenging is survival and death is just the beginning. Build, blast, and upgrade your way through mutant hordes, unlock new weapons, and assign combat drones to adapt your strategy every run.

games.name: Lethal Dungeon
games.description:
Lethal Dungeon is a roguelike card game. Win every battle using only the cards in your opening hand to defeat all enemies in a single turn.

Using as few cards as possible will earn you more rewards, and if you get stuck on an enemy, you can use money to shuffle and draw.

Upgrade your deck using the money you earn! Defeat stronger enemies to earn more money! Repeat this process until you clear the dungeon!

games.name: Where Time Ends
games.description: Where Time Ends is a psychological puzzle game that follows a grieving protagonist determined to build a time machine to see his deceased mother one last time. As players construct the machine piece by piece, they must solve challenging puzzles while reality slowly begins to fracture. With nine unique endings that explore different interpretations of grief, obsession, and acceptance, the game offers an emotional and introspective experience that blends mystery, logic, and psychological tension.

games.name: TBH: Task Bar Hero
games.description: The taskbar is now the stage for our heroes! Support their small but epic adventures. Earn chests through their journeys and unlock powerful gear to strengthen your heroes!

games.name: Breezy Bakes Simulator
games.description: Run your own seaside Italian bakery, craft pizzas and breads, and enjoy, fun with up to 4 players online!

games.name: Ethics Empire
games.description: Become the richest business owner in this strategy-based simulator, choose your playstyle trying to balance ethics and profits in this chaotic low poly world. Will you keep your ethical businesses thriving or will you let it all crumble down for a quick buck?

games.name: LightQb
games.description: Dash and survive in a grid-like world filled with colored light cubes, lasers, and portals, each with unique mechanics. Play, die, and repeat to master the fastest path to the finish. Time is not on your side.

games.name: I Have an Item
games.description: "I Have an Item" is a quick, chaotic multiplayer game for 2-4 players about risks, rewards, and item manipulations. Each turn, players blindly draw items from a shared dynamic pool, facing a constant dilemma. End the turn and keep resources or risk and draw more which can lead to triggering dangerous items sabotaging their turn or damaging them. This creates a tense, push-your-luck dynamic where greed is rewarded or punished instantly.

games.name: House of Nowhere
games.description: Survive a merciless hunt in the House of Nowhere. Alone in a haunting home that no longer feels like your own, you must solve puzzles to escape into a vast, silent forest. Scavenge for your life and uncover the truth before the ancient thing hunting you turns your story into a forgotten legend.

games.name: Don't Go Up There
games.description: Don’t Go Up There is a short game about exploring a cave system within an intimidating mountain, Schubert has to avoid shattering into a million pieces, make his way through twisting paths, and talk to various strangers who stand around in caves.

games.name: Chromatic Battles
games.description: Chromatic Battles is a 2D action/strategy game with tower defense mechanics and color-based combat. The player defends a rotating ship against enemy waves, damaging them only with bullets that match their color. It features planet-based progression, an inter-level upgrade system, and a cartoonie visual style.

games.name: Patient Zero
games.description: Enter high-risk extraction zones, plant containment bombs, and evacuate before the area is wiped out along with you and your team. Every decision matters. Death is permanent. A hardcore 6-player cooperative horror experience where survival is never guaranteed.

games.name: Hentai Archer
games.description: Hentai Archer is an erotic puzzle game where you uncover seductive artwork of a beautiful elven archer by solving relaxing puzzles in a magical forest setting.

games.name: Rei and the Floating City
games.description: Rei is on a journey to become a fully-fledged mage when her airship meets a terrible fate. She and her family crash land in Jupeterno and are nursed back to health by some locals... Except apparently once someone arrives in Jupeterno, they're never allowed to leave. Add in political intrigue and a mysterious, beautiful princess, and Rei's chances of ever making it home are crashing as rapidly as her airship did! Battle through a magical tower full of monsters to get what you need to escape the country... or give in and resign yourself to your fate. Which will you choose?

games.name: Tin Lord
games.description: Tin Lord is a hybrid of RTS and Tower Defense in a post-apocalyptic world where you control robots that rebuild technology and fight monsters in a destroyed world.

games.name: Byteworld
games.description: Welcome to BYTEWORLD, the ultimate VR experience that aims to bring streamers and viewers together like never before!

games.name: Royal Vermin
games.description: Climb, throw, and survive in this chaotic 2-4 player physics-based party game! As your preferred critter caught in a sudden flood, you must fight in a massive trash pile to claim your crown as the true "Royal Vermin."

games.name: You Are the Bomb: A Game About Rolling Bombs
games.description: Collect coins, gems and gun powder, uncover secrets, and conquer epic bosses across time-based levels. Test your skills by mastering the rolling mechanics in this action-packed 3D platformer! Face dynamic environments, harness powerful abilities, and race to save the magical world of Boomerland!

games.name: Absolute Tennis Manager 2
games.description: Immerse yourself in the world of tennis with ATM 2! Create or take on the role of a player and manage every aspect of their career: schedule, training, staff, personal life... Build your legend, tournament after tournament, and aim for the ultimate place in the Hall of Fame.

games.name: Mainframe Men
games.description: Learn about the ancestors of the very computer that you're looking at this now with in this interactive visual novel. ENIAC, UNIVAC... Wait, are these machines talking to you?

games.name: Spider Roulette
games.description: Spider Roulette is a tense online party game where 2-4 friends take turns flipping cups, trying to avoid finding each other's spiders..

games.name: Yurei: Ink of the Damned
games.description: A third-person graphic adventure in which our protagonist enters a world of Japanese legends, where his objective will be to collect a series of cards to advance through the stories and escape from that world full of nightmares.

games.name: Miya Might Break
games.description: A psychological horror visual novel about Miya, a former prodigy trapped in a decaying home with her unstable stepfather, her talking plush Mopa, and the bystander who hears every step she takes. Walk the ritual loops, and decide who survives Miya’s breaking point across three unsettling endings.

games.name: Ball Chasers
games.description: A goofy 3v3 multiplayer party soccer brawler where classes, crazy abilities, and pure chaos replace rules—score goals, troll opponents, and embrace the mayhem across wacky maps.

games.name: Blossoming Yandere
games.description: You've moved into your first apartment. A girl gazes at you, craving your love. What are you to do when you're the center of someone's world? Make choices, explore your new home, piece together a mystery, and be careful. Your actions and words have consequences.

games.name: Iverian Wars: Craxion vs Defugel
games.description: Iverian Wars: Craxion vs Defugel is a faction-based strategic action MMORPG set in the world of Iveria. Engage in large-scale battles, customize your gear freely, and shape the fate of the continent through war and strategy.

games.name: Rise of Piracy
games.description: The perfect blend of Action, Adventure and RTS. Begin your journey as the lowly captain of a small vessel. End as the commander of a threatening fleet. Rise to glory how you see fit. Trade, fight, recruit, grow, pillage, ally, destroy & conquer.

games.name: Emberbane
games.description: Emberbane is a pixel action-platformer with combat revolving around a mixture of four elements with unique abilities. Join Ophelia on her journey to slay the malevolent gods of elements and bring equilibrium to the land; use the elementals to your advantage and uncover the untold tale of centuries.

games.name: Warlock Survivors
games.description: Warlock Survivors is the battleground where you will face hundreds of thousands of enemies in a single frantic run. Upgrade your build and grab all resources you can to reach enough power to survive.

games.name: Fields of Mine
games.description: Fields of Mine is a roguelike puzzle where classic Minesweeper turns into an unpredictable adventure. Each level changes the rules, challenging your logic, focus, and adaptability.

games.name: Novel Haven
games.description: Novel Haven is a short game based on the bestselling book series. Move to a coastal town, renovate the crumbling lighthouse and turn it into a cozy bookstore, designed entirely to your taste. Help the villagers with quests, uncover hidden secrets, and create a literary sanctuary.

games.name: Fall of an Empire
games.description: Defend your realm from invaders in Fall of an Empire. Barbarians attack your frontiers and treacherous vassals plot against you. You know your crumbling empire won't last forever, but it's up to you to see how long you can save it.

games.name: Slime Attack: Survivor
games.description: Fast-paced arena roguelike bullet heaven! Battle relentless waves, tackle mid-run challenges, unlock unique heroes with their own combat pets, equip powerful gear, weapons, and spells, and take on mighty Yonian bosses.

games.name: Dice A Million
games.description: Have you ever tried rolling 1,000,000 points on some dice? No? Well, now at least you can try.

games.name: Backrooms Stories
games.description: Read five horror stories set in the Backrooms. Experience existential horror and terrifying encounters while making choices that will alter your fate. Will you escape or be lost forever?

games.name: Cat President: 3rd-Rate Candidate
games.description:
In a world where pets run the government, President DJ Nibbles has spent most of his time lying in sunbeams and using his desk as a scratching post. But now his days of zoomies in the Oval Office are coming to a close, as the U.S. prepares to elect its next Cat President!

Six wildly incompetent candidates are throwing their yarn balls into the ring, each more dysfunctional than the last. You’re the human campaign manager tasked with keeping these adorable candidates out of trouble. Wrangle egos, dodge scandals, fall in love, and maybe even save the country...or make it much, much worse.

With a script that’s nearly 100,000 words long, Cat President: 3rd-Rate Candidate is a visual novel packed full of romance, humor and cute pictures of real cats. Whether you’re a campaign veteran or just here for the musical numbers and fur-flying debates, it’s the most paws-itively absurd political simulator you’ll ever play.

games.name: Asteroid 69
games.description: Rogue asteroids have been detected heading toward earth. You are the pilot of experimental spacecrafts to destroy the impending danger. Fight solo or up to 4 players. Outerspace is full of lethal rocks and strange creatures out to stop you. Don't let your planet down!

games.name: Reigns: The Witcher
games.description: Adventure as Geralt through the ballads of Dandelion. Swipe right, swipe left, seek glory, find death! Will you hunt monsters, upset the locals, or run a hot bath? Compose an inspiring epic to claim immortality.

games.name: Movie Business: Die Welt der Filme
games.description:
This game, still in beta, plunges you into the exciting world of the movie industry. You take on the role of a producer or director and manage the entire production process – from brainstorming and casting to marketing. You'll need to manage your finances wisely, cultivate talent, and react to trends to make your film a huge success.

The game is ideal for anyone looking for a glimpse into the complex world of film production – without dry theory, but with a healthy dose of strategy and fun. In the beta, you can already try out different genres and compete against other players, while the development team continuously adds new features.

Whether you're a film buff or simply enjoy virtual challenges, this movie business game combines creativity with management and delivers thrilling entertainment.

games.name: A Long Time Ago
games.description: A Long Time Ago is a 3D RPG, Adventure, Mystery game. A terrible accident happened and ever since you cannot wake up or even remember who you are.You will have to search deep inside your subconscious where all the truth about who you are is hidden and become who you used to be.

games.name: Amy Hates Robots
games.description: AI has possessed everything. Toasters, telephones, and trash cans have come alive and want you dead. Fight back with a bizarre array of weapons, from bouncy balls to banana guns. Battle through deadly arenas and make strange allies in this action roguelike, as you uncover an apocalyptic conspiracy.

games.name: Bloodmatch
games.description: The arena beckons. Sharpen your steel. Slash, stab, and spear your way through the ranks of Rome’s toughest warriors, taking yourself from a lowly pit slave to the land's most glorified gladiator. Your audience awaits…

games.name: Supreme Strategic Battles 2
games.description: Wield over 300 modern weapons, from jets to tanks, and outmaneuver rival forces with your strategy. From small islands to massive total-war maps, turn-based battles let both newcomers and veterans play at their own pace.

games.name: Yuna and the Spirit Forest
games.description: A 2D pixel-art metroidvania where you fight using elemental spirits instead of basic attacks. Explore, collect, and solve puzzles in a magical forest.

games.name: Jump Frog
games.description: A determined frog leaps ever higher, risking its life in a perilous climb where every slip could send it tumbling back to the start. driven by the call to find the perfect mate. Will this frog have what it takes?

games.name: Spellcasters Chronicles
games.description: CAST. FLY. FIGHT. COOPERATE. In intense 3V3 action-strategy battles, summon hundreds of creatures, cast devastating spells, and call upon the might of Titans to rise as the most powerful member of the community of Spellcasters – and shape the fate of the world. Together.

games.name: Mitnal
games.description: Play as Emily, drawn to a remote Mayan ruin after her brother insists it’s safe, amazing and beautiful. Explore an ancient Mayan site spanning jungle, temple, and catacombs as it becomes clear that he didn’t understand what he uncovered.

games.name: What We Carry
games.description: What We Carry is a dark, gothic strategy RPG where you can only see yourself. Walk a brave path through an unseen world, face random event cards, and survive the weight of every choice you make—if you can carry it.

games.name: Snägäri Pinball
games.description:
Snägäri Pinball is a classic 2D pinball game set in the late-night afterparty world of Finnish snack kiosks. Players control a single hand-drawn table designed around ramps, lanes, gates, ball locks, events, and score-chasing challenges.

The game features multiple visual and rule variations, including Finnish Mode, Over-The-Top Mode, and an Analog Horror Mode with CRT-style effects. Optional seasonal table themes add holiday and national celebration variants throughout the year.

A dedicated Kids Mode replaces adult humour and nightlife references with family-friendly art, music, and separate leaderboards. High scores, achievements, multiball events, and hidden secrets support replayability across different modes.

games.name: CyberPunk Sex Tower
games.description: The world of the future, modern technologies make it possible to create a super realistic sexual experience ...

games.name: Neve
games.description: Neve is a non-linear interactive fiction in which your decisions can completely change the course of history. Manage your team, race against time and unravel the mysteries surrounding your ship's crash in this suffocating retrofuturistic thriller that will have you hooked from the first second.

games.name: Tomboy Adventure 2
games.description: Start a relaxing adventure together with your (girl) friend!

games.name: Dictocracy
games.description: Take charge as the President of a newly independent country, Adelphia. Build infrastructure, approve policies, juggle between conflicting priorities of the public, your ministers and other countries' leaders - All with only one action per turn and a different political landscape in each playthrough

games.name: AutoBlobber
games.description: AutoBlobber is a Roguelike Autobattler where you customize your Blob to survive endless waves of enemies. Strategically place upgrades, forge powerful synergies, and adapt your build between waves to push your run as far as possible.

games.name: Resident Evil Requiem
games.description: Resident Evil Requiem is the ninth entry in the Resident Evil series. Experience terrifying survival horror with FBI analyst Grace Ashcroft, and dive into pulse-pounding action with legendary agent Leon S. Kennedy. Both of their journeys and unique gameplay styles intertwine into a heart-stopping, emotional experience that will chill you to your core.

games.name: Cards and Castles Ultimate
games.description: Collectible cards meets tactical strategy! Build decks, uncover crazy combos, and battle friends and rivals in TACTICAL CARD-BOARD COMBAT. Bring your cards to life and dominate the grid!

games.name: Ruins Of Fear
games.description: Lucian wakes up on an ordinary school day to find himself in a deserted world. Together with Elora, he must solve puzzles, evade creatures in dark corridors, and uncover the mysteries around him.

games.name: Plague Alchemist
games.description: Plague Alchemist is a singleplayer adventure RPG with a deep focus on alchemy. Explore a world where the mundane intertwines with the magical and the corrupt. Harvest and loot your way to uncover the truth behind the world's mysterious decay. Perhaps there is more to it than meets the eye.

games.name: Lone Survivors
games.description: Cut through hundreds of monsters and survive against all odds in this fantasy survivors-like top-down action game! Level up, unlock abilities, and defeat bosses with a wide arsenal of weapons and magic.

games.name: The AI Bubble
games.description: Survive the corporate hell where AI tries to replace you... literally. Play as a Junior Dev, collect absurd upgrades (like 'Paid in Exposure' or '144p Tutorial'), and destroy hordes of buggy robots in this satirical Action Roguelite / Bullet Heaven.

games.name: Thekku Island
games.description: A chilling psychological horror set in 1980s Kerala. After weeks of silence, you arrive on a remote island to search for your missing wife. Explore an abandoned house, uncover local folklore, survive haunting encounters, and unravel the island’s buried secrets.

games.name: Survival
games.description: You are one of the last survivors of the apocalypse. Explore the dark forest, build shelters, craft weapons, and fight zombies and mutants in this realistic first-person survival simulator.

games.name: Darkest Cube
games.description: Darkest Cube fuses card games, roguelikes, and RPG elements – adapt your starting deck with cards gained from quests, and adjust your strategies to seal the mysterious Dark Cubes.

games.name: Offering App
games.description:
OFFERING APP is a psychological survival horror. This app is supposed to help us.
YOU can help YOU with this app. We don't need to suffer anymore. Yay!

games.name: Secrets of Temple Isle
games.description: Explore ancient ruins and diverse biomes, fight in third-person combat while collecting gear and powers. Design your space and decorate with items gathered in the world. Become the legend in this exciting single player adventure.

games.name: Sugoi Adventure! DragonSlayer
games.description: A game of choices where you get to become a hero, impress hot girls, and slay a dragon. Choose your own adventure and make it truly sugoi!

games.name: Kritter: Defend Together
games.description: Kritter is NOT a tower defense. It’s NOT an action roguelite either. It’s somewhere in between. All we know is you can become absurdly powerful, blow stuff up with your friends, up to 4 players, online or local and follow a surprisingly cool story.

games.name: Subliminal
games.description: Subliminal is a psychological horror game inspired by the urban legend of The Backrooms. Bleeding-edge lighting and rendering, handcrafted open-ended levels, light and perspective-based puzzles, nostalgic spaces, unfamiliar faces, and a rotting feeling that something is not quite right.

games.name: Anseion
games.description: Get ready for a journey to the world of Anseion, an immersive 2D MMORPG. Choose your fraction: good or evil. Fight against players and monsters, explore the fascinating world, collect items and create your own. Make a unique character. Participate in events and fraction battles, increase your rank.

games.name: Sand: Raiders Of Sophie
games.description: In an alternate 1910, scavenge the sands of Sophie in towering Tramplers. Build your highly customizable walking base. Squad up or go solo. Gather loot, weapons, precious artifacts. Clash with other players in a brutal procedurally generated desert forged by history and chaos.

games.name: Future Weapon
games.description: Future Weapon 2D is a top down space shooter where you can relive the couch co-op glory days with up to 8 players across 2 screens. Grab a gun, grab a spaceship, upgrade everything, mine rocks, explore, and recruit the local townsfolk to conquer this demo.

games.name: Matt's Hidden Cats
games.description: A scavenger-hunt adventure that spans 80 hand-crafted levels, including beautiful holiday destinations and fantasy themes. Look in buildings, detonate bombs, unlock treasure chests, dig for secrets, and more! Every item is clickable as you search for Hidden Cats & Dogs!

games.name: TransmuTowers
games.description: The Kingdom is under attack! Collect resources, build towers, buy upgrades and work alone (or with up to 3 friends) to defend it! Select your favorite Alchemist from a magical coven, and fend off innumerable hordes of beasts in this post-apocalyptic fantasy world.

games.name: Wrong Elevator
games.description: Wrong Elevator is a horror game where you explore abandoned facilities and scavenging resources to maintain and upgrade your elevator.

games.name: Primland The Magus
games.description: A dark fantasy 2D action game about a solitary island that has turned into hell and a girl named Magus. Collect "relics" sleeping on the island and acquire skills. Take on mysteries and powerful enemies using a variety of actions!

games.name: Gobocore
games.description: Roguelite Turn Based Auto-Battler about little goblins rescuing their kidnapped tribe members. Smash. Evolve. Survive.

games.name: Slay the Spire II
games.description: The iconic roguelike deckbuilder returns. Craft a unique deck, encounter bizarre creatures, and discover relics of immense power in Slay the Spire 2!

games.name: DrainSim
games.description: Dive into DrainSim and seize control of the floods! Clear the city's submerged streets, with a huge range of different tools from rakes to submersible pumps. Embrace the satisfaction of restoring the water flow. Become the city's hero, one drain at a time.

games.name: Shadows of Chroma Tower
games.description: An immersive first-person Dungeon Crawler RPG with heavy roguelite elements and huge bosses in an Extraction setting. Level up, learn skills on a vast talent tree, develop your profession as a harvester or crafter, discover new recipes, loot and craft your way to becoming an unstoppable fighter.

games.name: No Vacation for an Executioner
games.description: It's a a Dark Fantasy Action-RPG about a frustrated executioner in late 17th century. He ran away from the gallows. It aroused a riot of monsters, he had to clean up this cruel mess, and find out the truth of this crazy world.

games.name: Ascendant Dawn
games.description: Ascendant Dawn is a grand strategy game where you lead a nomadic tribe in a brutal bronze age world. Work your way up from a small clan to a great empire by founding cities and conquering your enemies.

games.name: Footsy
games.description: Footsy is a chaotic multiplayer soccer party game set inside grandma's house! Smash furniture, shatter bottles, and tumble TVs as you compete in wild, goal-scoring action. Customize your characters, challenge your friends, and embrace the crazy destruction in every room!

games.name: Streamers Cleaning Simulator
games.description: Restore order and cleanliness to the rooms of famous Gaming Streamers after their epic gaming sessions. Find artefacts, explore streamers life. Play co-op with your friends.

games.name: Royalty Free-For-All
games.description: Royalty Free-For-All is a hand-drawn cartoon Party Brawler featuring an original cast of characters inspired by the public domain! Join Dorothy, Sweeney Todd, Mother Goose, and more as they duke it out in hand-drawn platform fighting mayhem!

games.name: Chop Shop
games.description: Feel the flow as you hunt, butcher, and cook at a blisteringly fast pace in this action shop-keeping game. Hunt adorable monsters, chop colossal carcasses, and power-slice through huge chunks of flesh to serve your customers even faster. Move fast and stay sharp if you want your shop to survive.

games.name: The Wide Open Sky Is Running Out of Catfish
games.description: A story-driven photography game... on the back of a giant, flying catfish. Transform clouds into sea creatures and bring abundance back to an empty sky.

games.name: Mini Tank Mayhem
games.description: Mini Tank Mayhem is a roguelike deck-building tower defense game where you command a powerful mini-tank to repel waves of alien invaders. Craft your very own deck, deploy strategic defenses, and unleash devastating combos to protect Earth from pesky aliens!

games.name: Kings & Savages
games.description: A skill based auto battler. Easy to learn, hard to master. Little time commitment as games last a minute. Inspired by Chess and Dota.

games.name: Axom: Conquest
games.description: A base building roguelite tower defence game set on the dangerous planet named Axom. Gather resources to build defences, unlock research between games to get stronger and ultimately unlock the secrets of the mysterious planet.

games.name: PengPong
games.description: PengPong is a survival roguelike shooter in a vintage cartoon world. Use a hockey stick to deflect pucks and weapons, stop swarms, and test your luck. Spend chips for safe upgrades or risk it at the roulette. New builds and quirky synergies challenge survival every run.

games.name: Die Fighter
games.description: A sci-fi dice-driven roguelike where your dice fuel both your abilities and your enemies’. You'll need strategy and luck to outwit dynamic foes, harness synergistic upgrades, and escape creeping galactic doom before Fate catches up.

games.name: Enter the Nemesis: Blood Portal
games.description: In this 2.5D hack and slash shooter platformer enemy bodies will become your platform. Kill enemies to activate the portals, and build a platform of bodies to reach the exits. Stomp the bodies, crush the heads, collect blood, and snatch their weapons. Find and free the girl, then defeat the nemesis

games.name: Baspetball
games.description: When the tutors leave, the house turns into a basketball court, and the ultimate showdown begins: Cats vs. Dogs. Take control of basketball-playing cats, move, pass, and shoot a yarn ball to score baskets while outsmarting dog opponents. Explore creative strategies and make that swish!

games.name: Beetleball
games.description: Score goals with dungballs in Beetleball, the Greatest Online Multiplayer Class-based Dung Beetle Soccer Game to ever exist.

games.name: Blightened
games.description: Blightened is a 2.5D action platformer where corruption fuels your strength. Unleash powerful abilities, survive collapsing realms, and fight your way through a broken world shaped by blight.

games.name: Putt Down
games.description: Putt down is a first person mini-golf horror game, where you use a shotgun as a putter. Keep your shotgun in good condition and your stress levels in check while battling both randomized golf courses and horrific monsters. Will you survive or will you be putt down.

games.name: Unwanted Dungeon
games.description: A tactical survivorslike with classic RPG essence: unique builds, dual combat styles per class, rare loot, and semi-procedural level generation. Fast-paced action meets progression freedom and permadeath in a dark fantasy roguelike. Welcome to Unwanted Dungeon.

games.name: Axima
games.description: Welcome to the world of Axima, a Monster Taming RPG! Befriend and battle alongside over a hundred different Axi, while you explore the fully open world by yourself - or with your friends in multiplayer!

games.name: Rocket Wrestling Entertainment
games.description: Throw it down in the newest sport league of 2073: Rocket Wrestling Entertainment. Pelt your foes with a barrage of rockets and powerful takedowns to stand on top!

games.name: Lumina's Brew
games.description: Explore enchanted biomes, gather rare ingredients, and brew potions to sell in this cozy 2D metroidvania. Discover secrets, meet curious creatures, and master the art of potion-making as a young witch on a mystical journey.

games.name: Nullpoint Protocol
games.description: The feeling of high-level MMO raids, without the grind. Nullpoint Protocol is a 1-4 player co-op action roguelite where you face harbingers of the apocalypse. Craft your own class from randomized loot, master each boss fight, and save your species from extinction!

games.name: Ploink
games.description: A plinko roguelike where you create crazy setups with random objects then drop balls and watch the chaos unfold. Discover creative interactions, create cross-dimensional setups, break the game, feed cats and ploink it.

games.name: Echoes of Mora
games.description: Embark on a mysterious journey, filled with intriguing interactions and meaningful encounters, as you explore a sunken village and travel through time to help Mora find her lost brother. Playable in VR and non-VR on PC.

games.name: The Grey Company
games.description: Tabletop Tavern: RTS meets roguelike chaos. Recruit mercenaries, command them in real-time on a tabletop battlefield, and face endless goblin hordes. Unique runs, tough choices, infinite replayability.

games.name: Dosmic
games.description: In a world consumed by darkness, a boy embarks on a perilous journey to rescue a lost girl. Navigate through cosmic horrors and unravel ancient mysteries in this cinematic puzzle-adventure. Experience a hauntingly beautiful tale of despair and hope.​

games.name: Paragnosia: Museum
games.description: Watch over the Duskheath Museum with a rail-mounted camera. Closed following a series of disturbing disappearances, your mission is to photograph the anomalies and exorcise the spirits that have taken possession of the premises. Can you survive the 8 rounds through these mysterious exhibition halls?

games.name: Snatch Squad
games.description: Imagine Payday in an open world like GTA — built entirely of blocks. Snatch Squad is a co‑op crime sim in a voxel city. Plan and execute heists, launder money through legit businesses, and outsmart the police.

games.name: Waddle Paddle
games.description: Paddle as a cute penguin through a difficult kayaking course, dodging deadly obstacles along the way. Take on the challenge solo or team up with a friend to paddle in sync toward the finish.

games.name: Iron Blight
games.description: In a cold, rainy Eastern Bloc town, you find yourself trapped in a room as abominations claw at your door, with nowhere to run. You must survive the feverish night, uncover the horrors lurking in the shadows and above all, find your wife Valeria.

games.name: Kaiju Cracking Corporation
games.description: "KaijuCrackingCorp" is a simulation game about dismantling Kaiju. Manage your company, hire and train employees, and make decisions to maximize profits. Enjoy strategic gameplay mixed with fun mini-games for a unique and casual experience.

games.name: Case No.1: Rose Academy
games.description: Rose Academy is a detective visual novel about a young special agent sent to an elite girls' school to investigate the mysterious death of one of its top students. As you uncover the dark secrets hidden behind the academy’s flawless facade, you'll be drawn into a world of intrigue, temptation, and romance.

games.name: Oceanic Rails
games.description: Oceanic Rails is a game about building your island and creating combinations of crops, helpers, animals, modifiers, upgrades and more to pay your rent at the end of the week. Try out challenges and overcome the tricky weather or build you island worry free and create a beautiful pixel art world.

games.name: Troll Chess Sekai
games.description: One day, you gain the power to cast a troll spell in a chess game. Eager to try it out, you head to the chess club—where rivals range from novice Mirai to the mysterious owner who surpasses human skill. The rules of chess are no longer safe. Will you seize victory, or be swallowed by chaos?

games.name: Astrolite
games.description: Obliterate ever-growing asteroids in a race against time. Level up your starship to stay on top of the looming threat. Spend well earned Luna Coins on permanent power-ups to skyrocket through the levels. Each mission has unique enemies, challenging bosses, and unlimited variety in gameplay.

games.name: Secrets of Suburbia
games.description: Investigate a disappearance in a quiet American suburb in 1997—or ignore it entirely. Spend the night browsing the internet, playing video games, and chatting with your friends in this first-person mystery-horror experience.

games.name: Rogue Runner
games.description: Rogue Runner is a high-speed running, rogue-like, third-person shooter, action, and parkour game. You must run to break the cycle. As you run, you'll discover different possibilities. Run, Kill, Die, Try new skills, and Repeat to break the cycle!

games.name: Maid Mech
games.description: In 2060, nanoweapons leaked from an Antarctic ancient ruin transformed Earth lifeforms into deadly bioweapons. As human forces retreat, you—a top frontline commander—are tasked with leading experimental 3rd-gen mech units to defend the most critical zone until civilians evacuate to near-Earth orbit.

games.name: SubZero
games.description: A frozen apocalypse. Three unique survivors join you. Lead them through the icy wasteland! Zombie whispers, blizzards blur morality... Hope or doom? The fateful die burns in your grip.

games.name: Asantria
games.description: An intriguing top-down game with a cartoonish pixel art style! Move around the map in all directions while viewing your character from above! Use various types of magic to shoot and fight monsters! Also use different outfits that will give you additional advantages in the game world!

games.name: Overcat
games.description: OVERCAT is a 1v1 twin-stick fighting game, where competitive and casual players can finally have a fair fight!

games.name: Táng Chuánqí: Shàng Yuáncháng Gān Xíng
games.description: A three-thousand-mile journey of exile, a mystery of untold evil, when strange legends are decoded into reports of social pathology, when the joy of wuxia revenge collides with the ironclad fortress of power, from bandits slaughtering villages to the powerful committing cannibalism, who is not a lamb to be slaughtered in troubled times? This game focuses on the historical backdrop of the An-Shi Rebellion during the Tang Dynasty, and every choice the player makes will mark their character's fate.
companies: Hǔ Bǎo Miāo Miāo Miāo Zhìzuò Zǔ

games.name: Sculptor
games.description: Create and paint statues of beautiful women, improve your skills and follow the kinetic novel of a sculptor who fell in love with his creation. The game is inspired by the Greek myth of Pygmalion.

games.name: Eurekas
games.description: Eurekas is a real-time strategy colony sim where settlers battle a hostile, mystical island. Build, survive, use magic, and appease your gods—or risk losing everything to the wild forces that resist your claim.

games.name: Irezumi Defenders
games.description: Irezumi Defenders is a tower defense game where you craft your units in a world inspired by Japanese mythology. Stack cards to craft buildings, gather resources, and build up your defenses to protect your kingdom from Yokai!

games.name: Derelict Star
games.description: A precise momentum-based platformer that emphasizes exploration and navigation puzzles. Run and jump your way through a wide variety of obstacles and challenges as you explore an abandoned derelict freighter.

games.name: Rotato
games.description: Spin. Shoot. Survive.

games.name: Tomorrowness
games.description: Take flight as Juno, a small bird guided by the sound of her guitar through a hand-drawn world of music and memory. Play melodies to solve puzzles, fly through unique platforming challenges and piece together a story of grief and love.

games.name: NodalBastion
games.description: Defend the last AI core in an abstract minimalist game of incremental progression, powerful skills, and evolving networks.

games.name: Ergenekon
games.description: Ergenekon is a story-based, cinematic-heavy, linear, third person single player game about the Turkish epic Ergenekon. You will witness the resurrection of the Turks with Ergenekon.

games.name: The Melty Way
games.description: You move, you melt. Play as a brave size-shifting slime in this colorful precision puzzle-platformer, dashing through handcrafted puzzles and perilous traps on your journey in The Melty Way.

games.name: Gears Of Glory
games.description:
Gears of Glory is a movement-based Tower Defense where you drive a van across the map to collect Gears, build powerful towers, and stop the robots from destroying your bases.

Developed for PC, Gears of Glory combines classic Tower Defense strategy with a unique twist: driving a stylish van through the chaos of a post-apocalyptic world.

Featuring a top-down pixel art look and fast-paced gameplay, the player takes on the role of a resistance pilot tasked with protecting the last human bases from hordes of robots that have taken over the planet and isolated humanity. To succeed, you’ll need skill behind the wheel, dodging obstacles or running enemies over. All while building towers with strategic synergies capable of turning the tide of battle.

Speed, strategy and survival collide in this game where every turn can mean the difference between extinction and the salvation of humanity.

The game’s inspiration comes from the desire to complement the Tower Defense genre and eliminate those idle moments where players would simply speed up the game after placing towers and wait. In Gears of Glory you are in constant motion driving the van to upgrade towers, collect Gears, and run enemies over.

The gameplay and art are influenced by titles such as Gemcraft, Kingdom Rush, Thronefall, Rock and Roll Racing, Biker Mice from Mars, GTA2.

games.name: Tales of Fear: Episode Zero
games.description: Can you tell the difference between reality and tale? Experience three short horror stories and gather clues as to which are true and which are just part of our imagination. Immerse yourself in the protagonist's perspective and discover eerie tales from around the world.

games.name: Cosmic Castaway
games.description: Cosmic Castaway is a colony building survival game. Gather scarce resources, rescue and assign your crew, build and defend your outpost from hostile forces, and turn wreckage into refuge to repair your ship and escape back to your home planet.

games.name: Sheol no Mori: Tasogare no Majuuzukai
Sunken Sky
games.description: Welcome to the world of Sunken Sky and get ready for an epic action adventure through a vast open world. No place is beyond your reach - from the tallest mountains to the very minds of others. Battle bizarre creatures and befriend even stranger people. All in a detailed, hand-drawn 2D style.
