games.name: What’s in the Box?
games.description: A first-person incremental game where you buy and open containers filled with random items, repair and upgrade the things you find, and sell them for profit. In a dark industrial environment, upgrade your character, tools, and machines, earn money, and step by step work your way toward freedom.

games.name: Duck Duck Hotel
games.description: A 3D cute management sim where you're a duck building and operating a treetop hotel for a variety of bird species. Strategically expand your tree, cater to each species' unique needs, and keep your feathery guests happy through all four seasons. Just don't ruffle any feathers, or it's game over!

games.name: Medieval Life Simulator
games.description: Rise from nothing to wealth! Mine ore, harvest crops, cut trees, gather livestock products, sell resources, hire workers, buy rentable houses, gamble with card games, bet on fights, and expand into an empire.

games.name: Landlord
games.description: "Landlord Chess" turns the ever-changing strategies in card games into visual scenarios, makes it more like playing chess or Sudoku. It includes a single-player mode and a multiplayer online mode, while also integrating a leaderboard and an achievement system.

games.name: Chill & Reel
games.description: A cozy idle fishing game where you play as an adorable alligator angler. Designed to run in the corner of your screen, it's the perfect companion for work or study—featuring rich animations that make every moment feel like watching a charming short film.

games.name: The Saint
games.description: The Saint" is a first-person psychological horror set in eerie liminal spaces with VHS body cam visuals. Explore a decaying dreamworld, solve symbolic puzzles, and escape a nightmare inspired by the dread and mystery of Silent Hill.

games.name: Vellum: Raid Night Study Hall
games.description: Brush up on your fighting mechanics with Raid Night Study Hall - your worry-free guide to boss fights! Learn, practice, and don't stand in the fire! You will be prepared!

games.name: Spinwave Survivors
games.description: Spinwave Survivors is a fast-paced survival shooter with roguelike elements. Scoot, shoot and boost your way through hordes of drones as you upgrade your weapons and unlock new abilities, all while attempting the survive the chaos.

games.name: Cozy Fast Hanoi
games.description:
Cozy puzzle game, offering a modern take on a classic brain teaser.
There's only one rule: never place a larger piece on top of a smaller one. Cozy Fast Hanoi offers a relaxing solo mode and a dynamic 2-player mode. Play at your own pace, progress through the game, and unlock features to customize the game's atmosphere.

games.name: Molekraft
games.description: 3D Strategy Puzzle game in which you control moles and have to guide them to the exit of the level.

games.name: The Last Cat in the Universe
games.description: Gather the remains of a dying space station to build a cozy home for the last cat in the universe. A short, narrative-driven incremental game about finding peace in the face of darkness

games.name: Today's Menu
games.description: Mix cards with restaurant management in this sim game. Build, gather ingredients, and learn recipes. Use your deck to serve customers, earn profits and fame, then upgrade and expand to craft your ideal restaurant.

games.name: Idle Demon Summoner
games.description: A dark yet vibrant idle game featuring creature collecting, tower-defense, and bullet-heaven elements. Unlock new demons and weapons to conquer distant worlds.

games.name: But Why Penguin?
games.description: Nothing matters. You left your monotonous colony behind. Complete tasks, chase your dreams, walk across the ice while humans watch you, and uncover the secret that will be revealed in 2027. But why?

games.name: Slime City: Trials
games.description: Slime City: Trials is a movement shooter where slime removes friction, and momentum is everything. Splat enemies to paint slippery paths, slide into popping slimes for speed boosts, and race the clock to earn the best medals.

games.name: Noodle Hustle
games.description: You will play as a side road street food seller, cook noodle and serve customer, and of course earn money. At the end of the day will you manage to pay the bills for your hospitalized grandma, and save her?

games.name: Case 1963
games.description: Case 1963 is a 2D narrative and educational experience set in 1960s England. Explore the stories of three characters while solving puzzles and facing challenges that test skill and strategy.

games.name: Fruitbearer
games.description: An edgier, darker, thrilling and less casual Suika game turned roguelike deckbuilder.

games.name: Socks!
games.description: Strategic, Satisfying Sock Packing Action! Pair up socks, fresh off the clothesline, in this cute and relaxing physics-based puzzler. Match two socks to roll them up into an adorable bundle and free up space in your sock basket. But don't let your bundle basket overflow either! Pack wisely!

games.name: Divinity Vassals
games.description: A pixel-art creature collection, raising, and combat game. Capture and train unique creatures with distinct genes and talents. Hundreds of skills can be freely combined, with each upgrade offering an extra talent draw chance.

games.name: Doomstacker
games.description: A compact power-fantasy strategy experience wrapped in an auto-battler. Choose a castle, build it up, collect artifacts, and craft wild synergies between artifacts and (massive) armies.

games.name: Ju-men: Cursed Masks
games.description: “JU-MEN: Cursed Masks” is a short horror game about organizing countless masks and noticing subtle anomalies. Masks may change when you’re not looking—their color, shape, gaze, or position. What you notice depends on how carefully you’ve arranged them.

games.name: The Subject: Protocol Zero
games.description: Turn on your camera. The Kessler Foundation is paying for your pain. The game uses your webcam and microphone, turning the room into a lab. Complete four stages: from the blink ban to the "Green Light, Red Light" game. Money or sanity? Be the first to complete Protocol Zero. If you dare.

games.name: Mahjong Inkflow
games.description: This a 2D ink-wash solo game blending classic mahjong wins with light roguelikes. In game, you'll play as an ink drop, defeat foes by completing mahjong hands. Collect cards & orbs on the way, gain skills from special enemies, and experiment with builds in this vivid world!

games.name: Cozy Paintings
games.description: Every painting in this art gallery has been scrambled! Drag colors across your canvas and optimize your moves to restore famous artworks. Experiment with color palettes, unlock playful cats with strangely familiar names and watch them wander around while you paint in this cozy and relaxing game.

games.name: Sky Drill
games.description: Jump, boost, and strategize your way through increasingly difficult levels in this 2D roguelite platformer. Use equipment combos to tear through the stratosphere in ridiculous bursts of speed. Drill deep into the earth, mining mountains of gold, precious gemstones, and more.

games.name: Slime Must Grow
games.description: Slime Must Grow is a single-screen incremental game about one thing: make the slime grow.

games.name: Zero Stress King: Idle Defense
games.description: A short relaxing incremental game disguised as a tower defense, but enemies can’t reach your walls. Thanks to lava.

games.name: Open Fire: Ready
games.description: This is a very simple first-person shooter game that you can fight enemies in various game modes and maps, experiencing the thrill of shooting.

games.name: SokoGhost: Unfinished Business
games.description: Pass through obstacles in this block-pushing puzzle game! Beat all levels of the Box Corp skyscraper and reach for the stars by thinking through the box!

games.name: Mewlin the Clicker
games.description: Click to roll the crystal ball across the table, dodging obstacles and facing bosses while building a deck of cards that completely changes your strategy with every run. Help Mewlin, a very curious orange cat, make a total mess in this magical clicker with deckbuilding elements.

games.name: Crazy Hotel Together
games.description: Discover Crazy Hotel Together, a hotel management game where you and your friends have to run a rather unusual hotel! Fulfill your guests’ requests and upgrade your establishment to transform it from a low-cost hotel into a palace!

games.name: Endstation
games.description: A classic dice game played in a somewhat grungy subway train late at night - how many trips can you afford, how many dice can you collect?

games.name: Peasant or Rebel?
games.description: A chaotic, asymmetrical party game for up to 5 players! One player becomes the Lord, while the others are Rebels hiding among the Peasants. Will the Lord expose them in time - or be overthrown?

games.name: Paws Coven
games.description: These damn cats worship eldritch gods and summon monsters from other dimensions in my backyard again. And now they are- Wait! Why did they stop?

games.name: Cuberio
games.description: A casual strategy-puzzle game where you guide a cube through 100 handcrafted mazes, avoid moving hazards, collect coins, and unlock upgrades.

games.name: Phantom the Huntress
games.description: Not sword-clanging trash. Not glitter-magic garbage. Bow only. The rest is for peasants. I’m Phantom, elite huntress, eternally exhausted. You’ll track, gather, goblin-slay, babysit dumb NPCs and rank up at snail pace. Wishlist now. I get bonus wine money. Do it or vanish. My patience is dead.

games.name: Poker TD
games.description: The most relaxing, difficult, & satisfying game. Poker TD is a hypnotically satisfying card game with tons of replay value. Every game you play is much different then the last. Create broken combinations and see if you have what it takes to win a game of Poker TD.

games.name: Zumbi Olé: The Minigame
games.description: Zumbi Olé is unlike anything you've ever played: an action-survival game where you don't just fight… you OLÉ! Outplay clumsy zombies, dominate infested arenas, wipe out undead hordes and rack up points to show the world your true OLÉ skills.

games.name: Upbeat
games.description: Jump, bounce, and drum your way up an infinite climb. Build a beat, spawn platforms with your drum machine, and chain physics-powered combos to outclimb the competition in this rhythmic precision platformer.

games.name: Devour the Elixir
games.description: A dark tactical puzzler where you consume poison to gain power. In a world void of Qi, use [Foresight] to see enemy intent. Outmaneuver foes using [Movement Cards] and lure them into deadly traps. Perfect information, no random dodging. Only pure strategy saves you from death.

games.name: Tiny Utopia
games.description: Wield over 15 unique magical tools and traverse more than 12 vastly different themed worlds in an unprecedented hidden-object adventure. In Tiny Utopia, every click is filled with strategy and wonder.

games.name: Underdog Futsal
games.description: Become the manager of a small neighborhood futsal club, recruit players on a tight budget, and build your tactics. Manage morale through team activities, shift the momentum with substitutions and tactical changes in tense text-based matches, and grow your team step by step.

games.name: Forthold
games.description: Hold the fort as a lone archer in this short incremental defense game. Shoot waves of enemies, collect magic and soulshards, upgrade your power, and ascend to push further toward the source of the relentless darkness.

games.name: King of Santa
games.description: King of Santa is a competitive party action game for up to four players, where players take on the role of Santa, collect presents scattered across the stage, and deliver them to chimneys to earn points and win the match.

games.name: Mushroom Nook
games.description: Mushrooms of all kinds—adorable, quirky, and even some with unique abilities—are spring up randomly on your computer! Collect and nurture them, then decorate with various objects to create your own cozy mushroom haven, keeping you company while you work, study, or simply unwind.

games.name: Bootleg Alchemist
games.description: It's prohibition , time to bootleg like never before. As an exiled Alchemist on your path to redemption.Negotiate contracts from taverns to produce liquor and earn coin. Use your alchemy skills to evade guards , bandits and boost production, Help civilians and regain your status.

games.name: Knights End
games.description: Work together to survive the knight shift in this co-op PvE horror game. Serve your villagers’ as a disgraced knight by completing their commands in a cursed kingdom. Reclaim your lost honor to earn items and a chance at your freedom.

games.name: Five Dice
games.description: A deck-building strategy game where you roll FIVE DICE and blend tactics with luck to prevail in battle!

games.name: Lost & Found
games.description: LOST & FOUND is a free to play dynamic sorting game. Match forms to the right items and build your own warehouse, or compete with your friends in multiplayer mode after your shift is over.

games.name: Abattoir: Cow Escape
games.description: The pinnacle of CowGame technology. Cow Escape is a single-player action game set in a dystopian near future. Play as a cow in the resistance against the meat industry. Fight to free calves from the slaughterhouse, survive endless waves in the rodeo and utilize your powers to destroy Cowmen thugs.

games.name: Chees
games.description: What if your chess pieces lied to you? In CHEES, rooks crawl like pawns, queens leap like knights, and every game shuffles the rules. Outsmart the chaos in local PvP or challenge the AI. Think you can adapt?

games.name: 3D Escape Room: Cursed Legacy
games.description: After waking up in the manor’s basement, you discover that you’ve aged at an abnormal rate. As you fight to survive, clues and records from different eras gradually bring the mystery into focus. When you become young again, you will inherit the true “legacy”.

games.name: Tow the Line
games.description: Chained together meets tow trucks in this challenging platformer. Play solo or co-op!

games.name: Gnomed
games.description: Gnomed is a roguelite clicker base defence game where your humble home is the last line of defense. Hold out against 20 chaotic waves of enemies, unlock new abilities, and grow stronger each run!

games.name: Grand Valor
games.description: Grand Valor is a fast-paced fantasy action platformer featuring a tiny knight on a daring quest, blending swift movement and intense combat as you navigate challenging levels and defeat enemies with agility and skill.

games.name: One Tower Defense
games.description: One Tower Defense is a Roguelike Tower Defense game where you control a single tower. Gather resources, buy weapons and upgrades, and fight endless waves of enemies. Play in single-player mode or in multiplayer mode, where the last survivor wins.

games.name: Saccharine Echo
games.description: Saccharine Echo is a story that walks the line between psychological drama and dark paranormal romance. Your choices will shape the fate of a young woman haunted by an obsessive entity from another world.

games.name: Honor Mice
games.description: Dash, slash, and shoot through handcrafted levels across vibrant worlds in a fast-paced action platformer! Stop the forces of evil from stealing your mysterious lunch and uncover the destiny that awaits you!

games.name: Mixatro
games.description: Mixatro is a game where you merge Balls and buy upgrades to allow you to score higher and reach higher goals. It blends the simple, relaxing puzzle fun with the exciting, strategic choices of building a powerful deck.

games.name: Idlemon
games.description: Idlemon is an idle desktop monster tamer. Played on the side of your screen, your monster will gain experience and collect monster eggs. Upgrade your stats, purchase and collect cards, used to decorate your island.

games.name: Nine Skies
games.description: Nine Skies is a myth-inspired roguelite bullet heaven. As an ancient deity, command auto-firing divine artifacts through the Nine Heavens. Survive hordes of mythical beasts in fast-paced, screen-filling combat where power meets elegance.

games.name: Alice Landing
games.description: Alice Landing is a vertical scrolling, real-time reaction dodging game. Control Alice as she lands in city ravaged by totalitarianism and war, dodging obstacles, collecting scattered codons, following Alice searches for her brother, unlocks encyclopedia entries, and unravels the final secret.

games.name: ArvusForge
games.description: Craft your own weapons and carve your path in this fast-paced 3D roguelike action game. Defeat enemies, collect materials, and build powerful gear as you progress through a node-based world. Every run is a new challenge with randomized skills and endless crafting possibilities.

games.name: NolyRhythm
games.description: Get into the rhythm of the music! If you keep getting into the groove, you'll clear the game before you know it! This is the casual rhythm game "NolyRhythm"!

games.name: Moon and Fang
games.description: Unite the strength of the Vampires and the Werewolves and combine their defenses in a unlikely alliance to defend from the humans. Select your moves between playing cards, earning coins or unlocking stronger decks to survive their rampage. Choose your desired rewards and build unique decks!

games.name: Detective 26
games.description: DETECTIVE 26 is a relaxing, turn-based mystery board game for 5-minute investigations. Roll dice and traverse low-poly maps to gather clues. Use logic to unmask the Wanted before turns run out! Level up your rank, unlock new content, and master the art of being a true detective!

games.name: Roguegg: Hardboiled Survivors
games.description: Roguegg: Hardboiled Survivors is a top-down roguelike bullet heaven where you play as a brave egg fighting hordes of bugs. Collect upgrades, manage your grid inventory, and craft unique builds to survive the swarm before they scramble you!

games.name: Stalker From Willowfield St.
games.description: A stalker is terrorizing the neighborhood, and you’re next. Watch for signs he’s been inside your house and make the right choices to avoid becoming his next victim. Test your observation skills in this Exit 8-style game where the threat isn’t supernatural, but a real man and you have three choices.

games.name: Entrance No.9
games.description: A drunk man returns home, but the familiar stairwell turns into an endless, distorted maze. Floors repeat themselves, doors disappear, and every wrong step takes you back to the beginning. Can you make it to your apartment?

games.name: Cardwheel
games.description: Endless runs, endless combos — every spin is a new roguelite adventure.

games.name: StarDrift Delivery
games.description: Smuggle your way to freedom in this fast-paced space delivery action roguelite where you are in debt to the mob. Blast through asteroids for speed, weave through chaos, and deliver packages to survive. Don't let the debt consume you.

games.name: Three Jokers
games.description: A card roguelike inspired by Balatro and Cuphead. Fight duels, play insane mini-games, build Joker City and rise to greatness — in Three Jokers!

games.name: Wordy Online
games.description: Rediscover the fun of wordplay in this modern, colorful collection of popular games with fresh ideas! Play through the campaign or a huge dictionary of words: learn, earn rewards, track your progress, and even climb the leaderboards — play solo, with friends, and with players worldwide!

games.name: Under the River
games.description: Under the River is a romance visual novel set in Ming China’s world of spirits and the strange.As an opera singer,you return to Sui'an County to perform for the River God. However, a strange accident leads you to don a demonic skin, transforming you into a half-human, half-ghost.

games.name: Magic Tower: Legion
games.description: "Magic Tower: Legion" is a roguelike Magic Tower-like game. You will play as a legion commander and lead your team into the magic tower. Use each character's strengths to defeat powerful enemies. Remember to plan every step carefully, for all resources in the magic tower are non-renewable.

games.name: Labyrinthesis
games.description: Navigate your way through floors of enemies and descend deeper into an underground laboratory. Hack your gun to unlock new weapons, and defeat the machine guarding the elevator.

games.name: Pit Pioneers
games.description: A Lemmings-inspired puzzle game where you guide pioneers through treacherous underground caverns by strategically assigning abilities like digging, building, and blocking to overcome obstacles.

games.name: Truck License Trainer
games.description: Drive a simulated truck to gain knowledge and intuition of a real thing while having fun. Challenge yourself with real-life scenarios or almost impossible maps.

games.name: Ember Island
games.description: Relive the arcade glory days in Ember Island, a relentless quarter burner where every mistake costs blood and time. Fight through 12 deadly zones as a Knight, Mage, or Rogue. Chase high scores for lives, hit the checkpoints, and use unlimited continues to earn your mastery. Play the demo now.

games.name: Nullis
games.description: Logic puzzle game where you must destroy paths of 0-s from the board. Use logic to complete levels with optimal solutions.

games.name: Kuromaku
games.description: Kuromaku Is An Indie First-Person Psychological Thriller Experienced From A Child’s Perspective. Complete Chores Assigned By Your Mother, Uncover Hidden Secrets, And Survive Unsettling Encounters. Objectives Must Be Completed To Progress Further Into The Rich, Unfolding Story.

games.name: Eerie Dossier: The Haunted Apartment
games.description: "Eerie Dossier:the Haunted Apartment"is a walking simulation game that combines horror and horror elements.You will be trapped in an infinite loop of corridors and rooms, searching for opportunities to escape from this place while also discovering its secrets

games.name: Another Game About Automation
games.description: Another Game About Automation is a casual factory-building where you have to generate numbers and combine them with mathematical operations. Upgrade and unlock new mathematical operations.

games.name: Dramatour
games.description: In this local split-screen multiplayer game, 2-4 players compete to build the tallest tower by stacking randomly selected 3D objects.

games.name: BasketBlow
games.description: Play tabletop basketball with realistic physics in relaxing environments. Compete in customizable leagues and cups, edit your teams, and complete your trophy room. Collect points to unlock courts, balls, and environments. Play with friends locally or online.

games.name: Lila's Atelier
games.description: Lila’s Atelier is a casual action game where players can craft items across uniquely themed stages. Use dashing, throwing to dodge obstacles while watching out for traps and pitfalls. Earn enough points to unlock new stages and challenges, and help Lila and Jasmine find their way home

games.name: Kila: Hourbound
games.description: Journey through the fantastical world of Aion as Kila, a Keeper of Time. In this single-player action-adventure platformer, you explore floating islands and combat savages who are stealing time. With a magical staff and time manipulation at your hand, fulfill your destiny and restore peace to Aion.

games.name: The Pinkman Files
games.description: The Pinkman Files is a mini-game rich, fast paced, turn based combat game with a side of visual novel, that will challenge your detective skills and allow you to uncover the secrets of a peculiar town.

games.name: Parcel Peaks
games.description: A difficult fully physics based ski simulator where you deliver items down insane slopes. The controls are few, but difficult to master.

games.name: Scraps: Hellmouth Creek
games.description: A scrapbooking adventure. Ride bikes, float down rivers, and explore the woods while capturing photos and arranging your own scrapbook pages.

games.name: Super Ant Art Tycoon
games.description: You're an art dealer with nothing but ants. They paint. You set the prices. Sometimes it sells, sometimes it doesn't. Grow your colony, design galleries, and become absurdly wealthy in this fully remastered 3D idle tycoon game where the artists are tiny and the ambition is enormous

games.name: The Abbess Garden
games.description: Cozy third-person gardening in 1643 France. As Agnès, restore a forbidden abbey garden, grow and identify real plants through the seasons, uncover a spy plot, help the community, and find romance.

games.name: NightMaze
games.description: What started as a simple urbex quickly turns into a nightmare: locked sewers, a trapped castle, a ruined village, and a procedural maze swarming with zombies. In co-op, search, loot, dodge, and survive together—before the undead find you first.

games.name: Tabletop Fantasy War
games.description: Tabletop Fantasy War is a turn-based strategy game where you create and customize your unit groups, deploy them on the battlefield, and command them with strategic actions. Your units are all you have. Every decision matters. Lead them wisely and defeat your opponents!

games.name: Dreamcore: Rabbit Hole
games.description: Explore liminal spaces that feel eerily familiar and fire the imagination, like a dream you’ve already visited.

games.name: Space Digger Red Beard
games.description: Go down the mine, gather enough resources, and return back to the surface. Make sure that you don't run out of oxygen on your way! Plan every move on the grid carefully, only by returning safely can you progress and uncover even greater rewards.

games.name: Mayday Protocol
games.description: The plane is going down. The Pilot sees the cockpit but has no idea how to fix it. The Co-Pilots have the manual but can’t see the screen. Talk fast, think faster, and land safely. Only one copy needed. Communicate or crash.

games.name: Rise of State
games.description: Rise of State is a state management game focused on leadership and strategy. Every decision you make affects public happiness, military strength, the economy, and political stability. Manage crises, define your ideology, and try to keep your state standing.

games.name: Idle Desktop Marbles
games.description: Marble Desktop redefines the casual form of marble games with three core experiences: "physical excitement + idle development + relaxing decompression!"

games.name: S.A.F.E
games.description: S.A.F.E is a co-op survival horror game where you and your friends must go into procedurally generated castles and dungeons to find junk to throw in the grinder. The game includes many different maps and tons of monsters to keep you and your friends on your heels.

games.name: BlackSands
games.description: Trapped in a relentless time loop, fight your way through a mysterious arena. Explore, adapt, and use what you’ve learned throughout each reset to uncover its secrets and reach your freedom.

games.name: The Cats of Monte Cristo
games.description: A fun hidden object game with cats!  Explore detailed locations from Dumas' novel while finding fluffy witnesses to a great revenge.

games.name: Gnaughty Gnomes
games.description: Crush your friends in combat by embodying these adorable yet Gnaughty Gnomes! Throw everything you find along the way, choose cards to upgrade your build, change the rules of the game... whatever it takes to win.

games.name: Scott Pilgrim EX
games.description: Join Scott Pilgrim and Ramona Flowers in a brand-new brawling adventure across space, time, and the streets of Toronto!

games.name: Echoes of Red
games.description: Echoes of Red is a fast-paced roguelite shooter where you can carry tons of weapons at once, face endless enemies ever stronger and build your perfect custom loadout. Obliterate tens of thousands of enemies who dared to challenge you and make them regret standing against you.

games.name: Oradea
games.description: A hexagonal rhythm game played on a controller or touchscreen.

games.name: 3 Lines of a Delta
games.description: It’s time for him to face a long-avoided past. See the story from different point of views and gradually discover what caused everything to fall apart. The truth is hidden between the lines.

games.name: Card Roguelike of Musou Farming
games.description: A roguelike game of musou battle.

games.name: Oonga Boonga
games.description: Oonga Boonga is a tower defense inspired hero hoard battler! Arrange your heroes for best defense, get items and buffs and survive the run!

games.name: Monstergirl Hunters
games.description: A citybuilder where you collect your citizens. Capture monstergirls, craft their gear, and enact laws to turn them into compliant workers or fighters. Grow your colonies across 12 islands to fulfill the unique needs of your monstergirls. Or turn them all into unpaid interns and go humanity first.

games.name: Star and Serpent Solitaire
games.description: Experience Klondike solitaire through classical Tarot cards. Earn gold, claim treasure, unlock Major Arcana cards and if you win... get your fortune told.

games.name: Mega Trons Survivors
games.description: Become insanely overpowered in a Tron-style neon grid where swarms never stop. Stack broken upgrades, melt thousands of robotic enemies, complete high-risk side objectives, and deliberately break the balance to dominate the simulation.

games.name: Sad God
games.description: SAD GOD is a platformer-shooter-roguelike. We invite you to descend into a pit of monsters and traps. Gain strength from coins and weapons from altars. Touch an orb. Then race to the surface before the lava gets you.

games.name: The Adventure of Natsuki Hinomiya
games.description: "The Adventure of Natsuki Hinomiya" is an Action RPG that prioritizes the joy of exploration and is designed for short-cycle, repeatable runs.Gather items scattered across the open field, defeat the enemies blocking your path, and empower your protagonist.

games.name: Slice the Crops!
games.description: Slice, earn, upgrade, repeat. Slice mutant fruits in an addicting incremental game! Annihilate armies of unique mutant crops, dive into a deep talent tree, unlock new levels, and research powerful fruit mutations to maximize your harvest and dominate the farm.

games.name: Ikun Go Go Go
games.description: This is a 2D platformer with a trainee idol theme, inspired by the classic gameplay of 'NS-Shaft'. You will play as an aspiring idol trainee, proving your skills on 100 challenging stages!

games.name: The Long Winter: I Am Not an Animal
games.description: You inherit your father’s tavern in a small, isolated region.By day, life seems ordinaryBut when night falls, someone always knocks on your door.

games.name: Squid Arrives II: Make Squid Great Again
games.description: In XXXX, deep-sea squids receive "nuclear food" from the islands. This unnatural feast triggers their awakening, reviving the lost memory of cephalopod world domination. Note: Inspired by fried calamari. Contains allegory. Don't overthink it! (laughs)

games.name: Bochi Collection
games.description: An anthology of short indie games with emotional storytelling and simple gameplay. Discover unique experiences, each with distinct art, music, and tone. Perfect for players who enjoy narrative adventures, hidden details, and bite-sized stories.

games.name: Netoo
games.description: Netoo is a minimalist logic puzzle where you try to place small magnets into their correct spots by rotating transporter magnets with rotators. The difficulty of the game increases gradually, thanks to new mechanics introduced every 10 levels.

games.name: Rapid Puppet
games.description: Rapid Puppet is a wild mix of various genres that forms a unique and fast-paced gameplay experience. Roguelike action in the ever-changing worlds is designed to test your stamina and reaction speed. A set of upgradable skills and weapons to become an unstoppable Sci-Fi knight!

games.name: Salvage Unlimited
games.description: Salvage Unlimited puts you in the captain’s seat of a small salvage company. Accept contracts, use your boat’s sonar to locate wrecks hidden beneath the water, and bring your finds back to port to complete jobs. Buy, sell, and upgrade your fleet to take on bigger contracts and earn greater rewards.

games.name: Chilling Silence
games.description: Immerse yourself in the gloomy atmosphere of a small northern town at the turn of the millennium, where reality intertwines with the inner demons of the main character, who suffers from a strange form of social phobia. What could have happened in this godforsaken place at the edge of the earth?

games.name: Satsuman
games.description: Slice zombie veggies, stack insane weapons, and survive the chaos! Play as a furious mandarin warrior in this fast-paced roguelite arena shooter with endless upgrades and global leaderboards.

games.name: Enough
games.description: Enough is a Sokoban-style puzzle game where you play as Bell, a demon who can’t bring themself to work in Hell any longer. Traverse forests, deserts, mountains, and seas on your journey to see whether Heaven will give you another chance.

games.name: Follow Nightmare
games.description: Dive into Follow Nightmare, a psychological horror adventure where gore and macabre tales intertwine. Face a terrifying enemy and its nightmarish creatures. Survive through combat and parameters that customize your adventure. Dare you face the horror?

games.name: Homura Hime
games.description: "Homura Hime" is a third person action game, featuring Japanese anime visuals and intense 3D bullet curtain gameplay. Alongside Homurahime, fight against Demon Girls possessed by deviant "emotions", and get closer to discovering the truth of not only the fallen, but also your own veiled legacy.

games.name: Rusted Sea
games.description: Earth's surface has been dessimated by radiation from The War. The only remaining safe havens are found under the seas. Now you must cook, craft, and survive alone in your submarine, delivering vital supplies to the Starving Survivors - all while battling monsters both real and imagined.

games.name: Tape Us Out
games.description: Tape Us Out is an asymmetric, online co-op puzzle game. Players are sucked into a VHS tape and must face challenges of logic, coordination, and communication within the universe of old movies to find their way back to reality.

games.name: Nuggle
games.description: Nuggle is a delightfully cosy casual puzzle game with 100 levels at launch. It has a simple mechanic but you can quickly become unstuck trying to make sure there are no missing matches. It is unadulterated pure puzzles.

games.name: Everything I Know, and Everything I'm Ever Gonna Know
games.description: A short modern visual novel made with love, of course.

games.name: Mistpaw Ravine
games.description: The witches are gone. Only their cats remain. Make a new home for them in this feline city-builder. Keep your cats fed and happy, clean their litter box, and endure the toxic mist of a world ravaged by magic.

games.name: Iron Colony
games.description: After crash-landing on a mysterious island, confront hostile robotic creatures in intense combat and strategic duels. Explore forgotten ruins, uncover secrets, and fight for survival in a world where corrupted technology dominates every corner.

games.name: Roommates, Romance, and Ringing Hearts
games.description:
Roommates, Romance, and Ringing Hearts is a live action FMV romance simulation game where your choices shape a year of love and relationships with five unique heroines.

Experience cinematic storytelling, heartfelt moments, and branching outcomes as everyday roommate life turns into romance.

Produced by TV Asahi Japan and Aiming Inc..

games.name: Royal Dental
games.description: Rise from peasant dentist to royal healer in this quirky medieval dental simulation RPG. Treat patients, upgrade tools, improve your clinic, expand your knowledge, and restore Princess Penelope’s legendarily awful smile, all while facing sabotage from a jealous prince.

games.name: Grind TD
games.description: The gate is open, but it doesn't go across — it goes below. And something is coming up. As the ruler of a pixel realm, you will command the clash of strategies, dive deep into attack and defense, and experience the purest form of the tower defense world.

games.name: Picto-Cross: 1 Nonogram per Day
games.description: Picto-Cross is a 2D logic puzzle game with a minimalist style, known as nonograms, featuring a total of 372 puzzles based on historical events or celebrations that occur throughout the year.

games.name: Idle Quest Simulator
games.description: No complex operations required! Auto-battle through the Underworld, traverse the Dragon Palace, and retrieve the True Scriptures with full idle gameplay.

games.name: What Is Death?
games.description: A visual novel about death.

games.name: Kingdom Dice
games.description: Become a lord in a world of feudal greed in the turn-based economic board game Kingdom Dice. Build an empire, buy lands, collect taxes from friends, trade, and bankrupt everyone around you! (ง •̀_•́)ง

games.name: Death Scourges
games.description: Death Scourges is a linear and dark third person shooter mixed with tactical elements. You embody the captain of a special strike team consisting of four elite operators. Shoot, loot, craft and use your team to survive the unknown horror lurking in the depths of an underground research facility.

games.name: Never Grave: The Witch and the Curse
games.description: A Metroidvania x Roguelite, where you advance using a cursed hat. Use a variety of magic or possess your enemies to reach the lowest levels! Bring back loot, build new facilities in your village, make a living and strengthen yourself for the next battle! Supports up to 4-player multiplayer.

games.name: Marathon
games.description: A PvP-focused extraction shooter set on the mysterious planet of Tau Ceti IV, Marathon will see players inhabit the bodies of Runners, cybernetic mercenaries who have been designed to survive the planet’s harsh environments and explore the lost colony that once inhabited Tau Ceti’s surface. Players will engage solo or in crews of three, searching for mysterious alien artifacts, as well as for valuable loot and new weapons and gear that they can add to their collection.

games.name: Kromlech
games.description: Embark on a journey in this dark fantasy action-adventure game to find out why the tapestry of the world is suddenly unraveling itself and even the gods themselves seem powerless to stop it. Sharpen your blade, gather your companions, and prepare to make the last stand as the world around you burns.

games.name: Cupiclaw
games.description:
Cupiclaw is a cute & frantic claw machine roguelike deckbuilder.
Grab unique prizes, build powerful combos, face chaotic machines… and claw back your relationship!

games.name: Whispering Memories
games.description: Immerse yourself in a psychological thriller where your choices shape the story. Unravel the mysteries of a town plagued by supernatural phenomena, as you navigate the environments and interact with complex characters. Can you uncover the truth before it consumes you?

games.name: Planet of Lana II: Children of the Leaf
games.description: Embark on an unforgettable cinematic puzzle journey with Lana and her loyal companion Mui. Whether you're a returning hero or a new adventurer, step into a world where a new, ancient mystery emerges from Novo's hidden depths. But as they scour these depths, a new threat will put their unbreakable bond to the ultimate test, guiding Lana to confront her destiny amidst encroaching shadows.

games.name: Solitaire Battle
games.description: Slay your enemies by playing solitaire, synergize your card-powered attacks and abilities, then break the game and become the best to ever Solitaire Battle in this roguelike deckbuilding autobattler!

games.name: Docked
games.description: Return home to Port Wake and rebuild your family business. Docked is a realistic simulator where you operate heavy machinery, restore and develop the port's infrastructure, and manage day-to-day operations to help your port expand and thrive.

games.name: Taimanin Squad
games.description: Lead your squad of captivating girls in this Strategic RPG!

games.name: Anomaly 404
games.description: As a journalist, explore the unstable reality of a secret bunker in Anomaly 404 — a first-person psychological horror where your own eyes deceive you. Find and photograph the anomalies to uncover the horrifying truth behind "Project 404".

games.name: FoxHaunt
games.description: FoxHaunt is a choice-based RPG with turn-based battles. You are the Forgotten Fox. Find and fight the other fox spirits so that you will be remembered.

games.name: Directory Dungeon - File Explorer Dungeon Crawler
games.description: A tiny dungeon crawler played right in the windows file explorer. Explore a monster and loot filled dungeon by dragging and dropping your player folder into new rooms, equip powerful files, defeat terrible monsters, and banish evil once and for all.

games.name: Neuroforge
games.description: Build an unlikely army in this medieval-fantasy roguelike auto-battler. Choose from 80+ heroes with unique powers, join one of 10 factions, and conquer the galaxy’s 10 planets to impose your supremacy. Every victory, every defeat… comes down to your choices.

games.name: Hidden Raccoons
games.description: Hidden Raccoons is a relaxing hidden object game where you search for raccoons hidden in colorful pixel art worlds. With no timer, you can play at your own pace and enjoy every area.

games.name: Mega Memory
games.description: Upgrade your brain! Match cards, build massive combos, and earn coins to unlock game-changing upgrades. Scale from simple 2x2 grids up to the legendary 8x8 Singularity. A polished, scaling memory challenge with Steam Achievements and support for 18 languages.

games.name: My Sliem Gets Stronger After It Dies
games.description: My Sliem gets stronger after it dies is a fantasy RPG where you play as a weak slime. Through repeated rebirths, you grow stronger to defeat foes and uncover a conspiracy. In its top-down pixel world, you move, dodge, and cast spells—turning each death into power.

games.name: Mega Kaiju Boom Ball
games.description: Mega Kaiju Boom Ball is a giant monster-themed break-em-up developed with retro 8-bit constraints in mind. The game mixes the dynamics of breakout, pinball and legendary kaiju into a unique and action-packed 8-bit experience. Can you save the world from a kaiju invasion using just a ball and paddle?

games.name: Scrub Dudes
games.description: A world built from cardboard, fabric and handcrafted creations. Everything is messy and covered in grime, but the Scrub Dudes team is ready for action. Climb, glide, collect trash, fix things and WASH it all clean. Enjoy this cozy handcrafted world.

games.name: Boing Over It
games.description: Boing Over It is a challenge to your pride and your sanity. You’re a spring. You jump. You fail. You fall. And you try again… because you can’t stand letting the game win. Can you reach the top without losing your mind? I don’t think so.

games.name: Degeons Project
games.description: The abandoned mega-complex of Degeons Laboratory's holds dark secrets. Solve unique puzzles, investigate the cause of the catastrophe, and find out why the mysterious Man in the Crow Suit is watching you. Test your mind in this scientific enigma.

games.name: Myth Monkey Card
games.description: A unique blend of Texas Hold'em poker mechanics and Roguelike strategy. Forge your destiny across four distinct cultivation paths and challenge the gods of the Celestial Court. Will you master Artefacts for precise combos, or rely on the Self for a desperate comeback? In this mythic battle where the world is your card table, victory is yours to define.

games.name: Untold Memories: Potter's Field
games.description: Broken by guilt after a fatal accident, Mark accepts a mysterious job. But Potter's Field isn't looking for a guard; it’s looking for a prisoner. Orchestrated by revenge, your shift is a psychological execution. Watch the shadows, face your sins, or join the graves you protect.

games.name: Adventurer's Guild Reception
games.description: This is the Adventurer's Guild. Today, daring adventurers come here in search of a quick fortune. Become a receptionist at the Adventurer's Guild and arrange quests for unique adventurers in this training RPG game!

games.name: HyakuTyping
games.description: HyakuTyping is a typing software with a Roman alphabet input only theme based on the Hyakunin Isshu poems. You can play by looking at the display from the top and typing the lower verse, or by looking at the card with the lower verse and typing the first two characters of the upper verse.

games.name: Black Arhat: Wujing
games.description: Black Arhat: Wujing is a turn-based dungeon adventure game where players will take on the role of the protagonist Wujing and embark on a fantastic adventure journey with the companions they encounter along the way.

games.name: Lost and Found Co.
games.description: Lost & Found Co. is a hidden object adventure in a cozy and immersive world. Join a cast of quirky characters on their epic journey across countless magical locations. Find lost items, solve puzzles, and help a tiny dragon regain her power!

games.name: Froggonit
games.description: Froggonit is a cute comedy adventure about a frog with an obsession for secrets. Collect cards, defeat your enemies in turn-based battles and try to restore light to the island.

games.name: The Bearer & The Last Flame
games.description: The Bearer & The Last Flame is a dark fantasy action adventure. In a realm where death is rampant, a living soul has received his commission, to carry the last flame and light the lands of the night, the dark lands.

games.name: Aethus
games.description: Explore a vast underground world to mine, refine and craft hundreds of items, then build up your modular surface Outpost to farm hydroponic crops, prospect for gems and automate your resource-gathering in this sci-fi survival-crafter where the story always provides a reason to dig deeper.

games.name: Pieced Together
games.description: Pieced Together is a cozy scrapbooking game that takes you on a heartfelt journey about friendship and getting older. Sort items, solve gentle puzzles, and decorate the scrapbook as you uncover the story piece by piece.

games.name: Iridescent
games.description: Embark on a perilous journey through a plagued empire! Explore a vast world, conquer intricate dungeons and hone your skills against relentless adversaries that stand in your way of finding a cure. Are you capable of seeing this adventure to its end?

games.name: Mirage 7
games.description: Mirage 7 is a dark fairytale, a third-person adventure with a unique blend of fantasy and sci-fi. The young Nadira travels the desert with her pet lizard companion Jiji, searching for a lost oasis - where she hopes to find a way to save her sister.

games.name: Mina
games.description: Mina is a psychological thriller and story-driven TPS about psychiatrist Koray and patient Kagan investigating whether their world is a simulation. Players also experience Mina’s traumatic past and her attempts to escape, shaping the narrative through their choices.

games.name: Peregrino
games.description: Peregrino is a dark isometric survival adventure where you explore a cursed forest by day and manage your caravan by night. Gather resources, hunt deadly creatures, upgrade your caravan, care for your companions, and lead them through the vast wilderness in search of New Eden.

games.name: Space Hood
games.description: Defend your outpost in this tower defense with a raiding twist. Battle the ruthless Nova Roma Corporation as you build, loot, and survive relentless assaults.

games.name: Summer Adventurers: Mediterranean
games.description: Relax and explore the Mediterranean in a charming hidden-object adventure. Find cleverly hidden items, solve mini-puzzles, and uncover bonus sublevels filled with secrets!

games.name: Bloksie (For Now)
games.description: Enforce the Internal Revenue Code. Turn Hundreds into Decillions. Praise BirdJesus. The Rouge-Litest Arithmetic 'Em Up.

games.name: Bit//Cycle
games.description: bit//Cycle is a fast-paced top-down rogue-lite where you cleanse a corrupted computer system. Move fast as the heroic bit, or risk shrinking away to nothing. Procedural levels, grid-based movement, and permadeath make every choice matter.

games.name: Meow Survivors
games.description: A casual top-down game with simplified roguelike elements, where a ginger cat named Meow battles endless waves of enemies. Gain experience, upgrade your skills, find the most effective combination of abilities, and try to survive as long as possible.

games.name: Blockaholic
games.description: It's a physics-based puzzle that challenges your quick thinking and planning. Shake, spin, and pull the blocks up to put them into a line, but don't let them touch the ground

games.name: Untouchable Ground
games.description: You are a wandering fox, caught between warring animal clans, forgotten forest gods, and a secret that can unravel the world. The forest watches. Every step, every choice, could be your last.

games.name: The Vig
games.description: You'll be "Xie En", infiltrating the traitor's money empire. This urban hunt is a revenge saga where wit is your spear. Return as "Wu Wei," using rules as your shield in a world of grey. Will you choose love or vengeance? This lethal game of cash, betrayal and redemption awaits your move.

games.name: Ocean Pop!: Calypso Collision
games.description: Merge cute underwater creatures together in this physics-based puzzle game. Can you complete the sequence to get to the Whale Shark? Can you merge two Whale Sharks? Travel to the ocean floor for a relaxing game with an upbeat calypso soundtrack and test your skills!

games.name: Ghost Restaurant
games.description: In a melancholic first person narrative puzzle game, you are the Memory Chef of a mysterious restaurant for lost souls. Explore their memories, solve story driven and logic based puzzles, uncover deep regrets, and serve their final meal to bring them peace.

games.name: Kaibil
games.description: KAIBIL is a retro pixel-art RPG set in 1524. As warlord and king of the Mam Mayan tribe, Kaibil struggles to unite the warring and fractured tribes to try and resist the armageddon and save his people.

games.name: Memory Draw
games.description: Dive into the conscious and use your brushes to solve puzzles, reclaim forgotten memories.

games.name: FuwaFuwa Survivors
games.description: Survive with Fluffy Friends! In this 3D Survivor-like Action Roguelite, you Control adorable animals, Defeat swarms of enemies and Tame them to your Royal Companions! Utilize Skill Enchantment system to combine 20+ skills with 70+ Enchantment Cards to forge your unique builds!

games.name: Colorboration
games.description: Without crossing colors, move the blob characters around the field. By pushing boxes, have the blobs interact and together help them reach their goals.

games.name: Push Box 3D
games.description: 3D Box Pushing Game with 50 Levels

games.name: Birds Watching
games.description: You're the last human on earth. You spend your days bird watching. You're not alone on the mountain.

games.name: Briefcase
games.description: Briefcase is an atmospheric and satisfying inventory organization puzzle game featuring 50 handcrafted levels. Test your logic and attention to detail as you arrange weapons and items correctly to progress.

games.name: Grimslair
games.description: Build modular battle cards with Soulwords consumed from enemies you disembody, ripping their souls free. Play as Adam, the Grim Reaper’s son as you bend time to find new cards & synergies. Travel/fight alongside your dog and meet Grim’s daily soul quota to bring your girlfriend back from the dead.

games.name: Current
games.description: Find your flow in Current, a peaceful platformer focused on combining fluid movement to elevate momentum. Breeze through atmospheric worlds in this meditative experience.

games.name: Dungeon Apollonios
games.description: This RPG tasks you with forming a party of up to seven members to search for and defeat the Demon King Bargon within a vast dungeon, ultimately reclaiming the Ring of Galtea. Movement occurs in real time, while combat shifts to a turn-based system.

games.name: Connected Clue
games.description: A detective adventure where you infiltrate the scene to solve the case. Use tools to secure evidence and testimonies.

games.name: Pluto
games.description:
A roguelike deckbuilder where you fight with your fingers, spill some blood, and try to make it to your niece’s birthday on time.

You’re a wizard. A not-so-heroic wizard imprisoned for wizard crime, awoken from your wizard slumber by an invitation from your niece. Escape from jail and traverse a hostile world crawling with danger. Every turn is a frenzy of spell sigils, cracking bones, and desperate gestures as you shred through monstrosities with raw elemental power.

You’re not the chosen one, you’re just trying to be a good uncle.

games.name: Sushi Cat: Tower Defense
games.description: Battle back waves of rogue sushi in this cute-but-chaotic roguelite tower defense! Build, upgrade, and reshape the battlefield each run.

games.name: Drive Me Broke
games.description: Build your dream car! The cops are always on your back, so stay on good terms with them... Also, be prepared to do any job that requires money.

games.name: Astro Fighters 2
games.description: Astro Fighters 2 is a vertical scrolling bullet hell shooter designed to test your skills with non-stop arcade style action. Use a variety of special items, power up your chosen ship and compete for the high score across 4 difficulty modes to be the best fighter pilot in the game.

games.name: Dead Bit
games.description: Fast-paced runner-shooter where every run is a risky raid. Blast through enemies, grab loot, upgrade your weapons and gear, and unlock harder raids with new enemies and tactics each time you reach the end.

games.name: Project: Aftershock
games.description: Project: AFTERSHOCK is a fast-paced arcade hacking roguelite set in a dystopian future. Command a 20-year-old legacy terminal to breach enemy systems, siphon funds, and upgrade your hardware. Use your reflexes to survive the countdown and bring down the very system you created.

games.name: Holy Nope!
games.description: A small incremental game about defending Heaven from hordes of sinners who think they deserve a spot in Paradise. Sure, people have a high opinion of themselves, but Heaven is full - and you are the bouncer.

games.name: Card Corner
games.description: An idle poker game that sits in the corner of your screen while you do other things.

games.name: Echo of Humanity
games.description: A slow, atmospheric horror experience set aboard an abandoned orbital station - the last echo of humanity. Explore cold corridors, flickering terminals, and forgotten logs of a failed salvation program. No monsters. No jumpscares. Only silence, loneliness, and the weight of extinction.

games.name: LoopMage: The Infinite Trials
games.description: Fight an endless onslaught of foes in this minimalist wizard survival roguelike. Each loop makes you AND the horde stronger. How many loops can you survive? Ascend the global leaderboards to claim your glory!

games.name: Project Starblade
games.description: Project Starblade is a first-person action psychological platformer that follows YOU - a participant for a new series of tests that promise to push your body and mind to their limits. But not everything is at as it seems at "Fathom Laboratories"...

games.name: Demon With a Candy Crisis
games.description: A quick and easy 3d platformer playing as a demon that needs to quench its thirst for candy. Travel through hell to get to the surface to find someone's secret stash of candy.

games.name: Mr. Sleepy Man
games.description: In Mr. Sleepy Man, you play as a sleepy guy who's up way past his bedtime and out of control! Make a mess of everything you find and turn Bedtime Town against you! This sandbox adventure is filled with comical hijinks, outrageous characters, and platforming action!

games.name: Ranger’s Path: National Park Simulator
games.description: Begin your park ranger journey in Ranger’s Path: National Park Simulator. Maintain trails, assist visitors, check permits and respond to emergencies. Explore diverse biomes and observe varied animal behaviors across a wide range of species.

games.name: Nitro Turtles
games.description: Nitro Turtles is a racing game about super fast turtles! Reach insane speeds with awesome shell-attached gadgets, compete in crazy races with friends, and sprint across the finish line to claim ultimate turtle victory! To be the fastest turtle around, you'll need to master shell gadget usage, learn every shortcut imaginable, and maybe even consider using performance-enhancing seaweed!

games.name: Oeuf
games.description: 3D physics-platformer where you are an egg! Roll, hop and slide your way back home.

games.name: Unsealed: The Mare
games.description:
Unsealed: The Mare is a first-person psychological horror game set in a nightmare rooted in memory and trauma.

Players explore dark, oppressive environments while uncovering fragmented messages and hidden memories that subtly alter the world around them.

The experience emphasizes tension, sound awareness, and atmosphere, encouraging players to move carefully, listen closely, and piece together meaning through environmental storytelling.

games.name: Thelma Fantastic
games.description: Thelma Fantastic is a hidden object mystery game where every level and every hidden object is randomized. It is a game of finding objects, earning clues, and eliminating suspects to solve the case. An endless supply of randomly generated hidden object scenes for you to enjoy.

games.name: A Color Theory
games.description: A Trippy Puzzle-Platformer That Literally Plays with Color

games.name: Snack Escort
games.description: Who would’ve thought that a roguelike, card game, and tower defence could come together over a basket of food? Travel through magical lands filled with hungry creatures, collect cards and artifacts that shape your strategy with every run. Escort your food through this whimsical fantasy world.

games.name: Bililitz
games.description: Bililitz is a vertical roguelike with procedurally generated worlds. Explore mysterious depths, collect items, and discover portals to new challenges. Compete in the global ranking system to prove your skill and reach the top!

games.name: Bubblegum Galaxy
games.description: Bubblegum Galaxy is a cute building strategy game about rebuilding the galaxy tile by tile. Discover and design new planets, complete missions, explore your office and befriend your co-workers... all while trying to find out who deleted the galaxy!

games.name: Piece by Piece
games.description: It's time to open shop! Inherit your family's repair shop, and roll up your sleeves. Fix up the prized possessions of the forest folk, paint yourself a masterpiece to sell and make your family shop all your own with decorations, furniture and cookies!

games.name: Cirno! Lifts a Boulder
games.description: Help Cirno get back into her home! A chill, bite-sized 3D platformer in which you explore a frozen Misty Lake and gain boulder-lifting strength.

games.name: Malware Tycoon
games.description: Step back to the era of dial-up and WinGoals SP. As a black-hat developer, manage the delicate balance of detection probability versus payout potential. Will you build a silent botnet for profit or a worm designed to destroy? Avoid the feds and conquer the web in this nostalgic management sim.

games.name: Pig Commander
games.description: Pig Commander is a fast paced roguelike RTS where chaos rules every battle. Build improvised armies, pick a commander, and survive unpredictable challenges round after round.

games.name: Pawnbroker Simulator
games.description: Welcome to Pawnbroker Simulator, where you're the boss. Build your shop, strike deals, and test your business savvy in this indie simulation game. Dive into a world of trade and management. Can you make it big in the world of pawnbroking? Time to find out!

games.name: Mekanion
games.description: Defeat Mekanions, the mechanical lifeforms consuming the entire world!

games.name: RoadOut
games.description:
The world is dominated by an A.I. and rebel groups take refuge in a desert area known as the DeadZone.

Claire survives by executing delivery, sabotage and murder contracts for local leaders, while discovering about her past, revealing strange evidence that links her existence with the origin of the A.I.

games.name: John Carpenter's Toxic Commando
games.description: Take control of one of the commandos, team up with your friends and send the Sludge God and its horde of things-that-should-never-be back to the underworld. Choose the class that matches your playstyle, pile into your favorite ride, and unload an array of gunfire, grenades, special abilities, and freaking katanas as you save the planet.

games.name: Solateria
games.description: In a world where the Litt have perished, a small pyron warrior embarks on a journey to find the King, the Primordial Flame, the last hope to save the world. Defeat mighty foes, unleash fiery attacks, and master parrying. Explore a beautifully hand-drawn world and uncover its secrets.

games.name: DarkSwitch
games.description:
The Tree provides, the Tree protects, the Tree Prevails!

Dark Switch is a vertical city builder set in the boughs of a gigantic tree. Defend your leafy home against the perils of the creeping fog by managing light and flame.

Gather resources, research technologies, and send pioneers to explore the ruins of those who came before: discover their secrets and doom.

Set in a world of folk horror and creeping dread, DarkSwitch blends vertical city-building, tower defense, and exploration into a unique strategic experience.

Navigate a stunning, dangerous, dark fantasy world enriched by cinematic cutscenes and an atmospheric soundtrack from Silent Hill composer Akira Yamaoka!

games.name: Rhell: Warped Worlds & Troubled Times
games.description: Create unique spells by combining magical runes to solve puzzles your way. Transform objects, manipulate time, and discover the mysteries of a world where everyone has vanished, leaving only 12 people behind. Every puzzle has multiple solutions - if you can imagine it, you can probably do it.

games.name: 1348: Ex Voto
games.description: Journey through a tumultuous Medieval Italy as Aeta, a young knight errant who sets off on a brutal quest to find and save her closest one. 1348 Ex Voto is a cinematic action-adventure game inspired by chivalric tales.

games.name: Munchy Cat
games.description: Cat + Food + Color Matching! A feel-good, yummy puzzle that lifts your mood

games.name: Forest Loop
games.description: Forest Loop is a cozy incremental adventure game where you collect flowers, avoid hunters, and upgrade your way through the forest.

games.name: Clockwillows Voy Quest
games.description: Take control of Voy and jump all over the place, this is an adventure game with arcade elements, defeat enemies that hinder you on the way with jumps and punches in this magical-tech adventure!

games.name: Hollowreach: Alone
games.description: A third-person psychological horror focused on exploration and puzzle-solving. Trapped between the dead and his own thoughts, fight to maintain your sanity in a forgotten world. Each day echoes voices from the past — and the line between reality and delusion begins to fade.

games.name: Withered Haven
games.description: Withered Haven is a first-person psychological horror game. After the tragic loss of his wife and daughter, a broken man struggles to endure a collapsing reality. Familiar apparitions drift closer, echoing memories that mask a darkness beyond comprehension.

games.name: Writer's Block
games.description: Writer's Block is a falling block word game mashup where you write one block at a time. Put your vocabulary to the test, set up combos, and try not to let the letters pile up!

games.name: Mewseum: Film Festival
games.description: Mewseum: Film Festival is a puzzle game featuring famous movie posters in a charming feline universe. Get the museum ready for the big gala night in a relaxing and fun experience! Lights, camera... meow!

games.name: Coraroc
games.description: A back-to-basics retro platformer! Waking up alone in a mysterious laboratory, Coraroc must make his way through colorful stages and dastardly enemies to rescue his friends. Can you help Coraroc defeat the Pacicap menace?

games.name: Pocket Flight
games.description: Fly your own way in Pocket Flight - a cozy endless flight adventure! Explore dynamic biomes, face shifting weather, customize your plane, and take on daily challenges. Relaxing skies, infinite horizons. Ready for takeoff?

games.name: Ollie and the Merchant of Dreams
games.description: Ollie and the Merchant of Dreams is a 2D Metroidvania where you traverse a lore-rich world, summon monsters to your aid, ride a winged unicorn into battle, and unravel a story of duty and betrayal to free all of creation from chaos.

games.name: Mythmatch
games.description: A Greek mythology community sim about bringing people together by putting things together.

games.name: Funi Raccoon Game
games.description: Explore a series of whimsical, interconnected worlds to steal everything not nailed down. Make a garbage bin a garbage home :)

games.name: The Shame of a Daydreamer
games.description: Shame & choices = possible apocalypse. You need to figure out what’s causing the apocalypse to happen, so that you can prevent it. 2 playable characters with different relations to shame → 2 unique perspectives of the same story. Complicated families, branching choices and unforgiving consequences.

games.name: Monster Hunter Stories 3: Twisted Reflection
games.description: Twin Rathalos, born in a twist of fate. Two centuries after a conflict that divided neighboring kingdoms, the drums of war are reignited as twin Rathalos—long thought extinct—hatch from a single egg: an omen of destruction. Is there hope beyond the northern border?

games.name: You're My Favorite Person
games.description: Spend time with your new best friend! Have fun as it takes you through digital worlds to solve puzzles and collect Perfect Stars! After all, it knows what's best! It knows what's best! It knows what's best.

games.name: Teko
games.description: Teko is an Indie Roguelike Deckbuilder where you have to reach the highest possible score by playing Poker hands, but in an unconventional way: making 3 combos at once.

games.name: Next Patient
games.description: During a pandemic, you are a medical distribution officer at a controlled checkpoint. Review IDs, medical reports, and blood tests; approve or deny requests. Supplies are limited. Procedures are strict. The decision is yours.

games.name: Out of the Park Baseball 27
games.description: 27 years of sports gaming excellence! Out of the Park Baseball 27 is here - officially licensed by MLB, the MLB Players Inc. and KBO! This year's brand new version puts you firmly in charge of your favorite baseball franchise or country. Your team, your way, your rules.

games.name: WWE 2K26
games.description: The show never stops in WWE 2K26! Step into CM Punk’s 2K Showcase, dominate with 400+ Superstars and Legends, and unleash chaos with all-new match types.

games.name: Chopping Together
games.description: A 1-4 player co-op, You are stuck in a forest alone or together with one goal to chop every tree in sight. Chop Trees, Gather Wood, Make Money And Upgrade Your Tools

games.name: I am Slime
games.description: Memory backtracking, as one puzzle after another is solved, the memories of the blue slime are also turned over page by page ..

games.name: Everfall 2: Idle Dungeon RPG
games.description: Unique Bosses, Loot Filters, Combat Pets, & Pick Your Team of 4 to Customize with Skill trees, Keystones, Abilities, and Runes in a MASSIVE ENDGAME!

games.name: Insanio
games.description: Autobattler where you send misfits into vehicular combat. Your job is to prepare them, deploy them, watch them struggle and finally watch them die or win in massive explosions.

games.name: Cyber Saber Pro
games.description: Become HKKMR-U, the legendary Cyborg Samurai, and test your reflexes in a fast-paced arcade hack-and-slash survival game. Stand your ground, unleash your sword skills, and face wave after wave of mechanical enemies inspired by Japanese folklore.

games.name: Don't Crack!
games.description: A chaotic co-op or solo rage platformer about a fragile egg’s dangerous journey back to its nest.

games.name: Topobeam
games.description: Topobeam is a puzzle game about redirecting lasers in different two-dimensional manifolds. The levels operate on a grid system, but pay attention to how the sides of the grid are glued together as players, objects, and lasers can cross over these gluings to different parts of the level.

games.name: Night of Nightmare
games.description: Every night, the nightmare comes. Your room is no longer safe... The moment you lie down on a strange bed and close your eyes, you are no longer alone. Is this reality? Or are you inside someone else’s nightmare?

games.name: Drive Bros
games.description: Drive Bros is a chaotic co‑op driving game where one car is shared by multiple players. Drift, crash, and laugh as teamwork and rivalry collide on a mysterious island. Can your crew reach the PEAK of madness and escape together? Only the best bros survive the ride!

games.name: The Seven Deadly Sins: Origin
games.description: The Seven Deadly Sins: Origin is an open-world action RPG set in the universe of The Seven Deadly Sins. Step into the role of Prince Tristan of Liones and explore an open-world Britannia, as you embark on a journey to restore order to a world thrown into chaos by the collision of time and space.

games.name: Cavescape
games.description: Escape a procedurally generated cave by grappling and swinging. Explore the depths of the ecosystem, fight foreign creatures, and upgrade your tools. Destructible environments, deep mechanics, and tough bosses!

games.name: Ritus Exorcismus
games.description: Become the exorcist that the world needs! Use Holy Relics and the knowledge from your book to fight demonic possessions. Investigate unholy events and take part in church rituals in this medieval pixel horror game.

games.name: Giant’s Heart
games.description: Giant`s Heart — roguelike dungeon crawler with gardening elements. Discover powerful artifacts, make critical path choices - time is your most precious currency. A Giant marches toward the castle... You have just 5 minutes to descend into the dungeons, find and destroy its heart!

games.name: Deadline Delivery
games.description: Strap in, floor it, and deliver the goods — before the bomb goes off. Play as Carl, a monkey driving a mail truck rigged with explosives on a tight deadline. Play solo or with friends in this chaotic, explosive monkey mayhem!

games.name: Yes, My Warlord
games.description: Rule as a hobgoblin warlord in this kingdom management RPG. Balance resources and manage the shifting opinions of commoners, goblinoids, and elites. Face difficult decisions, and choose whether to rule with fairness… or with brutality.

games.name: Starship Troopers: Ultimate Bug War!
games.description: Lock and load into the Starship Troopers universe and join the Mobile Infantry in the most realistic depiction of war ever made ! Experience an original story in this action-packed, first-person retro shooter. Would you like to know more?

games.name: All Hail the Orb
games.description:
All Hail The Orb is a quirky and short active incremental game in which you devote yourself to The Orb!
Explore the once lost dungeon as you build your gathering of cultists and bring the dungeon back to its former glory!
Explore and enjoy the light-hearted progression and story!

games.name: Peeping
games.description: Peeping​ is a psychological survival game where you, a detained "supernatural suspect," must balance pretense and madness during a 31-day prison observation.

games.name: Thunder and Line-ing
games.description: Move lightning through the air to form lines. When everything aligns a boom echoes blasting your score up to a higher strata!

games.name: Skeleseller
games.description: Skeleseller is a laid-back idle game set in a vibrant fantasy world. You're a skeleton shopkeep who hires adventurers to collect loot for you after your untimely demise. Send adventurers into battle, sell what they find, and build up your town!

games.name: Bearly Flying
games.description: A hard game about flying a helicopter. Ascend through the floors of a deadly factory. Solo or local co-op. Watch out for emotional turbulence. Careful with those propellers.

games.name: Wizard 64
games.description: Destroy incoming enemies as a flying wizard. Collect points to grow stronger. Unlock new weapons and abilities, and use different builds to defeat endless monster hordes.

games.name: Cypher Dungeon
games.description: Identifier = ZERO. Localization = unknown system. Objectives = survive, decrypt, escape. Codes are key. Death is protocol. The sequence begins now.

games.name: What Did the Chicken See
games.description: A short, dark visual novel about a broken world. You are trapped with a cynical narrator who questions everything—school, society, and even you. In this glitchy reality, do your choices really matter, or are you just part of the system?

games.name: RoadHouse Manager
games.description: Bartend and run a roadhouse in this AI-enhanced roguelite-sim! Patrons once impressed, will become permanent barflies that can be hired as staff, or sent on quests in the mysterious mist. Upgrade your roadhouse, hire a band, and build your Signature Cocktail, with 333 ingredients to choose from.

games.name: Fireside Fables
games.description:
Fireside Fables is a narrative driven 3D platformer, which follows a group of children telling stories around a campfire. These stories then come to life, and you play through them as your favourite plushie!

You will be transported across worlds! From a pirate island, to a lush forest, even to outer space - Anywhere that the children's imaginations can take you!

games.name: Andromis
games.description: Play as two heroes a soldier and a doctor in a third-person action adventure packed with explosions, vehicles, and survival missions. Switch between characters, drive cars and tanks, rescue survivors, and fight deadly robots across 50 story missions in a post-apocalyptic world. Coming in January.

games.name: Layer Land
games.description: Layerland is a sandbox survival game set in a world that mirrors Earth’s terrain. Travel through gates, capture monsters as pets, and team up to battle, gather, craft, and build.

games.name: Crimson Desert
games.description: Crimson Desert is an open-world action-adventure game set in the beautiful yet brutal continent of Pywel. Embark on a journey as the Greymane Kliff and restore what has been lost. Explore uncharted lands, fight against threats that stand in your way, and discover the wonders the world has in store.

games.name: Mouse: P.I. For Hire
games.description: Join private investigator Jack Pepper on a guns blazing, jazz-fueled adventure in MOUSE: P.I. For Hire. MOUSE combines the charm of hand-drawn rubber hose animation inspired by the classic cartoons of the 1930’s with the adrenaline and action of an explosive first person shooter.

games.name: Valor of Man
games.description:
Valor of Man is a roguelike tactical RPG where enemies react to your actions, giving you endless chances to outsmart them with your tactics.
Valor of Man is developed by Legacy Forge, small indie studio created by 2 brothers.

games.name: True Vikings
games.description: Choose your own path: become a powerful jarl or a legendary king, or perhaps switch sides and follow the path of a knight, reliving the story of the Duke of Normandy.

games.name: Rushing Beat X: Return of Brawl Brothers
games.description: The legendary beat ’em up series from Jaleco returns. Master trained fighters take on a rising evil with raw strength and refined technique. Built around easy-to-use auto-combos, the game lets skilled players weave powerful strings for exhilarating combat. Let your fists burn with fury once more.

games.name: Virtual Ties Isekaijoucho Träumerei
games.description: Our protagonist, Kirishima Yu, returns from Tokyo to the island where he once lived and reunites with his childhood friend, Minase Seikai. Seikai, who had been on the verge of giving up on her dream of becoming an idol, looks somewhat gloomy. Wanting to make her smile again, Yu proposes that she debut as a virtual idol named "Isekaijoucho" based on an illustration he drew himself.

games.name: The Mortimer Paradox
games.description: A third-person sci-fi horror game about exploring your grandfather’s abandoned mansion and its interdimensional portals. Solve puzzles, evade monsters, and uncover why Dr. Voss vanished.

games.name: Setuna: Legend of Hamburger 2
games.description: All motions, all frames cancelable. The second installment of the ultra-free 3D action-adventure [SETUNA]. Challenge the limits of your skills with a fully professional-grade input system!

games.name: Rubato
games.description: A collect-a-thon about a frog fixing the solar system after it explodes for some reason.

games.name: Poke All Toads
games.description: A puzzle game starring mischievous fairies. Solve levels by working as a team, operating dangerous machinery and manipulating local wildlife.

games.name: VeilWood
games.description: Protect your farm from twisted creatures as you cultivate the land and put an end to the Azure Haze in this first person real time strategy dark farming sim.

games.name: Völund
games.description: The forge remembers every strike. In VÖLUND, a blacksmithing roguelike, you shape raw ore into weapons of legend. Unearth cursed metals, master the ancient craft, and forge your path to immortality.

games.name: Paracesium
games.description: PARACESIUM is a body horror time management game where you collect, analyze, dismember and reassemble body parts in order to create a pure cadaver for your experimentation. Every action takes time, so make your next decision carefully. Manage time, bodies and monsters and stay alive. Who is Delilah?

games.name: Inky Blinky Bob
games.description: Fly a weaponized hot air balloon across a chain of dangerous islands overrun by failed experiments. Scavenge resources, upgrade your flying machine, and dismantle the defenses of an occult biotech corporation before its greatest creation breaks free.

games.name: Desktop Fishing Cat
games.description: Here’s a cute, chubby black cat. All it wants to do is quietly go fishing. “Right in the corner of your desktop!” Collect fish to fill up the cat’s encyclopedia, earn money, and dress it up in adorable outfits!

games.name: Journey of the Garden Rose
