games.description: Lily must explore a fantastic palace and contest with the machinations of a cruel prince to rescue her mother in this Old-School 3D Action-Adventure game!

games.name: Incremental Ragebait
games.description: Incremental Ragebait is the journey of Demon Incrementus to ragebait god! Buy new weapons, unlock upgrades, and build a purgatory to automate the ragebaiting process.

games.name: Melody Friends
games.description: Just drop in your favorite song—done! A cute rhythm game that auto-generates multiple difficulties. Play comfortably with any key and clear a song your way with five friends.

games.name: Brighter Days
games.description: Fight difficult enemies, explore dangerous locations, and gain strength in this hand crafted world to defeat the evil that lays waste to these Scarred Lands.

games.name: Granser
games.description: A story driven rpg inspired by JRPGS like Xenogears/saga, featuring a unique turn based battle system. Follow Saragat and his dubious allies as they untangle the web of lies and attempt to dismantle the shadowy conspiracy of "The Core", as a far greater threat will reawaken.

games.name: Damon and Baby
games.description: An exciting new style of action adventure fusing shooting action with exploration.

games.name: Lofi Mahjong
games.description: Dive into a calm, cozy world with Lofi Mahjong. Enjoy classic Mahjong Solitaire enhanced by a lofi soundscape for maximum focus and minimum stress.

games.name: Reconquista
games.description: A fast-paced dungeon boomer shooter with melee combat, magic, and seed-based generated levels.

games.name: Mushi
games.description: Welcome to Mushi! The next-gen Auto-RPG set in a rich fantasy world. This is a feature-packed incremental idle game, meaning that it mostly plays on its own. Your hero will automatically defeat enemies and level up on your screen while you do other things. Begin your rise from level 1 today!

games.name: The V Anomaly
games.description: The V Anomaly is an atmospheric observation game where small changes matter. Search each room for anomalies and choose the correct exit: progress deeper as the Area number climbs or make one wrong call and return to Area 0. Stay sharp. Doubt everything.

games.name: Opus: Prism Peak
games.description: Opus: Prism Peak is a narrative adventure where your choices lead to divergent endings. Play as a photographer lost in an ethereal realm, and unveil its mysteries with your camera to find a way home.

games.name: Call of Dookie
games.description: Imagine you went to the crapper, and emerged an hour later to a monster apocalypse! Retro first-person shooter action inspired by 90's classics! Old-school local deathmatch & co-op for up to 4 players!

games.name: Copa City
games.description: Organize high-stakes football events in the first football tycoon! Get the urban space and the stadium ready, ensure safety, and provide fans with an amazing football fiesta! But stay alert: Your decisions will not only influence the city but also the emotional rollercoaster for football fans!

games.name: Rubber Sharks
games.description: Plunge into the tranquil existence of the sweet poolside life with the amazing company of peaceful Rubber Sharks. This adventure invites you to revel in the bliss of your cherished poolside sanctuary. But could there be a mystery hidden in this peaceful scene, or even more?

games.name: Project Songbird
games.description: Project Songbird is a cinematic first-person narrative horror game set in the Appalachian forest. Take on the role of Dakota, a musician who must record their new album in a remote log cabin amidst a writer's block. Take caution, however. These woods were never empty...

games.name: Screamer
games.description: High-octane action and anime aesthetics collide in this arcade racing game, featuring fighting mechanics and a storyline that hits hard. In this world, some race for glory while others seek power or revenge. Every race is a fight and every battle is personal.

games.name: EverSiege: Untold Ages
games.description: Liberate Bastion, humanity’s last refuge. Defend against evil hordes, reclaim lost powers, rebuild ancient ruins, and adapt your tactics to break the everSiege. A top-down action-strategy rogue-lite where choices shape every run, playable solo or up to 3 players in co-op.

games.name: Nutmeg!
games.description: NUTMEG! is a nostalgic football manager game with a deckbuilding twist, set in the '80s and '90s. Relive the days when the tackles were as hard as the mullets were long and football was about football.

games.name: Etrange Overlord
games.description: Join Étrange on this musical odyssey as she seeks to conquer hell in the pursuit of living her best afterlife.

games.name: Sweet Starlight Sisters
games.description: “Sweet Starlight Sisters” is a character-raising romance adventure where you share a sweet life under one roof with the bunny-girl sisters Anya and Sanya. Train the duo with your own hands to become top performers, and—while occasionally fielding their heart-pounding advances—lead them to victory.

games.name: Life is Strange: Reunion
games.description: Life is Strange: Reunion is the thrilling finale to the Max and Chloe saga, a chapter that brings their book to a close. This is a full circle moment for both developers and fans—one that builds on everything that has come before. And even as the game delivers a reunion long-thought impossible, it also caps off our time at Caledon University in a literal blaze of glory.

games.name: GwenBlade Witcheresque
games.description: Hack and slash your way through depression in lightning-paced Soulslike to find a way to finally move on from loss in real life

games.name: Michael Test
games.description: Michael Test is a point-and-click adventure game where you uncover hidden truths within classical paintings and follow faint traces of sound to deduce and choose the final ‘sin.’

games.name: Commie Block
games.description: Survive as the newly appointed manager in an expanding communistic regime where our purpose is to produce more and more resources for the glory of motherland! Manage the workforce & optimize output of buildings to survive against unrealistic demands as long as possible in our own commie block

games.name: Is Zombody Home?
games.description: Upgrade the house, customize the weapon and charge the special attacks, your cute zombie horde is about to attack.

games.name: Blastroid
games.description: Blastroid is an arcade-style roguelite set in space. Players customize their ships by combining different engine and weapon systems, striving to survive against ever-evolving threats in regions swarming with enemy waves.

games.name: Mega Man Star Force: Legacy Collection
games.description: The Mega Man Star Force series, which expanded into an anime, is back in the Mega Man Star Force Legacy Collection! This collection includes seven games and additional features like a gallery of illustrations and music! Online play is also supported!

games.name: Farming With Lasers
games.description: Incinerate various pests with your giant laser, as you grow your farm. Purchase incremental upgrades to expedite the process.

games.name: Don’t Turn off the Light
games.description: Don't Turn Off the Light is a 5-player asymmetrical multiplayer horror game where one player becomes a demon lurking in the darkness. Survivors must rely on light, teamwork, and scavenged weapon parts to avoid possession, escape captivity, and fight back before it's too late.

games.name: Trushybin & Removin: What I Couldn’t Delete
games.description: A cozy and emotive 3D platformer about two tiny PC icons who, with innocence and love, accompany their owner on a journey of emotional healing and memories.

games.name: Afterdepth
games.description: Explore, build, and survive in the depths of a forgotten world. Manage oxygen, power, and resources as you uncover the secrets buried beneath the surface.

games.name: Anything Simulator
games.description: A powerful 2D sandbox simulator — physics and magic, characters and animation. Create anything you can imagine!

games.name: My Egg Girls: A Gentle Story
games.description: A 100-day cohabitation romance you’ll wish would never end. Your choices sway emotions, shaping reactions and the ending in this emotional growth ADV.

games.name: Cubin II
games.description: Cubin II is a first-person puzzle-platformer game that re-immerses you in the LGA experience. Complete the story by solving these 50 new experiments to finally escape from this terrible place.

games.name: Theropods
games.description: Face dinosaurs, solve puzzles and travel back to the time of ginormous lizards and pixelated adventure games.

games.name: Mike Goes on Hike
games.description: Become a real tourist in Mike Goes on Hike! Amazing wild landscapes, inexpressible atmosphere of hiking and important vital lessons are waiting for you. Go all the way to the end to fulfill the request of your beloved grandfather.

games.name: I Am Jesus Christ
games.description: Become Jesus Christ, the famous man on Earth - in this highly realistic simulation game. Pray like Him for getting superpower, perform famous miracles like Him from Bible like casting demons, healing and feeding people, resurrection and more in "I am Jesus Christ".

games.name: Elementallis
games.description: Top-down action adventure with elemental magic gameplay. Guilt pushes you on a journey to restore the elements in a pre-apocalyptic world. Use and combine your elemental powers to fight and solve puzzles across the temples.

games.name: Dewdrop Dynasty
games.description: Run, dash, and crawl your way through a fast, Metroidvania. Battle with giant bosses, find new guns and abilities, meet quirky characters, and most importantly find your way home.

games.name: Parkour Bot
games.description: Parkour Bot is a fast paced, rhythm based, physics platform game, with an unique movement set of main character. Show your skills and get a lot of achievements in 100 dynamic levels.

games.name: Gecko Gods
games.description: Explore a mysterious island as a tiny lizard. Complete ancient puzzles, effortlessly climb cliffs, and eat bugs as you make your way across an island civilization lost to time.

games.name: Honeycomb: The World Beyond
games.description: Honeycomb: The World Beyond is a survival-sandbox game set on an exuberant planet – Sota7. Explore its vast world and face challenges on your bioengineering journey. Crossbreed plants or animals, gather resources, craft items, and conduct experiments in order to develop new species.

games.name: SacriFire
games.description: A modern JRPG-inspired game with a unique battle system, rich story, fantastic visuals and music by Motoi Sakuraba.

games.name: Building Relationships
games.description: Roll, jump, and dash around as a house on a date in this silly adventure game. Meet eccentric structures, romance eligible bachelorx pads, and uncover the meaning of life... or you could go fishing instead (though we replaced the fish with cars to make more sense).

games.name: Sondro Gomez: A Sunova Story
games.description: "Sondro Gomez: A Sunova Story" is an action-adventure platformer following the story of a failing musician named Sondro, who must seek and recover the wish-granting Mystic Orbs to repay his debt to the mysterious Masked Man. Can he find them before the many rogues of Sunova beat him to the punch?

games.name: Dono's Tale
games.description: Relive the glory days of the 16 and 32-bit era in Dono's Tale. A super cute and colorful platformer about a hungry little dragon! Jump, dash, climb, and shoot your way through detailed and colorful worlds in order to get back your precious fruit!

games.name: The Swordfish: Knight of the Deep
games.description: Embark on an epic adventure as a sword-wielding fish and restore order to the kingdom's depths. Explore an ocean world full of adorable characters, menacing foes, and hidden wonders.

games.name: Smipat and the Lost Bones
games.description: In Smipat and the Lost Bones you follow the life of Smipat, a necromancer's pet with a will of it's own. Smipat has lost some of it's bones and is going on an adventure to find them. Each bone has it's own unique ability that makes it possible to overcome the challenges ahead.

games.name: The Wolf Is Dead
games.description: Detective work is never easy. When the body of Alexander Wolff is found face down in the pool at a party for the film about his life, there's only one man (well, Fox) for the job. Interrogate suspects, investigate the scene of the crime and reach back in time with your partner, Maxwell Mirror.

games.name: Concerto on White
games.description: Rhythm Action? No, this is MUSICIAN SIMULATION! Concerto on White is a musician simulation game featuring classical music. Unlike any typical rhythm games, players are required to actually play the main melody. In the main story, you will experience adventurous campus life in the academy.

games.name: High Elo Girls
games.description: High Elo Girls is a Visual Novel set in the esports scene where you play as the latest recruit for a new all-girls team. Can you help your squad achieve their true potential, or will you only squander your own?

games.name: Demon Spore
games.description: Blast your way out of tentacle hell as a failed lab experiment gives birth to a rapidly growing viral horror in this intense action rogue-lite inspired by 80s Monster movies. Use the lab to your advantage and improvise an escape plan before this constantly evolving life form spreads out of control.

games.name: Rise of the Robots X
games.description: Rise of the Robots X (RoRx) is an online futuristic card-based strategy game played on a hexagonal grid battleground. Played on a hexagonal grid battleground, each game is an opportunity to refine your army and get better Robots, Buildings or Masteries!

games.name: Breadskate
games.description: BRDSKT (BREADSKATE) is a freeroam skating game but you play as bread and ducks with guns have invaded your world. Simply give your newly baken bread loafs some wheels and watch them go skating and exploring the world. Truly the miracle of life of bread!

games.name: Occulto
games.description: Occulto is an indie adventure game with a focus on artistic hand-drawn visuals and a non verbal game play, set in a fantasy world. Guide Eliot through riddles, mysteries, puzzles, strange creatures, faraway places and help him find his master!

games.name: SUMBR
games.description:
A 2-8 Player Arena Shooter filled with chaos.

Ascend into a 300 year intergalactic war between the 7 factions of humanity. Fight against all fronts and reunite the First Kingdom, as a Bellator of The King's Guard. Discover high tech weaponry, bionic augments and artifacts of a Pinnacle Era in the sci-fi Co-op, PvP, PvE world of SUMBR.

Venture into war-torn faction territories of the solar system, clear Heroic missions, and battle against other players in a variety of PvP modes, either solo or with friends.

games.name: The Backworld
games.description: Experience a non-linear turn-based horror RPG. Navigate through eerie corridors and surreal dimensions, while battling and evading terrifying monsters. Grow stronger by exploring every corner, not grinding battles. Forge your own path to find new colorful worlds, and decide the fate of the universe.

games.name: Little Nemo and the Guardians of Slumberland
games.description: Explore a dream world as Little Nemo, armed with toys, candy, and stuffed animals in this colorful platforming metroidvania adventure.

games.name: Interwoven
games.description: Welcome to Interwoven - a compact, but dynamic adventure inspired by traditional turn-based JRPGs! Follow an unlikely trio on their journey up to defeat the Obsidian Drake atop Anvite Mountain. Use the unique Augment Battle System to create all sorts of interesting strategies.

games.name: Flesh Everest
games.description: Explore a randomized facility built within a massive living mountain of flesh. Flesh Everest mixes a rogue-like survival experience with shooting mechanics inspired by Silent Hill and Resident Evil. Death is permanent and ammo is limited.

games.name: Glaciered
games.description: Glaciered is an action-adventure indie game that takes place on a glacier-covered Earth 65 million years in the future. Play as a Tuai, a species evolved from birds, to soar through the seas and fight against the threats to this new golden age of life.

games.name: Esoteric Ebb
games.description: ESOTERIC EBB is a single-player CRPG inspired by the freedom of tabletop adventures. Unravel a political conspiracy with your goblin sidekick. Roll dice in tense encounters. Become a cleric of legends or completely ruin the campaign.

games.name: Lucid
games.description: Discover your own legend in Lucid. Platform through a crystalline world torn apart by calamity, absorb powerful abilities that expand movement and enhance combat against a diverse cast of enemies and bosses, all in gorgeous pixel art inspired by the golden age of 2D sidescrollers.

games.name: King's Reign
games.description: Become a King of the mystical and mysterious land of Thalendaar. Rule a magical Kingdom by indirectly influencing your people's actions. Expand your cities, gather resources, and protect your citizens from mystical monsters in this lighthearted strategy game.

games.name: Bangkok Story: A Stray Dog
games.description: A top-down 2D story-driven adventure game inspired by real-life events. Traverse and experience the life of a formerly homeless man through an interview of how he regained his sense of self by telling his past to a stray dog. Set in Bangkok, Thailand 2017.

games.name: Eagle Knight Paradox
games.description: Eagle knight paradox takes you (the player) into a doble experience, one of them is the role of a powerful mecha trying to protect a space city from space fanatics. On the other hand, the game sets you as the role of Ian (the pilot) building relationships around the city or whats left of it.

games.name: Epsylon
games.description: A private eye mystery game where you decide how to solve the case. Use your detective skills to solve the case or rely on the abilities of your little dragon partner to see things from a new angle.

games.name: Witches Tavern
games.description: Witch Tavern is a simulated business game that integrates tavern management, cosplay, love development and other elements. As the new boss of the witch tavern, you will meet all kinds of friends in this magical city of Venesia and start a full and extraordinary life.

games.name: NecroTactics
games.description: An auto-battler roguelite with tower defense and horde survival elements. Draft and position your army, develop your graveyard, equip units with powerful items, cast spells, and place turrets to annihilate your opponent's army in seconds!

games.name: Ghost Cam
games.description: Ghost Cam is a spooky exploratory VR and PC game where you search for ghosts – at your own risk… Discover how good you are at finding ghosts, figuring out clues and uncovering the story - if you can survive the multiple endings.

games.name: Anomalistic Revolution
games.description: You stand before a pit at the city's heart, then your gaze drifts to a deeper void, one you fear even more. Wield your invention to unravel mysteries, reclaim lost memories, strengthen your skills, and battle nightmare-born horrors in this multi-ending RPG.

games.name: Slipgate
games.description: Explore a gloomy rooms of damned sci-fi base as a doomed marine, only survivor of the portal experiment. Save humanity like in 90's with your trusty shotgun, paving a way through ominous corridors inhabited by the shadows of sinners and evil spirits.

games.name: Solaro
games.description: Solaro is a handcrafted open-world game set in the remote outskirts of an ancient galaxy. Follow a lone traveller on an interstellar journey, solving puzzles, probing planets, and recovering lost fragments of the past.

games.name: One Card One Shot: Mafia
games.description: Enter the world of the mafia, with an agile and dynamic Card Game that will challenge you in your free moments or addict you for hours! Choose a mission and hit the target in seconds! What awaits you with each card turned over? Will you become the legend feared by all or will you fall into oblivion?

games.name: TouHou: Legend of Fairy Souls
games.description: “TouHou: Legend of Fairy Souls” is a TouHou fan game.In the game, because of someone's conspiracy, Reimu turned into Kedama and caused her power to weaken.Reimu then had to embark on an adventure to recover herself and finally uncover who was behind the scenes.

games.name: Montaro 2
games.description: Montaro, master of stealth, sneakily infiltrating a convenience store with nobody being none the wiser. A stealth puzzle game where you manipulate objects and NPCs to complete objectives, "stealing pantsu".

games.name: It Consumes
games.description: It Consumes is a roguelite arena-FPS in the dark. See by beating your heart and kill demons shrouded in shadows. Upgrade your abilities, unlock new weapons, and conquer what lurks in the darkness.

games.name: Timeless Rain
games.description: Explore this foreign world and use manipulate time to defeat any creature who dares to stand between you and your goal! Meet the inhabitants of this strange realm as they push you towards finding the Timeless Rain...

games.name: Whispers of the Luminaries
games.description:
Whispers of the Luminaries is an idol-themed murder mystery visual novel where you balance social life with detective work.

Investigate, obtain clues and deduce the killer.

games.name: Breathedge 2
games.description: Sent on a reckless mission, you find yourself in outer space filled with numerous dangers and things to explore. Build, craft, manage your crew, look after the chicken, and defeat the evil space corporation in this new breathtaking survival game.

games.name: Dimhaven: The Lost Source
games.description: After several years, the team behind Quern - Undying Thoughts is back with new mysteries to unfold. Explore Dimhaven, solve mind-bending puzzles and uncover the truth behind the Ravenwood legacy in this first-person adventure.

games.name: The Posthumous Investigation
games.description: Travel to a noir Rio de Janeiro in 1937 and investigate the mystery behind the murder of Bras Cubas, the famed character created by Machado de Assis. Until the truth is out, you'll be trapped in a time loop, amidst a plot full of conspiracy and treason.

games.name: Who Are You!?
games.description: 'Who Are You!?' is a strong narrative first person sci-fi psychological horror videogame, where you will play as Ray Roswell, traveling through his distorted memories and solving puzzles to understand what is real about his wife’s disappearance 20 years ago.

games.name: The Ripe Blood Anthology: This World Is Just for the Two of Us
games.description: Take on the role of Derek — the police chief in a small town. Make decisions that will change the course of the story. Unravel the mystery behind the peculiar behavior of Derek's boyfriend, Chris, and his younger sister. The graphic style is inspired by bara-manga and colorful line art.

games.name: Neo Junk City
games.description: Dive into Neo Junk City, a cyberpunk adventure where you’re an android detective unraveling your own murky past. Navigate neon streets, engage with unique characters, and race through the rain-soaked city. Uncover secrets in this twist on point-and-click gameplay.

games.name: Monke Simulator
games.description: Peel banan, escape containment and shower your oppressors in stench. Top the scoreboards, be the fastest ape and liquefy your neurons in this stink infused parkour shooter.

games.name: Wish Upon a Llama
games.description: Embark on a delightful journey of breeding and raising adorable animals like llamas, bunnies, and capybaras while building meaningful relationships with the residents of Llama Town. What unique animal breeds will you discover and whom among the townsfolk will you befriend? Adventure awaits!

games.name: Sylvana's Chronicles
games.description: A turn-based strategy game with roguelike and deck-building elements. Explore a dark and magical world full of forgotten lands, monsters, and secrets. Build your own deck of cards to fight your way through the dungeons. Upgrade your cards, unlock new items, and discover ancient artifacts.

games.name: Cooking Simulator 2: Better Together
games.description: Cooking Simulator is back – bigger, better, and with optional multiplayer! Create your own recipes and take advantage of new and improved controls to become the best restaurant cook in the city! Or just have fun and enjoy cooking at your own pace. You’re the chef here!

games.name: Frame of Mind: A game of Thoughts
games.description: Frame of Mind is a brief and cozy narrative game that lets you discover a character trough thoughts and mementos they find while moving out of their parents home. It's an introspective game, meant to share some experiences a peer-group of neurodivergent queers, including the developer, had growing up.

games.name: Vultures: Scavengers of Death
games.description: Face zombies and fearsome monsters in this turn-based survival-horror roguelike as you seek the path to recover a valuable artifact. Unravel the history of Salento Valley and its downfall after a bioterrorist attack led by a secret cult involved with the powerful corporation Eugenesys Tech.

games.name: Memento Dawn
games.description: A colorful puzzle game that follows a lost child on a journey to search for her memories and helps her through the darkness by controlling light and shadow.

games.name: KnockedDown
games.description: Race as a cop, take down criminals in this thrilling low-poly game. Fast action, challenging obstacles. Join the chase!

games.name: Oni Hunters
games.description: Journey through Gironia's lands, where monsters roam and secrets await. Battle, fuse creatures, and decide your fate in the grand Monster Jubilee. Ready for the adventure?

games.name: The Chronos Event
games.description: The Chronos Event is a fast-paced third-person shooter that emphasizes the tactics of time travel and fast, aggressive play. Players rewind time, battling alongside their younger selves against overwhelming opposition.

games.name: KilaFlow
games.description: Play as the mascot of a blazing fast (for it's time) antivirus software to clear out corruptions and viruses from various devices around a town.

games.name: House 2
games.description:
As a terrible storm approaches, two young girls spend a fateful night watching TV and playing games…

House 2 is the sequel to the hit indie horror game, House. In House 2, you play as Tabby & Melody, finally free from their cursed home, in the next chapter of the House saga.

games.name: 500 Caliber Contractz
games.description: 500 Caliber Contractz is a momentum-based 3D-Platformer in which you play as a contract killer hired via crowdfunding to murder CEOs, Disgraced Sinister Ex-Doctors, Private-Prison-Owning DJs, etc. With your handy high caliber sniper rifle and a chest full of anxiety, you can and will propel yourself to where you need to be. Collect tokens that float around for a reason I haven't bothered coming up with and then murder your target. Do it. Please.

games.name: Roll The Bones
games.description: Select spell-dice for your loadout, roll them and wreak absolute havoc! This high-paced pixelart roguelite will let you build unique loadouts with extremely interactable spells. Let's roll some bones!

games.name: Flow of War
games.description: A classic RTS game that features auto-micro workers and warriors, freeing you to focus on your base defense strategy with a variety of towers and walls. Craft an army with MOBA-like heroes and units to counter your enemies' strengths and secure victory on stunning procedurally generated maps.

games.name: Vangaro Tactics
games.description: Command colorful troops into tactical turn-based battles in Vangaro Tactics! Infiltrate enemy outposts on the Stealth Missions: mine, recruit, move wisely, and you'll stand a chance. Know your commanders and exclusive units to make the most of each faction.

games.name: Ammossum
games.description: Build an endlessly upgradable weapon! Evolve projectiles into unstoppable firepower in this action roguelike. Fight through hordes of infected beasts, save your family, and feel the thrill of bloody shootouts filled with bullets, explosions, and acid. Can you survive the madness?

games.name: Teacher Seduction
games.description: Math is such a boring thing... Unless you have a hot teacher! In this case, even her angry boyfriend might not be a big problem.

games.name: Sp(l/r)ite
games.description: When you wake up, you are in a different space. "Sp(l/r)ite" is an adventure game in which you must cooperate with your neighbors and a vivacious goddess, separated by walls, to escape from a room floating in a different space, while solving riddles. Which door will you choose when you get there?

games.name: Ooga
games.description: Help Ooga to retrieve his stolen food stockpile in this fast-paced, spear-based parkour platformer. Play the first world and a half in the free demo, secrets included!

games.name: Project Chameleon
games.description: Project Chameleon is a stealth game where you must shape-shift into objects to go unnoticed by your enemies. Play as Siren, an elite spy executing missions around the globe. Manipulate your surroundings, set traps, and use powerful gadgets in each mission.

games.name: Enginefall
games.description:
Start your revolution in a multiplayer social sandbox set aboard colossal trains circling a post-apocalyptic world. Craft, fight, and scheme your way through the classes, take control of the engine, and build your own future.

Enginefall is a multiplayer sandbox combining high-stakes combat, survival crafting, and long-term progression. Start as a “tailie,” trapped in eternal servitude aboard a massive mega-train, and fight to rise through the classes, take the engine, and become the conductor. Whether you focus on shooting and raiding, make friends and build alliances, or craft the ultimate base and gear, every new train is a chance to carve your own path to freedom.

games.name: The Last Winter Knight
games.description: Haunt a suit of armour. Explore an abandoned castle. Recover your memories... and bring the ghosts of the past to rest in this melancholy visual novel about love, family and regret.

games.name: Bloody Shrine
games.description: Complete the ritual and defend the shrine in this top-down arena shooter roguelite. Unlock new demons, discover new weapons and choose the right spells and items. Create hell-breaking synergies that will unleash pain and suffering on all ghoulies, elites and bosses.

games.name: Simulacro
games.description: In this first-person philosophical journey, Poísis, an enthusiastic art student, explores a mysterious island in Greece. As she solves the local puzzles, she uncovers traces of its ancient inhabitants, leading her to question her own reality.

games.name: isekizima: Ruins and Tails Journey
games.description: This is an action game where you explore ruins buried in the forest with Ethnic BGM. Kijino, a cat-eared adventurer with two tails (Nekomata), goes on a journey around the ISEKIZIMA (Ruins Island of dreams and romance : as it was written in the tourist brochure).

games.name: Wildlife Rescue Simulator
games.description: Get to the chopper and fly to isolated places to rescue terrified animals from man made disasters. Take photos of your adventures and share it with your loyal supporters to get donations. Upgrade your equipment in order to rescue even more animals.

games.name: Dead Weight
games.description: Challenge the Ancient Gods! Set the sails of your flying pirate ship and embark on the adventure in the steampunk world of Dead Weight. Explore floating islands in search for loot. Choose a class or create your own and enjoy turn-based tactical combat on tiny battlefields where every step matters.

games.name: Endurance Motorsport Series
games.description: Manage the race from the stands, drive legendary cars and enjoy a genuine endurance race experience. As both driver and engineer, in this unique simulation victory can only come through teamwork.

games.name: The State of Nowhere
games.description: Assigned to station 65, your role as employee 100411 will be to serve and sell products to the people, exercising the controls the state deems necessary to keep the population in line

games.name: Endless Tactics
games.description: Endless Tactics is a turn-based roguelite game. Play as the commander of a high-risk planetary mining operation, defend your base from alien creatures while trying not to get overrun. Use resources to upgrade your starship, unlock new technologies, powerups, and deadly new worlds to harvest.

games.name: Synapse
games.description: 「Synapse」is a game based on cooperative play with horror and thrills. Players must cooperate in a dark space to avoid robots, hack into facilities, and escape. The only thing players are given is a sense of helplessness and fear of death.

games.name: Eko And The Bewitched Lands
games.description: "Eko and the Bewitched Lands" is a roguelite action RPG game. Help Eko on his mission to save the bewitched lands filled with enemies. Acquire and upgrade weapons of all kinds to combat and discover all the secrets that awaits for you.

games.name: Deflectorium
games.description: Deflectorium: 2D sci-fi rogue-lite singleplayer. Deflect deadly shots back at your enemies to become unstoppable. With unique deflection system, you'll dominate battles while upgrading your skills and stats. Prepare for adrenaline experience where defense isn't just a tactic but an art.

games.name: Cheap Car Repair
games.description: Cheap Car Repair - go back in time to Poland of the 90's. Run your own Cheap Car Repair shop. Look for savings wherever you can. Make lots of money and avoid angry customers!

games.name: Rune Defender
games.description: Rune Defender is a grid based tower defense game. You build towers during the day and defend against the undead during the night.

games.name: Lunarium
games.description: Lunarium is an atmospheric fantasy A-RPG. Play as Ave, a light-armored knight, who teams up with Lune, a mysterious Starfarer. Together, they journey to save a dying world, engaging in challenging battles to retrieve the lost glow of the stars and forsaken memories, unveiling cosmic secrets.

games.name: Rita
games.description: Rita is a cozy adventure where a little chicklet solves word-based puzzles to transform the world around her. Follow her story across generations, meet her grandchicklet, and be a part of her legacy.

games.name: The Remake of the End of the Greatest RPG of All Time
games.description: The Remake of the End of the Greatest RPG of All Time is the last hour of a lost (nonexistent) JRPG, "remade” in 3D pixel art complete with director’s commentary, the digital manual, and archival footage.

games.name: Rising Army
games.description: A strategy camp sim game where you manage and command your army, training each individual troop and upgrading your camp. Satisfy your King by completing missions and epic battles against enemies. Lead your Lord to legend!

games.name: A Ruthless World
games.description: Embark on an adventure through a ruthless, 80s-inspired platformer world.

games.name: Jumpers' Mountain
games.description: Join our little friends on this adventure, jumping between platforms to uncover the paths of 'Jumper's Mountain'. However, beware, as there are many secrets to reach the top, and a miscalculated jump can be quite costly.

games.name: Below, Rusted Gods
games.description: A short horror game where you control an operator helping an expedition through a hole descending into the unknown.

games.name: Money Simulator
games.description: Become a mogul in this thrilling simulation game! Buy, sell, and customize cars, trade in cryptocurrencies, and expand your empire with your very own shop. Take risks, make deals, and watch your business flourish in this dynamic world.

games.name: Prisma
games.description: This is the story of Alma, a girl that receives strange powers from an old Camera containing a magical Prism Shard, and is transported to another world alongside other Almas from different universes. Each Alma will have their own Prism Shard, and a unique vision of the world, some will be friends, other enemies and some NPCs.Bring together a party of Almas, open new quests and combos by bonding with them, and unlock different routes to prevent the reality to break.

games.name: Codex: Eternal Eclipse
games.description: Embark on a quirky adventure with four unique main characters as they seek their truth, battling gods, colossal corporations, and bizarre foes along the way. Unravel the mystery of the Eternal Eclipse and uncover the ancient secrets of the world!

games.name: Cosminers
games.description: Start your career as a cosmic miner! During the day, mine raw materials, create new tools and lethal weapons. Build up your base to survive the night attacks of rampaging monsters. Protect yourself, gain wealth and fly away in a rocket, or turn your outpost into an impregnable fortress!

games.name: PsychexFuse
games.description: A lovingly hand-drawn adventure into esoteric worlds filled with threats, puzzles and horror. Help, save and clash with past versions of yourself, and unravel the mystery behind two and a half gods at war.

games.name: Scad
games.description: Scad is an action packed roguelite apocalypse adventure. Fight against zombie hordes, craft & upgrade new weapons and prepare for new missions.

games.name: Effective Immediately
games.description: All intergalactic travel passes through the orbital relay checkpoint. Verify ID discrepancies, repair vehicle systems and struggle against ethical dilemmas as you negotiate a shifting political landscape. Report for duty, effective immediately.

games.name: Nocturnal II
games.description: Nocturnal 2 is an action-adventure game that lets you explore and rekindle the dark depths and towering heights of the city of Ytash.

games.name: Sauna Simulator
games.description: Run your own sauna: buy a room, equip it with an oven and start earning money from it. Hire employees, ensure safety and, of course, have fun!

games.name: Whispers of The Shadow
games.description: Detective Grace Lawson sets out immediately upon receiving a tip about her missing stepsister Amy, and when she gets there, she suddenly finds herself trapped inside the house. Now, Grace has only one goal: to find her missing sister and escape this nightmare.

games.name: ABYA: Paint Ball
games.description: ABYA: Paint Ball is a challenging 2D platform action-shooter game. The robot ABYA awakens from a dormant pod, following the guidance of AI, wielding a specialized water gun to explore the complex and hazardous underworld for resources, enhance equipment, and open the central elevator.

games.name: Age of Enchantment
games.description: Age of Enchantment is a tower defense deck-builder set in a classical Fantasy world. Build, upgrade, and enchant your towers with a variety of buffs while adding cards to your deck. Do you have what it takes to thwart the rising Evil?

games.name: Project_Structure_01
games.description: Project_Structure_01 is first-person exploration game focusing on atmosphere and exploration of surreal liminal spaces that feature brutalist architecture.

games.name: Possible One: Lunar Industries
games.description: Possible One is the ultimate colony management game set in space, and the only space-related RTS game based on proven or very feasible technologies, avoiding sci-fi.

games.name: Mörk Borg Heresy Supreme
games.description: Mörk Borg Heresy Supreme is a doom-metal action RPG set in the world of Mörk Borg. Wretched antiheroes explore a side-scrolling, semi-procedural grimdark fantasy world, searching for a way to prevent the apocalypse or make the suffering worse.

games.name: Fight Life: Vanguard
games.description: Engage in strategic turn-based combat, manage and upgrade each character, and strive to reclaim harmony in a world on the brink of oblivion. Take on the mantle of leadership as you guide a mercenary squad through perilous landscapes, selecting your comrades from a diverse pool of skilled recruits.

games.name: Voice of Belldona
games.description: Voice of Belldona weaves a story of swords, magic, and sci-fi! The game features roguelike decks, turn-based combat, JRPG elements, and customizable builds. Choose a character and combat style, explore randomly generated maps, power up your team, crush your enemies and... interact with a cute loli?

games.name: Exil
games.description: A Mystical Anime-Inspired Metroidvania. Embark on an adventure through a mystical world full of magical creatures.

games.name: Kernel Hearts
games.description: Gather your allies. Eliminate Angels. Transform into a Magical Girl. Slay god. Kernel Hearts is a Multiplayer Co-Op Roguelike Action RPG about four magical girls and their attempt to save a world that's drowning in ashes

games.name: Pao Pao
games.description: Pao Pao is a wild mix of culinary diving and animal madness—where you become the ultimate restaurant boss and management guru! Gather ingredients, go fishing, and expand your spot solo or with friends. Every order turns into an epic adventure… Jump in and experience it for yourself!

games.name: Anomaly President
games.description: In this presidential rogue-like action game, gather votes and run for presidency by day, then transform into a warrior to take down your enemies by night! Master unique skills to become a swordmaster, a cyber mage, or anything in between, and overthrow the ruthless president!

games.name: Find This Pixel Anomaly
games.description:
In Find This Pixel Anomaly your task involves monitoring real-time surveillance camera feeds. Identify any irregularities within the monitored areas. These anomalies can vary from missing furniture to cute visitors.

Found an anomaly? File a report and hope it will get fixed in time. Otherwise you will get in trouble, because too many anomalies will end the game.

games.name: Fractured Worlds
games.description: Fractured Worlds is a dark fantasy action RPG set in the shattered remnants of a ruined reality. Master weighty, precision-based combat, explore diverse realms, and face challenging bosses alone or together with other players of the realm

games.name: Mama's Sleeping Angels
games.description: Kiss and decapitate your friends in a Co-Op horror game about collecting cursed objects to feed to a deity called Mama, lest she hunger for you. Work together, and betray each other... Anything to keep Mama happy.

games.name: Moonsigil Atlas
games.description: The deckbuilding roguelike with no energy – play cards using physical space! Slot cards together, manipulate the shape of your cards, and create overpowered combos to break the game!

games.name: Sagas of Lumin
games.description: Sagas of Lumin is a single-player action RPG featuring dragon flight that feels alive with full movement and combat control. Switch between aerial battles and ground combat using melee weapons, spells, and firearms. Your choices shape a deep, branching world.

games.name: Operatives: Revolve
games.description: A cinematic roguelike deckbuilder where your cards are physically activated "Machines". Enemies can strike, pierce, or bomb them to pieces. Install multiple components to modify your cards, and set off cascading chain reactions to destroy your enemies.

games.name: Smash It Wild
games.description: Smash It Wild is a tactical turn-based game combining volleyball and dodgeball in a fantasy universe. Upgrade your players and defeat your opponents in an intense roguelike competition!

games.name: Modulus
games.description: Modulus is a factory automation game where you cut, color, stamp, and assemble 3D building blocks. Design and optimize sprawling factories with creative freedom to efficiently fulfill the orders of the Grand Neural Network.

games.name: Panzer Strike
games.description: Authentic RTS gameplay straight out of the 2000s. Command your troops, develop strategies, and win World War II battles. Huge maps, thousands of units, long-range firepower, and no building mechanics!

games.name: Tombwater
games.description: Explore the accursed Wild West town of Tombwater and lay bare the eldritch horrors that lie beneath. Survive blood-spilling combat in this gruesome 2D action-RPG that might just drive you to madness.

games.name: Adventurers Guild Inc.
games.description: Adventurers Guild Inc. is a turn-based management game where you run the business behind the heroics! Hire staff, post quests, and fulfill adventurers' needs (while taking a cut). Manage your budget, grow your reputation, watch adventurers scramble and build the greatest guild of all!

games.name: Workaholic Simulator: Leaving the Dream
games.description: NOT your typical simulator! Is it your dream job or are you just working in your dream? Work fast, or face the consequences. Workaholic Simulator: Leaving the Dream is a surreal and dark descent into human psyche, burnout and the horror of the working culture.

games.name: Net Raiders
games.description: Net Raiders is a single-player game that combines RPG, deck-building, and roguelike elements. In order to survive the dangers of the ruined virtual world, you must synthesize the cards in your hand to find the best move and defeat the enemies you encounter!

games.name: All Will Fall
games.description: A post-apocalyptic city builder where every structure can collapse. Master a unique physics-based 3D construction system, create a sprawling vertical settlement on water, scavenge for resources, explore the ocean, and ensure your colony's survival by making difficult yet necessary decisions.

games.name: Abashed
games.description: Abashed is a 2.5D narrative-driven side-scrolling game that lets you explore the life of Issac, a man living with psychosis. One day waking up all alone, he sets out to find the truth behind his missing partner. On the way he finds himself needing to confront his deepest fears and the darkest secrets. Join Issac in this story of love, loss, fear, and acceptance. Reality is not what it seems.

games.name: Puzzle Spy International
games.description: Pursue a ring of diamond thieves and their trail of cryptic puzzles in this ‘60s spy adventure. As Agent Epsilon you’ll choose your path as you chat with (or chat up!) suspicious contacts. Decode cryptograms, decipher clues and deduce answers as you solve wordplay & logic puzzles across the globe!

games.name: Forbidden Solitaire
games.description: Forbidden Solitaire is a card-slashing horror game about unearthing the contents of a cryptic 1995 CD-ROM that should have never existed. From the creators of Ancient Enemy and Home Safety Hotline.

games.name: Indoor Baseball
games.description:
The highly anticipated follow up to Indoor Kickball!

Indoor Baseball is BIGGER, better, and even more destructive!

Indoor Baseball is a 1v1 baseball game played in the rooms of your house! Play in a goofy story mode to work your way up to make the school baseball team. Play a 14 game randomly generated season mode, or quick play 1v1 in a local multiplayer match against a friend or CPU.

games.name: Retro Game Store Simulator
games.description: Build your own Video Game Store in 1984. Everyday until the end of 1989 gives you the opportunity to stock shelves, cycle your inventory, manage your prices, analyze historical trends to make your game store profitable. Use era-relevant technology and systems to prove that gaming has a future!

games.name: Festered
games.description: Brave the terrors of a contaminated research facility, where every step could be your last. PSX style survival horror game.

games.name: Grex
games.description: Play as a Swarm in GREX, a fast-paced incremental auto-shooter. Our body is our weapon. We die to evolve. We evolve to become The Monolith. WE ARE ONE. WE INVADE. THEY DIE.

games.name: StarMoon Forest
games.description: Build your dream forest farm and apartment community! Plant all kinds of crops, make all kinds of delicious food and sell it in stores. Build apartments to attract residents from to live and maybe even find love.

games.name: Kijutsu Rider
games.description: Kijutsu Rider is a fast paced third person hack and slash anime styled action game where you play as one of five unstoppable heroes, carve your way through waves of monstrous enemies, take down the black cross conglomerate and save the world.

games.name: Baptiste
games.description:
Submerge yourself in a first-hand experience that will make you feel each chill as if it were real. The line between the game and reality blurs further with each step you take.

Explore a mansion where horror awaits in every shadow. The masterful dubbing and sound track will drag you to the depths of a nightmare. Darkness will become your most feared enemy, putting your bravery to the test in each corner.

Play as Tom, a young man still suffering from the tragedy. After the loss of his father, he accompanies his mother Sara on what ought to be a new beginning. However, the ghosts of the past threaten to consume him. Can you keep control against the siege of his inner demons?

Disentangle the gruesome secrets that impregnate each floorboard and each crack on the walls. Each discovery will reveal a story of pain and horror that beggars belief.

Submerge yourself into a world where beauty and terror coexist in a macabre dance. The visual design will transport you to a kingdom where the grotesque is fascinating.

Each objective, each note and each whisper contribute towards weaving the plot. Your perseverance in the face of fear will be rewarded with chilling revelations that will keep you on edge until the very end.

games.name: The Pet Squad
games.description:
The Pet Squad is a 2D strategy and puzzle game with pixel art aesthetics, mainly inspired by Lemmings, that puts you in the role of a support operator.

The game is set in the not-too-distant future, where humans have managed to artificially evolve animals. The pet squad S.L.U. is an organization responsible for maintaining order between humans and the evolved animals, known as Animanos.

As an operator, you will have to support your squad at all times, guide them along the correct path, and protect them from enemies or themselves. To achieve this, you will have access to the most advanced technology, allowing you to teleport objects and even slow down time.

games.name: Last Drop
games.description: Last Drop is a story you need to experience. Welcome to Nykylä Finland 1994. Seppo Sahtivaara and friends are waiting for you. This is an openworld action game with a story that has an impact. We bring back old good games and action from the best movies from that era. We want you to enjoy!

games.name: Intermundia: Dungeons, Polygons & Magic
games.description: Intermundia: Dungeons, Polygons & Magic is an RPG with a deep turn-based combat system and a story filled with multiple choices and endings. Let yourself be carried away by this epic adventure: plan your moves, choose your destiny and be prepared to face the consequences!

games.name: Ahapika: Heroic Agency
games.description: Gather brave heroes and open the most heroic agency in Ancient Greece! Help people, argue with the gods, but remember: a mistake can be fatal.

games.name: Gemmy's Adventure
games.description: Simple but not easy! Gemmy's Adventure is a casual action game. All you need to do is move a mouse to reach the finish line without touching any traps, objects and walls. Levels get harder, requiring strategy to pass.

games.name: TouHou Koishi's Enchanted Woods
games.description: 「TouHou Koishi's Enchanted Woods」 is a Touhou fangame.This is a "reverse-construction" action rogue-lite.Koishi vs. Kokoro! But as the playable character, Koishi uses various enhancement cards to continuously strengthen Kokoro. Can she ultimately defeat the Kokoro she has built up herself?

games.name: Settler's Domain
games.description: Settler's Domain is a settlement-building game with citizen and resource management elements. Build structures, recruit settlers, gather resources, and explore your surroundings.

games.name: Hats and Guns
games.description: Become a cardslinger in this roguelike deckbuilder with tactical elements. Fight, gather weapons and items, face unexpected events and upgrade your cards for hundreds of possibilities. Every run is unique and so are you, the best shot of the Far West looking for your upcoming revenge.

games.name: Aether & Iron
games.description: Immerse yourself in this narrative RPG set in an alternate 1930s where anti-gravitational technology has taken cars, roads, and even New York City into the sky. Muster a crew, master tactical, turn-based combat, and unravel the dark secrets lurking beneath the floating metropolis.

games.name: Kingdom Loop
games.description: Kingdom Loop is a strategic roguelike autobattler focused on building your army and kingdom. Explore many tile combinations, items, and units in search of the perfect setup to beat the Ancient Kings!

games.name: Gambonanza
games.description: Gambonanza is a mind-bending roguelike where every move counts. Unlock over 100 innovative Gambits and harness powerful synergy with your chess pieces to transform your board into a festival of explosive combos and tactical twists!

games.name: Ghost Sector
games.description: Ghost Sector is a survival horror game where you play as M-07, a prototype machine trapped in a cybernetic facility during lockdown. Outwit the automated defenses, search for answers to your origin uncovering secrets, solving puzzles, and upgrade your abilities while preserving your finite energy.

games.name: Flora Corner
games.description: Flora Corner is a cozy idle game about growing houseplants and decorating your living space.

games.name: Ramen Shop Simulator
games.description: Take control of your very own Ramen Shop! Transform a cozy, worn-out Japanese alley back into a vibrant hotspot. From scrubbing floors to cooking the perfect bowl of ramen. Decorate every corner, upgrade everything, and create your unique restaurant. The aroma of success is just a bowl away!

games.name: AstroScaper
games.description: A minimalist puzzle city-builder where every placement counts. Build colonies on asteroids using strategic proximity-based mechanics and minimal resource management. Relax in freebuild mode or chase high scores in challenge mode – all against a serene cosmic backdrop.

games.name: Dwarf Legacy
games.description: A challenging bullet-hell precision platformer. Climb up vertical dungeons of The Mountainhome, battling relentless swarms of enemies and navigating perilous traps. Uncover the secret of your lost legacy hidden atop the highest peak and secure the future of your village.

games.name: Wizard Hand
games.description: A magical deckbuilder game where solitaire meets roguelike. Uncover dazzling combos and accumulate points with the help of enchantments, crafting, and a collection of powerful artifacts.

games.name: Fantasy World Manager
games.description: Build a massive-scale MMO-themed fantasy world where you design all creatures, objects, quests, events and dungeons. Watch the inhabitants of your world embark on their adventures.

games.name: Scavland
games.description: Scavland is a hardcore, top-down pixel art survival game set in a Post-Apocalyptic Soviet Era. Explore a world ravaged by war and the deadly Mist, scavenging for resources, taking risky jobs, and seeking refuge in harsh settlements. The wasteland is relentless—everything is out to kill you.

games.name: Prize Denied
games.description: Prize Denied! Manage a claw machine arcade in this cozy management sim. Build challenging claw machines and play surprising cards to stop players from getting a prize! Earn money to unlock new arcades, collect cards, upgrade machines, and become the best arcade in the...UNIVERSE!

games.name: Cybervoid
games.description: Cybervoid is a sci-fi story-rich choice-driven adventure. Sent on a mysterious mission, will you follow orders or forge your own path? Manage your time and energy wisely exploring a city on the edge of salvation or ruin and in doing so, ultimately discover your connection to this city and its fate.

games.name: Captured 2
games.description: You're trapped in an apartment with ever-changing rooms. Capture anomalies on camera, survive deadly entities and escape an endless nightmare.

games.name: Final Sentence
games.description: Final Sentence is a Battle Royale typing game. Together with other players, you find yourself in a hangar, with a typewriter in front of you and a revolver loaded with a single bullet at your temple. Every mistake can be fatal. Only one will remain.

games.name: Voidling Bound
games.description: Hatch, evolve, and upgrade powerful space creatures in this action-packed sci-fi 3rd person shooter that reinvents the monster taming genre!

games.name: Ludaro
games.description:
Ludaro is a Roguelike Deck-building dice game with a unique twist on Ludo!

Plan your moves, manipulate dice rolls, and unleash powerful Spirit Cards to beat the score. Upgrade tiles, collect quirky pets and stack wild combos as you battle in epic boss fights with game-changing modifiers.

games.name: Plentiful
games.description: Stack stones to shape the world. A relaxing game about harnessing nature.

games.name: Demon Bluff
games.description: The cards lie! In this single-player social deduction game, you've gathered all the villagers to partake in a ritual to find out who is Evil. They will all state their case, but some will lie. Will you see through their bluff?

games.name: Eternal Palace Sakura
games.description: "Eternal Palace Sakura" is a rogue-lite 3D action game where you power up your character and take on thrilling dungeon challenges packed with flashy combat. Step into the shoes of Retla, a brown-skinned, cat-eared dual-wielder, and explore the ever-shifting dream labyrinth!

games.name: Clawed
games.description: Embark on a covert mission to the dinosaur theme park Prehistoria, where you must explore the park's grounds to scavenge resources, solve puzzles, and fight your way through diverse biomes, underground tunnels and deadly enclosures. But beware, you are not the apex predator here.

games.name: Severed Love
games.description: You have lost both your legs and arms and you can’t remember anything... The Limb-Severing Devil's Confinement and Devotion. Your only way to survive...

games.name: Project; Virai: Doomer's Life Escape
games.description: Help a doomer girl make her VTuber persona popular and escape her depressive routine. If you can.

games.name: Pakinpaks
games.description: A cozy puzzle game where you go on a journey all around the world packing and organizing all sorts of travel gear. Fulfill your client's request in any way you wish and — as long as everything fits — prepare the neatest bags that you can!

games.name: The Blue Cut Hook
games.description: The Blue Cut Hook blends cozy tavern management with subtle adventure. You're no hero, just a humble tavern keeper, but your food, gear, and advice quietly shape the adventurers who pass through. They make the choices, take the glory, and face the danger, but your influence might keeps them alive.

games.name: Noir Total: Deadly Party
games.description: Noir Total is a 2D local multiplayer PvP shooter set in darkened arenas. Sneak through total darkness using your controller's vibrations, track down your enemies, collect bonuses and set traps to stay one step ahead of your opponents in fast-paced, competitive matches for up to 4 players.

games.name: Luminescence
games.description: Illuminate the path in this Parkour experience across the constellations of Space

games.name: Chained Beasts
games.description: Chained Beasts is a 1-4 player co-op gladiator roguelite. Fight chaotic battles in the Colosseum while chained to your friends. Brave physical and mental injuries that change how you play. Entertain the blood-thirsty crowd by unleashing your inner beast.

games.name: Bushcraft Survival
games.description: Bushcraft Survival is an open-world, procedural survival game where you are pitted against the brutalities of nature. It features rogue-lite elements, with permanent skill tree progression. Use your tools and your knowledge to survive in Canada's unforgiving northern wilderness!

games.name: Kungfu 2
games.description: This is a fast-paced survivor game. Players will play as martial artists with special skills, and challenge 30 levels in a 30-second violent battle. Each character has its own characteristics, and with a variety of martial arts and props, activate the power of bondage and challenge the final BOSS!

games.name: Ashes of Morgravia
games.description: Ashes of Morgravia is a dark fantasy tactical deckbuilder where you move, strike, and adapt using dual decks to survive against necrotic horrors. Uncover lost divine secrets and fight for survival in a world swallowed by eternal night.

games.name: Papercraft Tactics
games.description: In Papercraft Tactics, your backpack is your lifeline. Navigate branching paths, battle fierce foes, and collect powerful items to craft the ultimate loadout. With a dark, hand-drawn style, every choice matters in this thrilling roguelite adventure. Will you survive?

games.name: The Walking Trade
games.description: Run a shop in the zombie apocalypse! Trade batteries, craft stock, manage your staff, and fend off undead hordes. Will you be a hero, or profit at any cost? Your choices shape your store - and your fate.

games.name: Astro Combat
games.description: This is an "Arcade-style Beat 'em Up" with "Real-time Tactics" and "Action RPG" elements. Choose to engage in a rampage or opt for stealth. After the main story, explore regions, collect items, battle foes, and develop your team.

games.name: Cloudy with a Chance of Kittens
games.description: Cloudy with a Chance of Kittens is a cozy, Suika-inspired, puzzle game where adorable, dessert-shaped cats fall from the clouds. Unlock power-ups, set up satisfying chains and combos, brave obstacles and cheeky weather twists. Play to relax or compete to leave your pawprint on our leaderboards.

games.name: Snake Party Extreme
games.description: The best Snake game ever made. A chaotic, unforgettable, laugh-out-loud 4-player couch battle. An intense test of your arcade gaming skills. Snake Party Extreme is all of these...and so, so much more!

games.name: King's Guard
games.description: In this turn-based strategy roguelike your job is to keep an ungrateful king alive. As the royal guard's manager you unlock upgrades, assign badges for special skills and try to keep morale and supplies from collapsing faster than the monarchy.

games.name: Swarm Hunter
games.description:
1985. An Alternate Universe. A Forgotten World Calls for Help.

The International Space Agency (ISA) has just intercepted a desperate, system-wide distress signal from the long-isolated inhabitants of Pluto. In a race against time, the nearby vessel Empress of Discovery is dispatched to respond…but moments after making orbit, the ship’s final transmission crackles through the void: a garbled, static-soaked mayday… then silence.

Now, all eyes turn to you.

Assume the role of Master Commander Lance Johnson, captain of the legendary Gilded Seeker.

Your mission: investigate the Plutonian distress call, uncover the fate of the Empress and its crew, and confront whatever terror has awakened on the planet’s surface. Can you stop the unknown menace before it spreads beyond Pluto’s orbit?

games.name: Mailbound
games.description: The dead linger in the CRT glow, their wails rippling through the screen like disembodied echoes. And now… you’re drifting with them...

games.name: Yokai Art 2: Tales of the Nine-Tails
games.description: After defeating Fujin and Raijin, Hiro and his allies found peace at his grandfather’s house. One day, Sanbi sensed a distant summon. After tracing the energy, they discovered it came from her true form—the nine-tailed fox. Determined to help, Hiro and his friends set off on a new journey.

games.name: Akuma's Bloodrain
games.description: Blow up hordes of akumas/yokais that are attacking this small japanese village. Shoot, slash, dash, and climb your way through the end of this battle!

games.name: Under Kingdom: Scam Centre Simulator
games.description: Run your own scam centre and pay off your debt. Expand your business by recruiting workers through shady means. Bribe the police, trade with others, and use every strategy to survive in this city. Will you rise to power or fall under the pressure? The choice is yours.

games.name: Beatdown City Survivors
games.description: Punch a car so hard it EXPLODES! Dash through flaming gas to create a fire trail burning everything. Destroy a hydrant to douse out the fire. Beatdown City Survivors is an immersive sandbox meets survive-em-up with dynamic environments & outrageous lite weapon crafting & team building.

games.name: U-Boot: The Board Game - Digital Edition
games.description: A digital version of the iconic U-BOOT The Board Game. Manage the crew of a powerful warship during World War II. Explore enemy territory, win battles using the strength of a steel giant and reliable tactics, and most importantly - overcome the blue abyss.

games.name: Transpawt Train
games.description: Real-time strategy simulation where you become the first railroad designer in the Paw-City! Draw railroad lines between towns and start running your trains. Design railroads for your cute animal residents and grow your Paw_City with efficient routes.

games.name: Alchemist: Journey of the Soul
games.description: First-person adventure game, playable solo or co-op with up to 4 people. Travel through unique areas, uncover memories and use them to craft powerful potions. Unlock special abilities and solve puzzles in a mysterious world. Will your soul survive this journey?

games.name: Backframes: Escape Together
games.description: Backframes: Escape Together is a cooperative horror game for 1–4 players. Explore dark levels, solve dangerous puzzles, and escape from sinister entities. Use your voice to interact with objects, uncovering unexpected paths to survival.

games.name: Kick and Hide
games.description: A nostalgic multiplayer action game inspired by children's outdoors game, kick the can.

games.name: Game
games.description: A journey through the life of a champion player of a cryptic and bizarre sport. The dialogue choices you make will determine the path your life takes, and the ultimate conclusion to your story.

games.name: Survivesmith
games.description: Reverse bullet-hell game with a crafting twist. Shoot hails of bullets, missiles, nails, lasers and whatever is at your disposal at your enemies and make tactical choices to overcome all obstacles. You are here to find and extract the 'Life Essence', and you're not leaving without it!

games.name: Doomclock
games.description: Doomclock is a roguelite, top-down arena shooter with deckbuilding elements. Bathe in blood of the damned, unlock new cards, and craft your deck of heavenly and hellish powers to survive the apocalypse. Be quick or be dead — there’s no time to rest.

games.name: Deeper You Go
games.description: You control a camera that goes down into a deep hole. More horrors you'll face, the deeper you go.

games.name: Lustra: Lachea’s Tale
games.description:
LUSTRA: Lachea’s Tale is a story-rich RPG that combines real-time spellcasting, exploration, and settlement building, set in a fractured floating island realm where ancient magic and mystery intertwine.

Play as Lachea, a young mage shaped by the world around her, learning to lead, grow, and take control of her path in a land suspended between ruin and renewal.

Lustra invites players to see the world through multiple perspectives, to reflect on morality, empathy, and responsibility, and to shape not just the outcome of a magical world, but the kind of person Lachea becomes along the way.

games.name: Shock
games.description: In SHOCK, you play as a disabled war veteran, hunted by a cybernetic creature. With only a wheelchair for mobility, use stealth, solve puzzles, and crawl into tight spaces to escape. Survive the horror and uncover the truth behind this nightmare.

games.name: Together in Forgotten Lands
games.description: Two souls, one destiny. Embark on a co-op adventure through a forgotten land, where teamwork and wit are the only way to navigate the wonders and dangers of a magical cave.

games.name: Legion Was Here
games.description: You are Legion, a secret agent who can change his appearance at will. Use your investigative and chameleon skills to infiltrate enemy ranks!

games.name: Deep Pixel Melancholy
games.description: Deep Pixel Melancholy is a visual novel about being stuck in a time loop inside a gray, soulless city. Unravel the mystery, and decide whether escaping is really worth it.

games.name: Mexican Ninja
games.description: A frantic fast-paced beat 'em up roguelike full of crass, brass and incredibly badass. Become THE Mexican Ninja as you slice your way through the streets of Nuevo Tokyo in this retro 2.5D arcade throwback. So what’chu waiting for? Show me your skills pinche ninja!

games.name: Five Heads
games.description: Five prisoners each have a visible-to-others card on their forehead. Across three rounds, they logically deduce and rank their cards from lowest to highest. On the final round, each guesses their exact card, using every prior guess as a clue. A single mistake can doom them—can you solve it?

games.name: Brotank
games.description: "BROTANK" is a top-down action roguelike game that combines retro RPG elements. Players will adventure in a post-apocalyptic world, recruit companions, acquire powerful tanks and equipment, capture wanted criminals, and ultimately become legendary hunters!

games.name: PayGame
games.description: 《PayGame》is a black-and-white hand-drawn dungeon exploration game.You must race against time through randomly generated rooms, combining items and bills to pay massive amounts of money in order to stay alive.Each run offers a brand-new challenge and a completely different experience

games.name: Inferno Pathways
games.description: Descend into the abandoned metro in Inferno Pathways, a first-person psychological horror game. Navigate dark tunnels, solve puzzles, and uncover sinister secrets. Confront your deepest fears and piece together the haunting story of Mike Collins. Can you escape the darkness?

games.name: Dracs After Dusk
games.description: "Dracs After Dusk" is an arcade, top-down shooter. Blast through bloodsuckers as the sharp shootin’ sheriff of a wild west town. Battle the deadliest bosses, claim weapons from the Armory to fuel your leaderboard topping run. It's an old school quarter muncher but luckily you have unlimited credits!

games.name: My Lil Afterlife
games.description: Become the new ruler of the afterlife. Summon spooky friends to reside in your unearthly realm and decorate it however you like with items you can craft, buy and find. Unravel the mysteries of the afterlife by taking on the reapers tower using spine-tingling spells to smite your enemies.

games.name: Islantiles
games.description: Islantiles is a cozy, minimalistic city-builder where you raise your civilization from adorable settlers to ridiculously effective explorers. Unlock groundbreaking technologies as you venture across a chain of unknown islands and discover over-the-top synergies.

games.name: Sandloop
games.description: Help Hura save her village from invaders by exploring the intricate lands of Iman and gaining ancient skills that will enhance her mobility!

games.name: PhiloDeka
games.description: In a serene, immersive world, strategically craft your path to turn every multiple of 10 into a rewarding harvest. Unlock the powerful interplay of numbers and strategy, and savor the satisfaction of perfect alignment and numerical zen.

games.name: Falling Thingies
games.description: Gameplay you simply won't be able to put down! The thingies keep fallin' and the thangies keep callin'. Uncover limitless difficulty scaling and tons of variety!

games.name: Super Meat Boy 3D
games.description: Super Meat Boy 3D is a tough as nails platformer where you play as an animated cube of meat who's trying to save his girlfriend (who happens to be made of bandages) from an evil fetus in a jar wearing a tux – IN 3D! Our meaty hero will leap from walls, over seas of buzz saws, through crumbling caves and pools of old trash sacrificing his own well-being to save his damsel in distress – IN 3D. Super Meat Boy 3D brings the old school difficulty of classic retro titles we all know and love and streamlines them down to the essential no bull straight forward twitch reflex platforming. Ramping up in difficulty from hard to soul crushing Meat Boy will brave lush (but also on fire) forests, vast dumps filled with the waste of mankind, and high-tech forges producing the very traps that will inevitably kill Meat Boy over and over and over - IN 3D! And if a bunch of levels weren't enough, we also have epic boss fights and tons of unlockable secrets – IN 3D!

games.name: Sea of Souls
games.description: Discover the secrets of the cycle of reincarnation in Sea of Souls! A Turn-Based RPG with various Metroidvania elements to help you explore the world.

games.name: Hello Space
games.description: Dive into a 2D action game where you control a spaceship, defeat enemies and overcome deadly traps. Extend your arsenal by collecting new weapons and technologies for your ship that you will need to conquer four different dungeon-like worlds, all connected by an open space full of surprises.

games.name: Dawn Break
games.description: In 2039, tsunamis of varying degrees occurred all over the world, and multiple small black holes inexplicably appeared in the sky, ruthlessly devouring the world. At first, scientists believed that this phenomenon was a common natural disaster, until one day, a test report shocked the world.

games.name: Iona's Island
games.description: Restore a vibrant island paradise atop a giant sea turtle! As the Leshen Iona, wield ancient spells to heal the land and befriend islanders and help them with their quests. Create your own enchanting sandbox style sanctuary. Uncover secrets and reshape a world with accompanied by cozy, lofi vibes.

games.name: Let's Freeze Some Penguins
games.description: Walnut the Walrus sets out to save his friends, and all of Northern Bear, from the dreaded Emperor Penguin. Luckily, his chilly Walrus Wind is ice cold. Now let's freeze some penguins!

games.name: The Wondrous Wedding of Ivan the Bard
games.description: A romantic fairy tale set in a fantasy medieval Rus'. Play as Ivan, a young bard with a gusli in hand, on a quest to win the love of the elusive Novgorod princess. Learn tunes, make choices!

games.name: Lecture Me Later
games.description: Just having a pleasant chat with one of the most popular guys in the University. Nothing weird about that, right? So why is he kinda... different than you've imagined?

games.name: Ghouls & Guardians
games.description: Ghouls & Guardians is a tower defense and strategy game with roguelite elements. Build and manage your defenses, gather resources, and fend off relentless night creatures. Each playthrough encourages creative tactics and offers a fresh, challenging experience.

games.name: Farewell, We See Each Other for the Last Time.....
games.description: A dramatic visual novel about the search for the meaning of life.

games.name: Cubic Blitz
games.description: Cubic Blitz is an isometric puzzle game where you control a cube and solve loads of hand-crafted levels. With the power of paint, sponges, and much more, your task is simple: PAINT THE WORLD.

games.name: Bosslife Office Manager
games.description: Set up your own office. Expand your office as you wish. Transform from a small office to a large company.Don't forget to make your employees happy too.

games.name: No More Grudges
games.description: Step into a shattered world where every bullet tells a story. No More Grudges is a visceral 3D top-down shooter that marries razor-sharp gunplay with a gripping, shadow-soaked narrative.

games.name: Cameraman: The Pilot Episode
games.description: Cameraman: The Pilot Episode is a psychological horror game. Manipulate time and gravity to solve puzzles in ever-changing, twisted spaces. With only a VHS camcorder, uncover dark secrets, face unseen anomalies, and navigate an uncharted dimension where reality unravels.

games.name: Capybara Hot Tub
games.description: Become an internet star in Capybara Hot Tub by playing as a cute, fluffy streamer! Soak in a hot bath, groom your fur, and set up your studio around the capybara to gain fame!

games.name: Sunberry Care Center
games.description: An analog horror adventure where you work as a staff member at the uncanny facility named Sunberry Care Center, which is dedicated to the treatment of a mysterious disease called Sunberry Syndrome.

games.name: Mushroom Hunter Simulator
games.description: A relaxing mushroom-foraging simulator. Explore the forest, discover rare mushrooms, appraise their worth, then dry or pickle your finds. Enjoy enchanting nature and relax far from the bustle of the city.

games.name: Wandering Souls
games.description: "Wandering Souls" is a visual novel game set in modern China. It tells a touching story about love, sacrifice, and repentance. Through delicate narrative and profound character creation, it brings players an immersive audio-visual experience.

games.name: Corbaci: A Cozy Cinematic Horror
games.description: Run a cozy little soup shop haunted by unsettling stories. In Corbaci: A Cozy Cinematic Horror, uncover hidden mysteries and unlock every secret recipe. Serve the right soup from the Super Soup 2000.

games.name: Ravenridge
games.description: You are being watched. Tested. In RAVENRIDGE, uncover the truth behind a forgotten prison as detective Ethan Ward. What begins as an investigation soon leads deep into your own mind. Are you in control, or just another subject?

games.name: Black Paradox Reloaded
games.description: Experience chaos in this remastered, hyper-stylized roguelite. As bounty hunter Black Paradox, travel through space to defeat the Hellraisers – now with enhanced pixel art, rebalanced gameplay, new synthwave tracks, and an intense boss rush mode.

games.name: Wasteland Bites
games.description: Wasteland Bites is a horror-based food truck sim. Cooking up questionable cuisine in your post-apocalyptic food truck is tough. Fending off mutants, UFOs, rabid dogs, and things lurking in the dark? That's the real challenge. A chaotic mix of cooking and survival in a long gone world.

games.name: Magician Impossible
games.description: A first-person, spell-casting, adventure about a second rate, self taught magician who's on an impossible mission. Draw shapes with your wand to cast spells, solve puzzles, swing over chasms, and steal anything that isn't nailed down!

games.name: Voodoo Fishin'
games.description: Voodoo Fishin is an online co-op horror game featuring fishing, proximity voice, and scary monsters. You and up to 3 friends can venture into the swamp to find the best fishing spots holding the rarest fish. BEWARE: Die along the way, and you will lose your catch!

games.name: InOut
