games.description: A minimalist puzzle platformer where each level is more than they seem. Change your perspective on levels to discover new areas. Explore the world to unearth its hidden secrets.

games.name: Order: The New Dawn
games.description: Order: The New Dawn is a colony sim with space adventure. As a legendary captain from the United Stellar, build a base on the desert planet New Terra and face the perils of the Wastespace—how will you shape the destiny of the stars?

games.name: Nezori
games.description: Embark on a cute action RPG adventure as a fox girl searching for the legendary hot springs in a land of fox and wolf girls!

games.name: Packed Lair
games.description: Villainous base-builder mixed with inventory management auto-battler roguelike! Draft buildings, pack them carefully into your cramped lair to create powerful synergies and send your army of minions to deal with the endless hero problem. Why won’t they just leave you alone?

games.name: Cry Pic.
games.description: This is a 2D action shooting game that focuses on fighting large enemies (bosses).

games.name: Hookah Simulator
games.description: Start with a small cozy hookah lounge and turn it into the most popular spot in the city! Your goal is to craft perfect hookahs, satisfying even the most demanding customers.

games.name: Iron Dice
games.description: The empire has fallen. Will you reunite its factions or forge your own path? Iron Dice is an open-ended grand strategy game set in a fictional, early medieval world. Outmaneuver and outwit your neighboring kingdoms as you develop your economy, research new technologies, and conquer territory.

games.name: Over the Moon
games.description: The final game in The Rose Garden Trilogy. Can you convince Moon to come home, or will her anger towards you be ever resolute?

games.name: Birdoo
games.description: Birdoo is an indie action game were you take control of a bird on his quest for revenge against the humans that mistreated him. For too long have you been called a flying rat and shooed away. It's time to take revenge!

games.name: Latitude 76: Land of the Onkilons
games.description:
Latitude 76: Land of the Onkilons is an action-adventure game inspired by the true story of the 1900-1902 polar expedition. It tells the story of brave explorers who decide to prove the legend of the phantom island in the Arctic Ocean.

Switch between characters, use your grappling hook to explore a phantom island, home to mammoths. Face threats from hunters and choose to play stealthily or confront the dangers head-on. Inspired by real events.

games.name: Land of Glarefall
games.description: An action-adventure survival game where every night could be your last. Explore a vast, dangerous world where survival depends on smart resource management, tactical combat, and what you choose to do before night falls.

games.name: Nothing Strange Here
games.description:
Nothing Strange Here is a single-player open-world adventure game with mystery and slice-of-life elements. Set in the small town of Larcenest Gap, players take on the role of a reporter exploring the community, documenting strange events, and interacting with townsfolk.

The game combines narrative discovery with photography and journaling mechanics. Players can photograph scenes, collect evidence, and publish their findings in a customizable in-game journal. NPCs follow daily routines, and the world changes based on the player's actions and the time of day. Additional features include hidden collectibles, such as stickers and gnomes, and dynamic events that encourage exploration and investigation.

games.name: Stabjack
games.description: A combination of Roguelike Deckbuilder and comic noir tragedy. Stabjack plunges you into a dark, gritty, demon-infested world, with gameplay that builds on the familiar concepts of Blackjack. Can a talking knife help you solve your wife’s murder, or is this just the beginning of your descent into madness?

games.name: Death and Tactics
games.description: A post apocalyptic turn-based strategy game. Permanent death is a primary mechanic, with unique events and items being unlocked based on how you play the game. Your choices matter and each loss reveals new strategic opportunity, cutting down on time wasted spent grinding or resetting.

games.name: Grow a Girlfriend
games.description: You accidentally grew a mushroom girl! Overcome your social anxiety to help her live her brief life to the fullest! Or… don't ;)

games.name: Hextalia
games.description: Hextalia is a strategic tower defense where you craft powerful items and attach them to your towers. Shape enemy paths with walls, craft the desired items, defend corrupted crystals, and unlock new powers as you grow your collection. Build, defend, and adapt.

games.name: Stellar Freight: Echoes of the Void
games.description: Take command of a freight ship traveling through deep space. Every jump brings danger, every decision matters. Manage your crew, upgrade your ship, trade, fight, and survive in a hostile galaxy where resources are scarce and every day could be your last.

games.name: Dreadcore: Locked Unit
games.description: A first-person psychological horror game focused on exploration, puzzle-solving, and environmental storytelling. Discover the tragic story of Unit 199, where a fragmented consciousness still haunts the place.

games.name: Treeplanter
games.description:
Create and enjoy a peaceful, interactive woodland throughout the changing seasons.
For every copy sold, we plant a real tree! 

Welcome to Treeplanter, an interactive woodland that grows and changes with the seasons. Piece together a small grove of trees, branch by branch, and watch as their roots blossom under the soil!

As time goes by, an ecosystem of animals, plants and birds will move in, turning your creation into a living world. Changing seasons and weather will affect the miniature universe of your grove.

Build your grove in a variety of landscapes, from sunny meadows to ancient ruins. Combining meditation and education, Treeplanter aims to teach players about the interconnected wonders of the natural world, above and below ground.

Each copy of the game sold helps Henry plant trees, wildflowers, meadows and community orchards, through partnerships with schools, farms, communities and woodland charities. Meaning you’ll help restore real-life nature too!!

games.name: Void Authority
games.description: A sci-fi roguelike document-inspection game where you approve or deny alien travelers, scan for contraband, and navigate shifting galactic laws across border outposts, with each run shaping the future political climate.

games.name: Rhythm Animal Café
games.description: Welcome to ​Rhythm Animal Café​! Animals' daily chaos meets funky beats: boss hype, colleague woes, your slacking, unfair blame—all become hilarious one-tap rhythm games! Simple controls, joyful groove. Feel music fuse with daily life’s warmth!

games.name: Jungle Jinx
games.description: Set up camp deep in the jungle and begin your adventure! Explore lost ruins, collect artifacts, upgrade your gear, and grow your expedition. In Jungle Jinx, choose your path: dodge deadly traps, fight enemies, or race through the jungle on wild karts!

games.name: Awakeroots
games.description: Awakeroots is a passion project—crafted by two brothers who combine creativity with a deep love for Slavic culture and storytelling. It’s not just a game—it’s a journey into a world that could have been… and now awakens again.

games.name: Mystic Fishing: A Fantasy Fishing RPG
games.description: Travel through over 10 different biomes, catching over 90 different kinds of fish. Collect different rods, level up, and try to fill your Fish Encyclopedia. Experience a story-rich narrative filled with a fun and unique cast while exploring a Lovecraftian-ridden sea.

games.name: Lux Leonarii: A Mechanical Puzzle Adventure
games.description: A puzzle game revolving around guiding beams of light throughout an ancient structure using a multitude of mirrors and devices, ranging from simple A to B connection to multiple colours and complex interactions.

games.name: Mage Blast
games.description: Forge arcane might in this semi-idle deckbuilder! Craft spells layer by layer—turn a simple fireball into a barrage of flaming meteors. Build a deck of modifiers to trigger explosive combos, explore ancient realms for rare resources, and stitch together magic unlike anything the world has seen.

games.name: Factory Town 2: Paradise
games.description: A cozy city-builder where you craft and sell tropical items to keep villagers happy. Use conveyor belts, trains, zip lines, catapults, and boats to automate delivery, optimize production, and earn the favor of a giant sentient volcano.

games.name: Bounce 2
games.description: Bounce 2, the 1v1 Physics Based Digital Sport built with the warmth and comfort of 2D analog graphics, and the cold precision of modern computing and networking. Challenge your friends, together or online, in the Bounce Arena.

games.name: Iconic
games.description: Battle an army of merciless monster icons in this lane-based horde survival roguelite frenzy and put an end to their evil endeavors. By clicking.

games.name: Luxuriant
games.description: Luxuriant is a fantasy card-driven roguelike deck-builder where you assemble and manage a deck of Royals, Citizens, Weapons, and Resources to outmaneuver Enemies in turn-based combat, earn Influence, progress through evolving levels, and unlock new cards for future runs.

games.name: LinkShift
games.description: A abstract arcade-style puzzle game with roguelite elements in which you place Nodes on a grid to try and form big connection chains. Use Upgrades and Master Nodes to change the rules or break them.

games.name: Stock the Shelves
games.description: A Frantic Store Management Sim. Create the best shop you can imagine, then make it better! Manage, Upgrade, Keep Customers Happy, but most importantly STOCK THOSE SHELVES!

games.name: Sabotrix
games.description: Sabotrix – A New Kind of Trolling Game! Use cunning strategy, precise control, and a variety of skill combinations to sabotage your enemies' operations and bring down those who seek to corrupt the Matrix World!

games.name: Kioku: Last Summer
games.description: Kioku: Last Summer is a cozy, story-driven adventure where you play as Asti, a young girl spending her first summer on the mysterious island of Kioku. Set in a hand-crafted world blending Scandinavian and Japanese influences, players explore, build friendships, play minigames, uncover secrets, and relive the magic of early 2000s childhood summers.

games.name: Vexcell
games.description: Vexcell is an elegant, minimalist puzzle game. Embrace the satisfaction of everything falling into place.

games.name: Lichgate: Tower Survivor
games.description: Burn through the underworld legion in this auto-battler tower defense. Choose from over 100 items to craft your tower into the ultimate weapon of destruction!

games.name: Hobby Horse: First Ride
games.description: Time to RIDE! Create your first Hobby Horse and overcome basic obstacle courses! Win trophies, develop skills and discover the world of hobby horsing - jump on a hobby horse and conquer the horse world!

games.name: Floatineer
games.description: The game is set in a world where lands have vanished beneath the waves. Players experience life as floating engineers, using modular architectural blocks to rebuild shelters that can withstand various disasters and fulfill villagers' aesthetic requirements within a given time limit.

games.name: Feudal Craft
games.description: Immerse yourself in an exciting medieval settlement simulator where you will have to fight for your place in the feudal hierarchy. Use a smart strategy to develop your settlement. After all, it is the skills and equipment of each peasant that can make the difference.

games.name: Cinema Theater Tycoon
games.description: Tycoon game where you manage your movie theater through more than 100 years of history. Build and customize your cinematic empire without being overtaken by the evolution of the 7th art.

games.name: Rest in Paws
games.description: Explore the touching story of Kebab, a rural cat, as she copes with grief following her passing from old age. Delve into her world and discover the story of her life, from her adoption by a loving family to the meaningful recollections that shaped her being.

games.name: Inner Voice
games.description: Step into the world of "Inner Voice", where the silence is louder than screams. In this atmospheric horror experience you will uncover long-buried secrets as the story unfolds. Every creak and every whisper holds a part of this story. Are you ready to face this nightmare?

games.name: Game Store Chronicle
games.description: Run your own game store! Stay ahead by following the timeline of gaming history and preparing for key events that has shaped the industry. Stock shelves, set prices, and sell consoles, games, and accessories. Strategize to grow your business and dominate the market!

games.name: Wavekin
games.description: Wavekin is a narrative adventure and underwater exploration game where you dive into the depths to discover an ancient civilization. Observe, listen, and use your song to unravel the ocean’s mysteries and breathe new life into a world on the brink of silence.

games.name: Trials of Valor
games.description: Trials of Valor is a real-time, roguelike fighting game. Gear up and build your character to fight evil monsters of increasing difficulty.

games.name: Before the Silence
games.description: In this turn-based strategy, you will take control of an anti-disinformation department and protect your citizens from terrorist influence. Manage your agents and resources, analyze media, and restore order in different regions of your country.

games.name: Croakspire
games.description: Dive into a fortress labyrinth crawling with monsters, defending yourself with your... tongue? As a frog, it's your best bet to traverse this retro-inspired 2D metroidvania title. Collect treasures to gain permanent upgrades, discovering new areas of the massive interconnected map with them!

games.name: Mysteries of Old Tokyo
games.description: Step into the Imperial Capital, where knowledge is your weapon. Research and explore 40+ real-life Tokyo locations, past and present. Encounter a cast of wandering spirits, interrogate their stories, and separate the truth from their lies.

games.name: Remembrance
games.description: Step into the fractured mind of a dying scientist in Remembrance, a mind-bending VR puzzle adventure. Piece together broken memories, uncover devastating truths, and decide the fate of a world teetering on the edge of collapse. Will you save humanity?

games.name: Gallipoli
games.description: Land on the battlefields of the Middle Eastern Front of World War 1! Gallipoli brings the most authentic WW1 FPS battles yet, with desert warfare, beach landings, historical classes and realistic weaponry.

games.name: Chickens Don't Fly
games.description: In this tough-as-nails physics-platformer, swing to freedom as a rooster whose only hope of escaping a harsh pit of hopelessness lies in a pair of plungers and his own strength. Grapple your way to freedom, but be careful—one wrong move can send you back to the start.

games.name: Ash Warden
games.description: Ash Warden is a fast-paced tower defense where you click to shoot enemies, teleport between three towers, and upgrade skills to survive relentless Redgaze waves.

games.name: Battlestar Galactica: Scattered Hopes
games.description: In Battlestar Galactica: Scattered Hopes, take command of a fleet escaping the annihilation of the Twelve Colonies. Manage crises on board as you prepare for the next encounter with the Cylon Fleet. Times are dire, and hard choices must be made. Your only hope: rejoin the Battlestar Galactica.

games.name: Sherlock Holmes: Night Stalker
games.description: “When you have eliminated all which is impossible, then whatever remains, however improbable, must be the truth.” — Sherlock Holmes. This work is an immersive mystery and deduction game, powered by the latest large-scale AI model technology and offering a brand-new interactive experience.

games.name: Mega Drill: World Domination
games.description: Run your mining empire to success and become the richest person in the world! Mega Drill is an action, management, upgrade game with a digging theme. Procedurally generated islands make every run different!

games.name: Heroes and Forsaken: The Official Wheel of Time Digital Card Game
games.description: Heroes and Forsaken is the official Wheel of Time digital card game. Build decks under Leader identities, choose Light or Shadow, and face rivals in fast, tactical matches across the world of The Wheel of Time. Command legendary characters and spells, outplay your opponent, and shape the fate of the Age.

games.name: FrogSpin
games.description: A wind-up frogventure bursting with colorful platforming and roguelike surprises. Spin the slots, master precision jumps, and rack up points. Ready to leap into action?

games.name: Frontline Logistics: Isarian Warfare
games.description: A tactical survival and outpost management sim driven by dynamic battlefield events. War isn't just about combat—it’s about the daily lives of your soldiers. Keep logistics running, scavenge every usable resource, and do what you can to ease the harsh reality of life on the frontlines.

games.name: GameShop Simulator
games.description: Run a GameShop set in the early 2000's. Manage your products for sale such as games, consoles, and accessories. Customize your store and your character to make it your own. Play solo or enjoy up to a 4 player co-op and run the store your way.

games.name: You Know The Drill
games.description: You Know The Drill is a relaxing incremental mining game about digging underground to harvest ores. Collect resources, sell them, and upgrade your drill to go even deeper!

games.name: Touhou Unite Arena
games.description: "Touhou Unite Arena" is a card Roguelike game based on the theme of the Touhou Project. Build your own team, combine the spell cards in your hand, play explosive attack values, defeat the target enemy step by step, and challenge the final champion!

games.name: Bonemarrow
games.description: Bonemarrow is a short action survival horror in which you play a mutant creature created in a lab, destined to be used as a test subject. When the facility you were created in falls into disarray, you finally have your opportunity to escape. You may just make it out alive.

games.name: Restore Your Island
games.description: A calm life sim about cleaning a ruined island, one trash at a time. Sell what you find, upgrade your tools, build your dream cabin, and share it all with your loyal dog. No rush, no rules—just you and your paradise in progress.

games.name: Dungeon Bodega Simulator
games.description: Dungeon Bodega Simulator is a retro styled fantasy shop game where you can grow crops, brew potions, sell items and raise slimes as pets! Can you build up your bodega into a one stop adventuring shop while solving the mysteries of the dungeon beneath you?

games.name: Orebits
games.description: Smash through alien rock with oversized mining gear, collect rare ores and uncover strange secrets. Orebits is a gritty sci-fi idle game full of mystery and metal.

games.name: Defense Collapse
games.description: Defense Collapse is a strategy game set in a medieval fantasy world. Pioneer the unexplored dark forest, build your town and defenses, and hold out against the massive hordes of enemies. How long can you survive?

games.name: Ash & Adam's Existential Treads
games.description: A mini action city-builder in a post-post-apocalyptic world. Grow your settlement. Fend off waves of enemies. Restore nature.

games.name: Cult Vacui
games.description: Cult Vacui is a horror point-and-click adventure with survival and time management elements where your choices could keep you alive... or not.

games.name: Cloudspan
games.description: In this bite-sized city builder, your goal is to stack and stretch your town as far as physics will allow. Tiny Island. Big mess.

games.name: War of Banners
games.description: "Start with a handful of soldiers and rise to become a lord who shakes the battlefield!" The game is a medieval-style strategy/real-time combat RPG. Explore a vast land, raise your knights, and conquer new territories. A free mercenary, a loyal noble, or the ruler of an empire. Choose your path.

games.name: Lord of Ogre
games.description: Lord of Ogre is a turn-based strategy game with action combat, where players manage their own attacks and defenses. It also features RPG, board game, and strategy elements for a unique victory quest.

games.name: The Mailroom
games.description:
A horror job simulator where you work in the mailroom of a small regional office of Hell located in Modesto, California.

You just started working in the mailroom of that weird building on 5th. The job was easy enough at first. Sort the mail and use their creaky old pneumatic tube system to send it to the correct departments. But then shit started getting weird. Can you figure out what's really going on in this place and find a way out?

games.name: Island Beekeeper
games.description: Island Beekeeper is a cozy sim where you harvest miraculous honey from sky islands to save a dying Earth. Explore biomes, breed exotic bees, craft elixirs and dishes. Relaxing farming, crafting and adventure with meditative cycles and mini-games.

games.name: My Infamous Dungeon
games.description:
It's time to be evil. Build and master your dungeon, hire despicable monsters, and rise to conquer the overworld. Gaze from below as your dark tendrils creep across the land, snatching treasures from the forces of good and funding an ever growing empire. But beware! Saint Million the Hero King and his table of royal knights are always watching. Leave your dungeon weak, and a single cleave from the hero's sword will end your reign.

My Infamous Dungeon is a roguelite dungeon builder. Take time to carefully plan your dungeon, then protect it against waves of greedy heroes.

games.name: Berghotel Heist
games.description: Co-op horror game that takes place in the Austrian Alps. Your break into a hotel, searching for valuable treasures, but little did you know that Perchten and Krampus are already waiting for you.

games.name: Cyber Siege
games.description: Cyber Siege is a fast-paced twin-stick shooter with pure gameplay. Play solo or in local co-op up to 4 players. Upgrade your character and weapons as you fight 100+ enemy types across 20 levels in 4 distinct worlds.

games.name: Path to Tamer Town
games.description: Travel from city to city collecting badges in these procedurally generated roguelite adventures. Catch and evolve your team of Mokitons, make tough choices, and fight using a unique real-time meets turn-based battle system – all leading up to the ultimate Stadium Showdown!

games.name: Frutiger Space
games.description: Frutiger Space is a social multiplayer game about the future we were promised.

games.name: Mysplaced
games.description: Mysplaced is an enchanting action-adventure game where exploration, puzzles, and combat come together in a beautifully crafted 3D world. Dive into a realm filled with secrets, challenges, and a compelling story waiting to be uncovered.

games.name: Jiji the Bajillionaire
games.description: A precision puzzle platformer, with no legs. Propel Wizard Jiji by setting off bombs along with loads of powerups and mechanics. Help Jiji collect enough money to pay off his debt and break his curse!

games.name: Soul Essence
games.description: A frantic, race-against-time survival horror game with Roguelite and Metroidvania elements. Traverse a decrepit, cultist-infested estate and collect awakened souls to conquer an ancient god looking to feast on your essence. Before midnight strikes—can you defeat the god or prevent its return?

games.name: Together: Moon Escape
games.description: Trapped on the Moon, two astronauts must work together to escape! Solve clever co-op puzzles, share laughs, and survive a hilarious lunar adventure with your partner.

games.name: AlcheMice
games.description: Explore 16th-century Granada, steeped in tarot and alchemy. Face Gusparda, the cursed witch, and fight for your freedom. Build your deck, choose every move across 3D boards, and use strategy and tactics to break the curse and craft the Philosopher’s Stone.

games.name: Imagine Sisyphus Happy
games.description:
Sisyphus, king of Corinth, has tricked the Gods and Death. To punish him, the Gods condemned him to push a boulder uphill forever, only for it to roll back each time.
But Sisyphus didn't give up. He decided to livestream it.

Imagine Sisyphus Happy is a Steamer Sim, Clicker and QTE mix game about life, spectacle, and finding meaning in repetition. Roll your boulder, pull off stunts, and try to make the eternal grind worth living.

Push the boulder. Do tricks. Go live.

Progressing from Greek myth to the modern day, the story asks two simple questions:
- Aren’t you a Sisyphus too?
- Can you Imagine Sisyphus Happy?

games.name: Cora
games.description: CORA (Counter Offensive Rapidfire Automata) is a singleplayer/multiplayer top-down shooter created by Empty House Games borrowing inspiration from other arcade top-down shooters.

games.name: The Cube, Save Us
games.description: The Cube, Save Us is an action-packed, close-combat extraction game set in a post-apocalyptic world. Pass each of the cube gates that presents its own surroundings and monsters. Survive the mutants and fellow raiders in close combat and come out on top by escaping the cube.

games.name: The Last Screening
games.description: You find yourself inside a cinema hallway, ready to watch your film. The venue, however, has other plans for you.

games.name: Dice Card Heroes
games.description: In this roguelike deckbuilder, every card features its own dice. Battle against many fantastic creatures across 3 chapters. Upgrade your cards, build countless synergies and find mighty weapons to shape your playstyle. There is only one goal: Be the hero, slay the dragon.

games.name: Deadliest Pigeon
games.description: Equip weapons against physics-based enemies, swing through chaos with grappling hook and destroy everything in your path to avenge the little chick!

games.name: The Afterlife Cafe
games.description: In a city split between life and afterlife, chat with spirits, brew drinks to suit your mood, and bond with the people who run the cafes that connect both worlds. In this urban sci-fi fantasy visual novel, your choices impact the living, the departed, and your own path forward.

games.name: Elfie: A Sand Plan
games.description: A perfect day at the beach requires sand castles. Help a small ambitious elephant with her ideas in this relaxing geometric puzzle game! Or enjoy building your own!

games.name: Well Keeper
games.description: Well Keeper is a Bullet Hell Shoot `Em Up where you move by flapping. Battle waves of enemies, upgrade unique and unexpected abilities and become immensely powerful.

games.name: Bounty Brawl: Most Wanted
games.description: Welcome to Hunter Haven! Bounty Brawl is a top-down action roguelite shooter for 1-4 players. Here, the hunt is fierce, and betrayal is inevitable. Will you form a fragile alliance with other hunters under the galaxy's most notorious bounties, or go it alone? Who will emerge as the ultimate victor?

games.name: Deadly Trick
games.description: Survive the death game unfolding at school under the name "Special Class." You are not given any special role at the beginning. Depending on the situation or your own choices, you could become the White or the Shadow! Cooperate… or betray.

games.name: Cat Island Petrichor
games.description: "Cat Island Petricolor" is an exploration adventure game set on Japan's summer "Cat Island." Become a cat, explore the island, and uncover the mysteries of Cat Island together with the heroine!

games.name: The Hidden Scrolls
games.description: The Hidden Scrolls is a turn-based roguelike tactical RPG with a Chinese-inspired setting. Explore five mysterious regions, battle fierce beasts and ruthless bandits, recruit and train a team of warriors to uncover the secrets hidden within ancient bamboo scrolls.

games.name: Scribble Wolf
games.description: A Werewolf game (or social deduction game), in which you can control the character that you have drawn. Up to 10 players can play online. Perhaps the key to victory is to "draw tracing" of an opposing team's character and "disguise yourself" as it...?

games.name: Dress the Duel
games.description: "Dress the Duel," is a roguelike deckbuilding game where your cards are your wardrobe and your outfit is your arsenal!Build a versatile wardrobe, disrobe strategically, layer outfits for powerful effects, and Dress the Duel!

games.name: BB Adventure
games.description: “BB Adventure” is an immersive action game where you ride a real balance ball and clear athletic stages. Using a controller with an accelerometer, your balance ball’s movements control the in-game character, making you feel as if you’re inside the game.

games.name: Beast Gang
games.description: Place cards on a 5×5 board to complete hands in rows, columns, and diagonals in this fresh, casual puzzle game! Simple controls, deep strategy, and addictive combos await. Use items to turn the tide and push your score to the limit in endless mode!

games.name: Space Revolver
games.description: Space Revolver is a strategic puzzle game set in a space station. Use limited moves—such as map rotation, gravity control, and horizontal movement—to find the optimal path. Enjoy clever and deep puzzles with retro-style pixel art and a classic sci-fi atmosphere!

games.name: The Last Keeper
games.description: In 1900, three keepers vanished. The official report lied. Now, you are the new keeper. Wind the gears. Polish the lens. In the consuming dark, let your voice be the spark. The sea is hungry. The island remembers. Based on the real Flannan Isles mystery.

games.name: Blast Head
games.description: Blast Head is a fast-paced action roguelite/bullet heaven with absurd weapons, powerful runes, and non-linear weapon skill trees. Dive into 10–30 minute runs, discover wild synergies, and unleash chaos across alien arenas.

games.name: Catio Simulator
games.description: Catio Simulator is a relaxing idle game in which you decorate a catio to attract cats. Pet your cats to get them ready for adoption, collect adoption fees, and buy new decorations and petting abilities!

games.name: Everglen
games.description: Build your dream farm in a cozy pixel RPG. Grow crops, fish, mine, and explore a charming island full of secrets. Meet quirky NPCs, craft and trade items, and uncover magical surprises at your own pace. Relax, explore, and create your story in this farming adventure.

games.name: IPS 13: All Signals Lost
games.description: Take command of the massive VOD(Vehicle of Destruction) and journey across planet Gaiganthra with your IPS(Inter-Planetary Squad)-13 crew to uncover the mystery of humans there. Be prepared for the worse and ready to fight. Upgrade your VOD, hire new crew factions, to be the ultimate War Machine.

games.name: AnimalFruitTart
games.description:
Simple controls—just jump! Play with one button in this physics-based, intuitive action game!
Bounce and roll through a candy world in the grand adventure of the “Animal Fruits”!

games.name: Sokoku
games.description: A block-pushing game where you not only push blocks, you are one. Plan your movements so that the right number ends up on top, while you interact with other cubes and mechanics. Can you roll your way to the solution?

games.name: [Herror] Gas Station Case
games.description:
[HERROR] is a series of short horror episodes where everyday work routines collide with paranormal threats. Each episode is a unique standalone story lasting 1.5–2 hours.

Dan Cooper, a 25-year-old night shift gas station worker in Ohio, recently laid off from a uranium plant, is trying to put his life back together. But everything changes when his friend Michael discovers a mysterious case by the lake. Soon, people begin to vanish in the surrounding woods, and the cozy gas station turns into a deadly trap.

games.name: Project II: Silent Valley
games.description: Project II: Silent Valley is a linear, semi-open world dystopian visual novel with card combat and explore. Play as US Navy Officer Hierophan, joining the docile humanoid weapon Osprey to uncover a conspiracy at the underwater base "Silent Valley" and the hidden truths of his missing friend, Ochira.

games.name: Nophenia
games.description: explore atmospheric dreams of vagrant but familiar memories.

games.name: Lobsterpunk
games.description: Lockpick your way through an abandoned city powered solely by the combustion of lobsters. Bring the dead machinery one last breath of life before their steel forms lay cold forever. As you do, see the memories of the last man on earth, and how familiar that might feel, however foreign the setting.

games.name: Black Cat Book Club
games.description: A magical library you can place on your desktop. Help the black cat study ancient tomes and learn spells in this cozy idle game.

games.name: The Gate Must Stand
games.description: Fend off brutal waves of demonic hordes as a mobile hero amongst your stationary allies. As the city’s last line of defense, recruit followers, unlock upgrades, and synergize skills to hold the line against apocalyptic bosses. Remember: heroes can fall, but the gate must stand.

games.name: The Solitary Existence of a Little Universe
games.description: In this dark interactive novel you will play as a lost soul wandering a forsaken desert, accompanied by a mysterious girl. Explore ancient ruins and face obscure choices. Your decisions will shape their journey—often in ways you’ll never fully understand. Will you find peace, or something else?

games.name: Deliverance Protocol: Ironrot
games.description: Atmospheric first-person retro horror. You are a courier — a disposable tool of the System. Sort, deliver, collect archives. Obey… or uncover what lies inside.

games.name: Everbrew
games.description: Farm, cook, and design your very own woodland café in Everbrew, a cozy pixel-art management game. Harvest ingredients, craft delicious meals, and welcome woodland creatures as they gather to relax, eat, and feel at home.

games.name: The Bestest Alchemist
games.description: Solve puzzles and brew potions in The Bestest Alchemist, a strategic match-3 roguelike! Freely arrange ingredients to create magical combinations, discover 100+ new recipes, and upgrade your collection to build powerful synergies. Your journey to becoming a master alchemist starts now!

games.name: Seek & Sail
games.description: Seek & Sail is a pirate-themed deck-building roguelike. Your deck is made up of sailors, each bringing their own actions into combat. Upgrade your crew, uncover unique relics, and face intense naval battles where timing is everything.

games.name: Convent Chronicles: Revelation
games.description: A visual novel that combines religious themes from Catholicism with anime inspired drama and visuals.

games.name: The Floor Above
games.description: A claustrophobic anomaly-horror game where you can only turn, blink, and decide: is it real or not? Survive five endings and uncover Mike’s story.

games.name: Kkokko Industry
games.description: Kkokko Industry is a relaxing idle game where you manage a chicken farm. The game runs on one side of your monitor, allowing you to enjoy it comfortably while working on other tasks.

games.name: Snow Steam Trail
games.description: Drive a steam-powered truck across frozen wastelands to uncover the truth behind the Great Freeze. Gather resources, refuel, repair, and upgrade your vehicle. Cultivate and cook plants. What secrets await in this slumbering frostland?

games.name: Alruna: End of History
games.description: Alruna; now in wide-screen! A different kind of Metroidvania, a tour-de-force of game design, with world-class temples and dungeons. Dead men yearn for Heaven, but Elysium remains out of their grasp.

games.name: The Reflex Lab
games.description: You've been kidnapped by an evil (and extremely rude) alien. To escape, you’ll have to complete a series of reflex, skill and patience based trials in his poorly constructed laboratory. Will you survive the alien’s twisted tests and escape? Or will you end up like his last batch of “lab rats”?

games.name: One Nation Under the Old Gods
games.description: A Rogue-lite Deckbuilder set in early 1800s United States. Play as members of a secret organization that investigates occult activity in an effort to stop various cults from summoning Eldritch Gods. Acquire cards to create combos and synergies to defeat your enemies in turn-based combat!

games.name: Blast Bebop
games.description: Blast Bebop is an easy-to-pick-up action-incremental game, combining dodging, shooting, collecting, and upgrades, set to retro pixel visuals and psychedelic music for a short, relaxing combat experience.

games.name: Jack's 510 Racing
games.description: Jack's 510 Racing is an open world arcade driver set on nine connecting islands. Earn points by racing on the streets, surviving UFOs and police, or causing mayhem in death races inspired by the cult classic movie. Use points to upgrade, customize, and buy new cars.

games.name: Lucky Break: Dating in New York
games.description: A Slice-of-Life Dating Sim with AI Full-Motion Videos, set in modern New York.

games.name: Where the Forest Ends
games.description: Where the forest end is a story-driven, top-down horror shooter set in a zombie-infested post-apocalypse. Visceral, grounded, and realistic. A fresh take on a classic genre.

games.name: R.E.A.P.E.R. Corp.
games.description: A co-op horror about scavenging a post-apocalyptic earth and eating your friends.

games.name: Blitloop
games.description: A fast-paced, side-scrolling retro shooter where you play as “Blit" on a mission to rescue orb pods. Blast enemy swarms and face off against bosses in this bullet-hell shoot 'em up. Earn power-ups and get ready for fluid arcade action in a stylish world with an 80s synthwave soundtrack.

games.name: Tyrone vs. Cops 2
games.description: Awaken the latent power of your melanin and kill cops in this thought-provoking game on police brutality in America.

games.name: Fractals
games.description: Fractals is a two-player co-op puzzle platformer where players complete puzzles and challenges using innovative mechanics. Work together to solve physics-based puzzles and go through platforming challenges.

games.name: Don't Freeze: A Winter Card Survival
games.description: Don't Freeze is a winter card survival game set in a winter wasteland. Explore, gather resources, craft, hunt, die, repeat. Something sinister lurks in the cold darkness. Will you make it out in time?

games.name: Love Surge!
games.description: Love Surge! is a comedy dating sim where you can romance human versions of your appliances, merging visual novel text with card game mechanics. As you rack up point combos, you will simulate deeper conversations. Who will you choose?

games.name: The Stalked 3
games.description: A late-night thrill turns into a nightmare. Olivia sneaks into Creepwood Wonderland Carnival with her boyfriend, expecting a fun night alone in the park. But something feels off. Distant footsteps. Faint whispers. Someone else is here… Watching.

games.name: Restless Rites
games.description: Tend to a cursed chapel at the edge of town, or be swallowed by what sleeps beneath it. Clean, survive, and unravel a rotting mystery in this surreal horror game of routine, decay, and sacrifice.

games.name: The Last Tape: Before the Mine
games.description: In this first chapter of the saga, relive an old tape recorded over 35 years ago, revealing one of Lurmont Corporation’s darkest secrets. Explore the Alhambra mines, uncover the truth behind the events, and survive the constant threat of B-96. What was once recorded now hunts you.

games.name: Out on the Water
games.description: Out On The Water is a short, meditative journey through memory and grief that tells the story of an inattentive father and his last chance to connect with his children. Set adrift in quiet waters that represent each child, catch strange memory fish to uncover the past and face regrets.

games.name: Impact Trial: Hyperchaos
games.description: Face endless waves and survive the chaos! Impact Trial: Hyperchaos is a casual spaceship bullet hell with adaptive difficulty, where your reflexes and decisions make the difference against hundreds of relentless enemies. Push your limits and climb the global leaderboards.

games.name: Perk Up
games.description: Perk Up! is a multiplayer deck-building fighting game where every defeat makes you stronger. Each time you fall, you gain new powers, evolving into an unstoppable force. Keep fighting, adapt, and outlast everyone to become the last one standing!

games.name: System Clues
games.description: Play as a secret agent of a mysterious organization and complete complex plot investigation tasks through network infiltration, social engineering, and digital investigation. Is it justice or sin?

games.name: Remnant Frontier: Survival
games.description: The Remnants of humanity send an augmented human to a seemingly uninhabited alien frontier. From sticks and stones, build the tools required to complete the Quantum Gate Terminus and save the world. A relaxed yet deep and engaging Rogue-lite Card Based Adventure; Combine, Explore, Learn & Build.

games.name: Rotten Life: Desert Prisoner
games.description: "Rotten Life" is a dark medieval RPG where you play a desperate mercenary. Complete lethal contracts, explore cursed dungeons, and manipulate warring factions. In this brutal world, survival means getting your hands dirty. No heroes - just blood, gold, and hard choices.

games.name: Amanita
games.description: Amanita is an introspective journey into your mind where the path seems to be only one, and it does not seem to be easy. Let yourself be guided by surreal characters in your thoughts, clash with your memories with sword blows, wander in your memory, play cards with your fears.

games.name: Fishing Tales: Neko's Journey
games.description: A relaxing idle fishing game focused on companionship, featuring 26 fishing spots and over 200 fish species. Easy to enjoy without much effort. You can place the game anywhere on your screen while studying or working, without it intruding on your tasks.

games.name: Asteroid Boom Cosmic Courier
games.description: You’re no hero—you’re a subcontractor. Drop the bomb, dodge the blast, and hope the paperwork clears. 4-player physics chaos in a space platformer with no safety net.

games.name: Tiny Hell
games.description: A 2D pixel roguelike where a tiny hero tries to escape from a hotel. Choose a class, explore rooms, collect items, craft powerful weapons, and defeat enemies in turn-based battles. Each run is unique and full of surprises.

games.name: Pizza Syndicate
games.description: Run your pizza empire in this quirky retro tycoon! Manage restaurants, hire staff, craft menus, and outsmart rivals. Dive into the underground syndicate—rob banks, hire hitmen, sabotage competitors, and use any scheme to dominate the city with humor and strategy! WISHLIST NOW!

games.name: Wanted Shadows: Unchained
games.description: A survivors-like game where you defeat creatures of the night trying to take over the underworld. Vanquish the invasion, perfect your build, and become purgatory's master.

games.name: Virtuoso GP Race: On
games.description: An homage to early 3D racers: true ’90s handling with bespoke physics, checkpoints with EXTEND TIME, instant restarts, ghosts, and global leaderboards. Demo: Sakura Coast & Dunas de Giza.

games.name: Slimeward
games.description: Slimeward is an idle game where players build and upgrade a village, recruit heroes, and defeat Monster 'Slime' that fell in front of the house one day,

games.name: 1492: Colonization of the New World
games.description: Chart your nation's rise in 1492 Colonization of the New World, a turn-based strategy game where you explore, settle, trade, and lead your colonies to independence amid rival empires and native alliances during the Age of Discovery.

games.name: Combotronica
games.description: Discover hidden patterns. Build spectacular chains packed with combos. Collect powerful Amulets. Watch scores skyrocket in this brilliantly satisfying roguelike deck-builder where you balance logic and luck your way!

games.name: Ware's Laboratory
games.description: Anti-piracy measures are now active. Your game has turned into a nightmare. Crawl through corrupted levels, read notes from a malicious developer, and face the nature of evil itself.

games.name: Faust Duel
games.description: FAUST DUEL is a Blackjack-driven roguelike deck-builder. Play as Dr. Faust, who lost his wager and now joins Hell’s games. Within a limited number of rounds, earn enough chips to buy back your soul from its master.

games.name: Hand-me-downs
games.description: A roguelike deck builder where you are your own worst enemy. Manage your deck as your opponents use your old hands against you. Use powerful trinkets to take full control of the table.

games.name: MechShell
games.description: Defend the Overgrown Realms as S.H.E.L.L., a weaponized snail! Customize your shell, unlock wild abilities, and team up with friends in chaotic multiplayer mayhem across lush, trap-filled biomes. Every battle is a fast-paced, action-packed adventure!

games.name: Decision Point
games.description: Plans meet friction in Decision Point, a wargame where you issue NATO-standard orders, observe AI execution in real time, and adapt as the battlefield evolves. At key Decision Points, the action pauses—giving you time to reassess, redirect your forces, and outmanoeuvre the enemy.

games.name: Gun of Fate: The Silver Gun of Ylia
games.description: A shooting adventure RPG game, where you play as a gunslinger in Westland. The main combat system of the game is gun shooting. You can complete quest and side missions, unlock items and equipment, and also play fishing and horse racing mini games.

games.name: Divine Sin
games.description: A deck-building roguelike with innovative card mechanics, blending strategy with unpredictability. In a decaying dark fantasy world, you are a resurrected Apostle—sworn to hunt the gods.

games.name: Red Souls
games.description: Prepare to suffer! Swords, Knights, Castles, Deflect, Gun Parry, Execution, Boss, Assassination, Explore, Ladder, Elevator, Does not open from this side, Clang! Clang! Clang!

games.name: Clan Fantasy Adventures
games.description: Clan fantasy adventures is a turn-based 2D RPG. Play Marco, a young boy who wants to become a swordsman, through various adventures that will plunge him into the heart of a major conflict.

games.name: Stardust Escape
games.description: Survive 15 minutes of neon space chaos in this fast-paced top-down arcade shooter with a twist of Asteroids. Blast through swarms of geometric enemies, complete quirky quests, and upgrade your ship with absurd weapons in a Jetsons-style galaxy brimming with danger, glow, and humor.

games.name: My Hero: Before the Conquest
games.description: This is a turn-based card game. Build a powerful team, reasonably arrange your cards according to the environment, and fully utilize the equipment, potions, and scrolls you have obtained. Keep fighting until you reach the deepest part of the enemy's territory!

games.name: Joyful Masks
games.description: Step into the subconscious mind of a brilliant professor, where memories twist, logic bends, and hidden truths await discovery through intricate puzzles

games.name: Uncle Lee’s Cookbook: Five Recipes for Disaster
games.description: Uncle Lee has done it again. It’s up to you to pick up the pieces. Join rebellious teen Ines as she deals with the fallout of her uncle Lee’s experiments/inventions/cooking, in a modern point & click adventure in five self-contained episodes.

games.name: Sticky Date
games.description: An anti-dating simulator that subverts the genre and provides catharsis through relatable, raw and satirical dates. You play as an underpaid dumpling cook who, in order to make ends meet, gets recruited by a sketchy dating app agent. Now you need to crash dates in order to earn a living wage!

games.name: Deckanism: Singularity Island
games.description: A roguelike deckbuilder meets auto-battler where every fight is a puzzle. Build mechanisms, counter enemies and unleash your perfect combo!

games.name: Gazar
games.description: GAZAR is an intense vertical arcade space shooter where you fight against an alien fleet destroying the galaxy. Battle through Story Mode or test your skills in Infinity Mode with 5 difficulty levels and leaderboards. GAZAR delivers non-stop action, stunning visual effects, and dynamic combat.

games.name: Reborn: The Evil Being
games.description: This is an open-world action-adventure game where you explore a stunning and vibrant fantasy world full of magic, mystery, and hidden danger. Play in either third-person or first-person as you battle monsters, uncover secrets, and grow stronger in your quest to find the truth behind your arrival.

games.name: Big Beautiful Women: Giantess Dating Action
games.description: If you like big girls, this is the game for you. Play as a college student trying to find love in a city full of giant ladies. 5 lovely ladies to woo, 5 stats to manage, and 10 endings to reach. Can you fall in love before you graduate?

games.name: DualVerse86
games.description: A 2D retro speedrunner where every second counts. Switch between worlds, dodge traps, beat the clock.

games.name: Tales of Justice Academy: Winds Arise
games.description: You can play as a young martial artist entering Justice Academy. Train through various courses, customize your build with different weapons, skills, and inner techniques. Explore the jianghu, bond with companions, and shape your fate across branching stories and three romanceable heroines.

games.name: Messy Hearts
games.description: Messy Hearts is a pixel-art visual novel about a complicated coworker friendship. Through journal-style narration, Florence unpacks romance, trauma, and some messy boundaries in a deeply personal story of mental health and heartbreak. No choices; this is a linear narrative.

games.name: Dungeon Forge
games.description: You are a blacksmith, not a hero. Create weapons with countless unique combinations, exploit monsters’ weaknesses, and supply heroes with what will determine their fate.

games.name: Recoup
games.description: Bring back mankind. Bring down factions. Explore the new world by solving light grid puzzles. Interact with lots of unique citizens such as a cashier and a shopkeeper. Recruit and bargain through combat-like dialogues. Modify your abilities as you experience the story through comic cutscenes.

games.name: To Crown or to Destroy
games.description: Fight horrible creatures. Devour other fairytales' hearts. Set the Princess free from her cage...and rewrite her fate! To Crown or to Destroy is a narrative RPG inspired by dark fairy tales, and tragic love stories.

games.name: SOS: Save Our Ship
games.description: SOS is a 4-player online co-op horror-action game. Operate your ship, explore dangerous islands, loot valuable treasures, and escape deadly enemies to repay your soul’s debt. Strategy and teamwork are key to survival!

games.name: Cuzuco
games.description: Challenge yourself and demonstrate your precise high-speed hand control to help our little armadillo get back home as fast as possible in this fair but unforgiving platformer game.

games.name: Eagle Legacy: Zero
games.description: Explore a cursed realm locked in mist and blood. Solve ancient puzzles, cast forbidden spells, and survive the Witch’s trial in this dark third-person adventure set at the edge of myth and memory.

games.name: Pelican Empyrean
games.description: Food is love! In this fantastical roguelike card game share the magic of abundance by cooking delicious meals for all who come to Pelican's kitchen.

games.name: Referee Life Simulator 2026
games.description: A realistic referee simulator! Show cards, use VAR, control matches, and rise through your referee career!

games.name: Forgotten: Whispers From Ashes
games.description: A curse lurks in the fog in this psychological and investigative horror game. Use a strange lantern to uncover the truth and solve the mystery of Centreville and its ghostly inhabitants. Will you break the curse… before it drives you insane?

games.name: Starship Dice
games.description: Starship Dice​​ is a strategy game with dice at its core, inspired by Mahjong. Players use dice to command fleets in battle. Different point values and dice combinations form scoring hands. But don't worry, you can still battle even without forming a complete hand.

games.name: Saga of Yurina
games.description: A 2D action platformer of graceful duels and perfect parries under the falling sakura.

games.name: The Sage's Spirit: Shining Flame
games.description: A Japanese-inspired Western fantasy visual novel with a female-centric narrative, set in a unique world. Play commoner mage Nolan: follow your mentor to Sabelien, forge bonds, face power struggles. Choose to avoid chaos or carve your path—your choices will shape Aorleton and the Mage Guild’s fate.

games.name: Rift Survivors
games.description: Rift Survivors is a 2D survivor-like game where you grow stronger by arranging your inventory. Equip items to unlock hidden powers and create your own unique build. Cross the rifts and survive against endless waves of enemies!

games.name: Synth Laser
games.description: Synth Laser is a dynamic laser maze rhythm game. Get ready to dodge and weave around the deadly and stunning laser show, built upon the outrun and synthwave music.

games.name: RebreatheR
games.description: Underwater, you're alone. Or almost alone. You're a diver doing routine work: cleaning the seabed, collecting waste, fixing pipes. But deep down there's always something wrong. Explore, repair, survive — and try not to lose your mind.

games.name: Synergy Strike
games.description: Arcade game where you play as triangles that dash strike enemies. Enter the flow state to climb global leaderboards while earning massive combos. Up to 4 friends can join in synergy with couch co-op team mode. Unlock prizes using your precision, poise, and persistence as 2D colorful combat ignites.

games.name: How Many Secrets Under Ceiling
games.description: The first light novel-style immersive detective game's here! A dentist dead in a double-locked room seems like a suicide, but unexplained contradictions connect different truths. Each investigation and puzzles are up to you. But wait, what's wrong with this suspicious "assistant" following?!

games.name: Whiskers Wizards & Wands
games.description:
Whiskers Wizards and Wands is a whimsical and cozy adventure game. Take on the role of a Wizard Cat who interacts with the world around them via a customizable wand. Fight enemies, find secret treasures, design spell combinations, to repair a world that has been broken and scrambled.

The game has a beautiful orchestral score, and is completely hand-drawn. Every image was drawn with markers on paper before being placed into the game.

games.name: Casino Tycoon: Sin & Win
games.description: Rise from a broke gambler to a casino kingpin in this high-stakes sim blending management, gambling, and adult content. Win big, indulge in luxury, go bankrupt, or start a gang war—every choice writes your destiny. In this city, you either rule the tables… or end up in a ditch.

games.name: Echoes of the Hive
games.description: Team up with friends in this 2D fantasy sandbox adventure! Explore mysterious worlds, craft powerful gear, battle monsters, and delve deep underground to uncover secrets and challenge epic bosses.

games.name: Yāo Liàn Xī Yóu
games.description: You, an ordinary college student, are unexpectedly reincarnated into another world, becoming the new "Golden Body" chosen by Jin Chanzi. Characters from "Journey to the West" suddenly reappear before you in the guise of women. To return to your original world, you must complete the mission entrusted to you by "Tathagata Buddha." Renew your bonds with various demons, undo the mistakes of the previous Golden Body, "Tang Sanzang," and retrace your journey westward, reshaping order and causality...
companies: Běijīng Jīng Wén Jī Zào XìnxīJìshù Yǒuxiàngōngsī

games.name: Shāpán Zhànzhēng: Sānguó
games.description: "Shāpán Zhànzhēng: Sānguó" is a strategic simulation game set during the Three Kingdoms period. Here you can play as various factions from Three Kingdoms history to conquer cities and lands, unify the realm. With abundant historical officers and scenarios, come restore the Han Dynasty!

games.name: It Reaches
games.description: It Reaches is a first person horror game, captured through the lens of a police officer’s body cam. Trapped inside the facilities of an abandoned hospital, find a way to escape the horrors lurking underground. Uncover a dark mystery left behind and don't get caught! They will reach for you…

games.name: Torch of Shadows
games.description: Torch of Shadows is a fast-paced roguelite where Light and Dark clash endlessly. Defend the temple, counter enemies with opposing powers, and preserve the fragile balance before the void consumes all.

games.name: TypeCaster
games.description: A once-shameless thief, cursed with a slow, agonizing death, must now embark on a perilous journey to the top of the legendary Tower of Trials. This 2.5D action RPG challenges you to master lightning-fast reflexes and precise typing to battle hordes of fearsome monsters guarding each floor. Harness powerful spells, uncover treasures, and push yourself to the limits in your battle against the unknowns. Will you rise to the challenge and break the curse, or will you become another victim?

games.name: Tiny Bakery
games.description: Run a tiny bakery for sweet-toothed slime customers! Bake multi-step recipes, keep track of every bowl, and adapt to changing weather as you unlock new recipes and welcome new guests. Take your time at night to prep for the next day.

games.name: Desktop Purrfect
games.description: Your purr-fect desktop companion is here! Get adorable cats that chill at the bottom of your screen, keeping you company while you work, study, play, or relax. Collect toys & furniture to build them a cozy home. Pet, feed, play, or simply enjoy their presence.

games.name: Cosmos Point
games.description: Control a squad of fighters in turn-based battles. The game pays great attention to the details of equipment - weapons, backpacks, a lot of grenades and other devices. More resources taken out of the mission - more improvements at the base. There are no useless items, there is a small backpack.

games.name: Wasteland Shop Simulator
games.description: A post-apocalyptic shop management game where you build, customize, and expand your store. Hire staff, explore the wasteland for loot, deal with messy customers and thieves, and grow your retail empire in a chaotic world gone mad.

games.name: Basement 66
games.description: The dice roguelike. You’ve been locked in Basement 66 with the Demon. Roll the death dice. Destroy cursed cards. Remember, only one of you can leave this hell alive. Will you survive? Good luck…

games.name: Indian Mechanic Simulator
games.description: Fix punctures, repair engines, wash, paint, and restore scooters, cars, and more in Indian Mechanic Simulator. Experience authentic street-side repairs and become the most trusted mechanic in town!

games.name: Rustmire
games.description: In this side-view pixel-art world, you captain a landship—survive by combat and scavenging, and grow your modular vessel into your own city. Among roaming cities and underground enclaves, records and wreckage hint at why people live this way… or how you become wreckage.

games.name: Bamorota Defense
games.description: Defend the sealstones in a fantasy world! Place towers and cast spells to stop endless waves of monsters in this casual tower defense game.

games.name: Bouncemasters 2: Pengu Throw
games.description: Bouncemasters 2: Pengu Throw is a sequel to the 300-million-downloads fun arcade hit and a successor of the legendary Yetisports! Grab your bat, line up the perfect swing and bounce your way around Levels Map. Chase glory while branching biomes packed with hazards, boosters and memes!

games.name: Lost Wiki: Kozlovka
games.description: Explore a wikipedia-like database and solve a small town mystery in Eastern Europe. Step into the shoes of a journalist in the 90s as you sprawl through articles and uncover the secrets that have been laid in front of you.

games.name: The Day of Salvation
games.description: "The Day of Salvation" is a horror game in which players must escape from giant humanoid creatures by hiding in the fog and discovering their true identities.

games.name: Bharat Police
games.description: Lead a police force in noir India. Manage officers, respond to emergencies, and upgrade your team. Navigate crime, corruption, and deep-rooted social tensions. Every decision has consequences.

games.name: Crawling Angels
games.description: Smash and thrash the mysterious Forever Chicken, a living ragdoll central to a frightful midnight carnival. Your Uncle Tontine assures "you can leave as soon as you desire" but despite their efforts no child has ever gone home... Will you be the first?

games.name: Butler Guillotine
games.description: Flesh filled puppets in a mishapen hotel. No windows, no exterior. Follow different characters' intertiwining paths and unearth forgotten events from a time long gone. Bring the ceremony to a halt.

games.name: Object Impermanence
games.description: A first person puzzle game where your vision defines reality, and only the things you can see exist. Learn and master the strange behaviours of objects outside your vision. Traverse the ancient structures of a world forgotten by the universe.

games.name: Eldritch Horror: Digital Edition
games.description: Uncover ancient cults, battle horrific monsters and thwart the rise of unfathomable Ancient Ones in a 1920s-themed adventure. In this faithful adaptation of the classic board game, you must race against time to save humanity from ancient powers and dark secrets before all is lost.

games.name: Espectro the Fighters Focus
games.description: Espectro - The Fighter's Focus is a beat 'em up action game with retro visuals and exuberant pixel art. Espectro and his allies, Sayuri and Iron Crusher, face hordes of enemies and powerful bosses in their quest for justice.

games.name: Lexispell
games.description: Strategy meets physics, in this roguelike word game, where you combine spelling with cool upgrades to score high.

games.name: Augmented Fear
games.description:
Augmented Fear is a horror puzzle game set in a dark and oppressive cyberpunk universe.
Trapped in a mysterious district, you must find a way out and survive against aggressive creatures.
Use augmented reality to uncover the secrets hidden within.

games.name: Saint Slayer: Spear of Sacrilege
games.description: Saint Slayer is an NES-style 2D action game, featuring loads of stages, enemies, and gore set against the backdrop of late-17th century Europe. Play as the ex-soldier Rudiger and wield the Spear of Sacrilege as you save the Holy Roman Empire from the corrupt Catholic priest Father Pacer.

games.name: Mini Shopkeeper
games.description: Run your cozy little shop from the bottom of your screen, decorate to attract unique customers, hire assistants, and send adventurers for rare treasures - all in a lively, charming management sim!

games.name: Starbump
games.description: Starbump combines fast-paced action, Third Person platforming and competitive modes in vibrants worlds. It’s designed for party nights where you and your friends battle it out for hours, packed into colorful arenas and quick-fire game modes. It's a pure cozy brawl !

games.name: Dumpling
games.description: DUMPLing is a fast-paced top-down survival shooter with a metroidvania twist. Pulled into the strange land of DUMPL, you’ll explore tunnels in platformer perspective, fight dumpling-like enemies in top down perspective, and uncover a bizarre story about food, friendship, and survival.

games.name: Escape From Ruin: Greymart Simulator
games.description: A post-apocalyptic loot-fight-extract survival game with escape-style raids by day and black-market shop management by night. Fans of Tarkov-like gameplay — and players who love running management sims — will feel right at home.

games.name: Drillbound
games.description: Drillbound is a short incremental game about mining your way to the planet’s core. Crush layers of rock, gather resources, upgrade your drill, and unlock powerful technologies as you descend into the depths.

games.name: The Doodle Palette
games.description: A cozy sandbox for building and painting miniature worlds. Place, paint, and decorate while tiny people and birds bring your dioramas to life.

games.name: MOLE
games.description: Voices of the dead are calling you from deep below the earth. Pilot the Mole, a Soviet drilling vessel, in this PSX-style simulator-horror game set during the waning days of the cold war.

games.name: Daughter of the Rift
games.description: Daughter of the Rift is story-rich card-battling adventure with a unique deck-building progression system.

games.name: Midnight Scenes: Among Graves
games.description: When the graves stop whispering in your ear, it’s time for you to surrender to eternal silence. So says the Agreement, and so it must be fulfilled. Welcome to a new dimension of horror. Welcome to Midnight Scenes.

games.name: Vena
games.description: Roguelike deckbuilder meets hex-tile city builder! Build a resource engine to survive the center’s rising demands. Place producers, converters, and combo-rich tiles. Roll dice to shop, pick perks, and chase wildly different builds every run.

games.name: Vytal Tactics
games.description: A real-time top down tactics game that rewards spacing, clever item use and team building. Vytal needs help, so form a strong team, level up your heroes and choose powerful artifacts to take out rounds of enemies.

games.name: StarAbyss Heroes
games.description: Torn by an ancient cataclysm, the world lies in ruins. In this ARPG, play a hero exploring relics, looting treasures, forging weapons, and mastering skills on a decaying yet fantastical journey.

games.name: Paparazzi
games.description: Take sneaky pictures of the Stars, or find and eliminate the Paparazzis in this chaotic multiplayer game of stealth and social deduction.

games.name: Overtrick
games.description: A trick-taking roguelike with style! Outplay your rivals, purchase special abilities, and dazzle 1920s high society with your unstoppable cardplay. Call your contract, follow suit, flush trumps, and claim the hand. This isn't your grandma's bridge club... this is Overtrick!

games.name: Everhome
games.description:
Become a sky architect in this relaxing, cozy, building and management sim. Meet charming characters and design unique houses just for them! Go shopping for new decorations, renovate their homes and discover the keys to their hearts.

Coming to steam in Q1 2026 -

games.name: Pixplorer
games.description: Pixplorer is a top-down sandbox action-RPG. Explore biomes, conquer dungeons, craft, build, fight, mine, farm, catch fish and insects! Enjoy the game's atmosphere and complete freedom to shape your own adventure.

games.name: Intervoid
games.description: INTERVOID is a tense co-op horror game with resource management elements. Delve into the dark depths of an abandoned subway, avoid dangerous anomalies, out-of-control trains, and manage your oxygen supply. Reach the heart of this oppressive place.

games.name: Line Up!
games.description: Line Up! is a chaotic, couch multiplayer game where you take on the role of a caring Mama trying to guide your adorable, easily confused little babies lined up through the bustling world. Other critters are doing the same, and they won’t hesitate to defend their little ones with everything they’ve got!

games.name: Pripyat 0
games.description: Chernobyl has broken down. As radiation rains down upon you, the world starts rapidly mutating. You've gotten stuck in a nightmarish loop. Can you correctly spot the anomalies on time and get to safety? Or will you become one with the zone?

games.name: Quintillion Quest
games.description: A fantasy-themed run-based active incremental game

games.name: Maze Creep!!
games.description: A satire co-op horror game where players aim to reach the end of an infinite series of mazes, evading the all-hearing Maze Creep and various other threats.

games.name: Factory 95
games.description: Factory 95 is a retro Windows inspired puzzle-automation game about making a slide show factory… in a slide show! Manage your space, make increasingly complex slides and worry about Y2K in this minimalistic factory builder.

games.name: Suncraft
games.description: A cozy village crafting adventure where you gather resources, refine materials, and build to unlock new technologies across evolving zones in a charming pixel-art world.

games.name: Without a Hitch
games.description: Without a Hitch is a co-op delivery game where you collect and transport cargo across a chaotic and perilous landscape. Whether traveling solo or in a convoy of 2 to 4 players, the package must arrive before the sun sets, and THEY come for it. Can you make it Without a Hitch?

games.name: Bag of Dreams
games.description: Bag of dreams is the cozy card-based Roguelike Dreambuilder you didn't know you needed. Can you piece together the perfect sleep, one fragment at a time?

games.name: Paddlenoid
games.description: Paddlenoid is a fun brick breaker you can play solo or with a friend. There’s nothing out of the ordinary and absolutely no reason to suspect a deeper purpose. Just have a good time and remember to ignore the crystals!

games.name: D.A.D.S.
games.description: Use your special ops units to construct base facilities and towers to protect them from the ever-increasing threat of alien invaders in this Tower Defense game with a city-building element! Research their weaknesses and develop defenses before mankind runs out of time.

games.name: Highway Noir
games.description: You are an underground driver for hire, fired from the Major Crimes Agency. Rush through a busy city at night as you take on high speed getaways, dangerous street races, white knuckle pursuits and more. Don't stop until you reveal the truth about who wanted you gone

games.name: Rearranged
games.description: A phenomenon called The Rearranging shuffles the rooms in your house and traps you inside with a monster. You have to explore the shifting layout, gather the right items, and solve one big puzzle to survive. Use the map from your tablet to avoid the monster and survive.

games.name: Hangar 51: Classified Investigation
games.description: A first-person investigation and detective game. Explore a sealed 1980s bunker, solve puzzles, collect evidence, take photos, and piece together what really happened. Your final report determines the outcome. Follow the protocol. Question everything.

games.name: Collapse Zone
games.description: Survive the unstable Collapse Zones and crush your enemies! Loot, upgrade your character and abilities, and unleash your own unique brand of violent chaos! Find and enter the mutated Magic Zones—giant claw machines, colossal pinball tables, and more—to reap even greater rewards!

games.name: Glue Blocks
games.description: Glue your falling blocks to create your own shapes and achieve monster scores in wells of all shapes with dynamic gravity. Compete with friends or have funds in coop. And unleash your own creativity with the mode and well editor!

games.name: It's Fine
games.description: It’s Fine is an active incremental/upgrade clicker game about releasing v1.0 of your game on time.

games.name: Dino Party
games.description: a chaotic multiplayer brawler packed with silly physics, unpredictable minigames, and over-the-top dino action.

games.name: Orbital Overdrive
games.description: Orbital Overdrive is a high-octane roguelite twin-stick arena shooter where you are pitted against hordes of relentless enemies on an orbit of a planet. Choose from hundreds of different abilities and weapons to create the deadliest build and smash the resistance!

games.name: Silent Spirits
games.description: Operate a secret speakeasy in 1920s America during Prohibition. Craft illicit alcohol, serve demanding customers, avoid police raids, smuggle shipments to the mob, and expand your empire across 15 years of escalating danger, pressure, and underground opportunity.

games.name: Wireworks
games.description: Wireworks is a base-defense roguelike auto-battler where your defenses are built and controlled using a module board.

games.name: The Town of Nowhere: End Of The Line
games.description: This is the first downloadable entry in the Town of Nowhere series. This game was made with the intention of being playable and enjoyable regardless of if you know the back story of the larger surrealist horror series. Largely inspired by CGA DOS adventure games TTON:EotL is in full first person 3D.

games.name: Exone Rift
games.description: Take direct control of your hero on a hostile planet. Build your base, gather resources, expand your territory your way, and survive against the planet’s deadly wildlife.

games.name: A Game About Shooting Bullets At Bullets
games.description: A 3D incremental FPS game where you don’t move, only your bullets do. You’re stuck in space with nothing to do but shoot bullets...at bullets. Watch bullets bounce out of control, numbers explode, and a quiet room turn into pure chaos.

games.name: Shuwa Shuwa Guin!
games.description: Shuwa Shuwa Guin is a time management game set in a charming world of penguins, where you must wash, dry, and iron clothes to keep your grandfather's laundry business open! Use the money you earn to buy items that will make your job easier!

games.name: Voidbound
games.description: Voidbound is a mining adventure where you explore random caves, fight dangerous enemies, and upgrade your abilities. Can you find your way back home to the void?

games.name: Seeing Double
games.description: In this puzzle platformer, your screen is split down the middle. Control Pitter and Patter simultaneously as you jump, dash, and climb through two parallel realities in this atmospheric adventure on your quest to reunite them.

games.name: Witchling Grove
games.description: Witchling Grove is an action-rpg, arena-shooting roguelike.

games.name: Dig, Dig, Die
games.description: Online co-op horror for 1–6 players. Board a cursed flying ship, raid haunted graveyards for loot, and survive monsters that hear every sound. Beware of UFO abductions, grab boosters from vending machines, gamble in the onboard casino, and embrace pure chaos with friends in voice chat.

games.name: Gun X Gunner
games.description: Gun X Gunner is a free-to-play, round-based first-person-shooter where up to eight players face off in fast-paced free-for-alls. Choose new equipment, weapons, and powerful, game-altering augments between rounds in an ever-evolving competition. It’s time to get good, get lucky, and GUN X GUNNER.

games.name: Terrafactory: Idle Planet
games.description: A planet building idle game that sits anywhere on your desktop while you do other things.

games.name: RAM Downloader
games.description: Do you need more RAM? Of course you do. Everybody does. Get RAM Downloader and improve your quality of life. It's easy. You click Download. RAM increases. You live a happier life.

games.name: DeGen Rivals
games.description: The ultimate 8-player vehicle battle royale that transforms the arena into a demolition party. Smash, crash, and bash your friends in solo or team based physics-fueled chaos. Risk it all for the mid-match jackpot, survive the onslaught, and prove you're the top Rival.

games.name: Shape Swarm
games.description:
Shape Swarm is a top-down action arcade game where players survive increasingly dense waves of geometric enemies in fast, session-based matches. Players automatically attack while maneuvering through enemy patterns, collecting upgrades that modify weapon behavior, movement, and survivability.
The game features short, score-driven runs, escalating difficulty, and a variety of enemy shapes with distinct movement and attack patterns. Progression is contained within individual sessions, emphasizing positioning, build choices, and moment-to-moment decision-making.

games.name: Tanks: Total Destruction
games.description: TANKS Total Destruction is a tribute to a cult classic, reimagined for modern action gaming. A top-down view, movement limited to four directions, and intense, tactical gameplay come together with modern visuals, spectacular explosion effects, and smooth animations powered by Unreal Engine 5.

games.name: Agrivore
games.description: Agrivore is an incremental farming roguelike where you equip magical farming gear, harvest crops, unlock new equipment, and create hyper combos in your skill tree.

games.name: Mythic Love: Iberian Legends
games.description: Think you can handle a little romance with creatures from Spanish folklore? Careful: your love life isn’t the only thing at stake at Mythic Love: Iberian Legends.

games.name: Chop Chains
games.description: Chop Chains is a relaxing incremental game where you chop, gather, and upgrade to become the ultimate lumberjack through trees, axes, and skills.

games.name: Bluegrass
games.description:
A spatial audio ASMR-narrative rhythm life-sim. Laid off, Linda is seeking peace on the Appalachian Trail. Guide her pulse as she unveils her Granny’s old hand-drawn illustrations and makes new memories in this relaxing spatial audio journey to Mt. Katahdin.

Bluegrass is an experiential episodic interactive audio narrative through the soundscape of Appalachia. In a linear adventure to Mt. Katahdin, tune your ears into the relaxing audio cues. Allow yourself to be guided by Linda's inner Conscience as you keep the heart pace steady by regulating her breathwork. Influence Linda's behavior via feedback at critical moments in this interactive theatrical.

games.name: Gravity's Edge
games.description: Begin an epic space journey filled with strange worlds, engaging puzzles, and a dense Afro-punk theme. Another challenge also awaits you in 'Survival'. There you will face off against oncoming hordes while searching for the Ability Anvils. Are you ready to become a Kassler?

games.name: Alonitaire
games.description: Break the rules of solitaire in this atmospheric roguelike deckbuilder. Unleash forbidden sigils while the Jack of Spades begs for your help in secret. Forge game-breaking combos under the Joker’s watchful eye and uncover the truth behind the deck. Don’t investigate… just play.

games.name: Chance
games.description: The property-trading deckbuilder. Chance is strange, dusty board game where you steal land from the bourgeoisie, bankrupt the proletariat, break the rules with unfair chance cards, and discover strategies worthy of an antitrust lawsuit.

games.name: Seraphine's Skyward Journey
