games.description: This game is an adventure game where you explore a steampunk-inspired world with 2.5D hand-drawn graphics aboard an airship. Manage resources like coal, food, and water while operating your airship, defeat sky pirates, engage in trade, and handle cargo transport as you venture into uncharted skies.

games.name: Fortune Teller Simulator
games.description: Step behind the curtain of an occult salon on a Victorian street of London. Play as a Fortune-teller who decides fates with Tarot readings.

games.name: Fearwoods
games.description:
Fearwoods is a cooperative survival horror game for up to three players, set in a cursed and hostile forest environment. Players explore a dense wilderness filled with supernatural threats while searching for a way to escape.

The gameplay focuses on exploration, survival mechanics, and cooperative decision-making. Players must locate GPS fragments, journal entries, environmental clues, and other objects that help them navigate through the forest and progress toward escape. Light and noise play a critical role in gameplay, as visibility can improve navigation but also increases the risk of attracting hostile entities.

Throughout the game, players are pursued by a supernatural demon that reacts to movement, sound, and player behavior. Survival often requires stealth, teamwork, and resource management rather than direct combat. Environmental storytelling, puzzles, and dynamic encounters shape the experience as players move deeper into the forest.

The primary objective is to escape the forest by collecting GPS components and restoring navigation systems. While progressing, players can uncover the story of Aveline, whose disappearance is connected to the events within the forest. By discovering her journals and hidden clues, players may attempt to free her soul, which can influence the outcome of the game.

games.name: Ham: The Game
games.description: HAM is a chaotic co-op factory management game where you and your friends struggle to fulfill endless orders while everything falls apart around you. Work together to survive the corporate grind, or watch your careers go up in smoke when the HAM hits the fan.

games.name: CD-ROM
games.description: 10 CDs, 10 passwords. Find hidden messages, text, numbers to unlock next CD to continue your steganography puzzle journey.

games.name: Purrfect Ascent
games.description: A brutal ascent to the top to rescue your frightened kitty. Missed jumps might be punished severely. Do you have what it takes to overcome the challenge? Meow.

games.name: Content King
games.description: Streaming simulator roleplaying game featuring voices from Twitch streamers

games.name: Edge Of Dread
games.description: A simple job at the mayor’s mansion turns deadly. Plan an escape attempt through shifting puzzles and locked corridors. Collect tools, create distractions and hide from the relentless monster. Uncover the truth and find one of multiple exits before a mistake foils your plan.

games.name: Clicky Islands
games.description: Clicky Islands is a unique blend of incremental gameplay, clicker mechanics, city-builder elements, and resource management. You play as a governor appointed by the king to discover and develop a new island for his future kingdom.

games.name: Synergism
games.description: Synergism is a free-to-play Idle game about... well, Synergy! Explore that concept through hundreds of upgrades, many reset layers and probably thousands of hours of content that allows both idle and active play.

games.name: Pecado: SD Card
games.description: Pecado is a first-person folkloric horror experience set in the “España profunda”. Listen to the word of God.

games.name: Essentia: A Monster Catching Adventure
games.description: Isometric dungeon crawler with procedurally generated levels. A wide variety of cute monster characters to collect. A turn-based battle system with unique mana mechanic. Uncover the secrets of the calamity that has left this world in chaos.

games.name: The Brewline
games.description: The Brewline is an open world bootlegging simulation. Players build their own alcohol empire through production, trade, and NPC interactions while competing against rival gangs. Manage your resources and navigate a dangerous landscape to expand your illegal operations.

games.name: Legacy of Kain: Ascendance
games.description: Enter the dark world of Nosgoth – Ascendance is a fast paced, 2D action platformer built around fluid combat, vertical movement, vampiric powers, and skill-driven play.

games.name: Feed the Demon Incremental
games.description: Unleash carnage in this dark incremental clicker. Sacrifice humans to fuel your demonic evolution and explode your wealth.

games.name: Hyphae
games.description: A rogue like tower defense. How far will you stretch your network? And can you fend of ancient powers? Defend your core on this alien planet, and uncover all ancient artifacts!

games.name: Mystery at the Gas Station
games.description: You accepted a simple job: working the graveyard shift at a roadside gas station. Low traffic. Few deliveries. Strange rules. But nobody works here for very long.

games.name: Wrong Answer
games.description: A deadly quiz show where knowledge decides who gets shot. Answer correctly — you pull the trigger. Answer wrong — the gun is aimed at you.

games.name: Renascor
games.description: The spine of time has shattered. With your team of 1–4 experts, investigate divine anomalies, gather evidence, and seal reality itself. Following the lost teams, infiltrate history as Renascor’s final hope.

games.name: Billiard Rampage
games.description: Billiard Rampage is a Roguelike-like game in the form of snooker billiards, blending deck-building with physics simulation. You play as a billiard ball that refuses to be struck, rolling toward victory by building your deck, collecting stickers, and using chalk in ever-changing rules.

games.name: VacBot Simulator
games.description: Have you ever wondered what your robotic vacuum feels when it's wandering through your house? Picking up your messes, leaving your floors pristine again. Wonder no more! Experience the joys of cleaning various houses through the LIDARs of several judgemental robotic vacuums.

games.name: Alpha Ceti TD
games.description: Classic Tower Defense meets space exploration. Build turrets on mining platforms, harvest enemies to build more defenses, and mine Dark Energy to travel the stars. As a sentient AI, you must upgrade your tech, scan planets, and find a new home for humanity before Earth fades away.

games.name: Let Deco Desktop
games.description: A cute idle-crafting game nestled in the corner of your screen. Visit various regions to gather diverse materials and decorate your home with furniture you've crafted yourself!

games.name: Satan's Ball
games.description: Summon the sinful to Satan’s…no, to your Ball in Hell. In a social simulation where society gravitates towards chaos, you will manage, promote, and punish, all to discover the knowledge the Satan’s Bible holds. How many will you sacrifice before the chaos erupts?

games.name: Pound for Pound
games.description: A sports management simulation where you build an MMA promotion from the ground up by signing fighters, running events, and expanding your reach in a living competitive world.

games.name: Intergalactic Juice Bar
games.description: Slice fruits with a physics-based knife on a rope. Upgrade your factory to slice fruit into smaller pieces. Buy advanced slicing technology. Maximize profits and quench thirst across the universe!

games.name: Weapon Master
games.description: Dash! Combo! Strike into throw, throw into dodge, dodge into strike! WEAPON MASTER is an action game built around fast, fluid combo-driven combat. By combining main-hand weapons, off-hand weapons, equipment, and talents, you can create a combat style that is truly your own.

games.name: Bulgasari: Consume·Evolve·Survive
games.description: Amidst the ruins of a crashed starship, you inject the mysterious ampoule BGS-01 and awaken an insatiable hunger for steel. Devour steel to evolve, and trade with the Space Stagecoach to secure vital supplies. Slaughter the swarms of alien monsters hunting you down and survive!

games.name: Hell Storage
games.description: A first-person psychological horror game about an ex-con working nights at a self-storage facility, where an old mirror reveals the spirits stalking him.

games.name: Smart Lab
games.description: Smart Lab: Build your lab from the ground up, research new recipes, optimize production chains, and craft valuable products. Produce in batches, improve quality, and sell your results to keep expanding.

games.name: Hong Huang Evolution
games.description: A top-down lightweight Rogue-like survivor game where players take on the role of a beast capable of evolving multiple times to fend off hordes of enemies. Choose from various evolution paths, talents, and skills build, survive against all odds, and ultimately evolve into the ultimate life form.

games.name: Mono
games.description: 『Mono』 is a 2D action game set in a monochrome world. Explore the land to enhance your abilities, defeat the formidable foes standing in your way, and resolve the crisis befalling this black-and-white realm.

games.name: Retired
games.description: RETRO HYPER TIRE RACING! Cruise down hills through 5 different developer created worlds competing for the best track time, or race through a nearly infinite supply of User created levels through the steam workshop!

games.name: A Little Physics Roguelike
games.description: In A Little Physics Roguelike aim to grab the best equipment, then build your unique board with a variety of item to defeat cute enemies.

games.name: The Hopeless Few
games.description: Third-person survival roguelite shooter, where you've got 20 minutes before the infection takes over. Use that time to salvage valuable loot & secure the survival of others.

games.name: Odds at Oddity
games.description: Odds At Oddity is a blackjack based roguelike deck builder. Manage your power betting deck, create diverse combinations and scale your points as far as you can go!

games.name: Find Cats 6
games.description: Pixel World's Hide-and-Seek Cat Challenge! Eight magical realms hide cute fluffy kittens. Solve interactive puzzles, unlock hidden maps, use your wisdom to bring all the furry little rascals home, and enjoy a healing and stress-relieving cat-hunting experience.

games.name: Bartender Life Simulator
games.description: What is a bar owner to you? A manager? A bartender? An interior designer? A psychologist? And what if you had to take on all these roles? Interact with customers, manage supplies, craft cocktails, and redesign the interior to earn the title of the best bar.

games.name: Smart Farm
games.description: In Smart Farm you take over an abandoned farm bought at auction and rebuild it with hard work, smart planning and modern agriculture. Restore fields and buildings, care for animals, process your harvest and turn ruins into a profitable farm.

games.name: Point Zero: Victoria
games.description: A multi-perspective narrative game where near-death flashbacks unravel the truth. Return to 1990s Hong Kong and uncover four competing versions of the truth through combat and investigation. Spine-tingling twists! A bloodstained mystery spanning thirty years, waiting to be uncovered…

games.name: A Wild Heist
games.description: A Wild Heist is a game where you and up to 3 friends rob banks as raccoons to pay off a gambling debt to the mob. The game includes fully destructible environments, online multiplayer, procedurally generated maps and more...

games.name: Slay All Bosses: Idle
games.description: Slay All Bosses: Idle, is a short incremental RPG. Cut down waves of enemies, defeat powerful bosses, and rapidly grow stronger through character skill trees, weapon and skill upgrades, and equipped passive abilities, all on your path to becoming the ultimate hero.

games.name: Hotshots
games.description: HOTSHOTS — is a dynamic, 2D adventure where the price of error is the complete loss of progress. There is no place for saving here: every run is an intense, separate battle. Your only reward for victory is taking valuable weapons with you to start the next, even more dangerous run...

games.name: Just a Simple Turn-based RPG
games.description: A short and straightforward turn-based RPG where every action matters. Explore, cast spells through quirky enchantments, help the townsfolk, and hunt for treasure, without endless grinding or overcomplicated stories.

games.name: The Corner Cafe
games.description: The Corner Cafe is a cozy(ish) cafe simulator set in a retro futuristic mythical Ireland in the year 2160. Play as Dan, the new owner of The Corner Cafe, the last independent cafe in Galway City. It is up to you to create an oasis of community in this dystopia...

games.name: Vault Vandals
games.description: Chaotic local multiplayer roguelite for 2-4 players. Command robots through deadly dungeons - but don't control them directly. Issue AI directives, grab cursed treasures, steal from friends, and escape before the Wall of Doom rises.

games.name: Hero Link
games.description: Recruit heroes and build your formation! Harness the unique "Master-Follower Link" system to craft action sequences and coordinate targets, unleashing synergies where 1 + 1 >> 2. Every link is a tactical choice, every formation has its own unique growth path!

games.name: Petal by Petal
games.description: Petal by Petal is a relaxing incremental gardening game where mindful movements are rewarded. Water seeds, grow flowers, sell your harvest, and unlock permanent upgrades across a sprawling skill tree.

games.name: Football Survivors
games.description: THE FOOTBALL WAR HAS STARTED! Thousands of raging fans are storming the field. Defend against the fan invasion! 50+ unique heroes and abilities, 50+ upgrade items, position your heroes strategically, crush the waves of fans!

games.name: Capsulitas
games.description: A physics-based gacha meets inventory management roguelike. Insert a coin, organize your backpack, and sell for profit! Multiply items with hammers, upgrade your machine, and survive the inflation.

games.name: Viral Hunters
games.description: You are trapped in the same facility, aiming to find a way out through the scattered "Vaccine Injectors". The game's core revolves around the crucial vaccines.

games.name: Blackjack Roulette
games.description: Blackjack meets roulette in a deadly duel. Lose a hand, pull the trigger. Use powerful cards to outsmart opponents in 1v1 battles, or defeat the Clown to escape. Win or die.

games.name: Hilarious Delivery
games.description: Take orders, fire up the stoves! Hilarious Delivery is a single-player and co-op restaurant sim where you run a frantic takeout shop against the clock. Cook dishes, then pull off the perfect handoff to your delivery rider.

games.name: Gift Drop Machine: Life Simulator
games.description: Survive with surprise gifts dropping from the machine! Sell or use them. Maintain the balance between hunger and energy, manage your bank, grow with your credit card, and buy homes and cars. Every choice changes your fate. Survive the roguelike challenge by combining luck and strategy.

games.name: Goob Wants an Android Girlfriend
games.description: A cute puzzle game about fixing up android girls! Grow your collection of girlfriends and prove your wits by solving clever yet intuitive puzzles!

games.name: Cosmic Rays
games.description: Jump and shoot in this 2D platformer to destroy the hivemind controlling the aliens that are attacking Earth. Hopefully nothing goes wrong on this mission...

games.name: WonderLang English
games.description: Learn English through immersive quests, interactive dialogues, and spaced repetition combat challenges. Help a young hero lift a magical curse by mastering English. Customize your learning experience and explore a vibrant world filled with unique characters. Start your journey in English today!

games.name: Legend of Asha
games.description: Enter the Kingdom of Ngoma in the Legend of Asha, a Top-Down adventure set in a unique and vibrant Afro-Fantasy setting. Explore unique and beautiful landscapes, use and upgrade powerful elemental abilities, fight off enemies and defeat Thonarka the Ravager to restore balance to the land.

games.name: Pachincro
games.description: An action-packed pachinko–plinko incremental game with a massive skill tree and tons of upgrades. Drop balls, stack multipliers, unlock new abilities, watch the chaos scale into pure satisfaction, all while trying to defeat the boss and staying alive

games.name: Asterobits
games.description: You've escaped from the galaxy's most secure space prison, and now there's a bunch of angry lawless chasing you. You must survive, fight for your freedom, and outrun these grumpy pursuers. Asterobits delivers a relentless (and slightly absurd) escape in an arcade-style roguelike space shooter.

games.name: Mask of Soul
games.description: Mask of Soul is a 2D Metroidvania action-adventure where you play as Cheong-O Chasa, the underworld’s gatekeeper, hunting spirits released under the Red Moon. Master precise parry combat, switch between spirit masks, and explore a dark fantasy world inspired by Korean mythology.

games.name: Bang Pass Duel
games.description: Pass the bomb. Unleash terror. Bang Pass Duel — a 2-player deathmatch where countdowns turn arenas into explosive rings. Hunter or hunted? Only those who master explosive art, push limits, and trust survival instinct become Bomb Master.

games.name: In Trusted Hands
games.description: Dive into the daily work of a cozy workshop in a big city, accompanied by relaxing atmospheric music. Manage client data, balance energy and stress, and make choices that shape the story and its outcome.

games.name: Freaking Hallway
games.description: Freaking Hallway is a single-player horror game about finding anomalies Play as Tayo, a talkative government agent exploring a looping containment hallway.Interact with every object through physics-based mechanics watch for anything unusual and survive the hidden dangers before the hallway traps you

games.name: Break Shoot
games.description: Break Shoot blends the precision of billiards with roguelike builds. Combine unique ball abilities and a variety of accessories to unleash explosive scores and push past each round’s target!

games.name: The Dame
games.description: A first-person psychological horror where a harmless camp ritual awakens The Dame: a presence bound to mirrors and silence. Break the mirrors before she reaches you.

games.name: Peace Dice
games.description: The post-apocalypse. When some are trying to survive in a new world, others join the detective agency "Peace Dice", which searches for evidence of mutants. Go on a raid and don't come back empty-handed!

games.name: Oh Puck!
games.description: Compete in the first ever curling party game! Slide, punch, and sabotage your friends in chaotic matches filled with special items. Outplay, outsmart, and out-slide your rivals in the ultimate frozen showdown!

games.name: Daemon: The Wolf, the Witch, and the Labyrinth
games.description: Daemon is a third-person action RPG where you explore a shifting spirit realm as a cursed wolf—then instantly transform into a werewolf for ferocious, skill-based combat against corrupted guardians.

games.name: Warboss
games.description: Choose your units, place them where it counts and build an army that wins. Deploy heroes with powerful skills to support your units and swing the battle your way. Unite the clans and take the fight to the Dubdals. Warboss is a casual and goofy battle simulator.

games.name: Particulitix
games.description: Pure 2D chaos made of particles. Fight relentless waves, exploit key positioning, do a clever build, and unlock permanent upgrades. ℙarticuliti𝕏 is a survivor action roguelite from a parallel timeline where 2D arcade games never stopped evolving.

games.name: Corner Clash
games.description: Idle auto‑battle game running quietly in your screen’s corner. Upgrade, unlock weapons, and face endless waves of stronger enemies.

games.name: WishPot
games.description: Korean folklore comes to life in a strategic board game where you chase your wishes! Combine number-and-ability cards to battle, upgrade your deck, and claim territory. Every match feels fresh—and tense—thanks to missions, talismans, sponsorships, and the Read system!

games.name: Nights of Nil
games.description: Control your villagers one by one in this action-RTS survival game. Build, defend, and survive night after night across procedural islands. Assign tasks, fight off waves, and settle each island to win the run.

games.name: Fearmates
games.description: Fearmates is a 1–4 player co-op psychological horror game. As a group of friends, you explore locations with paranormal activity and uncover the truth behind the events using your own equipment.

games.name: Sunsave
games.description: Sunsave is a relaxing incremental game with a vaporwave and minimalist vibe. Destroy meteors, collect resources, and evolve the Sun with upgrades that unlock new mechanics!

games.name: Pal Pachinko
games.description: Your job is boring. Pal Pachinko isn't. Park this idle game in the corner of your screen and watch your balls drop along with your productivity. It's the most efficient way to waste your time. Why focus on one thing when you can fail at two? It's small enough that your boss won't notice (probably).

games.name: Fantasy Wars: Endless Heroes
games.description: Fantasy Wars: Endless Heroes is a turn-based tactical strategy game. You lead a team of mercenaries from different races, each with unique skills. Explore a randomly generated fantasy world, recruit defeated enemies, capture pets, challenge demon lords, or conquer the world step by step.

games.name: Jargon
games.description: A word-puzzle roguelite where classic word games meet wild, rule-breaking builds.

games.name: Gardener Simulator
games.description: Start your own gardening business. Mow lawns, Trim hedges, blow leaves. Upgrade tools and become the ultimate gardener.

games.name: Pharmacy 24
games.description: Pharmacy 24 is a horror simulator game where you take on the role of a pharmacist, serving customers and taking care of the Pharmacy... Who knows, maybe one day it will accept you.

games.name: Farmch Revolution
games.description: A piglet kidnapped by a vile butcher. Dive into a gory field of vengeance, rescue the piglet, and bring it home!

games.name: Shell Increment
games.description: An active incremental were You Command your Skeleton Pirate crew. Destroy and Loot ships of their precious shells, Buy and Upgrade cannons. Unlock new abilities and Face Powerful Admirals and become the Richest Pirate there is.

games.name: SCP: The Beginning
games.description: A first-person survival horror game set inside a collapsing containment facility. Explore restricted sectors, read unreliable reports, and survive hostile entities where following procedures can be just as deadly as breaking them.

games.name: Oceanside Whispers
games.description: In Oceanside Whispers, the ocean is your canvas. Build and decorate spaces above or beneath the waves. Arrange rooms, add light, furniture, and cozy details to create calm retreats.

games.name: Gal Vs Village
games.description: GAL VS VILLAGE is an GAL like old-school FPS. You play as Kessenji “Blood-sucker” Yui, infiltrate the village, and must bring the situation under control. Move at high speed, swing your knife, blast away with the shotgun, and drive away the supernatural!!!!!!

games.name: Star Apoligce: Survivors
games.description: Deep in the vast galaxy, you are the last survivor. Waves of enemies keep coming, and the universe is filled with unknown dangers. Your only mission is to survive within the limited time. Pilot your spaceship to fight, gather resources, and upgrade your weapons and abilities.

games.name: Cat Adoption Tales
games.description: Foster and care for adorable hand drawn cats in this cozy 2D sim set to original Lo-Fi music.

games.name: Panic Protocol
games.description: A 1-4 player co-op horror game, where you guide your friends through a dangerous research facility. Use the CCTV system to observe enemies, set traps and interact with the environment. Extract with the research materials before time runs out.

games.name: Matchmaker Simulator
games.description: Matchmaker Simulator is a narrative game about modern matchmaking. You register clients and pair them, witnessing how romance becomes a transaction. Will this search for optimal genes lead to self-destruction?

games.name: Streetlight Syndicate
games.description: A casual, story-driven incremental game set in 1920s New York. Build your criminal empire from speakeasies to protection rackets, fight rival hitmen, meet colorful characters, and become the city's most powerful crime lord.

games.name: Scale2fit
games.description: A simple puzzle game about scaling blocks to fit them together.

games.name: The Hilarious Three Kingdoms 2
games.description: This is a traditional turn-based strategy game set in the era of the Three Kingdoms.Control different feudal lords, step onto the historical battlefield, experience the funny plot, strategize and unite the world!

games.name: EpiDexa Racing
games.description: EpiDexa Racing is an arcade racing game focused on time trials and online multiplayer. Play with keyboard or controller, climb the leaderboards, and prove your skills against friends or players from around the world.

games.name: Chicks in Trouble
games.description: A peaceful farm is thrown into chaos when a mother hen's chicks mysteriously vanish! Team up with the brave father rooster and embark on a quirky, obstacle-filled adventure to bring them home. Grab your mouse or gamepad—it's time to save the flock!

games.name: Colornova
games.description: A color matching space shooter about saving your home planet from total destruction!

games.name: Eternal Dreams: Poker RPG
games.description: A Rogue AI and alien virus have trapped humanity in a dream-sim. - Craft Poker combos in this Roguelite JRPG; build and BREAK your deck to shatter the illusion. In this Deckbuilder, every hand doesn’t just change fate, it rewrites reality.

games.name: Nyanjet
games.description: "nyanjet" is a precision platformer where the only way is up. Be cautious, be bold, and never fear the fall. Master the simple yet challenging controls of a cat-piloted jetpack.

games.name: Rosepine Hotel
games.description: I thought that hand was pulling me out of a nightmare and back into reality. Soon, I’ll realize—it only dragged me into another nightmare: “Rosepine Hotel”

games.name: Exercise Your Demons
games.description: Step into the world of Exercise your Demons, a 2d narrative adventure inspired by Irish fairies and folklore. Meet and befriend 5 locals while you work towards settling into the small fictional town called Inishsióg in County Galway, Ireland.

games.name: Trailmarks
games.description: Inspired by Carmen Sandiego, Trailmarks is a globe-spanning strategy adventure where you circumnavigate the planet as a travel guide fact-checker. Plan routes across 1,200 cities, answer 120,000+ trivia questions, trade souvenirs, and prove your expertise to unlock new countries.

games.name: Beltlife: Prospector
games.description: Beltlife: Prospector is a GUI-based "hard" sci-fi business/work sim with economy simulation and RPG elements. Your focus is on maintaining your ship's systems and your health while prospecting for asteroid claims to auction on simulated markets.

games.name: Hyper Euphoria
games.description: The command-selection adventure game that flourished back when PCs were still called microcomputers makes a comeback. Can you withstand the nonstop MAX 264km/h action that comes at you wave after wave!?

games.name: Dealmaster
games.description: DealMaster is a board game where every property is won through auctions. Time your action cards, invest smartly in stocks, build or destroy houses, and strike trades. Master it all across 6 unique roles to outwit your rivals.

games.name: Give Me Back!
games.description: 《Give Me Back!》 is a barrage avoidance adventure game. It will take you into a fantasy world. During the adventure, you only need to avoid snowflakes, cross the waves, and overcome many difficulties to survive until the end. Here, reaction speed and calm judgment are the only rules of survival!

games.name: Hamstory
games.description: is a 2D pixel platformer with heartfelt emotion and thrilling challenge. Time your jumps to leap forward—falling is okay. Find your route through the paths ahead. Journey to Haessi Star with warm encouragement from animal townsfolk, experiencing a world that transforms with every season.

games.name: Legends of Wasteland
games.description: Legends of Wastelands is an idle RPG where you shape your hero's growth. Choose among six classes, master 100+ skills, and combine talents and gems for unique synergies. Idle for rewards or dive into boss fights and shifting wastelands, with pets and gear adding endless build variety.

games.name: Experiment 404
games.description: Room 404 repeats. Identify anomalies, file reports, and stay alive—some anomalies might hurt you. Nurture the plants, listen to the overlord, end the loop, and unlock multiple unique endings.

games.name: Shadows of War 2
games.description: Command one of four armies in Shadows of War II, a side-scrolling RTS with destructible terrain, procedural maps, and four tug-of-war modes. Build armies, call in strikes, and outwit foes in tense 1v1 multiplayer battles.

games.name: Politiks
games.description: Political Roguelite Deck-builder with a twist. A card game where your worst build might actually work.

games.name: Clay Puzzle
games.description: "Clay Puzzle" is a falling-block puzzle game where you target and break apart falling blocks! As the blocks fall, aim and shoot away the unwanted parts to shape them into a better form! Get ready for a falling block puzzle game that puts your aim and judgment to the test!

games.name: Walto
games.description: WALTO is a boss-rush game set in the land of rabbits, built around a combat philosophy where evasion and attack happen as one, demanding extreme reflexes. Cut down the encroaching predators and bring this world to its end.

games.name: Rite or Ruin
games.description: Summon eldritch gods and outwit rival cultists in this online multiplayer game of deception. Shape the Rite, make dangerous bets, and unleash your Patron's wrath. Only one cultist leaves alive.

games.name: Celestial Drift
games.description: Celestial Drift is a space-action sandbox game. Play solo or online. Shoot down various enemies to obtain rare and valuable materials. Sell what you find to buy better equipment and ships. Explore sectors to discover hidden paths, and dare to roam places you shouldn't visit.

games.name: Electio
games.description: Five live rounds, a blank, and a choice. Electio is a short narrative horror game where death carries permanent consequences.

games.name: Remote Life Simulator
games.description: Work remotely, build skills, earn money, and upgrade your life. Become a professional remote worker in this life simulation game!

games.name: House Cleaner Simulator
games.description: Build your own cleaning empire! Unlock tools, take on bigger jobs, and clean your way to fame and fortune in this unique cleaning simulator.

games.name: Axonaut
games.description: In the final stage of the interstellar war, the Alliance established the secret organization AXONAUT, primarily responsible for handling anomalous zones across post-war regions. As a member, unleash the power of the Alliance to your heart's content.

games.name: Spori
games.description: Spori is a short story-driven psychological horror game, where you play as a janitor in the early 2000s.

games.name: Discarded
games.description: Discarded is action rougelike, arena shooter where you face waves of relentless enemies. You’re alone and outgunned - move fast, shoot faster, dodge the bullets and upgrade on the fly. Keep up with the pressure or get shredded like the rest.

games.name: DeskAlchemy: Fairy Mine Tales
games.description: "DeskAlchemy: Xiao Ke's Journey" is an idle to light storyline role-playing game. A young man from a small town encounters a talking mole named Xiao Ke, and embarks on a journey to dig for minerals and treasure across the country.

games.name: Hyperquiz
games.description: Fast-paced, high quality, challenging trivia. Play your friends or compete against the world.

games.name: Good Things Vol 1
games.description: Good Things Vol 1 is a collection of 15 wildly imaginative, weird little games ranging from evolving platformers to genre-bending adventure... but the Blue Elephant ate all the games, and if you do not help him he will DIE :(

games.name: Ultimate Control Machine
games.description: A platformer like no other… play with 30 unique controllers! Every stage changes the controls. Master your mouse, your keyboard, and your reflexes in the ultimate test to become the world’s greatest robot pilot!

games.name: Anvira: Forge Defense
games.description: Defend Anvilium from endless waves of goblins and monsters! A tower defense roguelite where you deploy mighty golems, unleash powerful spells, and craft crazy builds through deep customization. Adapt your strategy, grow stronger, and see how long you can survive against ever-escalating threats.

games.name: Playover
games.description: PLAYOVER is a first-person psychological horror game set in an underground drilling facility. You are sent to investigate missing workers and continue the operation

games.name: Myth Requiem
games.description: Myth Requiem is a mythology RPG with idle and auto-battle mechanics. Lead legendary heroes like Ulysses and Sun Wukong, explore ancient realms, and build a living bestiary by capturing, battling, and cataloging hundreds of legendary creatures in a story-driven quest for divine power.

games.name: Give Me a Weapon!
games.description: An auto-battler roguelike where you craft weapons by combining materials. Test your luck in the auto-battler style random shop. Build a stronger army with Artifacts, Heroes, and shop editing. Last blacksmith of this world, it's time to become a legend!

games.name: Dice Roller Incremental
games.description: Roll your dice, upgrade them, buy more dice! Dice Roller Incremental is a game where each dice roll earns you money, which you then spend on improving your dice rolls.

games.name: Rocky Idle
games.description: Rocky Idle is a single-player idle/incremental game. Level up your skills, gather resources, and craft powerful combat gear to defeat the strongest bosses and complete your collection log.

games.name: Cloudside Lane
games.description: Cloudside Lane is a small casual building game. Immerse yourself in a tranquil and comfortable environment, build houses and create your own cozy streetscape. There are no scores or rules here, just follow your heart to create and feel.

games.name: Siro
games.description: SIRO — As children, our dreams are pure and burning, yet fragile. Growing up brings compromise, and with each one, those dreams fade a little. As ordinary people, we are inevitably drawn into the fray.

games.name: Divineblaze: March Tactics
games.description: Divineblaze : March Tactics is a roguelite tactical RPG. Assemble your expedition, battle unique foes, and forge your ultimate squad. Customize tactics with gear and skills to crush nefarious leaders.

games.name: Soul Balance
games.description: Soul Balance is a 2D fantasy combat game that blends cuteness with distortion. Players will control different characters, enter the body of a bionic human that has awakened self-consciousness, and battle its thoughts—all to "correct" it into a normal individual.

games.name: Island of Ruin
games.description: "Island of Ruin" is a puzzle novel game where you collect memory cores hidden across the island and uncover the truth behind a tragedy of the past. When the horrors that befell the boys and girls and the island’s strange phenomena are revealed, what final choice will you make?

games.name: Dungeon Directive
games.description: You’ve taken over the guild hall in the center of town near a mysterious dungeon portal. With a small roster of heroes and limited resources, it’s your job to rebuild the guild, send parties into the depths, and shape a legacy that lasts for generations. What future will your choices create?

games.name: Cookie Flipper
games.description: A casual, nostalgic puzzle game with a delicious twist! Has 72 preset levels, and near infinite custom levels. Tired of Match 3, and want a change? Try Cookie Flipper, wish list it today!

games.name: Swarm Survivor: Endless Siege
games.description: Swarm Survivors: Endless Siege is a light roguelike bullet-hell idle shooter. You play as the last survivor of the Swarm, fighting to stay alive under the endless siege of alien fleets. Build overwhelming power and face wave after wave of relentless challenges.

games.name: Who the Fuck Ate Grandma?
games.description: Time has come to celebrate Grandma's 93rd birthday. Everyone gathered for this memorable family dinner, unfortunately it seems that Grandma is going to be served for dessert ! Inspired by the 90s, discover a new retro point&click adventure game fully drawn in pixelart

games.name: Fishbowl
games.description: Fishbowl is a slice of life, coming of age story told over a month. Video call loved ones, work from home, sort through puzzles to rediscover childhood memories, do care tasks and get to know yourself better, one day at a time.

games.name: Neverending Check-in: The Hotel Stories
games.description: Immerse yourself in The Neverending Check-In: The Hotel Stories, a pixel RPG filled with mystery, quests, cats, humor and life universe. Rebuild a once-glorious hotel and uncover its secret past in this captivating journey of deep plots, lively characters, and abundant quests.

games.name: Repterra
games.description: Repterra is a base-building survival game set in a world overrun by dinosaurs. Fend off massive hordes while building your colony. Manage resources and grow your army to survive in this dino-infested land.

games.name: Inkonbini
games.description: inKONBINI: One Store. Many Stories is a slice-of-life narrative-driven simulation game centered around a small-town convenience store in the early 1990s. Shelve goods, engage in meaningful conversations with your customers, and explore the ways you can impact their lives with your decisions.

games.name: Yunyun Syndrome!?: Rhythm Psychosis
games.description: “Yunyun Syndrome!? Rhythm Psychosis” is a rhythm adventure game about a psychotic hikikomori girl - also an avid anonymous poster - who corrupts the world with her severe brain rot from listening to too many denpa songs. Yunyun all over this world with your degen otaku-posting.

games.name: The Weeping Swan: Ten Days of the City's Fall
games.description: At nightfall, the sieged city falls. Yaoguai came to massacre. You are nothing but a scholar on the brink of madness, trying to survive alongside a courtesan you met years ago. Experience two intertwined storylines in this sequel to the visual novel "The Hungry Lamb".

games.name: Rocket Penguin
games.description: Rocket Penguin is a unique 2D flying game that may seem simple but requires master-level skills to reach outer space.

games.name: In a World After People
games.description: A robot awakens alone in a desolate world where humanity has vanished due to a plague. In this side-scrolling pixel art adventure, the robot, having lost its memory, retraces its past interactions with humans to rediscover the meaning of "love."

games.name: Rakka: Wake 01 - Soot
games.description: A visual novel paired with point-and-click elements, Rakka distinguishes itself with its breadth of hand-drawn assets, detailed backgrounds, charming character art, and unique paper-cut style. Complimented by the art is the incredible original soundtrack; spearheaded by the minds behind The PMT, it oozes indie charm. Both serve in tandem, dragging the player into the character and dialogue driven world of Rakka. Think you can make it to its thrilling conclusion?

games.name: Dancing Wings: The Aerobatic Simulator
games.description: Team aerobatics flight simulator - do it solo. Fly, save the replay, fly in overlay mode, save the new replay, and repeat it up to six aircrafts. Realistic aerodynamics and landscape. Step-by-step training. Share your replay online.

games.name: Dwarven Village: Dark Siege Td
games.description: Dwarven Village Dark Siege is a game that you need to defend your crystals from orcs and goblins, Place Allies on paths, Place towers to the sides and make upgrades in the village

games.name: Blitzpoint
games.description: A minimalist modern military strategy tower defense game where you build and defend a forward operating base. Strategically place defenses, manage resources, and repel relentless waves of enemies. Build by day, defend by night, and command your forces in fast-paced, action-packed gameplay.

games.name: Above the Snow
games.description: Join the shelter crew, and let’s create the best Alpine resort around! Enjoy rich character stories, customize your shelter, attract and rescue alpinists, dive into hotel management, and map out trails! Grab your map, zip up your jacket, fill your thermos, and brace for the worst winter of the ’60s!

games.name: Eona
games.description: Dive into Eona’s dark and strange tale. Survive the castle’s dangers—and Mélusine, the evil fairy who rules over it—for she has waited so long for a soul to torment. Escape this cursed place with your loot, hoping to save your mother.

games.name: The Last Transmission
games.description: The Last Transmission is a short, first-person psychological horror game built around isolation, atmosphere, and slow, creeping dread.

games.name: Core Hustlers
games.description: Core Hustlers is a single-player sci-fi extraction shooter where every run is unique. Infiltrate derelict stations, hack data cores, outthink ruthless AI, and survive shifting, deadly environments.

games.name: Night Shift Customer
games.description: A night shift at a minimarket turns into a nightmare. Serve customers, tidy the store, and watch for oddities - one of them isn’t human anymore.

games.name: Monitor State
games.description: You are an operator in a dystopia world, watch and punish citizens. Experience a deep narrative with moral dilemmas. Obey, resist or find another path.

games.name: Ship v Maze
games.description: Fly. Crash. Repeat. Avoid the obstacles for as long as possible, then try to do better.

games.name: Animal Bakery
games.description: Manage a cozy subway bakery in an underground animal city - run by a "retired" gangster you're secretly investigating. Serve cute locals, expand the bakery, prepare for festivals, meet strange visitors and explore the subway after hours for fun stories and special rewards!

games.name: An Eggstremely Hard Game
games.description: Two geese. One fragile egg. Infinite chaos. Work together to carry it through unpredictable challenges without breaking it, every crack makes it harder, every mistake more hilarious. A co-op physics game about teamwork, clumsiness, and the unstoppable power of honking.

games.name: Cochonnet
games.description: Play Pétanque online with your friends, the traditional french ball-throwing sport where 2 teams compete to land their metal balls closest to the target.

games.name: Convenience Store Simulator
games.description: A game about running and managing your own convenience store. Actively work the register, master stock and inventory, make and sell coffee, hire unique staff, and fully decorate your space. Strategically expand your business and play special mini-games for prizes.

games.name: Waddle Words
games.description: Waddle, spell, and honk your way to victory in this chaotic word game for 1–4 players!

games.name: King's Downfall
games.description: Defy the tyrant. Build your settlement, defend it from invasions, and gain enough power to overthrow the king.

games.name: Go! Go! Mister Chickums
games.description: GO! GO! MISTER CHICKUMS is a fun, classic single-screen platformer, inspired by arcade hits of the 80s. The game can be played either in single player mode, or in local couch co-op with 2 players simultaneously.

games.name: Penniless Chef
games.description: "Penniless Chef" is a game where you run and grow your own restaurant. Run and grow your restaurant, and get to know the villagers!

games.name: Just One More Link
games.description: A dark arcade incremental roguelite. Invest ZEK to buy time, chain crystals for exponential value, and cash out before collapse. Welcome to Blagine Corp. No refunds.

games.name: Boba Buba
games.description: BobaBuba Is the Boba Bubble-Pop Puzzle Adventure with story mode featuring cute beverages and an endless mode for huge replay value. With global leaderboards from launch!

games.name: Timber Fever
games.description: Cut down an infinitely tall Tree and defeat its Protectors. Timber Fever is an action, incremental, roguelike where you create chaos by cutting down the Tree of Life using wacky tools.

games.name: Keine's Expanding Class!
games.description: Solve and guess words one letter at a time in a brain-teasing, customizable Hangman-style challenge with Keine Kamishirasawa! Test your knowledge of English words or Touhou characters, locations and music to expand your mind! Wait... something else is expanding too!?

games.name: Cult Nation
games.description: An incremental game about sacrificing all your cult followers and collecting blood to awaken the devil.

games.name: Skatr
games.description: SKATR is an inline skating game where you skate fast and do cool tricks. Do advanced tricks for more points and maintain max speed! It's also just fun 2 skate around.

games.name: Glass Cannon Defense
games.description: A short incremental game where you defeat incoming enemies and make a glass cannon increasingly powerful.

games.name: Unknown Entity
games.description: Step into the shoes of Unknown Entity, a strange being with no form or memories, who will fight trapped bosses in the hope of discovering where it is, who it is, and why it seems to be watched at all times, in this Free To Play game.

games.name: Choiceline Brawl
games.description: Turn-based card game with fast runs: Choose one of many heroes with unique passive abilities, build your deck from 10 abilities, and face tactically selected opponents. Fight, unlock cards, and dominate short battles.

games.name: Escape Her
games.description: I'm a high school student who borrowed money from my senpai. We agreed I'd pay her back in the clubroom this afternoon, but I was late due to an unexpected situation. Now, a furious senpai is hunting me down to give me a serious beating. I must find a way to escape this building — fast!

games.name: 4Below
games.description: A co-op extraction roguelike with active ragdoll chaos. Descend into ancient underground ruins, recover priceless relics, survive the unknown, and escape with enough to meet the quota—together.

games.name: Matchward
games.description: Tower defense empowered by match 3 puzzle strategy. Level up and unlock potentially game-breaking upgrades. Design your own levels and share them.

games.name: Homgard
games.description: Homgard is a cosy, story-heavy nonogram (picross) adventure set after the end of a fading world. Solve logic puzzles with new nonogram rules, reveal the map beneath, and piece together a vast, whimsical place that refuses to be forgotten.

games.name: Misty Land
games.description: Develop and expand your town as you fend off eerie creatures from the mist. Choose from a variety of buildings and strategies, make tactical decisions, join defensive battles personally, protect your town and fulfill your ultimate goals.

games.name: Messy Recipe: A Hidden Object Game
games.description: Time to get cooking in a chaotic kitchen! Search for the ingredients you want, customize the recipe, then mix things together and hope for the best. Make friends with the shy ghost who hides your ingredients every night, and cook through family recipes in this cozy hidden objects game.

games.name: Crimson Realms: Relics of the Forgotten World
games.description: Embark on a colorful adventure in Crimson Realms! Battle creatures with four unique attack styles, defeat powerful demons to claim relics, overcome perilous obstacles, and complete epic missions in a world filled with danger and wonder.

games.name: Dilemma
games.description: You don't cure patients; you decide their fate. In this grim medical sim, review records and face impossible bioethical dilemmas. Consult the Medical Bible and choose who gets the bed. Every signature impacts your Ethics, Reputation, and Legal Risk. In a broken system, mercy is a dangerous luxury.

games.name: Keep It Contained
games.description: You’re part of a scientific team in a sealed facility, racing against time to keep dangerous anomalies contained. One scientist handles the modules, while others guide them using manuals and procedures. This local co-op experience requires two or more players.

games.name: GTJ: Grand Theft Japan
games.description: Grand Theft Japan is a tribute to GTA and Yakuza, set in Japan. Featuring stories inspired by real events: soaring rice prices, roaming bears, yakuza clans, otaku culture, and shocking political incidents.

games.name: Smol Toad
games.description: A tiny toad with a big personality lives on your desktop while you work or play. Interact with him, take care of his happiness, avoid overwhelming him, and collect points to unlock hats and unique styles for your little amphibian companion.

games.name: Doodle Wipeout
games.description: Doodle Wipeout is an action rougelite - survive waves of chaotic doodles by erasing them. Dodge, upgrade, and clean the canvas before it’s overrun.

games.name: Orso
games.description: Orso the rabbit is looking for carrots and needs your help! Guide Orso through an isometric landscape, using perspective to solve tricky puzzles and collect carrots.

games.name: Godfinger
games.description: "I know you've played hundreds of rogule-lite deck builder. This one is different. As a mortal with 7 years left to live, bet your life against gods in Godfinger Tavern and become immortal. This is your only chance! Play your hand smart." -- Dionysus, the bartender.

games.name: You All Know! Arm Tank Volley
games.description: The legendary “You All Know! Arm Tank Volley” is back! Just drop the ball in the opponent’s court—yet it’s deep and addictive. Punch the net for a rocket jump, stand on it, and laugh at physics miracles. Looks dumb, plays god-tier. Can you resist?

games.name: Dreamstranded
games.description:
Dive into a survival adventure with a cozy atmosphere! Enjoy gathering, crafting, and building — but beware, monsters lurk in the shadows, ready to challenge you!

At the beginning of the story, you awaken in a mysterious world with your memories lost, and the journey unfolds from there.

First, you must learn to survive — gathering resources, crafting items, and building a camp. You can choose to survive alone or recruit villagers to establish a thriving tribe.

As you explore the wilderness, you will encounter various monsters. Arm yourself with crafted gear, master magic, and defeat them!

Embark on a vast journey, follow clues, and unravel the mystery of why you drifted here. Or, you can simply relax and enjoy the pastoral life. The choice is entirely yours!

games.name: Kiosk 199X
games.description: Run a tiny 90s kiosk in a chaotic Eastern country - Kolkhozland. Serve quirky customers, survive inspections, pick a side in a local power struggle, and uncover a hidden conspiracy - all in a story-driven retro management sim full of humor and choices.

games.name: Watt's the Limit?
games.description: Click, upgrade, explode, and repeat. This is your job in an absurd incremental simulation where you stress test lightbulbs. Pull levers and push buttons to find their breaking point, then use profits to buy powerful upgrades, unlock new machinery, and automate the glorious chaos.

games.name: Fairy Tale TD:Hero
games.description: This is a 3D pigeon tower defense game that utilizes resources to build turrets and collaborates with heroes to block enemy attacks.

games.name: Microwave Simulator
games.description: An absurd sandbox where you put random objects in a oven and see what happens. Heat, melt, explode, or discover the unexpected.

games.name: Slorbis: Tower Defense
games.description: Immerse yourself in the cozy, minimalist world of Slorbis: Tower Defense. Build towers with unique roles, buy modifiers of varying rarities, collect money, and face the unpredictability of procedurally generated maps as you defend the king from dark spirits.

games.name: Asteroid Patrol
games.description: Bang bang! Shoot raining asteroids, dodge attacks of flying insects and battle against huge weird monsters! Gain exp, level up, pick perk and then rinse & repeat. Story? Nobody cares. If you are looking for a difficult and punishing game, don't leave without playing this one.

games.name: Lifecycles of the Traveler Spider
games.description: The Traveler Spiders are a species unique to their galaxy. A galaxy that is regularly destroyed and rebuilt by the galactic seasons. Ranging from tiny specs to star sized colossi, all the spiders must do their part to restore the natural balance and survive another season.

games.name: Slime Buddy Time
games.description: Take care of your slime pet in a cozy world! Play minigames, level up, unlock cute items, and customize your buddy and its home. Keep up to 3 fluffy companions while you work or study. Relax, decorate, and enjoy adorable company—you won’t feel alone anymore.

games.name: Capyvarias
games.description: Help Capyshan and Capymay rebuild the Capyvarias empire. Everything is gone. Only these two brave capybaras remain, determined to raise their community from the ashes. Can you click your way to survival, growth, and a future among the stars?

games.name: Linkies
games.description: You find yourself all alone in the vastness of outer space! Being alone makes you slow and weak. Take your Linky with you and confront the challenges head-on! Linkies is a co-op game that creates unbreakable bonds and makes you faster and stronger! Can you make it to the end of space?

games.name: Zero Warning: Burnt Out
games.description: In this anomaly horror game, a boy has been abandoned in a burning train car. Spot the difference, decide when to push forward, and survive long enough to complete the rescue.

games.name: Rune Rhythm Realm
games.description: Defend global seals in this dark fantasy rhythm-typing TD with roguelite elements, eliminating enemies via real-time letter typing while strategically deploying traps (spacebar) and activating skills (number keys) to the beat.

games.name: Pinfall
games.description: From the center of the Earth to the outskirts of reality, overcome the impossible in Pinfall: An extremely difficult physics-based platformer where momentum is key. While talking to NPCs, collecting items, and customizing your look, keep climbing as the impending fall awaits...

games.name: Rope
games.description: While repeating the same operation, the player's thinking deepens little by little. This is a puzzle game that values such a feeling. The rules are simple and clear. However, the accumulation of choices and results that unfold there creates a quiet tension and relaxation.

games.name: Next Quintillionaire
games.description: Become the Next Quintillionaire in this incremental game where you sell boxes, set prices, choose opportunities, and hire employees to grow and upgrade your business. Reinvest your profits to progress faster and get richer with every cycle!

games.name: Corporate Hell
games.description: Thank you for your application to Max Potency Inc.! After thorough consideration, we are excited to offer you the position of Junior Chemical Engineer. Master your instruments, encourage your coworkers, and make sure to hit those quotas! Max Potency: Driven by Excellence, Powered by You.

games.name: Darwin's Paradox!
games.description: Dive into the adventure with Darwin, an octopus as endearing as he is ingenious, torn from the ocean and trapped in a vast and mysterious industrial complex. Harness his unique talents and abilities to help him overcome the many dangers and traps in this captivating platformer and adventure game.

games.name: Rogolf
games.description:
ROGOLF is a minigolf roguelite, where each level has its own rules and each run is different.
Play mini-golf, buy equipment and score enough points to reach the top!

games.name: Morkull: Ascend to the Gods
games.description: Play as Morkull, God of Death and Darkness. Aware that he finds himself in a video game once again, you must help him escape so he can carry out his new plan for world domination. To do so, you must defeat an entire pantheon of gods in thrilling boss battles.

games.name: Peckers
games.description: A short clicker game which you can run in the corner of your screen while pretending to work. Peck into the depths for resources and craft gear adventurers probably shouldn’t trust.

games.name: Grimoria
games.description: Grimoria is a tactical card roguelike where five races unite to save the realm from shadow creatures. Combine synergies, unlock secret powers, and face tough decisions every turn. Build your deck, defeat monsters, and command Kings, Elves, Dwarves, Mages, and Dragons.

games.name: Yummimons
games.description: A pet game that lives at the bottom of your screen. Feed, pet, capture new companions, and engage in explosive battles — all without stopping your work, study, or browsing. Welcome to your new invisible addiction.

games.name: Dangerous Mountain Together
games.description: Team up in this chaotic 2-4 player co-op RC car adventure! Navigate dangerous mountain roads while tethered together, pulling each other back from disaster. Climb steep hills, survive wild weather, and reach the top without tumbling into the abyss!

games.name: Dwarven Rampart
games.description: Dwarven Rampart is a Fantasy strategy game where you build your Dwarven town, raise massive armies, and choose your enemies to fight against. How long can you survive?

games.name: Urban Ascend
games.description: A casual incremental city builder where growth is constant, production chains expand, citizens thrive, and upgrades push your city toward a bustling metropolis.

games.name: Wong
games.description: Wong is a 2D platformer designed for speedrunning, where you will clear levels, learn their shortcuts, and compete for the best score in a fluid, precise, and perfection-focused gameplay experience.

games.name: Vampire Hunter: Nightrise
games.description: Hunt the vampire before he awakens in this tense FPS dungeon crawl. Explore a shifting castle of traps and secrets, master its hidden mechanics, and survive long enough to stake the monster before Nightrise.

games.name: People of Note
games.description: In this turn-based RPG musical, join Cadence as she recruits an ensemble of musicians on her quest for stardom. Experience turn-based combat like never before, where each battle is a musical performance with evolving combat conditions and genre-bending mashup attacks!

games.name: Signal Zone
games.description: Build, mine, and defend your base to survive the nights. Gather resources by day, reinforce your defenses, and survive attacks in this challenging minimalist strategy.

games.name: Empty Gauge
games.description: VHS-style single-player horror part-time job simulator. Endure the night shift at a remote gas station/convenience store, then return home and collect hidden clues. As the days pass, nightmares bleed into reality—and depending on the clues you uncover, the ending changes.

games.name: ChainStaff
games.description: ChainStaff is a brutal action-platformer with a transforming spear and grappling hook, blazing weapon upgrades, and a rocking soundtrack. Aliens have taken over the Earth! Swing, shoot, and spear your way through hordes of mutating monstrosities and bone-shaking boss fights.

games.name: Wittengrad Is No More
games.description: Wittengrad Is No More is a surreal, narrative walking sim with horror elements. The city's foggy streets will lead you through the story of a single evening in Barnaba’s life. You will encounter the peculiar inhabitants of Wittengrad, though… does it even matter? After all, Wittengrad is gone.

games.name: A Thousand Bees
games.description: Spot the bees in this lovingly hand-illustrated hidden objects game. A literal thousand bees are spread out over a dozen beautiful levels. Can you find all secret levels, too? Enjoy a perfect summer day, deeply inspired by the cozy honeycore aesthetic.

games.name: Lost Little Things
games.description: Embark on a whimsical hidden-object adventure with Lost Little Things! Hunt lost treasures, complete missions, explore ancient temples, and visit moonlit festivals. Alongside your wise cat sensei, meet quirky yokai, uncover hidden secrets, and immerse yourself in a relaxing, magical adventure!

games.name: Knockout 2: Wrath of the Karen
games.description:
In Knockout 2: Wrath of the Karen, a puzzle-boxing spectacle fighting game, take the role of an FBI agent (the bureau of Federal Boxing Investigations) tasked with uncovering the sinister secret behind a rise in wanton entitled law-breaking worldwide.

Knockout 2 pits you against the worst of society and the only way out is with your fists. The cable company stops giving you the discounted rate? That's a boxing match. Someone yields at an empty roundabout? That's a boxing match, too. In fact, all laws, court cases, and skimping out on sandwich toppings are resolved through combat in a world where the legal system has been replaced with boxing. The road to victory might not be easy, but it will be hilarious.

games.name: Hidden Tails
games.description: Hidden Tails is a cozy hidden object game where every squeak tells a story.

games.name: Whisker Wanderlust: Unwritten Chapter
games.description: Wait... WHAT?! My human just vanished into a magic portal! The 3rd Whisker Wanderlust adventure begins! Explore a whimsical fantasy world, meet quirky new friends, and follow the clues to bring your owner home. May every kitty be loved! ♥♥♥

games.name: SCP-9779-JP
games.description: A psychological horror about survival in a cursed Japanese mansion and underground SCP laboratories. Hide, survive, and return SCP-9779-JP to its containment chamber before it destroys you.

games.name: Arcane Merchant
games.description: Open your own shop in the heart of a Medieval Fantasy realm! Stock your shelves with everything from potions and swords to mysterious crystals and legendary artifacts. Set your prices, earn your customers' trust and become the richest merchant in town!

games.name: Portal Guardian
games.description: You are a Portal Guardian. It is your job to help protect the secret gateways to the Realm. Your people have been kept safe and unaware for centuries, but something dark and relentless has been stirring... Unleash the fury of your towers and magic to defend the portal and the realm or all is lost!

games.name: Please Don't Shoot the Humans
games.description: Click with laser-focus to blast zombies while civilians wander in like they missed every safety memo. Stack upgrades, unleash turrets, and watch the numbers explode. See how long you can keep pretending everything is under control.

games.name: Aviarium
games.description: Aviarium is a relaxing sky sanctuary simulation filled with cute birds. Manage your floating aviary with click and idle mechanics, collect resources, and enjoy a pleasant experience in a colorful and peaceful world above the clouds.

games.name: We Need a Doorman.
games.description: You are the hotel doorman and a demon hunter. Observe the guests, and if you detect an anomaly, exorcise without hesitation.

games.name: Days With Girlfriends Ⅲ
games.description: During the game, you mainly match a certain amount of identical game elements, such as fruits, gems, building blocks, etc., so that they are adjacent to each other to eliminate them to win. Match three or more identical elements to eliminate them, complete the set goals.

games.name: Wukong Survivors
games.description: A pixel-art roguelite survivors game inspired by Eastern mythology. Play as Sun Wukong and other legendary heroes, battle endless waves of enemies, craft powerful builds from weapons, relics, and skill trees, and survive the chaos.

games.name: Nimillion: The Last Expedition
games.description: Metroidvania Spaceship adventure with physics-based rocket ship controls. Retro-inspired Thruster-only flight, unlock and upgrade abilities, solve physics puzzles, battle tough bosses, conquer brutal terrain. Easy to learn, hard to master old-school thrills!

games.name: Replaced
games.description: Replaced is a 2.5D sci-fi retro-futuristic action platformer where you play as R.E.A.C.H. - an artificial intelligence trapped in a human body against its own will. Replaced combines cinematic platforming, pixel art and free-flow action combat set in an alternative 1980's.

games.name: Dosa Divas
games.description: Platform through a vibrant world in an upgradeable mech and cook delicious meals. Fight off corpos in turn based combat, discover new recipes, build up your reputation with local communities, and bond with friends and family on a journey to taste everything life has to offer.

games.name: Hordekill
games.description: In an unknown realm, you slay hordes of nightmarish swamp monsters.

games.name: BaseStar
games.description: Dive into a classic grid-based dungeon crawler RPG in a sci-fi setting with unique classes, each offering a distinct playstyle. Immerse yourself in a fully voiced sci-fi story brought to life by two main characters, guiding you through a narrative full of twists and turns with real-time combat.

games.name: Artifact Hunt: Yao
games.description: Artifact Hunt: Yao is a roguelike deck-building game. Collect various Yao souls, seek out different artifacts, combine diverse inscriptions, and create your unique build to experience this adventure full of possibilities.

games.name: Fishing Inc
games.description: Fishing Inc is an addictive incremental fishing game! Catch fish, earn cash, and unlock powerful skills. Master new ponds, fill your Fish Log with Legendary catches, and become the ultimate angler.

games.name: MechsNBugs
games.description: Two Mechs. One player. And an arena filled with alien bugs. Survive five rounds in the arena to become the new champion.

games.name: Spaceman Memories
games.description: Spaceman Memories is a retro JRPG that takes place in a distant future but draws inspiration from ancient Japanese folktales. A story full of wonder and nostalgia as you take on the role of Ichiro 94, an astronaut who wakes up from hypersleep to go on a journey to find the remnants of his past.

games.name: Command Thousands Troops
games.description: This is a squad-building game set in a medieval fantasy world, blending turn-based development with real-time combat. As the commander of a small team, you will recruit soldiers, acquire skills, strengthen your army, and repel invaders. Write your own legendary story.

games.name: Cthulhu: The Cosmic Abyss
games.description: A mining station in the Pacific abyss is no longer responding. As an investigator of the occult, unravel the mysteries of the deep. Test your wits and sanity in this thriller inspired by the master of Providence.

games.name: Cozy Sanctuary
games.description: Cozy Sanctuary is a relaxing pet simulation game where you care for adorable animals living at the bottom of your screen. Grow their food, and keep them happy and fed to attract even more furry friends! They'll stay out of your way while you work or study, but don't forget to give them attention!

games.name: Kitty Finder
games.description: Find the adorable kitties hiding in every corner of a huge mansion! Discover the little friends hiding behind the sofas, bookshelves, and attic. A peaceful adventure experience awaits you in a relaxing atmosphere!

games.name: Anomaly Directive
games.description: Anomaly Directive is a first-person surveillance horror game. Monitor live camera feeds, detect and report supernatural anomalies, and survive an escalating threat from a malevolent entity.

games.name: Beta Kafe: Write Your Love Story
games.description: A man with a broken heart, trying to love and be loved—though it’s hard. In this dating simulation, you’ll be facing some of the most terrible first date experiences. It’s cinematic, funny, and brutally honest!

games.name: Night of the Living Bubble
games.description: NOT YOUR AVERAGE NIGHT SHIFT... When clocking into work, you find that your business has been overrun by monsters borne from the products on the shelves. Constructed by a mad scientist bent on world domination, only YOU can stop them and save the world by shooting monsters with your Nailgun.

games.name: Project Liminal 2
games.description: Explore terrifying liminal spaces. Horror walking simulator with reality-bending platforming and supernatural threats. Get lost between dimensions.

games.name: Clockwork Ambrosia
games.description: Clockwork Ambrosia is a compelling steampunk fusion of metroidvania and a 2D shooter. Players pull on the boots of an airship pilot to combat an army of deadly robots and monsters. Experiment with a range of rule-breaking weapons modifications and armors to prevail through this wild adventure!

games.name: Tides of Tomorrow
games.description: From the makers of Road 96, Tides of Tomorrow challenges you to survive the troubled ocean planet of Elynd, as well as the choices made by your friends and favourite streamers.

games.name: Masters of Albion
games.description: Build by day, fight by night in an epic story of power and consequence. Design, build and customise your world, from the food your people eat to the clothes they wear, the weapons they wield to the homes they live in. Possess characters at will in this unique God Game – Masters of Albion!

games.name: Kingdom's Return: Time-Eating Fruit and the Ancient Monster
games.description: A kingdom-rebuilding adventure filled with action and strategy! Kingdom's Return is an action RPG where you'll adventure to restore your fallen kingdom. Collect materials in 2D side-scrolling adventure stages, then use them in the strategy part to rebuild your kingdom and power up your characters!

games.name: Luminex Quartet
games.description: A JRPG featuring music. The curious boy Pato sets out on a journey with his childhood friend Belffie in search of legendary instruments. Eventually, they are bound to a great destiny. An adventure story with full Japanese voice acting for the main story.

games.name: Food Truck Chef: Full Course Edition
games.description: In Food Truck Chef: Full Course Edition, you explore vibrant locations and unlock fresh levels, each introducing a brand-new lineup of special dishes to perfect. Packed with delicious recipes from around the world, this is a true culinary journey. From the lively sights of Oriental Street and the smoky goodness of BBQ Street to the sugary treats of Donut and Waffle Street, tackle every challenge and complete each cooking mission. Simple to pick up but tough to perfect, this high-speed cooking game features some mechanics that keep you on your toes.

games.name: Witches of Element
games.description: In Witches of Element, you command Fire, Wind, and Thunder to craft unique spells from three elemental orbs. Merge identical elements to summon powerful pets. After each battle, upgrade elements, unlock items, and shape your own playstyle as you face new adventures.

games.name: My Summer Love
games.description: Kang Yuna is a student at the University of Arts in Korea. She is someone very intelligent and charming. In a nineties summer you're a new student in her class. Could love develop between the two?

games.name: Pragmata
games.description:
An all-new Science Fiction action adventure with its own unique hacking twist!
It is the near future, and protagonists Hugh and his android companion Diana, must work together as they make their way through the cold lunar research station.

games.name: Grandpa's Bee Haven
games.description: Grandpa's Bee Haven is a desktop-idler and a beekeeping sim that sits at the bottom of your screen letting you to do other things while managing your bee haven.

games.name: Saint George's Tavern
games.description:
Hilarious tavern simulator set in the early 1800's. Take food and drinks orders, catch and cook the food, pour ales and serve. A cozy game that occasionally ramps up the pace for a short while with tavern fights, drinking games, arm wrestling, happy slaps and many more.
Decorate your tavern ready for Christmas and watch as a choir of chickens sing Christmas carols to entertain your customers.
Earn money, buy new items, hire a worker, and increase your tavern rating. The tavern with the highest rating in London will be hosting King George III for Christmas dinner - guaranteed to be an absolute spectacle!!

games.name: Animal Style
games.description: You're a cat running your own hotdog shop! Use realistic fluid physics to sauce a huge variety of foods. Each food is a puzzle. Manage your shop, unlock upgrades, save the furry residents of Pawston, and make sure not to lose your balance....

games.name: Bobo Bay
games.description: Bobo Bay is a pet simulation game where you collect, mash(breed), accessorize, and train little creatures to compete in races and other competitions. You are able to feed your Bobo an old shoe which is kinda funny.

games.name: Gretel's Honesty
games.description: A comic-like visual novel, expressing a new story based on the fairy tale “Hansel and Gretel”.

games.name: It Lives in the Woods
games.description: It Lives in the Woods is a first-person psychological horror set in the forests of Canada. You are Ibrahim, a father who has recently lost his daughter whilst on a hiking trip in the forest last winter. You hope to find what happened to your daughter and whether you can reunite with her.

games.name: Rogue Night
games.description: Fight through hordes undead, and collect their heads to unlock permanent upgrades while you gather resources to build your base. Choose your class, and preferred weapons. Explore dungeons to find rings, tools, and blueprints, and rescue NPCs who unlock new structures and provide various resources.

games.name: Gray Planet
games.description: Explore a open world set in a post-apocalyptic background, gather resources to craft various equipment and build your base. Defeat different types of monsters while investigating what happened on this planet.

games.name: Invincible Vs.
games.description: Invincible VS is a brutal superhero 3v3 tag fighting game set in the Invincible universe, where you can battle to the death as a team of fan-favorite characters in iconic locations.

games.name: Winx Club: The Magic Is Back
games.description: Winx Club: The Magic is Back captures the essence of the Winx universe, delivering an enchanting experience with a mix of magical combat and puzzle-solving. Play as all six members of the Winx Club, each with their own magical abilities.

games.name: AfterTheDawn
games.description: After The Dawn is a scifi Survival RPG with offline and online features, it will feature co-op and pvp in online.

games.name: Mars Tactics
games.description: Classic turn-based tactical combat with some modern twists. Use stress to manage RNG. Master advanced suppression mechanics. Grow troops who develop abilities, personalities & relationships based on what happens in battle. Procedural, destructible maps. Realistic bullet physics.

games.name: Project Faith
games.description: You are cast in the role of a young boy who starts his adventure on a mysterious and vast green landscape. You know that your destination is straight ahead. You know what that destination is. But not much else...

games.name: Rancher: A New Life
games.description: Start a new life as a Rancher. Travel the forest paths by quad bike, raise cattle, build, repair, and improve your farm. Take care of animals, go fishing, cook, grow vegetables, practice your accuracy on shooting range, take photos, and much more. Relax away from the hustle and bustle of the city!

games.name: Toward The Ice
games.description: Toward The Ice is a classic first-person party-based dungeon crawler RPG with grid-based movement and turn-based combat. Venture into the frozen north and help a fair princess rescue her idiot brother from Troll kidnappers.

games.name: Time Jump
games.description:
A casual 3rd person action-adventure

Play as William Roger in this 3rd person comedy adventure. It's 1994. You're late for school! No sleep. No Breakfast. You "accidentally" activate your professors “Camera” and get sucked into the past.

Lost and alone in this strange place with your wits and no knowledge of where to go next, uncover the many mysteries of why you are here and at all costs, find your way back home before time runs out.

games.name: Derail: Sacrifice
games.description: Derail is a story-driven puzzle game similar to Rusty Lake. The once peaceful town was thrown into chaos when a coffin falls from the sky. The villagers vanished all of sudden. Only things left are embryos scattered on the empty streets. When you opened the coffin, a living person walked out.

games.name: Solis
games.description:
Solis is a hand-drawn adventure about technology and deception in a city at night.
During a company trip you explore the city of Solis from dusk till dawn, talking with its inhabitants and meeting colleagues. This night you learn the painful truth about the company you work for. Will you remain loyal?
In the game you explore an atmospheric and compact open world. Decisions within the game carry weight, influencing subsequent events, while the in-game text adjusts to reflect your choices.

In Solis you explore the city, investigate your surroundings and talk with the inhabitants and colleagues you meet. Decisions within the game carry weight, influencing subsequent events, while the in-game text dynamically adjusts to reflect your choices. Interactions are streamlined to utilize a single button, aided by context-sensitive interaction icons. The GUI is a sparse as possible. Solis offers multiple endings and is crafted to be concise and compact. The complete game is estimated to run for approximately 2,5 hours.

games.name: Lunar Strike
games.description: Lunar Strike blends speculative fiction with a game world grounded in hard science. The game focuses on compelling survival and character-driven storytelling over combat. A race against time to preserve the evidence of humanity’s presence on the Moon before its inevitable collapse and destruction.

games.name: Cat Girl Survivor 2: Beyond the Veil
games.description: Demon invasion has shattered the dimensions, filling the world with corrupted souls. Cat girls with unique stories unite through friendship to restore balance by purifying souls and facing fierce bosses. An exciting and adorable side-scrolling action adventure!

games.name: Koloboke: Sickness Simulator
