games.description: This is a difficult game that takes the best from Dark Souls - the rolls Combined with a first-person camera, it turns into a truly butt-blasting mix

games.name: Retronaut
games.description: A rogue star pilot lost between galaxies—upgrade your ship, harness ancient artifacts, and survive relentless alien hordes in this cosmic action roguelite.

games.name: Bourbon Risky
games.description: Bourbon Risky is a simple but deep boss rush action game with retro style graphics. Smash all enemies in your way with your eternal companion that blasting bullets and lasers!

games.name: Agebringer
games.description: The Crimson Core has been stolen. The end of the world draws near. The thief hides high atop the Infinity Tower. Gather your courage, take up your weapons... The Red Crusade has begun.

games.name: R-Type Dimensions III
games.description: Building on the legacy of R-Type Dimensions and R-Type Dimensions EX, Dimensions III has been completely re-envisioned with cutting-edge visuals and sounds, expanded gameplay modes, and a range of new features designed to deliver the most definitive modern edition of R-Type’s classic era.

games.name: Tri6: Infinite 2
games.description: Tri6: Infinite 2 is futuristic arcade racing without brakes: race across procedurally generated cyber tracks, dodge traps, use power-ups, and experience thrilling high-speed action. Every run is unique — how long can you last?

games.name: Futa Fucks Femboys
games.description: Futa Fucks Femboys is an explosive mix of 2D Visual Novel and Collectible Card Game, where an alien symbiote turns the main hero into a FUTANARI and drags her into an adventure full of passion, absurdity, and FEMBOYS. Saving Earth has never felt so spicy

games.name: Golf-Like
games.description: Golf-Like is a minimalist indie golf game focused on precision, physics, and compact level design. Each level is designed as a small puzzle where every shot matters, encouraging thoughtful play rather than speed or randomness. Simple controls combine with increasingly complex mechanics to create a focused and rewarding gameplay experience.

games.name: Battle of the Alamo
games.description: Defend the Alamo and rewrite history in this confined bullet hell! Play as Shieldon, a shield who can only parry, who was tasked with rewriting the Alamo's fate. But, the enemies and its commander won't let it come easily. Can you defeat who awaits in the end, or will you be left to be remembered?

games.name: Miskatonic
games.description: Miskatonic is a text-based strategy game where players take the role of an ancient god, determined to harvest fear for power. Incept your victims through dialogues with their psyche, study the limits of their mind by unlocking their stories, and manipulate the maze with powerful abilities.

games.name: DopePie Survivors 3D
games.description: *DopePie Survivors 3D* is a 3D shooting game with survivor-like mechanics! Countless different little girls, giant corrupted female bosses, and a variety of weapons! Skills! Building! Piloting helicopters and tanks! Gliding through the city! can you lead them to escape?

games.name: Monster Lily
games.description: A Deeply Tactical ASCII Roguelike with unique and often surprising mechanics. Explore Hanwu Divinity College and uncover its secrets.

games.name: Robolucion: The Sandwich Conspiracy
games.description: Robolucion: The Sandwich Conspiracy is a fast-paced first-person shooter set in a post-apocalyptic era, where mind-controlled “sheep” have taken over. Fight your way through hordes of brainwashed citizens, collect the mysterious purple serum, and uncover the truth behind the Sandwich Conspiracy.

games.name: Beach Ball Bounce Back
games.description: BBBB is a challenging physics platformer. If you fall down, just bounce back!

games.name: Brewed and Battered
games.description: Brew your own weapons from scratch and unleash them on hordes of homunculi! In this survival roguelite, every ingredient combination creates a potion that splashes, moves, and reacts in a unique way. Discover absurd synergies and rescue fellow alchemists in your quest for the Philosopher’s Stone.

games.name: Cozy Farm Manager
games.description: Cozy farming meets management sim - Hire and develop a team of farmhands, fulfill major contracts, combat pests with chemicals or biodiversity, and manage a limited water supply. Grow your farm’s reputation through thoughtful planning, sustainable choices, and smart business decisions!

games.name: School Crisis
games.description: A third-person co-op stealth comedy where up to four players sneak into an all-girls campus, while one player becomes the principal — the aggressive hunter with a shinai. Talk to the girls who only trust specific characters, complete missions, rescue captured friends, and survive the chaos together.

games.name: Mazemerizzz II
games.description: Moe is napping again and this time, it's a NIGHTMARE! The Watcher has Moe trapped in a massive endless maze filled with danger! Zombies, minotaurs and bone crushing, spikey, gaseous, flame filled traps. Equipped with just a torch, Moe must find a way to wake up.

games.name: Tales of Medieval Duelists
games.description: Ditch the animations. In Tales of Medieval Duelists, every swordfight is a unique physics-based clash. Master precise, skill-driven combat where timing a perfect parry is your key to victory. Build your legend with deep progression, gear, and a high-risk win streak multiplier.

games.name: Genesis
games.description: Investigate a murder at a lake marked by unexplained events. Play as a journalist trapped in his worst nightmare, explore unsettling locations, and survive a classic horror experience divided into three chapters.

games.name: Upload Aliens
games.description: The rule: DON'T LET THEM TOUCH GROUND! Become the Cyberpunk Knight and launch aliens skyward. Use foes as missiles to trigger chain explosions in infinite aerial combos. Unleash this pixel-art roguelite spectacle with just three buttons: Move, Jump, Dash.

games.name: Open Air
games.description: Summer! Sea! Festival! You've been waiting for this for so long, and here you are! But what is it, why are the stages empty, and everybody around you is sad? Explore the island, learn the stories of the islanders, unlock new strengths during meditations and arrange the loudest and coolest festival!

games.name: Besmirch
games.description: Besmirch is a Pixel art Survival Farming-Simulator. Stealthily plant crops and carefully watch them grow. Avoid monsters and unwanted visitors by night. Socialize with the local city-folk but can you actually trust any of them?

games.name: Directive 8020
games.description: Earth is dying and humanity is running out of time. 12 light years from home, Tau Ceti f offers a small sliver of hope. When the colony ship Cassiopeia crash lands on the planet, its crew soon realize they are far from being alone. In space, death takes many forms.

games.name: Saint of Chains
games.description:
Psychological single-player first-person horror. Explore dark environments, fight with melee and guns, and solve puzzles in this retro 2000s-inspired nightmare where the truth is more terrifying than the monsters.

Retro Horror - Reborn: A love letter to Silent Hill 3, Lost in Vivo, Condemned: Criminal Origins, and Cry of Fear.

Built in the haunting visual style of the PS2 / Xbox360 era — when every shadow felt alive, and every step sounded like a confession.

games.name: Yooca: Your Life
games.description: Build your dream life in Yooca, a cozy multiplayer life sim set in a vibrant online city. Express yourself through deep avatar and home customization, bond with your loyal Yooca companion, and join a heartwarming community. From mini-games to chilling with friends, how will you live your best live?

games.name: Taste of Blood
games.description: A real-time strategy game with a simple economy, designed so you can focus on the battle and crush your enemies.

games.name: King Crab
games.description: Dig trenches, build walls, explore the beach, and defend your sandcastle from the rising tide - on PC or in VR.

games.name: Corsairs: Battle of the Caribbean
games.description: An immersive adventure and strategy game set amidst the thrilling world of buccaneering. As a shrewd captain, navigate tumultuous seas, engage in complex politics, and manage a diverse crew to establish maritime dominance and ensure your fleet's future.

games.name: Forza Horizon 6
games.description: Discover the breathtaking landscapes of Japan in over 550 real-world cars and become a racing Legend at the Horizon Festival. Start your journey as a tourist and explore a world full of hit music and Japanese culture. Build a Valley Estate, acquire awe-inspiring homes, and display your prized car collection in fully Customizable Garages. Cruise the roads with your friends and join Car Meets around Japan, unleash your imagination with EventLab and build together in Horizon CoLab.

games.name: Pix Football Manager
games.description: PIX Football Manager is a nostalgic, casual football management simulator focused on scouting. Set your tactics, find hidden gems, and improve your facilities as you build a dynasty. With no visible player stats, you must spot talent yourself. Grab your clipboard, the game starts now.

games.name: Grumpy Jack
games.description: A bullethell adventure awaits! Join Jack, a reluctant hero, as he battles bizarre enemies, uncovers secrets, meets quirky characters—and hunts down Death’s missing coffee mug.

games.name: Coffee Talk: Tokyo
games.description: Coffee Talk: Tokyo is the newest instalment of the beloved coffee brewing and heart-to-heart talking simulator. It brings the warmth, heart, and delicious drinks from the previous games to an all-new café in Tokyo where humans and yokai alike share their stories.

games.name: Noneworld
games.description: NONEWORLD is a cute RPG set in a dying world. You are a Princess from another world, accompanied by an omnipresent Cheshire Cat. Only YOU and your fruity colored allies can LIGHT THE WORLD and return home safely.

games.name: Psyvariar 3
games.description: Play as one of 7 pilots in this thrilling sequel to a SHMUP classic. The time has come for a new generation of Psyvariars to rise… and save humanity.

games.name: Yours Truly
games.description: Yours Truly is an emotional 3rd person narrative-driven game with elements of exploration, puzzles, and platforming. Centered around Liam who is stranded in a strange world searching for his true self, and purpose while finding a way home.

games.name: Bubsy 4D
games.description: The infamous, wise-cracking bobcat has returned to 3D in a new platforming adventure. Bubsy is back with new challenges, new moves, and even more purrsonality. Run, jump, glide, and roll across alien planets, battle robotic sheep, and collect tons and tons of yarn. What could possibly go wrong?

games.name: The Relic: First Guardian
games.description: "Guardian, gather the pieces of the great relic and seal the void of darkness." In this action RPG, you embark on a heroic adventure to save the world in the dark as the last guardian. Start your journey as a guardian, gather pieces of great relic and close the void.

games.name: Stonemachia
games.description: Stonemachia is an adventure in which you can fight and explore a world distorted by the Plague of angels, taking on the role of Zefiro, a pawn capable of transforming into other chess pieces. Venture into the lands of Medhelan and prepare to face armies of angels transformed into statues and objects inspired by Italian art, architecture, and folklore! Fight with a variety of abilities and precise timing in a parry-centric game, where the shield can truly change the outcome of every encounter! Discover the various transformations and their unique abilities to experience a Dantesque epic and uncover the secret of the chess pieces...

games.name: 007 First Light
games.description: Earn the Number. 007 First Light is a thrilling espionage action-adventure game from IO Interactive. Follow James Bond as a young, resourceful, and sometimes reckless recruit in MI6's training programme, and discover an origin story of the world’s most famous spy.

games.name: Stranded Survivors
games.description: Survive swarms of monsters, rescue stranded animals, and build a base where they can be safe in this unique bullet heaven. Turn your rescues into upgrades and build a safe town to create new weapons and recruit powerful heroes that unlock new ways to survive til dawn.

games.name: Utawarerumono: Past and Present Rediscovered
games.description: The Utawarerumono legend reaches a new climax in this sprawling JRPG! As a shadow falls over Yamato once more, Oshtor and friends set out on a fresh adventure—and somewhere, amid white mists, a long slumber approaches its end.

games.name: LEGO Batman: Legacy of the Dark Knight
games.description: Rise as the Dark Knight and experience the essential Batman story in a bold, action-packed adventure with hard-hitting combat, an open-world Gotham City, and the signature LEGO charm that fans know and love.

games.name: Paradise Beyond the Nightmare
games.description: "Paradise Beyond the Nightmare" is a 2D exploration horror game where you explore and solve puzzles in a 2D space with depth. You can experience moving both sideways and forwards through eerie paintings.

games.name: Deluge: Raintime
games.description: Some things don't willingly submit to the games of man, but develop a grudge that sleeps under the soil for decades— An interactive visual novel with psychological and lovecraftian undertones.

games.name: Golel
games.description: Golel, a first person roguelike Dungeon Crawler.Combat is focused on mobility and using the environment to your advantage.Dropping book shelves on an enemy, or kicking an enemy into a trap are all valid tactics.Deep skill/magic and combat gameplay, with many development paths.

games.name: Archwizard
games.description: Fast paced "Hyper Shooter" complemented with esoteric exploration experience. Take a quest to become Arch Wizard: dominate surrounding realms, reverse Time, escape Death, befriend Chaos, face the End of the World. Knowledge based progression. High scores. Full of secrets.

games.name: Void Martyrs
games.description: A grimdark survival horror about a nun in a space suit. Scavenge amongst drifting space cathedrals, balance your faith with survival, and craft the tools of your salvation.

games.name: Until the End
games.description: Love remembers you. Even if you’ve forgotten.

games.name: A Simple Life with My Unobtrusive Sister
games.description: A fully animated and voiced sister life-sim with roguelite runs. Find a cure for Mio’s illness. Share meals and quiet nights at home, then enter the Abyss each day to fight, loot, and push deeper to protect your simple life together.

games.name: Orbital
games.description:
Orbital is an outer space, endless survival, arcade game where players become planetary pilots to prolong the inevitable grasp of a super massive blackhole, witnessing the collapse of the solar system. Navigate the cosmic perils and chaos, deploying specialised planetary tech to endure the onslaught and ascend the galactic leaderboard.

Adapt your strategy with each mission and push your endurance further with every attempt.

games.name: Bobble and the Tri-Crystal
games.description: Swim, shoot, and save the ocean! Play as a detective fish in this fast-paced 2D retro shoot 'em up! Unlock multiple weapons, defeat enemy hordes, and capture bosses before it's too late!

games.name: Wheel Balance
games.description: Wheel Balance is a hard and fun physics-based game about balancing on two wheels. Master controls and beat all locations, compete with your friends. Try not to fall far away down!

games.name: Chrysalis: Chrome Butterfly
games.description: Chrysalis: Chrome Butterfly - a cyberpunk neo-noir thriller. Play as Wendy, an agent with memory gaps investigating a disappearance in Neo-Kyoto. Switch between choreographed combat and detective work to uncover a conspiracy where reality is an illusion. But is the truth worth knowing?

games.name: Murderous Sunlight
games.description: In a dark world where Holy mages rewrite probability and Profane forces trap the dead in eternal patterns, Murderous Sunlight blends exploration, psychological depth, and occasional combat in an unsettling journey. Unravel a linear, character-driven story about trauma, identity, and defiance.

games.name: Beam It Up!
games.description: Capture monsters from distant planets and add them to your cosmic collection. Upgrade your ship, travel further, and become the galaxy’s top collector.

games.name: Shape World Level up Lite
games.description: A hyper clicker that combines control and strategy! From casual play to extreme difficulty, anyone can take on the challenge. Experience a vast adventure and endless leveling created by a solo developer!

games.name: Fragile Frontier
games.description: You're an owl postal worker who just brought the first automobile to Moonperch Island. Drive with packages stacked on your roof, hit a bump, watch them scatter! Triple-jump to glide, help friends recover cargo, upgrade your truck. 1-4 player co-op. But why is the mountain getting warmer...?

games.name: Black Border 3
games.description: The border never sleeps — and neither can you.  Inspect documents, expose secrets, and make life-changing decisions in this gripping night patrol simulator where one mistake can change everything. ️‍♀️

games.name: PawlleyBall
games.description: PawlleyBall is a cute volleyball game where cats face off in quick 1v1 matches. Jump, dive, and spike to score against opponents on colorful, stylized courts. Simple controls and lively rallies make it fun to pick up and replay.

games.name: Celestial Lumina
games.description: Ascend from the depths as Evan, heir of a fallen underworld, to uncover the truth behind a world stripped of dawn. Celestial Lumina is a 2D Pixel-Art Metroidvania where Light clashes with the Darkness that stole the sky.

games.name: Space Empires 4X
games.description: A faithful digital adaptation of the acclaimed board game by GMT Games, beloved by wargamers for almost two decades. Command the rise of your civilization and the fall of others, all in one to two hours.

games.name: Kal
games.description: KAL is a first-person psychological horror game. Trapped in an old, abandoned Creole house, immerse yourself in a time loop and relive the story of a slave who became a true legend.

games.name: Irradiate 235
games.description: Discover and automate unique materials. Engineer the machines and tools for your factory. Handle hazardous materials to make explosives and near-limitless energy. Use your own tools to navigate a labyrinth of alien passages and uncover untouched tunnels in this innovative Automation-Metroidvania.

games.name: Chicken Coop Invaders
games.description: Save the chickens! Help Lucas defend the chickens against a ruthless alien attack in this frantic FPS game with Tower Defense elements! Battle through dozens of levels, make allies, buy and upgrade items!

games.name: 8AM: The Warehouse
games.description: "8AM: The Warehouse" is a suspense game set in a massive distribution center late at night. Monitor security cameras as strange incidents occur among the remaining workers — and decide if it’s exhaustion, system error, or something lurking between the shelves until 8:00 a.m.

games.name: Mudventure
games.description: Mudventure is a casual sandbox adventure set in a living tidal-flat world of mud. Dig terrain, gather resources, upgrade equipment, and control the environment by building dams. Fight monsters and bosses, enjoy fishing at night, and escape the island by repairing a ship—solo or online co-op.

games.name: ShotFightDisaster
games.description: ShotFightDisaster (SFD) presents its tactical, team-based and action-packed gameplay. Players are catapulted into a conflict from which only the best return.

games.name: The Adventures of Elliot: The Millennium Tales
games.description:
The Adventure of Elliot: The Millennium Tales is an action RPG set in the world of Philabieldia - a beautiful but savage land dominated by warring beast tribes. Humanity’s last bastion is the Kingdom of Huther, protected by its tall walls and Princess Heuria’s powerful magic.

When a mysterious set of ruins is discovered, a young adventurer named Elliot and his fairy companion Faie are sent off on a journey to investigate. What seems like a simple, if dangerous, mission soon becomes a grand saga that will be woven across time and space.

games.name: Scrap Story
games.description: Scrap your way through a story book world in search of your missing brother!

games.name: No Way Back: Dark Horizon
games.description: Survive on a mysterious island! Battle against the infected creatures of a failed experiment, gather resources, build your base, and uncover the dark secret of the island.

games.name: Slot or Die
games.description: Lost in a cursed castle, a knight confronts the horror with the help of a relic-shaped slot machine. Stop the reels, chain attacks and bonuses, manage your inventory, and survive in this dark roguelite where every spin decides your fate.

games.name: Moonlight Knight
games.description: Moonlight Knight is an action-slasher with RPG elements. Use sword, bow, magic and hook to fight your enemies. Loot gold, upgrade character stats, find unique items and unlock ultimate abilities to make it to the very end!

games.name: Wind Runners
games.description: For centuries, the Realm uses fear and its military superiority to keep the Zarah Igna System under control, but a group of rebellious Ishma arises to fight its tyranny. With their superior aerial combat skills, the Wind Runners will bring freedom to all who live under the shadow of oppression!

games.name: The Wilds of Dacrima: Field Notes from a Poorly Supervised Alchemist and his Clockwork Robot Companion
games.description: Uncover the secrets of the forest in this tale of two unlikely friends, with alchemist Edric Tayte and L-P1N. Forage for weird and wonderful ingredients, brew Potions to empower you with potent abilities, and all the while discovering that this adventure isn't quite what it seems..

games.name: The Ranchers
games.description: The Ranchers is an open world country-life sim for 1-4 players. Raise animals, grow crops, craft machines, build your dream house and explore the gigantic open world where mines and dangerous monsters abound. Earn the villagers' respect and esteem. And who knows, maybe find love and start a family.

games.name: Rogue Mansion
games.description:
Rogue Mansion is a survival horror game combined with the best of the roguelike genre! Explore a procedurally generated mansion that changes every time you play, and becomes more dangerous and unpredictable according to your level of fear.

Experience the game in different ways, by choosing from multiple unique characters, each with their own equipment, specialist perks, and motivations.

games.name: Redemption of the Damned
games.description:
You are a field doctor's assistant who was heading to a distant village to help local peasants. Someone attacked your stagecoach and you wake up in a mass grave, being the only survivor.

The player fights against monsters and other evil spirits in various biomes of the cursed forest, and the only safe place is the village, where he can complete tasks, recuperate or replenish supplies. In each location the player will meet with the guardian of this zone - the boss, who is the iconic character of the folklore of Western and Eastern Europe. The main goal of the game is to get into the high castle in order to eliminate its owner.

The player's arsenal is represented by a wide range of firearms typical for the chosen era - ancient flintlock pistols, classic revolvers, muskets and rifles, as well as special tools for certain types of enemies like vampires, ghouls, werewolves, swamp creatures, spirits, etc.

What scared you, being myths and scary tales, becomes reality and...attacks!

games.name: Nocturne
games.description: The afterlife is now digital. Discover that eternal life comes with sacrifice in a genre-defying RPG with unique rhythm combat.

games.name: Insect Worlds
games.description: Immerse yourself in the world of insects. Explore fascinating forests and learn about their way of life. Complete quests and mini-games, fight or collect resources and cards. Admire the microcosm from a completely different perspective and learn new facts about plants and insects.

games.name: Sparkball
games.description: Sparkball is a 4v4 adrenaline-packed ‘sports brawler’ where players select from a cast of lovably unique heroes and carefully balance both ballin' and brawlin' to score in the enemy team's goal! Affectionately described as League of Legends meets Rocket League (or Kung Fu-tbol!), Sparkball grips you immediately with its dopamine-inducing take on combat sports and keeps you coming back for more as you strive to master its surprisingly complex strategies.

games.name: TIC-TAC: Twelve o'clock
games.description: TIC-TAC: Twelve o'clock is a survival horror game. Monitor corridors and rooms through surveillance cameras to counter vengeful ghosts. Keep the lights on, the generator charged, and fuses replaced… and don’t get caught!

games.name: MegaBattle
games.description: Build robots and enter the arena to battle! Robots have taken control of the galaxy and now humans must build bots to fight in the MegaBattle Arena. MegaBattle combines the best of the CCG with innovative mechanics such as unique mana mode, opponent reading attack and a fast card draw system.

games.name: Dystopicon
games.description:
In Dystopicon the players will live in a dystopian society in which they receive money in exchange to watch TV. With that money they pay services to cover their basic needs. Throughout the game they will discover the details of this dystopia in which the government monitors your movements but gives you freedom of choice.

The story will be told through gameplay, texts and comics. Take your time to explore the different objects and the mechanics in your first day.

games.name: Gowf: A Golf Adventure
games.description: Gowf is an arcade style golf game with a classic 3-click hit system. Features an RPG style adventure mode where you can level-up and customize your character's skills and equipment to win tournaments across a variety of courses and online play with up to 8 friends.

games.name: Mina the Hollower
games.description:
Mina the Hollower is a bone-chilling action-adventure game featuring classic gameplay and an 8-bit aesthetic in the style of Game Boy Color, refined for the modern era.

Quick and deliberate 60fps action combat, captivating world design, and top-down adventuring combine in a nostalgic blend. Whip foes, burrow through the ground, and explore a pixel-perfect world in Mina the Hollower, a brand new game from the developers who brought you Shovel Knight!

games.name: Galactic Diner
games.description: Become the best chef in the galaxy! Cook for aliens, make new friends, and go head-to-head against other chefs to win it all in a game show where the customer is always right!

games.name: Dreaming Worlds
games.description: Dive into the dreaming worlds of the four dream keepers and find out why they don't answer anymore. Rescue the trapped inhabitants of the dream worlds, change the dreams back to good and discover mysterious places and puzzles. But something dark will stand in your way.

games.name: Echoes of the Stars
games.description: Echoes of the Stars is a modern action-JRPG standing on the shoulders of the classics. Follow Rin and Eldric in a tale of two souls, bound together by fate in an epic tale of time, space, love, laughter, and the human condition as they challenge those who seek to destroy existence as we know it.

games.name: Athanasia
games.description: Athanasia is an action survival horror immersive sim where you explore a mysterious facility and use everything you have to survive with an arsenal of equipment as well as your wits against time traveling predators from prehistory and the future.

games.name: Adventures of Ruby Rabbit
games.description: "The Adventure of Ruby Rabbit" is a light action shooter adventure game. In the game, you can control Ruby the cute bunny, fight the bunny balls, and grow as she grows.

games.name: Nomori
games.description: Nomori is a mind-bending puzzle game where you need to control time and space to journey through a shattered spirit world. Take shortcuts through portals, rotate your perspective, and control the flow of time to move forward, whichever way that is.

games.name: Daomei Village
games.description: You have been banished to Daomei Village for your offense. In order to return to the Emperor's favor, you must make an effort. Repair, build, cultivate fields and fight various adversities. Meet new friends and learn their stories. Do whatever it takes not to be banished forever!

games.name: The Henchmen
games.description: The Henchmen is a pulp-inspired, 90s fueled top-down, action retro open-world game set in the fictional city of New Queens during 1979 and 1991.

games.name: Nowhere Manor
games.description: House of stolen devil bargains and indolent angelic aristocracy: Nowhere Manor is doomed to disappear. You can leave if you’ve got a soul … but that’s not an option for an artificially created servant such as Liber. Just how far are you willing to go escape?

games.name: Control Resonant
games.description: Explore a warped Manhattan on the brink of paranatural annihilation in this thrilling action-adventure RPG. Unleash the extraordinary powers of Dylan Faden as he fights for his humanity and survival against a reality-bending cosmic threat.

games.name: Huni Kuin: Beya Xinã Bena
games.description: A 2D platform game about the ancient stories of the Huni Kuin indigenous people, who live in the Brazilian Amazon. The entire game was produced in collaboration with the Huni Kuin communities of the Jordão river, in Acre.

games.name: Vampire Rancher
games.description: Rancher by day, Vampire by night. Manage your time and resources to restore your sleepy little town to its former glory, all while satisfying your vampire needs for blood. Oversee shops and saloons, farm crops and humans, and explore ancient vampiric ruins in the Weird Wild West!

games.name: Shark Rain
games.description: The very first Shark-Based Shooter game! Become a cute shark-girl and speed through water then emerge in human form and blast your enemies to oblivion! Nowhere will they be safe, not even on land!

games.name: Remorses
games.description: Learn terrifying witchcraft and investigate. Sanity? Open windows, or lose it.

games.name: Changer Seven
games.description: Fast-Paced Lane-Based Action Brawler. The legendary Changers 7 heroes must fight a new threat that changes the citizens of Sunny Point into terrifying beings! But as they investigate and defeat "villain of the week" like enemies, they suspect that someone from their own group may be behind it all.

games.name: The Last Grape
games.description: The Last Grape is a game about fruits, vegetables and vengeance. Slice through your enemies with speed and precision in this action, fast paced platform where you control a tiny grape in seek for revenge.

games.name: Robo Frenzy
games.description: Build and battle in Robo Frenzy! Create dozens of weapons and construct inventions to crush gigantic gadgets in a sandbox action game that blends crafting with combat.

games.name: Not Only Nine
games.description: A narrative turn-based RPG where the only fights are the bosses. Play as a cat and journey through the afterlife to save your human. Meet loveable characters and explore what it means to exist.

games.name: Mariachi Legends
games.description: Mariachi Legends is an action-packed mystery Metroidvania game. In Mariachi Legends, Join fantastical festivities at the Day of the Dead carnival alongside Detective Pablo Cruz, currently masquerading as a mariachi player to investigate an evil curse looming over the serene town of Santa Mascota.

games.name: No Stone Unturned
games.description: Hunt for clues, interrogate suspects and solve cases! No Stone Unturned is a dark-comedy noir detective game featuring multiple endings and choices that truly matter!

games.name: Football, Tactics & Glory: World
games.description: XCOM meets Football Manager. Embark on the career of an unknown coach: tactically outsmart opponents in turn-based matches, earn money and experience, search for talented players, manage a club, build your reputation to get invited to lead the national team, and win the World Championship!

games.name: SoulQuest
games.description: Carve your path through hordes of enemies, defying the gods to seize the power of Morrigan, Goddess of Death, and retrieve the soul of your beloved! SoulQuest combines the evergreen Metroidvania gameplay with the unique Celtic mythology into one, action-packed mixture!

games.name: Little Cheese Works
games.description: This is a cooperative action game where you have to carry cheese to the goal without being found by cats. You can have a conversation with voice chat, but the slightest noise will wake up the cat. Let's carry the cheese quietly by breathing quietly so that the cat won't find it!

games.name: Peacemaker: Bloody Emperor
games.description: A dark fantasy JRPG. The imperial princess Chrysoberyl must fight the Bloody Emperor who has usurped the throne. However, her army is small and her allies are conniving. It is a bloody war where she will have to choose between peace and lives...

games.name: Elemdian
games.description: RPG that combines exploration with magic combat. Unfurl your claws as a powerful werewolf warrior wielding the power of the Elegems! A journey to find the Elegems, unleash devastating spells, and unravel the mysteries of Morrok.

games.name: Rubinite
games.description: "Rubinite" is a dark fantasy boss rush action game that utilizes the unique mechanic "Focus" to pinpoint enemies' weaknesses and execute thrust attacks. Follow Ruby, a princess who has escaped from the Scarlet Kingdom, embarking on a journey of revenge to reclaim her kingdom.

games.name: Amp
games.description: Dive into the synesthetic world of Amp, the neon rail shooter set in a polygonal rhythmic universe.

games.name: Fantastic Haven
games.description: Restore the equilibrium of magic by saving endangered fantasy creatures. Build your shelter to welcome and protect them, explore unique regions, rally neighboring populations to your cause and rehabilitate creatures in their natural environment.

games.name: Soggy Beans
games.description: Fish will come, fish will go. Take photos, collect beans, decorate your seascape, then relax or do other things while your friends swim by in this calming side-idler.

games.name: Project Breakout
games.description: Project Breakout is a sandbox prison escape game, where you and up to three friends are put into a secured facility. Explore the area, train to improve your attributes and gather items, to craft tools that are necessary for your escape!

games.name: Mainland
games.description: Enter a cooperative medieval realm, forge alliances, lead armies, and engage in epic battles. Shape history with dynamic politics, or test your mettle against others in fierce player-vs-player combat.

games.name: Desktop Explorer
games.description:
Desktop Explorer is an exploration-puzzle game set in a retro-style operating system. Solve puzzles by interacting with built-in software features, immersing yourself into a realistic late 90’s computer experience.

The game follows a fairly innocent narrative as you progress through it’s puzzles. However it becomes clear to you that there is more than meets the eye with this machine, as you slowly see its familiar façade fade away in favor of a darker aesthetic..

games.name: Pight
games.description: Pight is a minimalist puzzle game inspired by the Minecraft redstone system, in which we try to turn on the light block by using piston blocks and different block types.

games.name: Map Map: A Game About Maps
games.description: Embark on a cozy treasure hunt as cartographer of an adventure crew. Use your sense of direction to make maps, help your companions and explore idyllic islands.

games.name: Tidebound
games.description: Tidebound is a fishing and inventory management game with a relaxing, casual atmosphere. Catch, sell, upgrade your boat, and sail further to catch more expensive and exotic sea animals. Casual yet engaging, the game offers a sense of progress with tons of equipment and hundreds of species to catch.

games.name: Wildsite
games.description: Crash-landed on an unknown planet filled with plasma and toxic weather. Your only hope? Bob, a sarcastic-genius AI who will question your every survival decision. Explore, build your mobile base and try to avoid death alongside up to 3 friends in Co-op.

games.name: Advaria: Chronicles of Immortality
games.description: Welcome, my Lord, to the cursed kingdom. A land plagued by black magic and creatures that crawl out of the darkness. Once this was a great kingdom. It could be great again. That's all up to you. Enter the world of Advaria - a hero defense game set in a world of fantasy and adventure.

games.name: Helix: Descent N Ascent
games.description: Helix is an adventure game taking place in a melancholic disembodied world. Combine your powers to solve puzzles and explore further and deeper.

games.name: Teeto
games.description: Teeto is a 3D adventure platformer where you play as a tiny blob and bunny duo on an extraordinary journey. Absorb objects from the world, harnessing their powers to fight the shadow corruption and help out a cast of crazy characters in an action packed adventure!

games.name: Silent Planet - Elegy of a Dying World
games.description: Silent Planet is an exploration-focused, dark action side-scroller rooted in Cosmic horror. Explore the claustrophobic corridors of a massive underground complex filled with the remnants of technological and biological horrors created by a dead civilization.

games.name: Emery Hearts
games.description: Immerse yourself in this thrilling action JRPG and uncover the secrets of Emery crystals as you face challenging enemies that will demand all your skill and ingenuity to defeat them.

games.name: Outbound
games.description: Build your own home on wheels and live sustainably off-grid. Craft workstations and power supplies, source energy from the sun, wind, or water, upgrade and customize your vehicle, grow crops, automate your production, and explore a colorful world.

games.name: Infinity Knights: Xross
games.description: A King and his Infinity Knights wield The Armaments - weapons capable of reviving slain enemies. Xross, the newest Infinity Knight, will embark on a life-changing adventure as he experiences both the thrill and dark reality of what it means to be eternal.

games.name: Delverium
games.description: Explore, Build, Farm, Craft and Fight in this vast procedurally generated survival adventure for up to 4 players. What you do is up to you, but the deeper you delve, the more you uncover the hidden truth. Could you be the hero to restore stability to the land and put an end to the invading "Faults"?

games.name: Head Chef
games.description: Head Chef is a restaurant management game. Supply the kitchen, select your staff, create a delicious menu and… cook! Make your guests happy and find your way to the stars. Keep control of your team and finances, because the higher you climb, the harder you fall.

games.name: Emblems: Sunless Vow
games.description: Can they stop arguing long enough to escape the void?! A Roguelike Visual Novel with QUICK turn-based combat and flexible difficulty. Calculate, power-up, and stack favors to The Heart's content... Or take on a narrative campaign filled with Mystery + Drama + Shenanigans.

games.name: LlamaRPG: Farm to Fable
games.description: A turn-based combat RPG following a llama traveling around the world trying to be a hero. Full of great itemization, crafting, story, hat collecting, and more.

games.name: One Fenix Down
games.description: A retro-inspired, classic turn-based RPG for those with nostalgia for the '90s golden era. Explore a vast world with 14 playable characters, fight hundreds of unique enemies, and delve into an epic story of war, betrayal, and redemption.

games.name: Zerra's Adventure
games.description: Zerra's Adventure is a classic turn-based RPG with no random encounters. Explore diverse areas, collect items and treasures to improve your team and defeat the strangest enemies. Level up, learn new attacks, and meet quirky characters on your adventure!

games.name: Lost in the Roots
games.description: A 2D adventure with a twisted story about guilt, where a girl is kidnapped and held in an attic somewhere in the countryside. Why and who took the girl to this godforsaken place? What to do when there is nowhere to run?

games.name: Feline Forensics and the Meowseum Mystery
games.description: There's only one detective to unravel this murder turned museum heist... and they're the cat's meow. Interrogate a "colorful" cast of suspects until they cough up hairballs... and the truth. Will you wrap up the case in time for an afternoon nap, and make injustice knead its last biscuit?

games.name: Prelude Dark Pain
games.description: Prelude Dark Pain is a Tactical RPG set in a dark fantasy world. Assume the role of a local blacksmith named Soren, lead an uprising against the Order of the Ash Crusade and save a world ravaged by war.

games.name: Coding Day
games.description: In "Coding Day", you are a videogame developer whose project is about to be released, but a sinister entity threatens its publication, and you must survive it throughout the night in a dark office building full of mysteries and dangers.

games.name: Aokaki
games.description: Aokaki is a fast-paced 2D platformer where you play as an isopod ronin. Explore fun and challenging levels while battling against the forces of the evil Shogun in this bug inhabited pixelart world.

games.name: Lifted
games.description:
Step into the Anytime Elevator and get LIFTED — a cinematic single-player 2.5D puzzle-platform adventure from a former Disney ride designer.

Slacker Ari Buktu only pokes his head into Professor Raventhorpe’s lab for extra credit; seconds later he’s hurtling through history on a reckless mission to steal a legendary tiara and fix the professor’s love-life. Each stop opens a new era, a bigger puzzle, and the shadow of a rival tomb-raider who’s always one jump behind…

games.name: Shoe it All!
games.description: Swing, fling, and cause chaos with your shoes in this physics-based mayhem. Discover secrets, unlock bonus levels, customize your look, and fill your journal with shiny stickers. Master the perfect throw and SHOE IT ALL!

games.name: Pinball Hero
games.description: In this game the pinball IS the hero! Ascend from the Goblin Caves, to the Perilous Plains and defeat the evil wizard in the Hallowed Castle to reclaim your adventurer spirit! Battle slimes, skeletons, goblins, ghouls, and other fantasy creatures in the retro-inspired reimagining of Pinball.

games.name: Barbarization
games.description: Barbarization is a roguelite dungeon crawler with elements of bullet hell, deck building and strategy. Civilization fell to the dark legions now swarming this land. From the ruins of what is left, unlikely heroes emerge to reclaim it from the scourge.

games.name: Neo Ha_Bits
games.description: Neo Ha_Bits plunges players into a chilling journey of psychological horror and mystery within a cyberpunk setting.

games.name: Cardinal Descent
games.description: Cardinal Descent is a card building roguelike where you craft elemental synergies and find game breaking sticker combos.

games.name: Escape of The Hammer Princess
games.description: A retro-styled rampage in both 3D and 2D! After years of waiting to be rescued, the Princess has decided to rescue herself. Escape as the princess in exciting retro-styled 3D, and relive the deaths of her would-be rescuers in classic 8-bit 2D! Bash some Skulls, Break Stuff, and Rise as a Legend!

games.name: Mightreya
games.description: Join schoolgirl superhero Reya and her manager Nio as they embark on their journey as Hero Content Creators, fighting monstrous beings that emerge daily from a dimension beyond. Anime-inspired, heart-pounding hero action is waiting for you!

games.name: Oceaneers
games.description: A raft-crafting survival management adventure set on sinkable islands. Control a group of survivors to scavenge, harvest and craft your way to an island colony! Build expedition rafts, research contraptions to keep islands afloat, and create your own floating settlement. CRAFT, FLOAT, SURVIVE!

games.name: Swan Song
games.description: Swan Song is a cozy and emotional puzzle game where music guides your journey. Use notes of different shapes and sizes to program a music box and solve each puzzle. Help the swan reach the exit as you uncover a touching story of family, loss and grief.

games.name: Coring
games.description: Coring is a fast-paced, turn-based strategy game with rogue-like elements. Play as Pruner 'III', a reborn entity tasked with severing abnormal branches to protect the World Tree. Piece together memories to uncover the truth of your endless rebirth.

games.name: Ogora
games.description: Ogora is a fantasy roguelike deck-builder where you will craft powerful decks, cast unwieldy spells, and blow up your own path through a procedurally generated dungeon. Adorn yourself with hidden trinkets and try to survive!

games.name: Deserter
games.description: In this stealth RPG, you play as a deserter who is forced to become a thief in a grim, war-torn town. You'll have access to a rich arsenal of tools and devices: from lock picks and crowbars to grappling hooks and dynamite. Additionally, take advantage of your surroundings: find or create alternate routes, stick to the shadows, stay quiet, or use loud noises to cause distraction.

games.name: MineGeon: Renegades
games.description: Descend into Planet Paimo in MineGeon: Renegades, a chaotic multiplayer roguelite where you choose your renegade, delve into the minegeons, and battle unique enemies across diverse biomes. Fight, gather, improve, and die to uncover the secrets of Paimo and New Olympia.

games.name: Scourge of the Reptiles
games.description: Scourge of the Reptiles is a party-based tactical RPG set in a prehistoric fantasy world. When a meteor strikes the Earth, humans, elves and dinosaurs alike are gifted with magical abilities—abilities that result in war, devastation and forces that stretch far beyond the hero’s quiet home village.

games.name: Just A Shadow Game
games.description: Hear me, pitiful mortals, for I shall reveal to you the path to true power - a demonic fusion of deckbuilding, ritual duels, and roguelite! I speak of a realm shrouded in darkness, where only the most wicked may thrive. Behold my masterpiece, "Just A Shadow Game".

games.name: Piñata Puppy World
games.description: Piñata Puppy World is a 2000’s nostalgia driven explorative campaign game with a dramatic and surreal storyline disguised within the genre of “Mascot Horror”.

games.name: Eldritch Escape
games.description:
In this roguelike bullet-heaven, Earth has been consumed by an ancient eldritch god. Form a customizable squad of survivors and explore decaying, metroidvania-inspired worlds trapped within the god’s belly. Battle endless waves of nightmarish creatures, extract resources, rescue survivors, uncover forbidden knowledge, and search for a way out.

Portals powered by ancient eldritch forces link worlds and realities, forming a tangled web. With a limited oxygen supply, your squad has just 20 minutes to navigate the portal network, jumping from world to world in search of the one escape route. Can you escape the void in time?

games.name: Your Crown Is Mine
games.description: Take the throne and fix the corrupt kingdom— or worsen it! A villainess life sim and visual novel where you balance your stats and romance rival nations' leaders for foreign policy purposes. How will you rule the country?

games.name: Operation Zero
games.description: Grab your biggest gun and jump into this story-driven top-down run-and-gun sci-fi arcade shooter starring the ultimate bio-engineered hero-manchild TASKILLER!

games.name: Hotel Tales
games.description: Hotel Tales is a mystery hotel manager set in the crossroads between worlds. Dive into the amazing, frightening and funny stories of guests and colleagues, discover the hotel's secrets and try to survive at least to the end of your probationary period!

games.name: Deforb
games.description: Deforb is a roguelite top-down shooter game where a mad orb defends its tower using up to four melee guns, a long-range gun, and strategically placed turrets. Upgrade your skills and craft powerful builds to survive relentless waves of enemies.

games.name: Rock Island
games.description: Explore the mystery of the mysterious cube at the center of Boulder Island, dig out endless treasures, wake up the sleeping little boulder people, and lead them to create prosperity!

games.name: Death In Your Dice
games.description: Can you outwit fate when your turn comes? From now on, all you care about is the game of dice and its consequences. Observe, investigate, act, defend yourself. Time is ticking away, but death will not wait.

games.name: Castlebound
games.description: Lead a band of heroes in a walking castle to battle endless hordes of enemies in this unique action-packed roguelike!

games.name: Hallow Maze
games.description: Hallow Maze is an epic action adventure through an intricate world submerged in war. Explore twisting caves, enormous palaces, battle unhuman horrors and help those in need, in a gothic hand painted 2.5D artstyle.

games.name: Kamilia
games.description:
Kamilia is an emotional, story-driven detective mystery where your choices shape the outcome.

Step into the shoes of a gifted painter, pulled into an unsolved mystery. An investigation that soon turns into something far deeper — an intimate, heartfelt search for truth.

Explore a beautifully crafted narrative blending mystery, emotion, and visual storytelling into a unique, choice-driven experience.

games.name: Lootbound
games.description: Lootbound is a tactical loot management roguelike where you start solo and assemble your party as you go. Choose routes, risks, rewards, equip heroes and companions, and create a build to challenge the final boss. Turn-based combat, calculated risk, equipment synergies, and honest difficulty.

games.name: Abyss Ring
games.description: Survive, cook, and conquer the depths! In this survival roguelike, cook monsters to stave off hunger through 100 floors of dungeons. With over 200 equipment and randomly generated dungeon, every playthrough offers fresh challenges and endless possibilities.

games.name: Bookbinding
games.description: Try on the role of a bookbinder in a magic world with strict social hierarchy. Design book covers, uncover your customers' secrets, and shape their destinies, but remember: everything comes at a price!

games.name: Aurora Polaris
games.description: Aurora Polaris is a vertical shoot 'em up set in a post-pandemic future where a mysterious old engineer brings together four unlikely pilots to stop a technocratic regime known as NOX. Blending arcade action, anime-inspired visuals, and heartfelt narrative, players engage in intense boss fights, upgrade their ships, and explore handcrafted stages across a frozen Earth. Featuring local co-op, emotional cutscenes, and a unique sci-fi take on holiday mythology.

games.name: Sucks To Be In The Sticks
games.description: An interview with a vampire from a decaying post-Soviet town. A cursed life simulator: scrub floors, brew moonshine, follow strange routines - and drink blood as your sanity unravels. The world is broken. Can you find out why?

games.name: Buckle Up
games.description: Buckle Up! is a chaotic 2–6 player party shooter where every round is a new mess. Battle friends across fast-paced gamemodes, upgrade weapons, fight to grab the most points, and show off your style with fun character customization.

games.name: The Devil's Due
games.description: You lost your soul in a poker game against the Devil. Now, trapped in the infernal depths, your only hope is to fight your way back to freedom. You’ll face a diverse gallery of monstrous foes in nearly impossible poker battles - but luckily, you’re a cheater.

games.name: Ice Cream Simulator
games.description: Run your dream ice cream shop and serve delicious treats from around the world! Craft Thai Rolls, Matka Kulfi, Mochi, cones, and more. Craft traditional recipes or use modern machines. Customize your shop, create a unique menu, hire staff, and keep customers happy as you build your ice cream empire!

games.name: Retro Rewind: Video Store Simulator
games.description: Manage your very own video store in the early 90s! Rent, sell, decorate and expand your business from the ground up and relive the golden ages of video rentals!

games.name: Terradune
games.description: Terradune is a hand-drawn 2D action RPG where you battle monsters, discover hidden treasures, and shape your hero’s fate. Explore scorching deserts, moonlit forests, and thrilling dungeons to uncover secrets in this fast-paced, immersive adventure.

games.name: Lucipurr
games.description: Lucipurr is a multiplayer horror game. Players(1-5) try to disrupt a cult’s ritual aimed at harnessing the captivating power of cats. Meanwhile, another player controls a demonic cat and hunts them down.

games.name: Prism Warriors DX
games.description: The Prism Warriors return for another helping of retro-styled bullet hell action. Face off against the sinister Twilight Four, and fight to save more than just your friends...

games.name: Oddli: A Satisfying Game
games.description: ODDLI is a casual puzzle game about creating satisfying loops. Solve moving puzzles where the only obstacle is your past self. Reach the goal with your character, avoid your previous movements and watch it repeat your path. Continue reaching goals, while creating mesmerizing choreographies!

games.name: Cleaner Company
games.description: You have officially joined the elite team of "Star Wipers"! Your mission? Cleaning! Alongside your trusted crew, you will embark on exciting expeditions to abandoned space stations, ruined restaurants in the cosmos, and unexplored planets.

games.name: Grim Trials
games.description: Prove your worth. Hack and blast your way through the Grim Trials. Explore the (after)life of the Academy – a training ground for aspiring Grim Reapers. Befriend fellow Reapers, learn from your mentors, and uncover the secrets of your life and love before your death.

games.name: A Heavy Morning
games.description: You know the feeling of struggling to get out of bed? In A Heavy Morning, you will play as a young girl battling with her own mind. Your only objective? Get out of bed and get to work on time.

games.name: Innocence Rewrite
games.description: "Innocence Rewrite" captures the summer before and after the college entrance exam.As old bonds mend and distant feelings return, it's a season of healing amid chaos.No need for correction fluid — just feel, and slowly rewrite the innocence of youth.

games.name: Arca
games.description: News of the Great Flood has reached the South Pole, and rumor has it there's an Ark ready to help... but only one spot per species! Jump, slide, and sabotage your rivals as you race against time to secure your place. It's every penguin for itself and the world against them all!

games.name: Spacerocks
games.description: Mine asteroids, find rare loot, upgrade & modify your ship, build space factories, and destroy your enemies in this next-level space shooter. Just... One... More... Asteroid...

games.name: Broth Bounty
games.description: Broth Bounty is a fast-paced 2D shooter inspired by classic lightgun games. Blast ingredients into a bubbling pot, dodge hazards, and adapt to roguelite challenges as you cook your way to culinary victory!

games.name: Servant of the Lake
games.description: Servant of the Lake is the new premium point-and-click adventure in the Rusty Lake series from the creators of the Cube Escape series, The Past Within and Underground Blossom.

games.name: Soulforge: Lost Path
games.description: In Soulforge: Lost Path (Survivors-like), become a legendary hunter slaughtering endless Corrupted Souls. Scavenge Sacred Remains to forge Exorcist Artefacts, manage limited inventory strategically, and uncover the world's festering corruption truth.

games.name: Death Kitchen
games.description: Death Kitchen is an immersive fast-paced co-op cooking horror game. You must coordinate with your friends to serve alien customers who can kill you in many situations. You can morph into a variety of characters! Embrace the chaos and deliver quality with your new intergalactic restaurant chain.

games.name: Agefield High: Rock the School
games.description: Relive your High School days in the town of Agefield. It’s the early 2000s and you have three months left at school. So REBEL with your friends, win over your dream girl and ROCK the school!

games.name: Road Truckers: New Beginning
games.description:
Live a trucker’s life in the first trucking sim RPG. Explore villages, cities and wilderness in a fully customizable truck. Get on-foot to eat, sleep, and help people along the way. Your goal: to bring back prosperity in your region. Drive, grow, and inspire!

Experience trucking on a new level: by driving and interacting with the world around you. Make your truck unique by customizing it mechanically and visually, inside and outside. Meet people and decide how to approach them. Enjoy the beautiful scenery in different weather conditions. But most of all, see the change you’re making by supporting the economy.

games.name: The Shores of Stellaluna
games.description: Sail a fractured world. Battle through dangerous dungeons, Stack powerful abilities, Rebuild cities, Manage trade, Survive ever-changing islands to gather lumen, get more powerful and shape the fate of a broken world in this first person craft and build focused RPG with a strong storyline.

games.name: Woodrot
games.description: You're the maintenance man for an apartment complex that has mysteriously been transported to the middle of the ocean. Woodrot is a surreal adventure game about getting to know your neighbors who all seem to blame themselves for their recent relocation.

games.name: Shutter Story
games.description: Your friend is convinced his house is haunted. Examine his family's photo album to reveal signs of the paranormal, as the horror unfolds in the house around you. Their fate is in your hands.

games.name: Papa Needs a Headshot
games.description: Papa Needs a Headshot is a brutal western-steampunk FPS soaked in kin blood. Rip through flesh and bend the battlefield with your cursed metal arm. Use every bullet wisely to slaughter freaks and abominations on your warpath. Keep enduring only to put a bullet in the skull of the man who made you.

games.name: Talewarden: Riders of the New Day
games.description: Talewarden is a weird west adventure visual novel. Restore time on a planet where the sun never sets as you explore locations, talk, romance, and bond with your companions. Find the source of the voice in your head and discover why you all fell here from different worlds.

games.name: Golden Gambit
games.description: Spin. Gamble. Conquer the Machine. Golden Gambit is a slot machine roguelite where every choice is a gamble. Build insane combos, unlock risky modifiers, and push your luck to the limit… or crash and burn trying. Use unique powers with each slot machine to win the Golden Gambit.

games.name: Covenant 21
games.description: Defeat the Covenant, round after round, using the mechanics of Black Jack and help yourself with powerful power-ups.

games.name: Cubex
games.description: Cubex is a horror escape room game in first person, collaborative (or not) for up to 4 players, where your objective will be to find the exit of a giant cube.

games.name: Denshattack!
games.description: Flip, trick and grind your train in a fast-paced, off-the-rails ride through a colourful Japanese dystopia. Outmatch rival gangs, wreck a shady megacorp, and take back the tracks with nothing but skill, speed, and style.

games.name: Combat Train TD
games.description: This is a tower-defense roguelike strategy game centered around combat trains. Select a suitable base, carefully plan orbital routes, upgrade your combat trains, create an unique build, and then defeat the endless waves of monsters.

games.name: Everything Is Crab
games.description: The Animal Evolution roguelite. Hunt, Flee, Scavenge & Thrive in a living ecosystem. Choose from over 100 mutations to evolve your creature in countless ways with every run. Adapt to survive the natural curve in order to beat carcinisation... or get Darwin'd trying!

games.name: We Need an Army
games.description: We Need An Army is a fantasy roguelike grid based deck builder about recruiting a powerful army! Recruit units, match patterns, and upgrade your grid in this tactical roguelike slots-based deckbuilder.

games.name: Plinkidle
games.description: Falling balls, rare buffs, and steady upgrades unlock colorful, cozy stages and immersive environments.

games.name: Hollow Stories: Lockdown
games.description: A neo-retro survival horror noir game where you explore, solve puzzles, and fight to survive in a city ruled by corruption and cults.

games.name: Hero of Sunset
games.description: Venture into this retro pixel art action-adventure with an open world. Explore, fight, solve puzzles, challenge bosses — and, most importantly, you can romance the cute girls!

games.name: Augment Anthem
games.description: Battle deadly enemies and bosses, unlock alien technology, bring humanity back from the brink in this retro style open world platformer!

games.name: Dino Citadel
games.description: Command a castle-on-a-dino through a corrupted world. Rescue fallen allies, lead them in battle, and build your deck. Manage your economy to draw cards and confront the Voidrift in this tactical roguelike deckbuilder.

games.name: Operation Highjump: The Fall of Berlin
games.description: In the last days of World War II, lead a suicide mission to hunt down the enemy leaders, steal their experimental technology and recover the art pieces and relics. A combination of frenetic action, tactical missions and an explosive run & gun platforming adventure.

games.name: Destiny Is Dice
games.description: The knight ‘Ail’ awoke in a dungeon where everything is decided by dice. Right beside ‘Grin’, witch who can manipulate every die. With this witch's help, ‘Ail’ heads toward the dungeon. To rescue someone trapped within it. Roll, manipulate, and change fate in turn-based roguelike. ‘Destiny Is Dice’.

games.name: Mazebound: Hunt, Gather, Run!
games.description: In this survival horror, you're surrounded by sea and a towering gate ahead. Walk into the maze, hunt, gather, and run to survive, alone or with friends. Remember: You're not the only one starving...

games.name: Breath of the Pasture
games.description: A heartfelt life-sim about love, land, and the magic of the countryside. Compose your very own pastoral symphony— Listen to the rain as it falls. Chase the breeze on sunny days. Watch crops reach for the sky. Let your cows and sheep rest in peace. Fall in love. Grow a farm. That is THE GAME!

games.name: Golden Swirl
games.description: GOLDEN SWIRL is a Roguelike Deck Builder blending fast-paced action with strategic card play in a dark fantasy world. Journey through shifting dungeons, uncover swirl secrets, and adapt to challenges with unique cards, relics, and a depravity system.

games.name: Forsaken Lands
games.description: Brave heroes unite to challenge the gods themselves and decide the fate of the world! Dive into an epic roguelite deckbuilder adventure. Gather your friends and take on divine foes together in thrilling online co-op battles!

games.name: Cheat Death
games.description: Cheat Death is a horror rogue-lite game where you gamble with the Grim Reaper. The dice are loaded, the deck is stacked against you, and the only way to win is to CHEAT. Use cards, dice, and every trick in the book to survive this high-stakes encounter.

games.name: Gloom Punks
games.description: Not your average co-op roguelike. Where the price for power is death, and you’re trapped in a gloom-scape of fever dreams and fairytales gone feral, you can only rely on Punks like yourself. Cheat death, bounce back, and take on a world that so badly wants you dead!

games.name: Nocturnal Visitors: Book One
games.description: Discover a world where magic and science, chaos and order, are two sides of the same coin.

games.name: Ruin: Beast City
games.description: Assassinate your targets with style, as you uncover a plot of world domination and ancient horrors in this boss fight action game. Dive deep into the dark ruins of the Beast City, where only lunatic killers remain.

games.name: Scopecreep
games.description: A whispering flame craves souls. With each offering, your resolve strengthens. Fight spirits, collect their essences, and feed a hunger that may never subside in this short active incremental.

games.name: Slime Tales
games.description: Embark on a pixel-art roguelite adventure as a brave little slime exploring a mysterious dungeon beneath a sorcerer’s castle. Battle deadly foes, uncover ancient secrets, and power up with loot and upgrades—solo or with friends!

games.name: Airport Baggage Simulator
games.description: Inspect and sort baggage at the airport! Check suitcases for illegal contents, weight, and destination. Build your own fully automated baggage handling and optimize your terminal's efficiency for maximum profit!

games.name: Mobile Phone Shop Simulator
games.description: Build and manage your own mobile phone shop! Buy, sell and expand your business in this detailed simulation game. Balance profits, manage your team, and become the best shop in town.

games.name: Chihuahua Controller
games.description: Help the Chihuahua reach the flag with the Chihuahua Controller! Controlling the Chihuahua will become increasingly difficult! How many flags can you collect?

games.name: Ultra Damage
games.description: Ultra Damage is a hand-drawn Boomer Shooter packed with humor and action, featuring hand-crafted visuals and a story blending gritty detective work with absurd comedy. Each level is a wild ride. Unravel the mystery, find hidden clues, and deal ultra damage to save humanity!

games.name: Crush the Rebellion!
games.description: The galactic empire is under siege from the rebel scum in all directions! Fight through endless waves of rebel ships using all of the weapons and resources at your disposal as you execute your sole orders: to Crush The Rebellion!

games.name: Push Through Hell
games.description: Survival roguelite, where endless waves of monsters and enemies try to stop you from completing your objective. Choose your character, find upgrades and defeat bosses. Will you be able to move The Core all the way to the end, or will you die trying?

games.name: The Shadow Cosmos
games.description: A 3D metroidvania with retro aesthetic. As master peacock, delve into a mysterious, dream-like world with non-linear exploration and progression, stylish and challenging fights with a powerful halberd, tricky parkour and puzzles. Collect shadows, unleash darkness.

games.name: Tiny: The Last Wayfinder
games.description: A wholesome adventure through an oversized world. Explore freely, solve puzzles, and unlock new paths using magic, tools, and traversal abilities in this calm, atmospheric world filled with secrets, story, and gentle creatures.

games.name: Don't Feed the Cat
games.description: You’re stuck in a time loop from 10 PM to 6 AM inside a dark apartment. Survive the nights, uncover the truth, and whatever you do… don’t feed the cat.

games.name: Glisynth
games.description: Glisynth is a rhythm game that uses two types of notes. The Q row on the keyboard is used for yellow notes, while the A row is used for white notes.

games.name: Shelf Life
games.description: Solve your supervisor's deadly task sequence to survive, but be warned: every wrong guess makes the store a more monstrous labyrinth. Unravel the horrific code and finally clock out, or be a permanent employee.

games.name: Twilight Protocol
games.description: Twilight Protocol is an atmospheric detective horror about an employee who becomes trapped in a corporate mystery. Explore the city, gather clues, talk to locals and colleagues, and uncover the truth hidden beneath the surface.

games.name: GU Fighters
games.description: GU Fighters is an action roguelike where you unlock and upgrade new abilities after every round of combat. Play with up to 4 players locally or online to create your own unique build and be the first to win, or go solo/co-op to traverse varying environments and defeat hordes of enemies.

games.name: Pair-A-Dice
games.description: Decide your fate with a game of Pair-A-Dice. A strategic fight to relinquish your cards with dice that match, while Navigating a strange world with even stranger inhabitants. Despite what they claim, no one seems to play fair. Will you?

games.name: Skinwalker: First Blood
games.description: Skinwalker is a hack n’ slash action platformer where you swear allegiance to a formidable beast to save your daughter from a terminal illness. Shapeshift into the creature’s monstrous form and wield untamed wrath in exchange for its freedom and the promise of a cure.

games.name: Under Heaven or Hell
games.description:
You wake up in Hell with no memory of how you got there, and no clear way out.

To return home, you will have to survive the brutal politics of this realm and forge alliances with two dangerous devils and an enigmatic angel, each with their own secrets, and temptations that may pull you closer.

Will you escape with your soul intact, or will your path become forever tied to those who linger within the flames?

Your choices will shape your fate, and perhaps, the fate of Hell itself.

games.name: Karate Rogue
games.description: A fusion of martial arts and roguelike dungeon crawling—build your fighter, master lethal techniques, and conquer the abyss with your fists alone. Strike. Survive. Evolve.

games.name: PiPu Party
games.description: PiPu Party is a chaotic party puzzle-platformer game with a shared 3-slot symbol backpack. Pick and put symbols to alter the level. Co-op or outsmart your friends.

games.name: Parcel Delivery Simulator
games.description: You've landed a job at a courier company, but your boss has to leave town. Now you're the boss. Deliver packages, sign new contracts, expand your office, buy new vehicles. Hire employees, set up parcel lockers around town, and create the most profitable courier company in the world. Simulation game.

games.name: Guilty Pleasures
games.description: You are Marcus Holmes, a young private detective and nephew of the legendary detective Arthur Holmes, known among the elite as the “Detective of Passion” — a man who uncovered the intimate secrets of the rich and famous: affairs, love triangles, model disappearances, scandals in high society.

games.name: Abyssal Anarchy
games.description: A fast-paced co-op spell-hell where each map pulls you deeper into the Abyss. Choose from 5 heroes and 14 spells, unlock upgrades, and survive alone or with friends as the magic grows wilder with every descent.

games.name: Imagine Future
games.description: "Imagine Future" is a Visual Novel with a campus theme. You will follow the perspective of the protagonist Ji Wang, experience the life of a high school student. The final examination seemed so far away. one day, it was close at hand. Standing at the crossroads of life, what choice will you make?

games.name: Erosion
games.description: Your daughter's been kidnapped. Every death costs you a decade. Explore a roguelike open world where your actions reshape the timeline. Join a cult, steal a ride, gamble Cheddar. Collect 100+ weapons and abilities, demolish destructible voxel dungeons. Can you save her before time steals her away?

games.name: Timberflow: Sawmill Simulator
games.description: From a single tree to an entire industry! Manage and automate your lumber business in this relaxing, yet challenging Sawmill Simulator. Start small, grow rich, dominate the market.

games.name: Deck of Harvest
games.description: Within a seasonal journey of harvest, plan limited fields, plant diverse seeds, reap bountiful crops, and amass wealth. Don't forget to manage your warehouse, select powerful treasures to build your deck, and become the ultimate farmer. Are you ready for this strategic challenge?

games.name: Fallosophy
games.description: Use just two buttons to climb a colossal pinball table spanning the history of western philosophy. Fallosophy is a minimalist game that turns pinball into a quiet struggle against gravity. No score. No tilts. No savers. Falling down means climbing back up again. Why climb? What does it all mean?

games.name: Shield of Breaker
games.description: Shield of Breaker is a single-player Action-RPG set in a fantasy world. Protect your castle from endless waves of enemies and turn the tide of battle by deflecting their own blazing fireballs. Choose your hero, upgrade your powers,. Each victory unlocks your path to defend new lands in your realm.

games.name: Rift Fishing
games.description: Rift Fishing is a multiplayer chatroom-focused fishing game. Fish through rifts into other worlds to catch mysterious creatures and artifacts. Make friends worldwide, paint together, and jam by the cozy campfire.

games.name: Time Travel Train
games.description: Time Travel Train is a roguelite incremental game about commanding a weaponized locomotive through history. Battle enemies, and upgrade your train to become an unstoppable force. Your train never stops moving. Keep it fueled, destroy everything in your path, and collect scrap from the wreckage.

games.name: FamCram
games.description: FamCram is a 3D grid-based puzzle game about two dads putting their kids to bed. Guide the children through increasingly challenging and multicultural settings, each with unique items, mechanics, and humor.

games.name: TankRat
games.description: A dying world, flesh given way to steel. Swarms of corrupted mech-monsters roam a desolated land. Search and destroy, scavenge and dismantle, rebuild yourself from the wreckage. What you take becomes what you are. Survive the wasteland. Make it to Highpoint.

games.name: Ephemeral Frame
games.description: Step inside picture frames, films, and other imagery that connect a variety of dreamscapes in this surreal first-person exploration game.

games.name: Orbital Chaos
games.description: A physics-based bullet hell that's all about gravity - with you as the center of it!

games.name: Inferno Protocol
games.description: Trapped in a deadly labyrinth, you and 5 friends must scavenge, craft, and survive. Harvest monster parts for gear, inject experimental syringes to gain unique skills, and navigate trap-filled corridors. In this 6-player horror survival, you must evolve to escape.

games.name: Rewindead
games.description: Rewindead is a single-player, third-person shooter about contract killing in time loops. Assassinate your target, rewind time, then eliminate your past selves before they complete the hit.

games.name: Drop and Grow
games.description: A short incremental clicker about dropping water to grow plants. Sit back and relax while you grow more and more plants.

games.name: Neighbor Master
games.description: Your neighbor just bought a SPORTS CAR. You? You're broke. But you have a shovel and a backyard full of... opportunity. Dig, melt, and bottle snow to build a "Premium Glacier Water" empire. Send in the drones, upgrade your gear, and save up for a ride that will make his car look like a cheap toy.

games.name: Func Key
games.description: Deck out your keyboard with powerful upgrades in this roguelike word-builder. Snap on keycaps to buff entire rows or columns, install "broken" function keys, and pick your projects as you rise from a lowly intern to a corporate legend.

games.name: Tiny House Finds
games.description: Search inside and around cozy 3D houses, floor by floor, in a relaxing 3D hidden object game full of tiny details.

games.name: Dead Rush
games.description: Dead Rush is an FPS arcade shooter that combines fast-paced action, stylized visuals, and relentless waves of zombies. Choose your weapon, fight with friends, and see how long you can survive.

games.name: Frontier: Path of Shadows
games.description: Fight enemies, upgrade your squad, and explore new planets! Make tough choices and shape the fate of an entire sector in Frontier: Path of Shadows. Experience a richly crafted 25th-century world and tactical combat where X-COM meets Final Fantasy.

games.name: Biovoid
games.description: Biovoid is a creature-building roguelike game that tests your creativity. As a fragile hatchling alone in the abyss, your only objective is to consume and adapt. Will you survive the perils that await and evolve to the top of this alien foodchain?

games.name: Taking Today Off
games.description: Taking Today Off is a light-hearted roguelike deck-builder about managing modern life states. Draw cards, place them on the board, add stickers and tools, and build playful combos. Easy to learn, with fresh choices and strategies every run.

games.name: Pearls of Wisdom
games.description: A rogue-like mindfulness deck builder with real-world side quests. The game involves matching quotes, using power-ups ('emblems'), and undertaking mindfulness tasks to increase the score.

games.name: River Runners
games.description: River Runners is a cooperative multiplayer adventure where you and your friends navigate a dangerous, unpredictable river. Clear communication and teamwork are essential to steer the raft, overcome hidden challenges, and survive the journey to the end.

games.name: Glitchia
games.description: GLiTCHiA is an adventure that blends a 2D retro game with a 3D horror space Keep an eye on the door behind you, then use gimmicks and glitches to find what matters as you explore a lost series. Uncover why the ending went wrong, and save the game’s protagonist, Aby.

games.name: Fall of the Final Age
games.description: Take command of the last Stronghold of humanity, fighting back against the advancing monsters. Decide where to prioritize the forces of your Heroes, as the number of turns before the invasion is limited. A turn-based tactical strategy with RPG and roguelike elements.

games.name: Hell Forge
games.description: Hell Forge is a retro roguelite survivor where you battle endless monsters to mine souls for the ultimate gamble. Locate the Hell Forge on the map and risk your resources in a high-stakes lottery system to craft Legendary gear.

games.name: Violet Impetus
games.description: Violet Impetus is a bullet-hell arcade melee 'em up set in a series of (lightly) procedurally-generated arenas. Drop into different biomes to rid the world of Æris—the demiurge, petrificate & fractured. Its other children just won't see things eye to eye.

games.name: Coinsweeper
