games.description: Coinsweeper is a roguelite that combines classic Minesweeper with risk management, deck-building and gambling mechanics. It is a round-based progression game with permanent meta-upgrades.

games.name: HyperRouter
games.description: A fast-paced, mind-melting, reality-twisting 3D platformer for the digital age. You are a Router, running files to every corner of the internet while a reactive soundtrack accentuates your every leap. Learn to traverse the unfathomable geometries of an untamed Netspace, and NEVER. SLOW. DOWN.

games.name: Stardust: Wish of Witch
games.description: STARDUST: Wish of Witch is a single-player SRPG beautifully crafted in pixel art. Follow the secret of the wish-granting star and join the adventure of the girl “Star” and the mage “Yu”.

games.name: Orbital
games.description: Explore the cosmos, discover new worlds, and seed life across the stars in ORBITAL, a relaxing 2D space exploration and colony sim. Guide the growth of your civilizations through rich, narrative-driven events where your choices shape their future. A cozy journey to the farthest reaches of space.

games.name: Little Woody
games.description: Little Woody is a 2D point-and-click puzzle adventure where you guide a small wooden soul through a mysterious world of shifting environments. Meet unusual companions along the way, solve handcrafted logic puzzles, explore atmospheric locations and uncover a forgotten past.

games.name: Kiln
games.description: An online, multiplayer, pottery party brawler from Double Fine Productions. Grab your friends to assemble a team of colorful spirits, then sculpt ceramic battle armor on a pottery wheel. The size and shape of your pots determine their play-style and abilities—work together to douse the enemy's kiln!

games.name: Adventurers Shop
games.description: Forge your legacy as both merchant and hero. Explore Zoldar, battle monsters for rare materials, and craft epic gear. Team up with friends to build a thriving shop in the village markets or arm yourselves to conquer the dangerous depths of the wild.

games.name: AstroDiner Manager
games.description: It is a fast-paced diner sim set on an asteroid where you serve alien customers, upgrade your restaurant, and uncover the mystery hidden beneath.

games.name: Something to Drink?
games.description: I'm Tom and I just got a job as a bartender. Now I have to wipe down the same sticky counters where I used to leave my own marks. In this dive, even the rats look like they're hungover. Alright, the boozers won't pour their own drinks - time to get back to work.

games.name: Echoes From Ciudadela
games.description:
Echoes from Ciudadela is a first-person adventure and puzzle-solving game focused on exploration, environmental storytelling, and narrative discovery. You play as Katari, who follows the trail of his recently dead father after uncovering his journal, that leads him to a sealed mountain known as Ciudadela.

Throughout the journey, your main artifact is a Balearic sling, a tool tied to both the environment and the forgotten technologies hidden within the mountain. As you dive deeper and solve puzzles, you’ll unlock journal entries left behind by Katari’s father. Each revealing pieces of a lost civilization and their connection to time, invention, and legacy.

games.name: Tom Lander: The Exiled King
games.description: Pilot wacky aerial vehicles with QWOP-inspired controls through colorful retro-futuristic levels. Struggle to stay airborne while performing deliveries, rescues, firefighting missions, bombing runs, and chaotic dogfights. This game will remind you that flying is hard, but landing is harder.

games.name: Guildamation
games.description: Guildamation is an Idle AutoBattling RPG that let's you build an automate a guild.

games.name: Dino Time Raiders
games.description: Travel back in time to capture dinosaurs and turn them into profit! Lead a team of scientists through chaotic time-travel missions, catch prehistoric beasts, and build the ultimate dino park. Manage research, upgrades, and disasters - all in the name of science and the free market.

games.name: NebulArena
games.description:
Nebularena immerses you in futuristic PvP battles on space platforms, completely automated through your strategy. You will create the ultimate ship that will confront the constructions of other players in deathmatches where anything goes...

Build, customize, and unleash your ultimate space platform in NebulArena, a fast-paced, fully automated PvP arena where strategy, design, and destruction collide!

games.name: Gone Digging
games.description: Dig together by day. Feed the darkness by night. A 1–4 player co-op digging thriller where loot, upgrades, and sacrifices decide who survives after sundown.

games.name: Prismarch
games.description: A colorful chess roguelike! Engage in dopaminergic, cinematic strategy while you fulfill a chess power fantasy - your pieces gain abilities as you construct a juiced up roster capable of surviving the onslaught! Only - seven mysterious prismatic kings stand before you and the one true crown...

games.name: Eco Volunteer
games.description: A peaceful, cozy game about cleaning up trash and other eco-friendly activities in nature. Embark on a journey through stunning natural landscapes while doing good deeds!

games.name: Arcade Shop Simulator
games.description: Run your arcade shop! Bargain for machines, set them up, and let kids enjoy the fun. Earn money, keep your shop clean, and customize it with stylish accessories. Need more space? Expand your shop and build the ultimate arcade empire, then play your Arcades after hours and compete with other players!

games.name: Prison Fury
games.description: Prison Fury is a 2 player co-op puzzle platformer game. Pair up across mirrored prison stages to solve interdependent puzzles—door sequences, platform chains, patterns, levers and more. Runs are intense and can take 16–45 minutes.

games.name: Entity Research Group
games.description: First-person psychological co-op investigation horror. Players act as researchers, completing tasks and gathering evidence to identify various entity types.

games.name: Prescription: Madness
games.description: In this visual novel, you take the role of Tenty, and interact with (mainly) dark and humorous characters, that aim to find the cause of a mysterious virus that's been unleashed in the Overworld.

games.name: Sports Card Shop Simulator
games.description: Rip open packs and flip cards for profit while building the sports card shop of your dreams. Hunt for holos, parallels,autos, and numbered cards to satisfy your collection obsession. Design your own card and experience the ultimate high as you pull yourself out of a pack!

games.name: Stackmon
games.description: Stack, train and collect 100+ powerful Stackmon in this creature-collector with a card-stacking twist! Build your camp, challenge rival Scouts in combat and face the mysterious corruption spreading throughout your land.

games.name: Dwarven Mining Company
games.description: Manage your own dwarven mine. Give orders to miners excavating ore and builders providing them with ladders to get deeper and deeper into the underground. Mine iron, copper and even mithrill to satisfy the needs of the dwarven kingdom for the price of a single coffee.

games.name: Void Sanction
games.description: A sci-fi action RPG. Battle alien hordes with fast-paced combat, evolving weapons, and a combat drone companion. Upgrade your arsenal, defeat challenging bosses, and explore a hostile alien world.

games.name: Coin Harvest
games.description: Harvest coins with robotic arms, unlock islands and conquer realms. An incremental idle desktop widget game that runs while you work or game.

games.name: Type the Rhythm
games.description: A rhythm typing trainer where you type real words to a variety of musical styles. Augmented proprioception lets you move the grooves between your brain and fingers for faster, cleaner typing. From hunt-and-peck to 150 WPM blindfolded, Type The Rhythm moves you forward.

games.name: Turquoise
games.description: Build your reef, observe wildlife, and learn about marine fauna. Turquoise is a contemplative game where you create and decorate a protected marine area to welcome a wide variety of aquatic species. Your screen becomes a window into a vibrant underwater world.

games.name: Alpaca Party: Grab & Run
games.description: Grab & Run | Alpaca Party is a physics-based multiplayer VR extraction adventure! The maps reshape every time, every object has real weight, and monsters are always watching. Team up with friends, embrace the chaos, and execute the perfect heist—or fail hilariously trying.

games.name: Rogue Hanafuda
games.description: A roguelike deckbuilding game meets Hanafuda. Never played Hanafuda before? No problem. Jump right in and discover an addictive roguelike card game that's easy to learn but impossible to put down.

games.name: The Henchmen
games.description: The Henchmen is a chaotic co-op heist game where you and your crew play as clueless, disposable henchmen pulling off robberies that are way above your pay grade. Sneak, steal, mess up, improvise, and try to escape with the loot.

games.name: Come Out Guys
games.description: Get ready for a chaotic chase for 2-8 players! Experience high tension FPS Parkour Hide and Seek with tiny characters in a giant environment. Climb, jump, hide, and shoot to surprise your friends. Escaping and chasing have never been this exciting!

games.name: Chibi Knight Classic
games.description: 3 beasts have ravaged the land of Oukoku, legend tells of a small knight who will save the kingdom. Re-live this classic Flash RPG platforming hack and slash beat 'em up adventure for free here on Steam! Lovingly-crafted by dad and 4 year old daughter (who also stars as voice actress!)

games.name: Timber Rush
games.description: Timber Rush is a fast-paced incremental roguelite where every swing explodes into upgrades, chaos, and massive numbers.

games.name: Forest Escape: Last Train
games.description: Forest Escape: Last Train is a co-op horror exploration game for 1-4 players in the mysterious forest. Repair your locomotive, solve the insane Warden’s eerie puzzles, and outrun the stuff of nightmares as you try to escape this twisted realm.

games.name: Beat Your Boss
games.description: Do you hate your boss? This game is made for you. Beat up your bullying bosses in a game inspired by the Mirror's Edge series.

games.name: Wacky Coursers
games.description: Wacky Coursers is a chaotic parkour racing game where you run, jump, shrink, smash, flip gravity , fly with wings 🪽, and get launched through surprise tubes . Race solo or online—and laugh your way to the finish!

games.name: Peglotto!
games.description: PegLotto! is a roguelike that combines slots, pachinko, and deck-building. Pick your items, place them on the board, and pray that luck is on your side! Sit back, enjoy the view from the train window, and ride the waves of fortune!

games.name: CoinPit
games.description: CoinPit is a dark game that blends roguelike strategy with coin pusher thrills. Trapped in a never-closing, dimly lit bar, your escape lies in the coin pusher—stack shiny towers, spin the lucky wheel, and shake the machine until the coins spill out.

games.name: Budgie's Bug Shop
games.description: A short incremental game about catching bugs and running a shop. Upgrade equipment, purchase game-breaking abilities, and maximize the profits of your Budgie-powered empire!

games.name: No More Pesticide
games.description: No More Pesticide is an active incremental game about a cute frog exterminating swarms of mutant bugs and taking down an evil pesticide manufacturer.

games.name: Tenshi Sword Quest
games.description: This is a 2D horizontal board platform puzzle game about finding one's own Sword Of Scarlet Perception by the Hinanawi Tenshi. She use her ability to manipulate stones to overcome numerous obstacles and find the unclaimed Sword Of Scarlet Perception.

games.name: Function Sue
games.description: Welcome to the world of “maSUEmatics”! Draw equations, shape the world, and roll Sue to the goal in this free-form physics puzzle.

games.name: Potion Craft Together
games.description: Need a break? Open your own fantasy potion shop with your friends! Gather ingredients, process them, brew potions, and cure the troubles of customers visiting your shop. Add Potion Craft Together to your Wishlist and prepare to step into a magical world with your friends!

games.name: Ajnabee: The Unknown
games.description: Follow Naina’s daily life as it slowly stops belonging to her alone. 🚪 An unseen presence watches ️, remembers , and interferes ️ as her sense of safety slowly collapses.  A deeply atmospheric psychological horror set in India, exploring obsession , fear , and emotional vulnerability.

games.name: AutoSquad
games.description: AutoSquad is a turn-based roguelike autobattler where you build and refine a squad of units, choose their formation and strategy, then watch the battle unfold. Recruit new units, combine them into higher tiers, collect relics, and defeat the final boss.

games.name: Dolls Made Here
games.description: You find yourself alone in an abandoned doll factory, assembling and inspecting dolls because you needed the money. Each order ends with the sense that they should never have been shipped, but leaving is no longer an option.

games.name: School's Out
games.description: Trapped in a mysterious place modeled after an old school, an amnesiac hero joins forces with several enigmatic heroines to confront endlessly looping spaces and terrifying monsters. As they search for escape and the truth behind it all, they begin to break free from the fate that binds them.

games.name: Astral Blitz
games.description: Astral Blitz is a roguelite, twin stick shooter. Control your fighter ship and wreak devastation through the hordes of empire defenses. Create your own play style as you customize your ship to your needs, setting it up for brutal destruction, refined precision, or to become chaos incarnate!

games.name: Astralis: Dawnblades
games.description: Astralis: Dawnblades is a turn-based tactical RPG that combines stronghold management, dungeon exploration, loot-based equipment crafting, and optional rhythm-based combat tied to an orchestral soundtrack.

games.name: Inverted Dreams
games.description: This dream driven psychological exploration game guides you through shifting landscapes shaped by buried fears, fractured memories and unsettling truths. As the world bends, every shadow becomes a clue, and every step pulls you deeper into the subconscious you’ve tried to forget.

games.name: The Long Way Home
games.description: You are alone on a drifting starship. No humans, only robots. As Miner 13-553; craft, farm, repair, upgrade skills and find your way home. Fight the machines or choose a peaceful path. Explore the mystery or just focus on the journey. The choice is yours.

games.name: Eggventure
games.description: Eggventure is a 2D Metroidvania platformer where you play as Egbert, an egg on a mission to rescue his friends from becoming breakfast.

games.name: Stellar Industrialist
games.description: You are neither a general nor a soldier — you are a Stellar Industrialist. To you, peace is nothing but shutdowns and losses. Venture to the frontlines, strip battlefields for wreckage and salvage, turn spoils into resources, and expand your interstellar arms empire.

games.name: Uncanny Tales: The Watcher
games.description: 2006. You become the new reserve caretaker. Patrol the territory in your rugged 4x4, check the phototraps, and monitor the area using surveillance cameras. But remember: you are not the only one watching.

games.name: Maneuver Warfare 2: BTG
games.description: A simulation of the 2022 Russo-Ukrainian War where the player maneuvers battalion tactical groups on a map and controls assets such as aircraft, special forces teams, satellites, field hospitals, and repair facilities to support these. The player can play single battles or a campaign game.

games.name: Incremental Infinity
games.description: An incremental game where your size and power grow with your number. Use an infinite, procedurally generated skill tree to defend yourself against ever larger incoming numbers and strive to reach infinity.

games.name: Dungeon Bomber
games.description: Dungeon Bomber is a chain-reaction roguelite where you place bombs and blow through the dungeon. Drop a bomb each turn, earn coins, and upgrade your deck. Fuse bombs to boost range and effects. Defeat advancing monsters and destroy the required blocks before your HP runs out.

games.name: ODEZZA
games.description: Chess meets Poker. A high-stakes game where chess battles and poker hands decide your fate. Capture pieces, build hands, and bet your way through the Odysseys.

games.name: Alpha Crisis
games.description: Alpha Crisis is a fast-paced 2D platformer focused on grappling hook movement and precise platforming, challenging players to descend into a collapsing facility to repair its systems and save humanity.

games.name: Loop of Command
games.description: ️ Loop of Command is a minimalist automation puzzle where you program obedient robots to survive in a cold corporate machine ruled by the Overseer’s cruel absurdity.

games.name: What Surrounds Us
games.description: What surrounds us? Come find out and restore balance to an abstract and colorful ecosystem where every individual maters.

games.name: Game.exe 2: Phantom Strike
games.description: You find an old computer with a forgotten program installed: Phantom Strike. A single server is still online, frozen in time and waiting for someone to finish the match. What begins as nostalgic curiosity becomes a descent into something far stranger.

games.name: Humanize Robotics
games.description: Command a robot that thinks for itself. You choose the destination; its neural network battles the physics. Struggle through brutal obstacle courses, evolve your body with collected data, and master the chaos of movement. Lose a leg? Keep crawling. The Company is watching.

games.name: Tail of Glory
games.description: A charming 2D adventure where a witty thief solves puzzles with knives, potions, and magic books. Light, humorous, and easy to play — a small game crafted with heart and full of unexpected moments.

games.name: Caravan: The Trade Road
games.description: Every journey is dangerous and every decision shapes your fate in this 2D pixel-art open-world trading RPG. Start as a novice merchant, level up, build powerful setups, trade wisely, fight bandits and bosses, clear dungeons, and rise as a legend of the trade routes by climbing the leaderboards.

games.name: Tale of Immortal Ring
games.description: "Tale of the Immortal Ring": A relaxed, top-down shooter. Use a mystical ring to journey between worlds. Battle monsters, gather resources, repair the ring, and grow stronger. Your final goal? Shatter the heavens and ascend to immortality.

games.name: Demigod Islands: A Puzzle to Die For
games.description: Vicious demigods demand sacrifices! To please them and uncover their secrets, take control of captive creatures, explore Demigod Islands and solve 50+ mindbending puzzle rooms by... killing yourselves. In this puzzle platformer, death is the goal and it can take many shapes and forms.

games.name: Our Metal Bowl
games.description: Explore, fight alongside your robot companion, solve puzzles, and gather essential nutrients to restore life to an abandoned greenhouse.

games.name: Tax Return
games.description: If the suits at the SRI think they can fleece people's taxes, they'd better watch out for the wolf. Join Swindling Steve as you take back your hard-earned money from the SRI's collectors, but watch out for the high rollers behind the scenes.

games.name: Drifting Dots
games.description: A minimalist physics roguelite where you create a mesmerizing cascade of droplets. Choose from three distinct modes and discover powerful upgrade synergies to master the flow. Calm, complex, and endlessly replayable.

games.name: Idle Sailor
games.description: Idle Sailor is a relaxing idle adventure where you sail between world destinations, livestream your journey, capture underwater photos of unique fish, and unlock upgrades to make each voyage faster and more rewarding.

games.name: Horny Academy
games.description: Horny Academy is an adult visual novel that blends interactive storytelling with a deep, branching narrative. Every choice you make leads to steamy animated scenes or unexpected twists within the mysterious walls of the magical Academy

games.name: Working Class Monsters
games.description: Do you HATE YOUR JOB? Well, these monsters don't have to. Place workers, open packs, make gold pile up. Ultra-casual incremental strategy where failure doesn't exist.

games.name: Around the Block
games.description: A minimalistic city builder where you can rack up tons of points for your island by strategically placing buildings on blocks around each other.

games.name: Nocturne for Cyl-Hestia
games.description: Play as a memorialist and investigate a dystopian city in this 3D adventure game. Collect memories, unlock visions, hack encrypted data, and expose the truth in the face of a regime that manipulates memory.

games.name: A Week in Paradise
games.description: A Week in Paradise is an interactive narrative mystery. Discover the unusual circumstances of your arrival to a bar called Paradise, and drink through the night with the bar's charismatic regular. Each night, unravel the threads holding back memories in your dreams.

games.name: Backpack Survivor
games.description: Backpack Survivor: is a strategy + combat roguelike game featuring meticulous backpack management and auto-battles with movement-only controls. Players craft unique builds to survive, racing toward ascension with all their resources

games.name: MythBeasts
games.description: Welcome to the world of Mythbeasts, an ambitious creature collection RPG that I'm developing completely solo as an autistic indie developer. Explore this huge world with endless progression and leveling for your mythbeasts

games.name: Stranger Mahjong
games.description: Stranger Tiles is a Mahjong-based strategy game. Step into a surreal dreamscape and duel against feline opponents. Optimize your tile setup and employ calculated strategies to counter speed with patience. Smash through the dream stages and defeat the Eternal Nightmare!

games.name: May the Cards Lay Out a Straight
games.description: Jack, a winning gambler, is trapped at the gambling table by his angry boss's magic spell. He is horrified to find the dice rushing towards him. Only by gripping his playing cards tightly and shattering all the incoming dice can he hope to escape the table alive.

games.name: Focus Grove
games.description: Build your cozy forest farm… while thriving in life. Focus Grove is a mindful game that improves your focus, well-being and work-life balance. Let your Woodlings grow your farm, while you grow in life.

games.name: Overtype
games.description: Overtype is a roguelike typing action game set in a neon-drenched post-apocalypse. Type to fight, dodge, and survive against waves of cyborgs and corrupted machines. Every keystroke is your weapon master speed and precision to uncover Zyra’s legacy and type out humanity’s last hope.

games.name: Dive or Die: Children of Rain
games.description: Every descent is a deadly gamble. DIVE or DIE in the cursed abyss, face Eldritch horrors to uncover the mystery of the black rain. Scavenge and upgrade, recruit and sacrifice. Save your camp... The Flood is coming.

games.name: Secrets of Velendar Castle: Escape Room
games.description: Find your way out of Velendar Castle. Discover why everything was taken from you. In this fantasy Escape room, you will have to solve puzzles to escape the wrath of the king… and find out what he wants from you.

games.name: Panic Files: Buried Sanity
games.description: Your first day at the local mine got a hell of a twist when the tunnels caved in. Can you escape when the only way out is going deeper? Avoid the deadly creatures, push through hallucinations and remember: Don't panic.

games.name: They Left Us Here
games.description: A Sci-Fi First Person Horror Game where you explore an abandoned Space Station //

games.name: Perfect Porcelain
games.description: A narrative-driven, 3D anime-styled horror game where you influence the fate of girls trapped in the doll-obsessed Raiko’s murder mansion. Explore, survive and uncover Raiko’s twisted mind.

games.name: The Curse of Womanland
games.description: A romance-adventure text-based game themed around the Land of Women. You will travel to the Land of Women, meet the mysterious young lady Jian Ling, and gradually uncover the bloody and dark secrets behind this realm. Death, resistance, or degeneration? Everything depends on your choices.

games.name: DJ Life Simulator: From Your Bedroom to the Mainstage
games.description: Plug in a REAL USB DJ controller or Mouse/Keyboard and learn professional mixing techniques while playing! Rise through a career of epic gigs, and master skills you can use on real decks — the only game where fun truly turns you into a professional DJ.

games.name: Sonki's Lagoon
games.description: Dive into Sonki's Lagoon, a colorful low-poly high speed 3D platformer, inspired by the classic. Explore a fun world, pull off stylish moves and find all the Johnnies in this indie adventure!

games.name: Business 98
games.description: A retro Roguelike Deckbuilder & Simulator about being a cashier in the year 1998. Complete payments using cool combos, tons of special cards, and fun strategies. Can you last until the end of the year?

games.name: Loot Loop
games.description: Build a party of heroes and send them into dungeons in this quick incremental RPG. Fight monsters, collect loot, and unlock upgrades. Fast runs, deep skill tree, zero stress.

games.name: Wild West Miner Simulator
games.description: You've become the sheriff of a town that... doesn't exist. Nobody lives here, the governor's stupid joke. It's time to get to work and turn this NOWHERE into a bustling metropolis. Mine coal, ore, and gold. Build houses, find oil, bring in new residents, create a paradise in the middle of nowhere.

games.name: Why Elephant Sit on Chair?
games.description: Why Elephant Sit On Chair? is a game that combines block-clearing with light roguelite elements. Team up with your animal block companions to face all kinds of unexpected challenges. every run is full of surprises! Just a tip: don't step on their tails.

games.name: Handgun Football
games.description: Handgun Football shatters physics: FPS meets soccer brawl. Revolvers, shotguns blast the ball into rival goals. Solo vs AI, slide from chill to hell; .LAN or global 2,3,4-teams,up to 12 players. Classic gravity or zero-g space variants. One shot flips the match.

games.name: Chant Wizard
games.description: Scream to win! Shout over-the-top spells in this hilarious voice-controlled battler. Assemble your magical deck from the five elements for 1v1 duels testing your wits and shame. Warning: Play safely—don't let your roaring summon the neighbors before you beat your rival!

games.name: Suck It Up
games.description: You never cleaned your room… and now the dust fights back. Blast your way through waves of dirty creatures in this fast-paced roguelite FPS. Vacuum to grow stronger, parkour to survive, and finally make your mom proud.

games.name: Magiclean
games.description: MagiClean – is a satisfying cozy clicker game where you clean up a Wizarding School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. Click to Clean, Upgrade and Brew potions, Synergize 15+ spells from your toolbelt, collect magical animals, and grow more powerful each second.

games.name: Network Notation
games.description: You are a lost artificial intelligence adrift on the internet. Infiltrate abstract computer networks filled with defensive complications to expand your world. Improve your capabilities to overcome ever greater challenges. Learn about the state of the world and what you were made for.

games.name: Skelly's Skirmish
games.description: Arcade platforming action with a spooky theme and a Game Boy aesthetic.

games.name: Last Spaceship
games.description: Last Spaceship is an adventure puzzle game. Play as a maintenance robot, repair the ship by solving a series of fascinating puzzles, explore its various compartments, and collect relics of human legacy. Experience a story about war, extinction, salvation, and choice.

games.name: Sonya
games.description: A surreal horror where your decisions and moral choices shape your destiny. Navigate a hospital, listen to the inner voices, and discover a truth that will break your mind.

games.name: Laby's Village
games.description: A quirky fantasy 2D pixel roguelite action game. Play as Laby, a goblin officer of the fallen Demon Lord's army, setting out from a small village to subdue ambitious rivals. Combine weapons and relics to forge your own chaotic build and enjoy absurd, fast-paced battles.

games.name: Construction Store Simulator
games.description: Start with a small construction store and turn it into the place every contractor relies on. In Construction Store Simulator, you will stock goods, set prices, move shelving with full physics, and keep checkout lines under control—while simultaneously expanding the store, hiring staff, and improving the look and reputation.

games.name: Eclipse: Anomaly Research
games.description: Investigate a haunted swamp as Ivy Summers, a field agent facing reality-breaking anomalies and a deadly creature. Monitor cameras, report the paranormal, survive the hunt, and uncover the swamp’s dark secret before the time loop resets everything.

games.name: Alien Snap
games.description: Explore an alien planet, snap pictures of wildlife and build relationships with your crewmates in this cozy sci-fi Point & Click - Visual Novel.

games.name: Low Magic They Said
games.description: They lied about the magic being low. A dark fantasy roguelike deckbuilder where victory matters - beat the game with one class, their magic unlocks for all others. 3 classes at launch. Optional dungeons. Gods who answer prayers. Vibrant fantasy descending into cosmic horror.

games.name: Forage Wizard
games.description: An incremental crafting game where you click your way to alchemical mastery. Progress through a branching skill tree and explore the forbidden woods. Collect resources and build machines of magic. Slay monsters, farm crops and automate your production to become the all-powerful Forage Wizard!

games.name: Inanis: Into the Abyss
games.description: Embark on an endless journey alongside your crew and traverse the true distances between celestial bodies. How far will you be able to go?

games.name: Soulcery: Deck of Shadows
games.description: An action roguelike fused with deck-building combat. Steal enemy abilities to shape your battle deck and unleash relentless, zero-cooldown combos.

games.name: Vessel
games.description: "The Vessel" follows siblings caught in a sinister conspiracy. A secret organization is hunting them, linked to the centuries-old "Sino-Western Occult Research Society." Trapped in a mysterious hospital full of dangers and hidden secrets.

games.name: BarrelBots
games.description: A multilayered grid-based puzzle game featuring small robots that carry and stack Barrels of nuclear waste.

games.name: It Was That Summer
games.description: A narrative game set in Cambridge, 2006. Spend one unforgettable summer as Leon, a visiting student, balancing studies, friendship, and love. Your choices shape who you become: yourself, or someone new altogether.

games.name: Bitter Harvest
games.description: Cast out of your rightful farm, you’ll scrape, scheme, and rebuild your way to power in this short, satirical farming sim about ambition and payback.

games.name: Kingdom Conquer
games.description: Build, lead and fight in a first-person Viking colony-survival game. Place every structure by hand, command settlers in real time, and personally raid enemy lands in a massive persistent world.

games.name: Ponchorado
games.description: Ponchorado is a satirical Wild West survival-action game with roguelite elements in a 1930s cartoon style, set in the ruins of a never-finished western movie. Play as Poncho, a forgotten stuntman battling through chaos, clichés, and caricatures.

games.name: Southbound
games.description: Fight endless enemies and become powerful! Get loot, level up, buy vehicles and upgrade to create unique builds to improve your chances of survival

games.name: Off the Beaten Track
games.description: A couch/online multiplayer party game for 2–4 players. Choose from a roster of unique characters, each with their own weapons and abilities, and compete in intense versus matches on varied space arenas filled with environmental hazards.

games.name: The Old Man and His Cat
games.description: Play as Domino, a stray cat in love with food, in this heartwarming adventure where you help an old man overcome his grief after his wife passed away. Use your feline skills to explore and solve puzzles as you strive to bring joy into the old man's life and build an unbreakable bond with him.

games.name: Love in Space
games.description: It is the year 2009. A short time after "the incident". Mankind has fled the scorched crusts of planet earth for a better life in space. Those unlucky few who still reside on earth are forced to live beneath the sea in leaky metal domes. This includes you... 50% Visual Novel - 50% Karaoke-Musical.

games.name: Cat-Astrophy
games.description: Guide Polo, a brave abducted cat, through a vast universe of exotic planets. Face challenging combats, customize your abilities, and choose your own path in this epic space odyssey to uncover Polo’s lost memories.

games.name: Mistfall Hunter
games.description: Mistfall Hunter is a third-person action PvPvE extraction RPG. Gear up for different classes, master combos and strategic skills, and face intense battles against monsters or players, solo or with teammates. Only a successful escape will secure your treasures.

games.name: Tales of Tonbrook
games.description: Tales of Tonbrook is a life-sim/RPG hybrid. When you receive an invitation to the prestigious Daverton Adventurer's Academy, you take it! Study, perform missions for the school to pay your way, explore the world, make friends, fish, farm, find hidden ruins, and much more!

games.name: Synco Path: Automaton Prison
games.description: Trapped in a surreal prison cell, Avery Stardust, a rogue automaton, has only 17 days to enter his reset code and accept a new life as determined by the Stagnation Protocol. But when the mystery of the Synco Path program unravels, Avery will question everything he believes to be true.

games.name: Fractured Library
games.description: A cozy 2D pixel art adventure where you explore magical worlds, solve whimsical puzzles, and collect crystal fragments to restore a misbehaving library: no combat, just curious discoveries and a dash of chaos.

games.name: Thirsty Princess
games.description: Thirsty Princess is a fast-paced, top-down party game for 2–4 local players where you and your friends compete to drink beer with an impatient and unreasonable princess. Get drunk and slowly lose control while you brawl, steal from and sabotage your friends to win the favour of your princess.

games.name: Fate Architect
games.description: Fate Architect is a roguelike deckbuilder where you build and modify symbols on a slot machine to earn points and shape your strategy. Each run offers new combinations, synergies, and challenges as you design the ultimate slot machine of fate.

games.name: Ella's Nightmare
games.description: Linear single-player game with puzzles and alternate endings. Control Ella and explore the rooms of the house, solving puzzles to progress and escape before becoming a victim of the lurking creature.

games.name: Top Drifters
games.description: A frantic top-down racer with simple old-school arcade controls, vibrant low-poly graphics, high-speed chaotic races and physics-based, drifting-focused driving. Master 10+ different cars with unique driving stats, tear through unconventional. semi destructible tracks and become the "Top Drifter".

games.name: The Industrial Council
games.description: A cozy AI driven game where you play a journalist in a steampunk fantasy city. Change is coming to Raversul, and with the help of your imp and your newspaper you will play a powerful role in shaping it. Solve mysteries, uncover stories, and shape politics in this revolutionary new game.

games.name: Escape: Immersion
games.description: Escape: Immersion is a horror adventure inspired by Inside and Little Nightmares. An atmospheric survival adventure with puzzles, platforming, and unpredictable challenges inside a collapsing underwater lab.

games.name: Hag's Hand
games.description: A tower defense game that blends Brazilian folklore myths with card management. Protect the forest by summoning the creatures that dwell within the wilds. As invaders push deeper into the untamed woods, the witch Cuca merely watches their movement, waiting for the perfect moment to strike.

games.name: Culdcept Begins
games.description:
Led by dice. Ruled by cards.

A hidden classic that fuses board and card games, Culdcept features a unique, innovative system that has captivated fans since its debut. Players become Cepters, wielding cards in intense battles where luck and strategy collide. After ten years, a brand-new story begins once again.

games.name: Slime Alchemy
games.description: Slime Alchemy is a relaxing puzzle game where you must place pieces in specific locations on a hexagonal grid.

games.name: DDD: Demons Double Down
games.description: Sometimes loneliness pushes us into strange, risky choices. A nightclub that wasn’t here yesterday. Mysterious strangers—each leaving more questions than answers. Just one short night that simply won’t end. What could possibly go wrong?

games.name: Maze Nightmare: Edge of Darkness
games.description: Maze Nightmare-Edge of Darkness is a first-person survival game. Trapped in a foggy, procedural maze, use limited ammo and faint breath sounds to locate the key-carrying zombie, find the key, and escape—or be lost forever.

games.name: Honogurashi no Niwa
games.description: Hono Kurashi no Niwa is a life simulation game set in a quaint countryside village. While cultivating farmland and raising livestock, you can hunt, fish, and deepen your ties with your fellow villagers. A relaxing, heartwarming pastoral lifestyle awaits!

games.name: Creepy Support
games.description: Save people from terrible paranormal dangers as a support operator of a secret SCP-like organization! Ask questions, give advice and watch the consequences of your choices... 5+ endings in each story ;-)

games.name: Teeko
games.description: Platformer meets tower defense in this story-rich game inspired by the Costa Rican Día de Las Mascaradas festival. One day, grandma Tita's kids get possessed by the spirits of the gigantes and begin to wreak havoc upon the land. It's now up to her pet sloth, Teeko, to save their town.

games.name: Underside: The Lift
games.description: A single-player survival roguelike horror game with randomly generated locations and permanent death. A mysterious labyrinth of post-Soviet apartments draws you into an atmosphere of solitude and plunges you into the darkness of the unknown.

games.name: Pieces of the Kingdom
games.description: What if Chess…was a roguelite? Assemble your party and battle your way across a broken kingdom in a fantastical, tactical take on Chess. Loot epic gear, recruit powerful pieces with unique abilities, and strategize your way to victory.

games.name: Ranchbound
games.description: Ranchbound is a western-themed real-time strategy and management game focused on running and expanding a ranch. Players manage cowboys and livestock, assign workers to tasks, transport cattle between locations, and make economic decisions to keep the ranch profitable and alive. The game combines strategic planning, light survival elements, and a stylized depiction of life in the Wild West.

games.name: I.T Never Ends
games.description: The printer is bleeding, the Wi-Fi is haunted, and Ticket #666 just came in. As the latest hire for a company run by cosmic horrors, your job is simple: Swipe to survive. Make binary decisions to survive the night shift in this dark comedy desktop simulator. I.T truly never ends.

games.name: Beast of Reincarnation
games.description: In post-apocalyptic Japan, humanity’s last hope may rest with Emma and her loyal canine companion, Koo. Explore what it means to be human in Beast of Reincarnation, an expansive one-person, one-dog action RPG built around demanding, technical combat. What awaits at journey’s end?

games.name: Nature Minds
games.description:
Nature Minds is an action-adventure RPG where you play as Tareq, a young warrior chosen by the ancient Bracelet of Dilmun. As nature falters and forgotten realms awaken, Tareq discovers that the force behind the world’s disturbance is Gilgamesh—the immortal king who gained endless life through the Plant of Immortality and now seeks to reshape creation according to his vision.

Travel across vast deserts, sunken kingdoms, radiant jungles, and sky cities as you uncover the truth behind the Bracelet of Dilmun and Gilgamesh’s transformation. Along your journey, you will ride the legendary Phoenix, born from the Three Impossible Legends of Arabic culture, and unlock ancient powers that guide you toward your final confrontation with the immortal king.

games.name: Jar Head Cauldron
games.description: Fight monsters from the other side using magical items and weapons crafted in world in order to succeed. Use “In World Crafting” to upgrade weapons and solve puzzles in order to help save your dismembered brothers and sisters by completing the necromantic ritual before their souls are lost forever.

games.name: Marvel Tokon: Fighting Souls
games.description:
Assemble your team of legendary Marvel characters in the ultimate 4v4 tag team fighter from PlayStation Studios, Arc System Works and Marvel Games.
Immerse yourself in the Marvel universe like never before with an iconic roster of heroes and villains, authentic stages, and intuitive gameplay mechanics. Experience the thrill of fast-paced over the top action with stunning anime-inspired visuals, where every battle is a unique and exciting team VS battle experience.

games.name: Anaria: Reborn
games.description: ANARIA: Reborn is a first-person psychological horror where you're trapped in the mind of a mysterious girl, searching for a way out through endless doors and a haunting nightmare.

games.name: Depth of Mind
games.description: In this turn-based strategy game, you must assemble the strongest team of mental operatives to overcome mental illnesses inside a person.

In this 2D pixel RPG, 24 navigate battles, puzzles, and quests in a war-torn world devoid of color. Your choices dictate the non-linear plot, with multiple endings and an open world hanging in the balance. Will you bring back color as the savior or succumb to darkness?

games.name: Chronicles of Childhood
games.description: A story-rich, platform, side-scroller in the coming of age genre. Travel around the Fantasy World of "Chronicles of Childhood", with your slingshot at hand. Fight and avoid imaginative creations, to finish all the levels and discover what does it really mean to grow up.

games.name: Metal Gear Solid Master Collection: Volume 2
games.description: This second installment to the collection features “Metal Gear Solid 4: Guns of the Patriots” and “Metal Gear Solid: Peace Walker (HD Collection version),” and also a digital soundtrack and "Metal Gear: Ghost Babel" as bonus content.

games.name: Leafblade
games.description: The coziest mix of ARPG and monster tamer. Fight along the Mons you meet in your adventure to recover the bond between humans and Mons. Take care of your Mons in your farm, improving their combat and farm skills while ensuring their happiness.

games.name: Velhodium Isle
games.description: Velhodium Isle is a pixel-art boomer shooter in which you fight monsters in themed locations. Use weapons and magic to get through crowds of monsters and close the source of apocalyptic terrors. Disable shields, close the anomaly, and survive the brutal slaughter!

games.name: Zombie Must Dead!
games.description: "Zombie Must Dead!" is a game that combines tower defense and FPS elements. Players must continuously fend off waves of zombies, upgrade their weapons, and strive to survive as long as possible.

games.name: Writer Tycoon
games.description: Become a bestselling author in Writer Tycoon! Write books, grow your fanbase, and dominate the publishing industry. Track sales, manage multiple books at once, and adapt to trends. Will you create literary masterpieces or chase quick cash? Become a bestselling author and leave your mark!

games.name: Atomic Age
games.description: Criminal case in the cabaret stage Atomic Age, a comedic, retro-futuristic 2D point & click adventure in the shape of the 50th and 60th years

games.name: The Zyrdain Sands
games.description: Visceral twin-stick shooter where desert gods sabotage your run with no-shots, sandstorms, and cursed upgrades while you evolve Zyrd's weapons to save the Sacred Stone.

games.name: Halloween
games.description: On Halloween night, 1978, no one is safe from Michael Myers. Become the Boogeyman or fight back against the face of evil itself in Halloween.

games.name: Waifu Wars Online
games.description: Kill, loot, and level up with other players in this mysterious online realm. Welcome to WAIFU WARS ONLINE!

games.name: Phantom Blade 0
games.description:
Phantom Blade Zero is a an action RPG featuring deep and dark art style, fast paced combat, and a fictitious world blending Chinese martial arts and steampunk!
Be the Dark Raider exiled by "The Order", embark on the path of vengeance, and uncover the darkest secrets of Wulin!

games.name: Brazilian Drug Dealer Before 4: Demons From the Portal to Hell I Opened Are Still in the Favela and Now I Have to Save Mamadas From Ronaldo
games.description: The standalone sequel of the Brazilian boomer shooter game made using the id tech 2 engine! Shoot, jump, double jump and dash! Embark on a journey throughout the state of Rio De Janeiro, São Paulo, Salvador, hell and even heaven! Save Brazil!

games.name: Akiba Lost
games.description: Thirteen years ago, six girls vanished in Akihabara in the unsolved case “Akiba’s Spirited Away”. Daiki Shinjo announces a live-action game based on the incident, gathering six women who embody Akihabara’s subculture. But their story begins to seep into reality. Can AKIBA LOST be finished?

games.name: Reel Talk
games.description: Cast your line, catch some fish, and make real connections. REEL TALK is a cozy multiplayer fishing game where you hang out, customize your character with pride, and chat with friends old and new. No pressure, no competition-just good vibes by the water.

games.name: Unwell
games.description: You regain consciousness. Beside you lies a broken and rusted ladder, and in front of you stretches a dark, damp-smelling corridor. In the distance, you hear the sound of falling water. You have no idea where you are. All you know is that you must go deeper.

games.name: Creep
games.description: Experimental dark platform game that takes place inside a struggled man's inner world represented as the worm world. You control the worm form of this man as he shows why this world exists and how it's like to live there. You also visit past memories/analogies and gain new abilities.

games.name: Woodo
games.description: Woodo is a 3D puzzle game. The player immerses in a calm and peaceful world where time stopped at the happy moment. With imaginary friend Woodo, player build bit by bit this tiny world. Woodo tells the player stories and makes the player feel not lonely while playing. The game looks like a wooden kit from childhood.

games.name: There's no way that tsundere girl I met in the infirmary will be my girlfriend
games.description: "B-baka! Who said you could get in!? I'm not prepared yet!" "Oh well... since you're already here, why not stay for a while?" "D-don't misunderstand, okay? It's not like I asked you to stay because I like you or anything..."

games.name: Mion and the Cursed Killer Hamster
games.description: The Magnificent Mion is a warrior queen from Wharevarland. She battles a malignant verse-making kraken, tries to win the love of Count De Loboda, studies at an ordinary magical school, and she's also... crazy! Absurdism. Ridiculousness. Idiocy.

games.name: Elation for the Wonder Box 6000
games.description: Elation For The Wonder Box 6000 is a first-person, claymation adventure game about going into the city to try and find a game from your youth that no one else remembers.

games.name: Snap Quest
games.description: A Photo Collection Adventure Game. Complete your research notebook, solve creature puzzles, earn research grant money. Buy upgrades for your camera, rebuild the town, bond with the locals, and reveal the paranormal mystery of Star Island.

games.name: Industrix
games.description: Step into the world of industrial production and become a master in factory-building! Create efficient production lines and manage your resources. As you progress through the game, you'll need to complete challenges for a certain company in order to rank up and unlock new technologies!

games.name: Veredilia: The Sacred Forest
games.description: Veredilia: The Sacred Forest is a 2D platforming game that takes inspiration from classic platformers such as Sonic, and fighting games like Mortal Kombat. The game aims to be a combination of classic 2D platforming with 1v1 fighting whilst also exploring the large forest of Veredilia across various locales with a wide range of characters, technical movesets, and flashy combos. You can take control of one of 3 characters, each with their own special moves, combos, and super moves. Solve puzzles, uncover secrets, and kick, punch, and slash your way to victory, before it's too late. Do you have what it takes?

games.name: EVE Vanguard
games.description: EVE Vanguard is an upcoming sci-fi sandbox FPS where every deployment onto a hostile planet is high stakes. You fight, scavenge, and adapt in brutal warzones - and every choice leaves its mark on a player-driven universe at war.

games.name: Weefager
games.description: Guide this pink being with the power of the ether in a metroidvania where nothing is as it seems. Infuse souls into objects, create minions to help you, and explore vibrant landscapes with a great soundtrack. Shape your destiny on this captivating journey.

games.name: Mithra
games.description: A cryptic puzzle/adventure game that blurs the line between fiction and reality. A tale of cultish affairs that sweeps through the nighttime streets of London, weaves through the back alleys of Beijing and beyond. Come with us.

games.name: Dungeon Settlers
games.description: A colony sim based dungeon crawler where you manage your clan to build a settlement in barren land, provide food and shelter for your people, lead them deep into the merciless dungeon, overcome challenging combat by your strategy.

games.name: Outward 2
games.description: Outward 2 is a challenging action RPG with survival elements focusing on a believable and relatable experience. There is no hand holding, no leveled encounters, no divine gift making you tower over your enemies. Eat your meal, check your map, grab your backpack: a fulfilling adventure awaits.

games.name: Wax Heads
games.description: A cosy-punk slice-of-life narrative sim about managing a struggling record store. Chat to quirky customers with unique tastes, explore a handcrafted record collection, fall in love with bands (and their drama!), or just slack off with your colleagues – all to restore the groove!

games.name: Countryballs: The Heist
games.description: Countryballs: The Heist is PWA's comedic stealth adventure where you become a master thief for eccentric clients. Customise your Countryball's disguise to explore maze-like countries. Plan, sabotage, hide and trick to outwit guards and traps - or create your own thrilling heists for the community.

games.name: Port of Jumanah
games.description: 'Port of Jumanah’ is a retro pixel-style underwater adventure with rogue-lite elements. Meet quirky characters, explore unique places, and encounter unusual sea life. Treasures and troubles await in these seas! Are you ready to dive into the unknown? Lovely mermaids and menacing sharks await!

games.name: Acts of Blood
games.description: Acts of Blood is a Beat ‘em up, Action, 3rd person game which focuses on fast-paced, brutal hand-to-hand combat. Set in dystopian city of Bandung, Indonesia.

games.name: The Bucketlist Tourist
games.description: The Bucketlist Tourist is a physics-based multiplayer party game where players complete tasks and capture them photographically. In the battle for the best snapshot, they share only a single camera.

games.name: PVKK: Planetenverteidigungskanonenkommandant
games.description: Operate your planetary defense cannon to fend off an interplanetary invasion from the comfort of your cozy bunker. You’re here to stay, so obey your superiors, press the right buttons, and sip your daily tea ration - it's good for you.

games.name: Tower Lab
games.description: Roguelite tower defense where enemies can’t be killed, knock them off with physics instead! Build devastating contraptions that push, pull, and launch enemies. Unlock towers, discover broken synergies, and dominate through creative combinations.

games.name: Sick Samurai
games.description: Sick Samurai is a blindingly fast and bloody action game based on instant-death combat. Immerse yourself in lofi hip hop and retro anime aesthetics as you slash and dash your way to becoming the greatest fighter on the island.

games.name: Reality Drift
games.description: Reality Drift is a roguelike racing game where your choices matter. Race through a series of strange worlds, choose upgrades for your car and decide which track will be next - your decisions are just as important as how you drive!

games.name: Medix
games.description: How much can a person endure, and what is the true value of human life? In this minimalist real-time strategy game about war medics, you fight for your own survival and that of others while the army is under constant pressure, retreating from a superior enemy. A narrative campaign, accompanied by hand-drawn illustrations, takes you through the story of physicians pushed to their breaking point in their fight for a sliver of hope.

games.name: A Forest Tale: Porasy
games.description:
Embark on a journey through a new mythological realm as Porasy, an Indigenous warrior. Explore uncharted landscapes, unleash the power of Muiraquitãs, unravel your story, and vanquish the Seven Legendary Beasts to carve your own legend. Are you ready to dive into this epic adventure?

Porasy is an indie platformer that combines the thrill of classic 2D action with the rich, untold stories of the Tupi-Guarani mythology. Inspired by childhood favorites like Sonic and MegaMan, Porasy brings a fresh challenge to the platforming genre, immersing players in a dangerous, atmospheric world of Brazilian folklore.

games.name: 100 Caliber Dash
games.description: A high-speed run-and-gun shooter with roguelite deckbuilding upgrades.

games.name: Forsworn
games.description: Step into a realm torn by divine conflict where every defeat is just another beginning in this rogue lite, turn-based tactics adventure where no hero fights alone. Build powerful synergies to overcome unforgiving battles and defy fate in a world controlled by the gods.

games.name: Aspiel: Edge of Chaos
games.description: Aspiel: Edge of Chaos is a third-person fantasy Action-RPG. Explore numerous locations ravaged by the dark power of Death, face various creatures consumed by Chaos, and harness the power of Life to save the continent of Aspiel.

games.name: The Mound: Omen of Cthulhu
games.description: In up to four player co-op, form a group of explorers searching for treasure. In this cursed jungle, danger is everywhere and monstrous creatures alter reality. Stay clear-headed and tame the jungle before it devours you…

games.name: Ember & Blade
games.description:
Become the immortal hunter and stand against the archdemon Asmodeus. Cut through bullet-hell swarms, clash with Souls-like bosses, and harness celestial blessings that
reshape your powers each run. The demons are rising—raise your sword.

games.name: Take Them Down
games.description: TAKE THEM DOWN is a fast-paced violent action game where you combine unique weapons and abilities to take down necromancers, demons, and betrayers while avoiding getting crushed and cleaved by traps, mines, and blades sprawled across nightmarish, macabre worlds. TAKE THEM DOWN.

games.name: Spinning My Wheel
games.description: Build a physics‑powered hamster‑wheel, master rocket‑boosted moves, to lead a brain chipped enhanced hamster through puzzles, mining, and laboratory‑runner mayhem.

games.name: GTL Schedule
games.description: In a post-apocalyptic world where food has become contraband and hope is on the brink of extinction, you quietly ignite a revolution to warm the world with a spatula and love.

games.name: Archon Soul
games.description: Roll the dice but make your own luck in this 2D dicebuilding roguelike. Customize your dice using swappable faces, runes, and bodies with unique effects. ​Draft spells, create powerful synergies, defeat challenging enemies, and conquer the Archon's palace.

games.name: Terrible Life Expectancy
games.description: Terrible Life Expectancy is a roguelite top-down shooter with Survivors elements, where you fight absurd hordes of mutants for the amusement of an unseen bloodthirsty audience. You only inherit all your upgrades as long as someone in your family is still breathing… or at least twitching.

games.name: Exofactory
games.description: Awaken as a forgotten AI on an alien world, your every choice reshapes your technology, environment, and identity. Automate deeply transformative factories in a chill open world, where the story evolves uniquely around you.

games.name: DungeonBox
games.description: A new Dungeons & Dragons Party Game! Let our Dungeon Master take you and up to 8 players on an adventure, where you control the next move by answering and voting from your phones

games.name: Arcaneering: Beyond Automation
games.description: Build spell-powered factories, reclaim ancient territories filled with magical secrets, and discover game-changing technology hidden across procedurally generated worlds. Master both engineering and magic in this cozy fusion of factory automation and RPG progression.

games.name: Sketchy Driver
games.description: An arcade, roguelike endless racer where you dodge traffic, jump ramps, perform tricks, earn points, and level up to make the run more entertaining, aiming for the best score. No story. No brakes. No problem.

games.name: Pigeon Guild
games.description: Pigeon Guild is a non-combat, single-player action RPG where you play as Jules Corso, a rookie cadet in Cassandria's most prestigious airborne postal service. Navigate your flying cargo boat through a world of floating islands, where every delivery tells a story.

games.name: Project Octavia
games.description: A stylized third-person spy action game with infiltration, gunplay, Close Quarter Combat (CQC) and innovative and dynamic sabotage gadget crafting with brand new science-fiction based stealth action multiplayer gameplay!

games.name: Economic Miracle
games.description: Build your own state in the most detailed economic simulator! Playing for the government of any country in the world, you will have to conduct domestic and foreign policy, pass laws, carry out economic reforms and fight. Try a real simulator of modern times!

games.name: Agecraft
games.description: Agecraft is a historical strategy and city-building game where players guide a civilization from the Stone Age to the space age. The game combines settlement building, resource management, and technological progression. Players construct cities, manage the economy, provide for their people, and expand across different eras, unlocking new buildings, production chains, and methods of transportation as history advances.

games.name: Leafy Corner
games.description: Run a cute little plant shop in this cozy shop management game. Grow, sell, and care for a variety of real-life plants, help customers find their dream plants, complete orders, and customize your cozy shop just the way you like!

games.name: Rat Game
games.description: Asymmetrical horror comedy co-op for up to 8 players. Play either a pack of Rats trying to sabotage a restaurant, or the Chef determined to stop them.

games.name: Micro Titans Wrestling
games.description: Micro Titans Wrestling is a nostalgia fuelled roguelike deck builder themed on the golden age of professional wrestling. Prepare to step into the ring with a roster of era defining characters and take it to the mat with a unique card battle system.

games.name: Astra Bestiary
games.description: Raise Beasts from eggs into powerful Champions in this 2D monster-raising/taming RPG. Feed, train and evolve your partners to explore a perilous, non-linear world. Master fast-paced, tactical battles, uncover the secrets of a fading world and pass on the Beasts' legacy across generations.

games.name: Souls Alive: Origins
games.description: Souls Alive: Origins is a Lovecraftian survival horror game set in a dark sci-fi future. Explore a world where reality bends, ancient cults return, and Cthulhu stirs once more. With a strong focus on story, atmosphere, and visual detail.

games.name: Potions of Veldenkeep
games.description: Run your own alchemist shop in the fantasy City of Adventurers! Grow plants, brew potions, set prices, and serve curious villagers. Earn gold, build reputation, and expand your craft in this cozy first-person herbalist simulator.

games.name: Appa
games.description: Appa is a narrative driven simultaneous card game about two siblings dealing with the death of their father. You play as Varun witnessing surreal nightmares and manifestations of his deceased father and playing a card game with him.

games.name: Swarmdustry
games.description: Build a living factory and automate the Swarm. Harvest resources, build mega factories and evolve organic industry. Balance growth, efficiency, creep spread, and survival in a world that fights back. Or doesn't. Up to you really.

games.name: Blackwood
games.description: By day, you run a DVD store in 2012 New York. By night, you’re a ruthless assassin. BLACKWOOD is a cinematic third-person shooter with grounded melee combat, brutal takedowns, responsive gunplay, and a double life to manage.

games.name: Avatar Legends: The Fighting Game
games.description: Avatar Legends: The Fighting Game is a fast-paced 1v1 fighter where you battle as your favorite characters from the Avatar franchise. Featuring hand-drawn 2D animation true to the series’ roots, proprietary rollback netcode, and full cross-play for smooth, competitive gameplay.

games.name: Armada Pet Wars
games.description: Armada Pet Wars is a 4X-lite asynchronous turn based space-themed strategy game... with pets. Design Starships, make or break alliances, setup your fleets for victory in this strategic, space-themed, auto-battler.

games.name: My Eerie Lair
games.description: A dark cozy ‘Romantasy’ furnishing game where a vampire kidnaps his beloved and tries to win her heart by turning his eerie castle into their dream home.

games.name: Tales of Terrarum
games.description: 《Tales of Terrarum》is a management adventure sim game. On the new land of Terrarum, you will inherit a territory as a descendant of the Francz family, and become the town mayor to settle the craftsmen and adventurers who come to the town. You'll live in and expand the town together.

games.name: Magical Blush
games.description: Magical Blush is a top-down action-adventure where fast-paced elemental combat meets Metroidvania-style exploration. Chain spell combos, exploit elemental weaknesses, rescue survivors, and team up in local co-op as you battle the powerful Elemental Lords and explore the wondrous world of Wyn.

games.name: Diffusion
games.description: Build defenses to protect your mining sites from the hostile native alien species. Explore the planet and discover the true reasons you've been sent here for. A true old school pixel-art experience.

games.name: Starlet Voice
games.description:
STARLET☆VOICE is a narrative talent-show survival sim set inside a 100-day televised competition. Train skills, build your persona, manage pressure, and form relationships as you navigate weekly episodes shaped by your choices. Public opinion, fan reactions, and on-air risks determine whether you rise in the rankings or fall into the elimination zone.
Featuring five heroines with unique storylines, multiple endings, and a blend of performance, strategy, and visual-novel drama.

games.name: Sister Other Paranoia
games.description: A dark visual novel created by the team behind NEEDY GIRL OVERDOSE. Overly sensitive to other people's emotions, the protagonist—a light novel writer—develops the ability to read minds, only to be driven even deeper into isolation. His sole remaining comfort is his younger sister, gifted yet lonely.

games.name: Dreadnought Tartarus
games.description: Dreadnought Tartarus is a semi-automated strategic simulation game centered around a single, colossal battleship. Take control of the massive warship Tartarus and destroy everything in your path as the battlefield continuously advances！

games.name: City Party
games.description: City Party is an 8-player simultaneous turn-based party game. All players act at once—no waiting! Roll dice on beautifully crafted global city maps, use skills, control special tiles, play combo cards, challenge opponents, and collect legendary treasures. Win this urban adventure your way!

games.name: Sovereign Tower
games.description: Play as the Sovereign of a magical tower in this story-rich, Round Table management RPG. Recruit eccentric Knights, assign quests and balance egos whilst carving out your kingdom's destiny. If destiny doesn’t go your way, keep turning back time, uncover secrets and rewrite fate again and again.

games.name: Funeral for the Sun
games.description: Search the ashes of an abandoned town and uncover 400 years of damnation, family history and revolution. Witness the past with your own eyes, construct a web of connections between townsfolk, discover secret identities, and learn the foul supernatural truth of what sleeps beneath the rubble.

games.name: Moorestech
games.description: Factory automation meets anime-style RPG. Harness gears and shafts to power machines and conveyors, building an automated factory. Produce items and research tech, evolving from windmills to fusion as you trace humanity’s tech evolution, then launch a rocket home to uncover the truth of your exile.

games.name: Demra: Rifts of War
games.description: Use powerful light magic to fight back the invading demon hordes in this lite-RPG/ RTS mix. Build a base, gather resources, research and command your army.

games.name: Make The Dead Dead Again
games.description: In this third-person action-adventure, use Lux’s gun skills and enhanced DNA abilities to clear out enemies as she searches for her missing mother. Along the way, level up and acquire loot to equip her - and her home base - with an insane variety of customisation options.

games.name: Codex Arcana: Grimoire of Monsters
games.description: Summon an army of Monster Girls to face your enemies in strategic battles! Defeat the Dark Lord's minions and expand your collection with cool, fierce and cute Monster Girls of all variety in this "Capsule Monsters" inspired game!

games.name: Myth of Valderit
games.description:
Myth of Valderit is a psychological horror experience set in the cursed village of Valderit, inspired by the abandoned Catalan village of La Mussara. You wake up as Nil, separated from your friends Julia and Enric, and soon uncover the dark secrets lurking within the village…

This single-player, first-person experience combines exploration, survival, and puzzle-solving. Nil must endure and remain alive, evading the fanatical devotees of an unimaginable entity.

games.name: Worming from Home
games.description: Be the Worm of Wall Street in this silly simulation game about working a remote finance job. Throw your spineless body around the keyboard to invest in the stock market and earn obscene amounts of money. Buy upgrades, train skills, and worm your way up to the promotion you've always dreamed of!

games.name: AGX GP
games.description: AGX is a heart thumpingly fast, Anti-Gravity racing game. It's lightning‑fast action and Xtreme ability‑based gameplay, will push your reactions and skills to the limit! Welcome To AGX!

games.name: InterViolence
games.description: Wander through a secret lair. Help a young supervillain move out of his lifelong home. Think about your past, and his uncertain future. The third entry in the Violence series.

games.name: Vapor Strange
games.description: Explore bizarre procedural generated psychedelic worlds, encounter surreal creatures, experience shifting rulesets, retro aesthetics, and altered music for a wild and truly strange experience.

games.name: Eye of Syn
games.description: Summon and combine demons to battle against zombie hordes in Eye of Syn, a lane based tower defense game where you must protect two dimensions at once. Uncover dark secrets and powerful demon synergies as you try to save Earth from an eldritch apocalypse.

games.name: Hellcard II
games.description: Hellcard II is a cooperative roguelike deckbuilder that can be played solo or with a team of up to four players. The game takes place in the paper dungeons known from Hellcard and Book of Demons, expanding into new biomes and storylines.

games.name: Another Eden Begins
games.description: Embark on a time-traveling RPG adventure featuring command battles presented by Masato Kato, creator of numerous RPG classics. With New Game+, embark on a new adventure with your upgraded characters and discover more than 10 different endings.

games.name: The Grand Slamboree
games.description:
The Grand Slamboree is a 2D Platform-Fighter, where every hit is lethal for intense, fast-paced rounds. With simplified movesets, anyone can join in the brawl, while leaving plenty for dedicated players to master!

Bash, blast and chomp your way to victory in this tournament of creatures, weirdos and not-quite-heroes.

games.name: Mine Mine
games.description: Mine Mine is an incremental game about mining ores, upgrading your equipment, and unlocking better and better quarries!

games.name: Beyond The Cupola: ISS Simulator
games.description: You are the ISS crew, where the station's fate depends on everyone. Oxygen leaks, system failures, meteorite threats — repair with your own hands and make real-time decisions. Complete missions, perform spacewalks. Experience life in orbit: in space, nothing goes according to plan.

games.name: Local Zombies
games.description: Death is just a career change. Shape unique characters in this turn-based life sim, then resurrect them as zombie companions. Transform their past talents into tactical advantages to take over the city.

games.name: Tunnel Escape Fates Entwined
games.description: Fight through a zombie-ravaged city as Olivenia, a daring cop on an escort mission in this rogue-lite RPG/ADV. Use various weapons and upgrade your gear to survive brutal gunplay and deadly encounters where every choice counts. Fail, and very bad things might happen to you…

games.name: WomboCombo
games.description: Fight through hordes of mobs in a roguelike-style challenge by hitting the correct key sequence. Test your reflexes, build your character, and survive the chaos as each stage ramps up. Rack up massive combos and push your limits with every run.

games.name: Barefort
games.description: "The fewer defenses you have, the more you become yourself." On the board, the score spreads over time, and corruption erodes. Stack units to create chain effects and turn the tide with minimal placement. Placing too many units will destroy you, while placing too few will prevent you from defending.

games.name: Freelance Dead
games.description: A roguelite top‑down twin‑stick shooter. Rain, shine, or zombie outbreak—nothing stops a Courier on a deadline. Shoot, loot, and scoot through hordes of undead with ridiculous item synergies. Earn cash, unlock weapons, and grow from broke gig worker to a walking apocalypse.

games.name: Ludus Magnatus: Gladiator Manager Simulator
games.description: Ludus Magnatus: Gladiator Manager Simulator is a classic management experience set in an alternate Ancient Rome. Start in Division VII with one of sixteen clubs, recruit fighters, equip them from the market, and climb the ladder through fully simulated seasons and matches.

games.name: Purrfect Tanks: The Yarnpocalypse
games.description: Command adorable cats in chaotic cardboard tanks and battle for the last yarn on Earth! Explosions, lasers, catnip-fueled madness — and lots of cardboard.

games.name: Flipper on Recoil
games.description: Flipper on Recoil is a fast-paced 3D platformer where a fish with legs and a shotgun takes on gravity. Use recoil, power-ups, and absurd tricks to blast through handcrafted levels and chase your best times.

games.name: Shell of the Coward
games.description: Shell of the Coward is a turn-based roguelike/RPG where you must escort the Anathema you've sworn to protect through a perilous dungeon without ever looking back.

games.name: Wrecked
games.description: 失败作 Wrecked is a visual novel game developed and published by ShanProject. Players advance the story by clicking key points on the screen. Featuring multiple routes and rich narratives. The game is music-themed, telling a fateful journey full of unforeseen twists.

games.name: Dreamy Golden Snow
games.description: Dreamy Golden Snow is a fantasy mystery-themed visual novel that tells a story among high school girls. The story appears in an ordinary high school. After the incident, the protagonist is also affected, and players will guide her through numerous choices to uncover the truth.

games.name: Cat Squeeze
games.description: Cat Squeeze is a cozy, brain-teasing cat puzzle game. Playing as an explosive kitten, use the extrusion of the pipeline, and navigate a maze to collect fish treats! Solve puzzles with precise blasts to escape, or get trapped by the soft maze.

games.name: Mystic Land: The search for Maphaldo
games.description: An old-school RPG game inspired by Wizardry 7, Might and Magic and Eye of the Beholder series. 2d grid-based movement, strategic turn-based combat and lots of places to visit and puzzles to solve.

games.name: Crescent County
games.description: Crash headfirst into this witch-tech open world, drifting and driving on the back of your new motorbroom. Make deliveries, trick out your broom, and race your new friends (and crushes) as the sun sets. Decorate your flat, sort your life out, and discover what it means to find home.

games.name: Decksplorers: Into the Shell
games.description: Dive into the world of Decksplorers: Into the Shell, where deckbuilding card combat meets real-time action in a thrilling roguelite adventure! Master the art of strategic card play, swift reflexes, and exploration as you venture into the mysterious ever-changing caves of "The shell"

games.name: Eternal Haunt
games.description: Eternal Haunt is a first-person atmospheric survival horror game. Explore the claustrophobic labyrinth of Yuki-Onna's home. Solve dynamic puzzles, scavenge for items, experience haunting scares that shift and evolve. Can you endure the relentless cold and escape the chilling embrace of death?

games.name: Fiefdom
games.description: Change the world, one battle at a time in FIEFDOM: a multiplayer action melee game set in a playerbase-driven story. Clash swords, cast spells, rain down arrows & more in in battles of up to 100 players both at land & at sea. Dive into a world where your victories define the outcome of entire wars. Who will you be fighting for?

games.name: Steel Ark
games.description: A first-person survival sandbox game where you explore a post-apocalyptic world, scavenge resources, craft production chains, and keep your train base running against all odds.

games.name: Corinne
games.description: Navigate Corinne through a realm of pixel horrors, surrounded by neighbors that are turning into bloodthirsty monsters. Discover the secrets of this twisted dimension before it's too late for Corinne and her friends.

games.name: Occult Hand of the Blood Lily
games.description: A Gothic-Punk yuri visual novel about a magician on the run and her mysterious vampiric guardian. Journey by airship across a war-torn Europe and search for a legendary flower with the power to destroy nations.

games.name: Hollow Faces
games.description: Hollow Faces is an atmospheric narrative horror where you step into the role of creators documenting paranormal phenomena. The game blends an intense walking simulator with environmental observation, careful listening, and reacting to threats.

games.name: Oathwood Realms
games.description: Oathwood Realms is a dark fantasy strategy card game focused on careful planning, tactical decisions, and calculated risk. Luck plays a role, but victory favors players who read the board and commit to their choices.

games.name: Bravery
games.description: BRAVERY is a third-person 3D adventure game in which players guide a fragile matchstick character through vast, detailed environments that appear enormous in scale. Gameplay focuses on exploration, tense chase sequences, and interactive fire mechanics that allow objects to be ignited. Throughout the journey, players discover hidden areas and capture enigmatic orbs that are sealed within restored magical mirrors, shaping progression through the world.

games.name: Lepidarium
games.description: Relax and collect unique butterflies and moths. Witness the real-time lifecycle from Larva to Pupa to Butterfly. Customize lush greenhouses and discover rare species in this cozy idle game. Let your sanctuary flutter in the background while you work or study!

games.name: FAFO Executive Order Simulator
games.description: F around and find out! A ruthless no F's given dark comedy where you play the president of the United States of America, abuse executive power, crank up the FAFO meter, deal with robot overlords, alien invasions, drain swamps, flip off allies, crush protests, and destroy all that oppose you!

games.name: The House in the Hollow
games.description: With stunning graphics, inspired by the 1920's Art Deco period, and a chilling soundtrack, the "House In The Hollow" will take you on a journey like no other. A journey filled with mystery, horror, and magic, where you are the master of your own fate.

games.name: Death Rabbit
