games.description: The city that never sleeps has taken a sinister turn, and the dark tunnels of the MTA have become the epicenter of a horrifying outbreak. As Alisa, you must navigate through a labyrinthine underground world fraught with danger, where unspeakable horrors lurk around every corner.

games.name: Grimmlins Tale
games.description: Grimmlins Tale is an action adventure monster tamer where you catch, train, and bond with all fairy tale inspired monsters. Fight alongside your monster friends in deep, real-time strategic combat, and hop on their backs to explore in the whimsical world of Never Everland.

games.name: Pozionista
games.description: Travel through a world surrounded by nature, collect plants and use them to create potions, invent new recipes, sell potions in stores and explore the world.

games.name: M.E.M.O
games.description: Rely on nothing but your own wits. A first-person cryptographic adventure game that play with paper and pen. As you wander through the maze of memories, can you find the key to saving the future?

games.name: Radiant Starlets
games.description: Radiant Starlets is a HD2D action platformer in the vein of classic action platformers but you can date all the bosses. Select your boss order and make your way through 8 challenging stages. Try every order and uncover the mysteries of this world.

games.name: Dungeon of Departure
games.description: an independently developed, pixel art, visual novel set in an original universe which follows the silent, player protagonist and three companion characters as they struggle to find a way out of an increasingly puzzling, underground world.

games.name: The Carcass
games.description: A deep roguelike colony RPG inside a dead god's corpse. Procedurally generated events, branching narratives, species with unique traits, and meaningful choices that shape your colony's fate. Every playthrough tells a different story of survival and evolution.

games.name: Knights Province
games.description:
Become medieval lord. Build and defend your town. Train your army. Conquer the enemies.

Knights Province is intended to be an old-school RTS game. Unlike many modern RTS games, which are fast-paced and often are more about tactics, KP planned to emphasize on “strategy” component. Slower-paced gameplay, base-building, resources collection and processing, in-depth strategic choices, variety of resources and units, attention to details.

games.name: Beautiful Light
games.description: Beautiful Light is a PvPvP(vE) tactical first-person extraction shooter where 6 squads of 3 operators are tasked with entering, securing, and extracting an artifact in a hostile, horrific environment. Face other operators and player-controlled anomalies, but beware: mistakes can risk your life and gear.

games.name: SweetCanvas
games.description: An untimely transfer. An unexpected encounter. A chance meeting between two students sets in motion a chain of events that will fundamentally change both of their lives... Or, perhaps, just their love life!

games.name: Chronal Chain
games.description: "TIME CONTROL" bullet hell action. Overcome impossible odds by slowing, stopping and rewinding time!

games.name: Legal Beagll: Justice is Argued
games.description: Legal Beagll: Justice is Argued is a courtroom simulation RPG where every trial is a battle of wits. You’ll take on the role of Harold Beagll, a golden retriever attorney navigating a legal system filled with sharp-tongued rivals, eccentric clients, and unpredictable witnesses.

games.name: Merry Crisis
games.description: Three loves. One week. Zero chill. Merry Crisis is an intimate, character-driven romance visual novel about love, loss, and belonging—is home what you left behind, or where you’re headed?

games.name: Cats Hidden in Advent Calendar
games.description: Sweeten the countdown to Christmas with this fabulous advents calendar full of hidden cats for you to find in this cute HOG by Travellin Cats - the original viral hidden cats game creator!

games.name: Hunter From Hell
games.description: With your friends, form a team of paranormal experts to unravel the mysteries of the most terrifying places. Armed with sophisticated gadgets like EMF detectors, infrared cameras, and incantation books, your mission is simple: gather evidence of the beyond and survive chilling encounters.

games.name: Little Ghost
games.description: 2D Metroidvania focused on platforming rather than combat. Explore a surreal paper world using a unique horizontal float mechanic. Chill-yet-Challenging, Little Ghost has tons of music, a sizeable interconnected map to unlock, & lots of hidden items.

games.name: Infinitesimals
games.description: Infinitesimals is a story-driven, 3rd person action adventure where you play as tiny aliens who stand only 1mm tall. Though a diminutive species, they are technologically advanced and space faring.

games.name: Witchbrook
games.description: Experience the thrills and pitfalls of school-life in Witchbrook! Discover a spellbinding isometric pixel art world full of charm and intrigue in this richly detailed magical school and town life simulator.

games.name: Fable
games.description: Become the Hero you want to be in an immersive open-world action-RPG where each choice shapes your journey, reputation is everything, and fairytale endings are never guaranteed.

games.name: Port Valley
games.description: Port Valley is a (not so) classic Point & Click game where a certain choice changes everything. Witness 3 points of view of the same story and find out what's really going on during Port Valley's Election Day!

games.name: Forsaken Realms: Vahrin's Call
games.description: Adventure awaits in this narrative driven fantasy action-RPG. The war-torn city of Vahrin stands before you on the brink of collapse and in desperate need of aid. As a mercenary in search of your next…opportunity, will you answer Vahrin’s Call?

games.name: The Way of Wrath
games.description: The Way of Wrath is a story-driven turn-based tactical RPG set in an ancient world governed by shamanistic laws. You explore the beautifully handcrafted landscape, rebuild defences of an old fort, take on quests and unite war torn people against the imminent wrath of enemy forces. Will you lead with an iron fist, diplomacy or trickery is up to you, but with every choice you make be prepared to face the consequences.

games.name: Last Moon
games.description: The Moon is falling, malicious creatures appear, the world falls in chaos! Last Moon is an Action-RPG greatly inspired by the mythical titles from the 90s! Explore a mesmerizing, vast and ruined world riddled with dangers, face tainted creatures and upgrade your abilities in a classic hand-drawn 2D style.

games.name: Rune Fencer Illyia
games.description: Rune Fencer Illyia is an intense, atmospheric action-platformer with a heavy focus on exploration and combat. Traverse an enormous and dangerous world, meet strange allies, and outfight your numerous foes with fast-paced swordplay and stolen runic magic.

games.name: The Lewd Knight
games.description: Help the girl - a superhero in the fight against evil

games.name: HyperCore: Rhythm Bullet Hell
games.description: HyperCore is a “Rhythm Bullet Hell”, mixing the frenetic action of classic bullet hell Shoot'em Up with semi-procedurally generated encounters based on the music. As PRISS, survive the action-packed levels in sync with the music and protect what is left of Humanity.

games.name: Divinum
games.description: Divinum is an action sidescroller featuring an intricate combat system and metroidvania elements. Attain the powers of the ancestor spirits, protect your home island from the invaders and uncover its dark secret!

games.name: Lost Viking: Kingdom of Women
games.description: While traveling to the East the Vikings fall into a trap. Ragnald is saved by the accompanying wolf and must find his loved ones. The Viking and his companion are forced not only to survive, but properly manage time, space and energy to achieve the goal.

games.name: Shadow of the Road
games.description: Shadow of the Road is a story-driven, turn-based RPG where feudal Japan meets magic and machine. Assemble your team from a diverse set of characters and test your skills against yōkai and steampunk contraptions. Carve your own path through an immersive story and change the fate of the Empire.

games.name: Carnival Hunt
games.description: Carnival Hunt is a Multiplayer Social Horror Game where you can either fight against the cannibalism corrupting the world or embrace it. Will you be the first one to commit cannibalism for survival or test your instinct at trust?

games.name: Neverlooted Dungeon
games.description: Venture deep into the Neverlooted Dungeon and face its treacherous, deadly traps. Armed with your creativity, trusty weapon and magical items, find your own ways to outsmart the dangers in a highly immersive world. Be careful, become paranoid, be the first to loot!

games.name: The Pope: Power & Sin
games.description: Take on the role of the Pope, strengthen the authority of the Church State, fight for spiritual and political independence from pagans and the renewal of church structures. The rule of Pope is a torrent of numerous scandals, excesses and signs of moral corruption in the authorities of the Church.

games.name: RevenBlade
games.description: RevenBlade is team-based third-person hero shooter with MOBA elements and a focus on melee combat with fast-paced action and mechanical outplays.

games.name: The Cabbage Effect
games.description: A cartoon-pop-surrealistic twin-stick shooter on procedurally generated stages that takes place in an apocalyptic narrative.

games.name: Nonuple Nine: Asymptote
games.description: "NONUPLE NINE: Asymptote" is a side-scrolling, narrative Sci-fi adventure game. Control the subject girl and solve the mystery of the building where the same floor loops. With vast scientific insights, can you find the answer for the "meaning of humanity" during this deadly journey?

games.name: Skyclimbers
games.description: Build your kingdom, choose your class, and tame monsters in this Multiplayer City-Building/Open-World Action RPG that takes place in a procedurally generated anime-themed metaverse.

games.name: Your World
games.description: Create beautiful multiplayer worlds, games, simulators, and theme parks with this easy-to-use sandbox title.

games.name: Tukoni: Forest Keepers
games.description: Tukoni: Forest Keepers is a cute and cozy puzzle adventure, based on a series of award-winning books by the Ukrainian artist Oksana Bula. Play as the forest spirit Tukoni as you meet unique characters, solve captivating puzzles, brew fragrant tea and explore a magical world filled with kindness. Play our free prologue now!

games.name: Heart of Muriet
games.description: Unique voxel fantasy real-time strategy. Experience the land of Muriet and reunite your family in this epic real-time strategy game! It's a game for people who love RTS games, but intense micromanagement stops them from playing.

games.name: Treasure Islands
games.description: Help Nick and Pippa find a selection of new artefacts and exhibits for the Grand Museum in an exciting adventure across a number of islands, each with their own quirks, characters and strange events!

games.name: Pocket Wheels
games.description: Pocket Wheels isn't just a racing game, it's an objective-based 3D platformer. Take a seat in various toy cars with special abilities and explore a house full of themed rooms filled with collectibles, objectives and race tracks!

games.name: Gravity Blasters
games.description: Gravity Blasters is a fast, fun and addictive multiplayer artillery action game that is recreating the classic artillery style of aiming and shooting by adjusting the angle and power.

games.name: Eternity Guards
games.description: The main idea of the game is a fantasy alternative to Valhalla. Scandinavian mythology is a thematic focus - the same style, ornaments and atmosphere where heroes fight for a place in eternity, there will be only one.

games.name: Meteora
games.description: Be a meteor in a constant race for survival in a young and chaotic universe by dodging, chasing & taking down other meteors in Meteora. Power up, strategize and put your skills to the test in our spectacular arcade combat racer!

games.name: Eden.schemata();
games.description: EDEN.schemata(); is a multi-ending sci-fi mystery adventure game, featuring headless corpses, a sealed laboratory, a limbless android suspect/heroine, and an amnesiac protagonist. The game design and gradually UI change in reflection of your actions.

games.name: They Are Here: Alien Abduction Horror
games.description: They Are Here is a first-person horror story about a journalist who witnessed an alien abduction at the Grayswood farm. Explore the area armed with a flashlight. Take photos of evidence of aliens presence and get to the bottom of the horrifying truth.

games.name: Espiocracy
games.description: Espiocracy is grand strategy game with unique take on the Cold War. Play as an intelligence service (CIA, KGB, Stasi, Mossad, and many more): launch proxy wars, stage coups, steal war plans, assassinate enemies, and tilt world history in your favor.

games.name: HeartLinks: A Puzzle Called Love
games.description: Solve puzzles with the power of friendship! Each student you befriend gives you a unique item that lets you unlock new areas and explore a wacky anime school! To deliver a confession to your crush, can you clear every obstacle? Can you overcome your feelings? Can you solve the puzzle called love?

games.name: Project: Aurora
games.description: Project: Aurora is an exploration game combining elements of RTS, survival and adventure games. You are the captain of the research mission, which lands on the surface of the newly discovered planet.

games.name: Yuha's Nightmares
games.description: This is a simulation game about the nightmares that our main character Yuha suffers from. You will explore the surrealistic world that is full of unexpected events. The deeper part of Yuha's consciousness is depicted through the flip side of the 3D world.

games.name: Midnight Laundry
games.description: Midnight Laundry is a short first-person horror game where a long night at the laundromat takes an unexpected turn.

games.name: Imperial Grace
games.description: Imperial Grace is a unique mix of romance, medieval intrigue, and strategy. Play as the new Empress of Calidya through a visual novel rife with ambition and deceit. Make choices that will change your fate and that of your nation, rule wisely to make your Empire prosper, and find love along the way!

games.name: Jury Trial
games.description: In this law simulation RPG you join a group of innocence lawyers. Set in a fictional country deeply divided by racial profiling, prejudice and social injustice it’s your job to find a jury who’s willing to listen. Study case material, discover new evidence and convince the jury in the court of law.

games.name: Explory Story
games.description: Play as a world famous detective who is stuck inside one of his own works! Be careful and watch your step. The words on the page can come to life.

games.name: Check x Mate
games.description: A fantasy visual novel set in a magical world of chess. Gameplay consists mainly of decision making and chess puzzles that represent what is happening in the story. There is a beginner difficulty for those new to chess and expert difficulty for those who seek more of a challenge.

games.name: Super/Human Identity
games.description: An RPG/Visual Novel hybrid where your choices affect both your own fate and the fates of your companions. Dynamic relationship system, romances (LGBTQIA+ or straight), and Quick Time Event superhero action.

games.name: Rules of Alchemy
games.description: Defy fate as you blast your way through a procedural open world, in this spell combo roguelike with thousands of items and hundreds of spells.

games.name: Wandering Wolf
games.description: Survival-Action experience in a dead world destroyed by civil war. You have to complete your own story, fighting for survival with monsters and nature.

games.name: Determinant
games.description: Post-apocalyptic physics-based open-world survival adventure game. Planned to include combat, base building, crafting, puzzles, survival and a compelling story to drive it. Building will be a core gameplay mechanic where you build structures to overcome challenges and solve puzzles in the world.

games.name: Island of Winds
games.description:
Island of Winds takes you to 17th century Iceland, plunging them into a magical world teeming with trolls, giant spiders, and mythical creatures. Experience all of this through the eyes of the magic-wielding Brynhild, a member of the Balance Keepers who draws her magical power from the natural world.

Brynhild's journey has her on a quest to find her mentor, Hrymja, that will take her through nine incredible landscapes that draw on Iceland's stunning natural beauty. These locations range from the fiery Lava of Skjól to the treacherous Jökla lagoon and gleaming Obsidian Shore. Brynhild will face legendary creatures on her journey, such as the powerful and majestic Bear King, Hafgúfa - Guardian of the Sea and the majestic elven lady Vör of the Oasis.

games.name: Potata: Foxy Tale
games.description: Potata: Foxy Tale is a fairy tale themed platformer adventure game in a beautiful world of dark forests. Your goal is to restore the balance and assemble the fragments of the Woodland Spirit.

games.name: Fragile Existence
games.description: Take command of the last surviving fleet of humankind in Fragile Existence, a sci-fi RTS with fully 3D planet surfaces and vast solar systems to explore. Dispatch expeditions to find resources, build settlements, construct vital parts and supplies, and evolve your technology to meet new threats.

games.name: The Inspector
games.description: The Inspector is a short-form first-person adventure about exploring the human mind. As an Inspector, you have the delicate task of investigating the human mind in search of those elements that will bring our loved ones back to life

games.name: Enter the Chronosphere
games.description: A psychedelic roguelike that blurs the line between real-time action and turn-based tactics. Play as misfit aliens, craft wild combinations between hundreds of weapons, items and abilities, and disable uncharted chronospheres: Colossal structures that consume time and distort reality.

games.name: Zeta Wolf Chronicles
games.description: "Date" one of four girls on the path to enlightenment. Prom awaits. Will you be led astray by an old crush? The realistic dating-sim that "teaches" through its gameplay. Follow Rayen, a young disillusioned teen as he attempts to romance girls based on e-book tutorials. Will desperation win out in this desire for love, or will knowledge, patience, and logic pave the way to success?

games.name: Recursor
games.description: An action roguelite inspired by platform fighters

games.name: A Sister's Journey
games.description: Explore a charmingly beautiful, hand-crafted pixel art world and help Violet on her journey searching for her sister. Uncover its mysteries, face its threatening foes, and run 'n gun your way through this challenging action-metroidvania - which will put your true platforming skills to the test.

games.name: Roombattle
games.description:
Roombattle is a party fighting game where players will control robotic vacuum cleaners and will fight equipped with sharp objects and balloons. The main objective is to be the last to be equipped balloons in the game. In addition to the battles, the game contains a large crowd of minigames.

Meet up with your friends, customize your vacuum, and get ready to battle in different rooms to claim victory!

games.name: Showa American Story
games.description: Showa American Story is a brand new RPG and an enthusiastic love letter to the 80s' pop culture that features a strong taste of B-Movies. Follow Choko's journey of truth and revenge across North America as she grows stronger.

games.name: Our Life: Now & Forever
games.description: A paper airplane, two new neighbors, four autumns, and a one of a kind life. Create an experience that’s all your own in this near-fully customizable, choice-heavy story where you grow from childhood to adulthood.

games.name: Killbot General
games.description: Satisfying real-time tactics packed in 5-minute battles. Create a customized cause and lead it to glory as its hero Killbot General in the crazy, dynamic story campaign for single-player or co-op. Simple yet deep, controller-friendly, with emphasis on strategy, not micromanagement.

games.name: Ardenfall
games.description: Ardenfall is a first-person RPG set in a world of intricate politics and ancient cultures. Explore rain-drenched wetlands and forgotten dungeons full of danger. Meet countless interesting characters with unique dialog and quests, and leave your mark on this mysterious world.

games.name: Dagada's Story
games.description:
Dive into the depths of a snowy world in this adventure game. Explore a mountain where a tribe of strange creatures, the Daoudaounes, lives among ancient ruins, while seeking answers to the mysteries that surround you.

Dagada's Story is a Puzzle-platformer game inspired by Super Nintendo-era games. This adventure emphasizes the balance between exploration, platforming, and puzzle-solving, with responsive controls and beautiful storytelling.

Particular attention has been given to the creation of the universe and each of its graphical, sound, and game design elements. The animation aims to be smooth and lively, reminiscent of pixel art from such game as Yoshi's island or the Super Mario bros series ...

games.name: Droid Escape
games.description: In this adventure, help Droid 07 to overcome challenges, discover mysteries and free your friend from the miniaigas.

games.name: Candela
games.description: Manipulate colors and conquer challenging puzzles in this mysterious 2D platformer set in a post-apocalyptic world. Explore the overworld, uncover hidden secrets, and bring light to this dark, desolate land

games.name: Christine
games.description: Christine is a young orphan who works at the Paris Opera, with an unexplored talent for singing. If history sometimes repeats itself, will an Angel of Music help her to achieve her dreams?

games.name: Obscurity: Unknown Threat
games.description: Obscurity: Unknown Threat is a horror shooter game where a team of soldiers must survive against a hidden foe. The game contains both conventional symmetrical FPS game modes as well as asymmetrical battles vs the Obscurity.

games.name: Abyss Delvers
games.description: Abyss Delvers is an Online Action RPG. Adventure out alone or party up with your friends on an epic journey and fight the monstrous hordes of the Abyss. Featuring randomly generated campaigns, dungeons, items and more!

games.name: The Bornless
games.description:
The Bornless is an FPS action shooter packed with a variety of gameplay modes. Dive into last-man-standing co-op gameplay or try the thrilling demon versus disciple mode, all within a terror-filled world. Players pair up and form teams, conjure demons to aid in combat, and utilize strategic planning and resource management to survive. Whether you choose an aggressive playstyle or prefer a more cautious approach, the choice is yours.

Join or create a Faction and amass various resources to upgrade and enhance your Safehouse or personalize your gear to give a new look to your arsenal as you go to war with other Factions.

You will also experience deep lore and storyline involving all the characters within The Bornless universe, which will be revealed as facts are discovered by players.

games.name: Solarpunk
games.description:
Solarpunk is a survival game in a technically advanced world of floating islands. Alone or together with your friends, you can construct buildings, grow food, craft gadgets and explore distant islands with your own airship.

Use sunlight, wind and water to create an energy system and automate your processes like gathering ressoureces, watering your plants or catching fish.

games.name: Eternal Remnant: The First Chapter
games.description: Dive into the unforgettable tale of two siblings on the run in this emotional RPG journey. With only their wits and a cursed power too dangerous to control, they must fight, explore and scavenge to survive in an unfamiliar world. Will their bond be strong enough to endure the road ahead?

games.name: Underling Uprising
games.description: Play as the Underlings, a group of experiments created by evil mad science, as you seek revenge on your previous captor, the maniacal Dr. Baldrick! On their journey, the Underlings will need to fight across the globe, overcome the demons of their pasts, and accept help from unexpected places.

games.name: Mirai #167
games.description: MIRAI #167 is a 2D pixel-art runner where you control two characters at once, rewinding time and jumping through portals. Embark on a frantic adventure to save humanity in a world where AI surpasses human control - upgrade your characters, break records and rewrite history before it’s too late!

games.name: Critias Empire
games.description: Turn-based strategy game with 4x elements. Build your empire while surviving frequent disasters rained down by the ancient Gods.

games.name: Hero Chest
games.description: The perfect combination of Roguelike, Hack Slash and Card Game! In Hero Chest you are an angry chest that got tired of being looted and decided to finish them all! With powers and special cards create the dungeon and strategize to reach your goal. An adventure full of combat and gold!

games.name: Mira: The Legend of the Djinns
games.description: An epic 2D pixel art style Metroidvania, inspired by Moroccan culture and spiritual traditions. Wield powerful ancient weapons and forge your way through unrelenting deserts, crumbling necropoli, floating islands and dangerous mountains as you try to uncover the secret of the last Djinn.

games.name: Multi Idle
games.description: Multi Idle is an idle game that features Exploring, Adventuring, Hero's, Dungeons, Raids and many more in its own kind of idling way. Get stuck in an endless loop of trying new things every time you play!

games.name: Cursed Dungeon Raider
games.description: Embark on an exploration adventure with spooky and horror elements, tasked with recovering real historical artifacts from excavation sites around the world. Beware of local traps and monsters inspired by the mythology of each region.

games.name: Death Ring
games.description: Death Ring is a casual action roguelike in which you will have to force your way through hordes of undead in search of the human world’s main artefact. Numerous scenarios of each character’s development based on random dropping items will make your runs unique.

games.name: Deer & Boy
games.description: A Cinematic Platformer who you follow the journey of a boy who, during his flight will meet an unexpected companion. Together they will overcome many obstacles that will change their lives forever.

games.name: Nivalis
games.description: Grow your business, manage restaurants and nightclubs, make friends and enemies, buy and decorate apartments, go fishing and maybe even find love in Nivalis, the city that stretches from the ocean to the clouds.

games.name: Tales of the Death
games.description: Join a comic adventure in a hand-drawn book with a life of its own. Rearrange the panels of an animated comic to reveal the stories of the world of The Death.

games.name: Good Heavens!
games.description: Good Heavens! is a procedurally generated open world crafting RPG for 1-8 players. Be a farmer, hunter, trader or warrior and explore the promised lands full of different races and cultures. Lead the heavens to salvation or who cares, find the best werewolf tavern and get drunk.

games.name: Phonopolis
games.description: The story of Phonopolis tackles relatable, real-world themes and topics, focusing on manipulation and individualism, but still keeping the overall experience playful and light-hearted. Players will take on the role of Felix, a thoughtful young man who, along with his fellow citizens, faces the imminent threat of falling under the control of the city’s authoritarian Leader once and for all, effectively losing their humanity. Accidentally becoming the only person who consciously recognizes the threat, young Felix must try to stop the Leader from playing the Absolute tone...

games.name: Alice is Dead: Hearts and Diamonds
games.description: A complete remake of the classic Flash game trilogy, Alice is Dead. Hearts and Diamonds includes all new art, added puzzles, expanded lore, and plenty of secrets for old and new fans alike.

games.name: Derelikt
games.description: DERELIKT is a short narrative FPS inspired by Alien Resurrection (PS1, 2000) and Doom 3 (PC, 2004), with a dash of cosmic horror. It aims to recreate the PS1 aesthetic as faithfully as possible.

games.name: Deep Alchemy Dungeon
games.description: D.A.D. is a dungeon crawling game were alchemy skills play crucial role. Young witch ominous plans were destroyed when she was put in a jail. But she founds ancient laboratory full of secrets and new shining perspectives behind the broken wall.

games.name: Abyss Fantasia
games.description: The city "Cynthia" on the edge of the abyss, the "missing" girl who didn't know where she came from began to step into the abyss. Experience the complex emotional, mysterious biological environment under the Abyss. Finally face the deepest darkness of the abyss.

games.name: Magnetic Bonds
games.description: Magnetic Bonds is a fusion of the visual novel and turn-based RPG genres inspired by shonen manga where players explore a vast galaxy, befriending characters and building relationships as they progress through the story and take down enemies and bosses.

games.name: Almost My Floor: Duality
games.description: Almost My Floor: Duality - a noir detective horror-adventure game about the internal struggle with depression and the impending darkness in a provincial town. The gameplay is based on decision-making mechanics and a branching storyline.

games.name: Paws and Leaves: A Last Tale
games.description: Life flashes before your eyes when you die. Help Me Fox by finding his memories beyond life and experiencing a touching, cute, and scary tale.

games.name: Dimakerus
games.description: Disguise as anyone. Mimic their ways. Ambush your friends. Discover cursed Roman relics in ever-chanading catacombs and wield their might to obliterate those who stand in your way.

games.name: Dungeons of the Amber Griffin
games.description: Play as a group of daredevils who explore the world of dark fantasy in search of fame, amber and gold. Experience the classic mechanics of the iconic ‘90s Dungeon Crawlers with a new twist. Solve the mystery of the ghost that haunted the ruins and discover a bestiary based on Kashubian beliefs.

games.name: Name of the Will
games.description: You are informed to be a resident of Hope, a suspiciously harmonious community. Dodge the secretive governors, establish a rapport with your neighbors who monitor you, and solve puzzles to find out how you got here. Are you willing to sacrifice for the truth? Or, are you choosing a life of oblivion?

games.name: K-Pop Idol Stories: Road to Debut
games.description: A love letter to the thrilling world of K-pop! In this life simulator, you're the manager responsible for scouting talent, organising schedules, creating budgets, planning social media, choosing music, and styling your idols. Your goal? To debut the next big K-pop idol group!

games.name: Order Automatica
games.description: A turn-based auto battler secret society. Draft your grid of allies, arrange them in synergistic formations, equip items to gain power, and survive against a gauntlet of enemy grids. Perform the rites and ascend with a variety of different team builds to unlock new allies and powerups!

games.name: Bloody Hell Hotel
games.description: In Bloody Hell Hotel, you embody a vampire. You wake up from a coma that has lasted for centuries, only to find your once-grand estate is now in ruins. It's time to turn it into a prosperous hotel! It's no easy task, though, as times are tough and resources are scarce. There are shortages of food, supplies, and workforce. Being a blood-thirsty monster doesn't help with customer satisfaction either. Luckily, underneath the estate lies a crypt and a system of caves. By foraging, farming, crafting, and fighting your way through the monster-infested dungeons, you'll find the resources you need to restore greatness to your mansion and turn it into a thriving hotel business.

games.name: Luna Abyss
games.description: Luna Abyss is a single player story driven action-adventure with fluid platforming and bullet hell combat. Follow the journey of Fawkes, a prisoner of Luna caught between a cryptic prophecy and their prison sentence.

games.name: 34Everlast
games.description: This is a super-concentrated action entertainment for busy working adults. The game is an action puzzle game where your discoveries and actions unravel a complex and intertwined world of breathless action in a dying world.

games.name: Kvlt
games.description: Fight your way through armies of Nazi occultists, religious zealots, and unspeakable cosmic horrors to unveil the Eldritch secrets behind the war theatre in this 2000s-era-inspired grimdark singleplayer FPS where WW2 meets Cthulhu Mythos.

games.name: Wonderland Quest
games.description: Wonderland Quest is a casual point & click adventure game. Travel across Wonderland teeming with colorful challenges, surprises and creatures, brought to life with beautiful artwork.

games.name: Farm Renovator
games.description: Buy a ruined farm and give it its full glory back. Clean, repair, restore, improve. Repair machines, manage the work on your farm, take care of your animals, and choose your development strategy. We're sure you'll have many satisfied customers.

games.name: Tenebris Somnia
games.description:
Tenebris Somnia is a horror adventure in the same vein as survival horror classics like Silent Hill or Resident Evil, but transferred to a retro 2D environment more typical of the N.E.S. or Famicom.

You will struggle to survive by solving puzzles and fighting horrible creatures.

The secret ingredient of the game is its cinematics. When you reach certain key points you will see sequences with a completely different aesthetic, made in live action with real actors and created by a professional film crew.

games.name: Virtueror: The Virtual Conqueror
games.description: Virtueror is an RTS with 4x and RPG elements. Your mission is to conquer new worlds and to extend your domain over the whole galaxy. Build your base, command your units, gather resources, set up defenses and crush anyone challenging you. Have no mercy and the universe will be yours!

games.name: Orc Warchief: Strategy City Builder
games.description: Become an Orc warchief and fight for survival of your race. Rebuild your village and train your warriors. Gather resources and craft your weapons. Raise your warbanner and gather The Horde.

games.name: Kitsune: The Journey of Adashino
games.description: "Where will their light lead them?" Kitsune is a fox girl who finds herself on Adashino Island and starts travelling with her Frog friend. Neon signs give light and color to the island with a Japanese-inspired atmosphere. Something is lurking in the shadows, inching ever closer...

games.name: Feudums
games.description: Feudums is a medieval strategy simulation with a detailed player-to-player vassalage system, full modding support and community-driven narrative. Balance diplomatic, economic, and military aspects while making your play for the throne. Is it your destiny to rule?

games.name: Furcifer's Fungeon
games.description: Furcifer’s Fungeon is a loot-based dungeon crawler action roguelike. Forge powerful character builds using common, rare and legendary items and upgrade your collection for following runs!

games.name: Kaiju Catastrophe
games.description: Crush, smash, and eat thousands of enemies showing humanity what the meaning of destruction is! Kaiju Catastrophe is an arcade game with roguelite mechanics. Mutate devastating weapons, unlock permanent evolutions, and wreak havoc with a variety of monsters to tear humanity apart! Wishlist today!

games.name: Bunker Builder Simulator
games.description: Plan your work, dig a hole and build a bunker, that will survive anything! Manage safety, needs and moods of your clients, so you can become the best architect and earn a fortune. Will you be able to meet the expectations?

games.name: ChaseTag
games.description: Come participate at ChaseTag ! A tag competition where athletes are candy ! Face your friends in intense Player-versus-Player matches, that will make you sweat !

games.name: Littlelands
games.description: The Littlelands region is brimming with strange characters and magical landscapes to discover if you know where to look, for a big-headed little youngster like you every moment exploring, growing berries, searching for buried treasures or walking through these lands can be an epic adventure.

games.name: RunMan Turbo
games.description: The indie legend returns, now in a 2D platformer where you speedrun randomly generated levels. Bounce, slide, jump, and run fast as heck. Easy to play and challenging to master, with an awesome soundtrack and a style that will make you go, "Oh snap!"

games.name: Salvus: Aries
games.description: A mature slice of death and adventure fantasy otome visual novel that begins at the bad ending.

games.name: Play Rough
games.description: Play Rough is a roleplaying game set in the surreal, post-apocalyptic wasteland of what was once California. It's a place where humans live side-by-side with living cartoons, twisted abominations of ink and flesh, and... Clowns...?

games.name: Astromeda
games.description: Astromeda is an adventure RPG, featuring unique fast-paced and turn-based battles in a mysterious, charming world. You are a human who returns to an Earth inhabited by intelligent Bacteria. Explore a rich world, befriend or fight quirky characters, and uncover the mysteries of the Bacteria race. The game is inspired by Undertale, H

games.name: Silent Hill: Townfall
games.description: Returning to an island town to ‘put things right’, Simon Ordell descends into a world of tense evasion, explosive confrontations, and mind-bending puzzles that slowly surface the truth of St. Amelia.

games.name: Sincognito
games.description: Sincognito, is a 5-15 players SOCIAL DEDUCTION, horror, stealth game in which players, split between two distinct teams - Humans & Sins - must use communication with proximity voice chat, teamwork to complete tasks, skills for combat, betrayal, and ultimately mind games to defeat the opposite team.

games.name: Thick as Thieves
games.description: Set in an alternate history Edinburgh, Thick as Thieves throws you into a world of supernatural intrigue. Society’s elite amass wealth and power, while the lower classes struggle to simply survive. It’s time to even the score. Team up with your fellow thieves and relieve the rich of their ill-gotten hoards. You’ll need your wits, a skillful crew and no small amount of luck to pull off daring heists. And if you get filthy rich in the process… who could hold that against you?

games.name: Red Rebellion
games.description: A sapphic fairy tale mashup as Robin Hood teams up with Red Riding Hood to save their town set in a historically accurate medieval England.

games.name: Total World Liberation
games.description: Open World Survival Automation Crafting Building Turn-Based game, yup that's a huge mix of genres and it works!

games.name: Hyper Drill
games.description: Hyper Drill is a speedrunning runner game, where you fly at supersonic speed and destroy everything in your path. Drill through any obstacle, jump between different galaxies, and uncover the mysteries of the universe.

games.name: Twin Jet Racer
games.description: Two jets. Two triggers. That’s all you need to swerve, drift, corkscrew, loop or even fly to reach the next checkpoint and top the leaderboard. Master the controls and the physics to progress to the next class of racer and unlock greater challenges. Compete against friends or against the clock.

games.name: Murder on the Stella
games.description: It's a murder mystery. It's an adventure. It's a cruise vacation simulator. It's different each time you play.

games.name: R-Type Tactics I & II Cosmos
games.description:
Outsmart and outgun your opponent in R-Type Tactics I • II Cosmos, the ultimate turn-based sci-fi strategy collection!

This two-game combination of the classic R-Type Tactics titles arrives on modern consoles for the first time, equipped with an armada of unique units to deploy across dozens of levels.

Multiple campaigns allow you to take on the Bydo Empire or even play as them yourself, while competitive online play lets you square off against others.

games.name: In Stone
games.description: In the late 19th century, a sculpture is confined in a monastery asylum. It's in your hands to follow the blue vision to explore the monastery's deeper secrets, or to escape the stone prison by gathering clues inside the hospital.

games.name: Tsurugihime
games.description: Tsurugihime is a side-scrolling action RPG. The last battle is in 100 days. It is up to the player to decide how to live until the day. Battle, ikusei, exploration, story, and even sister. "Craft" everything. An RPG that "crafts" fate.

games.name: Vocaless
games.description: Vocaless is a unique platformer game with rhythm elements, you must perform all of your actions to the beat! Not only that, but everything in the game, from enemies to obstacles, follows the beat of the music.

games.name: Nuclear Sub
games.description: A realistic nuclear submarine simulator will allow you to take command of your crew and battle your fiercest enemies. Arm yourself with missiles, dive into the ocean and fight for your country.

games.name: LumenTale: Memories of Trey
games.description: LumenTale: Memories of Trey is a Monster Collector RPG set in the wonderful land of Talea. Trey, who has mysteriously lost his memories, decides to set on a journey after a particular event. His only guiding light will be a mysterious desire... but will that be true?

games.name: Xanniban
games.description: Evil has been unleashed. Don the Trespasser's suit as you dash across facilities, manage resources, and confine hostile machines to change the fate of humanity. Lure your foes into containment as a grim epidemic festers beneath the surface...

games.name: Death By Misstep
games.description: Death By Misstep is an upcoming First-Person Rhythm, Stealth and Horror game set on a party cruise where a massive massacre by robots is happening.

games.name: Space Scavenger 2
games.description: Space Scavenger 2 is an Action-Roguelike where you scavenge for modules to build a hodgepodge spaceship. Upgrade and customize your ship on-the-fly to make the best of a terrible situation. Playful and colorful - who said you can't smack aliens with a huge hammer in space?

games.name: Captain Disaster and the Two Worlds of Riskara
games.description: A new Captain Disaster adventure; this time he is more of a hero than a disaster! ... Or is he? A point and click adventure game with cartoony graphics, epic storyline and more bad jokes than you can possibly imagine. Buy this game. It is your destiny...

games.name: Unwound
games.description: Lose yourself in a surreal candyland adventure about transformation and escapism. Descend into a land of weirdos and forgotten memories as you assemble a new you from whatever you find.

games.name: Imperial Ambitions
games.description: Discover and colonize the world, Allocate your labor force, Monopolize markets, Fight tactical battles, Survive the age of imperialism as the world turns into a war zone.

games.name: Zwaard
games.description: Explore a world where you try to preserve the still existing life forms. Technology has taken over and will try it's best to stop you in your adventure. Whilst those technologies try to stop you they could also be the only reason you're still alive.

games.name: Quadremor
games.description: A first person shooter where you take a role of one of the last human mercenaries, who has to take his revenge for annihilation of humanity. A deep dive into a dark and unforgiving realm, which will stay in your consciousness for ages.

games.name: Rina to Akumu no Kan
games.description: One day, the unlucky girl "Runa Ichiya" wakes up in a haunted house.

games.name: KaiJu Girls
games.description: Kaiju Girls is a Visual Novel full of Monster Girls. The protagonist lost his memory in an accident and became a KaijuTamer, with the Kaiju girls in the Kaiju world full of danger adventure! In the wonderful and exciting adventure journey in the protagonist will slowly recall his memories.

games.name: Gilded Destiny
games.description: Gilded Destiny is a grand strategy game depicting the transformative era of the Industrial Revolution. You will take the helm of the country of your choice and transform it from a backward agrarian society to an industrial powerhouse.

games.name: Omen Exitio: Hunger
games.description: Forces beyond human comprehension draw a macabre veil over the icy NY of 1927. A child has disappeared and you, a reporter with an unhappy past as an artist, become entangled in the drama. In this story, inspired by true events, you will investigate between reality, dreams and Lovecraftian horrors.

games.name: Moonlight Peaks
games.description: Live the vampire life in the magical town of Moonlight Peaks! Master the art of potions and spells, manage your supernatural farm, and leave your mark on the magical town. Make friends with the local werewolves, witches, and mermaids, and find your eternal love in the supernatural dating scene.

games.name: Inanima
games.description: Inanima Be part of something that will change the future of humanity.

games.name: Four Hundred Catapults
games.description: City builder & Survival. When the dead get close enough, they can use the deadly fog to take control of your settlements. Build a strong economy to supply your warriors with long-range weapons and massive fortifications. This is the only chance to survive.

games.name: Tails of Fate
games.description: Fulfill this tale, as darkness swarms the fantasy lands of Fauna. Venture epic kingdoms and treacherous dungeons in a 2D action plaformer, with Metroidvania elements in a hand-crafted pixel art world filled with souls-like boss fights, dungeon platforming, and difficult dynamic enemy combat design.

games.name: HexLands
games.description: HexLands is a turn-based, roguelike city builder set on procedural medieval islands. Grow your empire and adapt to harsh environments! Customize your deck, manage your resources, complete quests, and synergize perks! How far will your empire reach?

games.name: Moki: The Escape
games.description: Moki wakes up in a strange environment. The only memory: the own name. A peaceful world... or is it?! Join Moki in a challenging 2.5D jump & run platformer with many puzzles. Meet lovable and sometimes oddball characters and experience a occasionally emotional story.

games.name: EbiTapes
games.description: Go on an adventure to meet fun new friends, help them out, and create delicious beats along the way! Record the sounds of the world and make your own cool music.

games.name: Beyond These Stars
games.description: Journey on the back of the space whale Kewa, building a city for your people as you travel across the galaxy seeking purpose and answers, and developing deep relationships with the universe around you.

games.name: 99 Fails
games.description: 99 Fails is an impossibly difficult platformer set in Zeebo's surreal nightmare with bizarre monsters, set to music by legendary David Wise.

games.name: Bloody Horror Plant
games.description: Bloody Horror Plant – probably the bloodiest casual point and click adventure game ever! Help Horror Plant solve interesting and funny point and click puzzles, kill evil dwarfs, save the forest and its creatures!

games.name: Goblin's Journey
games.description: Goblin's Journey is a humorous adventure game with a stupid plot and even more idiotic characters. You play as a greedy bastard goblin named Alastar. You are about to save you king's life - in exchange for gold of course! An adventure full of gold, mischief and innapropriate content.

games.name: Legends of Castile
games.description: Legends of Castile is a comic fantasy point-and-click adventure set in the historic Castile region of Spain in the 19th century. It tells the story of a village girl who must investigate the myths and legends of Castile to fulfill her dream of becoming a nun. Advance the story by solving puzzles and riddles, meeting all kinds of characters, defeating fantastic creatures with your wit, and exploring places all around Castile.

games.name: Touchstarved
games.description: You were born cursed, with hands that twist the mind of any human you touch. Desperation leads you to the shadowy city of Eridia, where your fate intertwines with 5 monstrous strangers. Each can offer you salvation or damnation. Find a cure for your curse in Touchstarved, a gothic horror romance visual novel.

games.name: Forge of the Fae
games.description: Explore a story-rich, mysterious world inspired by Celtic folklore, use crystals to channel powerful magic, and make impactful choices that change the story's outcome. A unique Crystal System and battles with dangerous Fae await in this charming, pixel-style, retro modern RPG.

games.name: Dr. Emmerson's Nocturnes
games.description: Dive into the worlds of the best classic weird fiction and cosmic horror writers. Try out our original approach to bringing literature into the interactive medium. Relax and let Dr. Emmerson guide you through all colors of dread.

games.name: Laws of Nadragia
games.description: Become a prosecutor in the totalitarian state of Nadragia. Study the laws, use the court facts to convict the guilty or unwanted by the government... Can you keep your conscience?

games.name: Forgotten House
games.description: Try to escape from the old grandfather from his decrepit house by solving riddles. The game is inspired by Gnarled hag

games.name: Cosmic Holidays
games.description: Help Cibo find his way in an unknown world. Through gorgeous flora and fauna, Cibo can glide in the wind, bounce, propel or block, absorb impacts or roll, using his power to inflate his head. Learn from hostile nature to make it your ally. Earn Cibo's trust until he reaches his vacation resort!

games.name: Starship Colony
games.description: A deep starship colony sim. Build your starship, manage air, water, food, fuel, energy, temperature and psychology to keep your crew alive across vast distances. Closed-loop system in space. Mining, wiring, plumbing, in-ship factory, (alien?) radio signals & translation, diplomacy, combat, and more.

games.name: Atmosfar
games.description: Atmosfar is a sky-high odyssey set on an alien planet of floating islands explored by flying crafts and a mobile airbase as you uncover the fate of your collapsed colony.

games.name: Back to the Collis
games.description: Back to the Collis is a story-rich, fully hand-drawn 2D Point & Click adventure puzzle. Embark on a journey alongside the main character, Benjamin, to solve lots of engaging puzzles and explore the town of Collis, outstanding by its memorable populace.

games.name: Folk Emerging
games.description: Lead nomadic families through the Stone Age in this turn-based 4X strategy game with in-depth characters, cultures, and ecosystems. Explore the wilderness, hunt megafauna, outsmart competitors in trade & autobattler combat. Discover fire, agriculture, politics... and survive to tell the tale.

games.name: VICCP 2 Core
games.description: The Very Important Central Control Panel is back. Keeping the mysterious atmosphere and with even more mysteries. Control the omnipotence remote, experiment, and find many endings. Brainstorming in retro sci-fi style / Puzzle / Quest / Point Click.

games.name: 3 Last Chances
games.description: 3 Last Chances is an Action RPG game with challenging combat and progression system that allows to create your own unique playstyle. You get 3 chances to replay a year, complete quests and find just the right method of weakening and overcoming the seemingly unbeatable final boss.

games.name: Corr
games.description: Corr is a difficult Souls-lite Boss Rush Action RPG where you Run-n-Gun & Hack-n-Slash your way through challenging boss encounters. To endure the strange, dark and whacky world of Corr, level up and customize your warrior build with berserk powers, tonics, talismans and more.

games.name: 5 Star Fishy
games.description: Explore, bite, talk, and swim to the bottom of this semi-linear aquatic metriodvania! The world isn't particularly happy with a tiny pink fishy trying to nuke them, and they may try to kill you, so stay sharp and don't bite off more than you can chew.

games.name: Bogdan's Cross
games.description: Embark on a journey of redemption as Bogdan, a fallen Templar seeking to make amends for his past sins. Explore a stunning world filled with ancient mysteries, uncover hidden secrets, and battle fierce enemies in this immersive action-adventure game.

games.name: Portabellows
games.description: Explore a whimsical island to find… pie recipes?! Bake them by gathering or growing ingredients, which may be the key to helping out your new found quirky friends leave the island! In this wholesome 3D platformer collectathon, you can enjoy discovering the world freely at your own pace.

games.name: Rich Dad Simulator
games.description: Run your own chain of markets. Start from a small shop to the biggest business in town. Manage staff, control inventory, set prices, and keep customers happy. Build new locations and expand your retail empire. Can you succeed and become the king of retail?

games.name: Alien Boom Boom
games.description: Join the fight against an alien invasion in this fast-paced, old-school FPS. Battle in your hometown, around the world, and even in space. Take on unique enemies and wield powerful weapons, all with a touch of classic fps sensibility. Can you save humanity from the brink of destruction? Boom boom.

games.name: Danger is Near
games.description: Danger is Near - sessional hardcore multiplayer shooter that includes several genres: FPS, survival, weapon and combat simulator, RPG with MMO phenomena. The game will immerse you in a realistic gaming environment imbued with a gloomy post-apocalyptic atmosphere...

games.name: Squid Grid
games.description: Welcome to Squid Grid! A free puzzle challenge about a squid on a grid. Unique sokoban mechanics, cute art, and hand-crafted levels will give you a puzzle experience you won't forget. Get Squid Griddin'!

games.name: Forest of Deceit
games.description: Forest of Deceit is a 4-8 player social deduction game where you use your phones to play!

games.name: VISK
games.description: Face your fears in VISK, an open-world online co-op horror game for 1-2 players. Escape from a strange village, uncover the dark secrets of this place and solve puzzles to discover new areas. But beware, deadly creatures are after you and your friend!

games.name: Hayaku! Island of Darkness
games.description: Explore a mysterious island full of dangers and uncover the secrets behind the anomalous creatures that inhabit it in this retro-style metroidvania.

games.name: Enlightened
games.description: Enlightened is a survival horror game with strong focus on puzzle solving. Explore the hotel in which you woke up, find clues about what happened, solve puzzles and find a way out, while surviving horrors that awaits you there.

games.name: Tako no Himitsu: Ocean of Secrets
games.description: Tako no Himitsu: Ocean of Secrets is an indie Action RPG made as a tribute to the Game Boy Advance era of gaming. A spiritual successor to Save me Mr Tako, play in a world where Octopuses were erased from history.

games.name: Grave Seasons
games.description: Grave Seasons is a supernatural murder-mystery farming simulator. Play as the new farmer in Ashenridge as you harvest crops, fish and mine, meet and romance townsfolk, build up the community... and maybe stop the murders.

games.name: Haruka: Beyond the Stars
games.description: Haruka: Beyond the Stars is a juvenile sci-fi RPG about the intergalactic adventures of the protagonist, Yuuki, and a mysterious girl named Miiya. Set out on a spaceship and explore unique planets. Enjoy a thrilling adventure in the latest 3D anime art style.

games.name: Dead Detective: Zombie Conspiracy
games.description: Take on the role of Margh, undead private detective, in this humorous and wacky graphic adventure that combines point-and-click mechanics with an elaborate “deaduction” system. Use your brain (or what's left of it) and solve bizarre and unconventional mysteries in a world ruled by zombies.

games.name: April '86
games.description: April ‘86 - is a mystical first-person thriller which has our protagonist journeying to the abandoned city of Pripyat, to confront the secrets of the past.

games.name: Telluria: Forebodings
games.description: A 3D graphic adventure with parallel realities, ancient vestiges and dark omens. Play in two worlds and through two ages. Discover the past to shape the future. The fate of Telluria will rest on you.

games.name: Ebola 4
games.description: You open your eyes, it's dark all around. Are you in an underground bunker, alone with your thoughts... or are you not alone there? Fear, apocalypse, darkness swallowed the world, most people are infected. You are at the epicenter... And can you change something?

games.name: Light Odyssey
games.description: Light Odyssey is a soulslike boss rush where every battle is a test of mastery. Play as Bandi and fight to restore light to a world consumed by shadows. Face off against towering colossi in three deadly phases that demand precision, patience, and adaptation.

games.name: Toxic Crusaders
games.description: The Toxic Crusaders return for an all-new, all-action beat 'em up for one to four players! Grab your mop, tutu and attitude, and get ready to clean up the mean streets of Tromaville, one radioactive goon at a time!

games.name: Gunmetal Gothic
games.description: A co-op shooter-RPG with a retro-3D aesthetic. Customize and upgrade your character as you take back the city of Vestige from demonic machines!

games.name: Loftia
games.description: Welcome to Loftia, a cozy, multiplayer world where you can build towards a brighter, more sustainable future! Connect with friends both old and new, to farm, craft, explore, decorate, and create a meaningful impact - together.

games.name: Surviving Deponia
games.description: Explore, craft, build and fight your way through the harsh landscape of Deponia. Meet allies and make enemies while surviving the perils of the junk planet. It might be garbage - but it’s your garbage!

games.name: Dread Pilots
games.description: Dread Pilots is a space survival game where you explore a mysterious and hostile pocket universe called the Dread. Scavenge resources, upgrade your ship, make friends, and fight monsters as you try to carve out a little piece of the Dread for yourself.

games.name: Mearcair/System Pulse
games.description: Dive into System Pulse, a rhythm-fueled roguelike bullet heaven where you must outmaneuver swarms of robots moving while attacking to the beat. Unleash your reflexes, survive rhythmic encounters, and master the symphony of chaos in this electrifying action game.

games.name: Welcome to Mars 9
games.description: Welcome to Mars 9: The Tale of River is an old-school graphic adventure about a person adrift in space, rescued by a luxurious space station orbiting Mars. Playing as River, you will be drawn into a world of comfort and pleasure, only to soon discover that the station hides a dark secret.

games.name: A Simple Expurriment
games.description: A cartoony, combat-free metroidvania with puzzles, stealth and genetically modified kittens. Help a cat mom rescue her abducted children by doing typical, not-so-typical and definitely atypical cat things: run walls up and down, turn to liquid and rearrange parts of the alien ship like pieces of a puzzle.

games.name: Specters of the Sun
games.description: Specters of the Sun is a challenging 2D action platformer with action-packed levels. Take on the role of an elusive specter to reclaim your old corpse, now possessed at the heights of your former kingdom.

games.name: Death the Guitar
games.description: "Death the Guitar" is a pop and violent 2D Platformer action game. The player is a killer electric guitar whose owner was murdered, and the goal is to take revenge on the humans by manipulating "sound" and "electricity".

games.name: Time To Wake Up
games.description: Time To Wake Up is an atmospheric psychological thriller where one night you find yourself stuck in a dream. No worries, though. You are not alone. You hear a voice, in need of your eyes and willing to help you out.

games.name: Exodus: Sunflower on the Horizon
games.description: You're given a chance to find out what really makes the earth turn... But will you like what you see? Exodus is the ultimate sci-fi RPG experience about love, friendship, and deadly monsters.

games.name: Rebirth of Arcadia
games.description: Rebirth of Arcadia is a turn-based tactics game with roguelike elements and contemplative story. Experience the journey of two groups of people working together to escape from the Abyss. Explore, defeat monsters, wield and modify the power of runestones to uncover the secrets of the Abyss.

games.name: Nimbit Frontier
games.description: Embark on daring adventures into wild biomes to uncover fragments of long-lost creatures. Bring them back to life by hatching their young. Build them habitats, and release them into the wild. Become the star Nimbiteer you dream of surrounded by lovely folks in a small cozy town.

games.name: The One Who Stands Behind
games.description: Survive hordes of monsters in a deck builder with a tactical grid while engaging in existential conversations with your avatar.

games.name: Little Monster
games.description: Little Monster is a — fast paced and fun — beat 'em up game. You play as little monster whose goal is to prevent nightmare spirits from entering our minds while sleeping.

games.name: AI Kills All Humans
games.description: AI Kills All Humans is a Tactical RTS game in which you play as an AI sending robots to kill all humans. You however don't have direct control of your robots, but robots independently decide how to execute your commands, like a general telling troops to attack, but troops themselves decide how.

games.name: Cyber Paradise
games.description: Revive Mini the Dog digitally through 2D roguelite actions; craft her cyber paradise with beloved moments, like sniffing dog butts XD. Uncover a deeper dystopian narrative and strengthen friendships in cafe chats—a frenetic yet cozy journey.

games.name: Just in Crime
games.description: Just in Crime is a detective video game in which you play a detective dog and a wizard cat. With a twist; you are able to travel back in time and examine the crime scene a few seconds before it happened.

games.name: LightSup!
games.description: LightSup! is a couch-action co-op game for 1-4 players with rogue-lite elements where you play as adventurers encounter ferocious monsters crawling from the Eclipse Dungeons. Prepare your weapons and protect the Altar of Light at any cost, or the world will be doomed into darkness forever.

games.name: Lazy Jiangshi
games.description: A visual novel about lazy jiangshi Mao and her even lazier mistress.

games.name: Black Box LSS: The Merciful Savior
games.description: Immerse yourself in a pixel-art AVG that blends love, crime, and romantic comedy. A story of a young man forges connections with his online friend, and gradually falls in love. If you're a fan of love story, yandere, and don't mind a touch of thrill and crime, you will greatly enjoy this game.

games.name: Doubumon
games.description: Doubumon is an RPG monster collecting/battling game. Experience tactical battles as you choose 4 Doubumon to fight with on the battlefield. Grow, evolve, and customize your attacks while developing different strategies in order to win, as you fight and explore your way to become the Doubumon champion.

games.name: Blackout: Zero Point
games.description: Blackout is a hardcore co-op shooter for up to 4 players. Become a near-future special forces operative and eliminate infected creatures and monsters fused with machines. Complete missions through intense combat and teamwork, and escape the hellish battlefield.

games.name: Lunr.Rdio.Taxi
games.description: lunr.rdio.taxi blends drifting and rhythm into an exhilarating spacetime 'Drifthm' adventure! Slide and boost your way through the solar system to the beat of Brazil's best DJs and earn big as an interplanetary taxi pilot trying to pay an infinite debt in this hypercapitalistic BrazaFunk future.

games.name: Soul Devourer
games.description: Soul Devourer is a metroidvania action-platformer with a classic 2D horror style. You'll explore the vast, cursed Sakuradoki High School, master unique abilities, fight twisted monsters and uncover the long-buried secrets concealed under the school.

games.name: Water Me & You
games.description: Water Me & You is a cozy two-player co-op adventure in which you play as a water droplet or a seed-like creature that can change states, on a quest to regenerate a world left behind by humans.

games.name: The M/S Cornelia II Incident
games.description: Somewhere in the Nordic Archipelago a man wakes up with no memory of who he is, how he got there or what happened to him. A short point-and-click adventuregame about a man overboard survivor.

games.name: Garbage Country
games.description: Drive through a pixel art 3D wasteland. Explore vast procedural terrains dotted with hand-crafted landmarks, each holding echoes of a forgotten past.

games.name: Corpse Party II: Darkness Distortion
games.description: Corpse Party II: Darkness Distortion follows three high school friends; Haruka Nanami, Nemu Takanashi, and Maria Hitsugi, as they explore the Amare Est Vivere Hospital, testing a local urban legend as the streamer Nemu seeks to boost her subscriber count. Unfortunately for the three girls, the legend of “Ayame’s Mercy” is true, and they trigger a decades-old curse that sends them into a dark realm. Together they must avoid the vengeful spirit of Ayame Kirishima and other horrors from the hospital’s dark past as they search for a way to dispel Ayame’s curse once and for all.

games.name: Psychotic Bathtub
games.description: Have a psychotic episode in your bathtub. Argue with a rubber duck, flood your bathroom and drown dad. Find your very own ending – or all of them.

games.name: Ardent Passions
games.description: Ardent Passions is an adult visual novel where Heroman uncovers his girlfriend and her friends' vigilante secrets on a camping trip. With the fate of these relationships at stake, the game unfolds through decisions that determine if these vigilantes become allies or enemies.

games.name: To the Grave: The Battle for Faenora
games.description: Delve into the captivating realm of Faenora in our upcoming real-time strategy RPG game, To the Grave: The Battle for Faenora. Drawing inspiration from timeless classics like Final Fantasy Tactics and Ogre Battle, we're modernizing the elements that made these games unforgettable.

games.name: Escape from the Collector
games.description: In "Escape from the Collector", you will be trapped in an old house full of puzzles and secrets. Explore its rooms searching clues that will guide your adventure. Each puzzle solved brings you closer to freedom or dooms you to be trapped in the Collector's sinister game. Will you be able to escape?

games.name: Conquest of Eldinar
games.description: Conquest of Eldinar is a 2.5D Action RTS where you can choose from 16 different epic fantasy Factions to play as while you build bases, train armies, and engage in thrilling battles in either dynamic singleplayer campaigns or competitive online multiplayer.

games.name: Summer Sprint
games.description: Ride your bike across beautiful landscapes. Overcome obstacles. Help Lisa catch up with the thief.

games.name: Small Kingdoms
games.description: Rule a small fantasy kingdom and conquer your rivals as you build up cities and armies on the world map and command troops on the battlefield. Small Kingdoms is a streamlined grand strategy and RTS game with small procedurally generated world maps, and campaigns you can complete in a weekend

games.name: DollHouse: Survive or Death
games.description: "for that child's future." "I must ...... I must to do this. The eight children who came to the mansion were waiting for a series of horrible dreams... A series of horrible nightmares... Who did this? and for what? And who did this for whom...? Only by entering the DollHouse can we find out.

games.name: Dataminers
games.description: Dataminers is a fast turn-based roguelike where you climb and clear highly secured towers full of data. Outsmart guards and hack terminals in this unique combination of strategy, stealth and Minesweeper.

games.name: Nether Spirits: Beyond the Gate
games.description: Mend your shattered soul in Nether Spirits, a tactical roguelike deckbuilder set in a dark, fantastical afterlife corrupted by sin. Choose from seven distinct classes, explore a vast world, and fight your way to salvation - alone, with friends, or in real-time PvP!

games.name: On a Summer Night
games.description: "Today, I would like to tell you about one night. One night that changed my life." On a Summer Night is a short point-and-click visual novel.

games.name: Alpine Lake
games.description: Kick back in the fresh mountain air and craft your ideal haven on the shores of Alpine Lake! Build, and decorate your inn to bring joy and prosperity to the community. Welcome guests to your cozy escape in the woods. Farm, cook, and entertain them in your own unique way!

games.name: Archetype Blue
games.description: Archetype Blue is a rogue-lite deck building game where you form your own adventure team and deck before facing the challenges this fantasy world has in store for you. With all the options in front of you and the circumstances surrounding your expedition, do you have any chance of succeeding?

games.name: Undefeated: Genesis
games.description: The ultimate superhero experience. Fly freely and unleash your awesome powers as you battle violent mutants to save an alien planet.

games.name: Exelio
games.description: In "Exelio," you'll face an ever-changing environment and various threats while acquiring the knowledge and skills needed to survive in uncharted lands. Explore a world where beautiful nature and harsh realities collide, and delve into its mysteries as you carve out your own fate.

games.name: Fishing Echoes
games.description: Step into the cozy realms of Fishing Echoes, a game that beckons you to shorelines filled with rare fish and whispered legends. Ready yourself for the ultimate angling challenge as you embark on a journey to mastery.

games.name: Ghost Vanguard
games.description: Ghost Vanguard is a Beat'em Up game that combines stylish action with roguelike elements. Grab your sword and step into treacherous evil dungeons, using stylish and magnificent combos to defeat the sinister forces from the darkness!

games.name: Beaten Path
games.description: Beaten Path is a turn-based, tactical RPG following the story of a mage and her student as they traverse a shattered world, fend off foes, and strategize their way to victory.

games.name: Parkside: Decayed Soul Manipulation
games.description: Parkside is an FPS-Immersive Sim that chronicles the future of biomechanical subterfuge and suffering. Shoot, hack, and either save or sour the future of humanity in the dismally attractive and dystopian city of Abbotsford, California in the awful year of 2038. Will you serve the Divine Rod?

games.name: Mayhem Brawler II: Best of Both Worlds
games.description: A perfect fuse of '90s arcade vibe and modern rogue-lite / RPG mechanics in a time transition-themed beat 'em up. Play solo or online with friends and shape the story through your choices. Be amazed by the hand-drawn comics-inspired art, frame-by-frame animated characters, and kick-ass soundtracks.

games.name: Tom the Postgirl
games.description: Take a ride with Tom through her village and discover a great deal—perhaps too much—about the locals. Her approach, although controversial, is highly effective: intense and obsessive stalking.

games.name: Paver Simulator
games.description: Did you ever dream to become a paving artist? Perform tasks, during which the most important thing is creativity and precision. According to your design you lay different types of paving stones, so you earn money and raise the level of your reputation. Test your skills in the Paver Simulator

games.name: Angry Mother Earth
games.description: In "Angry Mother Earth", step into the shoes of Mother Earth and her alternate forms: Father Earth, Midgard, and Gaia. Each offers distinct abilities and introduces diverse strategies to the gameplay.

games.name: Hollow Home
games.description: Hollow Home is an isometric narrative RPG about the russian invasion of Ukraine, told from the perspective of a teenager trapped inside an occupied city. Learn survival skills, build relationships and face tough choices as each passing day brings new tragedies and destruction to your childhood home.

games.name: The Merlies
games.description: Meet the Merlies, a tiny birds community trying to find harmony in a world where the remains of an ancient civilisation are still visible. Build your village ingeniously, gather your birdies and explore this way-too-big world in this cute post-apocalyptic adventure ! Ready to spread your wings?

games.name: Swordeye
games.description: A hardcore MMO slasher with brutal directional combat. Explore massive, persistent PvPvE dungeons where every fight matters. Fight your way to the top, or die trying.

games.name: Kosmocean: The Endless Sea
games.description: Adventure and submarine exploration game. Control your Bathyscaphe with the help of a logbook. Through the game puzzles, bullet-hell sequences, and skill-based challenges, you will be plunged miles and miles into the depths where the ocean seems to have no end.

games.name: Infernae
games.description: Fear is not a shield. Only those who face it will survive this adrenaline-pumping bullet hell boss rush.

games.name: The Lab Thing
games.description: The lab thing is a first-person survival horror game. Explore a mysterious secret lab and play as the only human left alive. Gather all the scientist's notes about the monster, upgrade backpack items, record information and try to escape before you join the body collection of the lab thing!

games.name: Kardashev
games.description: Kardashev is a first-person, space set, open world, factory building game.

games.name: Tower of Tears
games.description: A 3D Survival-Horror Metroidvania in a vast, interconnected tower ruled by cryptic systems, strange residents and esoteric mysteries...

games.name: Rogue Mech
games.description: Pilot your trusty Phoenix in this isometric, post-apocalyptic mecha survival game with base building elements. Trade, plant, hack, dig, talk and fight your way through the wastelands. If you survive, you might be able to restore a little green to this ash-ridden world.

games.name: Memory Rewind
games.description: Explore the thrilling detective visual novel adventure with your assistant Olivina. Find your way through the bizarre case that pulling you into unique investigation gameplay and meet the colorful cast of memorable characters that can help you or endanger you

games.name: FrostFire: Battle Frenzy
games.description: This is FrostFire -Battle Frenzy-, a 2D anime fighting game perfect for new and experienced players of the genre.

games.name: Exploration: Light
games.description: Experience large space ship battles. Uncover the secrets of the mysterious alien race. Upgrade your ship or even start a fleet. Survive

games.name: Codename Incubus
games.description: Slice, dash, and parry your way through your inner demons in this fast-paced psychedelic journey! Dodge an onslaught of deadly projectiles and unleash your blade upon nightmarish foes that lurk within your subconscious. Follow a dissident dealer and a jaded philanderer on their never-ending trip.

games.name: Power Line Rider
games.description: Power Line Rider is an Action-Packed Endless Runner with retro 8-bit inspired graphics & sounds! Dodge Birds, Squirrels, Monkeys and Fight Bosses as you race across a post-apocalyptic world where the fastest means of travel is riding on old Power Lines!

games.name: Schrodinger's Cat Burglar
games.description: A puzzle heist adventure with a quantum flavour! The player controls Mittens the cat as she stumbles into a quantum experiment and gains incredible new powers - the ability to be in two places at once. Explore, solve logic puzzles and evade capture by pest control robots to ultimately save the day!

games.name: Hexrite
games.description: You are a sorcerer part of a group of mysterious characters embarking on an adventure to fulfil an ancient magical ritual. Fight, quest and explore in this stylized action-adventure indie title!

games.name: Dead Meat
games.description: Lucia's just killed her husband... probably. Can you get a confession before her lawyers arrive? Use your own words to manipulate, persuade, threaten, or even seduce her into 'fessing up. This billionaire has a terrible secret. And time is running out.

games.name: Alyssa
games.description: ALYSSA is an adventure horror game, in which you play as a little girl who wakes up in an unfamiliar place… Or rather, she’s awakened by Emily, who has a… strange mask permanently attached to her head. Armed with nothing but a small lighter, Alyssa must attempt to escape from this cursed place. Meanwhile, her tormentors lurk in the shadows, waiting for a single wrong move…

games.name: Blood & Chaos
games.description: Blood & Chaos is a roguelike tribute to the golden era of '80s RPG gaming. Create a fellowship of 6 heroes and embark on an epic journey. Explore a thriving world with quests to accomplish, cities to discover and dungeons to explore where your mastering of turn-based combats will keep you alive.

games.name: Music Power Up
games.description: As a musician in the 1980s, create music for early video games. Make your own sounds and melodies from scratch, or use pre-composed patterns. Play games, upgrade the music app, meet programmers, editors and musicians, find your next music job, in the crazy decade that started the digital revolution.

games.name: Sligga Trigger
games.description: Suit up and sling some shells at sadistic, superpowered sci-fi slugs. Snag some secrets, suffer some shrapnel, and shoot the shit out of some Sliggas in this one-of-a-kind twin-stick shooter.

games.name: Cavern
