games.description: Edit the Level as you play in Cavern, a Roguelike Puzzler. Select an object to open up the - SWAP MENU - and swap it out for another type. Turn a slime into a key. Or a rock into a bomb to clear your path. Even intercept bullets in mid air and send them back against enemies.

games.name: The Bugs Manor
games.description: The Bugs Manor is a free 2D pixel art horror game. Explore a cursed mansion, hide from scary monsters, and solve puzzles with an inventory-free gameplay, focused on direct interactions with the environment. Can you survive your first night in this haunted house and uncover its mysteries?

games.name: Clown Meat
games.description: Clown Meat is a Precision Platformer with an emphasis on speedrunning and replayability. Tumble through a butchered world where humanity is barely a memory on your naïve journey to cheer up the monolithic clown that came from the Depths of Jupiter.

games.name: Fat Goblins
games.description: Prepare for goblin-packed, hat-stealing, and princess-fattening team based 16v16 combat! Siege the castle walls, rescue your pudgy princess, fatten up the enemy princess with delicious meat, unlock new hats & weapons, and kill each other repeatedly in silly and chaotic PvP war!

games.name: The Transference
games.description: Escape from your own house, in which you have been locked up. But be careful, you will not be alone in your captivity. Immerse yourself in this first-person horror adventure, full of family secrets and betrayals. And find out who and why they locked you up.

games.name: Five Day Detective
games.description: The Five Day Detective is a point n click whodunnit featuring multiple cases and a twisted sense of humour.

games.name: Isolation One
games.description: Exciting action with puzzle elements and an interesting plot, which takes place on the huge spaceship Transporter P18. In this game, players will encounter an incredible mixture of science fiction and horror. Immerse yourself in a dark world where t you need to survive at any cost.

games.name: Soul Blade
games.description: "Soul Blade" is a 2D platform action game with classic hand-drawn 2D animations that provide a smooth and immersive visual experience. The combat system is built around the "swordplay" mechanism, delivering intense and exhilarating battles.

games.name: Bendy: The Cage
games.description:
Test your sanity as you take control of Henry in this third person horror experience taking place during the events of Bendy and the Dark Revival.

Condemned to the Keeper prison known as "The Pit", Henry must survive the horrific inmates and mangled experiments set loose to devour him. A labyrinth of steel industrial dread lay before him as his mind is invaded by the past.

Discover the hidden blood-stained truth behind the monsters as you explore the dark levels of The Pit, slowly making your way to the very top of the facility.

Take on the darkness with your axe in brutal melee combat: Unleash fast and heavy strikes, block and parry incoming attacks, shove foes away, stomp on enemies with a vengeance, and time dodges to avoid being torn apart by the things that hunt you. Dive into the shadows for limited supplies as you embark on a twisted tale of Henry's self discovery while facing down new and familiar creatures of the ink.

Find the maestro. Escape the prison. Fight the madness.

games.name: Rewind And Reclaim
games.description: Rewind and Reclaim is a turn-based adventure inspired by 90's horror movies. Explore different B movie scenarios by creating scenes in which victims outsmart villains. Investigate their terrifying behind the scenes to unfold the story linking them all.

games.name: Runehaven
games.description: Runehaven is a voxel-based atmospheric first-person roguelike dungeon crawler. Explore eerie, procedurally generated dungeons, battle vile creatures, solve puzzles, discover hidden secrets, and dodge deadly traps in your quest for survival!

games.name: The Lumenites
games.description: Build a cozy village on your flying turtle. Land on floating islands, recycle, upgrade your village, repeat! There's no combat, or wrong answers - just explore and go from chaos to control as you shape your perfect paradise.

games.name: The Hydra Experiment
games.description: Solve puzzles as a mad scientist in this action-adventure RPG.

games.name: Dr. Finklestein's Marvelous Room
games.description: Dr. Finklestein's Marvelous Room is a community run experimental story game. With the end of the world fast approaching, Dr. Gumphrey Finklestein announces his plans for a groundbreaking scientific experiment. What will it entail? Does even he know?

games.name: Mimic
games.description: A multiplayer survival horror game where players must choose their allies carefully to survive imminent danger. In this social-deduction game players won't know who to trust with their lives.

games.name: Dungeons Deep
games.description: Plunge into the Dungeons Deep! A dark-fantasy ARPG featuring vast underworlds full of horrifying monsters and ancient treasures. Liberate the old lands of Antioch for those who still remain.

games.name: The Dream Of A Cockspur
games.description: Stranded on a desolate island with Earth's final researchers, you investigate a mysterious celestial body. The day before departure, the return boat is damaged, forcing an extended stay. Is someone playing tricks, or does the island want to kill all of you?

games.name: Schrödinger's Call
games.description: I am Mary. The last person in the world you'll ever talk to. Schrodinger's Call" is an adventure game that uses a mysterious phone to connect with souls who cannot die. The main character, Mary, wakes up in a strange room with no memory. The player, along with the bewildered Mary, will save souls.

games.name: England in London
games.description: England in London is a surrealist satirical dark comedy adventure game with an emphasis on atmosphere, characters and mini-games. Featuring weird looking art, hand drawn animation and an ambient score for when you truly want to be left alone.

games.name: DDS x Narcos
games.description: Spinoff of the hit game Drug Dealer Simulator and the legendary show Narcos. It’s the 1980s, you are a disgraced CIA agent turned drug dealer. You will run your business in Mexico and the US in this story-driven simulator about the life of crime.

games.name: Digested
games.description: Digested is an open-world horror survival game in which you must evade a giant snake intent on eating you alive. Utilize various tools and abilities to formulate an escape strategy, and use the map to navigate through unfamiliar terrain. Locate your extraction pod and don't get digested.

games.name: The Witch's Bakery
games.description:
The Witch’s Bakery is a 2D Adventure Puzzle game where you play as a joyful witch who opens a bakery in modern Paris.

She has a special power: she can heal emotions with her bread.

games.name: Ink of Fate
games.description: Explore the world of books, discover its secrets and collect every page in Ink of Fate. A narrative 3D puzzle game in which you will help Helena, a half elf who embarks on a journey to rewrite her destiny and avoid the tragic end imposed on her by her author.

games.name: The Mermaid Mask
games.description: Magnus Mortuga has been killed. The captain of the world's strangest submarine, he was found in a locked room with an ancient stone cauldron - unsealed and opened for the first time. How did he die? Was it a curse? Perhaps one of his eccentric crew? Or does the bizarre truth run even deeper...

games.name: Big Walk
games.description: Hang out and get lost with close friends in a big world. A cooperative online walker-talker from the creators of Untitled Goose Game.

games.name: The Milgram Experiment
games.description: A first person narrative game, based on one of the most controversial psychological experiments of all time. Step into the shoes of an unwilling subject faced with the toughest moral choice: who lives and who dies. You alone will decide who to kill and who to spare. Please wishlist!

games.name: Kitty Cat Combat
games.description: A unique tactical military simulation RPG that fuses fantasy with modern warfare. Unite under the pawprint banner!

games.name: WorldShaper Idle
games.description: A tile-based world-building idle game. Place forests, rocks, mystical flowers and much more. Discover new tiles by experimenting with their placement. Then try to use their bonuses to optimize your production, or just sit back and become more powerful! What will your world look like?

games.name: Meat-Grinder
games.description: Live the life of Obi, a female killer with questionable morals and a good sense of humor! Witness a real human meat grinder performed by her and meet many unique characters on her way!

games.name: Growth
games.description: Journey to a place where even DEATH doesn’t stop your GROWTH…

games.name: Trade Tales
games.description: A cozy farming simulation meets entrepreneurial adventures. Create your legacy, Immerse yourself in a world of creativity, social interactions, and unexpected twists. Shape your story, build your own brand, and discover the joy of life in "Trade Tales." Your adventure begins now

games.name: Aeterna Lucis
games.description: Aeterna Lucis is the highly anticipated sequel to Aeterna Noctis. Following the gameplay steps of the first entry in the series, Aeterna Lucis is a Metroidvania that combines fast-paced combat, a large interconnected map, secret hunting, optional challenges, and a rich and deep story.

games.name: Moonshire
games.description: Embark on a journey to save Moonshire as you navigate through a mysterious world filled with dungeons, weapons, upgrades, and fast-paced combat!

games.name: L.OD
games.description:
A 2D exploration adventure.
The main character, Yoi, receives a letter from his dead sister, Chitose, saying that she wants to tell him a secret.
In order to find out the truth, Yoyi heads to an abandoned laboratory.

games.name: Lilac: Side Witch
games.description: Visual novel adaptation of the stage play by Project Ricoro about an interspecies academy story between mages and humans that depicts the “ordinary” within the “extraordinary.” Side Witch is the version with an all-female cast.

games.name: Match Tree
games.description:
Match Tree is a breathtaking puzzle experience (...it's actually a match 3 game).
Embark on an epic journey with pixie, gnome and witch full of adventure, mystery (huh?) and sheep.
Become the master of combination and create magnificent mansions from trees, flowers and carrots (I swear, it's fun!).

games.name: The Blood of Dawnwalker
games.description: The Blood of Dawnwalker is an open-world dark fantasy action RPG set in 14th-century Europe. You play as Coen, human by day and vampire by night, fighting to save your family in a story shaped by your actions and the secrets you uncover.

games.name: GameChanger: Episode 1
games.description: Take on the challenge to close the four Portals in this varied 2D-Action-Adventure with shoot 'em up elements! Explore the open Interworld, solve tricky puzzles in complex dungeons, shoot your way through the hordes of counter viruses and stop the dragon!

games.name: 100 Cats Greece
games.description: Find 100 Cats hidden in Greece! Can you find them all?

games.name: Knights of Fresco
games.description: Raise your own band of Knights and fight beasts from medieval paintings. Knights of Fresco is an open world party building RPG with auto-battling combat that tries to emulate medieval depictions of battles and wars.

games.name: Hellfire Poncho
games.description: Hellfire Poncho is a western rogue-lite isometric shooter. Shoot little demons with your upgraded weapons, die, and try again stronger. Bet your upgrades against the creatures you meet in the saloon, and develop your best build. Don't push your luck....

games.name: 100 Cats Argentina
games.description: Find 100 Cats hidden in Argentina! Can you find them all?

games.name: 100 Cats Pakistan
games.description: Find 100 Cats hidden in Pakistan! Can you find them all?

games.name: Algolemeth
games.description: "Create AI and Conquer the Dungeon." Algolemeth is a dungeon RPG where you send golems equipped with AI (combat logic) into a dungeon for fully automated exploration. Enhance the AI and, through trial and error, aim to conquer the dungeon!

games.name: Backrooms Game No. 999999
games.description: Backrooms #999999999 is a singleplayer/4 player co-op horror exploration game. Unlock the puzzles, survive the entities, escape the deadly geometry and try to reach the final level in one piece. Good luck, wanderer!

games.name: Before I Go
games.description: Explore the haunting, dreamlike fantasy world of BEFORE I GO, a punishing Metroidvania where you embody the innocence of an inner child on an allegorical odyssey towards death acceptance. The end is inevitable, but will you brave the journey?

games.name: Sunkissed City
games.description: Sunkissed City is a life-sim set in an upbeat, sun-kissed seaside metropolis full of funky vibes and quirky characters. Stake out your new life in the city, tending to DIY gardens, learning new skills, and making life-long friends and help bring life back to its once-vibrant streets!

games.name: Junklands
games.description: Embark on a journey to transform a polluted world shackled by its toxic overlords. Explore the lands, brave the environment, battle polluting foes and clean up a dying world in an epic 3D action-adventure metroidvania.

games.name: Dark Lessons
games.description: Can you survive your teacher in this psychological horror game? With only candles for light and trapped in her home, you have to uncover her family's dark secrets. Solve puzzles, connect the dots and escape. But beware: There is someone else playing games with you, and someone who needs your help.

games.name: DearMyFriend
games.description: Set off to the unknown world Stargather Land now. The shadow of chaos is shrouding here for so long, a girl from another world shoulders the responsibility of saving this land. Travel with the power of elements until the end of destiny, only fight will lead her to the finish.

games.name: Decurion
games.description: Combine the unique abilities of Mechs and Pilots in strategic synergy. Team up with friends in local co-op to conquer dynamic levels with different geometry, shaping your strategic approach. Watch out for anomalies introducing unexpected challenges as you defend your base and strive to stay alive.

games.name: Neon Auto Party
games.description: Build a party to auto-battle through waves of enemies in a futuristic fantasy setting. Each unit has its own deck of cards that determines their performance in battle. Find and buy items while leveling up units to take advantage of powerful synergies and reach the end of the dungeon!

games.name: Lost Hellden
games.description: Lost Hellden is a unique 3D hand-painted J-RPG from Artisan Studios, enhanced by dynamic lighting and weather effects. Follow Cyphel and his allies as a mature story unfolds. Customize your characters as you see fit and dive into a battle system that mixes action and strategy.

games.name: DI: Debt is Inevitable
games.description: DI is an endless wave-based FPS where you must micromanage the ever-increasing shop prices in order to defeat ever-increasing hordes of enemies. Powered by GZDoom.

games.name: Wonderia
games.description: Wonderia is a MANGA style open-world sandbox for 1-8 players. Unique blend of sci-fi life-sim and dungeon exploration. Transform into alien adorably quirky creatures, craft, farm, fight, recruit space travellers, and build your cosmic adventure!

games.name: Wiblu
games.description: Wiblu: The Search for the Fire Tea, is a captivating video game with German mythology, following Wiblu's quest to find the legendary Fire Tea to save her sick grandmother.

games.name: Whirlight: No Time To Trip
games.description: In the heart of Verice Bay, a brilliant idea takes shape in the hands of an eccentric inventor and an eclectic artist. Follow Margaret and Hector in a point-and-click graphic adventure that will take you to the edge of space and time to help them avert imminent danger.

games.name: Red Snow
games.description: Experience the ultimate fusion of snowboarding and combat in RED SNOW! Navigate perilous slopes, battle enemy forces, and execute stunning tricks to earn cash in this epic board-n-sword adventure.

games.name: 17.waves
games.description: 17.waves is an online co-op tower defense game for up to four players. Strategize with your teammates to build, upgrade, and maintain your towers to defend your base from hordes of invading aliens.

games.name: Vignettes: The Dream City
games.description: Vignettes: The Dream City is a first-person surreal dream-crawler game featuring turn-based combat, knowledge-based gameplay, non-linear exploration, and souls-like progression. Your dreams are haunted by a strange city, and you feel supernaturally drawn to explore it. What will you find within?

games.name: V.E.D.A
games.description: V.E.D.A is a Soulslike training game with weighty combat and exploration. The protagonist, awakened with no memory, undergoes combat training in a training simulator and uncovers hidden secrets. You too can enter the Soulslike genre. Don't hesitate.

games.name: Goals
games.description: GOALS is a gameplay-first, free-to-play, multiplayer focused and esports ready football game, currently in Alpha. Expect a responsive gameplay experience, designed to actually feel like football. Develop your club, build your squad and prove yourself on the pitch. To be the best, play the best.

games.name: The Sinking City 2
games.description: The Sinking City 2 is a terrifying Lovecraftian journey, powered by Unreal Engine 5. Experience a heart-pounding survival horror as you explore the flooded city of Arkham and fight eldritch monsters beyond human comprehension.

games.name: Abyss X Zero
games.description: Explore an expansive world in this 3D Metroidvania with enormous dungeons and stylish combat. Take control of two different characters, fated to battle each other: Codename A and Codename Z, both legendary heroes with unique abilities that change how you fight and interact with the environment.

games.name: Unyverse
games.description: Unyverse is a sci-fi, action role-playing game (ARPG) created by Afrime Studios. Unyverse delivers an immersive, story-driven gameplay experience for single and co-op players enriched by a deep Afro-Futuristic aesthetic.

games.name: T.K. Punk: G.O.L.D
games.description: Cyber Three Kingdoms Turn-Based Strategy RPG— As the latest humanoid AI developed, you were kidnapped by Zhang Jiao and joined the resistance organization—GOLD. Develop yourself, accept commissions, research prosthetics, cultivate companions and pursue the love and destruction in your heart!

games.name: The War in Chiapas
games.description: Control a group of young people who enter the jungle of Chiapas, Mexico, in the eighties, to form a guerrilla whose objective is to create an army to overthrow the government through a new revolution, however, a paramilitary group appears unexpectedly.

games.name: The Magic World 2: Curse of the Ancients
games.description: Party role-playing game. You control a squad of characters moving through an open game world. Collect items, complete quests, communicate with NPCs, try to survive, destroy enemies with various magic and weapons.

games.name: Ichorous Moon
games.description: Run! Race through the corrupted streets of Türme to stop the rising of the Ichorous Moon

games.name: Kelp Keeper
games.description: Take on a vital role in the ecosystem in this action-packed bullet hell. Control a charming sea otter and protect the kelp forest from an endless onslaught of devious sea critters. Skillfully dodge attacks, grab your prey, and eat them all at the surface for a huge satisfying snack.

games.name: Reggie, His Cousin, Two Scientists and Most Likely the End of the World
games.description: Control the direction of gravity as you run, jump and explore in an outrageous time-traveling adventure as Reggie, an unlikely hero from the 16,000th century on a mission to save science and ultimately the entire universe!

games.name: Ancestral Players
games.description: Ancestral Players is a fun-first PvP FPS with a unique twist: dying makes you stronger! Players of all skill levels can compete and enjoy the game together. Challenge friends or team up against bots for thrilling action.

games.name: Bounce Gun
games.description: Bounce Gun is a challenging arcade roguelike shooter with a huge number of item combinations, unconventional controls and an unusual approach to difficulty progression.

games.name: Confined: Leaving OKB-134
games.description: Confined: Leaving OKB-134 is a first-person horror game for PC and VR set in an abandoned soviet bunker. You got trapped! Seek safety by reactivating power, lights and machinery. Learn about long gone personnel, solve riddles and find a way to escape. But stay quiet! You’re not alone.

games.name: Chaos Front
games.description: A turn-based space mecha mercenary game. You can recruit pilots and captains with varying stories and skills, buy and modify spaceships, mecha, artillery, and fighters, take missions, participate in battles between Galactic Powers, change the situations, and experience different stories.

games.name: Incoherence
games.description: What started as a relaxing day off with your partner suddenly takes a turn when you find yourself waking up alone at the metro station of a creepy, abandoned complex owned by a mysterious megacorporation...

games.name: Greenfeet Haven
games.description: Greenfeet Haven is a colony sim set in a fantasy world where you start from nothing into the wild. Cultivate the land, collect resources, craft valuable items and discover new technologies. Organize your village according to your desires, then watch your inhabitants lead their daily lives!

games.name: Bleak Remastered
games.description: Immerse yourself in the dystopian world of Pinnacle with BLEAK Remastered. Experience stunning new artwork and enhanced gameplay in this dark adventure. Can you navigate the relentless hostile world and save your sister, Asha?

games.name: Antidote City Hall
games.description: You play as a former policeman who founded a private detective agency. Investigate a chain of mysterious murders, plunge into the world of crime, gain former glory, restore your good name. An exciting storyline, explore the city, a lot of characters, an atmosphere of fear and hopelessness.

games.name: Graytail
games.description: Graytail is a Zelda-like action-adventure game with interactive puzzles and combat set on a small island in the Pacific. Find the missing best female pilot and uncover the secrets hidden on the island.

games.name: Suspended Animation
games.description: A sci-fi first person exploration game about a ship in danger, and the evil AI tasked with saving it: you.

games.name: Cube Guy
games.description: Cube Guy is a 2.5D platformer with simple yet fun dodging, turn based boss battles, secrets, and a lot more!

games.name: Angel
games.description: ANGEL is an PSX-era rhythm racer that imbues the flow state of racing with the complexity of breakbeat music to redefine arcade racing and combo-based gameplay. FFO: Breakcore, serial experiments lain, and existentialism

games.name: Cozy Marbles
games.description: Cozy Marbles is a comfy game about building marble runs on a sunny afternoon. Using a huge range of bits and pieces, fit together the marble course you’ve always wanted to build and play with. Unwind to a lo-fi ASMR soundscape and roll with the nostalgia.

games.name: The Endarkenment
games.description: This is a narrative-based psychological horror game where the apocalypse itself is just the beginning of The Endarkenment. Explore the enigmatic lands of Antarctica and its surrounding areas all while the world ends.

games.name: Headlice
games.description: Headlice is a reverse horror game where you play as an escaped biological abomination fleeing an inept corporation. Embrace your parasitic nature and become the monster you were meant to be.

games.name: Cut the Cards
games.description: Create your own cards in this roguelike deckbuilder by cutting and pasting throughout your deck! Journey to the chasms, fighting off dragons and Boviks alike as you manage scarce resources.

games.name: Alonecats
games.description: Colorful mischief-makers have settled in this valley. Solve puzzles to find them all in a new unique game in the genre of animal search.

games.name: Blood Peace
games.description: Blood Peace, a hyper-violent FPS, immerses players in intense cybernetic warfare. Unravel a cryptic story or dive into chaotic action. Hunt Easter eggs, survive diverse environments, and master unique skills. Join the ultimate killing machine in this fast-paced adventure!

games.name: Moonwakers
games.description:
Dive into a survival roguelite by taking control of a S.E.E.D, an advanced reconnaissance android! To accomplish your mission, explore exoplanets to determine if they are suitable for humanity.

Thus, you'll need to search for vital elements necessary for life: Carbon, Hydrogen, Nitrogen, Oxygen, Phosphorus, and Sulfur. But beware, danger lurks on this unknown land, and your survival will depend on your ingenuity and skills. Traps abound, and you'll need to strategize to make it through.

Regularly, you'll have to shelter your character to escape ionic storms. Exploration will allow you to acquire new skills and enjoy more autonomy, speed, and gliding. Your biggest challenge? Managing your energy to avoid extinction.

games.name: Trizna
games.description: “Trizna” is a classic plot-driven 2.5D metroidvania filled with intense battles utilizing the unique features of weapons, evasions, parries, and counterattacks. Explore the mysterious and eerie realm deeply intertwined with pagan beliefs, with blade, magic and a keen mind.

games.name: Byte Breach
games.description: Embark on a chilling sci-fi co-op survival horror in a dystopian future ruled by AI corporations. Navigate through real and digital domains, filled with dark secrets and sinister entities. Utilize stealth, strategy, and teamwork to survive intense, unpredictable challenges. Will you outsmart the AI?

games.name: Mecha Simultactics
games.description: Mecha Simultactics is a simultaneous-turn-based competitive tactics game with customizable mechs, isometric battlefields, destructible terrain, anime-inspired battle replays, and online PvP.

games.name: Permanent: Hope & Vacuum
games.description: Psychological horror, puzzles, platforming, adventure, dungeons, action, intrigue and a touching story are all terms that should be used to try to define the essence of «Permanent: Hope & Vacuum».

games.name: The Tale of Mara & Moa
games.description: Mara and Moa have made a terrible mistake and now they need to find the Spirits of the Forest to save their village. Explore a world full of secrets with dynamic and fast-paced combat, alternating between the two characters and channeling the powers of the Sun and the Moon.

games.name: Veil of Madness
games.description: Veil of Madness is a Lovecraftian Deck Builder game that merges the strategic charm of a deck builder with the immersive experience of a first-person RPG genre. Unravel eldritch secrets, battle insanity, and shape your destiny in this chilling journey.

games.name: BrokenLore: Follow
games.description: BrokenLore: Follow is a captivating psychological first-person horror game that immerses players in the haunting narrative of Anne, as she grapples with issues of self-acceptance, bullying, and worthlessness while encountering metaphorical surreal creatures that heighten the terror of her journey.

games.name: Estilhaço
games.description: Immerse yourself in a world where technology blurs the boundaries of reality, solve puzzles, or escape from a relentless monster. Are you ready to face the horror lurking in the shadows?

games.name: Button Man
games.description: Button Man is a side-scrolling adventure game set in a fictional Nova Scotia during prohibition. After years of being the henchmen to the local bootlegging kingpin your job now is to find who killed him and protect the town from what’s coming to it. Explore Kingsport and learn the truth!

games.name: Price for Freedom: Gold and Sand
games.description: Gold and Sand is a CRPG with turn based tactical combat, with limb based targeting and bleeding and maiming mechanics. Several mini games such as cooking, fishing, and others.

games.name: Hope Timbre
games.description: Guide a mysterious creature through imaginary realm at night, or help two siblings awaken their broken world during the day. In dreams, you traverse the colorful environments and solve puzzles to find various hope instruments. Later, use them to summon the spring and escape the never-ending cycle.

games.name: Aquapark Tycoon
games.description: Build the ultimate waterpark paradise in this cozy simulation game! Design & customize water slides, pools, and saunas to fulfill your guests' needs. Combine creativity, strategy, and management to make a splash in the world of water parks and become the ultimate Aquapark Tycoon!

games.name: Bestiario
games.description: Bestiario is an exciting turn-based combat JRPG based on Spanish mythology and folklore, full of surprises. Should we call it an ÑRPG?

games.name: VanySlash
games.description: Heroine, a close-combat magic-user, and her partner, an axe to fight and collect magical Tools!

games.name: Distant Oceanic Getaway
games.description: Distant Oceanic Getaway - A Dating Adventure for WLW. You take on the role of Maeve, a heartbroken woman determined to move on from her cheating ex by embarking on this cruise alone. Will Maeve open her heart to new romance and the possibility of finding her soulmate at sea?​​

games.name: Critical Upload
games.description: Embark on a fast-paced action journey through space, discovering new weapons and abilities through acquisition and research to better each run. Invite friends to experience it with you!

games.name: Collector's Cove
games.description: Set sail on a cozy farming adventure aboard your boat in Collector's Cove. Explore diverse climate zones with your animal companion and discover a multitude of rare crops and fish. Enjoy cozy solitude while completing your Collector's compendium and rise to the rank of a Named Collector.

games.name: Under Canopies
games.description: Under Canopies is a serene exploration and survival experience. Set your own pace as you immerse yourself in activities like building and decorating your cabin, animal husbandry, crafting delicious meals, and uncovering the hidden secrets and valuable resources scattered throughout nature.

games.name: Connie and the Essence of Chaos
games.description: Connie and the Essence of Chaos is a cute 2D adventure inspired by past platforming classics. JUMP and PUNCH your way through 6 distinct and colorful worlds on your quest to defeat the evil overlord Lucilate and free the island of Cuisinia from his reign of terror!

games.name: Serial World
games.description: "SerialWorld" is a comedic yet serious RPG. Whether you've played deck-building games before or not, everyone can enjoy this adventurous tale. Embark on a journey into the mysterious world to solve the city's disturbances!

games.name: Food Devils
games.description: You're the last chef in a post-apocalyptic world. Attract adventurers with monstrous food, make them sign contracts with the Food Devils and organize expeditions to collect wicked ingredients! Customize your characters, build the perfect restaurant and plan every move in this Strategy-RPG Roguelike.

games.name: Revelation of Decay
games.description: Zombies have taken over our homes! Pick up guns, organize a brave team, and fuck up those monsters! Farm land, scavenge a large apocalyptic world, and fight various of zombies! Modify your weapons, defeat scaring bosses, and finally uncover the truth behind the zombie outbreak and save our home!

games.name: Maseylia : Echoes of the Past
games.description: Maseylia : Echoes of the Past is a 3d metroidvania that aims to reproduce the experience of a 2d metroidvania in 3d. It features a labyrinthine world in which you'll need to collect upgrades to unlock new passages and make your way out of the labyrinth.

games.name: Solnox: Grimoire of Seasons
games.description: Become the master of seasons in this tactical turn-based deckbuilder. Dominate the ever-changing battlefield by unleashing the four seasons and utilizing their terrain-altering effects. Learn to create perfect synergies & guide your three sorcerers to victory against unholy creatures.

games.name: Ultra Mushroom
games.description: Hey! Wanna rise to the top at a festival stall? "Ultra Mushroom" is a high-energy game where you run a mushroom stall at a three-day festival and see how much you can earn. Gather mushrooms in the mountains by day and sell them at night. The key? Rhythmic banter and Ultra Mushrooms that bring joy!

games.name: Kai
games.description: KAI is a game of Exploration and Adventure between the sidereal space and underwater depths. Skillfully lure and guide groups of fish to solve puzzles, access new areas and uncover the truth behind the mission entrusted to you, Akira, and the other crew members aboard the ship.

games.name: Earthborne
games.description: Explore, fight, craft and develop an automated technological civilization complete with airships and robotic drones!

games.name: Digital Exorcist: CF1_Defrag
games.description: After the mysterious death of a Superstar Idol, disgraced DATA Agent Sawyer must face his ultimate challenge yet, being an undercover high school teacher while also keeping the Mississipi Inaka safe from Daemonic influence.

games.name: Alpha Nomos
games.description: It’s time to wield the beat! Play as Cello and slice through an army of rogue puppets in a vibrant, melody-twisted world. Combat pulses to the soundtrack - time your moves to the beat to unleash show-stopping combos and perfectly choreographed chaos!

games.name: Dangerous Connections
games.description: As a crisis brews in the Soviet Union, all of your skills as special agent Dan Morris are in demand. Explore the dark machinations of your opponents in a gripping story with exciting and unforgettable characters and use weapons and vehicles typical of the time, as well as a series of spy gadgets.

games.name: HyperFatal
games.description: AIR STRAFE, ROCKET JUMP, and SURF your way through dimensions in this HYPER-intensive skill-based movement shooter of old. The onslaught of foes in your way are invading worlds, and the only way to stop them is to show you will be FATAL.

games.name: Jordi & Oslo: The Lost Tail
games.description: Cute 2D Point-n-Click of the adorable comic book characters Jordi and Oslo the dragon.

games.name: Malvinas: La Ultima Carta
games.description: The last survivor of a battalion (a teenage soldier) must protect the last letter of his fallen comrades. Undergo the hunger, cold and violence the Argentinean soldiers had to endure during the war on the islands.

games.name: Cozy Dungeons
games.description: Explore deadly dungeons, clear them out of enemies and renovate them in Cozy Dungeons, a one-of-a-kind adventure/interior design game!

games.name: Potion Punch Rivals
games.description: Potion Punch Rivals puts your shopkeeping, potion punching skills to the test. Race against your rival to see who can take orders first, prep fastest, and serve best.

games.name: Bleakwood
games.description: Bleakwood desecrates the foundation of chess in this roguelike deckbuilder. Enter a sinister fantasy world where corruption is key to success. Grow stronger with each run by unlocking cards, improving units, and making sacrifices, ultimately conquering your enemies. But remember, absolute power corrupts absolutely. Will you defile your morals to reclaim what is yours?

games.name: Playable Alpha
games.description: Surviving a post-catastrophic event, your mission is to survive. In this VR First Person Looter Shooter, you will get weapons, gear, upgrade it and have fun blasting them aliens to shreds.

games.name: Panthalassa
games.description: Panthalassa is a Point and click and visual novel set in an underwater alien world. You play as an AI trying to uncover the memories of their body's previous owner. The game makes you experience the world through different user interfaces, where the physical and digital worlds collide.

games.name: Motorslice
games.description: Parkour through the ruins of a megastructure, climb massive bosses, and hunt down every construction equipment in this slice of life action-adventure.

games.name: Junxions
games.description: Build a traffic intersection nobody has ever seen before. Use your wits to manage lanes, rails, crossings, traffic lights, and rights of way. Test it with advanced AI adapting to the rules of the road you decide on. Become a traffic engineer with the most comprehensive road tools in a game to date.

games.name: Tears of Metal
games.description: Tears of Metal is a medieval hack-and-slash co-op roguelike. Carve through hordes of enemies to reclaim your island with the help of your formidable Scottish battalion. As you advance deeper into the trenches, uncover more about the mysterious Dragon Meteor and the treacherous enemy invasion.

games.name: Battle Vision Network
games.description: Battle Vision Network is an online PvP Puzzle-Battler fusing cozy color-matching puzzle gameplay with deep turn-based tactics. Teams from across the galaxy vye for the ultimate championship title in fast n’ fierce puzzle battles!

games.name: Tenjutsu
games.description:
In Tenjutsu, you play as a renegade yakuza hellbent on defying her former associates and loosening their grip on the Secret Garden City. Revealed at this year's Devolver Direct, this fast and fluid rogue-jutsu is the latest game from Sébastien Benard, designer of the acclaimed Dead Cells.

Four powerful crime syndicates control the city, ruling with an iron fist. To defeat them, you must master a brutal brawling system and build a diverse arsenal of weapons, upgrades, and martial arts techniques, breaking their hold on the streets in a flurry of violence.

The city is reborn as these sinister organizations fall to your fists, tackled in any order you wish. The ruined streets become vibrant and full of life, and you can spend gathered resources in shops and restaurants to help you on your quest.

Shape the city to fit your play style, unlocking new weapons, combat moves, and new areas. Just don't take too long: the longer you spend preparing, the stronger your enemies will become.

games.name: Curilemu
games.description: Curilemu is an adventure-horror game inspired by the myths and legends of Chilean Patagonia. Immerse yourself in a haunting world filled with Lovecraftian horrors and ancient mysteries. Fight colossal beasts and discover what is behind the plague to heal this island and restore the cosmic balance.

games.name: Mixtape
games.description:
On their last night of high school, three friends embark on one more adventure together. Play through a mixtape of memories, set to the soundtrack of a generation.

En route to their final party together, a perfectly-curated playlist draws them into dreamlike reenactments of their formative memories. Experience a variety of narrative vignettes exploring the pivotal moments that shaped them. It's the greatest hits of teenage friendship, from the first kiss to the last dance.

games.name: Gears of War: E-Day
games.description:
Experience the brutal horror of Emergence Day through the eyes of Marcus Fenix in the origin story of one of gaming's most acclaimed sagas.​
Fourteen years before Gears of War, war heroes Marcus Fenix and Dom Santiago return home to face a new nightmare: the Locust Horde. These subterranean monsters, grotesque and relentless, erupt from below, laying siege on humanity itself. ​
Built from the ground up with Unreal Engine 5, Gears of War: E-Day delivers unprecedented graphical fidelity.

games.name: Stormforge
games.description: Stormforge is an open-world survival crafting game for up to 8 players. You are Stormforged, with the ability to brave and harness power from magical storms. Explore, fight, forage, craft, build, and defeat bosses in this epic, fantasy game. Survive the Storms and thrive!

games.name: Path for the Seeker
games.description: Path For The Seeker is a detective adventure in which a young nun investigates the disappearance of a famous inventor in a city on the border of two worlds.

games.name: Gummy Nightmares
games.description: Step into the enigmatic world of Gummy Nightmares as a little boy who wakes up in a mysterious amusement park with no memory. Explore, solve puzzles, and uncover lost memories while evading sinister plushie robots. Use weapons, set traps, and find hideouts to survive and reveal the truth

games.name: Skylark 64
games.description: A 64-bit 3D Collect-a-thon Platformer where you play as A flying squirrel who can glide, run, jump and roll in open non-linear levels collecting Acorns, Soul Leaves and 7 pieces of armor with unique power-ups! You can even play with a friend in Split-Screen Co-op!

games.name: Free Stars: Children of Infinity
games.description: Experience a stellar space adventure and the sequel to The Ur-Quan Masters. Travel through hyperspace, engage in fast-paced combat, discover weird worlds, and meet a unique cast of truly alien aliens as you uncover a mystery that threatens the galaxy.

games.name: Whiskers Wonderland
games.description: Whiskers Wonderland: a game where your pops sent you to find something that was lost in a restaurant, but be warned, Mr Whiskers doesn't like trespassers and you unfortunately are one, so he's after you... You do remember another robot named Dr Mouser. Ready to find what happend to him?

games.name: Five Laps at Freddy's
games.description:
Welcome to Five Laps at Freddy's, The premier animatronic kart racing circuit featuring you favorite and lovable Fazbear friends! Sponsored by Fazbear Entertainment

Select one of 12 of your favorite animatronic #FNaF characters and race on sixteen tracks set across 4 cups! Each track is based on your favorite locations from Five Nights at Freddy's lore, including Fazbear Hills, Midnight Motorist and more!

games.name: Ties: Soul Link
games.description:
TIES: Soul Link is an Emotional and Brutal 2D Metroidvania, combining Action RPG elements with Adventure Platformer.
An exciting story of resilience and overcoming fears. Explore incredible cities in a world in decline, set in the year 2097, full of secrets and with brutal and bloody gameplay.

games.name: Backrooms
games.description: Explore an abandoned liminal space. Uncover dark secrets through eerie exploration and environmental storytelling. Evade unpredictable supernatural entities and face psychological horror. Will you reveal the truth or become another lost soul?

games.name: Sloppy Forgeries
games.description: Sloppy Forgeries is a fast-paced, two-player local multiplayer painting game. Each player is given a mouse, a blank canvas, and a few simple paint tools. Each round, a famous painting from art history is revealed. Players race to copy the painting as quickly and accurately as possible.

games.name: The Occultist
games.description: The Occultist is a first-person narrative thriller. You play as Alan Rebels, a paranormal investigator who travels to an abandoned British island after his father's disappearance. Explore GodStone island, face supernatural entities, and uncover long-buried occult rituals.

games.name: Heart Dungeon
games.description: Heart Dungeon is a roguelite action game with visual novel elements that follows a boy called Leo who gets inside a video game that manifests elements of the psyche of whoever enters it. He will use this dimension to fight the illness that afflicts his mother and understand what is going on in his own heart.

games.name: The Standard Model
games.description: The Standard Model is a narrative walking simulator/slice-of-life game set in different worlds throughout the multiverse. The player takes on the role of an undergraduate student that gets to explore and experience 5 different worlds on a quantum adventure.

games.name: Mizuki and the Crimson Moon
games.description: Journey through a yokai-filled Japan in this 2D Action Platformer! Control Mizuki, a carefree and playful kitsune, as she investigates evil events happening around her village. Use her signature ability of teleportation to overcome obstacles and defeat enemies in this unique platformer adventure.

games.name: Polyaris
games.description: Polyaris is a single-player, first-person survival skiing game set in a post-nuclear, procedurally generated Arctic world. Survive the cold, ski through icy wastelands, find essential resources, fight enemies, and uncover the mystery of why you are the last one alive.

games.name: Brutalist
games.description: Brutalist is a third-person meditative game where you need to follow paths, find passages, solve riddles, watch out for radiation and monitor oxygen levels. And all this is surrounded by an atmospheric abandoned concrete world.

games.name: Cupid's Chatroom
games.description: Find your true love with the help of Cupid's chatroom, a mysterious server that won't let you leave!

games.name: Elementalist
games.description: In this movement puzzle platformer, you have to collect your abilities before using them. Jump, dash, dive, and teleport inside carefully crafted levels, to salvage as many sun fragments as possible.

games.name: Blightwreck
games.description: Stuck at the bottom of the sea floor, escape a sunken ocean liner in this handcrafted 2D Metroidvania! Find powerful upgrades, and fight strange bosses. You may be isolated from your shipmates, but you're not alone...

games.name: Fruit of Choice
games.description: Casual arcade game. Stay on the move and survive for a long time. Dash to dodge, attack, and explode bombs!

games.name: NBA the Run
games.description: Take your favorite NBA stars to iconic streetball courts around the world, in this fast-paced, online 3v3 basketball game. Stack wins, earn cred and become the GOAT of THE RUN. Who's Got Next?

games.name: Truckful
games.description: Drive your pickup truck through seemingly peaceful countryside valleys, deliver much-needed goods to local townsfolk and unravel the small town mystery. Beware, the old forest is watching.

games.name: Guns are Funs
games.description: Guns are Funs is a fun and exciting arcade game for people of all ages. It will help develop coordination of movements, accuracy and logical thinking. You have to shoot from a toy cannon at towers made of cubes.

games.name: Shop Crush
games.description: Run a mysterious thrift shop in a story-rich Visual Novel. Meet eccentric customers, uncover hidden illusions, and unveil the sinister secret of your shop.

games.name: Iso-Core
games.description: Farm, craft, build, and explore a Beautiful isometric pixel art world. Explore new places and find new biomes to expand your list of items, buildings, and recipes.

games.name: Dungeons & Furries
games.description: ✨What's more alluring than the charm of fantasy worlds? Answer: the same, but with sex. The more sex and magic, the better. Choose your character’s gender, solve match-three puzzles, enjoy the fully voiced animations, and find out how your story ends!✨

games.name: Duskfade
games.description: Duskfade is a colorful adventure in a world where the torments of the past haunt you. Battle against your memories in a dizzying dance to fade the shadows of the dusk.

games.name: Lady Death Demonicron
games.description: LADY DEATH: DEMONICRON is an all new side-scrolling, sword slicing, magic wielding, 15 level, multiplayer beat-em-up that takes the best aspects of the 1990's arcade classics - all mixed together with a killer 90's industrial-metal soundtrack!

games.name: Drunken Rogue
games.description: The rowdy adventures of drunk-as-a-skunk Rogue Lita and Vampire of Demise Endo! Stagger around traps and stumble through demon assaults. Make your way to the dungeon's deepest depths—rumored to contain the most precious of booze!

games.name: Solar Voltage
games.description: After a huge solar storm destroyed their ship and left them stranded, help Volt and her crewmates escape the dangerous planet filled with deadly robots and a mysterious AI.

games.name: Chemist Wanted
games.description: Chemist Wanted is a crafting game with a difference! In this lab simulator, you use practical chemistry to make compounds and sell them. Set up your equipment, run the experiments and create your products. But be careful who you cut deals with - you might get more than you bargained for!

games.name: Vortica
games.description: Vortica is a 2D action roguelite set in a solar system overrun by hostile aliens. Suit up, loot up, and shoot up as you battle against enemy hordes, explore derelict outposts, and hunt giant bosses. Each mission gets you one step closer to reaching Earth and saving the human race.

games.name: Dark Queen of Samobor
games.description: Embark on a journey inspired by Slavic mythology and Croatian folklore in this 2.5D action-adventure game inspired by the likes of Song of Iron, Prince of Persia, Inside and Limbo.

games.name: Mini Worlds
games.description: Mini Worlds is a cozy building game about creating tiny cities on a small world.

games.name: Airsoft Range
games.description: Play against AI in free play mode with difficulties ranging a walk in the park to fighting a literal aimbot or get lost in the immersive campaign going from a no one to a superstar. All in VR

games.name: Wire Throne
games.description: Blast your way out of captivity, upgrade your ride, and unleash devastating firepower to take down the Wire Throne! One life, one car in this roguelite top-down looter shooter!

games.name: Trifoil
games.description: Trifoil is a minimalist, cerebral line drawing puzzle game, that explores how lines can interact with themselves. It has multiple puzzle mechanics, secrets to discover and mysteries to solve.

games.name: The Enigma Cases
games.description: The Enigma Cases invites you to test your skills as a detective and solve the most complex cases. Join your friends in this immersive and mysterious world. Do you have what it takes to uncover the truth?

games.name: Gaming Raiding
games.description: Third-person shooter games

games.name: Umblight
games.description: Umblight is an Inscryption-like card game adventure where you're trapped in a dark, machine-filled room that changes as you go. Build your deck of shadow and light cards, make new cards by combining them and play mind-bending synergies as you try to defeat your dungeon master!

games.name: Silver Pines
games.description: Silver Pines is a survival horror metroidvania. Fight nightmarish terrors and solve puzzles, while carefully managing your scarce resources as you uncover the mysteries of a case that could hold the key to redemption.

games.name: Scriptorium: Master of Manuscripts
games.description: Run your manuscript workshop, receive orders to illustrate medieval books, decorate them any way you like, send them back to clients to get paid, and unlock new jobs, decorations, and items. Welcome to your very own medieval scriptorium!

games.name: CrisisX
games.description: Immerse yourself into a realistic open world experience and find your way out in the ruins of a dying world. Survive the threats from the Infected, the living and most importantly, the wilderness. Fight or cooperate with others, and build your own territory. Build your own new post-apocalyptic world.

games.name: Let's Build a Dungeon
games.description: Manage a game studio making the world’s greatest MMORPG. Hire designers, coders, and testers, create a fantasy world, then welcome hundreds of virtual players. If they get bored they will cancel their subscription and your investors will have your head. You can even play the game you create.

games.name: Will: Follow the Light
games.description: Dive into a realistic, single-player, first-person journey through the harsh northern latitudes as you sail endless waters, searching for a way back to your loved ones. Will you follow the light?

games.name: Galactic Economy
games.description: Can you become a leader in the Galactic Economy? Buy spaceships and spacestations on you way to get some additional income. Roll the dice and see what you can achieve in this board game.

games.name: Hela
games.description: Become a brave mouse familiar in a heartwarming 3D adventure through stunning Scandinavian landscapes. Solve puzzles, explore, and brew magic potions to find a cure for your befriended Witch. Experience a healing journey like no other!

games.name: Heroes of Might & Magic: Olden Era
games.description: Heroes of Might & Magic: Olden Era is the official prequel hailing back to the origins of the genre-defining, critically acclaimed series of turn-based strategy games. Explore the map solo or in multiplayer, triumph in iconic battles and establish peace on a continent where it was never an option.

games.name: Psycho Dead
games.description: A third-person survival horror game that you play as a girl with psychic power who tries to escape from a secret lab and is pursued by deadly stalkers.

games.name: Shadows of the Werewolf
games.description: Shadows of the Werewolf is a cinematic, third-person action-adventure game that places players in a suspenseful, horror-filled world. The story unfolds across various locations, including a suburban home and a mysterious forest retreat, where an innocent couple faces a relentless werewolf and other monstrous creatures. Players will engage in tense exploration, object interaction, and combat, using stealth and strategy to hide, fight, and escape from supernatural threats. The game blends elements of classic horror films and survival horror games, offering a narrative-driven, single-player experience filled with fear, suspense, and the challenge of survival under the full moon.

games.name: Match In Peace
games.description: In this terrifying, genre-busting strategy game, find and match monster pairs to unleash their terror on your enemies. Battle in PvP, conquer the Tower and Roguelike modes and find alchemy components to craft new powerful monsters. Can you keep your calm under pressure and Match In Peace?

games.name: Undergrounded
games.description: “Undergrounded” is a puzzle adventure where you explore a dungeon formed by the accumulation of American history. Become Scott, who wandered underground in search of his lost engagement ring after failing to propose to his girlfriend, and plumb the depths of the past itself with your buddy Canary!

games.name: Atre: Dominance Wars
games.description: Attain the powers of a God and dominate in this lore-driven 4X game full of unique species. Evolve your units to command diverse armies. Develop magnificent cities. Research and master arcane spellcraft to lay waste to the world itself. Find your own path to power and Ascend above all else.

games.name: Cain & Iddo: Break Week
games.description:
Cain the dog and Iddo the hyena are two plucky 24-year-olds navigating life alone in the East Coast American metropolis of Westside City. Their zany misadventures don't turn out exactly as planned, wacky unforeseen circumstances arise, and hijinx ensues...

Cain works as a barista at the local mall's Starbuzz franchisee. Due to requirements from higher Starbuzz management, his boss Sergio has to give Cain a week off work for the summer. Cain and Iddo have decided to get some bucket list activities done over this week-long break... but you can probably guess that finishing that list is not going to be as simple as it seems.

games.name: Ascend to Zero
games.description: Have you ever wondered what it's like to stop the time? Ascend to ZERO is a time-control roguelike, in which you can use your special ability to stop the time itself and efficiently fight your way through the top. Freeze the time to dodge opponents' attacks using your unique ability, and always hold a higher ground for the combat. However, don't forget that the time allowed for you is confined.

games.name: Aetherian Chronicles
games.description: Aetherian Chronicles is a 3D Casual SideScroller MMORPG focused on interaction with AI controlled players. Explore, train, party up, make friends and trade with real people or AI controlled players! Customize your character to your hearts content and choose your own way to experience your adventure!

games.name: Dragon's Brew
games.description: Dragon's Brew is a board game cafe simulator! Serve customers while fulfilling takeaway orders and delivery requests and build up your reputation in the vibrant seaside town of Pebblebrook. Source and grow your own ingredients, craft a variety of seasonal recipes, and expand your board game collection. Discover and unlock 100+ board games, each with its own effects and bonuses. Pair them with specific menu items to trigger unique effects and create powerful synergies that enhance your cafe’s operations and profits.

games.name: The Depths of Despair
games.description: Get ready to unleash your inner warrior as you battle goblins, demons, orcs, and more in a thrilling souls-like adventure. Your quest is to help an angel named Amelia find her sister, who has been captured by demonic entities.

games.name: ArcheAge Chronicles
games.description: Explore Auroria, a vast and vibrant world brimming with rich lore and thrilling action. ArcheAge Chronicles delivers an immersive experience that will capture players' hearts, whether they are newcomers to the setting or seasoned adventurers.

games.name: Depth Loop
games.description: A werewolf game set in a deep-sea lab, where the survival of humanity is at stake—does justice lie with humankind or the werewolves?

games.name: Spook-A-Boo
games.description: Spook-A-Boo is a ghost-hunting couch co-op game for up to four players. Team up with friends and family to locate and capture sneaky ghosts hiding in plain sight.

games.name: Akaku Forest
games.description: Akaku Forest is a game that blends puzzles, platforming, and thrilling boss battles in a Metroidvania-style format. You take control of Aki-Maku, a courageous forest spirit. Use your torch to solve puzzles or face off against your enemies. Save the forest!

games.name: Nerd: Tracing Dayline
games.description: An adventure game created with the concept of "a game for a single song."

games.name: Entwine
games.description: A first person psychological horror game. Experience a hand-crafted singleplayer campaign, or partner up with up to 4 players in a cooperative horror adventure.

games.name: Hark the Ghoul
games.description: Slash, kick and magick your way through an adventure brimming with secrets and curious encounters! HARK THE GHOUL offers a meticulously handcrafted world to explore, inspired by the interconnected nature of the first DARK SOULS.

games.name: Ten Ten
games.description: Ten Ten is a unique game that combines shooting, puzzles, and bullet-dodging.

games.name: Looppip
games.description: Looppip is a magical seed that carries an ancient hourglass with the power to turn back time. Your mission is to save the bee hives, essential for the survival of life on Earth, and reverse the environmental collapse threatening nature.

games.name: Sepulchron
games.description: An atmospheric puzzle-horror game where you have 72 in-game hours to escape with your life. Solve challenging puzzles that require logical deduction during the day, survive assaults from hostile ghosts at night, and uncover the mystery behind Astor Manor.

games.name: My Arms Are Longer Now
games.description: You are a yucky long-armed thief. Snake through levels, retract like a vacuum cord, or put on a sock to seduce a lonely guard - whatever it takes to pull off the perfect heist!

games.name: Beyond Astra
games.description: Beyond Astra is a real-time 4X sci-fi grand strategy game. Expand your own civilization, explore captivating and mysterious planets and star clusters, interact with your citizens and other life forms and shape your destiny through nearly infinite possibilities.

games.name: Alex's Journey to the Grave
games.description: Alex's Journey to the Grave is a visual novel about a boy trapped by fate and a girl in dire need of a friend. Help guide them through some of the hardest decisions of their lives as they experience warmth, connection, tragedy, the inevitability of death... and the antics of a mysterious black cat.

games.name: Bylina
games.description: Embark on an epic journey to the Far Far Kingdom and challenge Koschei the Deathless to save your immortal soul and become a true hero in Bylina, an Action RPG rooted in Slavic folklore and myths. Take on the role of Falconet, a young bogatyr born without hero's powers, shunned and underestimated by almost everyone. Conquer numerous ordeals, overcome insurmountable odds, and become a legendary hero whose tales will be told for ages to come.

games.name: Owl Force
games.description: Lead the legendary Owl Force and your wingmates on an epic journey defending the galaxy against the nefarious Darktail Order. Take on missions, upgrade your ship, and engage in heart-pounding battles to uncover the hidden secrets of the universe.

games.name: Good Boy
games.description: An ecosystem driven metroidvania on the mysterious planet of Terra II! Take control of Good Boy and explore the strange new world! Complete quests for other good boys and girls, capture and research exotic alien life, and forge a relationship with your new human friend!

games.name: Shine On, My Little Sun
games.description: When the Sun fell, darkness covered the world. In the snowy wasteland, the town of Svargo thrived under its faint light. But the Sun did not go out. The small Sun sleeps atop a grim lighthouse. What happens when the Sun awakens, seeking a few days of simple childhood?

games.name: Wild Haven
games.description: Wild Haven is a nature ecosystem builder. You will build the forest and create a thriving ecosystem. Clean up polluted land, strategically place wildlife together, discover more complex plants and animals and rebuild the ecosystem your way!

games.name: The Infectious Madness of Doctor Dekker 2
games.description: An FMV game where YOU are a psychiatrist trying to solve a double murder whilst treating the unusual patients of the recently deceased Doctor Dekker. Ask questions and link answers to determine their fates, and your own!

games.name: Animal Use Protocol
games.description: In this first-person, narrative-focused survival horror, you play as Penn, a hyper-intelligent chimpanzee. Hunted at every turn, your only chance of survival lies in scavenging, crafting, and exploring Anchorage Station. An epic story awaits. Be quick and quiet. Time is running out...

games.name: Nonolith
games.description: Discover the countless secrets of the NONOLITH. Copy and paste blocks to reach new areas, and master hidden mechanics that let you do the seemingly impossible. You are very powerful, you just don't know it yet.

games.name: Blades & Battles
games.description: Blades & Battles is a fantasy Beat'Em Up game that takes players to the heart of the legendary world of King Arthur in his barbarian youth. A modern version of classic titles such as Golden Axe.

games.name: Danchi Days
games.description: Laugh, cry, and feel awe in this cute adventure game about inviting characters to a Japanese summer festival! Surf the internet to learn their quirks and desires, then use your senses to uncover the unseen wonders of a Y2K, GBA-inspired world.

games.name: Gangstalk
games.description: GANGSTALK is a psychological horror game from the POV of your stalkers.

games.name: Active Matter
games.description:
You’re an operative stuck in a time loop, always brought back from the dead to the same point.

Choose your loadout and enter quantum unstable zones rich with active matter — a substance capable of warping and ripping the very fabric of space and time.

Fight against rivals from other timelines, survive physics-breaking anomalies and try to stay alive. Harvest active matter, gather loot and extract to a safe place before the whole zone ceases to exist with everything inside it.

games.name: Manipulus
games.description:
Manipulus is a thrilling deck-building, choose-your-own-adventure game with rogue-like mechanics and perma-death. Trapped by mysterious forces, you are made to relive your past, guiding a band of survivors through perilous times.

As a Manipuli general, form strategic defensive lines and manoeuvre your followers to activate wild abilities to defeat the oncoming monsters and lead your band to safety. Re-play your cards, re-live your actions, and fight to keep your refugees alive in this dark and captivating adventure.

It's time to FORM THE MANIPULUS!

games.name: Don't Wake the Beast
games.description: In Don't Wake the Beast, a roguelite stealth game, you’ll sneak through ever-changing dungeons to steal precious treasures guarded by deadly beasts. Use your trusty grappling hook to evade traps, outsmart enemies, and solve puzzles. But beware—each treasure you claim makes escaping more dangerous!

games.name: Void Dungeon
games.description: Void Dungeon brings you a 2D Action RPG with intense hack & slash combat, deep character options, and unyielding enemies, which you can face solo or with up to 4 friends. Oh, and quirky costumes. Because it’s better to look good when the void consumes you.

games.name: Haunted by Femboy
games.description: In this choice-based NSFW visual novel after inheriting a strange house from your parents, you stumble upon an ancient book and accidentally summon a mischievous femboy ghost. Now bound to your home, the ghost becomes your roommate, and it's up to you to find the missing pages of the book while navigating your unusual new life together.

games.name: Scorched Warfare
games.description: This is a strategy action game set in a fictional fantasy world. You play as a warmaster, commanding troops in battles. Use the roguelike system to customize your gameplay style: will you be a one-man army, standing against thousands, or a mastermind tactician controlling the battlefield?

games.name: Chi Project
games.description: Sci-fi fantasy visual novel that combines a turn-based combat system with murder investigation elements.

games.name: Pebbles Quest
games.description: The Princess has been kidnapped by evildoers! It is now Pebbles Quest to breach the Castle, face a gauntlet of traps and trials, all to rescue his one true love.

games.name: SpaceCraft
games.description: The Universe is yours. SpaceCraft is an online space exploration and building game. Explore a vast galaxy of solar systems and planets, mine and craft resources, design and build ships, automate planetary bases and interplanetary logistics, trade and cooperate.

games.name: Prolegomena To a Hyperdimensional Interface That Will Be Able to Manifest From Three-Minute Interchanges
games.description: This is a fully voiced multi-ending adventure game that progresses by repeating a limited 3-minute dialogue time. Interactions primarily occur through an interface called "choices".

games.name: Karting of Banban
games.description: Grip your steering wheel and join your favorite Banban characters in the race of a lifetime! Drift around tight corners and zoom through locations both old and new. Use power-ups and boosts to dodge your opponents and claim first place!

games.name: A Tiny Wander
games.description: Buu must deliver a package through a deep forest. Despite many attempts to challenge the forest, he has not succeeded. Chat with passersby, explore, and take breaks at campsites, while searching for a way to get through the forest. Let's go on a small nighttime adventure with Buu!

games.name: Life of a Lonely Indie Game Developer
games.description: "Create the games you want, at the time you want, and live doing only what you love." In this realistic life simulation game, an independent game developer dreams of such a life, struggling with money and time while paying taxes until death. Whether this life is happy or truly lonely, you decide.

games.name: Virtual Cottage 2
games.description: Virtual Cottage 2 motivates and supports you in tackling your daily tasks. Use its built-in productivity tool to accomplish your goals faster. Create your ultimate cozy space with a wide range of different furniture.

games.name: Steampunk Shinobi
games.description: Steampunk Shinobi is a roguelite action game set in a Steampunk/Medieval Japan-inspired world. Play as a lineage of Shinobi, where each death passes the quest to the next generation. Procedurally generated maps evolve with your actions, making every playthrough unique!

games.name: Pararecords
games.description: As a counselor in a mysterious facility, you are to examine children with strange powers and fill in their "Paranormal Records". In this story-based, choice-driven game, you will have to pry open your subjects' minds... but what you find inside them could prove dangerous.

games.name: Pinbleton Park
games.description: Pinbleton Park is a small open world cosy adventure game where the whole world can transform into a giant pinball table. Help the villagers, rescue lost spirits, craft new pinball elements, and take down the corporation bent on destroying the forest!

games.name: Toem 2
games.description: Step back into the shoes of a curious photographer and set off on a brand new adventure all about uncovering hidden details, helping friends along the way, and documenting the world’s little wonders in TOEM 2, the sequel to the acclaimed TOEM.

games.name: Shippin
games.description: Embark on a journey across cozy islands, where you’ll fish and experience magical moments. Uncover the stories of an ocean, where each harbor is a welcoming place, with friendly characters waiting to help guide you back home!

games.name: Cosmorons
games.description: A mix of gravity-defying gameplay, slapstick-tinged parody, and a classic low-poly-inspired aesthetic all wrapped up in an addictive arcade shooter for 1-4 players!

games.name: Feltopia
games.description: In this hand-felted, stop-motion "cute-em-up," the realms of Feltopia have been infected by a mysterious Smog Spirit. Skyrider flies on their pegasus through wondrous landscapes to save their magical sheep, transform creatures, and battle bosses on their quest to uncover Feltopia’s secrets.

games.name: Flexible Frosty
games.description: A short and icy GameBoy-style puzzle platformer featuring Frosty, a cute little penguin who can not jump like other penguins.

games.name: RPG Chess
games.description: A turn-based RPG, except it's also chess! Instead of capturing, your pieces engage in thrilling 1v1 battles where they can level up and unlock powerful abilities. Shape your team as you progress through the single-player campaign or challenge others in online matches!

games.name: Fogpiercer
games.description: Build your train to build your deck. Fight off bandits in a post apocalyptic world. Progress and unlock new train combinations with synergies. Get drivers to their final destinations.

games.name: Snake in the Dark
games.description: Sure, you've played Snake. But could you play it blind? Snake in the Dark is a total re-imagination of the timeless arcade and puzzle game classics like Snake and Sokoban. Fun gameplay you know delivered with more puzzling twisssts than you expect!

games.name: Ask Gear Re:Boost
games.description: A new, straightforward RPG! Hot scenarios and battles that go right to the heart of JRPGs. For those of you who still feel your youth in the RPGs of the PS1 and PS2 generations, this is the game for you.

games.name: Sintopia
games.description: Build the resurrection business of your dreams with Sintopia! You are charged with managing the bureaucratic administration of Hell, your team of Imployees punish the dead souls for their Sins, generating a profit to help you build and sustain your Hellish empire.

games.name: Turok: Origins
games.description: Play as the legendary Turok warriors to face off against ferocious dinosaurs and a terrifying alien threat that seeks to destroy all human life across the galaxy.

games.name: Onimusha: Way of the Sword
games.description:
Fight through bloodstained battlefields of intense swordplay action. Explore the historic Japanese capital of Edo-era Kyoto, twisted by malevolent clouds of Malice.
With every stage cloaked in mystery, danger and intrigue. Battle against monstrosities from the underworld known as Genma in a tale of dark fantasy.
Follow the tale of a samurai who wields the Oni Gauntlet, a mystical artifact that grants its bearer the power to slay Genma.
Through gritty, blood-soaked brawls, he searches for his reason to fight. What fate awaits at the end of his path?

games.name: Deprision
games.description: Deprision is a psychological horror game that delivers an immersive and terrifying AAA experience. Survive human madness, amnesia's power, and navigate parallel worlds via a deadly virus. Solve your world's problem, survive, prevent more deaths, and escape before it's too late.

games.name: Work In Progress
games.description:
It’s your first day in office and half of the staff is already on burnout...
Here is your gun, your contract.
Now go fire some people.

games.name: Unearther
games.description: Journey into different places and environments in search of resources and valuables. Make tools and equipments, survive the dangers and lurking monsters. Craft your way of living and discover the unknown world hidden in plain sight.

games.name: Buster Jam
games.description: Buster Jam is a comedic, fast-paced minigame frenzy full of wonderfully wacky characters. Its early 2000s style and soundtrack take full advantage of its rich story and hilarious visuals.

games.name: Vacation Cafe Simulator
games.description: Cozy Italian Vacation Cafe ️ No timers, No stress cook traditional dishes upgrade and customize just drink prosecco, relax and grow your dream cafe

games.name: Tattoo Removal Simulator
games.description: Take on the role of a skilled tattoo removal specialist. Enjoy a soothing pace that lets you focus on the calming process of tattoo removal. Set in a small studio in a bustling city, your all clients share one goal: erasing parts of their past, marked by colorful images, texts, secrets and stories.

games.name: Snow Resort Simulator
games.description: Step into the world of Snow Resort Simulator. Tackle daily responsibilities: upgrade facilities, maintain a cozy resort, satisfy guests with freshly cooked meals and drinks, and keep your inventory fully stocked. Be prepared for the challenges that come with winter.

games.name: Star Life
games.description:
Sandbox "Zero To Hero" RPG in futuristic setting. Game features deep economic gameplay with realistic economy and full freedom for a player.

While on a planet, range of opportunities is wide, from being employed practically at any building (should there be a vacancy) to owning any non-government building, influencing economy directly. Entire planet economy is based on real buildings present in the game and therefore player can shape it to his liking (if player is rich enough). Player can also choose to be anyone - from local business owner, to criminal or politician (or as it might often be - all at once). Skill development is only possible if player performs tasks which require those skills.

Player can travel from planet to planet and own or rent any spaceship, mining, pirating or simply trading goods between planets. While game has no quests & restrictions, there is a main story present which implies that player need to achieve certain results and actions to meet win condition, which does not stop player from continuing game thereafter.

Choose any path or all at once. Model employee, Business owner, Politician, Merchant, Pirate, Criminal, or just explore game as it feels.

games.name: Syntaxia
games.description: SYNTAXIA is a dream-dark adventure game that allows you to rewrite reality itself by changing the words that describe it. Use your creativity and intuition to escape. Which path will you choose?

games.name: Froggo's Adventure: Drifting Sky
games.description: A 2D side-scrolling platformer with cute and dreamlike aesthetics. The ever growing colossal tree known as "the witch's hand" is growing out of control. Froggo sets foot on a journey to investigate the tree in hopes of finding a solution to save his home.

games.name: Bat Galaxy
games.description: Half on-rails shooter, half exploration-driven adventure. Zoom into a world where billions of bullets surround you and your handy punch feature can send enemies flying.

games.name: Elflock
games.description: Elflock is a single-player third-person adventure. You are a princess returning to your home on the brink of war and it's up to you to navigate the machinations of the nobles surrounding the king. Engage in intricate dialogues and uncover mysteries in this branching fantasy tale!

games.name: Catfall
games.description: A lone astronaut cat survives a spaceship crash and now embarks on a journey to find the crew: his feline friends and his dearest human.

games.name: Nightmare Circus
games.description: Nightmare Circus is an action-adventure game where the player takes on the role of a Puppeteer trapped in the Nightmare Realm. Set out on a journey to find his friends and escape the nightmare!

games.name: The Gambit Lost to Time
games.description: Become a time-travelling advisor seeking to shape this world towards her ideal future. Choose between one of four kingdoms to support, with the realization that today's friend is an enemy in another timeline. Bring out your best Gambits and lead your troops to victory!

games.name: Project TurboBlast
games.description: Drift, boost, and spin around corners at BLASTING SPEEDS in this stylish Singleplayer + Multiplayer Arcade Racing game, Blending the familiar drifting of Kart racers and tight responsive handling of classic Anti-Gravity racing games. With a focus on being easy to pick up but difficult to master.

games.name: The Dropouts
games.description: Heist your own school to get the exams' answers and discover why so many students have disappeared in Noirmont High. Spooky and nostalgic.

games.name: Monster Crown: Sin Eater
games.description: Explore the beautiful and detailed environments of Crown Nation, breed endless monsters with the most robust and polished true crossbreeding system devised in a video game.

games.name: Re:Ver Project - Tokyo
games.description: Co-developed by Toei Animation and indie developer Nestopi, is a survival suspense adventure game set in modern Tokyo depicted in pixel art. Yukinori Amane whos falsely accused of a crime, uses his survival skills to evade the police and uncover the real culprit.

games.name: Null Path
games.description: Your skill, patience, and ingenuity will be tested in this homage to precision platformers and metroidvanias! Traverse various biomes, from caves to volcanic wastelands and mysterious towers. Each environment with it's own deadly traps, puzzles, and challenges designed to push you to your limits.

games.name: Zeizen
games.description: Ultra-violent point & click set in Shanghai, China.

games.name: Bugboy
