games.description: Catch, train and battle creepy crawlies and uncover the secrets of Spider Town in this retro Gameboy-style RPG.

games.name: Over the Hill
games.description: Explore the world in the golden age of offroading. Drive iconic vehicles from the 60s to 80s by yourself or with friends through challenging trails and beautiful scenery.

games.name: Looking For Fael
games.description:
Upon receiving a cryptic voicemail from your missing roommate, the ordinary confines of your apartment transform into a surreal labyrinth. Guided by his voice and a custom retro console in hand, embark on a journey to decipher the mysteries that have twisted your home into an enigmatic maze.

But beware. The further you venture into other realities, the harder it will be to find your way back.

games.name: Dragon Realms
games.description: Be the dragon! Customise, upgrade, and dominate a vast fantasy world. Destroy castles, battle foes, gather treasure, and rule Dragon Realms!

games.name: Pico Drift
games.description: Explore the city as your ultimate drifting arena. Dodge traffic, outsmart the cops, and challenge your friends. Experience official campaign tracks and game modes, or create your own playgrounds. This is your world - drive it your way

games.name: Aksun
games.description: Aksun is an action roguelite based on Korean shamanism and the afterlife.

games.name: Baba Yaga
games.description: A turn-based roguelike game of strategic combat and sinister magic. Decimate the king’s loyalist forces, grow your powers, and discover the reimagined origin story of Baba Yaga, the most feared witch of Slavic folklore!

games.name: HoverGrease 2
games.description:
Mixing the traditional elements of a team-based game with the arcade thrill of a twin-stick shooter. A super fast-paced game, where both your reflexes and your team’s positioning play a crucial role. Play the Singleplayer Story or join the 5v5 Online Multiplayer.

Dive into the vibrant, bio-cyberpunk world of Diamond Core Metropolis, where chaos reigns in every arena. Take control of a powerful mutant, master unique abilities, and fight for survival in an electrifying dystopian future.

games.name: Liminal Point
games.description: Classic Survival Horror. Drawn to Ashen Point by a cryptic voicemail, Lyra returns to the island where her band’s story ended in tragedy. Shrouded in fog and prowled by horrors, confront deadly creatures, explore the desolate town, and reveal the truth behind the night that changed everything.

games.name: Croak Crusader: The Champion of Canada
games.description: Do you dare save the Land of the Maple Leaf? Croak Crusader is a fast-paced, momentum-based action platformer featuring tight controls, explosive combat, and a versatile grapple mechanic.

games.name: There's Always a Madman: V.I.C.T.O.R.
games.description:
Secret agent Franklin Benjamin will stop at nothing to save the world.

In the single-player interactive novel villain team-up game "There's Always a Madman: V.I.C.T.O.R.," you play as his greatest adversaries. Can the criminal enterprise known as V.I.C.T.O.R. (short for a "Very Important Collective of Terrorists, Operatives, and Rogues") defeat the only man standing between them and world domination?

To the V.I.C.T.O.R. go the spoils!

games.name: Sangra
games.description: Classic survival horror with a modern feel. Solve puzzles, search for items, manage your inventory, and pray you'll return to the safe room alive in this decaying twisted facility consumed by a mysterious metallic corruption.

games.name: Biofactory
games.description: Build your living factory using organs and fleshy biomachines. Combine your pulsating machines to automate and scale up production. Mine, harvest, produce and assemble weird materials in a grimdark biopunk setting. No enemies or pressure, the hive mind has only one instinct: The factory must grow.

games.name: Zoominoes
games.description: Zoominoes is a tile based roguelite deckbuilder. Collect cute animals scoring points with crazy combos as you create the perfect zoo.

games.name: Vice: Magic City Mayhem
games.description: Vice: Magic City Mayhem is a retro action-adventure game where you fight, collect new items, and upgrade your character as you make your way through bustling nightclubs, scenic beaches, and raptor-infested yachts.

games.name: The Lightkeeper is Gone
games.description: A retro-styled horror adventure set in the 1930's on a lone island. Take on the job of keeping the lighthouse while discovering the story of those that came before.

games.name: Near the Sun: Chapter 1
games.description: God's punishment burns the earth to ashes, and eventually consumes the underground world as well. A stylish 2D stealth action game where how you explore determines your fate. A boy carries his sister on his back and races through the underground world.

games.name: Top Check
games.description: Collect cards, build decks, and battle fierce opponents in Top Check, a roguelike deckbuilder and online collectable card game inspired by the classic game of chess. With many unique pieces and abilities, only the best strategists will emerge victorious. Do you have what it takes to reach the top?

games.name: Tower Deckfense
games.description: Tower Deckfense is an exciting blend of tower defense and deck building. Build your deck strategically, upgrade your towers, and equip them with powerful modifiers to discover the best combinations and devastate your enemies.

games.name: Nightborn
games.description:
Nightborn is an Action RPG with narrative-focused gameplay set in a dark gothic version of our own world.
Players assume the role of the Bloodhound, a Vampire detective trained in tracking supernatural threats to the Nightborn, using arcane rituals forbidden to others of your kind.
Investigate a series of disappearances of your fellow Vampires, including your Maker, a politically influential member of the Nightborn, the Vampire elite of New Orleans.

Create your own Bloodhound character, choosing from 10 iconic Vampire lineages with a set of signature lineage power skill trees.

Lineage powers include physical prowess enhancements, shapeshifting, controlling the minds of mortals, and acts of eldritch sorcery.

Fuel Vampire powers by preying upon mortals via stealth, seduction, or brute force.

Elude Mortal Law Enforcement and Monster Hunters, masking your dark nature.

Solve the mysteries of gothic New Orleans by taking quests, discovering clues, and exploring the supernatural underworld.

Battle, evade, or outwit, natural and supernatural foes, using your powers, weapons, and tactics.

Side with a Nightborn faction, the ruling Establishment, the reckless Libertines, or the fanatical Orthodoxy; or eschew them all to forge your own path.

games.name: Super Debt
games.description: Fight against time in Super Debt, the intense and challenging twin-stick bullet-hell dungeon-crawler where everything is tied into one resource... money.

games.name: Voidface
games.description: Face off in a challenging bullet-hell arena shooter to try and clear bite-sized boss rush challenges. Learn to dodge their attacks, cast spells to gain an upper hand, and kill everything that gets in your way.

games.name: Deepspace Emporium
games.description: Deepspace Emporium is a gritty shopkeeping sim set in the depths of a sprawling space station. As a former scavenger turned merchant, you trade in goods of varying legality—all while facing rising rent. Navigate a divided society, balance faction demands, and dodge authorities as you try to survive.

games.name: The Barkeeper
games.description: A stylized top-down 3D bartender simulator. Your task is to quickly make cocktails & drinks according to recipes in a given time. Success depends on tactics, space planning and your adaptation speed. Ready for the challenge? Then grab your shaker and shake!

games.name: RockBeasts
games.description:
Lead a band of misfits on a roller-coaster ride to stardom in the age of MTV, rock anthems, and bad haircuts. ROCKBEASTS is a story-driven, role-playing management game that puts you in the shoes of a manager of an up-and-coming rock band.

Rock ‘n’ Roll Band Manager: This band has real potential, but they need your help to live up to it. Their tunes can revolutionize the music industry and redefine genres - but what good is a great song if no one hears it? It’s your job to land your clients a record deal and negotiate the terms on their behalf. Will you help them fight for their creative freedom, or sell them out to the industry bigwigs?

Coffee and Cigarettes for Breakfast: Sex, drugs, and rock ’n’ roll can only get you so far. Somebody has to make sure the band is in shape to play the next gig. This is where you come in. Make sure they eat a half-decent meal every now and again, fix their gear, get them to rehearse… Hope you like herding cats!

Don’t Stop Me Now: It’s your job to book the venue, finalize the setlist and ensure the gig goes according to the plan. Each successful performance is a step toward fame and glory. Sure, that “club” was just a grimy basement, and the audience barely outnumbered the band - but even rock legends have to start somewhere, right?

games.name: Trackastrophe!
games.description: Trackastrophe! is a puzzle game where you guide an eccentric train through wacky worlds. Add tiles to the map layout, expand your train by collecting train cars, and pray you can get to the other side in one piece!

games.name: Poem Ex Machina
games.description: Anime style, Ride X Fight, fast paced game.

games.name: Cryptage
games.description: A real-time action roguelite, you are a wizard venturing into a crypt full of monsters and buying new staffs and skins to improve yourself! The game has endless mode.

games.name: Mortal Quest
games.description: A survival-adventure game about a mortal who's been transferred to a demon-infested island.

games.name: Edge of Memories
games.description: The Corrosion, a plague of unparalleled proportions, has already ravaged the Astryan continent. On the other side of the world, the continent of Avaris and its nomadic peoples—so far spared from the horrors spawned by this abomination—now stand on the brink of extinction. Eline, an itinerant Soul Whisperer, relentlessly battles the force that turns the once-thriving fauna, flora and humans of this lush land into grotesque abominations. Following a mysterious encounter, a dark power awakens within her, one that may hold the key to ending this apocalypse: the ability to control the Corrosion within her own body.

games.name: With Dream
games.description: This is a story about two doctors who travel back in time to fulfill the last wish of a dying old man.

games.name: Inkwellers
games.description: Online 2 player co-op puzzle adventure game, you and your friend become the Inkwellers! Dwellers of stories who venture into journals to uncover their true meaning. With your friend, you'll explore hidden worlds, solve tricky puzzles, and uncover secrets.

games.name: Fungiman 2
games.description: Just another adventure with your friendly neighborhood fungus — nothing to worry about… probably?

games.name: The Final Fragment
games.description: A coming-of-age visual novel with GxG romance elements set in a Ukrainian arts academy. Nina tries to keep the trouble at bay. But when a mysterious incident occurs at the academy, will she muster the courage to confront the things she's been running away from?

games.name: Missi
games.description: Missi is a cozy point & click game in a watercolor hand-drawn world. Find hidden objects and solve puzzles using clues in sketches of past adventures. Try to trick the Mushroom Spider and the Crow King by collecting all medicinal herbs for the sick little mouse.

games.name: Where Noble Plans Lie
games.description: Build-up your territory, your team of advisors, and your reputation as you bring every other noble to ruin at the behest of the Vampire Queen. Make the kingdom yours in the city-builder and turn-based RPG: Where Noble Plans Lie!

games.name: Bless You Again
games.description: Lily” is a magician and a homunculus. She challenges a dungeon named “Tomb of Blessings” in search of a certain blessing! The player controls a character faithfully reproduced from the cel animation and defeats many monsters in search of a powerful blessing.

games.name: Off-Score: A Game of Songs
games.description: A surreal game that tells the stories of 3 songs. Play the music until the end by solving the puzzles and secrets along the way.

games.name: Clawsome
games.description: Control a claw in a chaotic world where grabbing prizes is harder than it looks! Avoid moving platforms, disappearing objects, and unexpected twists while building your own diorama with the trophies you collect.

games.name: Fate's Masquerade: Otome Visual Novel
games.description: Uncover the mystery of your fallen noble lineage and navigate an imperial court brimming with secrets and lies. In this manhwa-inspired dark fantasy romance, love is a weapon and trust is fatal. Beautiful animation. Brutal consequences. Will you hunt the monsters, or will you become one yourself?

games.name: No Need for Flowers
games.description: Dodge through colorful bullet patterns as you shoot down hoards of enemies in this arcade-style scrolling shooter bullet hell about magic dragon girls! Uncover a tragic story about acceptance as you overcome intense challenges that test both your skills and memory.

games.name: Gig Crawler
games.description: GigCrawler is a co-op roguelite where Freelancers swap abilities, prepare builds, and tackle procedurally generated, biome-coded dungeons. Adapt, grind, and survive the gig chaos!

games.name: Hordes of Fate: A Hand of Fate Adventure
games.description: Return to the world of Hand of Fate! Deckbuilding meets auto-shooter in this new title from the original creative team. Draw your cards and carve your way through hordes of lethal monsters. Unlock new heroes, upgrades and encounters, and stack your hand against the Dealer’s fiendish challenge decks.

games.name: Lacey's Flash Games
games.description: These are the REAL girls’ games. In the mid 2000s, Charlie (Charchar887), discovers the Laceys's Flash Games and their disturbing secrets. Step into the virtual world to uncover the whereabouts of the missing website creator, Rocio Yani, and explore all the games and activities with Lacey!

games.name: Polytropos: A Tactical Odyssey
games.description: Polytropos: A Tactical Odyssey is a roguelite turn-based strategy RPG. Wield magic and might against legendary foes from Greek mythology. Recruit a synergistic army and cultivate your hero to win Immortal Glory!

games.name: Rootbound
games.description: A physics-based action adventure about a plantling’s quest to save its home from a mysterious blight. Equipped with your sentient backpack, you venture into a broken world. Meet lost souls, solve ancient puzzles, fight dangerous monsters, and uncover the secrets of a long-forgotten civilization.

games.name: 100 Cats Philippines
games.description: Find 100 Cats hidden in Philippines! Can you find them all?

games.name: Dr.Mememe want to sleep
games.description: The genius Hakase “Mememe”, who wants to sleep all the time, invented “Kawaii Sheep”, which induces sleep with its mysterious healing properties. This is an exponentially kawaii sheep-carrying game in which Hakase puts the whole world to sleep.

games.name: Appulse
games.description: Discover pinball like never before with Appulse! The game is a roguelite shooter, where you protect a Galactic Federation ship! Upgrade your ball, your weapons and your ship to pushback waves of unwavering robots.

games.name: Metal Coffin
games.description: War has been raging for decades with no signs of it stopping. Take your chance in bringing an end to it in this high focus strategy game. Manage your troops, your supplies and protect your flagship at all costs and you might just be able make it to the capital of the nation.

games.name: Animas
games.description: Animas is a first-person psychological horror experience that plunges you into the dark secrets of the Blanco family. Explore a cursed house in the Venezuelan mountains, where time unravels to reveal decades of sectarian rituals and familial tragedies.

games.name: Ice on the Edge
games.description: ICE on the EDGE is a figure skating simulation game where you train athletes and lead them to victory. Plan training, master techniques, and refine routines for competitions. Face fierce rivals, push the limits, and carve your legacy on the ice. Guide your skater to the ultimate stage—On the Edge.

games.name: Town of Zoz
games.description: Fight with flavor! As Ito, a young shaman chef adventurer, you'll hunt critters, gather magical ingredients and rebuild bonds by cooking for the townspeople. A shaman chef always aims to lend a helping hand, but the more Ito gets involved, the more he'll learn about the town and its ancient secrets.

games.name: Recital of the Heart
games.description: An adventure game with a focus on story and exploration. Experiment with wide range of weapons, abilities, and modifications as you delve deep into a world pure imagination. Solve conflict and mysteries with your partner Kand by your side. Heed his wise words, or throw caution (and him) to the wind!

games.name: Absym
games.description: Absym is a unique rogue-souls-like that challenges you to survive between two dimensions: the decaying Nihilor and the corrupted Absymalith. Fight, explore, and use Rift Dancing to shift between worlds in real time. Every choice draws you closer to redemption... or corruption.

games.name: Moonbrella
games.description: A 2D Metroidvania with deep movement and no jump button. Upgrade your umbrella to explore an abandoned planet and ascend to the moon.

games.name: Phase Zero
games.description: A grotesque illness binds the town of Flint Peak. Two survivors try to escape with their lives as mysterious creatures roam the streets. Face horrific monsters, solve puzzles and escape the town in this classic survival horror. Can you make it till dawn?

games.name: Wanted 3D: Dead or Alive
games.description: Grab your bandolier and saddle up for Wanted 3D, a GZDoom-powered Spaghetti Western FPS! It's time to settle the score with your former gang and reclaim what is rightfully yours. Are you ready for the wildest showdown the Wild West has to offer?

games.name: Crimson Frontier
games.description: Crimson Frontier is a top-down shooter with RPG elements set in a cyberpunk universe. Battle powerful megacorporations, upgrade your character with augmentations, and uncover the truth in a dystopian world.

games.name: Hero's Hand
games.description: Embark on the ultimate Poker-Based Roguelike RPG Adventure! Hero’s Hand packs a strategic punch! Become the Knight of Spades & save the land of Cardunia! The game features hand drawn animation, humorous fantasy monsters, & addictive turn-based poker combat that keeps you coming back for more!

games.name: Raev: Kingdom on the Distant Shores
games.description: Build an empire, founding its villages and cities. Every kingdom started with a single bonfire, and RAEV allows you to create your own thriving civilization across a sprawling continent. Craft interwoven cityscapes, inspire your people, and build a kingdom to forge your path to greatness.

games.name: High Above
games.description: High Above is a small rooftop-building game about finding peace in the skies. Design and grow your perfect rooftop retreat, from vibrant Cuban courtyards to modern urban hideaways. Watch the world come to life around you, at your own pace, in your own little oasis.

games.name: Dark Mass
games.description: Dark Mass is a fully underwater horror game. Explore the ruins of a sunken manor and flee from a curse trapped within for centuries. Your choices will decide if you escape or join the lost souls of the abyss.

games.name: Super Adventure
games.description: SUPER ADVENTURE is a Shmup turned 2D-Platformer with great emphasis on bullet dodging, expressive boss fights and a wacky story.

games.name: Memory Adventures in the Jungle
games.description: Affordable price ! A hommage to the oldschool games, but delivered with a modern and cute look. If you are a fan of 1980's or 1990's, or just searching for an interesting game to play - here is your place !

games.name: Melted Time
games.description: Candle, your path is full of puzzles. Can you handle it? Hurry, your time is already melting away.

games.name: Uppercute
games.description: Uppercute is a 3D action platformer where, with the help of your sister and the use of your runner skills, you’ll dive into people's minds, face challenging opponents and retrieve valuable information to solve the mystery of your brother's disappearance.

games.name: Speak of my sin
games.description: Speak of My Sin is a word reasoning game - players are supposed to find the truth of the cases, restore the story in a number of interrelated cases and finally detect the identification of “me”, speaking out “my” sin.

games.name: Striker!
games.description: Striker! is a retro-inspired football-golf game set across 40+ levels. Control your team of Strikers and shoot your ball over a wide range of different courses and mechanics.

games.name: Fatal Dopamine
games.description: Play as a nameless gambler who arrives at a mysterious gambling table, constantly challenging different opponents. At this table, the stakes are not money but life itself.

games.name: Cereal Reaper
games.description: Cereal Reaper is a top-down turn-based RPG with a heavy focus on exploration. Talk and fight your way into finding the greatest breakfast item of all time.

games.name: Soviet Spooky Tales: Green Eyes
games.description: Have you ever heard of the damn Green Record? Or maybe the Black Sheet is trying to kill you at night? Have you ever seen a Blue Nail in a pie? The visual novel "Soviet Spooky Tales: Green Eyes" is the first of five planned games in the entourage of Soviet children's horror stories, where everything happens for real. The story tells about a girl named Dasha from 4th grade, who disobeyed her mother and listened to a green record. Together with her, you will face a mysterious and terrible evil, and only you can decide what awaits her in the end ^___^

games.name: Immortal Boy
games.description: A 2.5D turn-based RPG where you dodge through enemy turns - and emotional abuse.

games.name: Bloodletter
games.description: Bloodletter is a medieval deck builder all about using your cards to heal bizarre villagers. Protect their bodies and minds from the torment of mysterious entities by customising your unique deck and enhancing your dubious healing methods.

games.name: Hydraulic Slam
games.description: In this turn-based, tactical tennis simulation you build, control and improve your own tennis robot. Play on grass, clay and hard courts and balance your energy, precision and condition throughout the match. Maintain and develop your robot between matches.

games.name: Digital Legacy of Zero
games.description: Battle with creatures you collect to defeat the evil Ruler of the Digital World. Hack and slash through enemy basements, upgrade your own to achieve ultimate evolutions, and summon legendary beasts using your team. Unlock powerful upgrades with devastating combos to conquer the Digital World.

games.name: Abject Abyss
games.description: Abject Abyss is a first person horror adventure on a distant world. Explore Luminary Corporation’s most advanced research facility while piecing together what went wrong, and avoiding the horrors that lurk in the dark.

games.name: Galago
games.description: As night falls, a galago — also known as a bush baby — ventures into suburbia, searching for elusive golden fireflies. But the world is perilous for one so small… Galago is an exploration-platformer, blending puzzle-solving, survival, and mystery.

games.name: Starseeker: Astroneer Expeditions
games.description: STARSEEKER is a new game set within the Astroneer universe with a focus on discovery, cooperative expeditions, and camaraderie. Exploring deep space on the ESS Starseeker, players will need to work together with the entire crew of the space station to complete planet- wide objectives across a multitude of star systems using cutting edge technology.

games.name: America Against Ants
games.description: The year, 1951, the place, Nevada, USA. Take command of Task Force Sable and battle through 30 increasingly challenging missions to defeat giant, mutant ants as they swarm from atomic test sites in the desert. AAA features a unique, narrative driven blend of tower defence and real time tactics.

games.name: Skateboard Knight
games.description: Hop on a skateboard and casually save the world! Simple controls—just move up or down the lanes. Horizontal movement and attacks are all auto!

games.name: Terror Type: A.L.C.H.E.M.Y.
games.description: Terror Type: A.L.C.H.E.M.Y. is a stealth-action immersive sim about resistance, redemption, and the explosive power of chemistry. As a skilled alchemist turned freedom fighter, you’ll craft potions for the resistance, engineer devastating bombs, and dismantle tyranny from the shadows.

games.name: Drownlight
games.description: Drownlight is a city-building survival simulator set in a flooded world. Build and expand your city around a lighthouse, manage resources, and make moral decisions that shape the fate of the survivors. Secrets lurk in the raging waters, and if the lighthouse goes out, the city may be lost forever.

games.name: Groda
games.description: GRODA is an intense arcade experience, blending nerve-wracking action with precision platforming and rogue elements. Fight, loot, explore!

games.name: Spot Zero
games.description: Gacha ARPG developed by Tarta Games.

games.name: Okko the Exiled
games.description: Okko The Exiled is an action-packed adventure, where you stomp, launch, and bash your way through Kutala, a land of demons, on a quest to defeat the demon lord Yalda and link Okko’s isolated world with the heavens.

games.name: Drug Schedule
games.description: Build your empire! Cook and make illegal drugs, expand your cartel, and outsmart rivals and law enforcement. Play solo or team up in co-op to dominate the underworld! Your empire, your rules. Rise to power! Don't get high on your own dope!

games.name: Neverway
games.description: After quitting her dead-end job, Fiona starts over on a farm and becomes the immortal herald of a dead god. Make friends, fight through horrors and pay your debt in this nightmarish life sim RPG.

games.name: SpeedRunners 2: King of Speed
games.description: The ultimate competitive platformer is back! Outrun, outjump, and outsmart your rivals in cutthroat online/local races, now up to 8 players. Master the movement, learn meticulously designed maps, use powerful pick-ups, swing around with a grappling hook, and don't get knocked off-screen!

games.name: Ikuma: The Frozen Compass
games.description: Embark on a haunting journey into the cold in this narrative adventure - either alone or with a friend. IKUMA tells the story of Sam, a teenage boy who finds himself stranded in the Arctic with his dog. He must face not only its harsh environment, but also something lurking deeper in the shadows.

games.name: Flooded Burials
games.description: Flooded Burials is a top-down action adventure game about exploring a tower buried in the sea. Play trough stages where you have to face combat and platforming challenges, as well as meet and talk to strange creatures.

games.name: Rain98
games.description: Tokyo, 1998. A rain that never ends and a girl who wants everything to end. Two lonely youths will change the world with their choices.

games.name: Insectile
games.description: Find bugs, catch bugs, and piece bugs together! Explore a huge, whimsical world as a little mushroom in this clever, turn-based RPG about puzzlingly-shaped insects!

games.name: Dyping Escape
games.description: Escape from a dying-typing game where the words you type become reality and turn against you.

games.name: Beak Island Visitor Center
games.description: Congrats! You're now in charge of Beak Island's visitor center. This old gem's a bit rusty, and help's scarce, but don't let that stop you! Spruce up the island, cook up some treats, and bring back the buzz from 50 years ago. It's all in your hands now!

games.name: The Greenening
games.description: The Greenening is a short and wholesome incremental journey about exploring and reawakening a forgotten world. Wash away the ashes to discover the secrets hidden beneath, upgrade your versatile watering abilities, and grow your own cozy space garden.

games.name: Do Not Play
games.description: "DO NOT PLAY" " is a point-and-click horror adventure. Even if you reach the "truth" that lies beyond playing, we take no responsibility for any phenomena that occurs there. Please handle with extreme caution.

games.name: Star Wars Zero Company
games.description: Command an elite squad through a gritty and authentic story in Star Wars Zero Company, a single-player turn-based tactics game.

games.name: Dreadmoor
games.description: DREADMOOR is a Lovecraftian fishing adventure set in a post-nuclear apocalypse world. Sell your yield, upgrade your boat, build equipment and battle monsters lurking in water and on land. Explore forgotten lands and discover ancient secrets.

games.name: Dicewood
games.description:
Dicewood is a fantasy horror turn-based roguelike deck-builder where adorable forest animals band together to escape the relentless hunter.

Fleeing into a dark, twisted forest filled with ancient horrors, creepy monsters, and cannibal tribes, player must strategically combine different animals, overcome nightmarish foes, and make their way to the river to start a new life.

games.name: Switcheroo
games.description: A kangaroo named Jade escapes from an evil mad scientist! Along the way, she'll hop, jump, kick, and use her new color-switching powers to alter the machinery and contraptions found throughout the lab. Each component behaves differently based on the current active color: red, blue, green, or yellow!

games.name: Hyperfight 2
games.description: The next evolution of HYPERFIGHT! The fast-paced, no-block fighter returns with fresh knockout mechanics and a colorful cast of new and returning characters.

games.name: Slain 2: The Beast Within
games.description: A brutal gothic hack-and-slash where steel and savagery collide. As Prince Akran, wield the sentient blade Bathoryn, embrace your werewolf fury, and battle through a dying world. The time for hesitation is over. The quest begins now. Akran’s fate - and the fate of the kingdom - rests in your hands.

games.name: Tales of Tuscany
games.description: Tuscany has been obliterated by Thunder Goober for his own entertainment! Play as Lambypoo and adventure through the broken land of Tuscany, either making friends and having them join your team or defeating enemies for their EXP in your efforts to save your cousins and reunite Tuscany.

games.name: Cozy Beach
games.description: ️Cozy Beach is a wholesome game set on an enchanting tropical beach where you can fish and explore, solo or with friends. Catch and collect fish, search for treasure, craft tropical drinks, or just hang out and chill!

games.name: Potion in Motion
games.description: Brew potions, cast spells, and master alchemy in a fast-paced potion shop where magic and language intertwine. Experiment with weird ingredients, and manage quirky customers while avoiding failures! Every potion is a puzzle, but will you perfect your craft or turn your shop into a disaster zone?

games.name: Sugar Sling Showdown
games.description: Sugar Sling Showdown is a candy-slinging 1-6 players open-world adventure game where you brawl and compete with each other in Crackarena, while protecting and building a sweet society together in ToffeeTown. Your tongue is your ultimate weapon in this chaotic sugary mayhem.

games.name: Questing
games.description: An oddball, subversive fantasy adventure game inspired by 16-bit classics like Chrono Trigger and A Link to the Past

games.name: Catena
games.description: Catena is a deck-building roguelite where the freedom to customize your allies feels as powerful as programming. Dive into strategic, grid-based battles and create tactics uniquely your own to conquer the mysterious island and defeat the formidable enemies that await.

games.name: In Falsus
games.description:
"In Falsus" ties music gameplay to a tale of lies and truth, told through the eyes of 5 girls in a modern world both familiar and not.

An atmospheric soundscape awaits across 70+ songs—including more than 40 originals—arriving on release and produced by composers at the forefront of Japan's independent music scene.

games.name: The Shadow Syndicate
games.description: The Shadow Syndicate is a stylized noir stealth-action game set in 1930s Brooklyn. Sneak, fight, and uncover a dark conspiracy using supernatural powers. Explore a vibrant city, play mini-games, and solve mysteries in this thrilling cinematic experience.

games.name: Shell Bless the Faithless
games.description: Shell Bless the Faithless is a 3rd Person Roguelite Shooter supporting 1~4 players where you take on the role of a Norse warrior. In a chaotic world where runes, magic, and shotguns coexist, evolve with the blessings of the gods, crush heretical foes and their leaders, and rebuild a macho world!

games.name: Dodo Duckie
games.description: Aliens abducted your chicken friends! Play as Dodo, a brave but slightly clueless duck on a mission to bring them home. The twist? Swap between 2D and 3D perspectives INSTANTLY to solve platforming puzzles and explore a cozy, charming world full of surprises.. like a capybara that sells caps.

games.name: Deus Mantle
games.description: Craft, build, fight monsters, discover new technologies and explore an infinite procedurally generated world! Delve into unknown worlds to uncover ancient secrets and return home.

games.name: The Bunker Notes
games.description: "The Bunker Notes" is a visual novel about a concrete trap where the past whispers through the cracks of rusted doors. In this world, survival is everything; meeting another person might be your last mistake.

games.name: Plush Party
games.description: Get ready to challenge family and friends in PLUSH PARTY, the ultimate party game for all ages! Customize your cat, escape the claw, and be the last plushie standing!

games.name: Exovia
games.description: Exovia is a relaxing physics-based asteroid mining and logistics sim. Move minerals, automate production, and explore deeper into the unknown. What begins as a cold, chaotic rock becomes a thriving machine under your command.

games.name: Broken Relic
games.description: First day on the job. You broke a seal, unleashed a dark power, and may have doomed everyone. Now there’s only one thing to do: pretend you know what you’re doing!

games.name: Cappy & Tappy: Temples of Peril
games.description: Cappy & Tappy is a block-stacking platforming adventure! Help the famous adventuring duo Cappy and Tappy escape the crumbling Temples of Peril! Cappy will leap, bound, and climb to escape the temple, while Tappy stacks blocks to aid in the escape.

games.name: World of Dogs
games.description: WORLD OF DOGS is a high-velocity immersive sim where speed isn’t balanced—it’s weaponized. You are the first fully grafted human, stitched together from dead champions, dumped into a collapsing city where every faction is fighting for a future that hates you.

games.name: L8r Sk8r
games.description: L8R SK8R is a 3D platformer inspired by the classics of the fifth generation but with a unique twist that will make you feel like a speedrunner.

games.name: Monolith's Dreamers
games.description: A captivating 2D puzzle game where strategic thinking is essential. Explore the world of the Monoliths, outwit the traps guarding the ruins, and help the inhabitants. Solve puzzles that block your progress by collecting and redistributing energy.

games.name: Vikings Dynasty
games.description: Embrace viking life and earn Valhalla’s blessing. Survive in the harsh norse environments and praise the Gods. Become a Jarl, control every aspect of your village and protect your community at all costs. Build and customize ships and explore the fjords in the unforgiving world of Vikings Dynasty.

games.name: My Heaven's Dale
games.description: A cozy ranch simulator game where you can travel to the moon.

games.name: Mycelium: The Silent Contract
games.description: You arrive. You gather. You extract. Join an endless cycle of hunting for Mycelium in a haunted procedurally generated forest. Work alone or with up to 4 contractors, solve the mysteries, and avoid dangers. And most importantly - don't get lost!

games.name: Kugayama Shiori's Death Diary
games.description: A mystery visual novel where horror meets occult comedy. Follow Kugayama Shiori, a ghost who casually dies over and over as she searches for her cause of death and the regrets that bind her to this world. Her investigation will eventually lead to a single incident—and the truth behind her demise.

games.name: DreadOut 3
games.description: DreadOut 3 is a third-person horror adventure inspired by Asian - Indonesian urban legend. Follow Linda’s journey as Keepers of the Dark into an interdimensional rabbit hole to find the source of unseen power threatening the balance of light and darkness.

games.name: Sea of Remnants
games.description: Sea of Remnants is an original ocean adventure RPG developed by Joker Studio. Your journey begins as a puppetfolk sailor who has lost their memory. Alongside a mysterious girl, you’ll set sail on a chaotic and colorful voyage—one filled with treasure, conflict, dreams, and unexpected companions. As the seas stretch endlessly before you, an epic world of myth and history slowly unfolds. But beware, Captain: fall overboard, and your mind may be swallowed by the very thing this ocean was named for—forgetting.

games.name: Rumbral
games.description: Rumbral is a dark, puzzle platformer set in a seemingly forgotten world. Find your way in this desolated place while trying to recover your memories and find out who you really are.

games.name: Transport Fever 3
games.description: Transport Fever 3, the ultimate transport tycoon returns, bigger, deeper, and more dynamic than ever. Build the routes that transform the world across land, sea, and sky using over a century of evolving transport options. Design and build your ideal transport network.

games.name: Bloodstone Rising
games.description: Bloodstone Rising is a high-intensity co-op FPS roguelike where space dwarves battle waves of relentless zombie hordes to reclaim their ancestral kingdom. Mine resources, forge upgrades, and enhance your abilities between waves to survive the onslaught.

games.name: Escape the Baby Alarm
games.description: Escape the Baby Alarm is a cozy puzzle adventure about the chaos and love of early parenthood. Solve hand-drawn, escape room-inspired puzzles inside the baby alarm. Find your way out through mashed peas, pacifiers and sleepless nights. Funny, heartfelt, and beautifully illustrated

games.name: Warhammer 40,000: Boltgun 2
games.description: Obliterate heretics in the name of the Emperor in Warhammer 40,000: Boltgun 2! Play as Ultramarine Malum Caedo or Sister of Battle Nyra Veyrath in this sequel to retro FPS Warhammer 40,000: Boltgun with MORE enemies, MORE weapons, and NEW ways to purge!

games.name: Tezzel: The Tilemaker's Tale
games.description: Tezzel is a cozy, colorful, and crafty puzzle game where every move helps make a masterpiece. Discover mind-bending mechanics across 100+ handcrafted levels.

games.name: Black Zen White
games.description: Black Zen White is a puzzle platformer where the world flips every 10 seconds between two versions: black and white. Think, time your moves, bend time, and interact with strange creatures in this contemplative, hand-drawn journey inspired by East Asian ink paintings.

games.name: Tarvos Desolation
games.description: Survive on a hostile moon full of nightmares! Face hordes of monsters, explore mysterious locations, and uncover secrets that may save your life. Will you find a way to escape, or will you be consumed by the darkness of Tarvos?

games.name: Sub Optimal Co.
games.description: It's simple. Maneuver your submarine to collect the target and return back to base while not scratching the cave-walls. Invite your friends to take control. Navigate carefully and consider every move while exploring unique cave systems in this slow pace, athmospheric, multiplayer diving experience.

games.name: Chico's Rebound
games.description: A mysterious tower full of challenges has appeared. Launch Chico's walnut up at the blocks to break them all! Dash, dive, and tail-whip, while deploying an arsenal of creative power-ups. In between stages explore the Celestial Tower to solve puzzles, earn rewards, and uncover its secrets!

games.name: Drakefall
games.description: Explore the World of Drakefall in this roguelike deckbuilder. Build your deck, discover powerful items, and journey through swamps and mountain peaks with a familiar playstyle.

games.name: Alfons World
games.description: Collect magical creatures called "Papas" in a vast world, have them engage in battles, build structures, farm, and produce industrial goods. This is a brand new open-world survival crafting game.

games.name: Blade Blitz
games.description: Blade Blitz is a casual, yet competitive, local multiplayer game to play with your friends. Simply spin, slice, and poke your way through the opponents in a tug-of-war push to score the points for your team. Power ups provide tense matches, evening the odds as each team closes in on victory.

games.name: Diner Simulator
games.description: Run your own cozy diner solo or with friends! Cook, serve, clean, and manage the chaos in this fast-paced restaurant sim. Expand your café, customize your menu, and turn kitchen mayhem into delicious fun — or total disaster!

games.name: Iris Odyssey
games.description: Iris Odyssey is a text-based adventure game. In the heart of Shibuya, an orphaned girl searching for her family and a magical crime investigator are brought together by fate. Their journey will challenge them and spark a battle against unimaginable forces. A modern fantasy adventure begins.

games.name: Exo Helljumper: Descent X
games.description: Enter the chaotic world of Exo Helljumper: Descent X, filled with mutated foes and lurking dangers. Combine items and strategy to conquer relentless levels. Face unique foes and formidable bosses, test your cunning and skills, and feel the thrill of battle as you push beyond your limits!

games.name: VoidWalker: Call of Insomnia
games.description: Immerse yourself in the world of dreams and discover its secrets, enjoying every moment thanks to photorealistic graphics

games.name: Whiskers and Wizardry
games.description: Step into the magical paws of an overconfident wizard cat in this action-packed roguelite! Craft unique spells, battle hordes of minions and powerful bosses, cleanse the forest of evil, and rescue your Human Wizard Owner. From the creators of Margoq's Lair, a studio focused on roguelite games.

games.name: Project Horizon
games.description: Project Horizon is a 1-4 player co-op first-person spaceship simulator where the entire crew needs to work together to carefully maintain the nuclear reactor, take up arms against enemy ships, and repair every leak and faulty electrical panel to survive.

games.name: Sekira
games.description: Dark forces are penetrating our world! Help the humble priestess Anachel crush the heads of the Dark Lord and all his minions!

games.name: Space Grunts: Chrono Shard
games.description: You have an X amount of turns before all hell breaks loose. Gain experience and new items to find ways to prolong the inevitable while you complete missions on board of space ships, moon bases and other mysterious areas in space. One step at a time in this fast paced but turn based roguelike.

games.name: Grav My Balls
games.description: Grav your balls and let them fly! You are trapped and must use escape with the help of the strange tech built into your hands. Launch your balls to change gravity on objects blocking your path. Use your mind and your new powers to solve gravity and mind bending puzzles.

games.name: Shrine Protectors
games.description: A casual arrow shooter meets rogue-lite strategy. Lead your army, crush waves of enemies, and unlock powerful upgrades and passive spells. Combine precision shooting with tactical army management in this relentless bullet hell.

games.name: CallMara
games.description: CallMara is a psychological thriller with elements of horror, set in a gloomy medieval village. The protagonist, waking up in the forest, discovers a devastated village and explores its secrets, gradually realizing that he has become the cause of the evil that has engulfed his village.

games.name: Ward Off Evil
games.description: Ward Off Evil is an open world strategy RPG set in an apocalyptic sword & sorcery world. Create your character, rally an army, and roam the wastes as you battle to avert, or bring about, the end of the Cycle.

games.name: Star Squadron
games.description: Star Squadron is a next-generation space combat simulator delivering unmatched immersion. With seamless transitions, an interactive narrative, and revolutionary voice synthesis that personalizes dialogue to your actions, your choices, and your name, every journey will feel uniquely yours.

games.name: No Such Place
games.description: A top-down extraction shooter. You are dispatched to a Dimensional Fragment to conduct reconnaissance missions. Survive in an environment full of unknown threats, gather supplies and clues, and find the evacuation point. Through the collected information, bring back the truth to this world...

games.name: Shuffle Farm
games.description: A roguelike deckbuilder where farming meets the arcane. Build powerful synergies, master production chains, explore uncharted lands, and face formidable challenges - all with the help of a mysterious god. Or just chill and plant some crops... you can do that too!

games.name: HellSlave II: Judgment of the Archon
games.description: The Heavens are done waiting. In this dark fantasy dungeon crawler RPG, the Archon descends to end the demon war once and for all. Make your stand in HellSlave II, more immersive, brutal, and customizable than ever. The reckoning begins now.

games.name: Sydless
games.description: Sydless is a Fast FPS where your only weapon is a deadly bouncing ball. The more you punch it, the faster it gets—becoming a high speed projectile of destruction. You play as Diego, a ‘90s fast-food worker trapped in an anomaly, each door dragging you deeper into warped versions of the restaurant.

games.name: The Funskin Project
games.description: A horrifying experience in a strange and timeless universe. Explore, solve puzzles, fight for your survival and try to escape this nightmare.

games.name: Ping Profit: Internet Tycoon
games.description: Launch your hosting company straight from your parent's basement! Buy servers, solve problems, and grow your profits as you climb from startup to tech titan. Keep customers online, boost your reputation, and build the ultimate hosting empire in Ping Profit!

games.name: Bite the Crown
games.description: In a world ruled by sugary tyrants, an unlikely hero rises from the shadows: Pom the Mold. Build your secret guild, gather rogue treats, lead the rebellion and battle through candy-coated chaos to topple the Candy Kingdom. The Sweet Revolution begins—bite back!

games.name: Souls End
games.description: Souls End is an auto-battler roguelike where you'll draft unstoppable armies, placing units and items in just the right way to create awesome synergies! Cast spells while battles unfold and find relics to further elevate builds. Will you defeat life itself-or will you meet a Souls End?

games.name: Misty Garden
games.description: Create a peaceful garden. Build a soothing retreat and help the wandering creatures unwind from chaotic lives. Misty Garden is a calm and relaxing base building providing laid-back experience interacting with the creatures living in the Misty forest.

games.name: Gloctopus
games.description: It's you, and 8 glocs, up against the whole ocean - are you up to the task? Gloctopus is a fast paced 2D Roguelike shooter about a gun-wielding octopus on a mission to stop a nuclear warhead from destroying the world.

games.name: Herb Seek Slash
games.description: Herbs Seek Slash is a 2D top-down scrolling shoot'em up game with fantasy background. An ordinary swordsman, Ethan, sets out to find an ordinary herb to save his sister, Elaine, on an extraordinary and perilous journey.

games.name: Hobby Horse
games.description: Create your own hobby horse and hit the obstacle courses! Slay every ride, win trophies, improve and become the best hobby horse rider!

games.name: Tavern Talk Stories: Dreamwalker
games.description: Welcome Tavernkeep! In this D&D-inspired visual novel you will run a cozy seaside tavern, meet adventurers, gather rumours and mix fate-altering drinks to stop dreams from twisting into nightmares.

games.name: Infinite Alliance
games.description: Heroes and villains from 13+ Indie JRPGs collide, in this story rich Crossover Event! Chained Echoes, Jack Move, 8-Bit Adventures 2, Beloved Rapture, Quartet, and more unite for a totally FREE adventure!

games.name: Grinville
games.description: An abandoned park, a forgotten tragedy, and something that should never have been awakened. Years ago, a charming parade turned into a massacre when the animatronics, created to entertain, brutally attacked the audience. Now, you return to this cursed place to uncover the truth. But beware... they are still here, waiting.

games.name: Rune Dice
games.description: Throw dice, create explosive chain reactions, and defeat waves of enemies in Rune Dice! Collect ancient runes with diverse abilities, add synergies between relics, heroes, and special dice. All combined, this will give you an excellent experience in our roguelike deckbuilder.

games.name: Puffin Parcel Post
games.description: Puffin Parcel Post is a charming roguelite strategy game where players build and manage postal networks using adorable puffin workers. The game combines base-building mechanics with logistics optimization and strategic placement of buildings. Each playthrough offers fresh challenges through unlockable perks and upgrades that change how you approach building your postal empire. Players construct delivery routes, manage resources, and watch their cute puffin team waddle and zip across the map delivering parcels.

games.name: Rock Quest: A Rhythm Adventure
games.description: Rock Quest: A Rhythm Adventure is a hybrid rhythm-action RPG where battles play out as high-stakes musical showdowns. Hit notes in time to attack, miss and take damage. Lead your rock band through a weird New Orleans teeming with danger and mystery.

games.name: Death of a Dungslinger
games.description: Abruptly reincarnated as a dung beetle, you’ll battle a colorful cast of the neighborhood’s baddest bugs as you scoot, scuttle, and shoot your way through charming 3D worlds. Ball up whatever material you can find, then sling it at your foes—or hop on and ride it around to outmaneuver them!

games.name: Compress(Space)
games.description: A mind and space-bending puzzle game where you fold space to cheat your way through puzzles. Master space manipulation and reach beyond the stars to uncover the mystery at the end of the universe.

games.name: Coalescent: Tidal Rapture
games.description: A hypnagogic 3D swimming/entanglement adventure game about harmonizing and want. Dive into a world of merpeople who are transforming and discovering casual relationships through the eyes of a floater who's just been dumped and refuses to evolve. Told in 3 chapters.

games.name: Checkmage!
games.description: A chess-based strategy game with casual deckbuilding elements. Build your deck by trading cards and battling lovable, hand-drawn characters.

games.name: Ultima Chess VR
games.description: Ultima Chess VR – chess as you've never seen before! Battle on the chessboard in virtual reality, where every piece comes to life and engages in a fantasy duel!

games.name: City Garden Harvest
games.description: City Garden Harvest is a first-person cozy farm simulator. You live in a city of the future, and your goal is to transform your cozy apartment into a lush, prosperous slice of paradise. Grow a variety of plants, produce eco-friendly products, sell them, renovate your apartment, and expand your farm!

games.name: Arcadie II: Cold Lands
games.description: You are the Monarch. Protect your rule and your kingdom. Pursue the heart of your chosen lover, manage fragile alliances, or bring the world to heel, no matter the cost, in this character-driven interactive tale. The choice, and the crown, are yours.

games.name: Vampires Die
games.description: Hired by the "Council" to take out a rogue coven, you must gather your clan and travel through the dark streets, graveyards, and crypts to battle for hierarchy against the deadliest of your own bloodline. Roll the dice in this "chill" turn-based board game, but remember, sometimes even Vampires Die!

games.name: Void Protocol
games.description: Void Protocol is a 3D ​​hardcore puzzle​​ game built on ​​Temporal Imprint​​. In an indie-crafted cyberpunk lab, freeze/rewind objects' states (position, activation, motion) to crack ​​impossible puzzles​​. Manipulate causality—every action sparks solutions or paradoxes.

games.name: Loot Profit
games.description: Merchant Simulator. It seems simple enough — buy low, sell high. But in this world, almost everyone’s out to swindle each other...

games.name: Boba Cafe Simulator
games.description: Reborn at my venture's start. Last life, poor management got my milk tea shop crushed by rivals. At the door, sweet milk scent hit me, fired me up. Now, "Frost Citadel" aims to haunt the milk tea world. With my friend, we’ll set up to rule this street.

games.name: Exit Ways
games.description: Test your luck in the extraction shooter with survival elements. Build your camp, exterminate the contaminated and evacuate the civilians.

games.name: You Sure Wanna Drink This?
games.description: Dive into a whimsical turn-based RPG where logic meets alchemy! When a mysterious force steals all potion-making knowledge, you’ll master remedies on the fly! Analyze bizarre ingredients, reverse-engineer their effects, and craft tactical potions to outsmart enemies.

games.name: Grapple Car
games.description: A car with a grappling hook! Twist and turn with tight driving controls around colorful tracks to complete challenges, customize your car, and race for a spot at the timed global online leaderboards.

games.name: Robot Rhapsody
games.description: A futurist fairytale exploring AI themes, technology, existentialism, and strange transformations in a suffering world. A retro-inspired JRPG presentation of a modernist, character-driven drama.

games.name: No Gods of Men
games.description: Rebuild a towering citadel, manage your disciples, and slash through waves of enemies in a hand-drawn world that combines roguelike metroidvania gameplay with base-building & colony management.

games.name: Emojis Battle
games.description: Emojis Battle is a Tower Defense game where you build your army of Yellow Emojis to match your strategy. Strengthen them to fight Bluemojis, who grow stronger each round, requiring you to adjust to new types of Bluemojis and battle locations. Develop strategies, enhance your army, and make history!

games.name: Tank Core
games.description: "Tank Core" is a 2D top-down shooter game infused with Roguelike elements. Players will collect various random tank components in levels, including turrets, chassis, shells, modules, and cores, to assemble unique tanks that will protect base and defeat all enemies encountered.

games.name: Followers of Krow
games.description: Possess yourself an adventurer in this roguelike autobattler! Train their bodies, teach them powerful abilities, explore the world of fantasy to find them powerful equipment, ancient runes and relics. Seek out your enemies and... whether they die is up to Krow.

games.name: Marble Run Maker
games.description: Build marble runs in a room with realistic physics. Stack random objects to make a wobbly track and watch the ball roll down! Explore puzzles with unlimited solutions and cozy vibes.

games.name: Hollow Drive
games.description: In that world, simply being alive was enough to bear the weight of sin. To prevent the depletion of energy that grants supernatural powers, those who fail to prove their "worth of existence" are eliminated. …In this desolate world, I awoke with no memories, not even knowing my own name.

games.name: Fecal Freighter
games.description: Become a sewage truck operator and survive the foul dangers: drive your ZIL, battle sludge demons, complete tasks, explore a grim world, and uncover the mystery of an alien conspiracy.

games.name: Climb It!
games.description: Take on the challenge and dive into the intense and thrilling world of free solo climbing! Test your strength and resilience as you scale dangerous routes where every misstep can cost you everything. Become a Free Solo master and conquer the summit!

games.name: Mess
games.description: MESS is a multiplayer first-person jailbreak game where strategy, deception, and survival collide in a prison environment. Experience yourself in a role of Warden to maintain order, or Prisoner to try to break free and escape the prison.

games.name: Never's End
games.description: Never's End is a turn-based tactical RPG where you return from death into the midst of a global cataclysm. Possess townsfolk to use them as living weapons, wield the forces of nature to reshape the battlefield, and lead mankind back from the brink of extinction.

games.name: Castle Cab
games.description: Castle Cab is a hilariously chaotic action sandbox game that puts you in the horseshoes of a majestic, yet slightly unhinged, steed. Hitched to your trusty cart, you’ll gallop, drift, and crash your way through a bustling medieval world where rules are more of a suggestion.

games.name: Psycho-Sleuth
games.description: Psycho-Sleuth is a psychological mystery where cognitive disorders twist the logic of murder. 13 afflicted participants — each bound by strange rules like “no lying,” “no left side,” or “no faces” — are trapped in a deadly game where the sickness spreads and truth itself becomes unreliable.

games.name: Mop'n Spark
games.description: "MOP'N SPARK" is a 2D puzzle platformer where a street cleaner and an electrician—an unlikely duo—team up to tackle challenging stages.

games.name: The Shadow Beneath
games.description: The Shadow Beneath is an action roguelike where you must fulfill an ancient prophecy and rise against the demonic forces that have taken over the world. You will battle relentless waves of enemies, master powerful abilities and reclaim what humanity lost since the Demon Lords reign began - freedom

games.name: Touhou Dream Duel
games.description: Battle your way through Gensokyo in this fan-work inspired by classic Touhou Project fighting games.

games.name: A Planet Full of Cats
games.description: A Planet Full of Cats is a hidden object adventure with metroidvania-style exploration — in true Devcats fashion. Explore diverse biomes, unlock new powers and uncover ancient secrets!

games.name: Bloodstained: The Scarlet Engagement
games.description: Unravel the dark history of the Bloodstained universe and explore a hauntingly immersive 16th-century England steeped in a 2.5D gothic atmosphere, enthralling players in strategic battles, crafting, and exploration across a sprawling, cursed land.

games.name: Coming Home
games.description: A retro slasher horror game, with a focus on home defense. In the dead of night, you hear someone lurking outside - but you are not defenseless. Watch the cameras, barricade your doors, and have your gun at the ready - anything to keep the Sundown Rippers from claiming their next victim.

games.name: Shrine of Haunts
games.description: In the summer of 1990, you return to the secluded mountain village of Iwao as your grandfather falls critically ill. The village shrine is said to seal the yokai "Tsuchigumo." As the "Mushi Okuri Festival" nears, its ritual flames may awaken a thousand-year-old curse…

games.name: HR: Human Remains
games.description: You are an ordinary office clerk in a not-so-ordinary world ruled by demons. One of them is your boss. Will you lead the company to success, or will you try to hold on to your humanity?

games.name: Shadows of Midnight: They Watch Me Sleep
games.description: The game is a narrative-driven horror experience inspired by the Silent Hill and Fears to Fathom franchises. Live through two terrifying stories: a man’s summer getaway turns into a nightmare at a shady hotel, and a child grows up knowing something watches from the forest—always waiting.

games.name: Welcome, Sharehouse!
games.description: Living in a share house with three pretty girls

games.name: Lost Ground
games.description: 3x3 grid turn-based battle and the exquisite encounter of the rogue-lite deck building! Place multiple heroes on the 3x3 grid to strategically defeat your enemies. Customize and grow your heroes with various combinations of gears, cards, and relics. Defeat the demons to reclaim lost ground!

games.name: Escape Velocity
games.description:
Blow your way out of a collapsing bomb factory!

In Escape Velocity, you play an alien ant named Gerund as they navigate the ruins of their former workplace. Using a prototype demolition tool known as the Starter, break rubble, launch objects, prime cannons, and fling yourself to safety!

games.name: Mythic Isle
games.description: "Create your mini fantasy island in the corner of your Windows desktop! Tired from work or study? Just click casually and watch adorable pets farm, mine, and build automatically for you~ From a deserted isle to a thriving paradise - all thanks to these little creatures with superpowers!"

games.name: On Donuts and Holes
games.description: A psychological adventure through a dreamy landscape. Face unanswerable questions to reach the ultimate enigmas: Who are you? Who am I?

games.name: The Demon Queen's Dire Dilemma
games.description: A cute and comedic yuri visual novel about a demon queen who just can't catch a break.

games.name: 100 Barcelona Cats
games.description: Join the cutest adventure in themed locations full of cats! Explore the charming hand-drawn artwork of special places and try to find 100 adorable cats hidden throughout the game.

games.name: 100 Lisbon Cats
games.description: Join the cutest adventure in themed locations full of cats! Explore the charming hand-drawn artwork of special places and try to find 100 adorable cats hidden throughout the game.

games.name: Software CEO
games.description: Build your own software empire from scratch. Manage projects, recruit staff, design components, and grow from a garage startup to a tech giant. Create SaaS platforms, sell software, or fulfill contracts. Balance quality, deadlines, and innovation in this relaxing yet deep business simulation game.

games.name: Deep Room
games.description: An anti escape room game where you explore the depths of a mysterious room.

games.name: Show Quiz
games.description: Show Quiz is a dynamic quiz game that tests your knowledge and reflexes! Chain together questions, climb levels and improve your rank to impress Jack Pot, your supercharged presenter.Over 5000 questions await you in this game!

games.name: Journey to the Center of the Lost Waterpark
games.description: In this first-person experience you visit a waterpark unlike any others you have seen before. Your adventure leads you through eerie and beautiful surroundings with puzzles and obstacles while you uncover the secrets of the lost waterpark.

games.name: Mortal Shell II
games.description: Their Flesh Is Your Weapon. Mortal Shell II is a standalone sequel action-RPG with adrenaline-charged, high-stakes combat. Possess warrior Shells, dethrone false gods, redeem a ravaged world.

games.name: Game of Thrones: War for Westeros
games.description: Classic real-time strategy in the world of Westeros. Conquer the Seven Kingdoms solo, or in treacherous free-for-all multiplayer. Command the Great Houses, rally iconic heroes, and rewrite the fate of the realm. Do you have the strength to seize the Iron Throne?

games.name: Blighted
games.description: Battle your way through a psychedelic western nightmare to reclaim the memories of your people in this action RPG from the creators of Guacamelee! Harness the power of the deadly, reality-altering Blight and unravel the mysteries of a twisted world.

games.name: Last Flag
games.description: Hide your flag. Find the enemy flag. Run it back, then defend for a minute to win it. Welcome to Last Flag: a fast-paced 5v5 shooter with showstopping contestants, set in a televised competition where strategy, teamwork, and chaos blend in the ultimate game of Capture the Flag.

games.name: Snap & Grab
games.description: Do crimes using only your camera and your crew! In Snap & Grab, explore a puzzle adventure world where any photo you take could be the key to cool crime success. Travel to exotic locations, photograph treasures and reveal threats, then combine your photos in unique ways to create a rad heist plan.

games.name: Mind Reader: Ghost Trip
games.description: Mind Reader: Ghost Trip is a Chinese horror mystery puzzle game. The story takes place on a remote southern island, where a former detective and current game daily reporter comes to visit, only to be caught up in the murder of a well-known game producer. As the investigation deepens......

games.name: Warbound
games.description: A Rogue-like, Tower Defense Auto-Battler. Raise the dead, battle knights and wage war with fleets of advanced futuristic Drones as you battle across the eras in this strategic combat simulator. Upgrade your base, unlock new technology, destroy the enemy before they can level up.

games.name: Machine of the Wasteland
games.description: High-octane vehicular combat action game set in a chaotic, post-apocalyptic world where survival hinges on your ability to outmaneuver and outgun your enemies.

games.name: Magic Scavenger
games.description: 《Magic Scavenger》 is a light Rogue-like spell-building looting and extraction game. To earn money, you embark on an adventure—scavenging valuable items, crafting your spells, and fending off waves of enemies before extracting with your haul. How much treasure can you escape with?

games.name: Stealer
games.description: Platformer with elements of metroidvania. Begin your adventure as a thief who is immersed in darkness. Use your lantern to explore eerie locations, search for clues, and interact with surrounding objects to uncover secrets and achieve your goals.

games.name: People of Mine
games.description: A psychological horror where you play as a former agent hunting a cult—only to uncover a disturbing truth about your identity, memories, and the monsters you thought you were fighting.

games.name: Gourmet Steak Odyssey
games.description: A resource management platformer where you play as Sweet Baby Jesus on a quest to make the perfect steak. Use your gun to propel yourself through levels and use your feet viciously to crush your foes.

games.name: 100 Candy Cats
games.description: Join the cutest adventure in themed locations full of cats! Explore the charming hand-drawn artwork of special places and try to find 100 adorable cats hidden throughout the game.

games.name: 100 Astro Cats
games.description: Join the cutest adventure in themed locations full of cats! Explore the charming hand-drawn artwork of special places and try to find 100 adorable cats hidden throughout the game.

games.name: Pawsta
games.description: Join Rigatoni the mouse on the cozy cooking adventure of a lifteime! Cook up claymation-style food from scratch. Set off on a globe-trotting adventure and serve cute animal guests!???

games.name: There Are No Ghosts at the Grand
games.description: Inherit a crumbling English hotel and restore it by day—while battling ghosts by night. With a sardonic cat, a talking power tool, and a twisting supernatural plot, this is a musical mystery unlike any other. Will you be able to hold it together while everything around you falls apart?

games.name: Shadow Sacrament: The Roots of Evil
games.description: Immerse yourself in a grim survival horror game where you investigate the secrets of an ancient monastery, solve intricate puzzles, and face terrifying nightmares that haunt its shadowy halls. Hunt the Haunt.

games.name: Teios' Journey
games.description: Embark on a thrilling adventure through a vibrant world teeming with challenges and mysteries. Traverse diverse landscapes, solve intricate puzzles, and engage in epic battles as you unravel the secrets hidden within the land.

games.name: Colorbound
games.description: In Colorbound, color is more than just hue. As Anku, an Aymara boy with a unique gift, you’ll harness the power of color to shape the environment itself, uncovering hidden paths to navigate challenging and complex puzzles.

games.name: Leap Galaxy
games.description: Leap Galaxy is a 2D platformer with a minimalistic aesthetic and gameplay that puts speed and flow first. Take advantage of momentum and master the recoil of your shots to reach insane speeds and beat each level as fast as posible!

games.name: No Straight Roads 2
games.description: Metronomik and Shueisha Games are thrilled to announce NSR2 – the explosive sequel to the hit action-music adventure NO STRAIGHT ROADS – coming to Steam in 2026.

games.name: Call of the Elder Gods
games.description: Journey to the far corners of the Earth and unearth ancient horrors in this Lovecraftian narrative puzzle adventure and sequel to 2020’s critically acclaimed Call of the Sea.

games.name: Fading Echo
games.description: Fading Echo is a fast-paced elemental action-adventure RPG where creativity drives combat. Manipulate water, trigger chain reactions, and shift through surreal worlds as One, a young Legend on a mission to save a dying desertscape land from the grip of the Paradox corruption.

games.name: Joe & Mac: Retro Collection
games.description:
Grab your club/hammer, the Stone Age is back and bigger than ever!

For the first time, three legendary adventures from the Joe & Mac universe are united in a single collection. Step back in time and join your favorite cavemen in their wildest escapades through jungle mayhem, fighting dinos, and stone-age fun.

Joe & Mac Caveman Ninja: The original arcade hit that started it all. Rescue the village’s women from a gang of Neanderthals and face off against deadly dinos.

Congo’s Caper: A wacky spin-off full of high-flying action, mischievous monkeys and even more prehistoric madness.

Joe & Mac Lost in the Tropics: A tropical sequel where our heroes get new weapons, face new enemies and must defend the Tiki Village

Three full games, one epic Stone Age experience. Whether you are a nostalgic fan or a curious newcomer, this collection is your ticket to relive or discover the colorful chaos of Joe & Mac.

Welcome to the pre-hysterical jungle!

games.name: Dead Watch
games.description: You're stuck in a time loop. Whenever you find a dead body, you go back to the past. The only way to escape the loop is to cheat destiny & change the future. Explore the castle and uncover its dark secrets to prevent the next killing

games.name: Parasensor
games.description: When Marisol starts a new life as a telecom technician, she finds herself out of her depth in a mutating city. Connect with strangers, confront grotesque creatures, and unravel a conspiracy at the heart of the metamorphosis.

games.name: Wanderburg
games.description: Wanderburg is a minimalist open-world roguelike in an ecosystem of Castles on Wheels. Consume, grow bigger, upgrade your modules, and survive! Unlock new weapons, build your castle, and discover the procedurally generated map!

games.name: Dracamar
games.description: Join Caliu, Foc, and Espurna on a journey full of adventures in the magical island world of Dracamar. Run, jump, and fight to free the Okis. Collect all the Moki-balls to rebuild the bridges and reconnect the islands. Get ready to fight the evil King Crad and save the world with your friends!

games.name: Lap of the Gods
games.description: When the sun shines on the Lap of the Gods, it is blood red. And when it rains, the sky sobs. Explore a strange world populated by even stranger beings in this story-driven adventure as Marion attempts to undo a mistake on a universal level, before everything she has ever known becomes Undone.

games.name: Resonance: A Plague Tale Legacy
games.description:
Set 15 years before Requiem, play as Sophia, a fierce young plunderer, on the run and determined to uncover the secrets of her past. Dive into an original story blending combat, myth and fate with a brand new take in the universe of A Plague Tale.

Sophia’s journey leads to the Minotaur' Island, where she faces deadly trials, navigates treacherous trails, solves puzzles, all while fighting and staying one step ahead of the army chasing her. But the true challenge awaits, as the terrifying creature hidden behind the myth will soon resonate with her…

games.name: Aphelion
games.description: Stranded on a frozen planet, astronaut Ariane must brave rugged landscapes and shifting realities to rescue her wounded partner, Thomas. This action-packed sci-fi adventure blends exploration, traversal, and tense stealth gameplay.

games.name: Mudang: Two Hearts
games.description: MUDANG: Two Hearts is a narrative-driven, third-person action adventure that blends tactical stealth, visceral combat, and cinematic storytelling set on a politically volatile Korean peninsula.

games.name: Aniimo
games.description: Aniimo is a next-gen creature-catching open-world RPG created by Pawprint Studio, coming to console, PC & mobile in 2026!

games.name: At Fate's End
games.description: At Fate’s End is an action-adventure game where you fight the ones you love and your skill tree is your family tree. Explore a lush fantasy world, defeat the foul creatures of the realm, and face your estranged siblings in intense, emotional duels to decide your family’s fate.

games.name: In Silico
games.description: In a distant future humanity is enslaved in a simulation. Now that you are awake, can you escape from reality too?

games.name: Moomintroll: Winter's Warmth
games.description: From the creators of Snufkin: Melody of Moominvalley comes a heartwarming new adventure inspired by the beloved Moomin stories by Tove Jansson. This time, join Moomintroll himself on a charming but cold winter journey.

games.name: SkyRig
games.description: Build floating automated rigs in a volatile gas giant. Extract elements, synthesize compounds, and descend through atmospheric layers in this sci-fi systems-builder focused on chemistry, engineering, and survival.

games.name: Stars of Icarus
games.description: Assemble your crew and take to the stars in a team-based PvP dogfight. Enter the forgotten arenas of space, master your ship's loadout and strategize with the rest of your ragtag squadron. Victory or death, together.

games.name: City of Dolorosa
games.description: You've just died—and your trial for the ultimate sin begins. City of Dolorosa is an interactive fiction and first-person exploration game with handmade india ink graphics. Meet the Five Great Powers and uncover all the secrets that lie within Dolorosa, the cruelest city in Hell.

games.name: Make Your Move
games.description: Make your Move is a roguelike game where you control the map like a rubik's cube. Create combinations to improve your stats, discover new cubes, get equipment, and battle for resources to protect your world from the void.

games.name: Flashloop
games.description: Due to engine failure, the ship crashes onto an uninhabited planet. During his research, the captain finds out that the area is inhabited by angry creatures, and the ship was shot down by someone. These mysteries of the dreadful planet will lead the researcher to terrible discoveries

games.name: Deck of Memories
games.description: Deck of Memories is a deckbuilding roguelite where you delve into the life of the last lighthouse keeper through immersive card dioramas. Customize your deck with a unique card crafting mechanic, explore fragmented memories, and uncover the secrets of the lighthouse.

games.name: Thumblemania
games.description: Thumb up and fight! Thumblemania is an action-packed wrestling game where you smack down your opponents to become the “Strongest Thumb of the Univeeeeerse”!

games.name: Greta Sees Ghosts!
games.description: Greta Sees Ghosts! is a lovingly crafted cozy adventure filled with quirky ghosts, witty dialogue, and clever shape-based puzzles. Explore remote islands, help the dead move on, and uncover Greta’s quietly touching story — one odd encounter at a time.

games.name: Farmbotic
games.description: Get ready to venture into the world of Farmatic. Prepare to automate the farm work with the help of your trusty bots. Explore and fight your way through the mines. Optimize the transportation of your resources and help the villagers with their tasks. All that alone or with friends!

games.name: Fay Keeper
games.description: Battle, catch, and morph hundreds of Fays in this new turn-based creature collector RPG! Traverse the vast realm of The Faylands, filled with bustling cities, challenging dungeons and arenas, hidden routes and unpredictable weather. Ascend ranks to become the ultimate Fay Keeper!

games.name: The Great Hatch
games.description: Lead an army of goblins in a quest to break a giant floating Egg. Build your village and manage hordes of goblins in a chaotic journey to uncover the mysteries of the giant Egg.

games.name: Always with You
games.description: "Always with you" is a cute and relaxing action-puzzle game. Switch freely between controlling a girl and a cat, solve clever puzzles, explore the ancient Alto civilization, and defeat unruly guardians. Embark on an exciting adventure with three cats to find your mother!

games.name: GraviTech
games.description: In this 3D puzzle you will need to turn your perception of the world. After all, the actions of the game take place in the laboratory on the study of gravity changes. Forget about the attraction to the ground.

games.name: Ascension
games.description: Ascension is a fast-paced roguelite where skills evolve mid-run, quests shift based on your actions, and every room is unpredictable. Fuse powers, stay alive, and try not to think too hard about who's really watching.

games.name: 1! 2! 3! Battle Card!
games.description: A simple and interesting new poker game that supports 2-4 players online battles. The key to winning is to balance risks and benefits, perform operations to maximize benefits, participate in ranking and bidding competitions, and see who is the real "head-breaking" king!

games.name: Solar Wave
games.description: A large-scale 4X strategy game with indirect control and a focus on simulating a space empire. Capture systems, develop your economy and logistics, call up hundreds of powerful fleets and watch them incinerate enemies of the Solar Empire.
