games.name: Mistwilds
games.description: Mistwilds is a vibrant online adventure where you collect, evolve, and battle magical creatures. Explore a vast world, unlock new zones, and join forces with friends to tame wild beasts, take on quests, trade rare loot, and conquer challenging dungeons.

games.name: Dimension Ranger
games.description: This is a single-player roguelike card game. You play as Sun Wukong, a legendary figure from Chinese mythology, traveling through multiple parallel universes to save your master. Defeat enemies from parallel universes and gain card powers from these worlds.

games.name: Winnie-the-Pooh Hops for Honey
games.description: Uh oh. Winnie-the-Pooh ate all of the honey that Christopher Robin set aside for the annual Honey Festival! It's up to Winnie to set things right and prove that his heart is bigger than his stomach by adventuring into the Hundred Acre Wood to collect enough honey to save the festival!

games.name: The Symbiant II
games.description: The Symbiant II is a BL / Yaoi / Gay visual novel about a man who goes through change he didn't ask for. It's also a tale of ancient secrets, intimate exploration and unlikely romance.

games.name: Bombun
games.description: High above the clouds, Bombun, a bomb-throwing rabbit, defends her floating fortress from her former friend turned foe, Robombun.

games.name: A Snail's Tale
games.description: A retro jRPG with a twist. Have you heard the one about the million dollars and the immortal snail? A Snail's Tale will let you play out the story and answer the question once and for all - can he be stopped?

games.name: Ashfield Hollow
games.description: Ten years after the outbreak, you’re found unconscious and taken in by a camp of survivors. Learn to fight, scavenge, farm, and craft as you rebuild your life, form bonds, and maybe even find love in this post-apocalyptic life sim RPG.

games.name: Plush Shop Simulator
games.description: Run your own cozy plushie shop in this management simulation game. Buy, price, and sell adorable plush toys, stationery, and mystery blind boxes!

games.name: HellPunk: Purgatorium
games.description: HellPunk is a 2D action gore roguelite game. You play as the main character Asher Drake, who must help Leviathan conquer the Tower and solve the mystery of his family's vanishing.

games.name: Red Rust Pioneers
games.description:
Your story begins stranded in the unforgiving wilderness of the Wild West.

Your one goal: to survive.

Endure scorching days and freezing nights as you battle hunger, thirst, and the elements. Forage for food, hunt wildlife, and fish to stay alive. Scavenge the land to gather vital resources and craft the tools and weapons you’ll need to stand a chance in this brutal but breathtaking frontier.

Can you master the elements and withstand blistering heat, violent rainstorms and freezing cold winters?

Should you beat the odds and live, alone or with up to three friends, you’ll find yourself in a gorgeous, rugged, vibrant land. Will you be able to not only survive, but thrive?

Build and grow your camp your way with easy to use base building mechanics. Fish in the lakes and rivers, or hunt in the atmospheric woodlands and open prairies. Farm and harvest a variety of crops to establish a self-sufficient camp. Adventure high into the mountains to mine resources, and craft better weapons and tools.

Explore a beautifully realized, open world, fictionalized Wild West frontier and become the first to discover the untamed wilderness of Red Rust Valley.

If you can overcome the threat of extreme hunger, brutal weather conditions and lethal wildlife you may just live to appreciate it.

games.name: Echoes of Night: The Exodus of the Stars
games.description: In this world consumed by darkness, where aberrant creatures lurk in the shadows... Prometheus is the only hope. In this action-platformer, you must find lost star fragments and rebuild the constellations to restore light to the universe.

games.name: The Prophecy of Horn
games.description: Defeat the legions of darkness and kill their ruler, the Demon God Horn. The game tells the story of the feat of three heroes in a dark flexible world in an RPG with an original hybrid turn-based combat system and other well-known game mechanics.

games.name: Sobakistan: The Land of Dogs
games.description: Sobakistan — the land of dogs, is a darkly satirical narrative immersion in a closed-off totalitarian dog state — where any step could send you to prison.

games.name: Skull Horde
games.description: Skull Horde is an auto battler dungeon crawler where you play as a flying skull necromancer. Find powerful loot and create overpowered builds. Summon a horde of skeletons in a battle of bone versus flesh!

games.name: The Bunny Graveyard II
games.description: Help Skye the Bunny find her lost brother Claudio in this action-packed horror adventure with charming pixel graphics. Hop like a bunny and get ready to explore the haunted streets of Carrot Town!

games.name: Tuoni
games.description: A turn-based roguelite RPG set in a mythic northern wilderness. Explore procedurally generated lands, battle eerie folkloric creatures, and craft powerful builds on your journey to the land of the dead. Experiment with diverse playstyles in a richly tactical, old-school inspired adventure.

games.name: Tsarevna
games.description: Tsarevna is the world’s first ballet-inspired slasher set in a world of Slavic mythology.

games.name: Mawang: Dark Lord Defense
games.description: Mawang: Dark Lord Defense is a real-time tactical tower defense game. As Princess Lua, defend the demon realm against the hero alliance. Build unique towers, manage unit morale, and use tactical pauses to repel invasions. Your strategy decides the demon realm's fate.

games.name: Age of Respair
games.description: Age of Respair is a medieval strategy castle-builder. Build massive castles with fortifications while managing resources and production chains. Assemble a large army and lay siege to enemy castles. Lead your people and bring respair to your kingdom.

games.name: Number Machine
games.description: Number Machine is an open-ended factory and automation game with math mechanics. Design, build, and optimize factories that automatically assemble and deliver complex numerical structures. Inspired by Opus Magnum and Infinifactory.

games.name: Discard All Hope
games.description: Investigate an eldritch mystery in a town under siege, collect and upgrade powerful spells, fight grotesque cultists, twisted creatures, and bio-mechanical invaders in this twin-stick-shooter / Action RPG hybrid.

games.name: Tails & Talons
games.description: Tails & Talons is a roguelite deckbuilder where spell-casting cards and card-matching combos intertwine to create a addicting and strategic experience! Join a colorful cast of furry adventurers, unleash powerful spells, and chain devastating combos as you descend down a mysterious tower..

games.name: Die to Play
games.description: Die to Play — a deckbuilder with dice, set on a cozy retro computer inside a medieval English mansion filled with horrors and mysteries.

games.name: Ghost Golfing
games.description: Swing on to Ghost Golfing. Build haunting mini golf courses to ricochet, blow, burn or teleport the ball right in to the hole!

games.name: Space Scum
games.description: Lead a band of mercenaries through battle after battle in this Sci-Fi, turn-based RPG. Fight your way across different planets, earning loot and equipment to outfit your team – and remember, no option is off the table when survival is on the line.

games.name: Flipping is Hard
games.description: A flippin' hard game where rotation is your only motion. Flip, fall, and climb through the land of lost things to return to your boy.

games.name: Ancient Shadows: Awakening
games.description: Ancient Shadows: Awakening is a dark 3D dungeon RPG where you explore ancient ruins, battle terrifying creatures, and uncover the secrets of the deep.

games.name: Moon Princess
games.description: A daughter-raising game in a world of wuxia and mythology — raise her as a martial arts master in a rich wuxia world. Train, fight, manage, and shape her future! With 50+ branching endings and 60+ story characters, forge your one-of-a-kind heroine and change the fate of the Jianghu!

games.name: Forestless
games.description: Forestless is an atmospheric psychological adventure where you'll journey through a world of fears armed only with a magical arrow of hope. Explore biomes that embody human nightmares - from misty wastelands of loneliness to scorched deserts of loss.

games.name: Aghori
games.description: Aghori is a psychological horror game set in the Himalayan foothills. Unravel dark rituals, cursed forests, and forgotten villages as Rudra searches for his missing friends in a narrative-rich journey through fear, mysticism, and the unknown

games.name: Chain Letter
games.description: Persuade your friends, unlock their skills, and fight through rhythm battles. Chain Letter is a story-driven rhythm-defense roguelike combining key combo mechanics, tactical positioning, and emotional narrative progression.

games.name: Soulrift
games.description: Explore the Forest of Souls as you defeat enemies in tactical, turn-based battles. Choose from a great variety of classes, races, abilities, and equipment to deeply customize your character in this highly replayable traditional roguelike, as you delve deeper to find out the truth about the forest.

games.name: Sonic Valkyria: Kanon
games.description: "Every time you shoot an enemy, music is born." The heartbeat of rock becomes your aim. An impulse shooting game with anime song rock and lock-on! "Sonic Valkyria: KANON"

games.name: 100 Hong Kong Cats
games.description: Join the cutest adventure in themed locations full of cats! Explore the charming hand-drawn artwork of special places and try to find 100 adorable cats hidden throughout the game. Can you find them all? ️

games.name: 100 Amsterdam Cats
games.description: Join the cutest adventure in themed locations full of cats! Explore the charming hand-drawn artwork of special places and try to find 100 adorable cats hidden throughout the game. ️‍Can you find them all? ️

games.name: Haunted Room! Urami-chan
games.description: In this "life-intervention watching game," you control the earthbound spirit "Urami-chan." Travel between an apartment's past and present to change the murdered resident's future. The game unfolds in semi-real time, tasking you to watch over the resident and intervene.

games.name: Delve Survivors
games.description: An old-school roguelike game with modern survivors-like action! Delve into multiple retro pixelated dungeons where you control the pace with fast, reactive turn based movement and ever expanding skills which enable you to plow through hordes of enemies before escaping with the loot

games.name: I Am Night
games.description: A folk horror roguelike deckbuilder where you tear apart and scrap together cards to face monsters, unravel mysteries, and survive a world forged in fear. Set out on a brave, twisted adventure of self-discovery.

games.name: It Works: Electronics Repair Simulator
games.description: Electronics Repair Simulator lets players operate their own electronics workshop where they diagnose and fix various devices including receivers, phones, and speakers. Players use authentic repair techniques like soldering and component replacement while managing a growing business. Through successful repairs, they earn money to expand their workshop and take on more complex projects.

games.name: Raiders Rise
games.description: Raiders Rise is a multiplayer action-strategy game where two teams must cooperate and compete to collect crystals. Survive alien threats, outmaneuver rivals, and choose help or betray? In this chaotic battleground, teamwork is key… until it isn’t.

games.name: Putrika 2nd.Cut: For the Exquisite Attire
games.description: Is cutting down a young girl a sin, or a salvation? In the Haku-a Church where pure love and jealousy collide, a young gem-craftsman is forced to choose—to let her live, or to end her life.

games.name: AirBoost Airship Knight
games.description: the blonde Airship Knight Dorota, during a battle in the ruins, accidentally discovers an amnesiac girl, Agate. This also draws the attention of sky pirates, leading to fierce battles. The game offers rich levels and exciting battles, with many companions who will fight alongside you!

games.name: Voyage Router
games.description: Voyage Router is a "navigation-based roguelike" where you explore procedurally generated terrain guided by your map. Adapt your route as the environment and conditions change, and visit as many target points as possible.

games.name: Factories in Factories in Factories
games.description: Build a fractal world. Automate the automation of your automation. Put Factories in Factories in Factories.

games.name: Don't Get Caught
games.description: A stealth platformer where you control both the hero and the cameras. Evade security systems, manipulate switches and keycards, and outsmart the surveillance to escape a high-security lab.

games.name: Adorable Adventures
games.description: Play as Boris, a curious baby boar who must learn how to use his nose to reunite with his family after a forest fire. Explore beautiful landscapes, track scents, and uncover secrets as you slowly reconnect with nature in this cozy animal adventure.

games.name: Stories of Somnia
games.description: Unravel a story-rich adventure blending a turn-based RPG with real-time mechanics. Use spells to grapple across gaps, uncover hidden routes, and combine abilities with powerful Dreamkin companions to overcome a world consumed by Gloam.

games.name: Nova Patria
games.description: Nova Patria is a Roman Steampunk Colony Sim. In this alternate history, the empire never fell and lived on to discover the New World and steam power. Manage intricate supply chains, expanding cities, and innovations in a hopeful, procedurally generated, isometric simulation of industrial antiquity.

games.name: Where the Chips Fall
games.description: Balatro Meets Blackjack with a Cuphead aesthetic in this casino rogue-lite where you gamble with you abilities. Every chip you bet can turn the tide in your favor, but you could also lose it all in a bad hand. Think you can beat the house?

games.name: CastleOn
games.description: Build a castle! Grow economy, recruit troops from Europe and the Holy Land, man the walls and towers! Place traps and defeat attackers with arrows, wood and stone, fire, disease and cold steel! Survive the Third Crusade and conquer enemy lands in this turn-based strategy!

games.name: SuperWeird
games.description: Automate highly unstable and unreliable robots using microprograms installed along their paths. Design an automated system that is prepared to handle the challenges of a super weird environment, full of automated hazards left here long before your arrival.

games.name: Not Guilty!
games.description: You are the judge, the executioner, and the warden — all in one. Investigate absurd cases, make questionable decisions, expand your prison, and keep the budget balanced. Bend your morals, play with verdicts, and build your own empire of justice.

games.name: Storm Settlers
games.description: A survival citybuilder set in a desert afflicted by relentless sandstorms. Build, farm, research, clear sand and protect your people from the storms. Will you find water or desolation? Will your settlement thrive or be buried in sand?

games.name: Stellations
games.description: Stellations is a manic arcade game about careening around mind maps. Pilot yourself through vibrating circuits where each input is tactile, twitchy, delightful. Chase, be chased, escape.

games.name: Ocean City Killer
games.description: Ocean City Killer is an open-world corporate dungeon crawler. You play as Rick Atlanta, a private eye investigating the death of a former colleague. What starts out as a routine case pulls you into the dark labyrinth of a seedy megacorp. Hop in your muscle car to explore the city!

games.name: Hello World: a developer story
games.description: The developer narrates. The world evolves. The fourth wall breaks. Welcome to Hello World, a charming Narrative Physical Adventure where you play a game as it's being created live.

games.name: Blood Vow: Survive the Night
games.description: Defend the people of Sodermark from the hordes of darkness. Fight as an army of one, or online with up to four-player PvE multiplayer in this wave-based, action-survival game.

games.name: Spider Dynasty
games.description: This is a completely innovative Metroidvania-like game. There are two ancient trees host two royal families who have maintained an aerial dynasty woven from spider silk for generations. However, unknown evil forces are corrupting the entire silk world…

games.name: Chaos the Devil
games.description: A Ps1 era inspired 3D platformer. Run, jump and spin your way through a new adventure, done the old way.

games.name: Wanderstate
games.description: You find yourself alone in a place that feels familiar… but not quite right. Wander aimlessly or with purpose, it won’t matter. Is there an end? Has anyone been here before you? Time feels slow. Or maybe it's frozen. Or maybe… you’re not meant to leave.

games.name: Illusive Domain
games.description: Deflect, parry, and defeat your opponents through intense boss rush action. Fight for you and your allies’ freedom, lest you remain entombed forever more.

games.name: Fantasy Burger
games.description: A chill fantasy cooking game. Serve meals to knights, mages, and mythical creatures. Play solo or with up to 7 friends!

games.name: The Retrospection of Tomorrow
games.description: In this non-linear, time-travel romance visual novel, you'll date four captivating love interests just like in any ordinary otome game… until they die before your eyes(!). Trapped between memories and delusions, fighting fate itself—can you rewrite their endings? Dear time traveler, welcome home.

games.name: Cat-a-strophic
games.description:
CAT-A-STROPHIC is a goofy arcade 3D city destruction game with rogue-like elements where you play as Bluu, a colossal kaiju cat, rampaging through different cities to rescue your precious kittens! Embrace the purr-fect blend of chaos and relaxation as you level multiple towns and cities.

Unleash havoc by swiping at buildings, pouncing on structures, and hurling objects with telekinesis. As the chaos unfolds, enemies will continuously spawn to capture Bluu and stop her destruction spree. Once the level is cleared, you can rescue a kitten that supercharges Bluu’s powers, enhancing her abilities with unique effects like summoning lightning storms or turning invisible. Embrace the carnage, adapt your playstyle, and lead Bluu to victory!

games.name: The Last Gas Station
games.description: In a world where electric cars reign supreme, you are now the owner of an old gas station out in the wilderness. Establish trade, develop your business and uncover the secret of this strange place in the compact gas station simulator.

games.name: Among Space
games.description: Among Space is a horror game set on the planet EC-10013. You are a researcher of the anomalies of the planet, you were abandoned by your "comrades" during an emergency evacuation. Will you be able to leave the planet or will you find another way to survive?

games.name: Sudden Strike 5
games.description: Sudden Strike 5 delivers real-time tactics in epic WWII battles. A host of tactical options and more than 300 playable units open-up multiple approaches to reach your objectives in a 25 mission campaign on historical battlefields in Europe and North Africa.

games.name: Bobo's Big Tower
games.description:
Bobo is building a Big Tower to reach Heaven and become God! Bibi must conquer Bobo's Big Tower to save the world..

Time only moves when you do, so outsmart your enemies to get past them! Explore the procedurally-generated floors of Bobo's Big Tower to endlessly modify your arsenal for taking on stronger foes. Complete challenges to unlock new shop items and playable characters with their own item pools, bosses, & story endings!

Do you have what it takes to thwart Bobo?

games.name: Hollow Sorrow
games.description: Hollow Sorrow is a dark yet heartwarming 2D exploration adventure game where you confront your lost past.

games.name: Ugomeku Note
games.description: Welcome to the world of UGOMEKU NOTE (“Wriggling Note”). You—gentle, kind, and always wearing a lovely smile—have been chosen as a hero to embark on an adventure full of humor and heart. This is a handcrafted RPG made with RPG Maker MV. All graphics, music, and systems are being created by a solo developer.

games.name: Is the Vat Utopia or Dystopia?
games.description: "We regret to inform you that the Earth has been demolished." Coming next—a "Human Observation Documentary" starring "Landmine Girl" (self-proclaimed) and "Nerd" (so-called).

games.name: Hyperflex Ultra
games.description: Dodge obstacles, switch gravity in ways you never even thought possible and see just how hard you can FLEX in this endless action platformer. Think you've got what it takes to master all four levels and achieve the VIBE?

games.name: Tinker's Ascent
games.description: Jump to new heights in Tinkers Ascent, a 3D platformer adventure game. Collect, craft, and rebuild in this world of floating islands. The biggest thing to remember: don't look down... or maybe just don't fall down.

games.name: Abomination Ops
games.description: A strange action-packed sci-fi visual novel with elements of horror and comedy. Brought to you by the Dynamic Solutions Megacorporation (a member of the Dynamic Holdings Group).

games.name: Tama In-Between
games.description: An action-puzzle game where the slime cat "Tama" explores a mysterious, slightly melancholic pixel-art world. Use three unique actions—Absorb to grow, Split to divide, and Swap to switch bodies—to solve puzzles and follow Tama’s hazy, uncertain journey.

games.name: Trainwatch
games.description: Meet Troy, the new Gatekeeper. His job is simple - close the gates at a desolate railway crossing for one month. This is his last chance to earn back his wife's trust. To prove he can stay sober. To become a better man. Join him at the Tower in the middle of nowhere. Help Troy fix his life.

games.name: Tamer Town
games.description: Collect Mokitons in this city management game, where tamers and their monsters unite in battle, evolve and bond together in their unique town. Design neighborhoods, unlock stories and grow a feel-good world where every connection matters.

games.name: Ripley Remembered
games.description: A surreal, story-driven puzzle game set on a train caught in a time loop. Solve narrative-driven puzzles, battle psychic bosses, and uncover the truth about memory, grief, and a girl named Ripley—before the day resets again. Pixel graphics, bullet hells, puzzles, and dialog.

games.name: Table for None
games.description: "Table for None" is a pixelated, bite-sized open world, food truck cooking adventure game. Explore diverse regions, discover new recipes, and prepare meals to manage your food truck!

games.name: Otterly Lost
games.description: Play as Otto, a curious sea otter swept far from home. In this story-rich adventure, explore wild forests, dive underwater, glide over rocky canyons, and climb your way back. Meet friendly animals, complete heartfelt quests, and enjoy soft challenges, at your own pace!

games.name: Junkyard Space Agency
games.description: Build ships from scrap and fly them in a gritty, realistic space sim. Venture solo or team up. Hunt for parts, haul vital resources, and keep your space agency afloat.

games.name: Space Diner Simulator
games.description: After buying a rundown diner, you need to repair it and bring it to its full glory. Manage, renovate and upgrade the diner to attract more customers, and meet their demands. Bring a piece of home to the edges of space with Earths best recipes.

games.name: Wiffleball Legends
games.description: Swing for the fences and become a backyard hero! Throw insane curve balls and other crazy wiffleball pitches in this 4v4 wiffleball game! Build your dream team to win a championship in season mode, crush home runs in a home run derby mode and lead your team to the national championship in Story Mode

games.name: Saveseeker
games.description:
Saveseeker is a turn-based RPG adventure that follows a tenacious time-traveling girl who must save the world from her father.

Play as Emmer Edette, a cheerful and carefree child who discovers she inherited her famous father's ability to 'save' moments in time at specific points worldwide. Alongside her grumpy dragon toy sidekick, Tippleton, she embarks on a journey to overwrite all of the world’s save points (“Save Stops”) and confront her father, a once-great Hero using his power for nefarious means.

Explore six vibrant lands, recruit the Hero’s former foes, and save the world from an untimely end!

games.name: Mycubium
games.description: Mycubium is a first-person 3D puzzle platformer where you grow bridges using mushrooms in a minimalist cubic world. Explore and solve spatial puzzles across shifting landscapes filled with secrets, platforming challenges, and evolving mechanics. Build your path as the day fades to night.

games.name: Mechs and Muskets
games.description: Mechs and Muskets is a 2D isometric tactical RPG set in an alternate Napoleonic era where mechs rule the battlefield. Customize your squad with unique mech parts and abilities, and lead them through turn-based strategic combat in a story-driven campaign

games.name: Mech Log Zero
games.description: Take control of a mechanized pilot and its Mech. Blast through Colossal Machines and secure the last remnants of life inside a dying God.

games.name: Lead The Dragon
games.description: Join your crew and conquer the narrow roads of America. Explore the open world, earn respect and money by competing in street races, but breaking the law will bring you serious trouble with the police.

games.name: Clive Barker's Hellraiser: Revival
games.description: Experience a new chapter in the legendary horror series like never before. Clive Barker's Hellraiser: Revival takes first-person action horror survival to the next level. Wield the powers of the Genesis Configuration puzzle box to survive your bargain with the infamous Pinhead.

games.name: Don't Mind the Robots
games.description: The machines are coming. Build a maze and place powerful towers to defend your portal against an army of robots.

games.name: Nocturnals: Cacti Coast
games.description: A narrative-driven, choose-your-own-adventure game where a young survivor must make difficult decisions in order to survive the foggy wasteland of Cacti Coast and find a community to call home.

games.name: Trash Wars
games.description: A 3D hybrid tower defense game! Defend against trash, send trash. Manage resources, build turrets, automate defenses, and survive against pollution.

games.name: Farm to Table
games.description: A farming and restaurant management sim where you build a restaurant and grow food at your backyard. Plant, harvest, cook, serve, hire, decorate, produce, forage, fish, raise animals and run a restaurant with your own resources!

games.name: Wilderlocke
games.description: WILDERLOCKE is a tactical monster-taming roguelike. Build up a team of diverse & powerful monsters. Find the perfect combinations of moves, passives & stats to create devastating synergies. Triumph in increasingly challenging 2v2 turn-based battles and become unstoppable.

games.name: Oremus
games.description: This text adventure, beautifully illustrated in pixel art, invites you to explore a medieval abbey filled with secrets. You take full control by entering commands directly on your keyboard through a flexible command parser, allowing for free and immersive interaction.

games.name: Important People of History: Presidents - George Washington
games.description:
Learn all about George Washington in this visual novel biography containing rare photos from inside the Washington Monument, Washington's home at Mount Vernon, Yorktown where he achieved final victory in the Revolutionary War, and much more. Soldier, General, Spymaster, and President - this is George Washington!

Part of the Important People of History series:
1. George Washington
2. Thomas Jefferson
3. Abraham Lincoln

All three games about US Presidents releasing in 2026 to commemorate the 250th anniversary of the signing of the Declaration of Independence back in 1776

Proudly made in Washington’s home state of Virginia

games.name: Important People of History: Presidents - Thomas Jefferson
games.description:
Learn all about Thomas Jefferson in this visual novel biography containing rare photos of the room where the Declaration of Independence was signed, Jefferson’s Monticello home, the National Archives where the Declaration is kept, and much more. Writer, Diplomat, President - this is Thomas Jefferson!

Part of the Important People of History series:
1. George Washington
2. Thomas Jefferson
3. Abraham Lincoln

All three games about US Presidents releasing in 2026 to commemorate the 250th anniversary of the signing of the Declaration of Independence back in 1776

Proudly made in Jefferson’s home state of Virginia

games.name: Important People of History: Presidents - Abraham Lincoln
games.description:
Learn all about Abraham Lincoln in this visual novel biography containing rare photos of Lincoln’s hat from the day he was shot, the Lincoln Memorial, where he gave the Gettysburg address, and much more. Lawyer, President, Emancipator - this is Abraham Lincoln!

Part of the Important People of History series:
1. George Washington
2. Thomas Jefferson
3. Abraham Lincoln

All three games about US Presidents releasing in 2026 to commemorate the 250th anniversary of the signing of the Declaration of Independence back in 1776

Proudly made in the Washington DC area

games.name: Sunset Suckerpunch
games.description: Meet K8E: a talking, transforming motorcycle-sword-gauntlet. Drive her to meet your enemies, and wield her to crater them into the asphalt. Don't let them take her voice, too.

games.name: Drone District
games.description: Drone District is an adrenaline-charged FPV arcade experience that mashes up the flow of Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater with the freedom of Burnout Paradise—but with drones. Master flight tricks, grind power lines, launch off rooftops, chain mid-air stunts, and explore an open world.

games.name: Black Vultures: Prey of Greed
games.description: Black Vultures is a tactical first-person shooter set in a fractured warzone where trust is scarce, resources are limited, and every mission begins with a choice. Navigate ruined infrastructure and contested zones. Intercept transmissions, track movements, and recover intel to locate your objective before rival squads close in. Engage only when necessary. Retreat when survival demands it. The deeper you push, the higher the risk, but greater the reward.

games.name: Toll Booth Simulator: Schedule of Chaos
games.description: You tried to escape prison but got caught. Instead of prison, they gave you a debt. Manage a toll booth on a desert highway. Check passports, take payments, and decide who passes. Grow fruit, mix cocktails, sell drinks, and dodge the cops. The only way to earn freedom is by paying off your debt.

games.name: Fatal Train
games.description: Murder on the train? It doesn't matter, it's no longer our concern! Ladies and gentlemen, don't worry, we have four detectives who can handle this! After all, there's nothing complicated about murder investigations, right?

games.name: Teknokrat
games.description:
In the futuristic techno-metropolis of Nu-Vika, you are but a number in the system.

You have been branded as unemployed, and rely on the state to survive. Until you are assigned a temporary position at a cyborg repair workshop, giving you a shot at gaining freedom.

But when strange glitches start happening to your eye implants, you find yourself thrust into a plan far beyond your comprehension, tying your fate to one of three patients in your care.

TEKNOKRAT is a gay, y2k-fuelled sci-fi thriller/romance about the danger of enforced stagnation in the face of unstoppable change.

Explore a city where might makes right, and technology is absolute. Choose a partner in crime, and face the consequences of your actions with them.

games.name: Abyss Rebel
games.description: ABYSS REBEL is a Turn-Based Tactical RPG combining grid strategy, intense combat, and loot progression. Set sail for a frozen archipelago at the universe’s edge, lead a four-member squad on a skiff, equipping skills, relics, tackling bosses and summoning mechs to shatter encroaching darkness!

games.name: My Femboy Roommate: Special Weekend
games.description: You take your roommate turned boyfriend, Robin, to a fancy resort for your one year anniversary. Explore and enjoy everything the high-end resort has to offer while bonding and getting closer to Robin. Will you make the most of this special weekend?

games.name: Panic in Puzzle World
games.description: Panic in Puzzle World is an action-packed 2D platformer in the spirit of console classics. Play as Tide and breathe fire, slash with your claws, bounce on bad guys and glide with your wings to put a stop to the robot menace taking over the land, block by block!

games.name: PanzenTD
games.description: A charming tower defense game where heroic panda warriors defend their homeland against waves of destructive robots. Build towers, deploy unique heroes, and outsmart your enemies across stylized jungle battlefields.

games.name: Astroburrow
games.description: Astroburrow is a thrilling space adventure combining exploration, strategy and arcade action! As a mousey space cadet, explore beautifully pixelated galaxies to build new civilizations and fight for your species' survival.

games.name: Infinite Cards
games.description: Discover infinite cards in this roguelike deckbuilder. Every card is unique, every run a new experience. Craft, combine, and build your deck completely freely to defeat enemies and bosses, or take on cleverly designed puzzle challenges!

games.name: White Rats
games.description:
White Rats is a sci-fi survival visual novel set within the cold, decaying corridors of the research station UF-44.
When a group of survivors wakes up with fragmented memories and no clear way out, they must uncover the truth behind the station’s secrets — and the experiments that took place there.

Choices matter: each decision can lead to survival... or something far worse.
Investigate, adapt, and try to keep your mind intact as reality begins to twist.

Will you solve the mystery — or become just another test subject?

games.name: Tired
games.description: High-speed sci-fi time trial racing. Master five tracks with tight controls, instant restarts, and no distractions—just you, the clock, and the push to go faster. Your biggest rival is your own skill.

games.name: Frostliner
games.description: The moon shattered. The world froze. Take command of a nomadic train city hurtling through a war-ravaged frozen wasteland. In this survival city builder on rails, gather survivors, scavenge resources, and do whatever it takes to keep the engine running and stay ahead of the frost.

games.name: Bher
games.description: Delve dungeons, craft items and build relationships as you work to recover your memory. Bher is a town under siege, and you are an amnesiac with nothing to your name. Search dark woods and caves for resources and craft powerful weapons to delve into infested mines, forgotten swamps, and worse.

games.name: Warfactory
games.description: Warfactory fuses planet-scale automation with real-time strategy and lite 4X elements. Build sprawling factories, design modular robot armies, and lead thousands of units into battle. Conquer a galaxy with a supply chain — one conveyor belt at a time.

games.name: My Bookshop Dreams
games.description: A cozy bookshop management sim where you run, customize, and expand your dream bookstore. Restock shelves, host author events, play mini-games, and collect literary works as you grow your reputation across cities—and maybe even planets.

games.name: Well Dweller
games.description: Well Dweller is a dark fairy-tale metroidvania full of charming characters living in a wretched kingdom. Play as Glimmer- a tiny bird armed with a matchstick- who must burn the wicked queen to save his family.

games.name: Survive: The Alien Tracing
games.description: A survival game where you uncover the mystery of the alien civilization "The Fallen of Elun". Navigate a dark world, solve complex puzzles, face hostile creatures, and use many weapons to survive while searching for the truth behind your missing son.

games.name: Diceville
games.description: Build your city, roll the dice, and outplay your rivals in Diceville — a card-based strategy game inspired by tabletop classics. Trigger building effects, upgrade your HQ, and race to victory in a game of luck, planning, and clever combos.

games.name: Flaurel's Diaries
games.description: A visual novel about my OC, Flaurel. Her full name is Flaurel Gerania el Caryana. She’s a character, but also a part of me. I hope you enjoy reading her story as much as I enjoyed writing it. Thank you for playing.

games.name: Bring Me Home
games.description: A small point and click game about helping a dog to get back home.

games.name: Frob
games.description:
Life was simple.

Frob was just chilling by the pond, watching his tadpole kids wiggle around.

Until BAM ! a stork swooped in and scattered his children far and wide across the world. What a day...

Now it’s up to you to guide Frob through a world way too big for a small Frog.

Bounce on beetles, swing from dragonflies, collect some tasty flies and explore the world beyond Frobs comfort zone!

But most importantly: get your kids back!

Leaving the pond was never part of the plan — but adventure rarely is.

Small frog, Big leap!

games.name: After Work
games.description: Welcome to SPARK, a well renounced photography company. Here you'll find love, learn about consent, and meet friends. Use your observation skills to unfold motivation and stories behind characters. Be careful. You don't want it to end badly.

games.name: Ponchyo: A Platypus Adventure
games.description: Ponchyo: A Platypus Adventure is a charming 3D platformer collectathon full of adventure - and a hint of nostalgia! Play as Ponchyo the platypus and journey through a variety of vibrant worlds. Collect coins and discover new furniture to decorate your home.

games.name: Live Fire Exercise
games.description: Inspired by classic training missions from your favourite FPS games, Live Fire Exercise is a time trial arcade shooter that challenges you to complete rounds as fast and accurately as possible.

games.name: The Secret of Weepstone
games.description: In a hand-drawn black and white dungeon crawler RPG inspired by classic D&D of the 80’s - Roll Dice, Fight Monsters, Loot Dungeons, Embrace Death, and unravel The Secret of Weepstone.

games.name: Rot Together
games.description: A first-person co-op horror game for up to four players set in a medieval world. Explore a procedurally generated map and fight a mysterious cult. Brew potions, kill monsters, chat with your friends. Survival is not guaranteed!

games.name: DDoD
games.description: DDoD is a single-player and co-op tactical roguelite shooter set in the near future, deep inside an abandoned industrial zone. Explore, fight, and mutate your way to the source of a semi-sentient biological AI anomaly.

games.name: Chumaky
games.description: Chumaky is a game about traveling, trading, farming, and building your own homestead. Discover mysterious locations and enjoy atmospheric landscapes.

games.name: Valkyrie Iteration: Mecha Pilot Raising Pocket Simulator
games.description: Step into the role of a technomaster in Valkyrie Iteration, a sci-fi visual novel. Train and guide Lana, a young pilot, and her sentient mech, the Valkyrie, as they prepare for high-stakes battles against otherworldly foes.

games.name: Crimson System: VɅΔ Protocol
games.description: A dark retro-FPS born from a solo AI-creation experiment. Blast your way through a vampire-ruled station, slay twisted enemies, and uncover the secrets of the VɅΔ Protocol

games.name: Mesmalie
games.description: MESMALIE is an occult visual novel/point & click adventure where you attempt to tame your Magickal ability under the guidance of a small Witches' coven in the middle of nowhere. Heed Mesmer's aloof teachings, strengthen your Magick, or just go home,,,

games.name: Your Judgement, Inquisitor
games.description: Your judgment, Inquisitor Medieval Spain. You serve as an Inquisitor in the shadow of the dreaded Tomás de Torquemada. Cast out demons from the possessed. Burn heretics. Spare the innocent — or condemn them. Every wrong choice will bring you closer to the wrath of the Church… or the fury of the mob.

games.name: Bloodseed: The Last Helsing
games.description: Bloodseed is a game that combines two very distinct but terribly addictive genres; card combat and survival.

games.name: The Fatum
games.description: This situation is temporary, but it comes with a strict protocol that you must follow. Morality and cold calculation intertwine in a dark tale. You are an investigator, and your arrival marks a turning point in the lives of those you encounter.

games.name: Numeral Strike
games.description: A turn-based roguelite where battles take place on a field of numbers. Find pairs — either matching numbers or those that add up to 10 — to attack, defend, and overcome enemies in a world of magical medieval fantasy!

games.name: The Sword Game
games.description: The Sword Game is a semi-fast paced retro styled 3D platformer, made to mimic shareware games of early 2000's. Your mission is to get the lowest time possible on all levels. You can cheat, find shortcuts, you have all the freedom in the world.

games.name: Breadieval
games.description: Create unique baked goods by combining ingredients you find at the market. Befriend the puppet villagers by baking their favourite recipes or by combining tasty flavours. Have fun, you don't have to follow a recipe here.

games.name: Forge the Fates
games.description: This roguelike deckbuilder transforms your classic hand of cards into a grid of runes. Play a rune and the ones behind it shift forward, so every move shapes what’s next. Build a unique deck, trigger match-3 combos, and outplay your enemies.

games.name: Omicrox
games.description: Omicrox takes Ultimate Tic Tac Toe and adds powerful one-use ability cards for unlimited strategic possibilities. Earn abilities as you play, like swapping boards, blocking moves, or stealing cards, and use them to outsmart friends or AI in this battle of tactics.

games.name: Late Amusement
games.description: Were they all just accidents, or were they? Late Amusement is a first-person survival horror from a small indie studio. You play as young student Liam Snow and survive for as long as you can to uncover the secrets of the theme park.

games.name: Valor Mortis
games.description: Valor Mortis is a first-person action soulslike from the creators of Ghostrunner. Rise from death as a former soldier of Napoleon’s army. Wield supernatural powers, battle horrifying monsters, and unravel a conspiracy that threatens all of humanity.

games.name: Off Course
games.description: Stuck in a time loop, stop the possessed captain's plans in this cooperate-with-yourself puzzle game. Record each pirate’s actions to solve puzzles, interact with adorable animal companions and get to know the brave pirate crew and the bond they share with each other!

games.name: Road Kings
games.description: Drive a 40-ton semi hauling cargo across the coastal plains of the American South, managing multiple jobs, trailers, and routes. Grow reputation from rookie to veteran owner-operator, dodging disasters and rivals to become the hero of the open road.

games.name: Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War IV
games.description: Return to the RTS series’ roots with deeply satisfying strategy gameplay. Take command of four unique Warhammer 40,000 factions, including the Adeptus Mechanicus in their series debut! Fight through 70+ epic campaign missions, as well as the replayable Last Stand, Skirmish and multiplayer modes.

games.name: Bot Slash Bot
games.description: You click - You dash - You slash. Bot slash Bot is a fast-paced, top-down Hack n‘ Slash in which you control a rogue robot slashing & dashing through your former co-machines holding you captive! It's all about speed. Time is running out.

games.name: Zero Parades: For Dead Spies
games.description: From ZA/UM comes ZERO PARADES: For Dead Spies – a story-rich espionage RPG. You're a brilliant but tormented operant on a desperate assignment. Pick up the pieces of your broken network, untangle a bloody web of intrigue at the End of History, and prove yourself on the big stage or blow it all up – again.

games.name: Infinite Soul
games.description: Infinite Soul is a breath of fresh air for competitive fighters. Every battle will test your skill, cunning, and resolve. Attack and defend with Water, Earth, Fire, and Air; choose wisely because each one has a strength and a weakness.

games.name: Can't Even See the Sky
games.description: Your character is a man with a troubled past who finds himself trapped in a city on the brink of civil war. Look for ways to get out of the city and make peace with the past. Will you pull yourself together or drown in the abyss of despair?

games.name: Grind Survivors
games.description: Grind Survivors is a fast-paced action roguelike where demon hunters face endless hellspawn. Dodge, loot, and blast through brutal bullet-hell combat with dynamic builds and ever-changing weapons in a scorched, demon-ridden world.

games.name: Ignifugo
games.description: Ignifugo is a top-down action roguelite with auto-battler elements. Control a combat shell and modify it with auto-attacking units. Take advantage of class bonuses, items and abilities to create unique builds as you fight heated battles through five biomes. Will you survive or be reduced to ash?

games.name: Tropico 7
games.description: Get rich or die trying! In Tropico 7, you step into El Presidente’s shiny boots again to build your island nation and – literally – move mountains. As glorious leader you guide your loyal citizens (and your Swiss Bank Account) through the ages toward untold prosperity.

games.name: Beastro
games.description: Welcome to Beastro! In this charming fusion of fantasy adventure, not all heroes wield swords… Some prefer the spoon. And, sometimes to save the world you’ve got to start with a really good meal.

games.name: Project ReMind
games.description: "Welcome to the end. My end" Manipulate machinery, open secret passages and bypass computers to remember your life, from your first discovery to your own death bed. In this first-person narrative puzzle game investigate a mysterious presence looking for the answer that haunted you since THAT day.

games.name: Hell Let Loose: Vietnam
games.description: Step into the explosive fury of war with Hell Let Loose: Vietnam. Play a decisive role in one of the most iconic conflicts in history with expansive 50v50 player battles, where teamwork, tactics and an arsenal of destructive weapons combine to shape the battlefield in your favour.

games.name: Couch Planes
games.description: Couch Planes is a fast-paced airborne party game where the craftiest pilot wins. Dodge missiles, grab power-ups, and race through hazard-filled maps in various game modes in chaotic local or online matches. Easy to learn, wild to master, always a blast.

games.name: Crushed in Time
games.description: Embark on an adventure with Sherlock Holmes and Dr Watson on this surprising and elastic point-and-click adventure. Grab, pull, and release to help them solve a bizarre investigation full of humor and meta-time travel!

games.name: Frozen Feathers
games.description: Frozen Feathers is a charming multiplayer game where cute penguins engage in fun snowball battles, scoring points in frosty PvP encounters.

games.name: Wildekin
games.description: Wildekin is a 3D pixel-art adventure where up to 4 friends can build, explore, survive and thrive—or at least try to before some creature tries to turn you into a light snack!

games.name: Shadows of the Deepforge
games.description: An assassin weaving through ruin, striking fast and vanishing faster. The halls test your cunning, the darkness tests your nerve. Torchlight betrays, silence protects, and every shadow is both a hiding place and a threat.

games.name: Eggson
games.description: After being captured by EGG CORP for failing to comply with them, it’s now your mission to escape their facility. Run, jump, and fight your way out in this fast-paced 3D platformer heavily inspired by KARLSON

games.name: SkyShard
games.description:
Build your island kingdom and battle other wizards in a war for the throne! A PvP auto battler taking inspiration from city builders and puzzle games.

Your island starts empty, and as you progress through the game you can spend your Mana resource to travel to distant skyshards for resources. Build up your little kingdom and fight other players with asynchronous PVP matchmaking. Can you figure out which units combine best together, and how to manage the space on your little skyshard?

games.name: Verismo
games.description: A ghost and a carnival clown plot revenge on the man who ruined their lives. An operatic tragedy set in 1920s Sicily.

games.name: Project Kepler: Delivery Included!
games.description: Project Kepler: Delivery Included! is a roguelike base-defense game where players control a lone cyborg stranded on a hostile planet. The objective is to survive waves of evolving alien creatures while managing resources, constructing automated defenses, and deploying drones for combat and support. Key features include procedurally generated runs, upgradeable drones and turrets, automation systems, daily randomized upgrades, and an ultimate fail-safe: an orbital strike to eradicate the planet.

games.name: Children of the Spring
games.description: Embark on a quest to find your missing family in a world slowly being consumed by disaster. Explore the unknown, fight dangerous enemies in real time, utilizing variety of unique equipment to your advantage. Upgrade your ship and face the dangers of a boundless ocean.

games.name: Antenna Dilemma
games.description: Antenna Dilemma is a witty point-and-click adventure game in which you follow C432632, a finicky grey cube that loves watching TV and Alfred, a sphere who discovers a new world where, surprisingly, cookies don't exist.

games.name: Jacob's Ladder
games.description: Jacob’s Ladder is a haunting first-person puzzler where YOU are the solution. Swap bodies and stack puzzle pieces to please The Maker. Question the nature of the soul and earn your humanity - before it’s too late.

games.name: Escape the Beach
games.description: A surreal first-person narrative experience. Walk along an endless tropical beach, encounter out-of-place artifacts and look for a way to escape while being guided by a soothing yet sarcastic voice who makes you ponder the meaning of your existence.

games.name: Entropy
games.description: Entropy is a tactical turn-based RPG inspired by classic JRPGs. Assemble your party of mercenaries and forge your own path towards an expedition into hell to stop the demonic incursion. Choices you make along the way will determine the fate of your world.

games.name: The Next Stop
games.description:
The Next Stop is a narrative adventure about a murder full of contradictions, where the clues don't add up and everything hides something darker. It blends point & click mechanics with the depth of a visual novel, all set in a haunting subway filled with secrets.

Eight people are on board. Eight stories. Eight hidden truths. Each stop on the train reveals a new chapter. Each carriage is a different experience. Every decision you make has consequences.

games.name: A Ragdoll Rage Game
games.description: A Ragdoll Rage Game is a physics-based rage platformer where you grab, aim, and fling a ragdoll through challenging obstacles. The game also features secret badges, unlockable cosmetics, a built-in level editor, global leaderboards, and more.

games.name: Project Evilbane
games.description: Project Evilbane is a dynamic and action-packed strategy-based experience that you can tackle solo or with friends. Switch freely between ranged and melee weapons, and customize your skills for every situation to create your own unique warrior. Your choices and teamwork will determine your victory!

games.name: Halfmoon
games.description: halfmoon is a short adventure game set in a reception office for the deceased, the final stop before the afterlife.

games.name: Rotten Survivor
games.description: Rotten Survivor is the ULTIMATE 2D top-down horde survivor game! Fight massive hordes of bizarre enemies! Upgrade your equipment, create crazy combinations between all of the different weapons and modifiers and become an unstoppable force!

games.name: Cards of the Abyss
games.description: Cards of the Abyss is a movement based roguelike deckbuilder between Slay the Spire and Dofus. Move on a grid, dodge enemy attacks, and unleash explosive card combos to explore the Abyss and uncover the secrets of a lost civilization.

games.name: Cascadou
games.description: A satisfying solitaire roguelike where you find and create cascading, exploding poker hands. Stickers, special cards and badges turn your deck into a rule-breaking machine. Will your deck crumble, or cascade to victory?

games.name: Quest & Rest: Inn Simulator
games.description: Run a cozy fantasy inn where adventurers rest, restock, and head off to glory. Assign quests, serve buff-granting ales, sell magical gear, and manage your guests—then watch their stories unfold from the comfort of your inn.

games.name: As We Unite
games.description: As We Unite is a political strategy simulation game where you play as a high-ranking Consul of a secretive cult aiming to unite the world before an impending global calamity. Instead of controlling a country, you manage agents across different nations, each run has a crisis you have to resolve!

games.name: Roguebound Pirates
games.description: Roguebound Pirates is an adventure roguelike with deep ship customization. Plunder ships, search for lost treasures and create game-breaking builds to take your place as master of the seas.

games.name: Tiny Shop
games.description: Create Your Own Cozy Shop! Decorate, manage, and sell turn your tiny shoppe into a place everyone wants to return to! Arrange furniture, stock your shelves with goods, and interact with visitors in this cozy and relaxing game.

games.name: Versalis
games.description: A fast-paced, grid-based, card-flipping tactical CCG for up to 4 players! Archetypes and team Dynamics bring powerful abilities to move, defend, swap, or reorient cards. Capture the board and flip your way to victory!

games.name: Memoirium
games.description: Memoirium is a retro soulslike set in a chaotic and crumbling realm of dreams. As a Dreamer, you must adapt to the world's odd rules and defy others like you in order to escape the strange and eclectic subconscious landscape.

games.name: Down with the Ship
games.description: Strategic auto battler where you design a heavily-armed spaceship. Draft 200+ items, outfit your hull, and unleash it in async PvP. Blend captains and factions for absurd combos and galactic domination. Roll, buy, place, pray.

games.name: Meritaton
games.description: A 2D adventure story about the daughter of a pharaoh who tries to change her predetermined destiny in the dark and mysterious Ancient Egypt.

games.name: Spaceships and Cellular Automata
games.description: Spaceships and Cellular Automata is a tower defense game set in space! Place different towers to defend your ship against the waves of aliens. The enemies are simulated based on Conway's Game of Life. Even just one of your bullets is enough to cause a destabilizing chain reaction to destroy them!

games.name: The Grand Planto Heists
games.description: The neighborhood will never be the same! Play as a raccoon obsessed with the front gardens of The Grand Planto Heights in this 3D digging adventure, dodging Animal Control with your woodland critter friends and stealing whatever you can scamper away with in your paws & jaws!

games.name: The Coma 3: Bloodlines
games.description: Welcome to the world of The Coma 3: Bloodlines. In this realm of shadows rumors and urban legends become reality, and danger lurks around every corner. If a living intruder dies here, their body will be severed from their spirit and never wake again ...

games.name: A Kingdom of Soil
games.description: A Kingdom of Soil is a pixel-art RPG set on a contested medieval frontier. Farm, hunt, and forge to survive; manage your tavern and sway allies; plot in shadows or confront rivals in the open. Every choice shapes the legend you leave behind.

games.name: Living Dead House
games.description: Living Dead House delivers a pulse pounding, classic arcade experience. Battle through waves of the undead solo or team up with a friend. Use an arsenal of weapons and survival items to outlast the night. Will you escape alive and claim your top spot on the leaderboard?

games.name: Cinema Manager Simulator
games.description: Manage and expand your own cinema. Upgrade equipment, customize interiors, schedule movies, set ticket prices, hire staff, and handle repairs to create the ultimate movie-watching experience!

games.name: Intersecta
games.description: In a nutshell, Intersecta is an intense and intuitive tactical top-down shooter with a distinct arcade feel. It blends fast, twitch-based gameplay with the intelligent use of tactics. The game has a unique audio-visual style, utilising the power of Unreal Engine 5 for a stunning 2.5D experience.

games.name: Yami Kids
games.description: Play as "The Yami Twins" and uncover the mystery behind your family's killers. Yami Kids is a tale of tragedy, familial bonds, and revenge. Face off against trainers in "Shadow Duels", and make contracts with Oni to aid you on your quest.

games.name: Cyber Cleaner Simulator
games.description: Vacuum space junk, polish derelict ships, and clear alien worlds of debris as you upgrade your high-tech cleaning gear.

games.name: Taisho Romance Theater
games.description: This is a dark and diverse romance visual novel set in 1920s Taishō-era Japan, where amnesiac actor Kotori Sakuma is pulled into long-buried secrets after a friend's mysterious death. As he becomes entangled in magic, conspiracy, and haunting blood ties, his search leads him toward a darker truth.

games.name: Blackwood's Dilemma
games.description: Step into detective Brian Storm’s shoes and unravel a grim 17th-century mystery. Interrogate villagers, gather clues, and piece together the evidence in a deduction system where every secret matters.

games.name: No Tithe for Olaf
games.description: A grimly humorous single-player tower defense roguelite set in 17th-century Norway. Defend your farm from the King’s tax collectors, build bizarre towers, and lead a farmer’s uprising as a goat-riding rebel! Upgrade your farm, manage resources, and weaponize onions in escalating rural chaos.

games.name: Sova
games.description: Descend into a surreal sci-fantasy world in this narrative-driven action roguelite, where every run reshapes your story. Sova’s expressive combat meets deeply branching dialogue and world-shifting decisions. Compose your violence, rewrite your past, and bend a crumbling realm to your will.

games.name: Cellscape
games.description: Experience life as a microbe in a dynamic, living ecosystem. Hunt bacteria, dodge hazards and predators, and divide as many times as you can!

games.name: Taste of the Wind
games.description: A simulation and RPG game with multiple endings, set in a Chinese restaurant. Play as the owner, and manage the restaurant, form bonds with characters, and explore the lively town. Uncover the secrets behind the restaurant’s mysterious downfall.

games.name: Full Moon Guildhouse Simulator
games.description:
Full Moon Guildhouse Simulator is a cozy cooking game where you serve drinks to our loyal guild members! You might even run into some familiar Vtubers!

Man our drinks bar and learn the ins and outs of each station. Each station has different equipment and drinks to master.

Our state of the art coffee station offers espressos, lattes, and americanos!

We have a wide selection of tea and boba combinations at our boba station!

Make something healthy with fruits and vegetables (or not) at our smoothie station!

games.name: Void of Lilly
games.description: Void of Lilly is an adventure in the world of the near future with JRPG elements and Bullet Hell battles! Help Ann to find her sister and uncover secrets of this world... Void of Lilly is coming on Steam for free!

games.name: Defeat the Goblin King
games.description: Gear up and leave on a Roguelike RPG expedition to the unknown, strategize your way to victory against impossible odds in turn-based combat. It's time for the tyrannical rule of the GOBLIN KING to end!

games.name: Hirotonfa's American Revolution Smuggler
games.description: A historical trading and dating sim set during the American Revolution. Manage a trade ship hauling goods between colonial ports, profit from volatile daily market swings, and navigate faction dangers, from militias to pirates, while choosing sides that affect regional quests. Along the way, romance charming colonial “state-chans” across territories like Louisiana and Quebec, blending economic strategy, risk-filled navigation, and character-driven narrative.

games.name: Red Moon Kingdom
games.description: When a group of outcasts is sent to retrieve a wondrous artifact, a fatal mistake brings chaos upon the world. Explore, solve puzzles and card battle your way through a unique medieval fantasy setting full of magic with 3 controllable characters and in stunning 4K hand-drawn visuals.

games.name: Oniria
games.description: Oniria is a first-person psychological horror game with a retro aesthetic. Explore the village by solving puzzles and evading the strange presence that haunts it. Experience Angy's present in 3D, and uncover her hidden memories in 2D.

games.name: Cutout Village
games.description: Cutout Village is a narrative, cozy, city-builder game in which you will have to build villages using simple and unique mechanics: cutting, folding and gluing. Restore the family home, revive your village and create spaces filled with fruit trees and histories to live!

games.name: Project DeepWeb: Eternal Nightmare
games.description: Project DeepWeb: Eternal Nightmare is a deep web exploration adventure — a standalone spinoff of Project DeepWeb. Inspired by Internet lore and subconscious fears, this game tells a story based on a deep and forgotten folklore. The Show’s over. Time to wake up.

games.name: Inspektor
games.description: Play as the INSPEKTOR, sent to crush a violent uprising on a dark, industrial planet. Blast through rebels and machines in a savage mix of 90s-style shooter action, neon-soaked sci-fi, and nonstop blood-soaked carnage. Retro pixels, brutal combat, zero remorse.

games.name: Night Shift: 1999
games.description: Balance work, vampirism and socialising as you explore Kings Cross, Sydney during the last year of the millennium. Keep a lid on your darkest desires and be rewarded with a deeper understanding of what it means to live again. Or don’t — no one will stop you. You’re a vampire, after all.

games.name: TrailRail
games.description: Your path taken is the key. "TrailRail" is a physics-based action puzzle game where the trajectory of your movement becomes a tangible object. Control the girl and aim to escape from the mysterious research facility.

games.name: After Hell Freezes Over
games.description: Venture into the desolate frozen wasteland in this open-world survival horror. Struggle to survive in the cold, where strange creatures roam in the darkness. Build a shelter, collect supplies, fend off unimaginable threats, and fight for survival After Hell Freezes Over.

games.name: The Endless Elegy at the Flowercape
games.description: A dark fantasy style pixel ARPG. Players will travel in a world ravaged by natural disasters and tyrannies, encountering various companions, overcoming endless sadness and despair, until they reach the end of the world called "Flower Cape".

games.name: Devoid
games.description: Devoid is an immersive journey into the medieval world of vampires who feed on human souls. You will have to put an end to their power with the help of sword and magic. Use an arsenal of tools and magical abilities on your way to defeat the most ancient evil.

games.name: Eggspedition
games.description: Enter the Eggspedition - a terrifying survival horror with dinosaurs! Play solo or team up with up to 4 players to explore unknown planets, abandoned facilities, complete missions, and make daring extractions. It’s inhabited by… dinosaurs. Furious, massive, and very much alive.

games.name: Two Realms: Whispers from the Rift
games.description: Embark on a thrilling point & click adventure to save your young brother from the dark influence of a mysterious crystal. Immerse yourself in a magical medieval world, seek your sister’s aid, forge new friendships, uncover hidden knowledge, and outwit the cunning adversaries determined to stop you.

games.name: The Lift
games.description: You are a handyman renovating a massive research facility abandoned after a mysterious incident. The Lift is an eerie first-person simulator with satisfying house-flipping gameplay, a mind-bending story, and a highly interactive world inspired by Soviet sci-fi and the SCP Foundation.

games.name: Anima Shin Gun
games.description: A Bullet Hell Rail Shooter where you get shot to survive. Engage enemies and absorb their bullets as “seconds of life” by switching to the right color frequency. Thus, surviving long enough to break the time loop you’re trapped in and complete the ENTIRE adventure before the countdown gets to zero.

games.name: Underground Security Inc
games.description: Defend your dungeon against "heroes" in this rogue-lite base defense game. Assign minions, build traps, and mine ores. All in the name of becoming the most profitable dungeon!

games.name: Lucha Chess
games.description: Assemble the ultimate team of Mexican wrestlers in this roguelike auto-battler. Combine unique units with powerful items and relics to discover hundreds of synergies while battling your way through.

games.name: Crimson Rest
games.description: Fight relentless hordes of bloodthirsty monsters and choose which room lies beyond the next door in this retro-style dungeon crawler, where death is not an option. But tread carefully, do not awaken Count Dracula, or his curse will be unleashed upon you.

games.name: Living Hell
games.description: A co-op horror where you must retrieve specimens before sunrise, as solar radiation twists animals and humans into terrifying mutations.

games.name: The Midnight Barber
games.description: A narrative ASMR adventure about a supernatural barbershop in late 70s Barcelona. Trim and style your supernatural clientele, gain their trust, and uncover their darkest secrets.

games.name: Arkheron
games.description: In this fast-paced, dynamic PvP game from Bonfire Studios, teams of three battle to ascend a mysterious Tower built from fragments of their life before. Here, items are the heroes - each one imbued with powerful abilities that shape how you fight, adapt, and outplay other teams. Build your strategy and identity on the fly by looting and combining items in real time, creating unique builds throughout every match. What you choose to carry defines not only what you can do, but who you can become.

games.name: Cutting Edge: Roots of Mutation
games.description: Perform life-saving operations in this fast-paced surgery sim. As lizard surgeon Dr. Peri Maddock, you'll treat injuries, excise tumors, and hack corporate organs with speedy, surgical precision. The patient's life is in your claws!

games.name: Space Cat Solitaire
games.description:
Space Cat Solitaire is a euphoric and satisfying puzzle card game adventure. With cats.

Stack, organize and pros-purr! Hone your puzzling skills as you create epic combos, beat your high score and find your fortune among the stars! Use your wits & your winnings to unlock customizations, trophies, and elite story-driven missions featuring the eccentric locals of the Whiskerfang Expanse.

games.name: Tokatonton: One-Armed Blacksmith
games.description: Tokatonton: One-Armed Blacksmith is a medieval forge management sim. Craft unique weapons, satisfy demanding customers, or take risky deals for profit. Rebuild a crumbling forge with two struggling blacksmiths.

games.name: Pain Pain Go Away!
games.description: Pain Pain Go Away! is a therapeutic typing adventure where you dive into the heart of a troubled girl and type away the trauma that’s consuming her.

games.name: Imitation
games.description: A choice-driven adventure where you play as a young girl in a world where immortality is the norm. In this world, immortal humans are referred to as "Players." Your choices affect Stress and Affinity. Through multiple playthroughs, get closer to the hidden truths and endings.

games.name: Blokes on Blocks!
games.description: BLOKES on BLOCKS is a casual party game where you push your friends around. With simple controls this game is easy to pick up and play, suitable for everyone. Your actions happen just by moving around. Timing is everything so predict your blokes' next moves and knock them off their blocks!

games.name: Delivery Issues
games.description: Delivery Issues is a side-scrolling package-throwing time-attack action-platformer that tests your package delivery skills against a zany world of characters and events that just happen to make an easy job... difficult.

games.name: Spark! Photon Blast
games.description: "SPARK! -PHOTON BLAST-" is a sports action game where players face off in a futuristic stadium, rendered with stunningly beautiful photorealistic graphics. Your goal is to score by launching a sphere into your opponent's goal. Enjoy the heart-pounding, high-octane action where every second counts!

games.name: In Harness
games.description: IN HARNESS is an online co-op 3D jumping game for 1–10 players. With simple move and jump controls, pets team up to clear tough stages and reunite with a girl in heaven, bringing the warm “Helper’s High” of saving friends.

games.name: Cozy Forest
games.description: Restore a sleepy forest with adorable animals. Explore, craft, and decorate a cottage-core haven at your own rhythm—no timers, no hassle. Progress continues while you’re away!

games.name: The Dowsing
games.description: You have entered a sealed gold mine, dreaming of a fortune. All you can rely on is your dowsing rod. Is it gold that lies beyond your reaction, or is it......?

games.name: Over the Radio
games.description: Local co-op game about flying a plane. One player is the pilot, the other the navigator. The pilot has no map. The navigator guides the pilot using only words. Work together to reach your goal in a remixable national park map.

games.name: Zozo and the Lost Dreams
games.description: Help Zozo find his way home in this cartoon-inspired Metroidvania platformer. Pillow-fight sentient pastries, train under an octopus master, and brave a cybernetic jungle as you explore the vibrant landscapes of Zozo's dreams.

games.name: Trick Eight
games.description: On a remote village shrouded in bloody tradition, a centuries-old ritual endures. You are a detective with unique skills, yet branded as a traitor. Will you surrender your limbs to ascend like an immortal? Or risk everything at the edge of science and plunge into the abyss of truth?

games.name: Captain Corgi: Planetary Problem Solver
games.description: Mr Wolf is up to no good and Lil Red might be in trouble! It's up to Captain Corgi to investigate and figure out what's really going on.

games.name: Surface Labyrinth Kurumabu
games.description: Neo-2D Action Puzzle Game !

games.name: I Saw a Flying Saucer
games.description: An interactive fiction about a man who lost his wife and goes in search of a UFO that shouldn't exist.

games.name: Crude Oil
games.description: Escape your captors as a puddle of petroleum on the run from Big Oil. Collect more oil to grow big and juicy. Bounce and slide. Operate heavy machinery. Flush polluters down the drain.

games.name: Manaftory
games.description: Collect resources, build machines, and automate everything. Explore magical lands, face hostile creatures, and turn their loot into part of your factory system. This is your Manaftory — a magical factory powered by mana.

games.name: Mr Toilet
games.description: Your toilet - your rules. Clean, charge fees, kick out freeloaders. Turn a filthy restroom into a royal, automated empire in an absurd simulator!

games.name: Rite of the Dealer
games.description: Rite of the Dealer is a roguelike multi-deckbuilder where you guide charming rat companions through a peculiar, otherworldly hotel.

games.name: Still Stars Echo
games.description: An atmospheric science-fiction journey across distant alien landscapes. Traverse monolithic structures, solve intricate puzzles, and uncover the story of a lost civilization written among the stars.

games.name: Hoptale
games.description: 《Hoptale》 is a casual and strategic Rougelite game that combines slot machines with combat. Players will use the slot machine to determine the character's next behavior, the damage caused to monsters, and the loot obtained!

games.name: Aerocube
games.description: AEROCUBE is a Ski-Fi Roguelike + First-Person Boomer Shooter in a huge mysterious cube that always rotates randomly. Each room of AEROCUBE is different, but one thing stays the same: something’s always behind you, ready to kill.

games.name: D-topia
games.description: Step into the world of D-topia in this gentle-paced puzzle adventure. In D-topia, life is curated by artificial intelligence to maximize happiness. As the newest Facilitator, its up to you to solve puzzles to keep the D-topia residents happy and the facility running.

games.name: Demi and the Fractured Dream
games.description: In this action adventure, play as Demi and venture through the wondrous world of Somnus. Tasked by a mysterious voice, you must destroy the legendary Accursed Beasts to save the world. Use your attacks and abilities to slay enemies, solve puzzles, and uncover the truth behind an ancient history.

games.name: Unshine Arcade
games.description: An arcade full of secrets, a sentient virtual pet in the prize cabinet, a stealth shooter roguelite arcade machine and one way to escape: win tickets.

games.name: Chronoscript: The Endless End
games.description: Chronoscript: The Endless End is an exploration-based action-adventure game where you, an editor trapped within a manuscript, must unravel a thousand-year story that writes itself beyond its endacross 2D pages and a 3D manor.

games.name: External
games.description: RPG extraction-shooter in a post-apocalyptic setting. Survive in the ruins of the old world, loot gear, level up skills, improve your equipment and shelter. Fight various factions, or complete missions to become their ally.

games.name: Despa
games.description: DESPA is a fast-paced multiplayer arena shooter built for after-work warriors with more bills than free hours. Neon kill-boxes, railguns, and carbon katanas meet a five-second respawn loop, so every death flips into revenge before your coffee cools.

games.name: Thesis of Love
games.description: During the endless summer in Chishima, you join a graduate program hoping to become worthy of your crush. Little do you know what awaits... In this otome dating sim, experience campus life with three lab members trapped in toxic relationships. Your choices may lead them to new paths.

games.name: The Darkness Delivers
games.description: A haunting horror story set in an isolated abbey. Jeanne, a naïve young nun, struggles to save her lover, the angelic Sister Séraphine, from a wasting disease which has ravaged their home - but what is Jeanne prepared to sacrifice for Séraphine's sake?

games.name: Soft(A)ware
games.description: Soft(A)ware is a surreal puzzle-platformer set inside a vast, hostile system. You awaken in a virtual world that functions as a prison — a place designed to limit, to control, to erase any trace of freedom.

games.name: Lootbane
games.description: Lootbane is a roguelite RPG about risk, reward, and loot-fueled power. Explore changing regions, build synergistic warbands, push deeper into dungeons for legendary treasure, and lose it all to your insatiable greed

games.name: Joey The Duck
games.description:
Joey The Duck is a linear, open level type platformer game.

Join Joey as he explores different locations within one large, diverse level.

Don't be fooled by his cuteness - Joey is a materialistic, money-driven duck who embarks on a risky journey through the Forbidden Lands in search of a treasure that may not even exist.

There's no main menu, no world map, no hub world - Joey keeps moving forward without pause to get his feathers on that so-called mythical treasure.

The game features minimalist pixel-art style, with the option to switch between light and dark modes, as well as effects like CRT TV simulation and Black and White mode. These effects can even be combined for an extra retro vibe.

Collect coins, jump on enemies, interact with the environment, and get that legendary treasure!

Key Features:

One big level, zero interruptions - no main menu, no world map, just go!

Light Mode and Dark Mode - switch the style anytime!

Optional effects - play with CRT TV or Black and White effects, or even combine them!

Minimalist pixel art - cute and colorful!

Play as Joey - He's greedy, he's cute and he's cool!

games.name: Interrogator 2
games.description: You work as a detective specialized in the art of interrogation. You're given cases to solve and people to interrogate, together with your loyal partner, Charles. Interaction with other entities is based on written or spoken words.

games.name: Advent Arena
games.description: A PvP card-game/tower-defense hybrid.

games.name: Demondemon Demon Tamer
games.description: Demondemon Demon Tamer combines swarm-survivor and monster raising. Manage, take care, and train your demons during the day. Survive the swarm of attacking demons at night. Raise your reputation among three factions of demon tamers, and unravel their hidden motives in this doomed city, Laknakarta.

games.name: The Name of the Night
games.description: We were completely different, but back then we were both obsessed with the same thing in the same place... “The Name of the Night” is a text-based adventure game that explores the arcade music game culture of 2000 through the story of two girls' delicate emotions.

games.name: Cursed Memory
games.description: A psychological dark fantasy visual novel with turn-based combat. Unravel the mystery of a curse that erases memories and transforms people into demons.

games.name: Forever-Happy-Town
