games.description: A PvE multiplayer shooter where a prophecy of eight endless nights is rapidly approaching, are you good enough to keep the town forever happy? You'd better be, else a herd of lovely rabbits will require rapid relocation.

games.name: Penance
games.description: Immerse yourself in the unsettling atmosphere of Penance, a mystery adventure where every step in your search for the truth brings you closer to the abyss. Explore a gloomy monastery and unearth ancient secrets that will test the fragile duality between your guilt and your faith.

games.name: Minos
games.description: Minos is a maze-building roguelite where you, the fabled Minotaur, must defend your sanctuary from bloodthirsty adventurers. Design and re-design deadly labyrinths, set traps, and turn every brave fool into your next victim.

games.name: BrokenLore: Don't Lie
games.description: BrokenLore: DON'T LIE is psychological horror spin-off of DON’T WATCH, where lies, medication and fragile bonds blur the line between reality and nightmare.

games.name: Parasite Mutant
games.description: Parasite Mutant is a science-fiction horror RPG set in the distant future. Psionic agent Nova was sent on a mission to an abandoned and secluded island city filled with horrifying creatures, not knowing that what happened on the island will completely change her fate.

games.name: Join Us
games.description: Lead a cult and prepare for the end of the world in Join Us, the upcoming co-op, open-world survival experience. Ride bears, build up your perfect base, and prepare for the apocalypse.

games.name: They Come in Fives
games.description:
A story-rich collectible card game with a dark, horror-tinged atmosphere, set in a world where urban legends turn into devilish contracts.

Play as the Reaper on Lucifer’s payroll. Hand over souls, keep bodies, and build an army to overthrow the boss. Unravel urban legends and fight the hidden world government.

games.name: Curse of the Abyss
games.description: Curse of the Abyss is a Traditional Roguelike with a twist. Manage your resources and explore the abyss and slay the various Guardians of the Abyss and remove the curses.

games.name: Hardkill System
games.description: Take control of a powerful mech, scavenge for different weapons and upgrades, and complete missions to help the last humans recover from the AI apocalypse in this top-down real-time tactical action-roguelite.

games.name: Daibadestructor
games.description: Become a minion of a nefarious corporation and jump into the sea from Odaiba to destroy an underwater base in this easy-to-play retro-style FPS.

games.name: Deep Siren
games.description: Deep Siren is a Lovecraftian WWII horror fairytale. When the lone survivor of the USS Siren discovers a mermaid while adrift at sea, he finds himself plunged into a world of supernatural horror fathoms beneath the surface. Utilize unique gameplay mechanics as Alex battles to hold on to his sanity.

games.name: Odds Chronicles
games.description: A tactical roguelite RPG where every roll matters. Fight on a strategic grid, shape your hero’s path through dice-driven choices, and uncover a story-rich world inspired by tabletop adventures.

games.name: The Bold Bogey
games.description: The Bold Bogey is a 3D golf adventure that combines open exploration with satisfying platforming. Explore a vast world filled with dungeons to dive into, bosses to fight, and new ways to upgrade your ball in a golf game unlike any other. Do you have what it takes to become the Boldest Bogey?

games.name: Turnip Rush
games.description: In our new Party Game Turnip Rush, face your friends up to 4 players ! Forget the static board game for a dynamic and exciting gameplay ! Grow as much turnips as you can and prevent your friends of doing so by any means ( yes, this include exploding them)

games.name: Hazard Levels
games.description: The deeper the rift, the stranger it gets. Just make it back before last orders. Hazard Levels is a brand new co-op survival horror from the team behind Sker Ritual.

games.name: Now Hiring
games.description: Now Hiring is a top-down narrative adventure where you play a job seeker trapped in a scam syndicate. Across 21 days, your choices in dialogue battles and moral dilemmas will shape your fate, reveal human struggles, and lead to multiple endings.

games.name: Kingdom of Foundry
games.description: Kingdom of Foundry is a pixel-style tower defense meat pigeon game. In the game, you will play as the king of a city-state, and ensure the safety and stability of the city-state by dealing with different events in each battle and recruiting different types of soldiers to repel waves of demons.

games.name: Erebus-9
games.description: Erebus-9 is an immersive first-person psychological horror. Explore the derelict space station, solve puzzles, and run from the horrors that reside onboard. As you descend deeper into the station, uncover its dark secrets and the tragedy that unfolded.

games.name: The Everything Building
games.description: Press up and down, elevator goes brrr! Deliver customers to the correct floor and max your score. Serve many customers including but not limited to surfers, astronauts, cars, ghosts, cheerleaders, horses, and cheerleader horses. 1-2 players! 50 different floors! HORSE MODE included!

games.name: Steel Artery: Train City Builder
games.description: Build a living city on rails in this steampunk fantasy train-city builder. Manage multiracial colonies with thousands of autonomous citizens, balance their needs, manage the economy, and create logistics as you explore distant regions to ensure the prosperity of your Empire.

games.name: Cyte
games.description: Blaze your path as CYTE, a being created to guard the flow of time, as you dash and slam your way through a mysterious enemy’s mechanical army in this first person 3d action game. Fight through a unique science fiction world in the perfect blend of intense combat and lightning-fast movement.

games.name: Trickshotterz
games.description: SCORE IN THE TOP OF THE CUP. Pick abilities, grab wild powerups, and pull off absurd trickshots that hit harder the crazier they are. Play with up to 4 players locally, online, or hop into public matchmaking.

games.name: Slingbox
games.description: Slingbox is a minimalist, physics-based 2D platformer where precision and momentum are everything. Master your dash and rope mechanics to swing, launch and race through clean abstract levels. Beat the clock, earn medals and chase perfection.

games.name: Duck Norris Tales
games.description: Duck Norris Tales is a run and gun action game heavily focused on boss battles. Play as a brave duck saving the world from an alien invasion. Make friends, discover secrets, wield face melting weapons and most of all shoot first and ask questions later.

games.name: United Heist: Facility Zero
games.description: Work together in separate locations, each filled with unique puzzles that only your partner can help solve. Every move depends on sharp communication through in-game voice chat. Can you crack the code and escape before time runs out?

games.name: Black Jacket
games.description: The blackjack-inspired rogue-lite deck builder where you gamble your way out of hell, supercharge your deck and play impossible combos.

games.name: Shepherd Knight
games.description: Shepherd Knight is an adventure game where you must guide your flock of sheep, with your faithful dog by your side, through a world infested with dragons, wolves, and other dangers.

games.name: Channel 51
games.description: A first-person psychological horror thriller. Explore glitched channels, solve puzzles with your remote, and uncover clues about your missing son. Retro sitcoms, post-apocalyptic landscapes, and haunted mansions draw you into a tense, immersive narrative.

games.name: Divine Tactics
games.description: Lead your team of divine allies to victory in this roguelike autobattler. Position your units, unleash their unique powers, and outsmart rivals in this asynchronous multiplayer competition.

games.name: Reng Azure Requiem
games.description: Face the soul guardians in your quest for the 7 master keys in this pixel art Action RPG. Evolve your abilities and rely on the help of your protector raven to explore and fulfill this purpose in the grim world of Tartarius.

games.name: Installation 19
games.description: Alex Carter, part of The Abducted UFO group, acts on a tip about nighttime sightings. Unknowingly, he wanders into a top-secret military base, triggering a suspenseful journey.

games.name: Potat
games.description: Potat is a quirky, physics-based 3D adventure where you play as a sentient potato trying to escape a house before you get cooked alive. Roll, flip, and flop your way through a bizarre home filled with deadly traps, chaotic layouts, and unexpected obstacles.

games.name: Through Hell and Back
games.description: Through Hell and Back is a timeline based roguelike deckbuilding game. Place your spells on the Timeline to outsmart your enemies. Choose your power ups carefully, trade spells and upgrade the Timeline to unleash devastating combos.

games.name: Solnest
games.description:
Solnest is a relaxing cat-finding adventure set in peaceful, sunlit, solarpunk-themed rooms. Explore all cozy levels to discover hidden cats in a beautifully drawn world.
500+ hidden cats to find across detailed scenes. 11 cozy rooms to explore, each bursting with solarpunk personality.

games.name: Silence of Elven Mage Rin
games.description: A puzzle game featuring a beautiful elven sorceress.

games.name: Cosmic Composer
games.description: Casual puzzle game on a cosmic scale. Build stars, planets and other cosmic objects. Evolve your cosmos using abilities of the stars from stellar winds to supernova.

games.name: Condemned to Clean
games.description: You are a cleaner not by choice, but by necessity. A single-player eco-activist simulator that aims to bring life back to an old beach in a provincial town. Explore abandoned embankments and courtyards, collect rubbish, sort resources, and uncover the history of this forgotten place.

games.name: Re:Curse
games.description: A time-travel mystery visual novel about found-family, connections, and hope in dark times.

games.name: Deathplane
games.description: Deathplane is a 2D puzzle-platformer game about moving the actual deathplane below the level up and down to kill enemies and find solutions and secrets.

games.name: The Depths of Duskraven Manor
games.description: Follow the exploits of five fugitives as they fight their way through the horrors that lurk under Duskraven Manor. With the promises of a clean slate, wealth and freedom from the pasts that haunt them, they fight through unimaginable terror while uncovering a reality-shattering mystery.

games.name: Gingerbread Holiday
games.description: Learn to love a broken Holiday through romance. Build a gingerbread house as you form your new home.

games.name: Mowit: Grass Cutting Simulator
games.description: Mowing lawns has never been this much fun! Relax with your friends in online co-op, upgrade your equipment, shape beautiful gardens, and enjoy the experience. Join the fun with 1-4 player co-op!

games.name: Teach My Little Sister How to Drive
games.description: Your sister's first driving lesson! If you fail to teach her properly as an older brother, your survival cannot be guaranteed. Will you be able to survive safely until the end?

games.name: Malleus Maleficarum
games.description: A Metroidvania inspired by the mechanics and style of classic games in the genre. Help Mirabel find different ways to explore a haunted mansion and hunt terrifying witches while gaining new weapons and discovering more about the macabre experiments carried out by demonic beings.

games.name: Beer Manufacture Simulator
games.description: Brew your own beer from scratch! Take on the role of a brewmaster, learn brewing techniques, create unique recipes, and grow your craft brewery into a full-scale factory. Expand your brewery from mashing and fermenting to bottling and selling - every decision shapes your beer empire

games.name: Face Interrogation
games.description: Become the detective. Try and outsmart the killer by picking the right way forward. It's up to you to figure out clues, takes notes, then use your Command Computer to unlock and confirm core behaviors in the subject. Once you understand him, you may solve the case. Or you might just end the world.

games.name: MeowPower!Yachiyo
games.description: A casual side-scrolling beat em up where you play as a catgirl and join forces with cats to defeat enemies.

games.name: Omertà: Mafia Novel
games.description: Noir visual novel set in 1950s New York. Infiltrate a prison, build a smuggling network, and shape fates through tough choices across branching paths.

games.name: Metro Rivals: New York
games.description: Reputation is paramount; strategy is key, and all-out speed can make or break everything. Welcome to Metro Rivals—a genre-defying subway simcade game where you battle Track Titans in solo play or clash with friends in fierce PvP.

games.name: Pet Street Story
games.description: Jinyu, also known as Xiaoli, worked on Pet Street to repay her owner's debt as a way of expressing gratitude for the owner's life-saving kindness. During this time, she made various friends and experienced unusual events. As she matured, Jinyu decided to revive the increasingly depressed Pet Street.

games.name: Lóng Shén de Xīnniáng Wàizhuàn: Yù Líng Qǐ Tán
games.description: A Japanese-style fantasy x fairy-tale narrative adventure ADV, telling the story of an unnamed god and a wandering miko…

games.name: The Rainy Night
games.description: On a rainy night, it's all up to you whether to show love or be cruel.

games.name: Shū Liàn Yǔ Jūn: Xiānzǐ Xiàn
games.description: A vibrant, white-haired beauty, but her true identity is actually a timid, short-haired, glasses-wearing girl?! I'm still dating her! A 200% sweet college romance! Dates, hand-holding, hugs, kisses, and marriage after graduation!

games.name: Residuum
games.description: RESIDUUM is a first-person psychological horror game set in a decaying research facility. With only a dwindling flashlight and faulty heartbeat sensor, manage power, seek answers, and escape what hides in the dark.

games.name: Decay of Worlds
games.description: A tactical fantasy defense game with RPG elements: Deploy powerful units, wield magic, and lead a band of heroes through dark missions filled with meaningful choices.

games.name: Brass Rain
games.description: Fight iconic battles of World War II in Brass Rain. Choose your side and take part in crew-based combats as infantry, tank crews, bomber gunners, or naval teams. Support your Brothers and shape the course of history.

games.name: Ashen Vow
games.description: You are a knight sworn to God’s word, wielding only a sword against the darkness. But not all believers walk in good faith. The Black Maw has sunk its claws into the misguided, twisting their devotion into madness. Explore a once familiar castle now warped by evil, and cut down the corrupted horde

games.name: Contact Protocol
games.description:
Contact Protocol is a starship job simulator taking place in a gritty, cassette-future. Humanity has spread throughout the solar system and started extracting its natural resources.

You play as the security officer aboard PALE HORSE - a Galileo Corporation vessel carrying miners set for Ganymede, Jupiter's biggest moon. It’s your job to assess the intentions of approaching ships, decide their fate, and keep your crew alive. The company is watching.

games.name: The Man Who Walked
games.description: The Man Who Walked invites you to solve relaxing puzzles by switching between two worlds: in 2D you rearrange the environment, in 3D you explore it. Only by combining both perspectives will you uncover the end of the story.

games.name: Wrecking Wave
games.description: Wrecking Wave is an explosive action game with physics-based destruction focused on Challenge and Speedrun. Unleash a wave of chaos and smash cities, chase high scores and stop a mad scientist from polluting your ocean with toxic waste.

games.name: Cyan Heart
games.description: A horror exploration puzzle adventure where you relive events through a selfie viewpoint. Alone, with only voice communication from comrades as support, she simply keeps the camera rolling. Witness the record she wished to leave behind.

games.name: Brownie's Adventure: The Final Resolution
games.description: A traditional yet wildly unique 1990s-style Point & Click adventure. Journey through a realm of rich fantasy—and, er... the midlands—as you fumble your way toward saving both worlds from almost-certain doom! Make choices, solve puzzles and enjoy a hilarious final chapter to the Brownie universe!

games.name: No Exit
games.description: No Exit is a small chapter based indie horror game. You'll have to face challenging enemies, and perhaps make some allies, as you try to escape the crooked dimension you're trapped in.

games.name: DreamEcho
games.description: Dream Echo is an RogueLite ARPG game where players can explore the world of Dreams and acquire various Concepts to engage in nearly completely free-form combination battles. Additionally, you can gather Memories upon waking, allowing you to bring some Concepts into your next dream adventure...

games.name: Arinoa: Conquest
games.description: Arinoa: Conquest is a real time grand strategy game with a focus on hero units, and combines elements of strategy, resource management, and light RPG mechanics. Gather resources, build your army, and conquer your enemies within the harsh world of Arinoa.

games.name: Letter From Heart Antique Shop
games.description: A story about a girl who finds herself in a mysterious antique store where letters with screaming human hearts appear.

games.name: Ashbound Expanse
games.description: This is a fast-paced first-person and third-person shooter that blends roguelike elements, offering easy-to-learn mechanics, satisfying controls, and intense gunplay. Combined with highly immersive visuals, it delivers a thrilling and exhilarating shooting experience.

games.name: Runic Tower
games.description: Stand as the last guardian of the god-bound Runic Tower in a groundbreaking 3rd-person roguelike tower defense experience. Command evolving powers, confront relentless invading factions, and utilize strategic planning to overcome your foes!

games.name: Kinap
games.description: A pixel art action roguelite where you defeat enemies to transform into them, gaining their abilities in fast-paced, strategic, and intense combat.

games.name: PooPig
games.description: Shoot, dodge, and chase your acorns in this absurd, cartoon-style Bullethell filled with humor and visual gags.

games.name: Tower Tactics 2
games.description: The fusion of deck-building roguelike and tower defense returns, bigger than ever! Build your deck with powerful new cards, unlock unique trinkets, and deploy enhanced towers to overcome relentless waves of enemies and new strategic challenges.

games.name: Gladiators of Roma Revixit
games.description: Gladiators of Roma Revixit is a unique, story-driven roguelike, set in world in which, after the nuclear fallout, a new Rome and thus a new colosseum rises from the radioactive-ashes. Rise the ranks, enjoy the celebrity of being a Gladiator, and make decisions that impact the story.

games.name: Project Obscure
games.description: Solve the physics-based puzzles in a steampunk atmosphere "Enlighten" dark mysteries of an old facility. Delve into a unique experience and KEEP YOUR LIGHT ON.

games.name: Spider Hotel
games.description: Run, hide, survive in SPIDER HOTEL—an asymmetrical 1v4 chase. Hunt as the wall-crawling Spider or cooperate as the Insects to rescue allies and escape. Traps & abilities decide who gets cocooned.

games.name: Spooky Monster
games.description: The story is about a young woman who has been forcibly taken by a demon to another world, crawling with various monsters: zombies, ghosts, vampires, fairies. Now she must coexist with them until she can return home.

games.name: Medetashi Medetashi
games.description: Play the role of an ordinary main character in the story—a nameless cat. He journeys through the pages of the book in search of the heroine's secret.

games.name: Type Ride
games.description: "Type Ride" is a typing-based tower defense game where you summon units by typing. In a world overrun by ink lifeforms, the protagonist—once known as the "Type Rider" for her high-speed typing skills while riding a motorcycle—decides to ride her beloved bike once again to resolve the chaos.

games.name: One With the Unicycleverse
games.description: A precision platformer where you maneuver and weave your unicycle through hundreds of dastardly obstacles across dozens of levels and side modes. Upon mastering the controls; the game becomes a meditative experience and you will discover what it means to be ‘One with the Unicycleverse.’

games.name: Soulscape 2: Fragments of the Present
games.description: Soulscape 2 is a Turn-based RPG set in the dystopian near future. Featuring an isometric exploration, party-based combat, and a branching dialogue that is shaped by your choices in the game.

games.name: Operation Purge
games.description: Operation Purge is a story-driven sci-fi survival game set on Titan, Saturn’s mysterious moon. Explore the terrain, manage limited resources, and uncover the secrets hidden beneath the surface. Will you survive long enough to find the truth?

games.name: Secret of Havendor
games.description: Survive the shadows of your past. Forge your path in a world where blood and targets are currency. Will you cling to your humanity or become the monster they see?

games.name: GrappleBurger
games.description: GrappleBurger is a high-management cooking game where multitasking is the only way to get your orders out. Master the chaos of the kitchen as you fry, blend, grill, and craft your way up the leaderboards! Do you have what it takes to be a top chef?

games.name: Zombie Typing
games.description: Zombie Typing is a tense survival game where every action: moving, looting, reloading, and fighting off the undead, relies on your typing skills. Type fast and stay sharp, because one wrong key could mean the difference between survival and being devoured!

games.name: Cairn: Stone Towers
games.description: Build balance, one stone at a time. Stack stones into tranquil cairns in this meditative physics-based puzzle game. Explore serene landscapes, master gravity and patience, and create harmony through careful placement. No timers. No stress. Just you and the stones.

games.name: B-Ricky High School
games.description: Meet Ricky in this exciting arcade game mixing flipper, brick smashing and fight. Get ready for the challenges of Arcade or Story mode and for the tough ones, settle the score in the double 2-player mode.

games.name: RabbitHole Island: Turn-based Vtuber Battles
games.description: Turn-based battles against powerful vtubers. Free to Play!

games.name: Wonder Warp
games.description: An Alien Threat Has Emerged in the City of Cynosure! Run and gun through a series of mazes to defeat the monsters.

games.name: The Demon's Apple: Otome Game
games.description: The Demon's Apple is a Dark Fantasy otome game with mature content. Pomme, a herbalist as to make an alliance with a bloodthirsty demon she saved to survive in a world hostile to both. Play as Pomme who has to learn to live under the same roof as the demon who wants her blood and more.

games.name: Someone's Inside Me
games.description: Your teacher Ms. Morbid has trapped you and your classmates on a deadly multiplayer field trip inside a human body! With proximity chat, two teams must scavenge, sabotage, and outwit each other to see who escapes first.

games.name: Down Forward
games.description: A fast-paced roguelike FPS where you survive shifting liminal nightmares and VHS-era horrors.

games.name: Innerwhy
games.description: You just dissociated from reality. Unfortunately, the imaginary world you've landed in is as disturbed as your mental state. Gather your courage and confront your darkest thoughts in this 8-bit psychological horror RPG.

games.name: Dice x Deck
games.description: Based on backgammon, players gain buffs that amplify the effects of the squares. Deck-building roguelike-like play experience.

games.name: Human Planet
games.description: 500,000 years ago in the Stone Age, explore uncharted lands in search of a settlement. Survive hunger and predators armed with only crude weapons and your wits.

games.name: Genesis Relic: Idle Sandbox Simulator
games.description: A sandbox idle management sim: pick the preset worlds “Three-Kingdoms Conquest” “The Golden Lotus” or “Famine Legend” then build and govern your own realm. The in-game editor lets you customize development rules, characters and plots, export your world, or load and share creations with others.

games.name: Cairns
games.description: Balance. Patience. Perfection. Cairns is the quintessential Stone Stacking game. Experience diverse and atmospheric environments, and master the art of building the freestanding stone towers know as Cairns.

games.name: Hunkfrat
games.description: Hunkfrat is a fast-paced first-person shooter where you try to get your almighty frat beverages in the most sarcastic and entertaining way.

games.name: Nonetbeat
games.description: NonetBeat is a TPS action game starring three charming heroines. Each with unique combat styles, they obliterate hordes of monsters with magic! Sandbox stages let you destroy terrain for dynamic battles. Collect magic and unleash dazzling combos in thrilling hack-and-slash action!

games.name: Chain Shotgun
games.description: Chain Shotgun is a fast paced movement shooter where your only weapon is the multi-barrelled CHAIN SHOTGUN. Two barrels are way too few! With an up-to-infinite amount of barrels, it can shoot anything from sniper rounds, rockets, slime - LEGS? Why not even load it with yourself?

games.name: Case Files: Internal Affairs
games.description: The 3rd installment in the Case Files series. An FMV murder mystery, police interrogation, detective experience.

games.name: Recurrence
games.description: "Something is broken... and it keeps repeating."A classic survival horror set in a cyberpunk world corrupted by a strange signal. Solve puzzles, face terrifying creatures, and try to escape a nightmare that seems endless

games.name: Resort Island Simulator
games.description: A world filled with tricksters, pirates, zealots, and treasures. An ocean full of danger and prize. Face dilemmas and encounters. Manage a resort in this wild world and build a thriving business. An Explorer, a Survivor a Resorter or a Trader? Forge your own path to wealth. Make Resort Prosper!

games.name: Ice River
games.description: Ice River is a point-and-click story-driven adventure game set in late 1990s in northeastern China. Players will immerge into Jiangping, which inspired by Shenyang and Changchun, gradually uncover the truth behind the disappearance of Dun’s mother.

games.name: E9uations
games.description: You are the equal sign(=). Rearrange the numbers and operators to form equation and solve the puzzle.

games.name: Tulip Season
games.description: A strategy-meets-relaxation farming sim where tulips become your paint and the field your canvas. Plan and plant each bloom in harmony to form graceful patterns across your field. Whether you tend it daily or let it flourish in idle mode, your goal is simple: create beauty worthy of a king.

games.name: Pine Creek
games.description: Something strange is happening in Pine Creek on an autumn night in ’86. Your wife has vanished without a trace. Will you find her? Explore the outskirts, solve randomized puzzles, and evade the gray aliens that stalk and attempt to abduct you in this story-rich sci-fi survival horror.

games.name: Lugal: Bronze Age Survival Game
games.description: A survival craft game with RTS elements. Build a base, become the leader of a tribe → village → city → state. Conquer neighboring settlements and become king.

games.name: Cafe Crew Simulator
games.description: Craft coffee masterpieces, grow your dream café, and sabotage the competition in style! Coffee's hot, competition's hotter!

games.name: Sherpa's Caravan
games.description: Explore a cozy open world as a sherpa driver in your van! Deliver cargo, cook food, craft gear, and explore mountains, lakes, and hidden trails. Sail in boats and kayaks, dive underwater. Meet old friends and upgrade your van! A camping atmosphere and next-gen graphics.

games.name: Warp Marked
games.description: Warp Marked is an incremental space exploration game. Explore a mysterious uncharted dimension, navigate around its dangers, learn its secrets, and return stronger with every launch!

games.name: Plantverk: Perfectly Plantastic Plant Simulator
games.description: Create your perfect little Greenhouse with fantastic plants, fun decorations and more in this cozy idle game! Throw your harvests around and cause havoc, and then use the vacuum to clean up your mess (for profit of course). Use your well-earned money to buy decorations, unlock new plants and pots.

games.name: Abyss Lord
games.description: What awaits the young man in the future? A long and happy life next to loved ones? Losses and suffering leading to an inglorious death? The throne of the enemy of humanity? A harem of all sorts of races, from pretty goblins to graceful vampires? The one and only love until death?

games.name: The Black Bahr
games.description: The Black Bahr is a sandbox colony simulation RPG blending ocean exploration, crew management, and dynamic faction politics. Freely chart your course as a pirate, merchant, or honorable captain, shaping your destiny across the open seas.

games.name: Project Sara
games.description: A man who has lost his wife and seeks to escape loneliness and grief begins working as a firewatch in a forest. He meets a girl named Sarah and encounters strange occurrences while uncovering deep family secrets. He learns that not every voice is human and not every farewell signifies an end.

games.name: Purplearc
games.description: PURPLEARC is a platformer where you control the main character, Baty, and explore a world of night.

games.name: Polaria
games.description: Polarium is a relaxing idle game set in the serene world of Antarctica. Discover peaceful marine life, learn about polar ecosystems, and find comfort in nature. Inspired by real research, the game blends healing gameplay with subtle messages on climate and biodiversity.

games.name: Parking Garage Simulator
games.description: Build a parking business from scratch! Welcome cars as a valet, collect payments, expand your garage, and ensure security. Welcome to Parking Simulator with realistic mechanics and the chaos of city life!

games.name: Windwoven
games.description: You inherit forest edge land. Daily, till soil with your hoe grow radishes, rear chicks, bond with oddball neighbors. Spring seeds yield summer gardens; autumn's firelit pumpkins reveal woodland mysteries. Nighttime under trees, fireflies dance like starlit constellations, this is your idyllic life.

games.name: QiuQiu Town
games.description: You have come to this new world, where you will start a new life, have many options, run the farm, scale up, and become a great agriculturist. Or run a store and become a business mogul. Or ordinary life every day, if you were given the chance to do it again, what would you choose?

games.name: Spirit Vendor
games.description: I built Spirit Vendor as a solo indie dev, and I'm excited to share it with you! In this charming world, you decide how your day unfolds—run your shop, tend your fields, and care for your animals. Explore a lively village, meet unique characters, build friendships, and perhaps even find true love.

games.name: Mandate Order
games.description: Mandate Order is a strategy game set in the Warring States period. Starting from barren lands, build strongholds integrating production, defense and military functions. Manage resources and the people's will, expand your territory, counter threats, and ultimately rise to prominence amidst the chaos.

games.name: Craft. Sell. Goblin. Repeat.
games.description: Build and manage your own goblin shop! Craft unique weapons and negotiate their prices! Send out explorers in to gather resources and become the richest merchant in the kingdom!

games.name: Pakku Pony
games.description: Pakku Pony is a 2D virtual pet simulator where you raise your own pony! It’s a chill point-and-click game where you take care of your little garden, cook delicious dishes and relax with fun minigames. Oh, and don’t forget to look stylish with cosmetics and customization options!

games.name: Little Crossroads
games.description: A cozy multiplayer life sim where you build a home, explore peaceful biomes, and develop skills like fishing, mining, and bug catching—solo or with friends.

games.name: Bellochia: Love Powered by Gears
games.description: Find your first love in the kingdom of Bellochia, use your skills to talk with our 4 main protagonists, invite them to dates and live a school life in a day-by-day gameplay.

games.name: Inky's Sleep
games.description: A haunting yet enchanting 2D horror-adventure with surreal touches, led by an endearing little cat Inky. Explore dark dreams, unravel uncanny puzzles, and evade otherworldly creatures.

games.name: Frankenstein's Monster
games.description: Compete to build the perfect monster. Then unleash it to hunt your rival scientists. - Either in single player against bots, or online.

games.name: Your Forever Friend
games.description: Your Forever Friend is the solution to never feeling alone again! Play video games, listen to music together, reminisce about buried memories... And there's absolutely nothing wrong with it. NOTHING ! <3

games.name: The Nobody Woods: Lucy
games.description: The Nobody Woods: Lucy is an adventure game set in Nobody Woods, a place on the border between life and death. Escape from those who want to take Lucy's life, explore the forest, solve puzzles, and meet new friends.

games.name: Dumb Ways to Party
games.description: The worlds dumbest party game is here! Play as your favorite Bean, and go head-to-head with up to three other players to become the Dumbest of the Dumb. Will you use skill, sabotage or sheer dumb luck to win?

games.name: Brainshell
games.description: Stuck inside a nuclear missile, you are become one with the machine. A being born from flesh and steel, you live to serve one purpose: to fly towards death.

games.name: Open Robot
games.description: Third-person shooter action adventure about robots. Explore, drive cars, talk to other characters and fight your enemies to survive and complete the quest-driven story mode, or fight your way through the survivor mode!

games.name: Five More Minutes
games.description: Build your deck and strategize to defeat foes as you traverse videogame worlds. Choose between 3 unique starting genres, and combine them to create unstoppable combos! Five more minutes is a love letter to growing up with the emotional support of our best friend: videogames.

games.name: Watamari Part2: A Fake Marriage?
games.description: This is a yuri game where you as an angel of love must help guide the heroines. Do your best, little angel (you) and take care of your mistress's wellbeing!

games.name: Snug
games.description: Snug is a cozy game about packing bags just the way you like. Stack, sort, and squeeze everyday objects into oddly shaped spaces with physics, jiggling, and the satisfaction of fitting things neatly into place.

games.name: Scorched Sun
games.description: Scorched Sun is a short experience that combines top down survival horror with turn based combat. As a new initiate, delve into the depths of a monastery of the Scorched Sun order and discover the secrets within.

games.name: Descent Of Lunaris
games.description: Investigate a signal emanating from deep within the moon and fight through a dark reflection of human nature. Are you being tested, or punished for the actions of humanity? Descent of Lunaris is a classic dungeon-crawling turn-based RPG inspired by Wizardry and Shin Megami Tensei.

games.name: Ungodly
games.description: UnGodly is a dark fantasy RPG where visceral real-time combat meets collectible hero strategy. Build your roster, chain elemental powers through seamless team swapping, and forge bonds that unlock devastating synergies in a world on the edge of ruin.

games.name: It's Always Happy at Chubby's
games.description: Welcome to the night shift at Chubby’s, a 24/7 burger joint in the 90s. It's in the middle of nowhere, so you'll be mostly entirely alone. Just keep the store clean and occasionally serve the drive-thru counter. But whatever you do... always follow the rules.

games.name: Dual Fire Walled City
games.description: Dual Fire Walled City is a story-driven co-op game for two players. Featuring close friends who grew up together in the Kowloon Walled City, only to be pulled onto vastly different life paths by a twist of fate. Get ready to immerse yourself in a classic Hong Kong-style movie.

games.name: Dystopia RPG
games.description: Dystopia RPG is an 8 bit style fantasy RPG where You lost a duel to a government's shaman and ended up trapped and sealed in a Cell Phone application. Explore the Dungeons, Combat monsters, Collect and Trade Items, Glitch the game & break free.

games.name: Warhammer Survivors
games.description: Thrust into a universe of relentless war, become the embodiment of bullet hell in Warhammer Survivors, a fast-paced roguelite survivors game. Play as characters from the Warhammer 40,000 and Warhammer: Age of Sigmar universes, collect and evolve iconic weapons and destroy endless swarms of enemies.

games.name: Badass Brigade
games.description: Throw a dude at another dude! Badass Brigade is a light-hearted 2D action game where you shoot, punch, grab, and throw your foes. Take on missions where you can explore the world and uncover a wide variety of weapons and gear for new ways to fight.

games.name: Error: Ai.lien
games.description: "ERROR:Ai.lien" is a bishoujo horror adventure where she watches, learns, and slowly invades your everyday life— ordinary routines twist bit by bit, until the AI’s love transforms into madness.

games.name: No One Leaves the Field
games.description: A first-person folk horror game set on a cursed farm where the wheat shifts each time you enter. Search for your car keys, uncover the family’s dark ritual, and beware—something ancient walks between the stalks.

games.name: Be Missed and Remembered: The Letter from Mayoiga
games.description: The setting is 50 years ago, Showa 47. The protagonist, a high school student, is heading to his grandparents’ countryside home. A short trip taken during summer vacation, a yearly tradition. Spending time with his sister, peacefully interacting with the villagers, but…

games.name: RoboFarm
games.description: Build, automate, and decorate your dream farm! Deploy robot workers, unlock powerful upgrades, and watch your crops thrive while you relax, raising profits to your satisfaction. Save and share your creations, tune in with the music, and experience the world of RoboFarm.

games.name: Chill Planet
games.description: On this planet destined to perish, let's embark on the ultimate chill journey. This deck-building adventure game depicts girls traveling leisurely toward Hokkaido in a world doomed to destruction by an impending meteor strike.

games.name: Retrospect
games.description: "retrospect" is a novel game consisting of five chapters. Trace the memories of the ghosts and learn about them. That is the only mourning you can do.

games.name: Eternity Breaker
games.description: Build your class, break the cycle. A 2.5D turn-based roguelike where the skills you gain become your class.

games.name: Last Shinobi
games.description: Dive into a tactical roguelike where every decision counts. Build a unique strategy, unlock new skills and companions, and refine your synergies. Each level is a strategic puzzle to solve. No deck, minimal randomness, only strategic choices.

games.name: Bingo Betty
games.description: This ain't your average grandma's bingo! Put your bingo skills to the test in this strategic roguelite spin on the classic game as you collect items, customize cards, create combos, cash in scratch tickets, and take betty to the top!

games.name: The Loopler
games.description: The Loopler is a idle-like roguelite simulation of a car driving in loops. Pick upgrades, place gates and sit back and relax as the mesmerizing loop gets going and the dopamine hits of numbers going up fills your brain. See if you can go endless and beyond.

games.name: Within
games.description: Immerse yourself in the atmospheric world of a first-person thriller. You will face a cunning criminal. Explore locations, solve puzzles, and try to escape the nightmare. But be careful: you can become not only the hunter but also the prey.

games.name: The Diamond Adventures
games.description: The Diamond Adventures is a multi-genre, single-player adventure game packed with minigames and exploration. DanTDM is taken back through the old eras of his YouTube journey, allying with old friends and facing old foes as he makes his way through the memories into the present day.

games.name: Hop & Seek
games.description: Hop & Seek is a multiplayer egg hunt game set in a game show for Easter bunnies. You can hide eggs, seek eggs and trick your friends.

games.name: BrokenLore: Ascend
games.description: BrokenLore: Ascend is a first-person psychological horror with climbing and stealth mechanics. Follow Ren and Yui, two rooftop climbers facing a cursed tower and the terrifying Rokurokubi. The higher they climb, the closer they get to madness—and to the truth about themselves.

games.name: Veinrider
games.description: Veinrider is a short incremental game about traversing alien caves and escaping a strange planet.

games.name: The Maze
games.description: In a pitch dark maze like factory, you must avoid He, secure secret documents, and escape with only a flashlight. If He finds you, He’ll charge from the dark with an axe. Can you survive and escape?

games.name: Aberrate Inc.
games.description: Aberrate inc. is an upcoming 3D box-and-button puzzle game where the fabric of reality bends—and breaks—at your command. Harness the power to ABERRATE, splitting batteries into two coloured copies. Manipulate phased objects to solve puzzles, unlock new areas, and discover the world of Aberrate inc.!

games.name: Rizz Dungeon: Skeleton Key to My Heart
games.description: Fighting is hard, right? Let your party do it for you! Romance Monster Girls and traverse the Dungeon! Hopefully they'll all get along... right?

games.name: Triarchy
games.description: Sail your ship, explore islands, fight monsters, choose your abilities, and craft legendary gear to hunt for deadly bosses. Play Triarchy your way! Activate Boss Challenge Modes or enable Assists to suit your playstyle. Open-world, Co-op, Action Adventure (1-3 Players)

games.name: Scraps of the Machine
games.description: FPS Mech Action! Pilot a mass of steel through a single player campaign set in a desolate landscape. Target enemy armor or weapons to wear them down piece by piece, find upgrades to improve your mech or change its loadout, and survive in a world of rust and decay. Discover, Destroy, Scavenge.

games.name: Verdge
games.description: Verdge is a dynamic speedrun plaformer, where the player can decide which content is generated.

games.name: Agerasia
games.description: Eight time periods from across human history collide in a competitive bid to stop the end of the world. Go from fighting monsters to solving a murder, dating sim to escape game. Experience seven vastly different routes in a bid to solve the mystery as to why you've all been brought together.

games.name: Cocoboy
games.description: COCOBOY is a 2D puzzle platformer within a 3D retro gaming simulation. Hack an ’80s cult classic with modded abilities, decorate your bedroom with rare collectibles, and scour a 2005 gaming forum where a peculiar fandom takes root.

games.name: The Last Poem
games.description:
5 years have passed since then.
The sequel to "Christmas Tina" by the original team.
Here and now. A "Chinese" and a "Japanese" meet once more in a non-romantic encounter. At the end of the century, a journey begins—from the first (her) to the last (her)...

games.name: Iron Nest: Heavy Turret Simulator
games.description: Iron Nest is a brutal dieselpunk heavy-artillery game where you dominate the battlefield through a colossal war machine. Take map measurements based on the received coordinates, strain the hydraulics, and gunlay the cannons to unleash devastating blows ⟹ Will you obey High Command, Operator?

games.name: Faro
games.description: Faro is an immersive visual novel set on a sunless planet. Everyone tries their best to survive in these barren lands. Make your choices as you set forth into this unforgiving world.

games.name: Gothic Scythe
games.description: An high-difficulty action game where you must slip past your enemies attacks and crush them. Take back the city controlled by homunculus with your scythe.

games.name: TownsFolk
games.description: Guide your people through ruin—build, survive, and let every choice shape their fate. Rekindle the light of a forgotten world.

games.name: Spectral Report
games.description: Enter abandoned locations as Spectral Reporters to prove the existence of ghosts. But beware: sanity is fragile, and not everything you see is real. Cooperate with your team, investigate the place, take evidences, and finally prove that ghosts are real.

games.name: Imperial Bureaucracy Hero
games.description: IBH is a rich role playing game at the end of time. You're a mid-level official in a dying sci-fi regime, given the impossible task of fixing a faltering machine; explore a vast world, define your mind, flex your authority, and become a sinner or a savior in countless other stories.

games.name: Outpacked
games.description:
A scientist needs your help to pack for a conference trip, but be sure not to pack any hot items next to any meltable items, nor any liquid containers next to any electronics!

A family needs your help to pack their rucksacks for a camping trip, but the childrens' plushies are very picky about who and what they're packed near!

A rock musician needs your :-- well, you get the idea.

Outpacked is a logic puzzle game about efficiently packing items into grid-based inventories while satisfying their various constraints. Think "Tetris meets Sudoku".

games.name: Athelan Battlegrounds
games.description: Athelan Battlegrounds is a free-to-play, turn-based tactics game with no meta progression and no pay-to-win. It's a game made for players who thrive in a skill-based competitive environment. A game that promises to be easy to learn but incredibly difficult to master! Build your team of champions and engage in unique matches against players or AI!

games.name: Doomed Crew
games.description: Co-op Horror for 1-4 players. Dive into a brutal corporate environment, complete deadly objectives for your promised freedom. Trust nothing.

games.name: Shardpunk 2
games.description: The Empire may have fallen, but humanity continues the fight. Shardpunk 2 puts you in command of a human outpost in this potent mix of turn-based tactical strategy, RPG, survival and resource management as you gather your team, scavenge for resources and prepare for a new, evolving threat.

games.name: Brightfall
games.description: Lived through the Plague, did you? Now try surviving till morning on an island erased from the maps. Gather, build, and fight to keep your light alive in Brightfall - a co-op open world survival-craft roguelite where the darkness wants to swallow you whole.

games.name: Strigoi Town
games.description: Combine your potions and refine your deck to withstand waves of vampires in a Compact Deck-Refiner where every card matters. Draft your starting deck, discover powerful effects by mixing flasks and recruit allies to uncover the dark mystery threatening your home.

games.name: Armatus
games.description: ARMATUS is a third-person roguelite shooter set in the demon-infested ruins of Paris. As the last supernatural warrior of an ancient order, armed with powerful firearms and incredible celestial powers, scour the city in search of a lost gateway to heaven - the Sunless Gate.

games.name: Echo Generation 2
games.description: Embark on a sci-fi deckbuilding RPG odyssey. Gather your crew, craft powerful decks, and battle across the stars to find your way home. Deal the cards. Defy the cosmos. Embrace the adventure.

games.name: Vampire Crawlers: The Turbo Wildcard from Vampire Survivors
games.description: Deal world-ending combos and blitz through infested dungeons! Vampire Crawlers: the turbo wildcard from Vampire Survivors is a casual, turnbased deckbuilder with roguelite elements. Master the Turboturn with your own hand of cards!

games.name: The Dungeon Of Horror
games.description: A dark medieval-fantasy turn-based dungeon crawler where you try to escape the dungeon of your own creation! Place tiles, fight monster and cooperate with friends to find and destroy the pagan shaman Meir to escape this horror!

games.name: Vision Quench
games.description: An online co-op dark fantasy looter shooter set in the underbelly of a consumer goods conglomerate mega dungeon. Within its halls you will fight ancient foes and modern horrors. Can you survive long enough to make it to the top?

games.name: Quantum Quartz
games.description: Steampunk pixel-art precision platformer where you toggle platforms on and off using colored crystals. With only one active at a time, each grants a different movement ability, changing how you move and how the level works, blending high-skill platforming with spatial puzzles!

games.name: Cardaire: Eternal Aces
games.description: Get ready to crack packs and throw cards in Cardaire: Eternal Aces, a single-player collectible card RPG! Explore a unique world, hunt down powerful cards, and build the deck that'll make you a Cardaire legend.

games.name: Woman Simulator
games.description: Experience life as a woman - cleaning, cooking, laundry, and no time to rest. Full immersion into the world of everyday chaos!

games.name: Momolitos
games.description: Explore vibrant zones, collect ingredients, and feed adorable Momolitos to help them evolve into hundreds of unique forms. A cozy creature-collecting adventure that blends exploration, discovery, and the joy of caring for your own lab full of curious life.

games.name: Pop Pop Potato
games.description:
Pop Pop Potato is a rage game + 2D platformer where you blast yourself up the level with explosive corn kernels instead of jumping.

You lose control in the air, so wherever you land, that's it, even if it's the bottom of the level.

games.name: Shroomwood
games.description: Top-down bullet hell with challenging roguelike progression. Unlock and upgrade your town as you fight through procedural levels.

games.name: Beware of Dog
games.description: Beware Of Dog is a fast paced Action Adventure game with RPG elements set in eclectic insane world where our heroes grandpa Domkrat and his faithful Dog embark on their journey to buy some meat.

games.name: Lost Host
games.description:
Lost Host is a story-driven adventure puzzle game about a small toy car searching for its missing owner.
When the boy mysteriously disappears, the toy car begins a journey through the house and beyond, exploring dark rooms, hallways, foggy streets, and abandoned places while following clues to uncover what happened.

Players control the toy car as it navigates dangerous environments, solves physics-based puzzles, and interacts with objects to progress. The world is full of hazards for a tiny toy car - heights, fire, water - as well as enemies such as dogs, robotic vacuums, and hostile toy creatures.

The game combines atmospheric exploration, light horror elements, and emotional storytelling, creating a family-friendly adventure centered on mystery, discovery, and survival in a large, human-sized world.

games.name: Flap de Clap
games.description:
Take on Mount Snoepje by flapping your way up with up to three friends. Be careful not to bonk too much or you might end up at the very bottom again.
Hunt for highscores in the endless runner mode, dodging and defeating various enemies and bosses.

games.name: The Abyss Break
games.description: Hardcore first-person co-op horror extraction game. Explore the parallel worlds of the Abyss alone or with a team, gather resources, and make life-or-death decisions that will determine your survival.

games.name: Amelorn
games.description: Recruit unique units, cast powerful spells, and conquer your enemies in a 2D fantasy strategy adventure. Tackle a challenging campaign or dive into Skirmish Mode to create and customize your own battles.

games.name: Elemency Island
games.description: Elemency island is a cozy farm coop game. Plant, raise animals, sell your ressources to unlock technologies and automate your entire farm. Alone, or with your friends, come discover this island full of surprises and unknown creatures.

games.name: Alea
games.description:
Alea is a fast-paced hero arena brawler where skill, timing and strategy collide in explosive multiplayer combat. Players choose from a diverse lineup of unique heroes. Each with signature abilities, distinct roles and skills. Battle across dynamic arenas designed to reward creativity and precision.

Matches are intense and fast-flowing, encouraging clutch plays, coordinated team tactics and high-impact duels. Fight for the core objective and increase your damage, health and regeneration.

Whether jumping into quick skirmishes or mastering high-level competitive play, Alea delivers an action-packed experience where adapting on the fly is the key to victory and every fight is a chance to forge your legend.

games.name: Resequence: The Orchard
games.description: Resequence: The Orchard is an occult-horror adventure game in which school counselor Saito approaches an inexplicable phenomena through his counseling sessions with students.

games.name: Kindling Hour
games.description: A brief, atmospheric text adventure of flickering candlelight, forgotten memories, and a quiet search through the dark.

games.name: Robot Recycler Ryn
games.description: Build your own custom combat robots, piece by piece! Weld, saw, and shape metal to perfection. Lead your creations into battle as you follow Ryn in Story Mode, or craft freely in Construction Mode.

games.name: Saga & Seeker
games.description: From a consumer of stories to a creator of them. Saga & Seeker is a "storycrafting game" where you can generate endless tales with your favorite characters. The words you write become a part of the story itself in this immersive entertainment experience powered by your imagination.

games.name: The Streamer's Alt Account Labyrinth
games.description: A new collaboration by Acacia, the developers of Mahou Shoujo no Majo Saiban, and G-MODE. Explore dungeons and face a story of sickly sweetness, alt accounts, and a girl band with issues in The Streamer's Alt Account Labyrinth.

games.name: Avemary Rocket: Captain Patchwork
games.description: Join our brave captain on this action adventure in space! You'll be riding The Patchwork, a less than ideal spaceship, but enough to get away from pursuers. However, you'll be facing malfunctions, fires, enemies attacking... When it rains, it pours.

games.name: HoloVillage: Our Cozy Days
games.description: Farm, fish, mine, craft, and decorate your home in this cozy multiplayer life sim. Venture into dungeons and take on bosses outside the village for some added excitement. Share relaxing and thrilling moments alike with hololive talents as you shape your countryside life.

games.name: Wabisabi SushiDerby
games.description: Adorable sushi race at full speed in a training × racing game! Become a sushi chef, craft unique toppings, and enter your trained sushi into races. Don't forget to cheer on your sushi during the race. Win the prestigious S1 Cup championship, and become a top-tier sushi chef!

games.name: Blast Racer
games.description: "BLAST RACER" is an arcade-style bullet hell game. You’re humanity’s last hope. Drive an upgradable, transformable battle race car. Blaze through deadly tracks, dodge waves of bullets, and save the world in flames!

games.name: 4Dead
games.description: ‘4DEAD’ is a high-speed roguelike action game where you control the invincible creature “No. 42,” which dies if it doesn't consume prey within 4 seconds. Devour invaders relentlessly to survive! Keep devouring enemies within 4 seconds and save humanity from extinction with your own hands!

games.name: Flats Full of Cats
games.description: Flats Full of Cats is a cozy hidden object game where you explore adorable apartments packed with feline friends!

games.name: Poolscape
games.description: Poolscape is a retro reimagining of the Poolrooms, evoking the nostalgia of classic PSX games by immersing players in the iconic liminal space with authentic ’90s-styled visuals and atmosphere.

games.name: Jinni 2: The Ritual
games.description: JINNI 2: The Ritual is an atmospheric, high-tension horror game based on a dark Anatolian mythology tale. Are you ready to face the entity lurking in the depths of the house?

games.name: Chrono Seoul
games.description: Chrono Seoul’s unique Turn Table combat lets you use the hero’s mechanical arm and future-reading ability to predict enemy actions and respond with precise attacks, defense, and evasion. Each run offers new patterns, and at every chapter’s end, an Existence corrupted Seoul awaits.

games.name: Age After Age
games.description: Age After Age. Build a thriving settlement, shape society across multiple eras, and dominate a living world economy. Choose your path — classic history, Steampunk, Gothic, and more — in a deep city-building strategy with evolving logistics, citizen classes, diplomacy, and research.

games.name: Cafe of Roses
games.description: A lowkey, low stakes yuri story about a young woman and a mysterious maid. Who is the engimatic Magdalena, and is there more to her than meets the eye?

games.name: Rostov
games.description: You've been kidnapped and need to escape a serial killer. In this first-person horror game, you're constantly being hunted and never know when he'll find you. Grab anything you find along the way and try to survive.

games.name: Boundless Evil: Awakening
games.description: A first-person horror experience set in a desolate highlands village. Track your missing archaeologist sister, unravel her clues through exploration and puzzles, scavange for loot and face the dark force she accidentally unleashed.

games.name: Bone Fire Effigy
games.description: The horror of relationships passed. Collect old discarded things from the woods and burn them. Avoid the Effigy's fiery embrace.

games.name: The Gas Station: Graveyard Shift
games.description: Congratulations, You've been hired as the new nightshift employee at silver lake gas station. Can you survive the night?

games.name: Pingbert's Snow Ride
games.description: Slide, soar, and deliver! Join Pingbert, the upbeat penguin mail carrier, in Pingbert’s Snow Ride—a fast-paced, platformer where you'll slide down snowy slopes to deliver mail at high speed!

games.name: Pizzapocalypse 2
games.description: A 3D platformer with a pizza moveset that's accessible & engaging to all skill levels! Explore different countries, and put a stop to the evil corporation ruining Pizza!

games.name: Save My Scrap
games.description: "They mean everything to me. Please, make them whole again." An interactive visual novel puzzle game. By fixing the broken android, you may uncover the truth about your client's past.

games.name: Tome of the Damned
games.description: Tome of the Damned is a dark top-down roguelike where a cursed mage fights for freedom. Defeat castle guards, enhance weapons and spells. Enchanted weapons, elemental grimoires, ruthless bosses. Die, adapt, try again.

games.name: Serpent's Gaze
games.description: Serpent’s Gaze is a punishing 1-4 player co-op third-person action game where you fight tough enemies and relentless bosses, all while uncovering the secrets of an ancient desert.

games.name: Neath
games.description: Manipulate the turns of friend and foe alike in this Eldritch roguelike tactical RPG by the makers of Rogue Legacy. Ascend the inverted tower. Kill an indolent god. Control every "moment".

games.name: Do Crimes!
games.description: Hey, how'd you find this game?? Do Crimes is an upcoming chaotic competitive co-op extraction game where you and your friends drop onto randomized islands and cause criminal mayhem - then try to escape before you're squashed by the law...or just give each other the finger. Do Crimes! Or Don’t!

games.name: Rivage
games.description: Rivage is an immersive sci-fi puzzle adventure set aboard the A.R.E.S. space station trapped in a space phenomenon. Wake up as Miranda, forced to explore, solve intricate puzzles to unravel the fate of your missing crew.

games.name: Cave Oasis at Shylake
games.description: In this eco-futuristic farm life sim, you arrive at a moon town as the new hydroponic greenhouse farmer. Then dust storms start to appear, threatening to block the town's precious sunlight. Grow and craft supplies, build renewable energy tech, protect the wild biomes, and help your community thrive.

games.name: Dungeons of Dusk
games.description: Dungeons of DUSK is a classic turn based dungeon crawling RPG that takes place canonically between the episodes of the cult classic FPS. Are you... WORTHY?

games.name: The House of Hikmah
games.description: The House of Hikmah is a narrative-driven 3D adventure game exploring grief, legacy and the search for answers after profound loss. Solve puzzles, encounter historical scholars of the Islamic Golden Age, and uncover timeless lessons in a beautifully imagined House of Wisdom.

games.name: Springs, Eternal
games.description: Explore a mysterious hot springs in the dead of night and meet the other lost souls who are drawn to this place.

games.name: Silent Road
games.description: Drive through Japan’s suicide ring in your night-shift taxi. Pick up strange passengers, fulfill their unsettling requests and follow the silent road as their stories make each ride darker than the last.

games.name: Ultrapool
games.description: The pool bar is always open! Ultrapool is a colorful roguelike about playing pool with a bunch of wacky balls with crazy effects. Carefully craft a perfect build and get the craziest trickshots!

games.name: Blackjack Roulette
games.description: Blackjack rogue-like with a Roulette "spin". Purchase Insurance Policies with unique abilities give you the edge while taking on a larger Roulette wheels with even larger Buy-In Costs.

games.name: Rebel Infernal Path
games.description: Rebel Infernal Path is a turn-based, command-driven 3D hack-and-slash RPG. Choose from 10 classes to form a party of 4 heroes and 4 summoned monsters. Battle through dazzling dungeons and vast open fields to overthrow a tyrant. Defeat his minions, craft powerful gear, and conquer all 6 stages.

games.name: Opona
games.description: The reality TV show Popworld is a one-way ticket to pop stardom, and Mia and Noah came here to win! Fight your way through turn-based dance battles (and a whole lot of drama) in this hand-drawn idol adventure game.

games.name: Gap Year
games.description: Gap Year is a story-focused point & click adventure played through comic book panels that reconfigure as you explore Vera Novak’s one-bedroom apartment. Vera is a bright young scientist, but the arrival of an unexpected guest and a strange fixation with a cosmonaut may derail her academic pursuits.

games.name: Petunia's Purgatory
games.description: Petunia’s Purgatory is a creepy-cute, idle-farming game that lives at the bottom of your screen. Plant seeds that grow into horrifying crops, sacrifice animals for blood, and summon assistants to help you run your farm. Manage your sanity while you try to appease the Elder God!

games.name: The Queen's Quest
games.description: In this top-down adventure, you are a bee on a quest to find the legendary Flower of Life. Along the way, you'll befriend allies with powers who help you solve puzzles, battle fierce enemies and overcome epic challenges. Explore four unique worlds and unravel the hidden mysteries of this realm.

games.name: Gate Guard Simulator
games.description: Step into the boots of the castle guard. Inspect seals, expose smugglers and reveal witches. You decide who enters and who’s turned away. Will you uphold the law, or break it for your own gain?

games.name: Thrifty Business
games.description: Run your very own thrift shop in this laid-back management sim! Sort through boxes to find hidden treasures and arrange nostalgic displays of clothes, antiques, toys & more. Befriend the regulars, help with their requests and expand your store into a hub for the local community!

games.name: Find Your Words
games.description: Find your community at summer camp, one friendship at a time. Take a beat, enjoy a breath of fresh air - all while playing at the beach, strolling in the woods, and dancing with friends. This short cozy game was created by two dads, celebrating their kids’ journeys to find their voices.

games.name: ReStory
games.description: Run a quaint electronics repair shop in mid-2000s Tokyo. Grow your business by carefully restoring iconic video game consoles, cell phones, music players, and other nostalgic devices. Talk to customers, hear their stories, and see how your decisions impact both their lives and your shop.

games.name: Odd Jobs: On The Lot
games.description: A physics-powered, 1-4 player co-op set in a vibrant Australian carpark. Teammates race to complete a rotating roster of odd jobs avoiding hazards and losing wages. Manage chaos collecting stray trolleys, unloading delivery trucks, cleaning up trash, or delivering groceries directly to car boots.

games.name: Go Phish
games.description: Go Fish or go homeless. In this rogue-ish debt-builder, pay your rent by phishing a target in a supercharged version of the classic card game. Crack your victims password in a dynamic dialogue system, then use your loadout of unlockable suits and items to hack their PC and drain their savings.

games.name: A Date with Death 2: Remnants
games.description: Train, chat, and flirt your way through the Underworld in this romantic story-driven chat simulator. Create your own Grim Reaper, connect with your team through text and video calls, and decide who you are when the past no longer defines you in a sequel to A Date with Death!

games.name: Scramble Knights Royale
games.description: Welcome to Scramble Knights Royale! Compete against fellow knights in a 32-player classic-adventure battle royale. Be the last knight standing and win the favor of the princess!

games.name: FireFly
games.description: A momentum-driven 2D platforming adventure where mastering movement unlocks exploration. Leap, slide, and swing through vibrant open maps as a grounded firefly searching for family and hidden secrets.

games.name: Humanity Echo: Cyberpunk Tactical RPG
games.description:
Humanity Echo is a tactical turn-based RPG set in the rusted harbour slums of Odesa, 2044.

You play as an Engineer - not a soldier - using sabotage, environmental manipulation, and raw intellect to outsmart a corporate machine. In this high-tech, low-life world, every explosion carries physical weight and every shot leaves a unique acoustic imprint.

games.name: Virtue and a Sledgehammer
games.description: Go back to your hometown and tear it down with a sledgehammer in this narrative exploration game. Confront your past in a devastating story about feeling like you no longer belong in the place you grew up.

games.name: Astromine
games.description: Astromine is a co-op survival game about scavenging fully destructible voxel planets. Land on planets and gather enough materials to fight off alien creatures, build structures and spaceships, and conquer the solar system

games.name: Frog Sqwad
games.description: Storm The Sewers for the glory of the Swamp King! Swing, jump, catapult your friends, and eat eat EAT until you grow into a humongous Megafrog. A co-op extraction puzzle-platformer for up to 8 players. Squad up with your frog friends for a friendslop party in this slapstick physics adventure!

games.name: The Plant Shop
games.description: A cozy horror game where you craft plants for late-night customers while you manage a small plant shop. Expand your plant collection, upgrade your shop & grow your business.

games.name: Safo and The Moon Warriors
games.description: In a world where the sun no longer rises, Prince Safo must rescue his sister from Argus, a mysterious one-eyed monster. Joined by diverse companions, this adventure RPG features beautiful illustrations and a novel-like story as players uncover secrets in this sunless world.

games.name: PinKeep
games.description: PinKeep is a pinball deckbuilding roguelite – use the ball and flippers to collect resources and defeat your enemies! Place buildings from your deck on the playfield to defend your Keep. Create powerful synergies to eradicate the hordes of attacking Knights!

games.name: Fortunato
games.description: Draw a pair of aces, use them as poker hands or to eliminate your opponents? A poker roguelike battle card game. Build a deck of jokers, defeat bosses, modify cards, and conquer challenges across the ever-changing islands. At the table of four, win by chips or remaining health, your call...

games.name: Crimson Freedom
games.description: A classic RTS with modern look - Crimson Freedom is a gripping real-time strategy game featuring a thrilling campaign experience. Set on 22nd-century Mars, the game follows the epic struggle of ideologies battling for supremacy over the red planet.

games.name: Stupid Never Dies
games.description:
Set in a monster-ruled otherworldly dungeon, Stupid Never Dies puts you in control of Davy, a timid zombie living at the very bottom of monster society. Defeat enemies, level up, and collect strange items to grow stronger on your quest to bring Julia, a frozen human girl, back to life.

Steal enemy abilities, customize your undead body with bizarre upgrades, and experience fast-paced combat packed with innovation.

games.name: Ontos
games.description: A sci-fi mystery set on the repurposed moon hotel Samsara. Uncover cryptic experiments, face unsettling encounters, and piece together a mind-bending narrative. The deeper you go, the more the truth unravels as you confront the ultimate question: What is reality?

games.name: Order of the Sinking Star
games.description: From director Jonathan Blow (Braid, The Witness), Order of the Sinking Star is a narrative adventure set in a realm of magic and enigma. Solve over 1000 interconnected, hand-crafted puzzles, discover unique playable heroes, master evolving gameplay mechanics, and decipher a grand mystery.

games.name: Ace Combat 8: Wings of Theve
games.description: Soar through the skies and rise above every challenge to earn your place among the elite. Engage in intense aerial combat to dominate the battlefield with powerful weapons. Experience a breathtaking campaign filled with high-stakes missions, hard choices, and deep squad connections.

games.name: Star Wars: Galactic Racer
games.description: STAR WARS: Galactic Racer is a runs-based, high-stakes reinvention of racing born in the lawless Outer Rim. With the Empire gone and the galaxy rebuilding, The Galactic League is created: an underground, unsanctioned circuit where syndicates bankroll chaos and champions are forged.

games.name: Elevator
games.description: Embark on a journey through The Elevator. This is not a simple trip to the top. Each stop will open your eyes to the mysteries of the Elevator. What floor will it stop on? What will it show? The Elevator decides your fate now!!! From the makers of Elevator: Source comes Elevator, the sequel.

games.name: Dyadem
games.description: Become the greatest tactician in this love letter to classic handheld SRPGs. It falls to you to forge the bonds of your Prince's followers, develop their skills, and shape their strategies as you fight to reclaim your homeland and save the world.

games.name: Shibuya Sushi Master
games.description: Cyberpunk sushi master adventure

games.name: Midnight Billiards
games.description: Midnight Billiards is a turn-based roguelite game inspired by Peglin and billiards. Choose from a variety of characters and collect items to build your unique strategy. Aim carefully and make the perfect shot to defeat your opponents!

games.name: Dragon Dinner
games.description: Cute but chaotic restaurant simulator where you play as a dragon waiter in a fast-paced dining rush. Set tables, serve hungry dragons, deliver the right dishes, and keep the place clean! After each day, customize the layout of the restaurant and learn new abilities to improve.

games.name: Beandejo
games.description: BEANDEJO is an action-packed spin-gun roguelite. Enter the Old West, where the cattle roam, and drunken vegetables terrorize the local saloons. Spin your gun, time your draws, and gun them down to become the toughest sheriff in town!

games.name: Don Pepe y sus globos
games.description: Don Pepe y sus globos is a multiplayer party game where up to 4 players can duke it out... with water balloons! Reload, avoid and throw to fight - whoever's still dry at the end wins!

games.name: Stunted Gravity
games.description: Stunted Gravity is a hovercraft stunt-driving game set in a neon-dystopian future. Race, jump, and improvise lines across arenas where gravity pulls in any and every direction. Execute stunts, evade hazards, and battle enemy drones as you pilot though the interplanetary Stunted Gravity Circuit.

games.name: Morbid Mailroom
games.description: In a claymation prison for occult offenders, you are the package inspector. Search packages for hidden contraband, coded letters, and cursed objects. Balance duty, compassion, and survival as you decide what reaches the inmates and what burns in the incinerator. Your choices cannot be undone.

games.name: RadCity: a post-apocalyptic adventure
games.description: Scavenge for food and escape a dead city in a broken, post apocalyptic world. Gather enough food for 40 days and prepare for a train journey to a place of refuge. Featuring a top-down perspective and a finely crafted 3D world.

games.name: Pollinate or Die
games.description: Pollinate or Die is a fast-paced action roguelite set in the hazardous wastelands left behind by humanity. As one of the last surviving bumblebees, you alone can revive Earth's flora. Fight through swarms of enemies as you search for flowers to pollinate and bring life back to the planet.

games.name: The Boo Croo
games.description: 4-player cooperative and competitive party game with various minigames where everyone can win... and everyone can lose!

games.name: Loco: Rails & Tails
games.description: Chaotic co-op for 1-4 players! Build rails, protect the train and deliver cargo on time. Pick your favourite animal hero and embark with your friends on wild west adventure!

games.name: Feast of the Beast: Unleashed
games.description: "Top-down action and survival shooter, playable solo or cooperatively. Explore Valachia with your brother and face off against humans, lycanthropes, and rival vampire clans as you advance towards the origin of TOX-Z, the toxin that consumes the world."

games.name: Orium
games.description: Aboard your ship, exterminate the enemies of profit, exploit planets and expand the corporation’s commercial empire across the stars. Orium is a roguelite infused with streamlined 4X elements.

games.name: Pass the Fear
games.description: Pass the Fear is a roguelite bullet-hell shooter. A catastrophic Witch’s Disaster strikes without warning, and chaotic magic forms the ancient Wall of Storms. Its corruption spreads relentlessly across the island. As a demon hunter trapped within, you must find a way to escape before dawn breaks.

games.name: Nick's Recursive Videogame About Deciphering Word Puzzles to Discover Your Identity and Redefine the Universe!
games.description: A recursive word game for (mostly) clever people! Use your imagination to define things that define things that define things...in an unpredictable reality where there are NO wrong answers & your mistakes pile up (and up and up)! Playful, lighthearted, and charmingly offbeat.

games.name: Neidfyre
games.description: Neidfyre is a turn-based duel game forged in fire and steel. Step into a cursed land of no escape. Survive against those who stand in your way and fulfill your purpose.

games.name: Alien Together
games.description: As a pair or solo, test your coordination and your friendship by each controlling a thruster to steer your space car.

games.name: Foghorns Drown
games.description: Foghorns Drown is a psychological thriller where you play as a ferryman, bringing passengers across a foggy lake to a town drenched in mystery and folklore.

games.name: Fatberg
games.description: You, a lowly janitor, have been forced to go into the sewers to remove blockages that will cause a flood. But the inhabitants of this dark, slimy, stinking, writhing underworld do not like to be disturbed and will not let you leave alive.

games.name: Factory Time
games.description: 2D automation game set in a time loop. Only time anchored factories and knowledge can be carried through multiple loops, until a way to escape time is discovered. Manage factories, production, research and bonuses to reach the end. What will you carry an what will you leave to the mercy of time?

games.name: Curse Chapter: Dawnthief
games.description: Plunder all the treasure worth taking from the exotic wilderness with your band of rogues. Jump, kick and sling your chain mace to smash and climb your way through any obstacle. Face off against beasts and hopeful heroes that rise up to stop you.

games.name: Trees Hate You
games.description: Hike through the worst forest full of the most horrible trees. Do not trust them. The trees will trick you. They will bully you. They will hurt you. If only you could find an axe...

games.name: Bounce95
games.description: Incremental game where you bounce balls on stages you create

games.name: Bruisers 2D Boxing
games.description:
Step into the ring and fight your way to the top in Bruisers 2D Boxing — a gritty, retro-styled boxing RPG where every punch counts and every decision shapes your career.

Welcome to the unforgiving world of professional boxing. Build your legacy from the ground up — train hard, fight smart, and manage the life of an up-and-coming fighter chasing glory. With in-depth 2D boxing action and a rich career mode, Bruisers 2D Boxing captures the raw intensity of the sport like never before.

games.name: Pratfall
games.description: A co-op game where you fall, dig, and explode your way down a dangerous cave system to find your lost dog. Catch your friends and watch your step on this journey full of traps, hazards, and the most deadly force of all: gravity. Will you jump into the unknown to rescue your dog?

games.name: Trinket Bag Maker
