games.description: Trinket Bag Maker is a retro sandbox game inspired by the 2000's girl games, where you can create your own trinket bag! Choose between many adorable charms and bags to create the trinket bag of your dreams!

games.name: Encryptid
games.description: Encryptid is a short FMV horror game about hunting and catching cryptids. Use real-world footage recorded exclusively via the Gameboy Camera to identify, locate and capture iconic creatures of myth and folklore.

games.name: Redhowl
games.description: Social deduction game for 4 to 15 players, inspired by Little Red Riding Hood. 3 factions clash: use your unique powers, unmask them or be devoured before the Blood Moon turns against you.

games.name: The Big Hollow: 1982
games.description: A serial killer’s dumping ground is exposed. Find details in the evidence, interpret their behaviors, and prove your worth to the FBI’s new Behavioral Science Unit. A dark, atmospheric 2D animated murder mystery.

games.name: Absolute Cinema
games.description: Build your movie empire! Create blockbusters by combining 44 topics and 22 genres, hire star actors through auditions, develop your studio and technologies. Crazy random events, references to real stars, and tons of humor. Prove you're the best director!

games.name: Some of You May Die
games.description: Create an overpowered squad of heroes to fight for you. Each run is different. Heroes are granted random boosted abilities making each unique. Go head to head against other players online or overcome the challenging singleplayer campaign in this one-of-a-kind roguelike autobattler!

games.name: Blindfold
games.description: Blindfold is an asymmetric co-op game: one player is a blindfolded prisoner, the other a guide with a map and bodycam. Work together to escape, avoiding guards, traps, and creatures. Each level adds new hazards and dynamic weather. Communication is key.

games.name: Backroom Cleaners
games.description: Purge the unknown Backrooms in this 4-player co-op TPS roguelike. Experience endless combat with fresh build combinations every run.

games.name: Soul Hunter
games.description: A team of young paranormal researchers ventures into the cursed corners of Japan to prove the existence of the spirit world. Ghosts feed on fear and the sanity of the living, luring you into traps of illusion. Your only defense is a special camera, capable of banishing spirits and unveiling secrets.

games.name: Blackjack Descent
games.description: You're locked in a room where your only chance of survival is to play blackjack against a sinister dealer. Every hand isn't just a gamble, it's a deal with fate. Fail to repay your debt on time, and you'll fall into darkness... or something far worse.

games.name: Office Inspector
games.description: Identify anomalies and dangers in a mysterious office complex and make the right decisions to escape using the elevator.

games.name: Trapped on the FlipSide
games.description: In this Puzzle Platformer, follow the narrative of three explorers, kidnapped by a mechanical megastructure. Play as their assistant spherical robot in an effort to save them from this brutal place. By powering up the system, area by area, the secretive past and dark truth may make itself known.

games.name: The Granny Detective Society
games.description: A cozy and quirky detective game where Madeline, a retired little mouse, watches her street and dives into thrilling investigations… until the Granny Detective Society contacts her and she discovers that the whole neighborhood is living a double life… especially the grannies.

games.name: Zeroad
games.description: ZEROAD is an endless pixel-art roguelike shooter. Fight through shifting roads and zombie hordes, growing stronger every run. Find unique weapons with modifiers, level up your character, and push further each time – solo or in two-player co-op!

games.name: Game Company Simulator
games.description: A weary ex‑developer, tired of pay‑to‑win and toxic workplaces, creates a simulation where you play as a game company boss. Recruit staff, push their potential, battle rivals, and aim to dominate the market with blockbuster hits to reach the pinnacle of success.

games.name: Bonsai '98
games.description: Craft tiny bonsai scenes for people on a cozy 90s internet forum. Grow trees, decorate scenes, unlock new items, and personalize your space as you unwind to lofi beats. No pressure, just chill positive retro vibes.

games.name: Ether Void
games.description: New York, the 90s. Detective Frank Miller investigates a murder in a grim metropolis. Your window to the truth is an old terminal. Analyze data, crack codes, uncover digital trails. Remember: not everyone here wants you to succeed.

games.name: Void Raid
games.description: A cooperative space horror about raiding derelict ships: breach compartments, grab the loot, and make it back to your own vessel before the oxygen runs out — or before something lurking in the dark gets to you.

games.name: From Basement with Love
games.description: Conduct a high-stakes espionage operation at the peak of the Cold War. Intercept and decipher encrypted communications to uncover a hidden threat. Break codes, manipulate targets through social engineering, connect the dots, and escape before it's too late.

games.name: Caterpillar King
games.description: Return the Caterpillar King's lost child for a life-changing reward! Ant pushes for change, Beetle clings to comfort, and their hungry Caterpillar keeps pulling them into trouble in this narrative-driven light tactics-puzzle game.

games.name: The Beginner Investor
games.description: Start from scratch, learn the market, and build your fortune in this accessible stock market tycoon game. Buy, sell, and diversify your way to wealth!

games.name: Skyward Bastion
games.description: Skyward Bastion is a tower defense roguelite set on floating islands. Build and upgrade your defenses, survive endless waves of enemies, and explore procedurally expanding maps under a living day-night cycle.

games.name: A Game About a King Saving a Dragon
games.description: Help a mighty dragon break a terrible curse in this incremental game. Hire workers, collect resources, construct buildings, unlock upgrades, and become a powerful king.

games.name: Martyr
games.description: Rise as a martyr in a plague-scarred, heretical Europe. Surrounded by disease, paganism, and relentless foes, you will fall, return as a Shade, and forge power from sacrifice. Death is not the end. Every fall strengthens you, every relic will help you, but enemies will hunt you for your faith.

games.name: Campus Confidential
games.description: An LGBTQ slice of life/supernatural dating sim

games.name: Sweep Squad
games.description: Sweep Squad is a 1-4 player arcade sweep-em-up where you and your ambiguous rodent friends team up to sweep away the bad guys and hit your quotas. Crank up the earnings with overtime and use various sub-weapons at your disposal to sweep away the competition.

games.name: Poolside Vigil
games.description: Based on a true story. Navigate through ever-changing pools where the path can never be memorized. Solve puzzles with physics-based interactions and survive the entity on your trail. Experience the grim consequences of phone addiction. Can you solve the mystery of that fateful day?

games.name: The Board is Yours
games.description: The Board is Yours is a strategic chess-based incremental game: buy squares, unlock upgrades, and chain synergies through defended pieces. It plays as a demanding idle game where you’ll constantly reposition pieces and optimize your production until the board belongs to you.

games.name: Shadow of the Moonlight
games.description: A dark fantasy visual novel set in a medieval world. You are the privileged son of a wealthy family, seeking revenge, even if it means becoming an outlaw. Will you dare to face your weakness and strength? How far will you go to find your true enemy? Uncover your roots' secrets. Survive… if you can.

games.name: RentPoly
games.description: RentPoly is a roguelike city-builder board game. Build your own real estate empire, squeeze rent from tenants, and become a billionaire!

games.name: Rise of Chi
games.description: When Chi finds her eggs are stolen by sneaky snakes, she is forced to leave everything behind. A brave journey that begins with a personal mission and escalates into something far bigger. Guided by unlikely allies and haunted by self-doubt, Chi must face enemies far greater than she imagined.

games.name: Mechborn
games.description: Protect Earth and her colonies in a roguelike deckbuilder inspired by ’90s mech anime and Greek mythology. In MECHBORN - YOUR MECH IS YOUR DECK - Unlock mech parts and pilots, craft custom decks and unleash devastating combos as you fight to repel the Kaiju incursions!

games.name: Jenny the Witch
games.description: Something evil is brewing deep below New York City and Genevieve Marconi has been hired to uncover it. Shoot and slash your way through an army of robots in this standalone story set in the Steel Carnelian universe.

games.name: Sound System
games.description: Sound System is a next-generation rhythm game that brings guitar gaming back, while introducing an entirely new platform built around free music and community-driven gameplay. Shred guitar, sing vocals, and build your own note charts for any tune anytime, unlocking a new era of music gaming.

games.name: Silvarn
games.description: Silvarn is a first-person psychological horror game set in a fog covered rural village. Players explore abandoned locations, solve environmental puzzles, and uncover fragmented memories while being pursued by an unseen threat. The game focuses on atmosphere, tension, and narrative-driven exploration rather than combat.

games.name: Chef Knight
games.description: Cook what you kill in this cozy fantasy incremental. Slay monsters, turn them into delicious meals, and build your dungeon food business!

games.name: Lydia Was Here
games.description: A horror RPG about how not to handle grief, identity, and the delusions of bringing someone back.

games.name: Last Fisherman
games.description: In abandoned biomes, forgotten cities, and lifeless waters, you cast your line — often without knowing whether it is still worth it. Rare fish, fragile systems, and a world without explanation create an atmosphere that observes rather than entertains.

games.name: Whisk
games.description: Whisk is a two-player platformer about shared movement and communication. You’ll coordinate leaps and grabs as Luna and Foam, to send all Dreamcats home!

games.name: Wiz Hunter
games.description: Wiz Hunter is a rogue-lite deckbuilding card game. Embark on a deadly quest to hunt down wizards through strategic, turn-based combat. Kill, die, learn, repeat.

games.name: Neuron Activation
games.description: A frantic rhythm-puzzle game filled with micro-challenges. Push buttons, flip switches, shoot targets and more in search of high scores to appease your overlords.

games.name: Toxoplasma
games.description: You are trapped on an abandoned space station, developing a bio-weapon that makes the infected hallucinate demonic entities. Spot any anomalous signs of infection before they kill you, complete your research, and unmask the conspiracy that brought you here.

games.name: One Last Sacrifice
games.description: PvP Autobattler meets character progression. Draft your board from a rotating shop. Build a semi-persistent deck and refine it through crafting. Discover powerful synergies. Outwit your opponents in sync or async duels and ascend the Arenas of Naskarr. A card battler without pay-to-win mechanics.

games.name: Remnants of Sin
games.description: This is a roguelike deckbuilder where cards become tiles. Place shape-based cards onto the board, clear rows and columns, and turn every decision into damage, defense, or special effects. Fight through creatures of the underworld, refine your deck and relics, and see how far your strategy can go.

games.name: Nano Dash
games.description: Nano Dash is Boulder Dash like action puzzler game but with a lot of new elements and also some Metroidvania features like tiny story-line, power-ups and a lot of secrets and hidden dungeons. The graphics and sound is 8 Bit like and close to the one from the original from 1986.

games.name: I'm No Demonlord
games.description: I'm No Demonlord is a Roguelike shooter bullet hell game. High freedom in mechanics leads to unique playthroughs. As a demon-possessed hero, battle enemies, grow, and unveil dark schemes. Can he accept his new role? Save "kinds" or destroy "outsiders"? Good or evil? The choice is yours.

games.name: Rudravati: Curse of Bhankilla
games.description: A first-person supernatural horror inspired by the legends of Bhangarh Fort. Explore India’s most haunted place, uncover your brother’s disappearance, and survive the ancient curse that still haunts the ruins.

games.name: Warhounds
games.description: Warhounds is a turn-based tactics game about an elite mercenary squad with an old-school action movie vibe, inspired by XCOM and Jagged Alliance. Recruit unique fighters, upgrade your base, and fight for Africa’s future. No fake RNG - only true ballistics and lethal tactics.

games.name: Wish Of Hers
games.description:
Wish of Hers is a round-based 2.5D roguelike about surviving in unstable dreams.
Each run is shaped by unlocked abilities, combined aspects, and your decisions.
Experiment, adapt, and break your own builds!

games.name: Waterpunk: Through the Rust
games.description: A roguelite action game set in a post-apocalyptic water world. Shape your strategy by choosing which abilities shine by day and which awaken at night.

games.name: Jeremy, No!
games.description: Jeremy, No! Is a spot the difference horror game where you are babysitting a poltergeist named Jeremy. Jeremy isn’t allowed to move stuff around or invite any “friends”, so carefully look at the rooms and call him out if anything has changed. Don’t let Jeremy get away with too many shenanigans...

games.name: Headache: Altered States
games.description: Immerse yourself in a psychedelic adventure created with RPG Maker. The main character uses a substance “Nix” to draw inspiration for her book from surreal worlds. The line between hallucination and reality blurs, and the search for creativity turns into a struggle with addiction and inner demons.

games.name: My New Paranormal Life
games.description: My New Paranormal Life is a story-rich, erotic visual novel focused on its dating-sim and sandbox aspects.

games.name: Nightwater
games.description: Forage, craft and automate to grow your factory, unlock new technologies and expand your island to discover new biomes. Progress through the ages from sticks and stones to the Bronze Age, the Industrial Era and into the future to uncover the secret of the Lighthouse and escape this reality.

games.name: Veyora
games.description: Veyora is a medieval open-world RPG with elements of farming, survival, and adventure. In a vast, stylized world, you decide where to live and what to create – whether near a bustling town, in the lonely mountains, or by a peaceful lake. Each location offers its own resources, challenges, and opportunities.

games.name: Send In The Vampires
games.description: A gothic horror arcade beat em up in a throwback psx retro style. Supports up to 4 players in local coop. Includes a randomizer for replayability.

games.name: The Curator
games.description: The Curator is a gallery-management roguelite about managing your own traveling exhibition. Upgrade your van and constantly re-organize artworks to unleash synergies while satisfying picky visitors. Prepare for special events and curate a collection that pleases everyone, including the Baron Family.

games.name: Liv
games.description: You are accused of the disappearance of a young woman. To prove your innocence, you must solve the case. Use the computer, the victim's diary, and her videos from the last months. You can use specialized software and the police datas. Make deductions, solve puzzles and find out what happened to Liv.

games.name: I Can Offer You Flowers
games.description: A cosy puzzle and bouquet game, which will appeal to all fans of problem solving in a cosy and aesthetic universe. As a florist, you carefully select the flowers that match the requests... and explore the many emotional combos to touch people in your own way!

games.name: Another Hero's Adventure
games.description: A pixel-art RPG rooted in modern wuxia novels. This spin-off continues the spirit of the original, letting you embark on an untold tale of the jianghu where your choices shape the chaos and forge a new heroic saga.

games.name: Zombie Craft
games.description: Zombie Craft is an open-world survival, farming, ranching, factory-building, and trading game inspired by many beloved classics. Explore the continent freely, rebuild villages, and earn your fortune. And whatever you do—prepare for the night. They are coming.

games.name: Path of Glory
games.description: Path of Glory is a deck-building, roguelite game, set in a post-apocalyptic world. Offering endless replayability, unlockable characters with unique tree skills and card deck's. Fight all beast on your path to become a Hero.

games.name: A Game About Making A Planet
games.description: A Game About Making A Planet is a short incremental auto clicker game. Make a planet by merging particles together.

games.name: Applecalypse
games.description: Point and click about apples, featuring real photos as backgrounds, with gameplay sections inspired by billiards and a Lynchian story about a -paranormal?- event taking place in a small town, psychologically and physically transforming the neighborhood’s residents.

games.name: Comeback
games.description: A Visual narrative about overcoming the status quo, Fight in a series of different Arenas Levels, In your downtime cook different meals with unique effects and craft equipment to increase your chances.

games.name: Dadum The Dice
games.description: Plan, roll and outsmart your enemies in this turn-based tactical puzzle adventure. Show a higher number to defeat foes, discover new mechanics in every world, and face challenging bosses that twist the rules. Think ahead, take your time… and master the Great Die.

games.name: Heavy Metal Death Can
games.description: Heavy Metal Death Can is a Retro-Inspired Survival-Horror game set on a submarine in an alternate late-70s Swedish setting. Trapped beneath the ocean, you must fight against the terrifying Sludge which has turned your crew into Zombies. Look for survivors and uncover the truth behind the madness.

games.name: Idle Monkey Theorem
games.description: **Idle Monkey Theorem** is a charming idle/clicker game that brings the famous *Infinite Monkey Theorem* to life. Watch as your adorable team of monkeys frantically type away on their typewriters, randomly producing words that against all odds slowly but surely recreate the complete works of William Shakespeare.

games.name: Driving Rogue
games.description: Arcade driving meets roguelike chaos - fast, intense, and ridiculously addictive. In Driving Rogue, every run is a new story: the city keeps changing, and you’ll need pure focus to push your score to the limit. After each race, hit the shop and craft your build for the longest streak possible.

games.name: CaraVanguard
games.description: A rogue-lite action RPG with co-op for up to 7 players. Choose from 7 classes, master 70+ weapons and 100+ skills, and battle through a world where elemental interactions can weaken—or empower—your enemies. Inspired by traditional action RPG's and classic titles.

games.name: Doomtrain
games.description: Hell has gone CORPORATE! DemonCorp's evil executives force demons into eternal overtime. Armed with the powerful DOOMTRAIN, unionize Hell and free the demon workers. Build a medieval steampunk town, upgrade your train and turrets, unionize demon workers, and defeat DemonCorp's corporate overlords!

games.name: Spirit Talk
games.description: Cozy visual novel about a lovely witch who’s able to talk to spirits in a fantasy setting. Using her powers, Julia helps her neighbors in their daily whereabouts. Craft potions, find the right time to use them and get to know both spirits and clients to find their peace.

games.name: Train Goes Right
games.description: A cozy physics based railroad simulator where you chop trees, drive trains, transport materials, and build track one rail at a time in the early steam age. The goal is simple: go right.

games.name: Cardoom
games.description: Cardoom is a roguelite deckbuilder where you start with a basic deck. You collect new cards and items that affect your gameplay as you go.

games.name: Ravelle: Last Draw
games.description: What starts as casual matches in a humble café becomes a shared effort to protect a place that matters. Ravelle is a free-to-play turn-based strategy card game with visual novel elements, blending tactical card battles and personal character stories.

games.name: Ghost Scout
games.description: Identify invisible ghosts using mundane and strange objects. Find the Anchor without getting killed, reveal the ghosts true form and attempt to get out alive.

games.name: Sugar Orbit
games.description: A platformer where you play a gummibear jumping between planets to rescue lost gummies, playable at your own pace but built for speedrunners and perfect runs.

games.name: The Alighieri Circle: Dante’s Bloodline
games.description: The world knows the Divine Comedy as a poem. For your family, it is a prison. As Gabriele Alighieri, you inherit a duty: reseal the gates of Hell. Burdened by fate, you descend into a psychological nightmare where the only escape is to uncover the dark secrets of your ancestors.

games.name: Typeoids
games.description:
Typeoids is a fast arcade-style typing game inspired by the classic Asteroids.
Wield your keyboard to protect yourself against the incoming asteroids threatening to crush your ship, and get performance statistics and track the progress in your typing journey.

games.name: A Stupid Game About Pouring Drinks for the P.T.A.
games.description: The P.T.A. (Parent Teacher's Association) is planning the Summer Fete but they need money to hire everything. Selflessly serve drinks and upsell the heck out of them to gain funds. Dig deep! It's for a good cause, after all.

games.name: Out of Sight: Stage Fright
games.description: Uncover the story of a tormented Unseen, a spirit child who reaches out to Sophie for help with their final performance. Together with Teddy, they reveal new perspectives, a chilling history, and a need to overcome their greatest fears.

games.name: Broom Broom
games.description: Grab your broom, fly over to people in need and brew them potions after a catastrophic snowstorm has hit your village! Talk to your lovely (but mostly grumpy) neighbours as you find your place in this short and cozy adventure.

games.name: Kotamon: My Sis Found a Super-Rare Card in Her Cereal Box, so I Became a Garbage Man to Find the Entire Collection and Earn $1,000,000
games.description: Clearing trash can feel even better when you not only make the world cleaner, but also find extra-rare cards that have suddenly increased in price! Rummage through garbage, fulfill the orders from the dump site owner, look for hidden treasures... and collect all the Kotámons!

games.name: Party Pop Bubblyz
games.description:
Jump into the Ultimate Penguin Party!
Break the ice and have fun at the Park! Join the 20-player party to be the star!
Explosive Fun in Just 10 Minutes

games.name: The Lantern of the Laughless Saint
games.description: A solo or co-op RPG inspired by Morrowind. Drawn by a shared dream, you awaken on an isolated island crowned by a silent Tower. Unravel the mystery of the Laughless Saint, confront the weight of human desire, and decide what deserves to be saved when the light beneath the world finally stirs.

games.name: Idle Chibi Knight
games.description: Chibi Knight returns in an idle dungeon crawler! Fighting and exploration happen automatically while you cast spells, acquire loot, unlock new skills, level up your attributes, and push deeper. Replay as multiple classes in this casual, incremental RPG.

games.name: Petrichor
games.description: Petrichor is a JRPG about a space cub going on a quest to find the perfect houseplant. Make friends, defeat monsters, help people, save the stars and maybe get his plant. Maybe.

games.name: EVO Card
games.description: EVO Card is a roguelike card game in which players evolve creatures by assembling biological components through deck-building mechanics. Each run features randomized encounters and progression, encouraging strategic adaptation across repeated playthroughs.

games.name: Asylum 1966
games.description: Asylum 1966 is a first-person psychological horror experience set within the decaying halls of a long abandoned mental institution. Players step into the role of an investigator drawn to the asylum by a series of unexplained events, only to uncover a place where time fractures, memories distort, and reality becomes unreliable.

games.name: DungeonOS
games.description: Crawl Dungeons, Loot and Equip your Adventurers! Log in to an old-school operating system. Manage your adventurers and use puzzles to damage your enemies. Are you ready to find the five artifacts you always dreamed of?

games.name: Wingmine
games.description:
Wingmine is a narrative puzzle game inspired by Minesweeper, entirely based on logic.
Your special unit has been scattered behind enemy lines: analyze the terrain, defuse the mines, and save your team.

games.name: Shadowstone
games.description: Shadowstone is a 1-4 player tactics game where players must master strategic positioning and powerful hero synergies to survive against the unrelenting horrors of the Sunderlands.

games.name: Manifesto
games.description:
Manifesto is a new management sim about burnout, layoffs, and making shitloads of money.

You’ve climbed the ranks, left countless competitors in your wake, and proven you have what it takes to survive in this cut-throat business. With this latest venture, you’ll have to put any human feelings you’ve ever experienced aside, and attempt to satisfy shareholders who can never truly be satisfied.

games.name: Mercy Incore
games.description: Hack and Slash Adventure. A long time ago you were a merciful knight until falling through the techno-dimension. Now, your life is sustained by the Draincore on the back and it feeds on enemies' lives. Surrender core's hunger to survive. Trailblaze a techno-void to return home. Leave mercy incored

games.name: Captain Tsubasa II: World Fighters
games.description: The next episode of Tsubasas riveting adventure is here! Enjoy the thrill of spectacular soccer actions with 110 playable characters and new sensational super moves. Challenge a friend in the field or support Tsubasa on his Journey, the ball is yours.

games.name: Hold Your King
games.description: In this physics-based co-op platformer, you and a friend must carry your short-tempered king through deadly medieval courses. Dodge traps, maintain balance, and work together to reach the throne room. One wrong step, and the king might crown you with his rage!

games.name: Final Orbit
games.description: Master the cockpit of highly realistic spacecraft in this Newtonian physics based sim. Take off from surface to space, plot a course between the planets and dock with space stations. Trade commodities or take shipping contracts to buy upgrades and optimize your build - every choice matters.

games.name: RatSpiderFrog
games.description: A cursed auto-battler where you take control of a bunch of rats to fend off enemy attacks. Crossbreed them. Grill them. Feed them. Make them POWERFUL!

games.name: You Remembered
games.description: Type letters that fall and become part of the world. Use their shape and attributes to navigate the puzzles and secrets.

games.name: Late Night Duty
games.description: You’re a desperate, untrained night security guard called in at 11.30 PM after the previous guard vanished without notice. With no bag and only two hands, patrol a severely underfunded school. A first-person atmospheric horror about the terrifying mundane... and what hides in the dark.

games.name: Meaningless Random Numbers
games.description: Meaningless Random Numbers is an Incremental Horror Game about earning cash through Random Number Generators but be cautious, God is Watching.

games.name: Bloomies
games.description:
Bloomies are cute little creatures born from seeds and eggs, growing while you go about your day on your PC. But peace doesn’t last forever because Shadow Bloomies are waiting for the right moment to invade and take over your taskbar world.
In Bloomies, you plant seeds, grow eggs, and hatch over a hundred unique Bloomies, each with different ranks. Raise them, collect rare Sparkle Bloomies, and watch your tiny companions live their lives.
When Shadow Bloomies attack, your Bloomies automatically jump into battle. Defeat powerful bosses in order to unlock new seeds and items.
Prefer a calmer experience? Cozy Mode lets you disable combat entirely and simply enjoy collecting, decorating, and customizing your Bloomies at your own pace. You can even automate your experience through the skill system.
Bloomies is a cozy monster-collector with light farming and idle elements that runs directly on your taskbar . But it doesn’t have to stay there. Resize it, move it anywhere on your desktop, and create multiple profiles to match your mood. Decorate your world with tons of items, dress your Bloomies with adorable hats, or even turn Bloomies themselves into hats.

games.name: Isekai HKV
games.description: “Isekai HKV” is a 2D top-down pixel-art roguelike themed around VTubers traveling to another world. Players take on the role of the hero “DD,” gain the cheat skill “Unlimited Gacha,” and adventure with VTubers to defeat the Demon King!

games.name: Drift Market
games.description: Destroy supermarkets, fight absurd bosses, and turn your trolley into a weapon of mass destruction! Drift through chaotic stores as a furious mutant fruit and unleash over-the-top, physics-driven mayhem in this ridiculous smash ‘em up.

games.name: Agrocracy
games.description: A farming management game focused on planning and numbers. This is not a farming sim - no driving, animals, or role-playing. Manage weather, labor, capital, and time on a large isometric map.

games.name: AlterMage
games.description: AlterMage is a first person metroidvania that combines spell-slinging action with a cerebral exploration experience. As an aspiring mage seeking to learn sorcery, you find yourself upon the shores of a forbidden island fortress. Take up your staff and set out on a journey that will challenge your mind, body, and spirit as you uncover the truth behind the citadel's origin.

games.name: Toymaker: Threads of Joy
games.description: Toymaker is a toy-crafting and store management simulator set in the 1910s Spain. Meet unique customers and colorful locals in a bustling city, and discover a magical story based on a folk legend. Follow two different mythic paths, and change the future of your hometown!

games.name: Bullet Time Agent
games.description: Bullet Time Agent is a sci-fi action-adventure bullet hell. Slow time and dodge storms of bullets as you punch your way through robot-filled arenas. Thread laser gauntlets with super-powered jumps. Take down increasingly intense bosses as you rewind your own death again, and again...

games.name: Jibbers
games.description: Physics-driven ski game with fully simulated bodies and flexible skis. No trick buttons. Control, timing, and motion earn every move. Full customization, tunable physics, community maps, multiplayer.

games.name: Plinkomancy
games.description: PLINKOMANCY is a roguelite that turns a simple ball drop into explosive chaos. Hit pegs, rack up massive numbers, and unlock upgrades as you push the arcade cabinet to its limits. How far can you go before the machine pushes back?

games.name: Killing Things With Your Friends
games.description: A chaotic first-person co-op game about surviving lethal experiments with your friends. Work together, dismember your enemies, steal their limbs and escape before time runs out.

games.name: Less Miserables
games.description: A point-and-click parody of 'Les Miserables', set in the French Revolution

games.name: Void Diver: Escape From the Abyss
games.description: Manage 'Balusha' antique shop in an anomalous city. Command 'Divers' into the abyss to recover artifacts from city dungeons. Survive and escape alive in this high-quality pixel art extraction action RPG. Face bizarre threats alone or with friends.

games.name: Corridors
games.description: Explore an abandoned hospital, solve puzzles, and uncover a nonlinear story where your choices have consequences. A hardcore psychological horror game in pixel art.

games.name: Lord of Undead
games.description: Destroy the castle on the hill in this grim RPG where you play as the Dark Lord. Collect souls, summon an undead army, master dark abilities, craft powerful gear, build your base, and desecrate the lands of a vast open world.

games.name: The Whispering Bones
games.description: The Whispering Bones is a roguelike psychological horror where you gamble with a mysterious stranger in the depths of a nebulous wood. Speak to him, unravel his secrets, make bets and win a chance for a better life.

games.name: Brigandine Abyss
games.description: The king of Solginat is dead, and a new would-be emperor stands over the corpse. Confront the dark in one of six different storylines as you manage resources, rally your monsters, and stand against the empire

games.name: Crimson Moon
games.description: A gothic action-adventure RPG of violent angels and dead gods.

games.name: Castlevania: Belmont's Curse
games.description: Crimson Curse —Will Your Fate Bloom in Despair or Salvation. Set 23 years after Castlevania Dracula's Curse - follow a young Belmont's journey in an all new 2D Action-Exploration title from KONAMI, Evil Empire and Motion Twin.

games.name: Stunt Paradise 2
games.description: Stunt Paradise 2 - more speed, more explosions, more madness! Jump over ramps, dodge lasers, buzzsaws, and rockets while performing insane stunts. With new traps, improved graphics, and pure arcade chaos - get ready for the ultimate stunt challenge!

games.name: Homeostasis
games.description: Navigate a desolate snowscape in your lone vehicle, keep your systems running, and unravel unsettling clues about the last expedition in this short retro survival horror experience.

games.name: Land of the Dead Trees
games.description: Land of the Dead Trees is a roguelike extraction RPG. Walk the thin line between life and death as you struggle to restore a shattered world. Lands of the Dead Trees draws you into a breathtaking realm beyond your wildest dreams - where danger lurks at every step, and survival demands courage.

games.name: OS95 Plus!
games.description: OS95 Plus! is the newest first person puzzle adventure game from Gev Creates. You're stuck in a mysterious facility and are forced to indefinitely partake in software testing. You must navigate rooms and solve puzzles to escape and uncover the truth behind the experiment.

games.name: Helenland
games.description:
Helen finds a mysterious video game on her doorstep and starts playing it.
But as she progresses, strange events begin to happen around her...

Helenland is a single-player, first-person psychological horror.
The game features deep narrative, exploration and puzzles.

games.name: MineSweeper.R
games.description: MineSweeper.R is an ultra-casual roguelike Minesweeper game with spell-programming mechanics. Build your own sweeping skills freely and experience Minesweeper in a whole new way.

games.name: Sweep Bump
games.description: Play as a cleaning robot, dodge incoming vehicles on a bustling street, and collect trash to earn higher scores.

games.name: Is Guilty
games.description: A psychological horror job simulator. Serve coffee at a lonely drive-thru. But when a mysterious email arrives, your shift changes. Watch the cars. Check the plates. Someone in line is hiding a dark secret, and something else is watching you from the dark.

games.name: Crosstown
games.description: An overload of 8-bit-style action mayhem, Crosstown hands you a toga and a gun, and lets you loose in an ever-changing maze full of monsters and explosions! 40 levels, up to 4 players, and an endless mode!

games.name: Slopeside Kings
games.description:
Slopeside Kings is a multiplayer snowboarding combat racing game.
In Slopeside Kings you shred down the slopes, catch big air, and pull off tricks to build boost then use chaotic items to battle your way to the finish line.

games.name: The Kingdoms of Ædloran
games.description: The Kingdoms of Ædloran is a 2D top-down pixel RPG. Explore a living open world, encounter strange and fantastic creatures, level up and learn new abilities, battle savage beasts and monstrous foes, delve deep into perilous dungeons, and claim legendary loot.

games.name: Mira: Shadow of the Past
games.description: Travel. Go back. Erase your regrets.

games.name: Masackra
games.description: A tactical game with grid-based combat, classes, and synergies. Assemble your squad, strengthen it through events, and make decisions that determine the outcome of each battle.

games.name: The Anomaly Unit
games.description: Forced into working as an Anomaly Observer in a space stockroom, you must explore, observe carefully, and report inconsistencies. Earn Credits to buy upgrades, but beware: hideous horrors are creeping in the dark.

games.name: Kingdom Heroes
games.description: Kingdom Heroes is a fantasy medieval survivor-like blending action, exploration, kingdom management, and local co-op for up to 4 players. Battle massive hordes, vote on the group's fate, build your kingdom, and dominate other players through asynchronous multiplayer.

games.name: Backrooms: No Escape
games.description: A 1–6 player immersive psychological horror experience. Venture through multiple handcrafted liminal Backrooms levels, solve puzzles, explore and survive.

games.name: Pit of the Lord
games.description: Pit of the Lord is a dark fantasy tower defense roguelite where you place towers and slot machines on a grid, choose random upgrades, and defend the Pit through waves of enemies, pushing your luck as corruption and chance shape every run.

games.name: Cybro
games.description: Government gig becomes personal. Return to a corrupt city on a contract to recover stolen software, only to uncover a conspiracy. Fight back with guns, stealth, hacking, and raw action as betrayal hits close and escape becomes the only way out.

games.name: Tome Improvement
games.description: A co-op dungeon crawler where you and your friends name the spells. Catch critters, combine them in your staff, and hope your friends remember which spell is "DIVORCE BEAM" when you are surrounded by skeletons.

games.name: Heartseers Grove
games.description: Gather, craft, build, and explore in Heartseers Grove, a cosy survival game set in a peaceful world of forests, hills, and caves.

games.name: Reroll Routine
games.description: Reroll Routine is a rolling clicker inspired by autobattler-style shop systems. Buy ROUTINES, earn R€COINS, win the ROLLYMPICS and REROLL your life. One of the past champions, Relder, is here to help you achieve it.

games.name: Bust Buddies
games.description: Become the Bust God in this chaotic friendslop party game! Play with up to 8 buddies as you chisel, chainsaw, or slam together marble into questionable masterpieces guided by random prompts or your friends' terrible ideas.

games.name: Watch Eye
games.description: Victoria just wanted to take a shortcut through the usual parking garage in order to get home... she just didn’t expect to find an untold danger there.

games.name: I Never Late for Work
games.description: This is a life-simulation roguelike card game. Harness item and skill cards to shorten your commute, continuously boost yourself through diverse events, forge connections with different friends to help each other out, and become the best employee who never arrives late.

games.name: Fractaloid Attacks!
games.description: Fractaloid Attacks! is an arcade mix of pinball and brick breaker set inside a living digital world. Bounce, glide and blast through fractal caves, unlock powerful technologies, survive chaotic hazards and build your own collection of strange fractaloid creatures.

games.name: Static Shift
games.description: A Lovecraftian, psychological co-op horror where the powers from above are tormenting you and your co-workers, warping reality with anomalies and using any means necessary to stop you from leaving or finding out the truth: Can you do it?

games.name: Dreadmarch
games.description: From the Celestial Bastion, send heroes across a Might & Magic–style world map and survive endless waves of infernal enemies in brutal combat grounds. Grow stronger between runs and hold the line against the Dreadmarch.

games.name: Cozy Farm
games.description: A cozy farming game where you grow crops, raise animals, freely build and move farm structures, craft products, and sell fresh goods to villagers in a peaceful, cartoon-style world.

games.name: Kill Spewy
games.description: Collect components. Build the flow. Kill Spewy. A cozy idle game where your only goal is to kill Spewy as many times as possible, earn Bread Slices, and unlock endlessly growing component builds.

games.name: Dead 4 Now: Escape Together
games.description: A 4v1 asymmetrical horror where survivors escape by solving shifting puzzles. Use always-on proximity voice to manage sanity, but speak too loudly and the monster will find you.

games.name: Diskette Dungeon
games.description: A magical diskette opened a portal in your office, pulling you into endless dungeons where survival depends on adaptation, destruction, and corrupted data collected to reach the next world.

games.name: Toilet Paper Idle
games.description: Toilet Paper Idle is a chill incremental idle clicker game about consuming as much toilet papers as possible with the help of helpers, skills, and upgrades. Discover special types of toilet papers as you progress, and be careful to not clog your toilet!

games.name: Ever Flip
games.description: Ever Flip is an incremental coin-flipping game where consecutive 50% chance wins create powerful streaks, bigger rewards, and increasing automation.

games.name: Soundscapes
games.description: Soundscapes is an interactive music sandbox where your songs shape the world around you.

games.name: Dreamera: Figment of Dreams
games.description: Point-and-click puzzle adventure about exploring surreal dream worlds, solving layered environmental puzzles, and navigating between realities through a central Dreamgate.

games.name: Whispers of Appalachia
games.description: An atmospheric horror walking simulator inspired by Appalachian folklore. Explore a hostile forest, survive multiple nights, and avoid the creatures that roam within. No puzzles. No combat. Just you, the forest, and what hunts inside it.

games.name: Platyguard: Swarm Slayer
games.description: PlatyGuard: Swarm Slayer is a 2D action roguelike platformer RPG set in a post-apocalyptic wasteland, infused with biopunk and dark sci-fi flair. Survive the chaos, clash with mutant foes, and explore mysterious sites in this indie adventure!

games.name: The Last Wizard: A Goblin Detective Mystery
games.description: Investigate a murder as the first goblin detective in a comedic fantasy world without magic...where a wizard is the prime suspect!

games.name: DishDash
games.description: DishDash is a single-player time management restaurant game where you prepare meals, serve customers, and manage limited resources under constant time pressure, turning kitchen chaos into smooth rhythm through speed, focus, and smart decision-making.

games.name: Tileweaver
games.description: A Tile-placer Roguelike with Puzzle elements. Build your board, empower yourself and slay monsters in this dark strategic game. Discover a variety of arcane skills and enigmatic artifacts to control the board and delve ever deeper into the abyss.

games.name: Rogualik
games.description: Rogualik is a rogue-like dungeon crawler where you uncover dark, scary secrets of a surrealistic sweet-filled world. Use ridiculous makeshift kitchen weapons, upgrade your croissant with "Mise en place" assets and defeat all the crumbs that stand in your way!

games.name: BattleBoat X
games.description: BattleBoat X is a combat roguelike where you command a heavily armed gunship through a chain of hostile islands. Fight dangerous enemies, upgrade your vessel, and save the world from certain doom!

games.name: Avernoth
games.description: Sealed away in an ancient alternate dimension, you must find a way to break free. In this fantasy action rogue-lite, uncover a variety of spells to cast your way through waves of hostile magical apparitions. Discover the secrets of Avernoth to make escape possible. Do you have what it takes?

games.name: Grid
games.description: Grid Slash is a fast-paced, grid-based visual debugging action game where you dive into consecutive battles and wipe out system-breaking bugs.

games.name: Chronicles Meteorfall
games.description: A semi-open world turn based RPG with detailed class-based and skill building mechanics, deep worldbuilding and lore, and genuine LGBT+ representation.

games.name: Aelwater
games.description: Memory has weight. The departed are not gone. Step into a village drowned by flood and memory, and search for the final answer about guardianship and farewell among the shattered past.

games.name: The Day That Wasn't
games.description: Relive the same day without remembering it. Your choices feed four inner alter egos (Shadow, Mad, Alex, and Bully) — shaping reality, glitches, and one of 16 possible endings. The day repeats. Your mind doesn’t. Or does it?

games.name: Do a Crime
games.description: Do A Crime is a casually-chaotic-cozy platform puzzler where you play as a Raccoon - doing crimes! Do A Crime takes the whimsy of being a mischievous raccoon and allows the player to live out their chaos gremlin dreams.

games.name: Kisen: Seeker of Aenjan City
games.description: Tap into the mystery as a stranger in the city — a mild mystery visual novel. Kisen runs a tracing agency in a city far from his home. There, he is asked by a local university student to look for his brother missing from twelve years ago. Investigate what happened back then to uncover the truth.

games.name: The Legend of You
games.description: Shape a fantasy realm with your words. Choose your hero’s tale, recruit, train, and equip allies, and battle through turn-based encounters of your own design. Each victory writes your legend, each choice brings you closer to the ultimate treasure.

games.name: Lurk in Abyss
games.description: After moving to the village, Lurk begins a new, independent life. However, the place turns out to be no ordinary village on the outskirts of the city, but something far more mysterious... Are you ready to dive into this abyss?

games.name: Soul Card Duel
games.description: A deckbuilder where position and direction make combats more tactical. Flank enemies with 8 attack directions and combine cards to win in any situation. Explore procedural maps, create decks and armor to customize your hero, and forge your legend in the region's grand tournament.

games.name: Become
games.description: Experience life's fantastical journey as one of millions of sperm. Survive the microcosm dangers, wiggle, dash and compete through the human reproductive system and create new life.

games.name: DoDoon
games.description: Defend your castle from approaching monsters! Upgrade your defenses and survive all 30 fast-paced waves in this addictive defense shooter.

games.name: Choice of Life: Floors
games.description: Choice of Life: Floors is a psychological horror detective game where every choice shapes your story. An elevator descends through the endless floors of your own home, leading you into a game against your own mind. Each step brings you closer to escape… or to madness

games.name: Girl With Gun
games.description: A dating simulator, but... The girl has a shotgun, and if she doesn't like how you answer her questions, you die. Your date takes place in a living, watching cave where every element of the environment actively reacts to your tension and tries to break you.

games.name: Scicry
games.description: A first-person sci-fi action-horror. After a catastrophic event, the station’s crew has mutated, turning its corridors into a deadly labyrinth. Explore the station, scavenge resources, and fight monsters to survive.

games.name: Where the Hell Am I?
games.description: Where The Hell Am I? is an atmospheric first-person exploration game. Its diverse locations draw you into an unknown world where every shadow hides a story and every step deepens the mystery. Uncover the truth behind the mystery that started it all. Are you ready to get lost in different realities?

games.name: Idle Ways
games.description: An incremental game about building and optimizing your own global transport network. Draw lines, place stations, and unlock new systems as your cities grow!

games.name: World Without Time
games.description: World without Time is an atmospheric adventure about a fire alicorn exploring a ruined world, using magic, and confronting their past self. Experience exploration, flight, light combat, and choices that shape the fate of the protagonist.

games.name: Santa's Burnout
games.description: Santa has officially quit. The kids are too spoiled, and the magic is gone. This year, the Toy Factory has been converted into a strip mine. Click rocks, crush hope, and manage a cynical coal mining operation in this dark industrial idle game. Your goal? Ensure everyone gets coal for Christmas.

games.name: Dream Village
games.description: Immerse yourself in the cozy world of village life! Set up your home, buy groceries or order home delivery, cook delicious soups, manage your farm and earn real estate. Dream Village - dreams become reality!

games.name: Sento Survivor: Slip, Grab, and Bathe in Glory!
games.description: Slide, Shoot, and Send Your Rivals Flying!Chaotic, tumbling shooter battle set in a Japanese Sento (public bathhouse). On these super slippery floors, you'll slide, shoot, and stumble to victory. Defeat your rivals and soak in the sublime bath reserved only for the winner!

games.name: Kafak
games.description: KAFAK – Survival Card-Building & Base Management Game Build your deck with 150+ unique cards, upgrade characters and your base, craft Thai dishes, hunt and farm to survive, and face 10+ powerful bosses in a post-apocalyptic world.

games.name: Pirate's Dual
games.description: A 2D pixel-art PvP ship battle game where you outplay opponents with smart attack and defense tactics. Climb matchmaking, join tournaments, earn in-game currency, unlock skins, and more.

games.name: Sepium
games.description: Investigate and localize abnormal activities in this 1-4 players survival horror game. Find your way to various locations where something odd is happening, while trying hard to keep your crew alive.

games.name: Lounge Café
games.description: Lounge Café is an atmospheric coffee shop simulator where you play as Sara from Lucerne, running a small café in Binoville. Choose beans, craft drinks, and compete in the city’s major coffee tournament to become the best.

games.name: Delucid
games.description: An atmospheric horror game set within an inescapable dream. Trapped in a dark forest, you must explore, forage, and uncover rare ingredients to craft the one potion capable of waking you up.

games.name: Grainhold
games.description: Grainhold is an open world mining game where player build their own settlement, which they must then defend against waves of enemy attacks. To construct buildings, players must gather resources and grow vegetables, which they can sell to buy better equipment from the merchant.

games.name: Wing-It
games.description: Adapt or crash! WING-IT is a 2.5D shooter where your arsenal is a slot machine. Shoot down drones to trigger the Toy Box Gacha and swap weapons on the fly. Fight through Medy's house, survive the bullet hell, and defeat the mechanical monstrosities ruling the house.

games.name: Outlanders: Exiles of Veridion
games.description: Outlanders is a sci-fi open-world survival game set on Veridion Prime. Build your base, fight hostile factions, explore alien biomes, craft advanced gear, and survive deadly environmental threats in a living world shaped by your choices.

games.name: Re-Taped
games.description: You must record your movements and play them back to progress. Use your recorded echoes to weigh down pressure plates, body-block lasers, and trigger springs to launch you across gaps. Master the timeline and complete all 30 time-bending levels.

games.name: Dogfight Darlings
games.description: Dogfight Darlings is a bite-sized, bullet hell boss rush featuring an aviation themed cast of plane girls! Take to the skies, unlock skills, and battle your way to victory through daring aerial combat in this game made entirely of boss fights.

games.name: Chop Chop for the Old God
games.description: Chop trees, throw logs into a wormhole, unlock upgrades, brew potions, find teleporters, unveil the map, and explore multiple endings.

games.name: Loot And Defend
games.description: A short, relaxing incremental game about slaughtering millions of attacking zombies. Take a load off, the end of the world doesn't have to be stressful.

games.name: The Anomaly Detective
games.description: Your mind plays tricks on you in this hotel. Is what you see real, or just a hallucination? Close your eyes, take a deep breath, and clear your mind. Whatever remains when you open them is your only truth. Photograph the anomalies, connect the evidence, and solve the mystery.

games.name: Moorage
games.description: Moorage is a fishing roguelite where you must travel the ocean to find a way off a desolate island. Meet people stranded like you, level up each time you fail, and catch a bunch of fish!

games.name: The Bold Club
games.description: A totally chaotic card game for up to 6 players where you must cheat to win. Match shapes and colors, use special cards, cheat to secretly get rid of your cards and report other players before they do the same.

games.name: SkyRen
games.description: Race, climb, and free-run through dynamic cityscapes! Build your character, master movement, compete with players, earn gear, level up, and climb the leaderboards to become the ultimate free-runner in this anime parkour MMO!

games.name: Dear Journey...
games.description: Run your own little travel agency. Plan itineraries with the cards you are dealt. Satisfying traveller moods and needs to help grow your agency’s reputation.

games.name: Mount Noire
games.description: Get cash, get meds, get home. Survival horror set in a forgotten ski resort.

games.name: Only Tactics
games.description: You lead a tactical group in a series of turn-based battles with other groups. A limited number of actions and rules create an infinite number of tactical combinations. The levels are balanced so that the one who finds the right tactics wins. Get ready, that will not be easy

games.name: Deep Hunger
games.description: A short incremental game about cleaning the ocean, and feeding the insatiable hunger of a deep sea creature.

games.name: Don't Drive Dead
games.description: Drive, shoot, and survive huge zombie swarms in a top-down roguelite where you build a squad, upgrade your car, and create wild hero synergies. Procedurally generated characters, weapons and levels.

games.name: When Voices Died
games.description: When Voices Died is a game of puzzles and silent emotions. Amid distant echoes and broken memories, you rebuild paths that reveal forgotten feelings — and the weight of choices that still echo.

games.name: The American Dream of Gunther Aims
games.description: A retro puzzle shooter built around ricochets, where every shot counts. You play as Gunther, a revolver and a family man, in a constrained turn-based system: one action at a time, until it fully resolves.

games.name: Donnie's Delicious Nuclear Funeral
games.description: A point-n'-click choose-your-own-adventure game about Susie, a kind girl in the post-apocalypse who must arrange a funeral for her dearly-departed brother Donnie in the town that hates his stupid, dead guts!

games.name: Exorcism:Nuo Rituals
games.description: Exorcism:Nuo Rituals is a horror pazzle game. A late-night delivery goes horribly wrong, pulling you into the city's supernatural underbelly. Saved by Nuo mask, you enter a hidden world where Nuo Masters against unspeakable horrors. But you'll soon discover this mask didn't choose you by accident.

games.name: Memoria Arcana
games.description: A single-player card game of memory and fate. Reveal cards to form poker-style combos, earn points, and overcome cursed stages that twist your field. Unlock and upgrade Arcana cards to alter runs and reshape destiny with every turn.

games.name: MioAquaria
games.description: Build and manage a cozy underwater sandbox aquarium run by cats. Discover fantasy sea creatures, research upgrades, send expeditions, and balance fish, staff, and visitor needs to become the world’s top aquarium.

games.name: Neural Drive
games.description: Neural Drive is a cyberpunk action rogue-lite. Use acceleration powers to reflect bullets, dodge attacks, and counter enemies. Master weapons and upgrade your skills to overcome relentless enemies and deadly bosses.

games.name: Death Pong
games.description: You step into a place where no one plays for fun. A metal collar tightens around your neck, audience whispers, and every throw can end in victory… or voltage. Here, there are no draws — only winners or dead bodies.

games.name: NPC Simulator
games.description: NPC SIMULATOR is a game where you can finally become that boring NPC! No swords or spells. Your job is to give out quests, fix crooked textures, and do whatever it takes to keep players from reporting bugs. Hang in there!

games.name: To Be Connected
games.description: To Be Connected is a relaxing, minimalist strategy game where you shape the land, connect your sites, and maintain a balanced, harmonious landscape. Build a world that expands forever, or craft real-country layouts by shaping land and connecting important locations.

games.name: Stillwell
games.description: Minesweeper meets horror. Deterministic grid puzzles with clear rules. Use your lantern, flashlight, and chalk to escape before your oxygen runs out.

games.name: Mandarin Spin: Dynasty's Fate
games.description: Mandarin Spin: Dynasty's Fate​ combines card strategy with slot-machine thrills for a unique take on Ming Dynasty power struggles. Each card pull is a high-stakes gamble of wealth and prestige—a strategic choice between life and death. Pay taxes, climb the ranks, rewrite history.

games.name: CoinClave
games.description: Summon humans through coin tosses and engage in intense battles — a Coin Toss × Card Battle game. Whether you can summon them depends on luck. Manipulate that luck with strategy and seize victory.

games.name: Alisa’s Incident Report
games.description: Nursing student Alisa takes on a part-time job ghosts to pay for tuition. By glimpsing the ghost’s past memories and providing compassionate nursing care, help them rest in peace! A medical and occult RPG made by a REAL NURSE!

games.name: Bulk
games.description: Collect cards, mix them, watch them rise their rank, sell for gold, and invest in upgrades. Stack, mix, sell and repeat... The machines in this dark fantasy factory keep humming, and the profits are waiting for you...

games.name: Fast & Fractured
games.description: Step into typical Spanish sun-baked places and prepare for Fast & Fractured experience, a frenetic physics-based driving shooter for up to 8 contenders— in a chaotic multiplayer battle royale. Choose from 4 colorful elderly characters and battle in stereotypical Spanish maps

games.name: Undergone: Before
games.description: Explore the story of Kale Vortex in a world where nature thrives — until every step begins to change it.

games.name: The Story of Mikagoyama
games.description: This is an RPG where you explore a mountain called Mikagoyama. The water from this mountain is very delicious.The water from this mountain is very delicious.The water from this mountain is very delicious.The water from this mountain is very delicious.The water from this mountain is very delicious.Th

games.name: Mystic Tavern
games.description: Mystic Tavern - co-op simulator tavern and farm with a mystical twist. Build your homestead, explore multiple map regions, harvest and mine resources, cook dishes and brew potions. Customize your character, bond with charming NPCs, and face subtle horror after sundown as you uncover hidden truths.

games.name: Starburst Fever Night
games.description: Enjoy fast-paced match-3 puzzle battles! Quickly move star blocks and aim for chain reactions!

games.name: Wubbo: PuterPal
games.description: Meet Wubbo, your cozy desktop companion! Fish, cook, craft, and more together in this relaxing idle RPG for your screen.

games.name: Quiet in the Library
games.description: Quiet in the Library is a point and click horror game about working the night shift in a library while danger lurks.

games.name: Beta Massage Parlor Simulator
games.description: 建造并经营你的按摩店，雇佣伊莲、阴婷、贝塔柔、肌肉男等员工为你工作，自定义装饰你的按摩店，应付警察的审查，打造出属于你的独特按摩店吧！

games.name: Football Club Inside
games.description: Lead a small football club through one unforgettable season. Make tough choices, face the media, manage morale and ambition — every decision shapes your story in this cinematic, story-driven football management drama.

games.name: Idle Garden
games.description: This little garden quietly grows at the bottom of your desktop. With a bit of patience and care, it brings you more delightful plants and decorations. Arrange your desk garden with love, and let it be your gentlest companion through work and rest alike.

games.name: Echoes of Pinebridge
games.description: A slice-of-life college story that gradually develops into a supernatural mystery, all guided by your choices.

games.name: A Game About Opening a Chest
games.description: Open the chest, collect legendary swords, craft powerful synergies, and amass enough gold to pay the King. Dodge the Goblin, survive the Dragon’s fire, and earn the Angel’s blessing. Can you conquer the dungeon and reach 2,000,000,000 gold coins?

games.name: Two Dollar Suits
games.description: Two Dollar Suits combines the very best of the Action-Strategy genre into a fast-moving criminal playground, where players thrive in creativity and exploration. Complete intricate levels and create your own paths using skill, ingenuity, and raw power.

games.name: Starving Merchant
games.description: Being a merchant is hard enough, but with constant dragon attacks, demon resurrections, and magical wars, it's just about impossible. Nevertheless, it is your dream. Pick your wares, bargain with customers, and communion with the gods. Just don't invest it all in gold right before a kraken awakens.

games.name: The Starforge
games.description: A short incremental game about harvesting planets to feed your mothership. Mine, manage resources, grow your fleet, and unlock upgrades to evolve your species. You are the devourer of worlds.

games.name: The Second Reality Room: Unspoken Truths
games.description: Decode the "Second Reality." Decipher the true feelings behind the words of Visitors you can't fully understand. Talk. Read minds. Translate. An empathy-driven psychological mystery adventure that doesn't turn chuunibyo—an adolescent delusion syndrome—into a joke, but gets to how they really feel.

games.name: Dung Battles
games.description: An action puzzle game where you play as a dung beetle, battling against your beetle peers to create the biggest dung ball. Battle online to test your ball rolling skills, strategically roll up items to win in challenge mode, or follow a young beetle's journey home in story mode.

games.name: Pawful Dice
games.description: The cutest roguelike deckbuilder, where you roll your animal dice to win! Add new dice, level them up, pick up items, greed! Every strategy works as long as you can defeat the Mushroom King...

games.name: Frog Up!
games.description: Jump, Rise, and Pose! This 3D action game challenges you to climb steps from a third-person view. Score points with each jump and aim to reach the goal—but don't fall into the water! You can strike a cool pose to get special items. The cooler the pose, the better the rewards. How high can you go?

games.name: Tidewake
games.description: Enter the uncharted seas of TideWake in this single player naval roguelite. Explore uncharted oceans and defend your vessel from dangerous foes. Collect and customize your ship with powerful parts and mystical trinkets to become the most powerful pirate in history! Sink into chaos. Rise a legend.

games.name: HeroTail: Survivors
games.description: HeroTail Survivors is a run-based roguelike where your heroes form a living chain. Level up, recruit followers, and stack powerful set bonuses while battling through waves of enemies and unlocking permanent upgrades.

games.name: Sokogram
games.description: Sokogram merges Nonogram logic grids with Sokoban box-pushing puzzles. Each level blends both systems into one unified challenge with handcrafted designs that reward deduction over guessing.

games.name: Logistics Simulator: America
games.description: Drive across the United States as a professional trucker. Deliver cargo on highways and backroads, manage your fleet, develop your warehouses, and run a realistic logistics business. Plan routes, manage fuel and time, and take on the real challenges of life behind the wheel.

games.name: Steel Force: Top Down Shooter
games.description: STEEL FORCE is a top-down shooter. Attack robots, use your shield, and push your skills to the limit. Run, dash, and break through waves of armed machines.

games.name: Deg
games.description: A non-linear pure puzzle game where you solve various puzzles using logical reasoning. Explore unknown puzzles in the game world.

games.name: Ghosts With Hats
games.description: Ghosts With Hats is a fast-paced top-down arcade racing game where ghosts compete on dynamic tracks. Collect relics, upgrade your unique character, and dash to victory!

games.name: Girl of the Ruins
games.description: “Girl of the Ruins” is a horror-mystery adventure game set in the future. One day, a girl who looks exactly like you suddenly appears. As you follow this suspicious girl, you will eventually uncover the truth of the world.

games.name: The Lone Sword
games.description: The Lone Sword is a narrative platformer where YOU are the weapon. As a living Sword, embark on a nostalgic journey to find your Maker. Explore the Castle, solve physics puzzles, master the blade with unique mechanics, and reflect on your purpose in this emotionally rich adventure.

games.name: Iris
games.description: Control Iris, a messenger who walks through a spiritual realm, guiding lost people who seek peace. An action-platformer focused on music, combat, and atmosphere.

games.name: Floating Frontiers
games.description: A minimalist strategy game about growing your infinite floating town. Combine wacky 3D blocks to optimize synergies, build idyllic scenery, and chase your high score.

games.name: Journey to the King
games.description: Journey to the King is a 2D pixel art platformer inspired by classic platformer games. You play as a knight on a quest through dangerous lands to reach the kingdom and help the king who urgently awaits your arrival.

games.name: Wagon 00
games.description: Observation game about anomalies in a train car: spot changes, choose back or forward, advance by a streak of correct choices. No HUD; focus on attention and memory.

games.name: DripDrip: The First Incremental Horror Game!
games.description: If your computer was given a double-dose of Benadryl, this is the nightmare it'd have. How much blood can you keep while you study and work?

games.name: FuJianStrike
games.description: Command the deck crew, experience the aircraft carrier deck scheduling process, ensure the smooth take-off and landing of aircraft, and ensure that the aircraft carrier can defeat the endless stream of enemies.

games.name: Captain Speedfin
games.description: Ahoy, matey! The clock is ticking for Captain Speedfin. Trapped with an hourglass that never stops, this pirate has only one choice: run. Your mission is simple but brutal: navigate 60 intense platforming levels to reclaim your chests before the last grain of sand falls. There are no special powers here—just pure skill. Every jump, slide, and dash is a test of your reflexes. In this world, the slightest mistake is fatal.

games.name: Micro Rush
games.description: A Seconds-Long Speedrunning game about short levels and fast gameplay. The average level only takes a couple seconds to finish, so you can replay and hone your skills to earn higher medal ranks.

games.name: Horror Scenarios: The Redwood Estate
games.description: Investigate the Redwood Estate as officers Tim Rieff and Kim Hansbury in this classic top-down survival horror game. Face terrifying creatures, manage scarce resources, and uncover the dark secrets behind the mysterious events that took place within the estate.

games.name: Posse of 3
games.description: Posse of Three is an RPG Maker game that takes place in a wild west setting with heavy fantasy elements! You will play as 3 main characters. Sammy a young settler, Ahiga a native man, and Fennic a wild fawn. Expect traditional turn based rpg combat with a gripping wild west story.

games.name: Italian Pizza Simulator
games.description: Become a true pizzaiolo and bring joy to a small Italian village in Italian Pizza Simulator! Help bring back Grandma’s decrepit pizzeria to its former glory, surrounded by the sun-kissed hills of Tuscany, and serve colorful customers from all over the world!

games.name: Dungeon Walk 4: Solitary Insect Princess
games.description: The main character is a card user. defeats monsters and strengthens his cards and aim for the depths of the labyrinth. Even if he is defeated by a monster and dies the hero has the ability to repeat the loop the power of the strengthened card is inherited, challenge the labyrinth again and again.

games.name: Friends of a Feather
games.description: An absurd adventure RPG: ruin weddings, break into dinosaur mansions, and sleep with 3 or 4 opossums.

games.name: Godway
games.description: A breathtaking run on rails to the heavens! Godway tests you with dynamic obstacles, platform jumping, and escalating difficulty. Fall, rise again, and push your limits to claim your place beside the god at the summit. The path to immortality begins here.

games.name: TomaDo!
games.description: TomaDO! is a fast, quirky multiplayer platformer where tomato heroes race through floating obstacle courses, dodge hazards, and respawn at checkpoints. Jump, dash, and explore golf and other modes to reach the finish first.

games.name: ExoTrain
games.description: Build your base on the train. Explore the exoplanet, fight dangerous wildlife, and discover what happened to the human colony on this planet. Upgrade your train and combine gear modules for perfect survival. Play solo or co-op with friends!

games.name: Royal Verdict
games.description: A medieval court simulation where every verdict matters. Hear cases, uncover lies, and balance the King, the People, and the Church as your reputation shapes the fate of the kingdom.

games.name: Low Earth Orbit Adventures
games.description: Low Earth Orbit Adventures is a relaxing space sim set in the near future where the space around Earth has become a frontier of science, commerce and diplomacy. Retrieve the Hubble, rescue astronauts, assemble space stations and many other missions in this realistic but friendly adventure.

games.name: Bhangarh: The Untold Story
games.description: A story driven survival horror game that puts you in the shoes of a journalist investigating a real-life haunted site, pulling you deep into its cursed corridors as you solve environmental puzzles and struggle to survive the malevolent force that stalks you from the shadows.

games.name: Rich River
games.description: Forage the nature for treasures, sell your finds, and use the profits to build a thriving city. Explore, trade, upgrade your tools, and transform the reaches in this cozy clicker life sim.

games.name: Frost Loop
games.description: Frost Loop is a survival city builder set on a train in the snow. Build, Manage, and Pilot the train carrying the last of humanity in a world of snow and storms. Can the warmth of humanity survive on the run? Or is it destined to go cold.

games.name: Chrysanthemum: On the Way to Sweet Dreams
games.description: A high school senior with superpowers longs to confess her feelings to her chemistry teacher, but the island’s mysterious anomalies turn her world upside down. A non-linear otome visual novel filled with sinister mysteries and complicated choices.

games.name: Sheeps
games.description: Kill a sheep - Feed it to a tree - Listen to a poem. Sheeps is a poem-based adventure in a small open-world. Find 200+ poems contained within the sheeps roaming the world. As more poems are read, explore more of the world and interact with the characters from the poems.

games.name: Sunset Racing
games.description: Take on friends in a top-down RC racer that incorporates the best of karting games.

games.name: Ballatory
games.description: Ballatory is a short, 100%-able incremental idler where you BUY, UPGRADE, PAINT, and watch your BALLS bouncing around, hitting the cores and earning you money!

games.name: The Quiet Days of Dorothy
games.description: During the 2020 lockdown, Dorothy spends her days caring for jars of sourdough starters. By sharing them with others, she builds unexpected connections and discovers small acts of kindness that bring warmth in difficult times.

games.name: Rebellion Princess
games.description: Raise your favorite characters and have them ready to fight in the next run! Command beautiful girls to defend the castle and princess A non-reset roguelite × tower defense

games.name: Blood Facsimile
games.description: An immersive FPS adventure set in a dark and surreal scifi world

games.name: Flipper of Eridanus
games.description: A fantastical sci-fi pinball experience featuring advanced physics, unique table mechanics, mini-games, and a full pinball tutorial!

games.name: Wunder: The Double-sided Deckbuilder
games.description: Wunder is a game of chance about flipping coins. Build a deck of coins with their own risk & reward; upgrade each side to tilt the odds in your favour, bolster your strategy with strange talismans and defeat the Ferryman at his own game.

games.name: P-Pan
games.description: Armed with a big smile and punches that fly endlessly,have fun progressing! P-PAN can fly and hovering,so even if you're not good at play jumping action,this 2D action shooting game has simple controls that can enjoy.

games.name: Rentcthulhu
games.description: A dark fairytale deckbuilder where you serve Ancient Gods. Reconstruct shattered stories using card suits and racial synergies. Stack high scores to complete Oracle challenges in this twisted roguelike adventure. Can you mend the fragments before the darkness wins?

games.name: Red Tape Rampage
games.description: You're the boss of bureaucracy. Exploit interns, automate the red tape and climb the corporate ladder in this satirical idle empire builder.

games.name: Nodosis
games.description: Nodosis is a tic-tac-toe-inspired rogue-like deckbuilder where you play an endless game of high-scores, tile synergies and mysteriously accursed rings. Score, Retrigger, Multiply, Modify, Win and Lose. It's up to you how you want to play this game, Nodosis. Willing to take the chance?

games.name: Scrybe
games.description: SCRYBE is an incremental game with multiple playstyles. Battle cities for hidden resources, unlock secrets and gear, and progress at your own pace. There’s no right way to play — choose your path and enjoy the journey!

games.name: Mystery Egg Shop Simulator
games.description: Run your very own mystery egg shop! Stock shelves, manage customers, and grow your business. Every egg hides a surprise, you can sell them sealed, or open them to discover what’s inside? Unbox action figures, trade collectibles, and build themed dioramas to increase their value.

games.name: Combo Vectors
games.description: Evade enemies and their attacks and fight back using the Braille alphabet in Combo Vectors, a short and minimalist action roguelike.

games.name: Scumbag Streamer
games.description: Scumbag Streamer is a story RPG game where you play as a streamer. Interact with NPCs and the environment to get as much money and viewers as possible! Your choices will determine the type of streamer you are and the audience you get.

games.name: Starnded: Gardens of the Rubellite
games.description: Starnded: Gardens of the Rubellite is a first-person sci-fi survival RPG. Explore an alien planet, gather resources, build your base, and survive a world that's both beautiful and deadly.

games.name: Smash Simulator
games.description: Inherit a failing company and transform it into a destruction empire! Build and manage your own Rage Rooms, let clients smash objects to relieve stress… and turn it all into profit!

games.name: HamsterCraft
games.description: Defend and grow your cheese with an army of heroic hamsters in this chaotic 2D Tower Defense adventure! Build, upgrade, and outwit waves of enemies, all while keeping things squeaky clean.

games.name: Mace Knight
games.description: Line 'em up and bring the pain in this action-packed arcade game. Grab your mace of choice, bash your way through hordes of enemies, and compete for the top score on the leaderboard!

games.name: Fly High Runners
games.description: Race against up to five frenemies as jetpack couriers trying to deliver contraband through a pulsing cyberpunk skyline. Master the questionably-engineered flight system, manage fuel & inventory, collect power-ups and EMP blast rivals into cop drones.

games.name: Meowniverse
games.description: Merge endless cats on your desktop! Every cat you adopt becomes a unique part in your Collection. Evolve your cats, complete the Collection, and enjoy their company. They’ll embark on adventures, bringing you coins and fish! Get ready to huff cats and let their sweet meows lift your spirits!

games.name: Tank Brigade
games.description: Explore a tactical top-down tank shooter set across diverse biomes. Each run offers a unique experience with procedurally generated levels and a variety of powerful weapons to unlock.

games.name: Poodle Kick
games.description: The world’s most accurate poodle-kicking simulator. Made for horrible people like you.

games.name: Tohotopia
games.description: A 4X strategy craze sweeps Gensokyo! As the "Esports Tournament" begins, the girls join the fray. Warlords rise: will you be "Pharaoh" Remilia, "Emperor" Kaguya, "Great" Kanako, or "Philosopher King" Miko? Launch the game now, lead your empire, and dominate Gensokyo!

games.name: Dead 4 Now: Bio-weapon Simulator
games.description: Craft bio-weapons, master lethal science, and unleash global annihilation. Experiment. Fail. Adapt. Evolve. Repeat until humankind falls.

games.name: Math Is Hard
games.description: math is hard! or is it? Push, calculate and solve your way through challenging Sokoban-style puzzles. Strategically manipulate numbered blocks and operators to reach the target value and clear the level. Are you up for the challenge?

games.name: Cannabiz: Weed Shop Owner
games.description: Build, customise, and grow your cannabis empire from a tiny shop to a booming city-wide business!

games.name: Star Wrath
games.description: Star Wrath is a multiplayer space extraction-action where you design your own ship and fight other players for resources in intense PvP and PvE battles.

games.name: Donutal
games.description:
You awaken from a cold sleep and suddenly find yourself in the year 2206. What you once knew as the International Space Station is now the International Space Port—a gateway for aliens coming to Earth. Crushed by a massive, unexplained debt, you’re forced into a job you never asked for: Chief Xeno Inspector.

Seems simple enough, just wave in the friendly aliens and turn away the dangerous ones. However, make the wrong call and Earth could be destroyed. No pressure though, right?
